item.text: dul ba gzhi////bam po nyi shu drug pa//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bkur sti ma yin pas
bsnyengs pa yin gyis/ bcom lda na 'das rgyal po'i khab nas
bzhud de/ gnod par gyur ta zhes ma smras sam/ de ni 'di yin no/
yum de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bu bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol cig/ yum
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa'i rngo mi thogs lags so// bu khyod kyis sas rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tsan dan dang ste'u ma nyam pa/ khong khro ba dang/ rjes su chags
ba spangs pa yin no zhes ma thos sam/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dpung pa gcig la ste'u yis 'jog
bar byed la/ cig shos la tsan dan sa mchog gis nyug par byed na/ de la bcom ldan 'das rjes su chags pa yang mi mnga' khong
khro ba yang mi mnga'o// de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ mi zhig la smras pa/ kye nang rje tshur shog/ khyod
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la son nas/ kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos
te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba zhung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ gnod pa mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang bde ba la
reg par bzhugs sam zhes snyun gsol la/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/ btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal
po ma skyes dgra'i mchid nas/ btsun pa bu ngan pa ni mchis kyi/ pha ngan pa ni ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ rgyal
po'i khab tu gshegs par gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer stongs te ming lus
par 'gyur ro zhes gsol cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas chas te/ rim gyi mnyan yod
du phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu
'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga
ba d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa chungum/ nyam nga ba cung dam/ zhes bya ba nas/ reg par bzhugs sam zhes
snyan gsol lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kya mi khyod dang/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga ng+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dag bde bar gyuratsug/ btsun pa lus 'phagos ma'i bu yul
ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mchid nas/ btsun pa bu nganapa ni mchis kyi pha ngan pan ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ rgyal po'i khab tugashugs su gsol/
gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs n zhes bya ba nas/mang lus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas mi de la gnang ngo// nga nus mi des
bcom ldan 'das chung mi gsung bas gnang bar ' gnas /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das jisrid bzhed kyi bar dumanyan yod du bzhugs nas/ nyan thos kyi dge

'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i khab gangan bder rgyu zhung gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pan yul ma ga d+har byon to// bcom ldan 'das kyimathus rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis ni dug gas
malung bar byas pa'i chude dag bsams so// char pa 'babs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ngo// lha rnams ni char pa 'babs pa la bzhugs so//sangs rgyas la mngon par
dad pa'i lha rnams kyis ni rgyal po'i khab nas mi ma yin ba rnams bskradanas mi ngas zhi bar gyur to// mtha'i rgyal phran dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong nas
grong khyer bskor ba btang ste dong ngo// tshong ba rnams kyis ni theng dag bkramamo/ bzo phal pa gzhan dag gis nir nga rang byed par brtsamasaso/ khul so so nas gnas pa'i tshong pa rnams dang//
da dbon rnams ni 'ong dang 'jug bar brtsams so// lo ni legs par gyur to// lam po che dang/ srang dang/ sum mdo dang/ bzhi mdo rnams su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid chen po sgrog
bar gyur to// mu stegs pa rnams ni bag 'khums par gyur to// skyabo'i tshogs rnams nirang tu dga' bar gyur to// lus la phags ma'i bu yu lam ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan
'das yul ma ga d+har gshegs so zhes grosaso// thos nas kyang snying dga' bo dang/ dgu ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ dga' ba chen bo dang/ yidi bde ba skyes nas/ blon bo rnams la smras
lha ba shes ldan dag dang la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi par dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi lam bstar ba dang/ grong khyer dag bzang bor byos shig/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thamasacad kyang rdob dang/

zhi gseg mdang/ gyo mo so'i te/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag thob la dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po sbyongs shig/ dri zhim po'i ngo ga bor dgashoms la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dag tshugs shig/ bar bar du/
tsa me tog gi gzhal med mdzes pa dag byos shig/ lhabaka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blonabo rnams kyis lus da ba 'phags ma'i bu yul mag rta'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas thams cad rgyas par byed/
dubcug go/ de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hu'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pa dang/ rgyal po chen po'i mthus/ bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang sur song ngo//
donas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba/ 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba/ 'khor grolar/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin nga/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra
bcomal/ 'khor dgra bcomal/ 'dod chagasadang bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa/ 'khor mdzes pa// khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po glang
bo che'i phrug gu'i tshog sakyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor pa lta bu/ dang pa'i rgyal po dang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' ldang 'dab chags kyi tshogs
kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa 'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo dmag ga tshigs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan
'gron pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshong dpon rang gi skye bas bskor ba lta bu/ rgyal phran blon po'i tshigs kyis bskor ba lta bu// 'khor los
sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu// nyim 'od g zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul la khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu
lus 'phags bo grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu ba tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nor sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lcabu/ thag bzangs sa lham yan gyi tshog
kyis bskor ba ltakhu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi chogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho mi g.yo ba lta bu/ sprin chudang bcas pa lta bu/
glang po che dam brgyags pa dang bral bltar dbang po rnams shin tudul bsam g.yengs pa'i spyod lam gyi spyod pa can/ skuskyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa// dpe
byad bzang po brgyad cusamadzes bar byas pa// sku 'od 'dom khang gis brgyan pa/ nyis stong gi bod gtsor bas lhag pa rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang/
mo 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ ma 'dres pa gsum dang/ dran ng bar gzhag pa dang/ thugs rjechen po dang ldan pa// dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu mang bo dang/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga

d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang/ lha brgya stong phrag dums zhamaring byas te rgyal po'i khabakyi grong khyer du gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'adas rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/ mngon par 'du byed
0 bdung bcas bas/ grong khyer gyi sgo'i thim bu la zhabs g.yas pas mnanapa de'i tshos rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sachen po 'digagos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab/
tuldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg cing/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mthon lho phyogs dma'
mtha' mgron dbus dma'/ dbus mthon mtha' dma' bar gyur to// 'jig rten 'di 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas pa thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen bos gsal bar gyur to// ltas kyang bar snang
la cha dag brdungs so// nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyisani bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+madang/ ku mu ta dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ a ka ru'i bum
dung rgya spos kyi phyam dang/ gur kumagyi phyam dang/ tama'a'i 'broma'i phyam dang/ lha'i me togaman dar ba dang/ gos dag 'thor bar byed de/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer dugshegs ngan/
de lta bu'i ya mtshan dag byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang dog ba dag ni yangs par gyur to// dma' ba dag mtho bar gyur to/ mthob dag ni phyal le bar gyur to// glang bo che dag ni skad 'byin
par gyur to// rtadagakyang skad 'byin par gyur to// khyu mchog dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to// khyim gyi nang na bzhag ba'i snod sna tshogs dag ma brdus bar ng sgra 'byin par gyurato// long ba
rnams kyis ni mig thob par gyur to// 'on pa rnams ni bas sgra thos par gyur to/ lkugs pa rnams ni smra nus par gyur to// dbang po lcagam ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po so so/
thob par gyur to// mngagis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to// dug 'thungs pa dag ni dug zhi bar gyur to// banatsun khon byung ba rnams ni mdza' bar gyur to// sbrum ma dag ni bde bar
btsas pa'i gyur to/ btson du bcings pa dag ni thar par gyur to// nor med pa dag ninor red par gyur to// de lta bu'i 'byor ba d mthong nasaM/ dge bsnyen zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smas pa/ tshul
gang zhig tu 'jig rten gtso bo gshigs pa der/ lo nyes mi ngas dang ni phyi dgra'i 'jigs pa med// lha rnams char 'bebs skye bo bsod nams rab tu byed// der ni ya mtshan bargya phrag gzhan yang 'byung
bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te skyepo'i tshogs dbugs phyung nas/ rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ 'od ma'i tshal du gshegs so// de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu
[% ]yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcomo ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu
'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yulam gad+hi'i rgyal bo ma skyes dgra la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug bar mdzad/
yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// da nas lus 'phags ma'i ba lul ma gadz+ha'i
rgyal bom skyes dgra/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod de/ rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs ti bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba/
der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudad/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/ bdag gis dgung zla gsum dun bza'i tshes
gos dang/ bsod snyomos dang/ gzin sa chadang/ stunadapyad kyi rkyen sman dang/ yo byad 'bul zhing mchis na/ gnang ba ra mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu
yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gonang ngo//den lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das cang migasung bas gnang bar rig nas
btsam ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ stan las langs tasong ngo// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ lus 'phags ma'i du yul mag
d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzims chadang/ stun dpyad kyi rkyenasman dang/ yo byad rnams kyisakhasenabakur byas so// de nas
sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba'i lha rnams kyis/ mi sa de bsad nas rgyal po de babs byung nas sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba'i nang du byung ste/ yangs pa can du 'dug nas/

yangs pa can gyi skye bo'i tshog salami ngas byang bar gyur te/ khyogs dang phyogs 'dudapar gyur to// yangs pa can na bram 'i mdun na 'donamada' bo che zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i rmi lam na/ yangs pa
can naganag pa'i lha zhig gis smras pa// gal te mi 'dul kha la sbyar ba'i mchog/ shAkya'i rigs dga' ba yi bcom ldan 'das// yangs pa can du gshegs par gyur na ni// gnod pa rnams ni
rnam par 'jigs bar 'gyur// des nam nas nas yangs pa can gyi 'atsa byi rnams la smras pa// shes ldan dag bdag gi rmi lam 'di 'dra gzhig mthong ngo// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes
ldan dag de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya su zhig gtang khos phan tshun bgro bar brtsams pa dang/ mdun na 'donamada' bo che 'di nyid thams cad du nus pa yin la/
bdag cag la yang byamanye pa yan gyis gtang ngo// de la do dag gis smas pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la phyin nas/ bdag cag gi tshig gis bcom ldan 'angs kyi zhabs gnyis la
mgo bos phyag khyos la/ gnod pa chung dam/ nyam ngang nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas/ snyan gasol ba zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/ btsun pa yangs
pa can gyi tshogs kyimachid nas/ bcom ldan 'das yangs ba can du gshegs sugaso'/ gal tapa 20 yangs pa can du ma gshegs n/ ring po ma thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can/
stongs shing mingalus par 'gyur ro zhes gsol cig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan drag lus 'phags pa'i shu par gtsA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra ni khyed la yun ring du gnod pa byed pa'i phyir/ rgol/
ba dgra boragyur pa yin pas bdag la gnodapa byed par mi 'gyur grong/ de dag gis tshigs su bcad de smras/ yul 'khor gzhan dang 'gyed par yang// pho nyami gsod ces grag na//
khyod ni rgyal ba'i pho nya yin// kun gyis mi gsodosmos ci dgos// de nas mdun na 'don mda' bzhi dag patshan dang/ bkrapashis dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te/ rim gyis
rgyal po 'o khab tu phyin nas/ lam gyis dubar bsal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag por dga' bar gyur ba dang/
yang dag par mgukhar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mdun na 'donamada' bo ches/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/
to/ kyi go'u ta ma yas bcan gyi tshogs bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal// gnod pa chung ngas/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/
gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang bdebal reg par spyodadam zhes snyan gasol lags so// mda' bo che khyod dang yangs pa can gyi tshogs bde bar gyur cig kyi go'u
blo tam yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs su gso'o// gal te bcom ldan 'das yangs ba can du mgashegasan/ ring bo mi thogs pa khonar yangs/
ba can skyongs shing ming tsam lus bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ mda' bo che 'di'i nga nyanathos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tulus 'phags ma'i bu yul
ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ zla ba gsum du lo khyad thams cad kyis bstabs pas rgyal bo la rtogs shig/ gal te rgyal pos gnang na/ nga de bzhin du gshegs par bya'o// des

te/ yangs pa can du bcom ldan 'das ni 'di skad ces gsung ngo zhes spring ngo// de rnams kyis kyang sbring ba de nyid kyi phyir khyod lus 'phags ma'i bu patshul mgat+ta'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gangan ba der song la son/
nas bdag cag gitshig gis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul mgat+ta'i rgyal po ma skyes dgral/ gnodapa chung ngam/ nyamang ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am gnodob ma maisan/
stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang dris la/ 'di skad ces lhabcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs par bcom ldan 'adas la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ lhas
0 gal te bcom ldan 'das la rjesasumaganangan/ rid po mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing/ mi rus par gyur ro zhes smos shig/ de nas mdun na 'donamada' bo ches bsams pa//
ci'i zhig rgyal bo la bsnyenapar bya'am/ 'on te blon po rnams la bya snyam du bsams pa dang/ de 'di snyam du sems te 'ga' zhig gibasnyen par mi bya ste// 'on kyang bsAnaparabyed pa la bsnyenapar
bya'ozhes 'byungabs/ mdor na blonapo rnams la bsnyen par bya'o snyam nas/ sa blon po rnams langasAnabar bya bar brtsams so// de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa// mdunan 'don dgos
bci zhig la 'os/ des smras pa// shes ldan dag kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha la gsol ba 'debs su mchis kyis/ khyed cag gis grogs mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/
de bzhinadu byas kho bo cag gis ji tsam na bos pa de'i tshe khyod shog cig/ danas de dag gis skabs shes nas bos pa dang/ de nas mdunan 'donamada' bo che 'as 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i
rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song ste sonanas/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la rgyal bo dang/ tshe spel ba dag byas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig
tu'adu gnas mdunan 'don mda' bo ches lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'a'adi skad ces smras so// lha yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mched nas/ lha la gnod pa chung ngas/
re bar gnas sam zhes bya ba rgyas par snyan gasol la// mda' bo che khyod dang yangs pa can gyi tshogs bde bar gyur cig/ lca yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyimachid nas/ 'di skad
ces lha bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can dugshegs bar bcom ldan 'das la rjesasu gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ lhasaga' te bcom ldan 'das rjes su ma gnang na/ ring po ma gas pa kho nar yangs
pa can stongs shing mang lus par bgyur ro zhes mchi'o// rgyal bos smras pa// mda' bo che kho bos yun ring mo zhig nas kye ma yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa de/ gal
te yas pa can gyi gnas stongs par rgyun/ khob yid la bsam pa tshog sazhung phus rdzogs par ma gyur tam/ dek+kad ces smras pa dang mda' bo che song/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ b+habacos
ldan 'das kyis sems can gcig kyang los su btang ba lta mchis sam shes ldand med do// de ltan lhas bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis// lhas bcom ldan 'das la rjes
suganang yang rung/ ma gnang yang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ni langs pa can gyisim can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gshegs par 'gyur ba nyid do// rgyal pos smras pa/ shesaldan dag kho bos ma
shes kyis/ gal te de ldan khug cig/ dedag gis mda' bo bkug nas rgyal bos smras pa mda' bo che kho bos dam bca' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su gnang bar bya'o// gal te kho bos
bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang/ bsnyenang kur ci 'dra ba byas pa de khon 'dra bar yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis byas na/ daltan kho bos rjes su gnangango// des yangs pa can pa rnams la rgyal po 'di/
skad ces gsung ngo zhes smreng ngo// de rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal bomig cig bur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang/ kur sti byed na/ bdag cag tshogs su gyur bas ci ste mi bya zhes/
dadag gis bcom ldan 'das gshegs sugasolacig dang/ bdugacag gis bcom ldan 'das la de bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchod pa dang/ bkur sti bgyi'o zhes springang// de
nas mda' bo tshos/ de dag rgyal po la rigapar byas so// de nas 'as 'phags ma'i bu yul mgat+ta'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan/
'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogasagacig tu 'dug nas/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma gtsA'i rgyal bo ma skyes dgros/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig l/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar dun babra 'chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzims cha dang/
snyan dpyad kyi rkyen smanadang/ yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid bar spro lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la khrugasabartse bas gnang bar mi 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan
0 @#// bdas bdag gis chod kyi/ gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lus 'gas ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgrul
zla cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo/ de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga pa'i rgyal pom sa dgras/ bcom ldan 'das rung mi gsung bas gnang bar ri gnas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo// de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul mgadz+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras de nyid kyi mtshan monas zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zinanas/
phyag bcabs te lhung bzed grubar ri gnas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gser gyi bum bum blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
kyis klu gdug pa dang/ gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni brtul 'gasan/ btsun pa klu'i rgyal bo sogam med 'di yun ring mo zhi gnas / bdag cag la sha bonam mchis bar ni sha khobgyid/
'gran zla ma mchis par ni 'gran zlar gyur/ gnod pa ma mchis par ni gnod pa bgyidapar gyur te/ le tog gang dag skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gzon par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs
brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med legs par gdul bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang
ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu lam gtsA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la yon bsko ba mdzad nas gshegs te/ gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan
bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' sa/la pa/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo//
byang phyogasanani phan yonalnga yodape/ lta gapazhen/ me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang/ chu phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bsod snyoms med pa dang/ skya/
ba'i tshogs drang bo yod do zhes gsungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du bzhugs so// de nas lus 'apagasam gi bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po'i khab nas/
nu bo gapa'i bar gyi lam dang grong khyer dag thang du stor du bcug ste/ lam rdo ba dang/ gseg ma dang/ gyo mo thams cad bsal nas/ tsan danagyi chus chag chag btab/ dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi pog
boradag bshams/ darakyi chun 'phyang mang po dpas/ bar bar du me tog gi gzhal med khang dag byas so// yangs pa can gyi la tsa byi rnams kyis chu bo gang+ gnas / yangs pa can gyi bar du de bas
lhag par chad par du 'phags par lam dang grong khyer dag stor du bcug go/ de nas nga com ldan 'das dgongs kanang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te/ tshe dang ldan ng kun dga' bo
gal bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bon 'an da gang na ba der 'dong ngo// btsunapa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan ng kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyananas/
de nas bcom ldan 'das dang/ yul mag dz+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pan/ nakhanadar byenanas ni lan dan a bra'i tshol dgag dbyecan zhes bya ban bzhugs so// de'i tshonalan dan kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i
tshong pa zhes bya brgas pa/ 'khogs ba/gzugs ba/ btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa zhig gnas pa la/na lan da'i bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams la bkur sti byed/ blamar byed/ ri mor byed/
mchod par byed de dgra bcom par bkur ro// de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong ba'i sngon gyi grogs po dang/ blon po dang/ gnyen dang/ snag gi gnyena mtshams su gyur pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'disAn
dusams te/ gal te bdag gis/ kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa la 'di skad ces drang srong khyod tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces sman/ gang yang bdag

gis tshig mi snyan pa de srid ngas ma la bdag de'i drung du song ste/ yid kyi dri ba 'dzan du gzhug go snyam nas/ de nas lha de kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong ba gangan ba der song ste phyin nas/ kun tu rgyu/
'dam bu'i tshong pa la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong tshur shog/ kho bo las yid kyi dri ba khong la kun nub par gyis shig/ jiltar mdza' bo ma yin r la mdza' bo ltar ba cos pa yin par blta
bar bya/ jiltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya/ ci'i phyir sdong/ ltar chad med ba thob/ drang srong gang zhig khyod kyi dri ba yid kyisa mngon par 'dus byas pa 'di dag tshig/

gis lung ba statshabar sems rangs par byed pa de'i thad du khyod tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces smras nas/ de nyid du ma snang bar gyur te// de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshongs pas lha de las yid
kyi dri ba bzung ste// kun chub bar byas nas/ 'od srungs rdzogs byed gong na ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'od srungs rdzogs byed kyi drung du/ yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa//
ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas/ ji ltar nad med ba thob par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'od spungs rdzogs
byed kyi de'i yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par mi shes na/ lan glan pa lta mos kyang ci dgos/ de nas kun tu rgyu'adam bu'i tshong pa 'di snyam du sems/
ti 'od srus rdzogs byed kyis bdag gi yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang ma shes/ rnam par me shesan/ lanangun pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam nas/ de kun tu rgyu
gnag lhas kyi budang/ smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang/ mi pham skra'i la ba can dang/ ka ta'i bu nog can dang/ gcer bu ba gnyen gyi bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nasaM/
gcer bu pa gnyenagyi bu'i mdun du yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas bu/ ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la 'dza' boltar bcos pa yin par bya zhes bya ba nas/gcer
bupagashen gyi bu'i bar gyis kyang/ bdag gi yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par shesan/ lan blan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar
gong ma bzhin du'o/ de nas kun tu rgyu'adam bu'i tshong pa 'di snyam du sems te/ gang la yid kyi drib yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i tshig gis lung bstan pa mi thob pa de 'dra ba'i rab tu
byung bas bdag la ci zhig bya/ bdag gi nye du rnams la longs spyod rgya cher yod ngas/ ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa la yang longs spyad cing/ sbyin pa yang btang/ bsod nams kyang
bya'o snyam mo// yang de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la bdag dge sbyong go'i tan gang na ba der 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de mus pa dang yang bsamasapa/ re zhig dge sbyong dang/ bram ze
rgan rabs gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'od srungasardzogs byed nas/ gcer bu paganyen gyi bu'i bar gong ma bzhin// de rnams kyis re zhig yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa
rnams kyang mishes/ rnam par mi shesan/ dge sbyong go'i tamanas gzhon pa gsar bu rab tu byung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam dubasams te/ slar ldog par 'dod pa las/ yang de
gdisnyam dusems te/ sngon gyi kun tu rgyu ba rgan 'khogs brjod pa'i slob dpon dag las/ bdag gis dge slong gzhon nu 'baras bar mi bya/ dge slong gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan bar
mi bya te/ dge slong gzhon yang de ni dbang cha ba/ ma che bar gyur pa lanin zhes thos so snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
sngar yod kyi zhu ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ ji ltar madza' bom yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas/ ji ltar nad med pa thob ces bya ba'i bar gongam/
bzhin du go/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis kun tu 'dam bu'i tshodapa'i bsamapa mkhyen nas/ de'i tsha tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mdza' bo gzhan la rnam par smod byed cing/
de ni bdag tu zad dozhes sprul// las kyang bla dgu 'dum zhing byed pa de// bdag gi bshesam yin barashes par bya// gang zhig bden pam yin tshig/ mdza' bo dag la skya byed cing// sna la
gsasu mi byed pa'i ng// mkhas pa rnams kyis shos shes te// de lta bu nidza' bo ma yin la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par shes par bya/ ji ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza'ago yan par
rig bar bya zhon/ gab zhig rtag tu bag med dbye ba yi// bsam pas glags lta de ni mdza' min gyi// gang zhig 'dir ni snying dang 'dra gyur bar// gzhan gyis mi phyed de ni mdza' bo yin//
de lta bu ni bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya'o// ci'i phyir klong na na/ skyes bu gces pa mkhar 'byin cing// 'bras khu'i blta bar byed pani// rab tu
dga' ba spyod pa'i gnas// rab bsngags 'dren pa'i zhi ba bsgom// de den du gnyer ba rab sgom mo// ji ltar du med pa thob cin/ rab tu dben pa'i ro dang ni// nyebar zhi ba'i ro shes nas// chos
la dga' ba'iri 'thung ba// nad med sdig pa medabar 'gyur// de ltar nand med pa thob bo// de nas kun tu 'dam bu'i tshong pa 'disnyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u tama'i thugs kyis ni// bdag gi bsam/
ba mkhyenano snyam du re gnas / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// go'u ta ma bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slongagi dngos po

thob pa ltan/ bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i spyan sngar bdag gisatshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// kun tu rgyu 'dum bu'i tshong pa legs par gsungs pa'i sa 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing//

bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slongagi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byun gnas atsho dang ldan pa dos zhes bya ba nas/ desems shin tu rnam par grolaba'i dgra bcom par gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong mo bzhin/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodangaldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grodadu 'dong ngo// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan/
pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang phyag bzhes ngumar bu can gyi grong khyer dang/ rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na rgyal po'i gnas
'od ma'i dbyug pa can na nub mo nye bar brten cing bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' na la pa/ dge slong dag nga dang khyed cag kho nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bo dag/
mashis/ ma mthong/ khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas/ lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to// nga de dag gang zhe na/ nga dang khyed cag kho nas zhes bya ba nas/ sdug bsngal 'di ga
ba'i bden pam shes/ ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin dug/ nga dang khyed cag khe nas zhes bya ba nas/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog
par 'gro ba'i 'am ma shes/ ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// ngas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bdon parjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs pas/ srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'kho
ba'i skye ba zad de/ danisrid pa gzhan med do// ngas sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bdenapa rjes su rtogs shing
so sor rtogs pas// srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad di/ ngani srid pa gzhan medad// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'astsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad
gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga dang khyed cag khon yis// 'phags pa'i bden ba pa'i bo dag/ jilta ba bzhin ma mthong
bas lam rid du ni 'khor bar gyur// bden pa de dag mthong nas ni// srid pa'i srid pa bcad nas su// 'khor ba skye ba zad pas na// dani srid pa gzhan med do// bcom ldan 'dasakyis
de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsalar/ kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong gang na par 'dong ngo// btsun ba bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang/ yul ma ga ng+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ dmar bu can gyi grong du byon te/ dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs so// dmar
bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas/ dmar bu can gyi grodadubyon te/ dmar bu can gyimad rtenanabazhugs s zhes
sago/ thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshog sadang/ khyunas khyur phradacing 'dusanas/ dmar bun gyi grong nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabasaganyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdaga rnams la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze dang khyim bdagadag lnga po 'di dag ni bag med pa nyis dmigs dag yin te/ lnga gang zhe na maze dang khyim bdag dag 'di la bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i
rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur ba gangayin pa 'di ni/ bag
med pa'i nyes dmigs dang bo yin no// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa ' gnas pa'i rgyus/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa dang/ bsngags pa ma yin pa dang/
grags ba ma yin pa'i sgra dang/ tshigasasu bcad bgrags par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa ngag modang la gnas pa'i rgyas/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa dang/
bsngags pa ma yin pa dang/ grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang/ tshigs su bcad pa grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bgamed pa'i nyes dmigs gnyis pa yin no// bram ze dang
khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med ba bgamed ba la gnas ba'i rgyus/ rgyal rigs kyi ba bar du'ang rung/ bram ze'i 'khor du'ang rung/ khyim bdag gi 'khor du'ang rung/ dag sbyong gi
'a khor du'ang rung/ 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i 'khor de dang der zhum zhum por gyur nas/ dga' ba med pa dang/ bag tshabs 'gro bar 'gyur skye/ bram ze dang
khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa ' gnas pa'i rgyus/ gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas/ bag tsha bas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma de bzhin du'o// 'dini bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gsum pa'o/
bram ze dang khyim bdag dgagazhan yang bag med pa bag med pa ' gnas pa'i rgyus// yid la gcags bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dgabag med pa ngagamed pa la gnas pa'i
rgyus yid la gcags bzhin 'chi bar 'gyurang gang yin pa 'dini/ bgomad pa'i nyes dmigs bzhi pa yin no// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i
ra rgyus 'as khrig nas shiba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dam ba ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur pa/ bram zo dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/
lus zhi gnas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro'ago bar ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'dini/ bag med pa'i nyes dranigs lnga pa yin no// bram/
ze dang khyim bdag dag lnga po 'di dag nibag yod pa'i banayen yin te/ lngagabazhen/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod ba la gnas pa'i rgyus/ 'angs spyod chen po
0 las nyams par mi 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dgabag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyas/ lengs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di'i/ bag yod
ba'i phan yon dang po yin no// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa ngag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su dge ba dang/ grags pa dang/
sgra dang/ tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen por grags par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yodapa bgo yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su dge ba dang/
grags pa dang/ sbya dang/ tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon gnyis pa yin no// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan
yang bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'ang rung/ bram ze'i 'khor du'ang rung khyim bdag gi 'khor du'ang rung/ dge sbyong gi la ber du'ang
rung/ 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba dadang dor zhum zhum bor ma yin pa dang/ dga' ng dang bag tshab med pas 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pal/
gnas pa'i rgyus zhes bya ba nas/ bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag yod nga 'i phan yon gsum pa yin no// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang/
bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas ba'i rgyus/ yid la gcags pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/
yid la gcags pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'din/ bag yod pa'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag yodapa la gnas pa'i
rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gromatho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dgabag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyas// lus zhig nas bde 'gro
mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag yod nga 'i phan yon lnga pa yin no// de nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram zedang khyim bdag rnams stan las las
te bla gos phrag pa gcig rtagazar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gsasu thal mo sbyarab btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
gi gnas su de mod bzhugs par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram bra dang khyim bdag rnams la cangamigasung bsaganang ngo// de nas dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang
khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cangami gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong
de ma ga d+ha'i sa chen po lagatogs pa dpar byed kyis/ dge sbyong ge'u dum ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgya zhing ga shegs pa na/ dmar bu can gyi grod du gshegs nas/ dmar bu can gyi

grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs te/ de la dmar bu can gyi grang gi dram ze dang khyim bdag rnoms kyis bkur sti byas so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rta rgod ma dang ldan pa'i shing rta/
thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs nas/ gser gyi bya mabum dang/ ril ba spyi blugs thogs ta/ bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing/ bram ze'i khye'u'i
tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas dmar bucan gyi grong nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'o blta ba dang bstun bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo// de ji tsam bzhon pa'isa'i bar dubazhon pas
song nas/ bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang pas kun dga' ra bar zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan ciga mngon du yang dag
par dga' ba dang/ yang dag par mgu bar gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma
gadz+ha'isnachen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtamagyis yang dag par ston bar mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa ra mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du
'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag bar 'dzin du bcug
yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de cang mi gsung ngo// de nas ma gad+ha'i snachen pol gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go'akhyam dag slong gi dge 'dun
dang thabs gcig tusang bdag gi sdum par gdugasatshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis ma gtsA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la cang mi gsung
bsaganang ngo// de nas mag d+ha'i snachen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang migang bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song
ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gats+tsi sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbar byed song nas/ ring po ma len par thugs su chud nas/ 'dug gnas gang na ba der gshegs te
byon nas/ 'dug gnas kyi phyi rol du zhabasaganyis bkrus te/ 'dug gnas su zhugs nas/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drang nga ra bsangs
te dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag go/ bcom ldan 'das 'dug gnas ni nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na/ lha'i na rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'phagos pas/ dmar
bucan gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'bre ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang dgongs gnang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te/ 'dug gnas nas byung nas/ 'dug
gnas kyi grib ma la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsol pa/ kun
dga' bo khyod kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtseg par brtson pa su yin/ ci thes// btsun pa bdag gis ma ga d+ha'i snachen la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed lags par thos so//
kun dga' bo legs so legs so// ma gat+ta'i sna chen bo la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed nimakhas pa yin te/ 'di ltar sum curtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig bgros pa lta zhig/ kun
dga' bo 'di na nga 'dug gnas nanyin bar gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na/ lha'i spyan rnam par dag ba mi'i las 'das pas/ dmar bu can gyi grong na mthur ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis
'bre ba gzigs so// kun dga' bo phyogs gang du mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyis bres pa'i phyogs der ni 'di lta ste/ gnas kyi phyir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i mi rnams kyi semA
gzhol bar 'gyur ro// phyogs gang du lta bor ma dang phal pas gnas kyis bres pa'i phyogs der ni 'di ltaste/ gnas kyi phyir ma bar ma dang phal pa rnams kyi sems/
gzhol bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo phyogs 'di ni mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyi gnas kyis bres pas phyogs 'dir 'di lta ste/ gnas kyi phyir dbang nge bar grags pa dbang che bar grags
pa'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo ya rabs kyi gnas dang/ ya rabs kyi tha snyad ji snyed pa dang/ zong 'grems pa rnams kyi nang na yang 'di lta ste/ dmar
bu can gyi grong khyer 'di mchog tu 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di la bar chad gsum 'byung bar rig par bya ste/ me dang/ nudang/ nang 'khrugagis so// de nas ma ga 'i snachen po
ba lagatogs pa'i bram bre dbyar byed de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ zhes bya ba'ibar gongan bzhin te/ gser gyi bya
ma bum thogs te gsol ba 'debs shing spyan sngar 'dug go/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kya go'u tumasbyin pa 'odi las bsod nams kyi mthunang dang/ dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang/ bde ba'i
gzhi cimachis ba de dmar bu can n gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yun ring po'i denadang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i slad du yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsolo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs subacad/
de bka' stsal pa// skyes bu gang zag dad pa can// gang zhig lha rnams mchod byed pa// ston pa'i bka' bzhin byed pa ste// de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags// mkhas shing yid ni gzhungs/
nga yis// gang gi phyogs su gnas 'cha' ba// tshul khrims ldan pa bshol gsol nas// de yi 'og tu yonabasdo bu// de rnams rnyed pas rjed 'gyur zhing/ mdzod pas kyang nimatshodangar 'gyur/
denas lto nas byung ba ye// du la ma bzhin 'di' brtse// lha rnams brtsi ba'i skyes bus// bdeb bzang po thong bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze
dbyar byed la tshos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs
togashagasaso// de nas ma gad+ha'i sngachen po 'a gtogs pa bram ze dbur byed kyis der rgyu lhag gangayin pa de thams cad sbyin par btan gnas / bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin bzhin du 'brang zhing 'di
snyam dusems te/ sems las mngon par 'du byed de/ bcom ldan 'das go'u tam dmar bu can gyi grongagi sgo gang nas phyir gshegs pa de ni/ bdag gis go'u tama'i sgo zhes gdagasaso//
nu bo gang+ga'i 'jug ngogs gang nas rgyal ba de yang/ go'u tama'i 'jugangegos zhes gdags so snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen de la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar
byed kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ dam can gyi grong gi dbus thog thag gshags nas/ byang phyogasasu rgyu ste/ chu bo gang gang na ba gshegs so//
de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma gat+ta'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'disnyam du sems te/ ma la bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das mchodapa bya ba la lhag bar sngo bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas// rtsibs
brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ba dang/ yangs pa can gyi latsa byi rnams kyis bsam pa/ lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma/
skyes dgra 'di/ bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la rang nyid lhag par spro bar gyur// ci'i phyir bdag cag gis slobar ma bya snyam nas/ de rnams kyis kyang rtsibs brgyadang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga
brgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo// klu rnams kyis bsams pa/ re zhig mi 'de rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar gyuran/ bdag
cag klu rnams ni rnam par ltung ba'i lus can yin la/ ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de dag gsakyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng
dub zung ngo// rgyal chen bazhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsams pe/ re zhig mi bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong ba 'di dagakyang/ bcom ldan 'adas mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar gyur/
na mngon sum du mthong ba bdag cag gis ci'i yi spro bar mi bya sAm nas/ de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgyad nga ltad[E]'i gdugs lnga brgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo//
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsams pa// lha dang mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba'i sar na/ bdag cag gis ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ do dag gis kyang
rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo// bcom ldan 'atsam kyis dgongs pa// ji ltar 'di dag phyir zhing dad pa mngon par 'phel bar
'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab bo snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar re re'i yid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi stang na/ bdagagadugs 'dzin to snyam pa de ltar byin gyis
brlabs te/ don bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la/ gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya lha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo// dge slong rnams
the tsom skyes nas/ btsam thams cad gcodapa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ des bcom ldan 'das mngon par
rdzogs par byang chub pa la/ gdugs nyis stong lnga brgyalha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin
gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rab sagazhanan las byas shing bsags pa tshogs red pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur 'gyur/ zhes bya ba'i bar

gongam bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhi rnam par rgyal ba'i chos dang ldan pa// chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdunudang ldan pa legs mthong chen po zhes

bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po de la bu stong dugacig gis mtshang bzhi yodado// rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni bu btsas shing btsas ba dag phyibazhin khrid de 'khyag par byed do// btsun mo rnams kyis bsams pa/ rgyal
po 'di'i kun tu spyod pa ni sras btsas shing btsas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid nas 'khyam ra mdzad ngas/ bdagabu yod bzhin du/ bumad pa dang 'dras/ dananang khrims shig bcas te/ gal te
bdag cag las 'ga' zhig sems can dang ldan ra ra gyur na/ des rgyal po lagadags par mi bya'o zhes bas so// ji tsam na btsunamo gzhan zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur nas// dad
dag gis phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhi g sta da zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba// blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba//
mgo gdugs ltakhu/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i gzangs mtho ba/ yon lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// jitsam
chen por gyur ba dang/ btsunamo de dag thams cad khye'u de la bu'i sdug pa skyes so/// 'dul ba gzhi/// bam po nyi shu bdunapa/
mi/ de nas dus gzhan zhig nargyal po legs mthong chen po shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling nas// rin po che sna bdun gyis sna drang+ga shing/ khams kyi rgyal phran stong gis yongs su bskor te/ bu
stong du gcig gis ma tshang bas zla ba kham pa lta bur bskyor na/ gzi brjid nyi ma'i 'od zer stong sa lhag par smra zhing 'ong ba/ gzhon nu khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pa des mthong nas/ des ma
la dris nga/ yum mchi ba pha gi su lags/ bu khyod kyi yab rgyal po legs mthong chen po yin no// yum de 'das na bdag rgyal por 'gyur ram/ bu rgyal po de'i sras stong du gcig gis ma
tshang ba zhig yod pa de dag thams cad kyi phu bo gang yin pa de/ de 'das na rgyal bor 'gyur na/ khyod ni thams cad kyi nub yin no// des smras pa/ yum gal te de 'das na bdag rgyal bar mi 'gyur na/
gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ bdag dad pa yang dag pa khonas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar ba gyi'o// btsun med dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ bu khyod la bdag cag gi bu'i sdug/
pa nyams su myong bas de ltar ma byed cig/ yum gdon mi 'tshol bar rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// de dag gis de gdonami za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas sapa/ bugal te de ltanadam zhog
ga/ bcas nas gnang bar bya ste/ gang yang khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogasan/ da khyod kyis bdag cag la smyos shig/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// de de dag gis gnang nas/

des mtha' gcig tusong ste/ mkhan po dang slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos bskyedanas rang byang chub mngon sumedubyas so// rang sangs rgyas dus bsams pa/ bdag gis
ma de rnams la khas blangs pa smad gos pas/ song la sngon gyi dam bcas ba mthar dbyung ngo snyam nas/ bdag nyid chen po dedag gisachos miston gyi/ lus kyi yin pas/ sa de rnams kyi mdun du 'bar ba
dang gsal ba dang/ char 'bebs pa dang/ glog 'byin pa dag gi tsho'akhrul dag bya bar brtsamasaso// so so skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas/ de dag shing rtsa ba nas bcad ngo
bzhin rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ 'phags bodakyis yon tanagyi tshogs 'di ltab rtogs sam/ rtogs so// 'phags ba khyadani bsod snyoms bzhed pa 'gasal/ bdag cag kyang
bsod nams 'tshal ba lags na/ khyod 'di nyid du skyed mos tshal dubazhugs shig dang/ bdag cag gis rgyan tu bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o// rang sangs rgyas des khas blangs nas/ de dag
gis rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms kyis bsnyenabakur bya bar brtsams so/ rasangs rgyas des bsams pa/ bdag gi lus rnag can 'dis bya ba gang yin pa de ni byas kyis/ ral bdag phung po
lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug gosnyam nas/ de nas de ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab mabarkyang pa ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang/ gsal ba dang/ mar/
'bebs pa dang/ klog 'byin pa'i cho'aphrul dag bstan nus/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'dus pa zhi ba'i dbus su zhugs so// de nas dedag gis shing dri zhim po thams cad spungs te/ dus
nas bsreg te/ me'i phung pod 'o mas bsad nas/ rus pa de dag gsar gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/ skyed mos tshal de nyid du aba'i mchod rtenabartsigs te/ mgul gdub dang/ gdu bu rgyun
can dang/ gzhan yang rgyana rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ banganadag btsugs so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po legs mthong chen po btsun mo'i 'khor
gyis bskor nas sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/ me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing/ ngang nga dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ ne tso dang/ skags dang/ bya ko ki la dang/ shang shang te'askad

khyen pa'i tshal gseb tu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir song nas/ de skyed mos tshal na 'khyam pa las/ dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten de mthong ngo// des skyed mo'i tshal srung ba'i mi la smasab/ kA ya nang rje 'di ci yin/
des smras pa/ lha dag gis nim 'tshal te/ 'on kyang 'di'i donani btsun mos 'tshal to// de nas des btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la rmas pa dang/ dedag gis rkang ba gnyis logatugs te smras pa/ lhami 'jig
bstsaladu gsol/ des smras pa/ de bzhin du sbyin no// de dag gis skabs dergyas bar sa pa dang/ rgyal pos smras la/ khyed cag gis bu rgyal srid la mngon par dga' na//

de kho bo lam gsol ba bzang po ma yin pa zhig byas so// gal tegasol bar gyur pa dang/ kho bo de khonal rgyal sridadebang bskur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba zhig/ 'on kyang dus bdag nyid chen po de mya ngan las
'das par gyur kyang/ gdugs dang/ rtsod nganadang/ thor tshugs gdagos so zhes/ de nas de bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod yon de la gdugs dang/ bon ban dang/ thor tshugasa rnams

btags so// dge slong dag ji snyam dusems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po chen po legs mthong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// gang yang ngs de nabu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la gdugs dang//

cod panadang/ thor tshugs btags te/ las de'i rnam par smin sa/ ngas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong lnga brgya byas so// las de kho na'i lhag mas da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na/ lha dang

mi rnams kyis rtsibs brgyad ldan pa'i gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur to// gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu ma rtogs par gyur na/ gzhan du yang das 'khor los sgyuba'i

rgyal po nyis stong lnga brgya byed par 'gyur ro// de lta bas nanga'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa can gang yin pa de/ ngasanyanathos rnams kyi longs spyod du rnam bar smin par bsngos te/ gal te mu tig brigang

mtha(khugasakyang/ 'on kyang nga'i nyan thos rnams ni bsod snyoms kyis 'phongs par mi 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tuganag pa yin l zhes
bya ba nas ( brtsal bar bya sta/ dgaslong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag gi
rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodade///lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma gat+ta'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ gru tham 'dzugasasu bcug pa dang//
yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gru zam btsugs so// klu rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag klu rnams ni rnam par ltung ba'i lus can yin pas//
ma la bdag cag gis gdangs ka'i tham pas bcom ldan 'dasuchu bo gang+gA bsgral par bya'o snyam nas/ de rnams kyis gdengasaka'i zam pa btsugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dag slong rnams
la bka' stsalar/ dge slong dag khyed cag las gang zhig/ lusu 'phags ma'i bu yul ma gtsA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam las chu bo gang+gabargal bar spro ba de ni de las rgol cig/ gang zhig mangs

can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis gru zam btsugs pa las spro ba gang yin pa de yang de las rgol cig/ nga yang dge slong kun dga' bo dang thabs cig klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las chu bo gang+ga brgal bar
tu bya 'o/ de na kha cig ni lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam las rgal lo// kha cig niyangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi gru zam las so/ bcom
ldan 'das kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig/ klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las rgal lo// de rnams dag bsnyan zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kha cig zam pa gtsug
nasachu bran bor ta rgya mtshocha lag/ skye bo rnams ni gzings 'cha' mkhas pa'i skye bo rnam bu rgal// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bram zergal bar gyur nas skam la bzhugs/ dge slong dag 'dir khrus
byed nyan thos rnams nigazings 'cha' na/ gal te kun n chu yod khron pa'i chusani ci zhig bya// srid pa'i rtsa ba bcad nas su zhig spyod pa tshol par byed// bcom ldan 'das kyisas phyogs gzhan zhig na/
mtho zhing mtho ba'i sa phyogs zhig gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyed rgyal po sgra chen gyi lha'imachod sdong srid du'adom stong yod la/
sbomasusu 'dom druganu yod pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa// rin po che sna tshog sakyis spras pa zhig yod de/ sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas chu bo gang+gA'i nung du bor ba gang
yin pa de lta bar 'dod dam/ btsem ldan 'das de lta bde'i dus la bab lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang mchod sdong dobasgong na/ dag
tsha slong rnam lta bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis 'khor lo dang/ bkra shis dang/ g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang/ drabs 'brel pa/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/
'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'i phyag gis sa la reg par mdzad pa dang/ klu rnams kyis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir sa la reg par mdzad snyam na/ mchod sdong gzigs/
par bzhed par mthong ngo// de nas de dag gis bsgrengs pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyi mchod sdong blta bar brtsams so// tshe dang ldan pa 'gas ldan ni 'dod pa nga ba yin pas/ mtha' gcig tu song
nas phyag dar khrod pa dag 'tshapa mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mchod sdong nub par gyur gyis/ rtags zung zhig ces pa las/ da nub
ba gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la// dge slong rnams kyis zhus ba/ btsun pa dge slong rnams mchod sdong la lta bar bgyidan/ tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan ni 'dod pa chung
bas/ maphral gcig tumachis nas phyag la khrod nga batshom lagazigs/ ci lags/ re zhig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad du 'am/ 'on te sngon bsten pa'i slad du lags/ gal te re zhig 'dod
chags dang bral ba'i slad du lags nani/ gzhan yang 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig mchis lags so// 'on te sngonabastan pa'i slad du lagazhani/ 'dis gang du bstenalags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkab/
stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir yang yin la/ sngon yang bstanang gi phyir yang yin no// 'dis sngon gang du bstan lags/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba/

bya rgyal bo rab sgrogs zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de lta'i dbang po brgya byin dang grogs por gyur te/ dbu 'dod kyang bu mid nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste/ nor tshes
mang po zhig bsagasan bdag la bu med pas/ bdag min rgyal po'i gdung brgyud chad par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas brgya byin gyis mthong nas dris pa/ grogs po khyed ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa
gtad nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ nges smras pa/ ko'u shi kanor rdzas 'disnyad cig bsags nang dka la bu med pas/ bdag shi nas rgyal po gdung brgyudachad par 'gyur bas so//
nga byin gyis smas ba/ grogs po khyod sems khong du chudaper ma byed cig/ gal lha'i bu 'ga' zhig 'chi ba po ba'i chos byung bar gyuran/ de khyod kyi bur bsko bar bya'o// chos nyid kyis lha'i//
bu 'chi 'a bo'i chos 'byung ba laniltas lnga 'byungabar 'gyur te/ gos ma bangs pa rnams brnyings par 'gyur ba dang/ ma tog gi 'phreng ba ma bar ngs pa dag b.rings par 'gyur ba dang/ lus
lho las dri mi zhim pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ mchan khung gnyis nas rdul 'dzag pa dang/ rang gi stan lomi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o// jitsam na lha'i bu zhig la snga ltas lnga byung bar gyur nas/ 8
wawalalha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sbas pa/ grogs bo rgyal bo rab sgrogasakyi btsun mo dam pa'i mnga' yunying mtshams sbyor zhig/ des smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de ni bag med pa'i gnas yin te/ ko'u shi
ka rgyal po rnams nyes pa mang po byed pa yin pas/ chos ma yin pasu rgyal srid byas nas/ sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur na mi rung ngo// brgya byin gyis smras pa// grogs po khyod las/
dran bar bya'o ko'u shi ka rgyal po rnams ni dga' ba mang bos bag med ba yin no/ grogs po de'i bdenan/ 'onakyang kho bos khyed la dran par bya'o/ de nas rgyal bo rab sgrogs kyi btsunamo dam

ba'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyar to// gang gi nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams byas pa de'i nyi ma khonal skye bo'i tshogs chen po u0f8bsgra phyung bar gyur to// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas/
te zhes bya ba nas/ sna'i gzas ma glo ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// de'i nyid dag 'dus shing tshogs nas/ ming 'dogs par byed// khyabu'i ming ciragadags/ gnyen rnams kyis

smas pa/ gang gi nyi ma kho na la khye'adi ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung bar gyur bas/ dba'on khyab kyi ming sgra chen bya bar gdags so zhes/ de'i ming sgra
chen zhes bya bar btags te/ khye'u sgra chen ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas/ zhes bya ba nas/ brtag pa brgyad dang/ dbye ba dang/ klog pa la mkhas shing shis nyen can du gyur to// zhes
bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing/ yul gyi dbang phyug dang/ mthu dang/ brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon
par zil gyis mnananas/ gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang/ las kyi gnas tha dadang gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang/ rta la zhon pa dang/ shing rta'i thabs dang/
ral gri'i thabs dang/ mda' gzhu dang/ phyirab snur ba dang/ mdun du bsnur ba dang/ lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang/ zhags pa gdab pa dang/ mda' bo che 'phanam dang/ dbyug pas
rdeg pa dang/ 'dzin stangs dang/ gom stangasadang/ gcad pa dang/ dral ba dang/ dbug pa dang/ rgyang nas phog pa dang/ sgra drag par phog pa dang/ gnad du phog pa dang/ mi

'chor bar phog pa dang/ tshabs che ba dag ste/ gnas lnga bo de rnams la shin tu byung bar gyur to// chos nyid kyis re re zhig pha ji tsam gson gyi bar dubu'i ming mi grag pa yin no// dus gzhan zhig na

rgyal po rab sgrogs shi nas/ sgrachen rgyal sradi la bzhag pa dang/ des the gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug nas/ chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug par gyur to// da nas
brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po khe bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi bur bskos te/ chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig/ sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgo 'am/

tsa0 des the gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyalasrid byed du bcu gnas / slar yang chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug par gyur to// lanaganyis su yang brgya byin gyis sar/ grogs po kho bos khyod
rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi bur bskos te/ chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal sridam byed cig/ sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur taro zhes ma bsgo bam/ des smras pa/ ko'u shi ka bdag cag rgyal po rnams ni
dga' ba mdapos bag med pas skad cig brjod r ra 'gyur gyis/ bdag la khyod kyis mtshan ma zhig zhogacig dang/ bdag gis mthong nas nges par sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bgyi'o//
de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i bu las thamasacad pa la bsgo ba/ las thams cad ba song la khyod kyis/ rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lho'i 'a khor gyi khyams dang/ lha'i mchod sdong srid
du'adom stong yod pa// sboms su 'dom drug cu yod pa/ thams cad gser las byas shing/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul cig/ donas lha'i bu'i las thams cad nga sa rgyal po sgra chen gyi
gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang/ lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yodapa/ sboms su 'dom drug cu yod pa/ thams cad gasare las byas pa/ rin po che snatshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul to//

denas rgyal po sgra chen gyis mchod sbyin gyi khang pa rtsig tubcu gnas / rang gi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba mchod sdong gi zhal ta bar bzhag go/ de nas mchodasdong la 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa 'i mi thams cad lta'
spro bar lhags nas/ zan zos shing mchod sdong lta bas rang gi las sgrub par mi byed de// de nas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams bar chad byas pas rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin mi 'du bar

'gyur to// blon po rnams kyis dbya tung ngu phul ba dang/ rgyal po sgra chen gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dgaci'i phyir dang nyung zad cig dbul/ lta 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo 'i tshogs mchis nas
'tshalam 'tshal zhing mchod sdong la lta zhing mchis te/ rang gi las grub par mi bgyid pas/ zhing las kyi mtha'a rnams kyi ngar chad bgyis pas/ dpya thangabazhinam 'du lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/

mchod sprin gyi khang pa srol cig/ de rnams kyis de 'dral na yang de bzhin du skye bo'i tshogs de rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas za zhing mchod stong la rtog cing 'dug ste/ rang gyi las sgrub par mi byed pas zhing

las kyin tha' rnams kyi bar chad byas pas// de bzhin rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin mi 'du bar gyur to// rgyal bos dris pa/ shes ldan dag mchod sbyin gyi khang pa dral na/ ci phyir da dung dang nyung bar gyur/

blon bo rnams kyis smras pa/ lha skyengo'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas 'tshal zhing mchod sdong la rtog cing mchis te/ rang gi las sgrub par mi bgyid pas/ zhing las kyi mtha' rnams bar chad bgyis
pas des na dmya nyung bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po sgrachen gyis sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas/ mchod sdong de chu bogang+gA'i nang du bor ro// dge slong dag de jisnyam du sems/ rgyal po
rab sgrogs gyi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong legs ldan 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis sngon 'di bstan to/// btsunapa mchod sdong 'di gang du zhig par 'gyur lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ dge slong dgam 'ongs pa nami rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur te/ mi lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi rgyal po dung zhes bya ba/ yang dag par sdom pa/ 'khor/

sa sgyurab/ mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyalakha/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i rin po che sna bdunani 'di lta bu dag 'byung banga'agyur sta/ 'di/

lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po chedang/ glang bo rin po che dang/ ltarinapoche dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ bud med rinapo tsho dang/ khyim badag rin po che dang/ bdun pa ni blon po rin po che nyid do// de la du
dang 'a ba/ tshul yod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan ng/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshangabar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dergya mtsho 'khrug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod
bar sdo ba med cing/ 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa medal/ chos dang mthunazhing snyoms pas legs par rab sta gnas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dung gi mdunana'adon/

bram ze tshangs pa'i tsha zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/ de'i chung ma ni tshangs ldan m zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ngo// de byams pa tshad med pa'i yanalag gis rgyas par byas pas/ bu byams pa zhes bya ba zhig btsal
btsa' bar 'gyur ro// bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri la// bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug ga/ des bram ze'i khye'u de rnams byams pa la gtad nas

bram bre'i khye'u byams pas/ bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri po rnams bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis gter chen po bzhi lo/ ka ling ka nas dmar ser rta/

mi gi la nas skye ba'o// sa 'dzin nas ni sa la'i 'dab// wA ra NA si'i grongan dung// mchod sdong 'di yang khyer nas rgyal po dung la dbul bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dung gis kyang bram ze tshangs pa'i tsho la sbyin par

'gyur ro// bram ze tshangs pa gi tshas kyang bram ze'i khye'u byams pa la'o// bram ze'i khye'u byams pas kyang bram ze'i khye'u de rnams la'o// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis mchod sdong de dum bu dum bur

bcad nas 'gyed par 'gyur re// de nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas mchod sdong de'i mi rtag pa nyid mthong nas/ de nyid kyis skyo ba skyes nas nags su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang gi nyi ma khon lanags su song ba de

khoma'i nyi ma la byams pa tshad med pa'i yanalag gis rgyas par byas nas/ blanamed pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de'i mtshan blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas byams pa/ bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// gang gi nyi ma khen la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba de kho na'i nyi ma la rgyal po dung gi rin po

chesna bdun nub par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dung yang khams kyi rgyal phranabargyad khri'i 'khor dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byang ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//

'i chung ma rin po ches ga zhes bya ba yang bumedabargyad khri'i 'khor dang/ slanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byungaba'i rjes su rab 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze tshangs pa'i

tshe yang bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri'i 'a khor dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byung pa'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa la ngesas rgyas byams

ba 'khor dge slong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang/ ri bya gag rkyang gang na ba der gshegs par 'gyur ro// don dge slong 'od srungs kyi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa 'dug pas/ ri bya gag rkang bla na med pa

gang dag par rdzogasaba'isangs rgyas byams pa la kha dbya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams bas/ dge slong 'od srungs kyi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa/ phyag

g.yas pas blangasanas/ phyag g.yon par bzhag ste/ nyan thos rnams l 'di skad ces/ geslong dag skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub ban/ ston pakya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba de'i nyan thos

rnams las chog shes pa dang/ 'dod pa chung ba dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mchogani 'od srungs yin no zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin te/ shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/
de'i bstan pa yang 'dis yang dag par bsdus so zhes chos ston par 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis mthong nas skyo ba skyes te/ 'di 'dra ba'i lus kyis ji ltar 'di lta bu'i yon tanagyi

tshegs klob par gyur snyam nas/ de rnams skyo ba skyes pa de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/ 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tana mngon du bya
ba la brtson par 'gyur ro// mchod sdong de ni der zhig par 'gyur ro// btsun pa rgyu gang dang/ rkyen gang gis dkon mchog gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags// btsem ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so// bcom ldan 'das gang du smon lam btab lags/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul dbus su rgyal po gesaM sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang/ rgyas
a pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa dang/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ de'i shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyam 'degs
par phab pas/ lhag par la tog rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur to// byang phyogs na rgyal po nor ldan zhes byab 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa/ skya bo dang mi mang pos
rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ de'i shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag bdang/ lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas/ lhag par lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur to//

ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal bo gosasbyin gyi mdun na 'donalas khye'u spyi gtsug rin po ches brgyan pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyacher byas nas/ de'i ming rin chen gtsug tor can zhes btags so//
de dus gzhan zhig na/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas skyo ba skyes te nags su song ngo// gang gi nyim kho na la nags susong ba de kho na nyim la/ des bla namad pa'i ye shes
thob nas/ de'i ming yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal lo

nor ldan steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhirasong ste/ blonapo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug go/ des blonapo rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag pa'i ci 'drab de ltar rgyal po gzhan 'ga'i yul na 'byor pa dang/
rgyas l dang/ bde ba dang lo legs pa/ skya bo dang mi mang pos rab tugang ba dang/ shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang/ lhas dus sas char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas me tog
rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ yul dbus nas tshong pa zang thog tu/ byang phyogs su 'ongs pa de rnams kyis sa pa/ lha yul dbus na rgyal po gis sbyin zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis so//

rgyalalonor ldan gyis bros ma thag tu mi bzod pa chen po skyes te/ dmibazod pa skyes nas blon bo rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag dbang gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig dang yul 'khor gzhom par bya'o//
denas rgyal po nor ldan dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi// glang bo che'i tshogs dang/ rtapa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta pa'i tshogs dang/ dbung bu chung gi tshogs ga bskon nas//

gul dbus su dong nas chu bo gang+g+ha'i lho phyogs 'gram du 'khodado// rgyal po gos sbyin gyis rgyal po nor ldan ngapung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che'i tshogs dang/ rtapa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta pa 'i tshogs

dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ yul dbus su 'ongs te/ chu bo gang+ga'i lho phyogs kyi 'gramana'akhod donas bros so// khros nas kyang des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa// glang po che'i
tshogs dang/ rtapa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta pa'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ chu bo gang+gA'i byang phyogs kyi 'gram na 'dug go/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyus rin

chen gtsug tor can gyis de gnyis kyi gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ chu bo gang+ga'i 'gram du nub mo nye bar rten cing bzhugs so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis 'jig/

rten pa'i thugs bskyedado// chos nyidakyis gang gi tshesangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi sems kyis/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyur ro/ de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yong dag/

bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ da rnams kyi kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen po byung bar gyur pa/ rgyal po nor ldan/

gyis mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang blon po rnams laphrisam/ sa ldan dag rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul na/ snang ba chen po byung ba 'di ci yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal bo gos sbyin gyi yul du yang

ga par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can byung sta/ de la blta ba'i phyir brgya byin tshang pa la sog pa mchis pa des na snang ba chen po 'di 'byung ste/ ri'i rdzu 'phrul che'i ngamathu che ba lags pas/ 'dinapa'i

chu'ags so// rgyal po nor ldan gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi yul dugang la brgyabyin dang tshangs ba la sogs pa yang baltaba'i phyir 'ong ba rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing de lta bu byung ba de la bdag gis

gnod pa ci 'dra ba zhig bya zhes/ des de la kho nya btang ste/ grogs po khyod la bdag cung zad kyang mi byed kyis/ tshur spyon/ khyodanib sod nams kyimathu chen po can zhig pas/ khyodakyi yul na gang la

brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa yang balta ba'i phyir 'ong ba rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can bzhugs so// 'on kyang khyod kyi mgul nas 'khyudanas/

bgro bar bya ste/ de ltan bdag cag ban tshun yid bdebar 'gyur ro zhes smreng ngo// rgyal po gos sbyin yid m chen s/ de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste
byagru phyi na nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhapas 'khar bas phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal
bogos sbyin gyis/ yang dag par rdzogasar 'isangs rgyas rin chen gatsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bdag la rgyal po nor ldan gyis spring ba/ grogs po sdug pa khyod la bdag cag yang
mi khyed kyis/ tshur shog/ khyod kyi mgul pa nas 'khyud nas 'grobar bya ste/ de lta na bdag cag phan tshun yid bde bar 'gyur zhes matshibani/ de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrib par bgyi/ yang dag
bar gos pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo chen po song zhig dang/ khyod la legs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das cib dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtug

par bgyi lam/ rgyal po chen po rgyal po dpung chen bo rnams la nigatug par bya dgosaso// de nas rgyal bo gos sbyin stan las langs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rin chen gtsugater can kyi zhabs
gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas mas te/ rgyal bonor ldan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal bo nor ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so// de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis mgul pa nas 'khyud de yid

gcugs par byas te btang ngo// de nas rgyal bo gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor
0 can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgya la bogos sprin gyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can//
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa rgyal po thams cad kyis rkang ba gnyis la gtugs pa'i rgyal po gang 'gas/ rgyal po chen po 'khor los sgyur ba yin no// de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te/

bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gatsugator can gang na ba de legasasu thal mo sbyar ba btud/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gatsug tor can l/

'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dunadang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugasatshodasbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin

chen gatsug tor can gyis rgyal bo gos sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogasapa'i sangs rgyas rina chen gatsug tor can gyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas//

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyanasnga nas dong ngo// de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis de nyid kyi nubamonas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dngabacab bdag lta gon byas te/ nang par
sngar langs nas gdan bshams te/ nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can l/ spyan 'dren gyis dusatshod gsol pa/ patsun pa gdugs tshod bshams 'ag
shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das dade'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rinachen gtsug tor can s dro sham thabs mnabs/

lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/dge slong gi tshog sakyis yongs su bskor zhing/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bdun gyis blta// rgyal po gos sbyin gyi bkadas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi
ge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can lasogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dunabade bar bzhugs par

na rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi gnas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas
go yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gatsug tor can gyis gsol nas/ phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed bar rig nas/ zhabs gnyis la gdugs te/ smon lam gdab ba brtsam
pa/ btsun pa sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur cig ces smras nas/ demathog tu dung yang bus so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gatsug

za racan gyis/ rgyal po gos sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsalato// rgyal po chen po khyod skye dgu'i tshalo brgyad khrithub pa na/ 'khor res sgyur ba'i rgyal po dung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas skad chen po'i
rgyal bo noraldan gyis ca co'i sgra dag thos nas/ blon po rnams la rmas pa/ shes ldan dag rgya' go u0f38na gyi yul na ca co'i sgra grags pa de ci zhig yin/ de rnams kyis legs par brtag
nas smras pa/ lha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis/ rgyal po des sbyin bawer []sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs/ dga' ba dang mgu ba dang/
rab tu dga' bras/ des n ca co'i sgra grag pa lags so// de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/khyogagacig tu 'dug go/ phyogagacig tu 'dug nas/rgyal ponor ldan gyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can l
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'khor los sbyar ba thams cad kyis rkang pa gnyis lagatsugs par bgyi ba gang lags/ rgyal po chen po de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas yin no// de nas rgyal po nor ldan stanalaMsalangs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gatsug tor can gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cigasang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis naganang bar mdzad du gsol/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
gsas rgyas rin chen gatsug tor can gyis rgyal po nor ldan la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas rgyalapo nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi

gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan/

snga nas song ngo// de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis de nyid kyi nub monas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas/ nang par sngar las te gdan bshams shing/ nor bu'i chu snod bzha gnas /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can l/ spyan 'dren gyis dus tshodagatsal pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshodabshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab
par dgongs su gsol/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can snga drosham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong tshog sakyis yangs
su bskor cing/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ rgyal po nor ldan gyi bkadas gang na ba daragshegs tabyon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dunagyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/

u0f09 da nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza'abadang bca' ba dag rang gi

lags stobashing tshim par byed de/ rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rina chen gatsug
tor can gyis gsol nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad la byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas nas/
smon lam gdab par brtsams pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces btab bo// yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal ba/ rgyal po chen po khyod skyes dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de ltar na smon lam gyi dbang gis dkona mchog gnyis cig car 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis//

tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo grong spyil bu can zhes bya ba gangan bar 'dong ngo// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan nas/

denas bcom ldan 'adas yul spong byed ces bya ba nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ grong spyil ba can du byon te/ grong spyil bu can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag ni tshul khrims yin no// 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yin no// 'di shes rab yin no/
dge slong dag tshul khrims goms par byas nas/ ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin goms par byas na shes rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// shes
