rab goms par byas n 'di lta// 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dag las sems yang dag pa khonar rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de ltar sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par
grol ba'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyis ni bdag gi zag pani zad do// tshangs par spyod pa nibastan to// bya ba ni byas so// 'di las srid pa gzhinam shes so zhes yang dag pa khonar shes par 'gyur/
ro bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon ng ra bsto da do/ ]/de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo sgra can gang na ba der 'dong ngo/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar

mnyanano// de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ sgracan du byon nas sgra can gyi drang srong sgra sgrogs kyi gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe sgra can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la
mis byung nas/ de'i tshe dge bsnyan brtan pa yang shi/ nye ba dang lhag par brtson dang/ brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang/ mdzes pa dang/ nyamadzes dang/ yid 'ong dang/ nyabar yid 'ong dang/
bzang po dang/ shin tu bzang dang/ grags pa dang/ grags byin dang/ dge bsnyan grags mchog kyang ba'o// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang
chos gos thogs te/ sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// dag slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsad snyoms kyi phyir sgrubs/ sgra can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi sa byung// de'i tshadag bstan
brtan pa yang ngashi/ nyeb der lhag par brtsonadang/ brtson pa'i khya mchog dang/ mdzes pa dang/ rtsomadzes dang/ yid 'ong dang/ nyobar yid 'ong dang/ bzang po dngo/ shin tu bzang dang/
grags pa dang/ grags sbyin dang/ dag bsnyan grags mchog kyang shi'o zhes thogs// thos nas kyang sgracan du bsod snyoms la brgyus te/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ thas phyi ma'i bsod snyomasasngangs
shing / lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas/ rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgonges phyag byas te/
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tugadu gnas / dgeslong rab tu mang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso 'ate// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang
bos 'dir snga dro shamathabs 'tshal/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas/ sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod

snyoms kyi phyir rgyaban sgracan 'dir skye bo'i tshogs la mi dus byung nas/ de'i tshe dge bsnyan bartan pa yang gum/ lta ba dang lhag par brtsonadang/ brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang/ mdzas pa dang/ nyamadzes/
dang/ yid 'ong dang/ nye bar yade bong dang/ bzang po dang/ shin tu bzang dang/ grags pa dang/ grags sbyin dang/ dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang gum mo zhes thos lags na/ btsun pa de rnams

kyi 'gro banigang/ skyo ba nigang/ mngon du 'gro bani gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge bsnyen brtan pa ni tha ma'i chadang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs pas rdzus te skyes ta

der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing/ 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro// nyeb dang lhag par brtson dang/ brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang/ mdzes pa dang/ nyamadzes
dang yid 'ong dang/ 'bar yid 'ong dang/ bzang po dang/ shin tu bzang dang/ grags pa dang/ grags sbyin dang/ dag bsnyan grags mchog kyang tha ma'o cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga sdangs pas

rdzus teskyes to/ der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing/ 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'a'o bar 'gyur ro// dgeslong dag sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyenanyis brgya lnga bcu lhag cig

shi ba de dag kyang thama'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga rnams sngangs nga sa rdzus te skyes te/ der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing/ 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar

'gyur ro// dge slong dag sgra can 'di nyid du dag bsnyan sum brgya shi ba dadag ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum yapasngangs la/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dag kyang bsrubs pa'i phyir 'a na cig phyir

'ong ba yin te/ 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas/ sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag grong khyer sgra can 'di nyid dudage bsnyan lta brgya lhag cig shi ba de dag ni kun tu sbyor ba
gsum sdangs pas rgyun tuzhugs pa/ rnam par mi ltung ba'i tshes can rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par gzhol ba/ re ltar thogasanasrid pa bdun yin te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du 'an bdunang nyung
mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor nas/ sdug bsngal mthar budang ra 'gyur ro// dag slong dag khyed dus 'as 'das shing shi bar gyur pa rnams de bzhinagshegs pa la zhu ba zhu bar byed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs
ba la mthobatsam pa yin te/ des nad bzhinagshegs pa bde bar mi 'gyur ro// 'onakyang skye ba yod na'achiba'i dus byed pa yin na/ ngomatshar ci zhig yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung/
ma byung yang rung/ chos rnams kyis nyid dang/ chos gnas pa nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings 'dini gnas pa ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi mngon par mkhyen pas mngon par byang chub nas
gsus te/ 'dog par mdzad/ rab tu 'jog par mdzad/ rnam par 'byed par mdzad/ rnam par 'brel bar mdzad/ gsal bar mdzad/ 'chad par mdzad/ yang
dag par rab tu 'chad par mdzad pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung/ 'diskyes pas 'di skye bar 'gyur te 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis

rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis meng dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rgyanagyis tshor ba/ tshor nga 'i rkyen gyis
sradapa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ lenapa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skyab/ skya ba'i skyin gyis rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smasngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid
mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams rab tu 'byung bar gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'di med na 'dimi 'byung la/ 'di 'gags
na'adi 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes ba 'gags pas mngadang gzugs 'gag
ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skya mchod drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gag
bas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas sridapa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skya ba 'gags pas rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba

dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ daltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// dag slong dag 'on kyang khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyis/
gsa bshad kyis/ de legs par rab tu nyonal yid la zung zhig dang bshad de// chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhen/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la shes nas dadang ni/

chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs yin te/ sa khyed la chos kyi mi leng gi chos kyi rnam gras bshad do zhes

gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni de yin no// a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'adas sbyong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ sgracan du byon nas/ sgra can gyi drang srong sgra sgrogs kyi gnas nabazhugs so zhes

thos so// thos nasakyang a mra skyong ma de la/ ne tso bzhin rgyus zhes bya ba mi skad shes pa zhig yod de/ nitsobazhin rgyas la 'di skad ces smras so// bzhin rgyas tshur shog khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
der song la phyin nas/ kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasaganyis la mgo bos phyag byas la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyamang ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ gnod pa
mamachis sam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyan g sol la/ 'di skad ces sam skyong ma'i mchid nas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam yangs pa can du/
gshegs pa de'i tshu phyags pa rtse bar dgongs te/ thog mar bdag gi a ma'i tshal du gshegs par gsol zhes kyang gsol cig/ de nas rje tsobazhin rgyas kyis a ma skyong ma'i ltar ma nyan nas/ bam/

ldan 'das ganganab der song ba de ya sa pa can gyi 'atsa phyi'i khyabu dag gis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dganatso 'gro ba 'dini smad 'tshong ma'i yin no zhes/ de dag gis de la 'dab 'bang
par brtsams lan/ de yang de dag gi steng du babs so// de nas ne tso zhes tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ yul 'khor gzhan yang 'gyod par yang// pho nyami gsod ces gragan// bdag lta rgyal
ba'i po ta bas// lus can kun gyis ga la bsod// de rnams kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa// khyod kyi tshig gis mda' 'phangs pa'i ng// ldoganabadag cag smos ci dgos// khyod ni rdzu
'phrul ches bskyabs pas// 'jigs pa med par 'gro bar gyis/ de nas ne tsobazhin rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la a ma skyong ma mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga banyung ngam/
[z/ ]bskyod pa yod la/ 'tsho'am gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyan gaso'alags so// bzhin rgyas khyod dang a ma skyong ma bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa
a ma skyong ma'i mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das nam yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe thugs brtse bas nye bar ng khung ste thogamarab dag gi a ma'i tshal du gshegs su gsol zhes de skad mchi lags//
bcom ldan 'das kyis ne tso bzhin rgyas la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyanasngas song ngo// debcom ldan 'das la dad pa bskyed nas song ba las/ ring bo ma lonong kho nar rol bas srog dang bral te dus dus nas/
rgyala chen bazhi'i risakyi lha rnams su skyes so// chos nyid kyisaskyes nas ring po ma len pa'i lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo ni sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gnas shi 'phos pa dang/ gad du
skyes ba dang/ las gang gis yin pa'o// des bltasan/ dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon
bar dad pas so// de nas sngonan tso byed pa'i lha'i bu 'disnyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin gyis ci nas kyang
bdag zhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam nas/ de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu rnachagadub khor drim med pa g.yo ba thogasangashing/ se mo do
dang do shal gyis lus brgyananas/ de nyid kyi nub mo lha rnams kyi me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+madakar po dang/ mnadar ba'i me tog gis thu ba bkang nas/ shin tu
'bagasashing/ mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog gis/ de'i nub mo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'dasal me tog gis gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
spyan sngar 'dug go de'i sngonan tsa byed ng 'i lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen pos sgra sgrogs kyi 'dug gnas thams cad gsal bar gyur to// 'dul ba gzhi//
bam po nyi shu brgyad pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ nanatso dang 'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyalo dang// khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/

dadang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhiso sor rtogs par 'gyur pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bus 'jigatshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba yi shesakyi rdo rjes
bcomanas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas/ lan gsum duched du brjod pas ched brjod pa/ btsun pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la mas ma bgyis te/
phas ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags// rang gi skye bo dang gnyenagyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ rgyal bos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sdum 'das pa rnams kyis ma 'gas//
dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'grodang/ yi dgas rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/
lha dang mi rnams lanirab rto bzhi g 'khor ba las ni ring du mdzad/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtshoniyams a pa'iri bo lasani bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams 'i bkum/ mtho ris dang thur
pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtsalo nyi shumathob ye shesakyidis bcom nas// rgyunatu zhugs pa'i 'brasabu mngon sum du bgyis lags te/
btsun pa bdag ni'aphags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung
gral/ rasmanachad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchibar mngon par dad lags so/ donas sngonanatsabyed pa'i lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la mngon par dga'
zhing rjes su yirangasanas/ tshong pa 'ong redapalta bu dang/ zhing pa lo tshigs pa lta bu dang/ dpa' bo g.yul ngor rgyal ba lta bu dang/ nad pa nad thamasacad las longasasu thar pa bzhin du//
yangs pa can du byon nas//'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyispyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid dang rang gi gnas su song ngo/// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa/
bla kun dga' bo'abaka'astsal pa/ kun dga' bo yarapa can gang na ba der 'dong ngo// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshad ngaldan ng kun dga'abos bcom ldan 'das kyiltar mnyananas/ danas bcom ldan
'das songabyed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pan/ tsayas pa can gyi a ma'i tshalanabazhugs so// a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ yangs pa can dubyon nas/
yangs pa can gyi bdag gi ama'i tshul kho nan bzhugs so zhes thosaso// thos nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/ bud med kyi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te/ bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas yas
bcan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyenabakur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ des ji tsam bzho ba'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/ bzhonab las babs te/
rkang pa banas kun dagabar bar zhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'igung la chos 'chadacing bzhugs pa nA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis am skyongam rgyang ring bo khonanas
gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ a mra skyong ma phag 'ong gis/ brtson 'grus dang/ shes bzhinadang/ dran pa dang ldan pas gnas par gyis shig
sarjesasu bstan pa ni 'di yin no// ji ltar na dge slong brtson 'grus la gnas pa yin zhen/ 'di la dge slong gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes ba rnams spang ba'i phyi 'dun pa skyed de// 'badado//
brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'jog go/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyid pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyidado// 'bad de// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// rab
tu 'jug go/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyod pa'i phyir 'dunang skyod do// 'bade// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// soms rab tu 'dzin to// rab tu 'jog go/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas
pa dang/ nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang/ goms par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba dang/ ye shes rgya chen po mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyodado// 'badad//
brtson 'grus rtsom mo// somasarab tu 'dzin cing rab tu 'jog pa ste/ deltar na dge slong brtson 'grus can yin no// jiltar na dge slongashes bzhinacan yin zhe na/ 'dil dgo slong gis 'gro ba dang
ldog pa la shes bzhin gyis gnas shing/ lta ba dang/ rnam par lta ba dang/ bskum pa dang/ brkyang ba dang snam sbyar dang/ chos gos dang/ lhung bzed thogs pa dang/ 'grub dang/
'grengab dang/ 'dug pa dang/ rtsol ba dang/ gnyidam log pa dang/ snang dang/ mi sgrub dang/ gnyid kyis snyom pas dub pa rnams la shes bzhin gyis gnas pa ste/ daltar na dgeslong shes
bzhinacan yin no// ji ltar dge slong dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhen/ 'di la dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang/ shes bzhin dang/ dran pa
dang ldan bsa'ajig rten la gnodasems dang/ yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so// phyi'i lus dang/ nang dang phyi'i lus dang/ nang gi tshor ba rnams dang/ phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang/ nang dang
phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang/ nang gi sems dang/ phyi'i sems dang/ nang dang phyi'i sams dang/ nang gi chos rnams dang/ phyi'i chos rnams dang/ nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chos kyirjes su

lta zhing brtson 'grus dang/ shes bzhin dang/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang/ yid mi bde ba spangs nasa gnas pa ste/ de ltar na dge slongadran pa dang ldan pa yin no// dge slongangs
a ma skyongam pha gi 'ong gis/ brtson 'grus dang/ shes bzhin dang/ dran pa dang ldan pas gnas par gyis shig/ sa rjes su bstanapa ni 'di yin zhes ngas gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni de yin no// de nas a
ma skyong ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song staphyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis a mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga'/
bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtamagyis yang dag par bastan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/
nas cang mi gsung ngo// de nas a ma skyong ma stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gas su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gdage 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sa bdag gi snyam par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyongam la
cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas a ma skyong mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar re gnas / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga

nas song ngo// yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis btsem ldanu'adas sbyong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ yangs pa can du byon te/ yangs pa can gyi a mra skyong ma'i tshal nabazhugs so zhes
sa so// thosanasakyang soso nas shing rtadang rta rnams la zhon te/ khacig ni rta sngon po dang/ shing rta sngon po dang/ srab skyogs dang/ lcag sngonapo dang/ thor tshugs dang/ gdugs dang/ la kre
shubs ston mo dang/ rdzayab nor bu'i yu ba can dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ byug pa sngon po dang/ 'khor sngon po/ kha cig ni rta ser po dang/ shing ser po dang/ srab skyogasadang/ lcag
rat+ya@#// ser po dang/ thor tshugs dang/ gdugs dang/ ral gri shubs serapo dang/ rdzaya ba nor bu'i yu ba can dung/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ byag pa sar pa dang/ 'khor/
ser bo/ khacig ni rta dmar po dang/ shing rta dmar po dang/ srab skyogs dang/ lcag dmar po dang/ thor tshugs dang gdugs dang/ ral gri shubs dmar po dang/ rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can
dang gos dang/ rgyan dang/ byug pa dmar po dang/ 'khor dmar po/ kha cig nirtadakar po dang/ shing rta dkar po dang/ srab skyogs dang/ lcag dkar po dang/ thor tshugs dang/ gdugs
dang/ ral gri shubs dkar po dang/ rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ byug pa dkar po dang/ 'khor dkar por chas te/ skad mthon po dang/ skad chen por slar khyed slar khyad

ces zer zhing yangs pa can nas byang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar dong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams rgyang ring po/
khon nas 'ong ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed cag las sug sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyodamos tshalagyi gnas su 'gro ba ma mthong ba de yangs

pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la ltos shig/ daci'i phyir zhen/ dge slong dag sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang ji ltar daltar gyi yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi dag bzhin du/ rdzu 'phrul 'di dang/ 'byor pa 'di dang/
0 cha lugs 'dis skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro'o// jitsam bzhon ma'i sa'i bar du bzhonapas song nas/ bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang pa nas kun dga'i ra ba zhugs so// de nas yangs pa can
gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song sa lhagasanas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la tshes dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa ra mdzad/ yang dag
par rab tu dga' bar mdzad// rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad

nas cangamigasung ngo// de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu 'kher 'dus pa de nyid du 'dug par gyur to// de nas bram ze'i khye'u sor skya'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar nas/ btsem
ldan 'das gang na ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni slobs lags se// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ser skya'i bu khyed

phyobs par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus de'i tsho tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ang ga'i rgyal bo nor bu'i go 'chang ba// mag d+ha'i rgyal pos rnyed pa rab rnyed
de4 de yi yul du byungaba'i sas rgyas ni// grags pa'i sgra dgags kyiri bo bzhin// ji ltar ra rlabazang po legs bsrungs pa// dgos ka la bye dri zhim ldan pa bzhin//
bar snang la ni nyin lhag ge bar// snang ba lta bur nyi ma'i rgyud la ltos// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shes rab stobs// jiltar mtshan mo me 'bar lta bu ltos// denimig byed snang bar byed pa
lta lhags pa rnams kyi blo tsom rnam par 'dul// lo tsaphyi lnga brgyas/ bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras so// bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras so zhes/ bla gegs lta
brgya legs par sbas pa'i phyir byin no// de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde legs su thal mo sbyarab
btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tusang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis naganang bar mdzad du
gsol/ gnas 'jog dgang sar a mra skyong mas spyan drangs so// btsun pa a ma skyong ma dman pa/ shes rab dman pa des bdag cag bslas lags te/ des na bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das
thog ma nyid du blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi bo'i rtsom thogs modakaM/ da dung yang bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyan bkur 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis/
de dag la gnas 'jog de ni 'alegs par smras so zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yangs pa can gyi la tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'dasakyis gsungs pa la mngon par dag pa sa su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan

'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo// bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu nad nyid du 'dug go/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i lus yangs pa can gyi la
tshabyi rnams dong nas ring po ma lonabar shesanas/ ston las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ganganabade legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dir bdag la la tsa ba lnga brgyas bla gos lta brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir stsal ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba 'bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/

bcom ldan 'adas kyis bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bla gos lta brgya bzhes so// donas bcom ldan 'adas kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu la bka' stsal pa/de bzhin/

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byungan/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhen/ ser skya'i bu 'di la ston
pa de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes khu'adul ba'i kha lo sgyurab/ blan
med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jigarten du 'byung zhing chos thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru
bzang bo/ ma 'dres pa// yongs su rdzogs pa// yongs sudag pa/ yos su bung ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ston ng ra bgyuratu/ ser skya'i bu 'di ni de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byungan/ ngo mtshar rmad du 'byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang po yin no/ gdag chos de zhes dang bcas pas nyan cing bla mar byed/ dmapar byed/ yid la byed cing
sems rtsegacig rnablags nas sems thams cad bsdusanas nyan par byed pa 'din sar skya'i bu/ dengazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byungan/ ngomatshar

rmadadu byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gnyis pa yin no// chos de gang dag gis thos nas de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa 'dinisar skya'ikhu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

as rgyas 'jig rtenadu byungan/ ngomatshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gsum pa yin no// chos de gang dag gi thosanas dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa 'i dag ba

rgya chen po thob ba 'di nis nga skyo'i bu/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngomatshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba bzhi pa yin no// chos

dbang gis thos nas don zab mo'i gzhi shes rab kyis so sor rtogs par byed pa 'disar skya'i bu/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byungan/ ngo mtshar rmad du

byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba lnga pa yin no// ser skya'i bu skyes bu dam ba dag ni byas pa gzo ba dang/ byas patshor ba can yin te/ de dag cung zad tsamabyas na yang chud gzonaparamabyed na/ mngapo lta

smos kyang ci dgos/ de lta bas naser skya'i bu khyod kyis 'di ltar byas pa gzo ba dang/ byas pa tshor ba can du bslab par bya ste/ cung zad tsam byas n yang chud mi gzonan/ mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/
ser skya'i bu khyod kyi de lta bur bslab par bya'o// de nas bram ze'i khyeser skya'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis

la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyanasnga nas song ngo// de nas a ma skyongams de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa za' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te/ nang par sngar lasanas
gdan bshams te/ nor bu'i chu snod dag bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'adas la/ sbyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags na/ bcom ldan 'das da da'i dus
la bab par dgongs sugasol// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos dag bsnabs te/ dag slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing/ dge/
slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltasanas/ a mra skyong ma'i bkadas gang na ba der gshegs tabyon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la//
klo bzhugs so// de nas a ma skyong mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dag bdun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim/
par byed de/ rnamagrangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs te

lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan dma' ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis lam skyong mas sbyin pa phul ba de la rjes su yis bas

! lnga su yi rang bar mdzad de/ sbyin la dga' bgyur skye ba sten byed na// snyan pa thob cing de yi grags pa 'phel// ser sna med cing tshogs par 'groban// zhum par mi 'gyur 'jigs ba mid par 'gyur// dulta
bas na mkhas pa bde 'dod pas// ser sna'i drim spangs te sbyin pa gtong// dedag yun ring sumacu rtsa gsum gnas// lha rnams dang ni skal ba mnyam par dga'// sbyin gtong gi byed
nishi 'bosanas// rangagi 'od kyis dga' ba'i tshalanargyu// dan de gnyis rtse zhing dga' byed pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag dang ldan// ma bcings skyob pa de yi gsung thos nas//
bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos mtho ris dga'// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis amra skyong ma lachos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par
ga zes bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ stan las langs te song ngo// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ thatsom thams cad gcod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa yangs pa can gyi li tsaphyi rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des nagal te lha rnams su skyes n yang lha mthu che bar 'gyur la/ gal te mi rnams su skyes na yang mi mthu chen por
gyur cing/ daltar sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dpar ya nga bstanalags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis las tshogs redapa/ rkyen
yongs subasgyurab/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdonami zabar khyabar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/ 'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor
myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i bams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur ma'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams lami
'gyur gyi/ 'diltar dge ba dang mi dag babyas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni//
chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyurab nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ sbya dgu rnams kyi
tshe lo nyi khri thub ban/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan// bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i

kha le rab/ blanamed pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srus zhes bab 'jig rtenadu byung bar 'gyur te/ de 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang grong khyer wA ra NAsi'i drang srong

snabar dogs kyi nagasan nye bar brtan cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe wArA NAsin dge bsnyan lnga brgya gnas so// de rnams kyis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i thong sta gon byas te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gru bo che

tshil bsgrubasanasarim gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang/ rjesasu mthun pa'i rlung gis rin poche'i gling du phyin to// de nas rin po rnams kyis gru po che yongs su bkang nas chas pa dang/ des rlung gis

bsaM nasargya mtsho chen po'i klong zhig tu phyin to/de rnams bred cing re ba mad par gyur nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi phyir byem las mchod rten byas nas/ rin po che snatshog
kyisamachod pa byas so// de nas gnyid logapa dang/ lhazhig gis smras pa/ khyed cag ma 'jigs par bag yod par byos shig dang/ zhag bdun gyi nyin par dus rlabs 'ong bar 'gyur te/
denas khyed cag bde legs su 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ro// namanangs nas de rnams phan tshun dus zhing gros bya bar brtsams te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag la lhas mi 'jigs pa bstan

pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi mthus yin pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi mchod rten la bdag cag gis rin po che phul ba dag slar blangs te
'dong ba ni mi rigs so zhes/ de rnams kyis gtugs te/ smon lam btab par brtsams pa/ gang ya nga bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs bsod nams

kyi zhing bla na med pa la bya ba byas pa'i dag ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ gal te bdag cag lha rnams su skyes par gyur na bdag cag mthun ba kho nar gyur cig/ gal te mi'i nang du mi rnams su skyes par gyur na mthu rtse
ba dang/ mi rnams su skyes n yang sum cu rtsagasum gyi lha rnams kyi dpar rung bar gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ dge bsnyen ljab po gang yin pa de dag ni li tsab lnga brgya po
'di dag nyid yin te/ 'di dgagis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srus kyi phyir bye ma'imachod rten byas shing/ rin po che dag gis mchod pa byas pas/ san mi mthu chen po rnams su skyes par
gyur te/ sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yang dber rung bar gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nig cig tuganag pa yin/ 'dresam rnams kyi 'dren
ma yin/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na gang yang las gcig tu gnag ba rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ las/
gcig tsudakar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'/
bo yangs pa can gyi grong khyer dusong la/ sgo'i them pal rkang pa zhog la/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dang/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smos shig/ bas ra ta/ ba sa ra ta/ bi sar ta/ bsur ta/
sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtseb can gyis bka' stsal te// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa// dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa//
tatsi slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig smra ba thams cad kyis bsams pa/ sa rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis
bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs paso sos bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa// lhas bsams pa// lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis
bsams pa/ lham yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sar ta/ bsar ta/ ba sa ra ta/ bsar ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thug

0 brtse ba can gyis bka'astsal to// muny+tsata/ muny+tsata/ yams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'dug par gyur cig/ nir gats+tsata/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tshata/ nir gats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po
lha'i yang lta lha'i bla ma gshegs te/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang/ dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams
dad 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro// lha brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang/ lha ma yin brgya stong phrag dum dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro//

bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'jug ste/ de dag gis khyed rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ nir gats+tsha tu/ nir/
gats+tshata/ nir gtsAta/ nir gats+tshata/ myur du byer cig/ khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni rlag par gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyesapar
mi 'dod la/ srung bar byed par 'dod pa de dag ni ba khod cig/ dgongs pa la yang 'jug par gyur cig sasargyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
su mu su mu/ su mu sumu/ su mu ru/ sumu ru/ sumu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mur mur/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ miri mir/ mi'i mi ri/
mi'i mur ma ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru me ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru me ri/ maru me ri/ mur me ri/
mu rume'iti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri ti/ rIrirI rI rI rIti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri ti/ tasimi ri/ mi ri ti/ mirI mi rI/ sI sI mi/ kangag ra/ kang ka ra ta/ kang ka ra ta//
kang ka ra/ ka tsA kang ka rA kang ka rA/ kang karA/ kang kArA/ kang ka rA/ kang ku rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rAti/ kudIshe/ kang ka shi/ kang ka
risha/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ re pAsAri/ ri pu/ du/ ri pu/ ripu/ redu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ripu/ nA thAthA/ ri pu ri pa
nAthAthA/ nir gats+tshata/ nir gtsA ta/ nir
dgats+tsaM tu/ niragats+tshatA/ pal yAta/ ripu ri bu pal yAta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa byams pa la/

gnas pa// thugasarje dang dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs to/ lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad kyi blam/ sangs rgyus kyis chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi gsang sngagasakyi tshig grub
pa grub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ ]gang gi sred pa'i chags pa dag/ rnam par bcomanas 'bral mdzad pa// thugs zhiganod bamamanga' de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//
'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzuda mdzad cing// chos rnams thams cad ston pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi
don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mang mdzad de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te//
khyed la bde legasa mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi skyob gyur pa// gling dang dpung gnyen gyur ba de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang
zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing bsgrub mi mnga' ba// gsungagatsang gtsang bar mdzad pa ste// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dang ba bon po gang skyes pas// phun sum
tshogs don 'byor gyur cing// don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams dang/ nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos nas//
sems can thams cad rab dga' d// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gang zhig gis// sa rnams rnam drug g.yos gyur cing// bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de//
khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa gsung ba gang// thub pa grags pa 'byung bde// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur
gangagis chos kyi yid 'phrog pas/ mu stags byed rnams phama mdzad la// tshogs kun dabang du mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas//
[F ]khyadal bde legs mdzad// brgyabyin lhar bcas bde legs dang// 'byung bo kun gyibade legasani/ khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang// lha rnams kyis
bsams pa yis// khyed nams don 'dod gang yin pa// dond da ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyadacag bde legasashog/ rkang ba'i khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro
bde legs shog/ phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la gnas par shog/ khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma
gyur cig sangs rgyas lhanistong rnams kyis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sdang sems can rnams byar gyur cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ sangs rgyas rang
sangs rgyas rnams dang// dgra bcom slob pa'i bdenatshig gis// 'jig rtan mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'don gtong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun
dngakhyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad named gyur cig/ kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir no lhags
gyur cing// sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing// nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ ces rjod cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa can du song ste/ grong khyer gyi zam pa la rkang pa bzhago nasaM gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang/ tshigs su bcad pa
'di dag smras so// bsar ta/ bis ra ta/ bas ra ta/ bas ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang
sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa// dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa// nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig sgrub/
thams cad kyis bsams pa// chos rnams kyis bsams pa// 'dod pa'i dbang phyag gis bsams ra/ tshangs ras bsams pa// tshangs pa so sos bsams pa// dbang
pos bsams pa// lhas bsams pa// lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha mo yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung
po thams cad kyis bsams pa// bsar taM/ bas ra ta/ ba sa ra ta/ bis ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// muny+tsata/ muny+tsataM/
ams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'dug par gyur cig/ nir gats+tsata/ nir gats+tsata/ nil gtsAta nir gats+tsha// sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lhalha'i bla ma
gshags te dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang/ dwangang bsu dang bcas pa rnams dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang/
'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro// lha brgya stong phrag dum dag dang/ lham yin gyi dbang po rnams dang/ lha ma yin brgyastong phrag du ma dgakyang 'jug par bgyur ro//
bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung ngo brgya stong mang bo dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'jug ste/ de dgags khyed rnams laganod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ nir gats+tshata/
nir gats+tshati/ niragats+tshata/ nir gtsAta/ myur du byer cig/ khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni brlag par gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'isems dang ldan zhing nyes
par mi 'dod la/ srung ba byed par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cing/ dgongs pa la yang 'jug par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtsab can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//

mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru me ri/ mu ru mir/ mu ru me ri/ mu ru me ri/ mu ru mir/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi'i/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru me
riti/ ri ri'i ri ri ra ti/ rirArArI rI rI/ mir mi'i/ mi rimi ri/ mi ri mi ri ti/ bsi mi ri mi ri ti/ mi rime rI/ sI sImi/ kang kar/ kang ka ra ta kang ka bta
kang kur/ ka tsA kangagarA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka ra/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka ra/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA ti/ku rig/ kangagarIshe/ kang
ka rIsha/ ri ra ra ri'iri/ ri yA sAri/ ri pu/ ri du/ ri lu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ringu/ ri dug ripu/nAthA thA/ ri pu ri pu/ nAthA thA/ niragats+tsata/ nir gats+tsha ta/ ra
gats+tshata nir gats+tsata/ pa la Atha/ ri pu ri pu/ pa la yA tha/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgos pa/
byams nga la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs te/ lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad kyi bla ma/ sangs rgyas kyis chos nyid
kyi ye shes gsang sngags kyi tshig grub pa grub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsus so// gang gi sred pa'ichag pa dag/ rnam par bcom nas 'dul mdzad pa// thugs zhiganod
pa mi mnga'ad// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing// chos rnams thams cad sten
pa de khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyirten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mang mdzad de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob
pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugasakyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can
kun gyi skyob gyur pa// gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de// khyed la bde legasa mdzad par 'gyur/gang zhig chos kun mngon sumagyur// gtsang zhing bslu ba mi mnga' ba// gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad
paste khyadalo bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes par// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing// don grub tshog sakyang grub pa de// khyed la bde legasa mdzad par gyur//
gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams dang// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos nas// sems can thams cad rab dga' de// khyedal bdalegs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gang dag
gis sa rnams rnam drug g.yos gyur cing// bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lebaskorab na// 'phags pa'ibadanapa gsung ba gang//
ba thub pa grags pa 'byung bde// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang gis chos kyi yid 'phrog pas// mu stegs byed rnams pham mdzad la// tshogs kun dabang du mdzad pa de// khyed/
la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang// 'byung po kun gyi bde legasani// khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig/ sus
rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang// lha rnams kyisani bsams pa yis// khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang ba'i
khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cagalam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs sheg/ nyin m de legs mtshan bde legs// nyima'i gung la gnas par shog khyed
cag kun kyang bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha ni stong rnams kyis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sdangasems can rnams byer gyur cig/
snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang// dgra bcomaslob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ grong khyer 'din gtong gyur
cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nd ni med gyur cig/ kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur
cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur cing// sa'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byamu
byed cing// nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ ces brjod pa dang/ der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus mi ngas zhi bar
sdom 'a/ 'od ma dang ni dbus kyi grong// mi thi la dang lus 'phags dang// sA la khron pa ngan sdong bu// ngur smig gtsug phud bsngags ldan dang// gnag lhas
dang ni sdig can dang// ku sha'i grong khyeratha ma yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'od ma can gyi grong gangan
bar 'dong ngo// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyananas/ danas bcom ldan 'das sdong byang nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ dam

can gyi grong du byon nas/ 'od ma can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi grong shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas sa red par dka' bar byung bar gyur to// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar 'dir mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mongs zas red par dka' ba byung gis/ dge slong dag tshur khyed las
00 smos 'drin ji lta bu yod pa dang/ gtam 'dres pa ji lta bu yod pa dang/ 'grogs bshes ji lta bu yod pa de dag ni yangs pa can gyi 'a 'khor gyi sring byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par dam chos shig/
nga yang ba na bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang/ 'od m can gyi grong 'di nyid du dbyar gnas par dam bcas na thams cad bsod snyoms kyis 'phongs par mi 'gyuragrang/ btsun pa bka'
bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ sa 'dren ji lta bu yodapa dang/ gtam 'dres pa ji lta bu yod pa dang/ 'grogs pas ji lta bu yod pa/
dag ni/ yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// bcom ldan 'das kyang bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang/ 'od ma can gyi grong de nyid du
dbyar bzhugs par dam bcas so// dbyar gyi gnas der bcom ldan 'das snyan tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag po grongs la thug pa zhig gis thebs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'ad/
snyam du dgongs te/ bdag nad tshabasachen po mi brjod par drag pa ga la thug pas thebs la// dge slong gi dge 'dun yang 'thor bar gyur na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thor ba na/ bdag
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag gisatshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis bcil la/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar sems kyi ting ngo/
byabya// 'dzin mtshan ma med pa lus kyis mngon sum du bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o snyam du dgongasaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis
[ ]slar bcil nas/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi mdzad pas/ sems kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa skus mngon sum du mdzad de/ bsgrubs nas bzhugs te/ des na bcom ldan bs
lhag par spyod pa dang/ lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dgongs gnang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das snyan tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag pa gros la thug pas thebs par glo bar chud nas/ bdag gi lus dug 'tshalo ba bzhin du phyogs kyang bslad//
bdag gis thos pa'i chos rnams kyang bskyad par gyur lags te/ de la bdag glob re ba na/ re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi slad du zhal chems cung zad bka'am stsal
gyi bar du/ yongs su mya ngan lasami'od 'a'osnyam du bgyid do// kun dga' bo gang zhig 'di snyam du dge slong gi dge 'dunani bdag gi yin te/ bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun bstan

par bya'o// bdag gis dge slong dge 'dun drang nge snyam du sems pa de ni/ dge 'dun gyi phyir kha chems cung zad smra bar 'gyur ba nyidan/ kun dga' bo ngal ni 'di snyam du dge slong gi dge 'dun ni ba'i
yin/ sa dge slong gi dge 'dun bstan par bya'o// ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun drang ngo snyam du dgod pa me mnga' na/ ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir zhal chems khe na cung zad bstan
du ci yod gzhan yang kun dga' bong la dge slong gi dge 'dunagyi rag lus pa ci zhig yod/ kun dga' bo ngas rtag tugoms par bya ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bshad zin to////'dul ba gzhi// bam po nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa la nigang
zhig gzhan dgagis shesan mi rung bas/ de bzhin gshegs pas bcab bo snyam du dgongs pa'i slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi na ngu'a'o// kun dga' bo 'on kyang gang gi tshe/ de bzhin
gshegs pa snyan tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag pos gros la thug pas thebs pa de la nga 'disAm du sems te/ bdagand tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag pa shi la thug pas thebs la/ dge slong gi
dge 'dun yang 'thor bar gyur na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thor ba na bdag yongs su mya nganalas 'da' ba bdag gi cham yin gyis ]ma la bdag gis tshor ba
gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar sems kyi/ ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa lus kyis mngon sum du bsgrubs nas gnas par bya'o
snyam nas/ ngas tshor ba gcig pu de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil nas/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi mdzad par sems kyis/ ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa skus mngon sum
du bsgrubs te bzhugs te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa lhag par spyad pa dang ldan zhing/ lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to// gzhan yang kun dga' bo da ni de bzhin gshegs pa khi na
ts+tsa tshod la brgyad cu len pas/ sku bgres/ 'khegs/ gtugs par gyur te/ rnam pa gnyis la brten nas 'tsho'o// dper na shing rtaring pa rnam pa gnyis la brten nas brtan ng
de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegos pa yang na tsho le brgyad cu len pas/ sku bgres/ 'khogs/ gtugs par gyur te/ rnam pa gnyis la brten nas 'tsho'o// de lta
bas na kun dga' ngo khyed mya nganam byed cig nyon mongs par mang da cig/ smre sngags ma 'don cig/ skyo ba dang/ byung ba dang/ byas pa dang/ 'dus byas pa dang/
0 bsams pa gang yin pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par 'gyes pa'i sa can de la mi 'jigs pa de lta bu lta ga la red de/ da ni gnas med de kun dga' bo gang yang ngas khyod la
sdug pa dang/ 'phangs pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang 'bral ba dang/ 'jig pa dang/ 'byas pa dang/ mi ldan par 'gyur bar sn gnas bshad/
zin to// kun dga' bo de lta bas nad lta 'am nga 'das kyang rung/ bdag nyid glingadang/ bdag nyid skyabs dang/ chos kyi gling dang/ chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'o/
gling gzhan dang skyabs gzhan gyis ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bod lta 'am nga 'das kyang rung gang su dug bdag nyid kladang/ bdag nyid skyabs dang/ chos kyi gling
dang chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par byed kyi/ gling gzhan dang skyabs gzhan gyisani ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ nga'i nyan blos bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin no//
kun dga' bo ji ltar na dge slong gis bdag nyid gling dang/ bdag nyid skyabs dang/ chos kyi gling dang/ chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan dang skyabs gzhan
gyis rim yin zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di la dge slong nang gyi lus lus kyi rjes su lta zhing/ brtson 'grus dang/ shes bzhin dang/ dran ba dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten
u@#// la gnod sems dang/ yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so/ phyi'i lus dang/ nang dang phyi'i lus dang/ nang gi tshor ba rnams dang/ phyi'i
tshor ba rnams dang/ nang dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang/ nang gi sems dang/ phyi'i soms dang/ nang dang phyi'i sems dang/ nang gi chos rnams dang/ phyi'i chos rnams dang/
nang dang phyi'i chos rnams 'chos kyi rjes su lta zhing/ brtson 'grus dang/ shes bzhin dang/ dran pa dang ldan pas// 'jig rten la gnod sems dang/ yid mi bde ba spangs nas
gnas ba ste/ kun dga' bo dge slong 'di lta bu ni bdag nyid gling dang/ bdag nyid skyabs dang/ chos kyi gling dang/ chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas kyi/ gling gzhan dang skyabs gzhan gyis
ni ma yin pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsakha/ kun dga' bo dbus kyi grong gang na bar 'dong ngo// btsun nga/
bka' bzhin 'tshol zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar na nyanato// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzado// chos nyid kyis gang
gi tshasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'itsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang/ sar po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dag
'byang zhing/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// gang dag 'og tu song ba de dag ni yang sos dang/ thig nag dang/ bsdus gzhom dad/ ngu 'bod dang/
ngu'ibod chen po dang/ tsha ba dang/ rab dutsha ba dang/ mnar med pa dang/ chu bur can dang/ chu bur rdol ba dang/ so thams thams dang/ kyi hud zer ba dang//
achu zer ba dang/ ut+pal ltar gas pa dang/ pad+ma ltar gas pa dang/ pad+ma ltar gas pa chen po'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang dag
yin pa de dag la ni bsil bar 'bab bo// grangaba'i sems can damul ba gangadag yin ba de dag la ni brobar 'bab bo// des sems can de rnams kyi gnod pa'i khyad par dag so sor bcil lo//
de rnams 'di snyam dusems te/ shes ldan dog ce bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam pa dang/ de rnams dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
sbyar pa zhig btang ngo// de rnams kyis sprul ba mthong nas 'di snyam dusems te/ sa ldan dag bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang med la// gzhan du skyes pa med mod kyi/
'on kyang sngonama mthong ba'i sems can 'adi'i mthus bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rnams so sor bcil 'o zhis/ de rnams sbalapa la sems mngon par dang bar gyur pas dmyal ba
myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas/ gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar gyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba bzung ngo//
gang dag stod du song ba de dag ni rgyalachen bzhi'i ris dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang/ 'ashab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
dang/ tshangs ris dang/ tshangs pa'i mdunan 'don dang/ tshangs pa chen po dang/ bodachunganang/ tshad med 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang dge chung dang/ tshad mo da dag dang/ dge rgyas dang/ sngon
mad dang/ bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu cha dang/ mi che ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ gya nom snang ba dang/ shin tu mthong ba dang/ 'ogamin gyi lha rnams kyi nang
dusong nas/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stongapa dang/ bdag med pa'i dbyangs sgrog cing/ tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis kyang bsgrags so// brtsam bar
bzhi 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/ gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas// chos
'dul 'di la brtson gyur na// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal thamar byed par 'gyur// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
ma khams byul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'gro'o// de la gal te bcem ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhedanani/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam legs
su nub par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed nani/ mdun legs su nub par 'gyur ro// dmyal bar skye ba lung ston par bzhed nani/ zhabs kyi ma gyil du nub par 'gyur
re dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhad nani/ zhabs kyi rting pa'i nub par 'gyur ro/ yi dgas su skya bar lung ston par bzhidanani/ zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro//
mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi pus mor nub par 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhad nani/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du nub par
'gyuraM/ 'khor res sgyurab 'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhedanani/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur/ lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bor nub bar 'gyur/
nyan khros kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed nane/ zhal gyi nang du nub par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byung chub tu lung ston par bazhedanani/ mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/ blonamed ba
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed nani/ dbu'i gtsug tunub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das lo lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong
gis bkra ba yi// tshogs rnams zhal gyi nang nas byung gyur pa// ji ltar gdugs zhishar bar gyur ba bzhin// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ yang tshigs su bcad pa
dag gis gsol pa/ rgodabral zhumadang rgyags ba spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gronang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyum mchis par// rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum
ston mi mdzad// de slad brtan pa nyid blo dus mkhyen nas// rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog/ nyan par 'tshal ba'i nyan pa po rnams kyi// the tshom skyes pa gsang tshig brtan
pa dang// dmal bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol// tshamu'i ri bolta bur brtan pa'i mchog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston// bstan pa ji sladu 'dzum pa ston
mdzad pa// skya bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshol// bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de de bzhinano// ded bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin ge gas pa/
thaM dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rgyu med/ rgyanamed par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di mthong ngam/ btsun pa 'di mthong lags so//
kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsum bzhugs par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos myur ba myur bar bla gos bzhi bltab tu byas te bting nas//
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa kho na la bzhugs shig dang/ sa phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhis yongs su
longs skyed par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// skad cig gcig tu bzhugs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
kun dga' bo grong khyer mi thi la gang nabar 'dong ngo// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das lus
'phags kyi ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs ban/ mi gyi larabyonanas/ mi thi la'i lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal nabazhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa
mdzad do// tshodang ldan ng kun dga' bos btsem ldan 'das 'dzum ba mdzad pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ btsun pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i rgyu gang lags/
@#// rkyen gang 'gas/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med/
rkyenamed par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de// kun dga' bo ston byung ba mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub par gyur te/ mi tshe lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi 'dzam bu gling 'di 'byor ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/
bde ba dang/ lo legs pa dang/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang pos gangs/ grong dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul kha bar dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang gi bar bya gag gi 'bur stabs kyisam tshod
bar byang bar gyur to// mi tshe lo brgyad khri pa rnams la/ lus kyi gnod pa ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ grang ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ bkresang dung/ skom pa
dang 'dod pa dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ rgab yin no// mi tshe la brgyad khri pa rnams kyi bu mo ni btsas nas 'a lnga brgya lonang dang/ khyo la gtong bar byed de/ dper nad/
ltar gyi lo bco lnga 'am/ lo bcu drug len pa bzhin no// kun dga' bo mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba mtha' bzhir rnam par
u0f09 rgyalab/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo// de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu byungahU~M/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang/ glong
bo rin po che dang/ rta rin po che dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ bud med rin po che dang/ khyim bdag rin po che dang/ bdun pa ni glenapo rin po che nyid yin no// de la yang bu dpa' ba//
tshur bod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa// pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'dzoms pa stong yang tshang bar byung ste/ da rgya mtsho la grug pa'i sa chen poms pa gnodabar sdo ba med cing 'tshe
ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs par phab sta gnas so// de nas rgyal po lha chen po'o skadang kha spu 'dreg mkhan gyi mis
'chos pa na/ 'dreg mkhan gyi mi la smas pa/ kyenang rje pa'i dbu la skra dkar po skyes pa khyod kyis mthong dang lha'i pho nyabyung ba yin gyis/ de'i tshe nga'i snyan du gsol cig/ lha bka'
bzhin 'tshal zhes 'dreg mkhan gyi mis/ rgyal po lha chen po'i ltar ma nyan to// dus gzhan zhig na 'dre ga mkhan gyis rgyal po lha chen po'i skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na/ rgyal po lha chen po'i
mgo la sku dkar po skyes pas lha'i pho nya byung bar mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang rgyal po lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyenapar mdzad du gsol/ khyed kyi dbu la dbu skra dkar po
skyes bas lha'i pho nya byung lags so// des smras pa/ kyenang rje khyod kyis skra dkar po de dag mi 'dreg par dale bu dal bus phyung la nga'i lag tu byin cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
'dreg mkhan gyis rgyal po lha chen po'i ltar mnyananas/ skra dkar po de gser gyi snang tshar gyi mi 'dreg par dal gyis phyung nas/ rgyal po lha chen po'i lag par
bzhag go/ de nas rgyal po lha chen pos skra dkar po de lag pa gnyis kyis drangs nas tshigs su bcad de sa pa/ da nibadag gi mgo bo la// na tshod 'joras pa'i sku skyes te// lha yi
bon byung gyur pas// bdag gi rab byung dus 'bab/ bdag gis mi rnams kyi 'dod pa ni spyad wanagyis/ bdag gis lha'i 'dod pa dag btsal ba'i dus la bab kyis/ ma la bdag

gi gzhin du klu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug la/ rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs bar spyod pa spyad de snyam nas/ de nas rgyal bo lha chen pos gzhonanu bo nyas bku gnas 'di skad
ces smras so// bu gzhon nu shes par gyis shig nga'i mgo la skadakar po skyes bas/ lce'i po 'byung bar gyur to// ngas mi rnams kyi 'dod pa spyad zinapas nga'i lha'i
'dod pa dag btsal ba'i dus la bab ste/ ngas bu gzhan n khyod la rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i sa chen po 'di gtad kyis/ de khyod kyis chos bzhin gyis rjes su bskyang ba la bya'i/ tshomo ga
yin ngas nim yin no// 'ba' zhig chos ma yin pa skyed dam/ 'dren mar sbyod na/ khyed kyis yul 'khor du gnas su ma gzhug cig/ bu gzhon nu gang gi tshe khyed kyang mgo la

skra dkar bo skyes pa mthong ba dang/ lha'i pho nya 'ongs pa yin gyis/ de'i tshe khyod kyis kyang gzhon nu bu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du chug la/ rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshongs/
par spyad pa spyod cig/ 'diltar bu gzhonanu khyod kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa srol ded pa de lta bu'i rjes bsab par bya'i/ rgyun chad par ma byed cig/ skyes bu tha shal du gyur ta re/
bu gzhon nu 'ga' zhig 'di lta bu'i skyes bu bzang po rgyud du byungaba'i dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes mi 'tshob ba gang yin pa de/ de rnams kyi rgyun gcod pa yin zhing/ de de

rnams kyi nang na skyes bu shal du gyur pa yin no// de lta bas na nga khyod la 'di skad ces/ gang gi tshe khyodakyis 'di lta bu'i skyes bu bzang bo rgyud byung ba'i dgo ba'i lam nges srol dod pa da lta
bu'i rjes sogs la rgyun chad par ma byed cig/ skyes bu bshal du gyur par ma byed cig ces smra'o// de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhan nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed dubatsug

nas/ mi thi la'i lha chen po'i a ma'i tshal de nyid du rgyal bo'i drang srong gi tshangs par sbyod pa spyad do// kun dga' bo rgyal po lha chen pos gzhonan thu bo gang yin pa de rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang
byed du bcug pa de'i ming yang 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal bo lha chen po zhes bya ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas/ gnas so zhes bya ba'i khar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas
rgyal po lha chen po'i sku dang kha spu 'dreg mkhan gyi mis 'chos pa na zhes bya ba nas/ de de rnams kyi nang na skyes bu tha shal du gyur pa yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
bzhin du'o// de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhonan thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcu gnas / rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ kun dga' bo bu dang/

tsha be dang/ yang tshe dang/ gsum tshal sogs pa de ltar rgyud bas/ lha chen po brgyad khri bzhisong mi khri la'i lha chen po cha u0f7ala dra'i tshal 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa
spyad do// de rnams kyi tha ma rgyal bo mu khyud ces bya ba chos kyi rgyal bo/ chos dang ldan ng/ chos la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po zhig byung ste/ de btsunamo dang/ gzhon nu dang
blun po dang/ khrom gyi ru ba dang/ grong mi dang/ yul mi dag dang/ chos spyod de/ sbyin pa dag gtong/ bsod nams dag byed cing/ bsnyen gnas la
gnas te/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug go/ de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin lu'i mdunas chos bzang du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dus shing 'khod pa rnams
kyi mdun du bsngags pa rjod par byed de/ grogs po dag lus 'o bgos kyi mi rnams kyis red nga legs ba ra red de/ lus 'phags kyi mi de rnams kyi rgyal po mu khyud chos kyi
rgyal po/ chos dang ldan pa// tshes la gnas pa'i rgyal bo chen po de btsun mo dang zhes bya ba nas/ tshul khrims yang dag pas blangs te 'dug go/ zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma
ba zhin du'o// grogs po dag khyed cag rgyal po mu khyud lta bar 'dod dam/ ko'u shika shin tu'atshal lo// grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed cag sdod cig dang/ kho bos re
zhig rgyal po mu khyud lta'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum ba brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba bskum pa tsam gyis sum cu rtsa gsum
pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mdunas chos bzang nas mi snang bar gyurati/ mi thi lar rgyal bo mu khyud kyi khang bzangs su 'dug go/ 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ mu khyudod la lha'i mdun sa
chos bzang du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dus shing 'dug pa rnams bsngag pa rjod pa ni/ khyodakyis red pa legs par red do// grogs po lus 'apags kyi mi rnams kyis redar
zhes bya ba nas/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te 'dug par byed do/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// mu khyud khyedasum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro
'dod dam/ ko'u shi ka bdag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta ba'i phyir mche bar 'tshal go/ mu khyud de'i phyir sdod cig dang/ re zhig kho bos khyod la rta cangashes stong dang
ldan pa'i shing rtabaskur gyis/ de'i nang du khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog cig/ de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes rgyal po mu khyadakyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar
mnyan to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyin ng du song nas/ kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdu la lcas pa/ ma lagadu khyod song la myur ba kho nar rta cangashes

stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta shoms te/ rgya' bo mu khyud gangan bder song la phyin nas 'di skad ces/ mu khyud khyod lo lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rtacang shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rtabaskur ba 'di yin gyis/
'dir khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog cig ces smosaM shig/ ko'u shi kakhyod kyis gsungs pa shin tu bzang ngo zhes/ kha lo sgyur ba ma lagadus lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar mnyan
nas/ myur ba kho nar rta cang shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta bshams nas/ rgyal po mu khyud gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang 'di skad ces smras so// mu khyud khyed la lha'i dbang
po brgya byin gyis rta cang shes steng dang ldan pa'i shing rta bskur ba 'di yin gyis/ 'dir khyed zhuges la ma g.yo bar shog cig ces zer ro// kun dga' bo rgyal po mu khyad rtatsang shes
stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta'i nang du mi g.yo bar zhugs pa dang/ de nas gas kha la sbyar ba ma la gdus/ rgyal po mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras so// mu khyud khyed kyi shing rta gang
logs su drangs/ gang nasems can sdig pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba legasasu 'am/ gang nasems can dge ba'i
las can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba legs su drangs/ ma la gdu de'i phyir kho bos gang du gnyis ka mthong bar 'gyur ba/ gang na sems can sdug/
pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam bar smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba dag yod pa dang/ gang nasems can dge ba'i las can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa so ser
nyams su myong ba dag yodapa der shing rta drongs shig/ de nas kha bsgyur ba ma la gdus rgyal po mu khyud kyi shing rta/ rgyal po mu khyud kyis gang nasems can sdig pa'i 'os can rnams
sdig pa mi dge ba'i lasakyi rnam par smin pa sosor nyams su myong ba dag yid pa dang/ gang nasems can dge ba'i las can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba
dag yod pa gnyis ka rgyal po mu khyud kyis ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar drangs so/ dkun dga' bo rgyal po mu khyud sum cu rtsagasum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ rgyal po
mu khyud lha'i mdunas chos bzang po zhugs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal bo mu khyud la stan phyedabastabasanas/ rgyal po mu khyud dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan phyed phyed/
la 'khodad// kun dga' bo rgyal po mu khyud dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin stanang da phyed+ha la 'bad pa na/ khyad par ram/ bsam pa 'am/ tha dad du bya
ba med kyis/ gzhan du na lha'i dang nga po brgya byin ni mig 'dzums par mi byed do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rgyal po mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras so// mu khyud 'di
nyid du 'dug la/ mu khyud khyod dga' bar spyod cig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pa la rtsed mo byos shig/ dga' bar spyod cig/ dga' dgur spyod cig/ danus
rgyal po mu khyud kyis de'i tshatshigs su bcad de smyos pa/ ji ltar snod dang shing rta dag/ re zhig dus kyi bar n po ltar// gzhan dog dbang sgyur gang yin pa'i// gnas kyang de dang
'dra ba yin// 'di nas ma tho lar song la// dge bamang po rnams bya ste// bsod nams byas shing 'byor byas nas// mtho ris suni'agro bar bya// kun dga' bo de'i tshe
de'i dusan rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba gang gis dge ba'i lam nges pa de la zhugs shing/ gong dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa la brten nas/ lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong mi thi la'i sgyu

chen po'i a ma'i tshul 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad par gyur pa byung ba gang yin pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
0 7 kun dga' bo nganyidada'i tshade'i dus na rgyal golha chen po zhes bya bar gyur te/ nganyid kyis dge ba'i lam nges pade srol btod cing/ dge ba'i lamanges pa srol dod par brten nas/ lha

chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ma tho la 'dinyid nalha chen po'i a ma'i tshel 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' ba de'i tsho nga 'dod chags
dang bcas zhe sdang dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas par gyur te/ skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ nob dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ snesngags 'don pa dang/
sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol zhing/ sdug bsngal las yongs su mgrol lo zhes gsung ngo// kun dga' bo da ni nga nyid 'jig
rten du ston ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan ng/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyenapa/ skyes bu
'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blanamed pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur nas/ 'dod chags dang bral/ zhe sdang dang bral/ gti mug
dang bral bas/ skye ba dang/ rgyab dang/ nab dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/
'khrug pa las yongs su grol zhing/ sdug bsngal las yongs su grol lozhes gsungang// kun dga' bo de ltar na yang ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa srol btod pa de
la brtenanas/ sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni skye ba'i tshes nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sems can rgyab dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don
pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa'i tshes can rnams ni 'khrug pa'i tshes nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ ngas dge ba'i lam des nga la zhugs shing/ dge
ba'i lam nges ba la zhugs pa de la brten nas/ sems can skye ba'i chos can nas/ sems can 'khrug nga 'i ches can gyi bar dag 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ba de gang
yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang
dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di ni ngas dge ba'i lam
nges pa la zhugs pa dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa de la brten nas/ sems can skye ba'i chos can nas/ gong ma bzhin du 'khrug pa 'i tshes nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i
bar yin no// kun dga' bo khyodakyis kyang de bzhin du dge ba'i lam nges pa srol ded pa de lta bu'i rjes bsab par bya'i/ rgyun chad par ma byed cig/ skyes bu tha shal du
gyur par ma byed cig/ kun dga' bo gang la la de lta bu'i nyan thos bzang po brgyadadu byung ba'i dge ba'i lam nges pa srol ded ba de lta bu'i rjes ma 'tshob pa de ni de rnams kyi rgyun
gcod pa yin zhing/ de da rnams kyi skyes bu tha shal du gyur pa yin no// de bas na nga khyod la 'di skad du/ rinas kyang khyod kyis de lta bu'i nyan thes bzang bo brgyud du byung nga 'i 'om
nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu de'i rjes sobs shig/ rgyun chad par ma byed cig/ skyes bub nyal du gyur par ma byed cig ces snya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe
dang ldan ng kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lus 'phags gang nab der ba dong ngo// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshel zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags su byonas/ lus 'phags kyi phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do zhes bya bas/ sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan yin no zhes bya/
ba dang/ skad cig bzhugs nas zhes bya brgyas bar gongom bzhino// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo sA la gang na bar 'dong ngo// btsun
pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi lta ra mnyan nas// bcom ldan 'das spyong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ sA
lar byon nas/ sA la'i bram ze'i grong na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ sA lar
bsod snyoms la zhugs so// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong go'u ta ma 'di sA la'i bram ze'i grong na 'dug ste/ de snga dro sham thabs bgos//
lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ sA lar bsod snyoms la zhugs kyis// ma la bdag gis sA la'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ji ltar dag sbyong go'u ta mas lhung bzed bkrus te/
sA lar bsod snyom la zhugs pa bkrus pa de kho na bzhin bsod snyoms bam 'ga' yang ma red par phyir ldog pa de lta de ltar byin gyis brlab bo snyam mo// donas bdud sdig can gyis su la'i bram ze
dang khyim bdag rnams ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus te/ sA lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa bkrus pa de kho na bzhin du bsod snyoms kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed par slar
byon pa de lta de ltar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis bdag nyid bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing
'di skad ces kyang smras so// dge sbyong dag sbyong bsod snyoms kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed dam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te// kyi ma nye bar 'ongs pa 'di ni bdud sdig can
yin te/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par dkrug pa'i las byed do snyam du thugs su chud nas/ tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// de bzhin gshegs la khyad bsad pas// khyod kyis bsod
nams min mang bsags// sangs rgyas rnams ni brgal dka' bar// sdig can cig ma shes sam/ dge sbyong de'i phyur slar yang sA lar bsod snyoms la bzhud cig dang ci nas kyang bsod
snyoms red pa de ltar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// nga la ci yang mi bdog pa// kye ma shin tu bder 'tsho ste// 'od gsal lha rnams ji lta bar//
dga' ba yi ni zas bza' 'o// nga la ci yang mi bdog pa// kye mashin tu bder 'tsho sdu// 'jig tshogs lta la mi rten pas// dga' ba yi ni zas bza' 'o// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam
du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i sems kyis bdag gi bsam pa shes so snyam du rig nas/ sdug bsngal dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'gyod pas de nyid du ma snang bar gyur te//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khron pa bon gang na bar 'dong ngo// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'/
bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khron pa can du byon to// khron pa can na bud med gzhan zhig phyung thag dang chu snod khyer te khron pa 'i drung du song ba

dung skyes pa gzhan zhig de la chags pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i sa mas kyis rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba dang/ de yang lhag par de la chags pas de gnyis phan tshun du 'tham zhing khron par dong ngo//

de'i bu khye'u chung nga ma zhig/ de dang lhan cig phyi bzhin 'brang zhing song ngo// de nas de skyes pal rtog cing chu stong gtang ngo snyam ste/ khye'u chung de'i mgul na thag pas btags te btang ba las shipar gyur to/
des sngon ma thos pa'i tshigs su bcad pa thos pa/ 'dod pa khyod rtsa ngas shes te// rtog ba las ni 'dod pa skye// khyod la rtog pa ma byas dang// de nas nga la mi 'byung ngo// bcom ldan 'angs
kyang lam de nas gshegs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'baka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo tshigs su bcad pa 'di zung zhig/ tshigs su bcad pa
'di ni 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin te/ 'di'i so so'i skye bo'i lag tu 'ongs pas mi snang/ mi gsal/ rnam nga ra mi gas la pa// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas ji ltar sems 'di myur du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ni gcig kyang ma mthong ngo// de nas bud med de bu'i mya ngan gyis gdungs nas/ bcom ldan 'angs kyi
zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyenanas/ de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad
de de thos pas bud med des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shum tho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas lan
du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa// btsun pa bdag la 'di lta bu ni/ mas ma bgyis te/ phas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ snga ma 'das pa rnams kyis ma/
lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags/ rang gi skya bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/
bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nasaM/ ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bkumaM mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/
yi dgas nas ni rkang nga drangs/ lha dang mi rnams su ni rab tu bzhag/'khor ba las ni thagu bsrings/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ nus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/
thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ni yashes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa
bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag
dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol// deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te// skyabs su mchi par mngon par dad lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo nga byang nub sems dpar gyur pa na/ phyogs 'di nyid du drang srong ngan slong gi bus gdan dang/ rtsa ba dang/ 'bras bu la spyan drangs so//
phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo nga byang nubasams dpar gyur pa na/ rgo ba la sogs pas yid byung ste/ phyogs 'di nyid du lha'i dbang po brgya byi

rngon pa'i cha byad du byas pa la ka shi ka'i ras phran byin nas gos ngur smig blangs pa yin te// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis ngur smig blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten rtsigs te/ da dung

du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang ka shi ka'i ras phran sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du khyer te bzhag nas/ kashi ka'i dus mchod
chen po btsugs te/ da dung du yang de la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag bya ba byed do// phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sdu la pa// kun dga' bo nga byang chub
ga nag dbar gyur pan/ phyogs 'dir ral gri ut+pal sngon po 'gas dbu skra bregs nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'phangs pa yin te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis dbu
sku blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ da dung du mang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do// lta'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang dbu skra sum cu rtsa gsum
pa'i lha'i nang du khyer te bzha gnas / gtsug phud kyi dus mchod chen po btsugs te/ da dung du yang de la sum cu rtsa gsum pa lha rnams bya ba byed do// phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang
