bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir cu'i rgyal po bsngags ldan 'dun pas khrid nas slar btang ba yin te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis bsngag
ldan slar btang ba zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ da dung duyang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phug byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul gnag lhas can du byon nas/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo gnag lhas can 'dir rigs kyi bu 'dun pa btsas nas 'di nyid nga chen por gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
'das sdig can du byon te/ sdig can gyi rgyud rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das sdig can du gshegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgan rabs rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu gang yin pa de dag
gis ni lam bzang po'abyos shig/ bdag cag gis ni grong khyer bzang por bya'o// de nas gzhon nu rnams kyis lam bzang por bya bar brtsams pa na/ de rnams kyis pha bo
zhig mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de dor bar brtsams pa las dor bar ma nus so// bcom ldan 'dus kyang phyogs de nyid du gshegs nas bka' stsal pa// gnas 'jog dag 'di ci bya/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi slad du shal bzang bor bgyi lags na/ pha bong 'di dor bar rngo ma thog go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de ltar na ngas dor ram/ bcom ldan 'das dor du gsol/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos pha bong steng gi nam mkha' la 'phangs te// mig rgyang gis kyang mi so da bar bor ba dang/ de'i sgras rgyud rnams sngangs par gyur to// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas 'jog dag ma 'jigs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis pha bong de phyi mar blags nas rdul dang ba par brtsams so/ spyod rnams kyis/
gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdul gang las 'bab lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas pha bong de phye mar byugs pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das ma legs pa zhig/
bgyis so// ci sur mtshams sbyar ram/ bcom ldan 'das slar mtshams sbyar du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mos pa'i stobs kyis slar sbyar nas/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du
bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid na bzhugs so// byed lnga brgya po de dag kyang de nyid du tshogs nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis pha bong de stongs gang gis 'phags
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gnas 'jog dag yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs kyis so// de rnams kyis gsol pa// stobs gang gis phye mar blags lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis so// gang gis slar mtshams sbyar lags/ mos pa'i stobs kyis so// bcom ldan 'das kyi yab dang yum lus byang
ba'i stobs kyi tshad ji tsam lags/ gnas 'jog dag gi gsu'i stobs gang yin pa den slong phal po gcig gi yin no// glang phal pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni ba man sngon po gcig gi

yin no// ba man sngon po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang bo na phrug gu gcig gi yin no/ glang po chu phrug gu bcu'i gang yin pa de ni glang po che mo gcig gi yin no// glang po che mo bcu'i gang yin pa de ni glang po ma
yul gcig gi yin// glang po che phal bcu'i gang yin pa de ni glang po che mchab med gcig gi yin no// glang po che mcho ba med bcu'i gang yin pa de ni sngon po gcig gi yin no// sngon po bcu'i gang
yin pa de ni ser po gcig gi yin no// ser bo bcu'i gang yin pa de ni dmar po gcig gi yin no// dmar bo bcu'i gang yin pa de ni dkar po gcig gi in no// dkar po bcu'i gang yin pa
de ni 'bigs byed kyi gralegacig gi yin no// 'bigs byed kyi glang po che bcu'i gang yin pa de ni sdes kyi glang po chu gcig gi yin// spos kyi glang po che bcu'i gang yin
pa de ni tshan po che gcig gi yin no// na po nu bcu'i gang yin pa de ni tshan bonan po gcig gi yin no// tshan po che chen po bcu'igang yin pa de ni rab gnon gcig gi yin no// rab gnon bsu'i gang
yin pa de ni stobs mchog gcig gi yin no// stobs mchog bcu'i gang yin pa de ni srid med kyi bu'i stobs phyed do// sred med kyi bu'i stobs phyed gnyis gang yin pa de ni sred med kyi bu'i
stobs yin te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshags dang tshigs phran dag na yod pas/ gnas 'jog dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni srong

med kyi bu'i stobs kyi tshogs can yin no/// bar sngon la// mi dang glang dang ba chen dang ni de bzhin glang chen phrug gu dang// glang chen mo dang phal dang mche ba med dang de bzhin bzhi tshan dang//
'bigs byed glang chen dang ni tshan po che gnas dang// rab gnon dang ni stobs mchog dag dang sred med bu yi stobs gzhis so// sred med kyi bu'i stobs gang lags pa 'di de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yab yum las byung ba'i stobs lags na// btsun pa yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang/ mos pa'i stobs las stobs gzhan mchis
lags sam/ gnas 'jog dag yod de/ 'dilta ste/ bsod nams kyi stobs zhes bya ba yin te/ gnas 'jog dag bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas
byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'khor 'byung po bye ba sum cu rtsa drug can bcom nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so// btsun pa yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
dang mos pa'i stobs dang/ bsod nams kyi stobs 'di bas lhag pa'i stobs gzhan lta mchis lags sam/ gnas 'jog dag yod/ 'di lta ste/ yi shes kyi stobs zhes bya
ba yin te/ yoshes kyi stobs dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs bor (spangs/ bsal te/ so sor
sbyangs so// tsun pa yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang/ mos pa'i stobs dang/ bsod nams kyi stobs dang/ ye shes kyi stobs 'di bas
lhag pa'i stobs gzhan lta mchis lag sa sam/ gnas 'jog dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zhes bya ba yin te/ gnas 'jog dag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang ldan
pas de bzhinagshegs pas 'od spungs rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par/ thams cad mkhyen par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa dag spobs pa med par
btsun pa 'di ltar yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang/ chos pa'i stobs dang/ bsod nams kyi stobs dang/ yal gas
kyi stongs dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di bas lhag pa'i stobs gzhan lta mchis lags sam/ gnas 'jog dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa 'i stobs zhes bya ba yod de/
gnas 'jog dag mi rtag pa'i stobs dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yab dang yum las byung ra'i stobs gang yin pa dang/ bsod nams kyi stobs gang yin pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin
gyi skyob sa gang yin pa dang/ mos pa'i stobs gang yin pa dang/ yoshes kyi stobs gang yin pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs gang yin pa de dag thams cad shing sA la zung gi bar du gabri
med par 'gyur ro// tshigs su bcad de yang bka' su la pa/ shes stobs dang bsod nams stobs dang ni// rdzu 'phrul stobs dang sku yi lto bas pas kyang// nga yi gzi brjid 'dzoms nga' byed
pa yi mi rtag nyid ni ches skyob ga ldan par 'dod// gang du gser gyi ri dbang rtse mo lta bur 'dug ba'i sku/ 'di 'dra mi rtag nyid kyi gzi yis bcom nas 'jig 'gyur ba// mi rtag shin tu
stobs dang ldan par mkhas pa sazhes bya ste// gang du mi rtag nyid kyi brdzi ba med pa de thob bya// 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po sum cu ba'o//
gnas 'jog dag da ltar gyi mi rnams tshe dang/ kha dog dang stobs dang/ longs spyod kyi bar dag nyams pa la ltos// rdo 'di ni bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi pad tshad kyi rdo yin te/ 'di la lag
rjes kyang snang ngo// de rnams shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ de rnams kyi stobs kyi dregs pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyad de rnams kyi bsam pa dang/
bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas 'jig tshogs la
lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba yashes kyi rdo rje s bcom nas/ rgyun tu tshugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas 'an gsum du ched du brjod pa sa ched du
brjod pa// btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la mas ma bgyis te/ bag ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/
dge sbyong dang bram ze sa ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa bdag cag la mdzad de/ bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes
gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams kyi gnas nas ni rkang pa grangs/ lha dang mi rnams su ni rab tu bkod
'go ba las ni ring du mdzad/ thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i 'jig rtogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ma tho ba ye shes kyi rdo rje s bcom nas/ rgyun tu tshugs pa'i gangs
bu mno sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phugs so// de lta bas na bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su
mchi lags kyis/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol// deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ku shi'i grong khyer gang na bar 'dong ngo// btsun ba bka' bzhin 'tshol zhes tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
'das kyi ltar man to// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sdig pa can du ma bzhud par/ kushi'i grong khyer gang na bar rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rims kyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang ku sha'i
grong khyer du byon nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo kushi'i grong khyer 'dir shing sA la zung gi bor du ring bo mi thogs pa kho
nar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// sdom la/ ste'u dang lhas bltas lum bi ni// ser skya dang ni shing 'dab dang// gser thub zhing ba
chos gos dang// khrus dang byed can bcu tshogs yin/// bcom ldan 'das sgra nan/ sgra yan rnams kyi grong rdal khra bo 'dul na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag ngas zag pa zad pa shesashing mthong nas gsungs te/ rgyas par yang dag ldan pa'i lung las phung po'i le'u las sta'u lta bu'i mdo 'byung
ba yin no// ltas bltas su byon nas/ der tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo lhas bltas 'dir shAkya shin tu blo gsal btsas te/
'di nyid du chen por gyur to// lum bi ri gshegs nas/ de na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo lum bi ni'i tshal 'di'i/ ngabatsas nas ring bo ma lon
zhing sus kyang ma blangs par gom pa bdun bor nas ngas phyogs bzhir bltas te/ pa'i srid pa'i skye ba'i mthul ni 'di yin no zhas tshig tu smras so// ser skya'i gnas su byon nas/ des tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo ser skya'i gnas 'dir rgyal po zas gtsang btsas te/ 'di nyid du chen por gyur to// shing bal gyi 'da' ba can du byon nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag chos bzhin ma yin pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor bshad kyis/ legs bar nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// chos ma yin
ba'i 'khor gang zhe na/ 'khor gang zhig 'dun bas 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ 'jigs pas 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni chos ma yin pa'i 'khor zhes
bya'o[; ]chos kyi 'a khor gang zhin/ 'khor gang zhig 'dun bas 'gro ba ma yin/ zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma an/ 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin pa lta/ 'di'i chos kyi 'go ces
bya'o dge slong dag ngas khyed la chos ma yin pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor ngas shadagozhas gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni da yin no// mtshams can gyi gong du byon nas de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo mtshams can gyi grong 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang thub bltams te/ 'di nyid du yongs su mya
ngan las 'das so/// zhing pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bkur stsal ba/ kun dga' bod byang chub sems dpar gyur ba na/
zhing pa'i grong 'di yang zas gtsang las kyi mtha' rnams la bltas nas/ deng 'dzam bu'i grib ma la zag pa med pa dang 'drab bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so// phyogs gzhan zhig
na yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyin bza' chos gos brkyang ba yin no// khrus kyi grong du khyonas/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba// kun dga' bo khrus kyi grong 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis khrus mdzad pas/ de bas
nA'adi'i ming khrus kyi grong khrus kyi grong zhes bya bar grags so// bye ma can du byon nas/ bye ma can du shing 'dzeg gi shing lta bu'i mdo'i lam gyi tshogs rgyas par bsdus so/
sdom la// 'dod pa 'dun dngashas cha dang/ lo ma bdun dang 'char ka dang// mnyan yodagadu bu sa can dang// sing ga'i grong dang grong sar dang// grong khyer dang ni khri'u la 'dzeg/
phyi ma rgya gro d+hag ste// grong khyer de ngag bcu gnyis gsungs// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa 'dun pa na/ 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das/
kyis dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag nga zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed kyi/ nga la bsod snyoms stobs pa dang/ bcolnga pa'i gso sbyong de nyid ma gtogs
'a dge slong su yang ma 'ong zhig/ bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum po de la nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs nas/ bsod snyoms stobs pa'i dge slong dang/ bco lnga pa'i gso sbyong de nyid ma gtogasar ba/
dge slong su yang der mi 'gro'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum po da kho na 'das nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khyed la gal te gzhan mu stegs can dang/ kun tu rgya rnams nye bar lhags nas 'di skad
ces 'dri ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma gnas ba gang zhig gis zla ba gsum po 'di nang du yang dag bzhag par gyur ces 'dri na/ de skad ces dris pa la dbugs rngub ba dang 'byung pas bzhugs so zhes
brjod par bya// de ci'i phyir zhan dge slong dag ni zla ba gsum po 'di la dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba dran pa'i gnas las nang du yang dag bzhag ste/ ngas dran bzhin du

dbugs brngubs na yang dran bzhin du parngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dran bzhin du dbugs phyung na yang dran bzhin du dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
dul ba tu pags so// ring bo dang/ thung ngu dang/ lus thams cad yang dag par myong nas dbugs brngubs na lus kyi thoms cad yabadag bar myong nas dbugs brngubs so snyam du yang ga pa

jilta ba bzhin du rab turashes so// lus thams cad yang dag par skyong nas dbugs phyung na yang lus thams cad yang dag par myong nas dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so//
zla lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs brngubs pa dang/ lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs phyung na yang dbugs sbyong// dbugs brngubaso snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin/
0 du rab tu shes so// zhes bya ba nas/ 'gog par rjes su lta shing dbugs phung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag de la
nga 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gnas pa rags pa mngon par 'dus byas shing khaMsams kyis/ ma la bdag gis gnas pa de nyid las yang dag bza'adus te bor nas/ ches phra ba 'dis lan mang du
gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ ngas gnas pa de nyid las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bor nas/ gnus pa ches phra ba 'dis lan mang du gnas so// de nas lha gsum zhig nga gang na bden
'ongs te phyin nas/ lha gcig ni 'di skadabyes dge sbyong go'u ta ma nongs so zhes zer ro// gnyis pa ni 'di skad ces 'di wer nongs pa ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang nongs par mdzad pa yin no zhes zer ro/
lta gsum pa ni 'di skad ces nongs pa yang ma yin/ nongs par mdzad pa yang ma yin te/ 'on kyang dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gnas pa ni 'di lta bur zhi ba kho na yin no zhes zer ro// dge slong dag
gang yang dag par smra ba na 'phags pa'i gnas ba dang/ lha'i gnas pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang/ mi slob pa'i gnas pa zhes smra bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
gnas pa yin te/ slob pa'i gang zag rnams ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang/ ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang/ mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs ba yan
mi slob pa'i gang zag rnams mthong ba'i tshos bon la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// de yang dag par smra ban dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung
ba'i na pas gnas pa smra b.ru'agyur ro// draci'i phyirezhin/ dge slongadag dbugs brngubs pa dang 'byung ba dran pas gnas pa ni/ 'phags pa'i gnas pa dang zhes byabanas/ mi slob
pa rnams mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par phyir zhugs pa yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das ko sa lanas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pan/ 'dod bamathun bar
byon nas/ 'dod bamathun pan/ 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so// de'i tshe bram ze pad+ma'i snying ba zhes bya ba la/ ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyis dpya rgyu rtswa dang/ shing
dang chur bcas par bram ze'i spyin gadang du byin nas/ shas chen po rgyas ba la longs spyad ngo// bram ze pad+ma'i snying po'i slob bram ze'i khyabu ma sdug ces bya ba mang du thos pa/ tshig gsal

ba ba thags thogs mang par smra ba zhig yod de/ bram ze pad+ma'i snying po'i bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyal bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig 'don du 'jug go/ bram ze bad+ma'i snying bos ngag sbyang ga'u ma/
sh+tsa shAkya'i sras/ shAkya'irigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngu sgrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa zhes khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de/ bla namongapa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chubu mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shes ldan ko'u dam de'i dge bdang/ grags pa dang/ sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di phyogs dang
phyogs mtshams su grags te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ko'u dum ningabazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigu ba dung zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blanamed pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas/ bdud dang
bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang khram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas/ lha dngami'i skye dgu dang bcas pa 'dril mthong ba'i chos kho na la rang nyid kyis mngon pa shes pas mngon
sum du byus dubasgrubs nas nga'izag pa zad do tshangs par spyod pa la brtan to/ bya ba byas so// 'dilas srid pa gzhan ga shes so zhes go bar byed pad gsang tshig las kyang
'byung// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa kanyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po 'gro baniganyis la sa gzhan du'i 'gyur te/ gal te khyilan kanasazhani 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ deb rin po che sna bdunani 'di lta bu dag min te/ 'di lta ste/
'khor le ni po ched/ glang pa ni bo che dang/ rta rin po che dang nor bu rin po ching/ bud med yin po tshodang/ khyim 'angag rin po chadang/ bdun
pa ni blon po rin po che 'de yin no// de la yang bud par ba/ rtul phod pa/ an la mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol kyi snga rab tu 'joms pa stong sang tshang ba 'byung bar
'gyur zhing/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'is na po ma lus la gnod par snga bamang cing 'tsho ba med pa 'di de chad pa med cing mtshon kyis bda' ba med la chos dang mthun zhing sAms khas lekas par
thab ste gnas par 'gyurar// kal de sku dang kha spu brakasazhus/ gas ngur smaka bkos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim mdabar rab tu byungan/ de bzhin gshegs pa klu
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sku rnam par grags bar bskyur ba de ko sa laraljongs rgyu zhing shashikas ban/ 'dod pa mthun par byenanas/ 'dod pamathun pa na/
'dabamathun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so zhes thos so// shesanas kyang bram ze'i khye'um sdug la smras pa/ ma sdus shes sam/ kho bos dge sbyong kro'u rtam shAkya'i sras shAkya'i riges las sku dang ba

k+Sha spu bregasanas/ kos ngur smrig bkosaM taM/ dad po mdzad g pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas zhes bya ba nas tshangs par spyod pa rab tu smin to/ zhes bya ba'i bar ng sta/ kho bos nga

kasang tshig dag las brten pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po 'gro bzhi gnyis las gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ gal te khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
bo mtha' bzhir rnam bar rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal bo zhes bya banas/ 'jig rten du sku rnam par grags par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ dko sa la nas ljongs rgya
kashegs pa na/ 'dod pa mthun par khyonanas/ 'dod pa mthun na 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrodan bzhugs so zhes thos kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u tshur/ khyod shes ldan ko'u dmagang na ba der
song zhig dang/ phyin nas jikashes ldan ko'u ta ma de'i dge ba dang/ grags pa dang/ sgra dang/ tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen ba phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su ji'akrugs pa de kho na bzhin yin
nam ma yin pa dang/ de'i mtshan rnams grags pa yang dag pa yin nam ma yin rang nyid kyis rab tu shes par 'gyur thang ]bram ze'i khye'um sdug gis bram ze pad+ma'i snying bo ltaazhan nas/ shas/
che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs mang bo dang lhan cig tu shas che banas byunas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ phyogs gciko tu 'dug go/ zhes shas chab 'i bram ze rgan rabs rna
rabs rnams bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cike mngon du yang dag par dka' bar 'gyur ba dang/ yang ga pa a u0f74 bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcike tu 'dug go/
@#// thugs kacig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad
yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag pa gzangs bstod pa mdzad yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das shas chab 'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams la
chos dang ldan pa'i gdam gsung ban/ bram ze'i khyim sdug mchilalham dang bcas pas 'chaka cing/ blo bur du gtam dag gleng bar byed la/ katam mthar phyin par ma sdong par ma gus pas bsdams
shing / bzlog par sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// bram ze khye'akhyod bram ze kasum ga pa rnams dang lhan cika glo bur gyi
kadam de lta sna 'am/ kye dag sbyong ko'u dam gdam jilta bu zhika/ dziltar de bzhin gshekaMs pa shas che ba'i bram ze charabs char ra bas rnams la chos dad ldan pa gdam kasung ba/ khyod
mchil lham dang bcas pas 'chag cing/ glo bur dukatam dka gleng bar byed l/ katam mthar phyin par mi sdod par/ ma kus pas bsams shing/ slar bzlog par sams pa lta bu 'o/
kyi ko'u ta ma bram ze 'gro ba rnams ni bram ze 'gro ba rnams dang/ 'greng ba rnams ni 'greng ba rnams dang/ 'dun pa rnams ni 'dug pa rnams dang 2la ba rnams ni nyal ba rnams dang
0 phan tshun legs bar sna'i/ dge sbyong mgo rekun ka bo'i rtsa lag bo ring gang ngaka yine pa de dag dang ni kri po cig du'ang lta bu'i glo bur gyi gtam gleng du rung ste/ dper na da lta shes ldan/
go'u tam dang gleng ba bzhin no// bram ze'i khye'u khyod don du kanyer ba la zhugs nas 'dir 'ongos na/ de lta bu'i bsnyen bkur ma byas pa las kazhan la med par/ bram ze'i khye'u ma/
sdug ni bla ma'i tshogs dag la bsAn bkur ma byas pa zhig yin pa lta dunas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma5 za'i khye'u tsha sdug la bkur ste mad pa'i tshig gis spos ba na/ khros/
'khrugs/ nang zhing yi ma rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kha bya bar 'dod/ spobs bar 'dod/ brtsad par 'dod de/ 'atsam gyis dag sbyang ko'u tun la kha bya ba dang/
spobs ba dang/ brtsad po dang/ dran par byas bar 'gyur ro snyam du ri gnas / bcom ldan 'das 'a 'di sku sras kasol to kyi go'u tam shAkya 'di dgazhid byungakhon yin te/
da byung gi rigs yin pas bram ze rnams la zlam dang/ ri mo dang/ mchod pa mi byed de// rtsibram ze'i khye'u khyod la shAkya rnams kyis gnod pa cung zad byas sam/ kyi ko'u tam dus gcig
cigan bganyid mkhan po'i bya ba zhig la grong khyer ser skya'i kazhir rkang pas phyin pa na// ngan bdag la shakya rnams dang/ shAkya mo rnams khang bzangs kyi stang du song nas mdzub kegyis ston pa
byed de/ a ma'o bram ze pad+ma'i snying po'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u ma sprul yin no// bram ze pad+ma'i snying po'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug yin no/zhes/ ngangag 'dug
lamadzubaka' khonas ston par byed kyi/ bdag la bkur sti dang/ thum dang/rimo dang/ mchod pa mi byed do// bram ze'i khye'u 'o zhig byi'u khug sta mang rang gi tshangan 'dug na/ ji nga 'dod
par skad 'byin na shAkya rnams lta smos kyang cingagos/ bram bre'i khye'u 'di lta ste/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi 'di ni shAkya rnams kyi rang gi yin no// kya go'u dam rigs ni 'di bzhu sta/ bram
ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang rje'u'i rigs dang/ dmangs rigs so/ dkya go'u tam 'gas bzhi bo 'di dag na bram ze rnams la bkuraste byed/ bla mar byed ri mor byed/ mchod par byed do// 'on
kyang shAkya 'di dag ni da byung kho na yin te/ dbyung gi rigs yin pas bram ze rnams la bkur sti dang bla ma mi byed/ ri mor mi byad/ mchod par mi byed do// de nas bam ldan 'das 'di snyam du
dgongs te/ kye ma bram ze'i khye'u cha sdug 'dishAkya rnams la a ma'o shAkya rnams ni da byung yin/ ama'oshAkya rnams ni da byung gi rogs yin pas shes da byung yin par da nang kha zerabs/
mal ngas 'di'i sngon 'ges brgyud pa btsal snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'am sduka gi sngon gyi bkas brgyud pa btsal ba dang/ bram ze'i khye'u mi sdug nishAkya rnams kyi bran mo'i bar
gyural/ shAkya rnams nipa'i dzubo bur gyur par 'brigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze'i khye'u khyod legs son/
ko'utugamig mi 'dzums kyi bu'o// bram ze'i khye'u 'di nas ngas khyod kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ba btsalan/ khyo nishAkya rnams kyi branaso'ibur gyur pa mthong ngo// de nas shas chab 'i
bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kya go'i ma khyod bram ze'i khye'am sdug la bran mo'i bu zhes tshig tum kasung zhig/ de ci'i
slad du nan/ bram ze'i khye'am sdugan mang du thos pa/ tshig gsal ba/ thags thogs med par ba ste// bram ze'i khye'um sdug gis gzhi 'di la shes ldan go'u tun la chos dang mthun pa'i
lanagadab bar rngo thog go/ bram zad g gal tekhyod cag 'di snyam dubram bu'i khye'um sdug la chos dang mthun pas lan ldon nus so snyam dus mas na khyodatsaka cang ma bar/ bram ze'i khye'u
ma sdugagan 'dril ba la chos dang mthun pa'i lana'adebs chug cig/ bram ze dag khyodacan gal te 'di snyam du bram ze'u ma sngag gzhi 'di'ang la chos dang mthun pas lan 'debs mi nus so snyam
du soms na/ bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug cang ma smra bar khyed kyis gzhi 'di la nga la chos dngamathun pas lan thob cika kyi go'u dam bram ze'i khye'u ma phraka nyid mang du thos ba/ tshi
gsal ba/ thakas grogs med par sla ba lags te/ bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug gis gzhi 'di la shes ldan go'utam la chos dang mthun pas lan gdab pa ra
ngo thog gi gzhan kyis nim lags so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram phra'i khye'am sdug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze'i khye'u sngon byung ba rgyal po bu
ram shing skyes zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po bu ram shing skyes la bu bzhi yod pa/ skar ma'i gdong dang/ lug rna dang/ glang pa tsho'i thal mong dang rkangargyan ldan no// rgyal po bu ram
pa/ shing skyas nges nyes pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir skyugs nas/ de dag rang rang gi sringamo khrid de yul 'khor gzhan dang/ yul gzhan du dung nas/ rim gyis gangs can gyi phugs chu bo skal ldan shing
rta'i gram na zhes bya ba nas/ khye'u dang bu mo dag btsas so// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de nas rgyal po bu ram shing skyes kyis blon bo rnams la smras pa/ kye grong pa ngag gzhon nu rnams de
ltar byed phod dam/ lha rngo thogs lags so// de nas rgyal po bu bam shingeskyes rostod bstong nas/ lag pa kayas pa brkyang lta ched du brjod pas rtsod du brjod pa/ kyema'a gzhon nu rnams kyis
yod de zhes sems can dbang chab r grags pas gzhan na rnams kyis phong de nas tshig tu smras pas/ shAkyang shAkya zhes bya bar grags so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis shAkya rnams de las skyes pas
mgo 'dzugs pa de yin pa dang/ de dag gi shes brgyud de yin badrazhung thad thos sam/ go'u ta ma bdag gis shAkya rnams de las skyes pas mgo 'dzugs pa de yin pa dang dadaka gi rigs
brgyud de yin par thos so// bram ze'i khye'u rgyal bo bu ram shing skyes kyi branam sngo bodam zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sduka ba/ mdzes pa zhig yod pa dang/ drang srong kangol
pa'i rigs shig dang lhan cig 'dus nas/ de gnyis 'dus pa las khye'u zhig btsas so// gzhon nubatsasam thag tu tshig tu um ra zhoge bag dril phyis dang bkru ba kyis la/ mi gtsang ba las
thar bar gyis shika ces smras so// de'i tshon sha za rnams kyi ming ma 'dzums kyi bu zhes bya la kazhanan btsas ma thag du tshig tu yum bangag zhig dril phyis dang bkru ba gyis la/ mi gtsang ba
las thar bar gyis shig ces smras ba dang/ kyama'o moka mi 'dzums kyi bu zhig skyes so zhes/ mika mi 'dzums kyi bu mig mi 'dzugs kyi bu zhes bya bar grags so// bram ze khye'u khyod kyis
mig mi 'dzums kyi bu rnams de las skyes pas mgo 'dzugs pa de yin pa dang/ de dag gi rigs brgyudang yin par cung zad thos sam/ de skaces bka' stsal ba dang/ bram ze'i khye'u mig
ma 'dzums cangami sna'o// lanaganyis lan gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das kyi/ bram ze'i khye'u ma sngoka la 'ang skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze'i bu ru khyod kyis mig mi 'dzums kyi
bya dbu rnams dulas skyes pas 'go 'dzugs pa de yin pa dang/ dedag gi rigs brgyud de yin par dung zang thos sam/ lan gnyis lanagasum du yang bram ze'i khye'u
[gt; ]ma sngaka Ami snya'o// nas gnod sbyin gnado rdzogs rdo rje'abab/ rab du'abarab/ kun tu rab tu 'barab/ me lce gcig tu gyur cing 'bar bo/ bram ze'i khye'am sdug gi mgo bo'i
stangan 'dzin cing/ gal te bram bo'i khyo'am sdug la bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum gyi bar dum ba rmas pa las/ rna la gzan ci lanam gsol bar gyuran/ rdo rje 'khaMr ba/ rab
du 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba/ ma lcagacig tugyur cing 'bar ba 'dis spyi bo tshal pa bdun du dugs pas bya'o snyam pa dang/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rdzong bcom ldan 'das kyis
gzigs nas (sangs rgyas kyi mthus bram ze mo sdug gis kyang mthong ngo// de nas bram ze ma sdug stangs/ skrag bra nga/ spu zing zhes byang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
cas kasol to// kyeko'u ta mamig mi 'dzums kyi bu rnams las skyes pas 'go 'dzugs be de lags pa dang dadag gi rigs brgyud degs par bdag gis thos lags so//
nas shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'di snyam du sems te/btsun ba ko'u rnams 'di skad ces bram ze'i khye'am sdug nishAkya rnams kyi bran ma'i bu nyid yin la/ shAkya rnams zhi
'i jo bo'i bu yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin ba bden na/ bdag cag shes ldan go'u ta mas gsungs ba la yid mches bur zad do snyam mo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kying/ shas che ba'i bram ze rgan
rabs rgan rabs rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed sug bram ze'i khye'am sdug la bran mo'i bu zhus kyang tshig tum sna zhige de'iphyir zhe na/ 'dida'i tshodrang srongardzu 'phrul cha
ba mthu chab zheka tu gyur pa las/ rgyal po bu ram shing skyes kyis nyes pa 'ga' kho na'i phyir bram ze'i chad pas bcad do// bram ze'i chad pas bcas pa dang/ phyis rgyal bo 'u a shing skyes
'dzigs/ smragra byed d+ha spu zing byed nas/ lag pa kayon pas bu mo chen mo rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzung/ lag pa ka yas pas gser kyi bya ma bum thogs te/ drang song de la chungamar
byin na/ drang srong gis de ma blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis/ bram ze'i khye'um sdug la bran mo'i bu yin no zhes bka' stsal pas zhum zhum por gyur nas/ thug pa bcum mgo smad de/
spobs pa med cing gtad khongs su chud nas cang mi smra bar gyur do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze'i khye'u ma sduka 'di bran me'i bu yin no zhes ngas tshig smras pas
zhum zhum po ra rags phrag pa bzum/ mgo smad de/ spobs pa med cing gtong khongs su chung nas che smra bar gyur gyis/ ma la ngos 'di la phyi nas kadam 'dri bar bya'o snyam du dgongs
nas bram ze'i khye'um sdug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze'i khye'u padan rgyal rigs gzhon nu dang bram ze'i bu mor lhan cig 'dus par gyur te/ de//
gnyis lhan cig 'dus pa las khye'uzhig btsas na/ des bram ze rnams las nanam/ mu'am/ gsang tsheg gam/ gangon pa thob bam/ kyi go'u da ma thob lags so// de rgyal rigs rnams
kyis rgyal rigs kyi dbang bskur pas dbang bskuram/ kyi go'u tam dbang bskur lags te/ deci'i slad du zhen/ spyan gyi bu lags pas/ rgyal rigs rnams kyis tsha bo dbang bskur lags so//
bram ze'i khye'u dpar na bram ze'i gzhon na ngang rgyal rigs kyi bu mor lha srin 'dus par gyur la/ dganyis lhan cig 'dus pa las khye'u zhig btsas na/ des bram ze rnams las stan nam/ chu 'am/
gsang tshig gam/ gdon pa thob bam/ kyagongu dam thob lags so// de la rgyal shes kyis drab ng bskur bas dbang bskuraram/ kya ga'u tam dbang bskur lags te/ de ci'i slad du
zhen/ tshabo lags pa'i slad du/ rgyal rigs rnams kyis tsha bo dbang bskur lags so/ bram ze'i khye'u puran rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal dregs dag gis nyes pa 'ga' kho na'i phyi'i spugs par
gyur na da des bram ze rnams las stan nam/ chu 'am/ gsang tshig kaNaM/ gdon ba thog bam/ kyi go'u ta ma thobalags so// de la rgyal rigs kyi dbang bskur bas dbacoskur
0 ]ma/ kyi go'u tam dbang bskur te/ deci'i slad du zhen/ thu nu bo lags ba'i slad du/ rgyal rigs rnams kyis phu nu bo dbang bskur lags so// bram ze'i khye'u par n bram ze'i gzhon nu bram ze/
rnams kyis nyes ba 'aka'i kho mo'i sbyor spyanas par gyuran/ des bram ze rnams las smananam ( chu'am 1 gsang tshika gam/ kAngon pa thob bam/ kye ko'utam mi thob lags so// de rgyal rigs rnams
kyis rgyal rigs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur na// kyi go'u tas dbang bskur te/ deci'i sladang zhen/ bram ze kungol pa lugs pa'i slad du/ rgyal rigs rnams bram ze kadol pa la dbang mi bskur
lags so// bram ze khye'u de ltar na rus dang/ gnad kyi skyolarigs kyi rigs mchog yin kyi/ bram ze ma yin no// bram ze'i khye'u tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos tshigs su bcad de
smras pa/ rus dang 'brel ba gang yin pa'i// rgyal rishes rkang gsazhungan btsun// lha dang mi rnams nangan yang// rige dang zhabs su ldan pa btsun// bram ze'i khye'u tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag
po nges tshigs su bcad de 'di skadatses/ rus dang 'brel pa gang yin pa'i// rgyal rigs rkang gnyis nang na btsun/ lha dang mi rnams nangan yang// ga dang zhabs su ldan pa btsun/
zhes smras pa ni legs par smras pa yin gyi/ zhes basmras pa ma yin/ legs par bsnyad pa yin gyi/ zhes par bshad pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ bram ze'i khye'u nga ya nga 'di skad ces/ rus dang
'brel ba gang yin pa// rgyalags rkong gnyis nangan bdun/ lha dang mi rnams nang na yang// rig dang zhabs su ldan pa btsun// zhes gsungang// bram ze'i khye'u
ji snyam du sems/ gangan bka ma len pa dang/ bkum gtong ba yod pa denas/ bram ze rnams kyis snyan nam/ chu 'am/ gsangaNIka kam/ kangon pa thob bam/ kyi go'u ta ma gang na bag ma len pa
dang/ bka ma gtong ba mas pa de nas/ bram ze rnams kyis stan nam/ chab bam/ gsang tshig gam/ gdon pa thob lags so// bram ze'i khye'u gangan bag ma len pa dang/ bag ma gtong
gyur yod pa de na/ rigs kyis bsnyems pa yang yod/ rus kyis bsams pa yang yong/ bram ze'i bu'i bsams pa yang yod de// bram ze'i khye'u sems can rigs kyibasAms pas rnam par
bcings pa dang/ dus kyi bsdoms pas rnam par bcings pa dang/ bram ze'i bu'i bsnyams pas rnam par bcings pa ji snyang ba de dag rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bla na mar 'di nyinge mngon sum dum
byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i skal pa mod kyi/ bram ze'i bu rigs kyi bsnyams pa spangs/ rus kyi bsnyams pa sbrangs/ bram za'i bu'i bsams pa spangs na de ltar n 'ge pa dang zhabs
su ldan pa bla named pa 'de mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// shes ldan ko'u tam la bdag dang sngon yang ma byung phyis kyang mi 'byung/ da lta na yang a mchis pa de lta bur

'a 7 dad lags kyis/ shes ldan ko'u ta mas bdun la ji ltar rig pa dang zhabs 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos bshad du gsal/ bram bre'i khye'u de'i phyir lekas par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhika dang
bshad do/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la sngon pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzokas pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa
skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten nga byung ste/ des chos bshad pa ni/ thog mar dag ba/ bar du dge ba 3
tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa// yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byungab/ tshangs pa spyod pa rab tu ston de/ chos nga khyim bdag
kam khyim bdag gi bus mnyan nas// des chos de khros nas dad pa so soraredango// dad ba so so rud pa dang ldan pas 'di la so sor yang dag par slob par byed de/ khyim kyi gnas ni nyam nga ba
rdulangag gi gnas yin no// rab tu byung ba ni sla gab med pa yin na khyim pa khyim na gnas pa rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar tshangs par spyod pa gcig tu sa gyis dag pa/yongs su
rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa// rnam par byang ba'ang khyad par dkas/ ma la bdag gis skra dang kha spu bregs la/ gos ngur smig bkos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
mad par ba du'abyung ngo snyam nas/ dedabazhin rab tu byung nas/ tshul khrims la gnas pa yin te/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin/ spyod pa dang spyod
yul phun sum tshogs pas kha na mtho ba phra mo tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba yin/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs de slob pa yin no// srog gcod pa spangs nas srog kacod pa las
slaleg pa yin te/ chad pa spangs pa yin/ mtshon cha spangs pa yin/ 'dzem pa dang snying rjeraldan pa yin/ sems can srog makas su gyur ba thams cad la/ chung ngu na srog ga/
grog sbur yan chad srog gcod pa las slar log pa yin no// dem byin par len pa spungs nas/ ma byin par len pa las slar log pa lan te phyi pa len pa yin/ byin pa la dka'
ba ba yin/ sbyin pa la lhag par kadong ba la dka' ba yin te/ rkun ma ma yin/ 'dod chen can ma yin/ gtsang ma yin/ bdag nyid bsrungs pas ma byin par len pa las slar leka pa yin
no nga yi tshangs par spyod pa spangs nas/ mi tshangs par spyod pa las slar log pa min te/ tshangs par spyod pa yin/ spyod pa ngan pa spangs pas dag pa yin/ gtsang ba yin/ dri ba
med pa yin/ 'khriko pa dong bral ba yin/smad rigs kyi chos dang bral ba yin/ mi tshangs par spyod pa las slar leg po yin no// de rdzun du smra ba spangs nas/ brdzun du smra ba las
slar pheka pa yin te/ bden pa sa ba yin/ bden pa la dga' ba yin/ mnyan par 'os pa yin/ yid ches pa yin/ brtan pa yin/ 'jig rten la mi slu ba yin/ brdzunang skya ba las
slar log pa yin no// de phra ma spongs nas/ phra ma las slar log pa yin te/ de tshu gi ngag 7samanyan du/ de dag dbye ba'i phyir pha gi dag la smra ba ma yin/ pha ki ngag las mnyan te/ dngag
dbye ba'i phyir tshud la skya ba ma yin/ bya ba rnams sdums byed pa yin/ mthun pa rnams la gzengs bstod ba yin/ mthun pa la dgra'ab yin mthun pa la mgu ba yin/mthun par
byed pa'i tshig smra ba yin/ phra ma las phyir ldog pa yin no/ de tsheg rtsub po spangs nas tshig rtsub po las phyer phog pa yin te/ de gang la yang tshig gdug pa dang/ rtsub pa dang/

rol la mi snyan pa dang/ pha rol snga 'akong bar byed pa dang/ skye bo mang po'i yid la ma 'thung pa dang/ skye bo mang po'i stong du ma sngaka pa dang/ skye bo mang po mi dka' bdang/ skye bo mang po'i
yid du mi 'ong ba dang/ mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa dang/ mnyam par 'jog bar 'gyur ba ma yin ba de lta bu'i tshig spangs pa yin// mi tshugs pa dang/ rnarasAn ba dang/ snyingamin par khyadapa
dang [0f10 ]dga' bar byed pa dang/ grong khyer ba dang/ snyan cing 'jebs pa dang/ rnam par kasal ba dang/ rnam par rig par byed pa dang/ mnyan par 'os pa dang/ mi rten pa dang 'gal pam yin
@# ba dang/ thun pa madra pa dang/ skye bo mang po la sdug pa dang/ skye bomang po la mgu ba dang/ skye bo mang po la dga' ba dang/ skye bo mang bo'i yod du 'ong ba dang/ mnyam par/
gzhan pa dang/ mnyam badra'ajog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig smra ba dang/ de tshe rtsub po byas nas/ tshig rtsub polas slar leka ba yin no// 'tshige bkyal pa spangs nas// tshige bkyal
pa las slar log pa yin te/ de'i dus su zla ba yin/ yang dag par smra ba yin/ de kho na nyid smra ba yin/ don smra ba yin/ chos smra ba yin/ rtogs pa smra ba yin/ khong duchud par
byed pa'i tshig smra ba yin te/ sa su dang/ 'dran mam yin pa dang/ gleng gazhi dang bcas pa dang/ na rtags dang bcas pa dang/ chos dang don dang ldan pa yin te/ tshig bkyal pa
spangs nas/ tshig bkyal pa la sa slar log pa yin no// denAtshong las slar leka pa yin te/ de gzhal blugs la g.yo byed pa dang/ srang la g.yo byed pa dang/ tshadra la g.yo byed pa
spangs nas/ gzhal blugs la g.yo byed pa dang/ srang la g.yo byed pa dang/ tshang la g.yo byad pa las slar log pa yin no// dgasuka len pa dang/ 'dred pa dang/ bsdigs nas rang gi
byed pa spangs nas/ kaMsuka len pa dang 'dridapa dang/ bsdigs nas rang gir byed pa las slar log pa yin no// de kasad pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ gcad pa dang/ dbug pa dang/ brdaka
pa'i bsam pa spangs nas/ kasodapa dang/ 'ching ba dang/ kacod pa dang/ 'bakas pa dang/ rdaka bams su myong bar byed pa las slar leg pa yin no// de 'od dang bud medacan dung lhan/
cig tu nyal ba sngangs nas/ 'od dang bud med can dung lhan cig du nyal ba las slar lag pa yin no// de nang gi gzhi dang/ khyim gyi gzhi dang tshong khang gi gzhi len pa spangs nas/ nga zhing
gi gzhi dang/ khyim gyi gzhi dang/ tshong khang gi gan lenab las slar log pa yin no// de glang bo chadang rtadang/ ba lang dang/ lug dang/ bya gag dang/ phaka len pa spangs nas/ de gleng
bo chodang/ rtadang/ ba lang dang lug dang/ bya gag dang/ phag len pa las slar log pa yin no// dbran po dang/ bran mo dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba len pa sbyang sanas/ dran po dang/ bran mo
dang/ shas 'tsho ba len pa las slar log pa yin no// de chung ma dang/ bu pho dang/ bu mo len pa spangs nas/ chung ma drang/ bu pho dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dung/ bu ma len pa las slar lo//
pa yin no// dregaser dang dngul len pa spangs nas/ kasar dang dngul len pa las slar log pa yin no// nga 'bram nyams pa len pa sangs nas/ 'bru ma nyams pa yin pa las slar len pa yin no//
de thagacig pa yin te/ nub mo'i spangs shing dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs pa yin/ dus su rgyu zhing sus su spyod pas sbyor ba la brtson pa yin/ de lus kyi bgo ba ran pas chog shes shing tshod zin
/pa yin/ bsod goms lto 'grangs kyis chog shes shing da zin pa yin no// de lus kyi bkob ldan pas chog shes shing tshod zin pa yin zhing/ bsod snyoms lto 'gras/
kyis chog shes shing tsho'in pa yin pas/ gang dang gang du'agro ban lhung bzeng dang bcas/ chos gos dang bcas par 'gro'o// dpon 'dab chags bya shang dang gang du lding ba dera'adzab ma dang
bcas/ gshog pa dang bcas te lding ba de bzhin du/ de lus kyi bkokho na pas chog shes shing tshod zin pa yin/ bsodusnyoms lto 'grangs kyis chog shesapashing tshod zin ba yin no/ dngolus
kyi bgo ba na pas chog shes shing tshod zin pa yin zhing bsod snyoms lde'agrangs kyis chog shes shing tshod zin pa yin te/ ma sduka 'di ltar yang dage sbyong dang/ bram ze kha cig dad pas
byin pa dag spang nas/ sa bonagyi tshogs dang/ 'byung bo'i tshogs sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson bas gnas pa 'dilta ste rtsa ba'i sa bon dang/ sdong bu'i sa bon dang thor don/
sa bon dang/ 'gas pa'i sa bon dang/ lnga panas bon nyid de/ drag sbyong dang brom tho rnams kyi sa bon kyi tshogs dang/ 'byung po' tshogs sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa da lta bu
las slar len pa yin no// ma sdug 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha tsako dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas/ gsog 'jog sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pos gnas pa 'di lta ste
zas kyi gsog 'jog dang/ skom kyi gsog 'jog dang/ dri'i gsog 'jog dang/ ro'i kasog 'jog dang/ la ma'i gsog 'dzaka dang/ ma dag gi gsoka 'dzaka dang/ 'bras bu'i gsag
'jog dang/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi gso ka 'jog sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no////'dul ba kazhi//
bal bo sum cu kartseka kha rtag sngaka 'di ltar yang dag sbyong dang bram ze ba tsaka dad pa sa byin pa dka spyanas/ kanas mal mthon po dang/ gnas mchen po sna tshogs rtsom ba la sbyor
bar ba rtson pas gnas par byed pa 'di lta ste/ stan dang/ khridang/ khri snam bu can dang cas kyi snam bu dang/ be'u rus kyis g.yogs pa dang ras yug chen kyis g.yogs pa dang/
bas khra bos g.yogs pa dang/ ba le lariras kyis kayogs pa dang/ glangapo tsho'i 'thab stan dang/ rta'i 'thab stan dang/ ngos gcig bal las byas pa dang/ ngos gnyis ka bal
las byas pa dang/ stodabal las byas pa dang/ rkyab bal las byas pa dang/ bal las byas pa dang/ ka ling ka'i gos kyi steng g.yogs pa dang/ g.yogs dang bcas pa'i
kos dang/ phyogs gnyis su sngas dmar po las byas pa ste/ ke sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi gnas mal mthon po dang/ gnas mal chen po rtsom pa la sbyong ba ngolta bu las slar log pa yin
no 3ma sduka 'deltar yang dag sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dang pas byin pa dag kyang nas chang dang gzhan pa sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa
'dil pa/ mnye ba bkru ba dang/ drilaphyi dong/ ma rtog gi 'phrongab dang/ dri dang/ byaka pa dang/ kha dog 'chang ba dang/ sen mo'i drog sbyar dang/ khar phu ma 'debs pa dang
gdongagi phyi doradang/ che long la lta ba dang/ lag ngar brgyan pa dang/ gtsug tor 'ching ba dang/ kajushas kyi rtsa ba sbu gu can dang/ ral gri dang/ dra yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang/
mchil lham khra bo dang/ gas sarapa dang rdzas sar pa kha tshan 'chang ba'i rang bzhin can dag ste/ dge sbyong dang b+bom ba rnams kyi kazhag pa dang che ba sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar
brtsonapa ngo lta bu las slar leg pa yin no/ ]ma sngaka 'di ltar langadage sbyong dang bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag sbyang nas ltadamo sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa
'di lta ste// glang bo ches 'byed pa dang/ shing rtas 'gyed pa dang/ dbung bu chungashis 'gyed pa dang/ dbyug pas 'byed pa dang/ khu tshur gyis 'byed pa dang/ gru chos
'byed pa dang/ khyu mchog gis 'gyedapa dang/ ma nyes 'byed pa dang/ ra 'gyeng ba dang/ lug 'gyed pa dang/ bya kag 'thab pa dang/ mchil ba'athab pa dang/ 'ja'athob
ba dang/ bya gag dang/ mchil ba dang/ 'ur bar 'thab pa dang/ bud med 'thub pa dang/ skyes pa'i thab pa dang/ gzhon nu 'thabab dang/ gzhonanum 'thab pa dang/ shing 'adzeg
dang bro gar gyi tshogs dang/ phrag pa nas 'gong ba dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang/ dpung gi tshogs dang/ kayul bshams pa dang/ dmag tshogs lta ba dang/ 'dus pa chen
bol lta bar 'dod pa ste/ dge sbyong dang bram bre rnams kyis ltad mo sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bas brtson ba delta bu las slar log pa yin no// ma sngan 'di ltar yang dag sbyong dang bram
ze kha ko dad pas byin pa dag spyad nos/ nyan pa sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/ glang po tsho'i skad dang/ rta'i skang dang/ shing rta'i sgra dang/ dupung
bu chung gi sgra dang/ rnga pa Ta ha sgra dang/ rnga bo tsho'i rgyu dang/ remo tshogs pa'i sku dang/ gar mkhan gyi glu sgra dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang 'khar gsal gyi sgra dang/ sa gol
kyi sgra dang/ thal mo'i sgra dang/ bum pa sgra dang/ rang bzo'i dang/ snyan dngags kyi sgra dang yig 'bru sna tshogs dang tshig dang yi ka sna tshogs dang/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phan

dang ldan pa dang/ grags pa'i ga tamanyan 'dod ba ngag ste/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi sgra sna tshogs nyan pa rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no// ma sdug 'di ltar yang
grubya/ drag sbyong dang bram ze 'tshe dad pas phyin pa dag spyad nas/ uka shud dang/ khrus dang/ cholartsom la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta sta/ mig brgyad pa dang/
mi khacupa dang/ na ya'i mig dang/ phyogs phyogs nas 'byed po dang/ bum pas rtse ba dang/ kale dang/ katshale dang/ phag gis rtse ba dang ug shud dang/ gul tshab dang 1thur
ma dang lag rgyan nam/ kha cig sgugs lta bar 'gyed pa ste/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi uka shud dang/ khros dang/ chol rtsom pa la sbyor ba de lta bu las sla raleg pa yin no//
ma sduka 'di ltar yang dge sbyong dang bram ze kha ga dadapas byin pa dag spyad so/ gtam sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'dilta ste/ rgyal po'agatam dang/ dmag gi gtamadang/
bras kyi gtam dung/ skom gyi gtam dang/ gos kyi gtam dang/ tshong dus kyi gtam dang/ smad tshong gi gtamo dang/ lam ngan pa rjod pa'i gtam dang/ rgya mtsho chen po rjod pa'i gtum dang/

ljongs dang sna chen bol gtogs brjod pa'i gtam ste dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi gtam sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no// ma sdug 'di ltar yang dage sbyong dang bram
khacag dadapas byin pa dag spyad nas/ rtsod pa sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson bas kanapa ba 'di lta ste/ ji ltar kho bos chos 'dul ba 'dikun shes pa de bzhin du/ khyod kyis kyang

00/ chos 'dul ba 'di kun shes modakyi/ khyod kyis ni shes pa dang ldan pa dang 'brel bar ma yin te/ sngar smra bar bya ba niphyis smras/ phyis smra bar bya ba ni sngar sbas la/ khyod kyis ha cang myur ba smras
pas mi gsal le// rtsod pa mjug brtul kyis/ khyod kyis brtsad pa'i don dugs pa'i tshig de thongazhika/ bcadu par shes sam/ gal tilan thebs pa lta na dris dang/ smos

shig da nga zhes bya ba dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi rtsod pa sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no// ma sdug 'di ltar yang dag sbyong dang bram ze khag dadapas byin pa ka gyur nas/
bonya'agro ba dang/ gtong ba len pa'i tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste dadag rgyal pori'am ]blon po chen po rnams kyi'am/ bram ze rnams kyi'am/ khyim bdag rnams kyi'am/
krong rnams kyi khram/ yul mi rnams kyi 'am/ tshong dbona rnams kyi'am/ ded dpon rnams kyi bo tshu gnas khrid dbakaresna 'dren par byed pa dang/ pha ginas thon khrid datshuger
sna 'dren par byed ba ste/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi pho nyar 'gro ba dang/ katongab lon pa'i tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no// ma sduga'adi ltar yang dge sbyong dang bram ze kha
cig dad pas byin pa dka spyanas/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ khagasaka dang/ gzhogs slong dang/ thob kyis 'jal ba dang/ red ba sa redapa sgrub par byed de/ dge sbyong bram
the rnams kyi rnyog 'chos pa dang/ kha gsag dang/ gzhogs slong dang/ thob kyis 'jal ba dang/ rtsed bas redapa sgrub par byed pa de lta bu las slar log
pa min// 'di ltar yang m sdug dag sbyong dang bram ze kha cig dud pas byin pa dag spyad nas/ mon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ kanam kum pa dang/ rna mtshon
dang/ rnalam gyi mtshan ma dang/ mas tshisho pa dang/ rgyus deka pa dang/ byi bas zos pa dang/ 'bebs pa dang/ skadazhan pa dud/ 'byung po thams cad kyi sang dang/
lus kyi dpyad dang/ khyim sa'i da byed dang/na tsho'i dpyad dang/ bya'i dbyad dang/ mthe bo'i dpyad dang/ kha cige skaa'i skyor ba byed d/ dgo byungadang bram ze rnams kyi yon
bo'i dpung kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no// 'a stsaka'adiltar yang dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dogo spyad nas/ yonapo'i dpyad kyi ldog pa'i 'tsho bas
byed pa 'dilta ste/ ud tsam rnams kyi sbyor ba dang/ rgyu skar shar ba dang/ robartag pa dang/ zhi ba'i las dang/ rgyas pa las dang/ na po ri las dang/ bsang gtor gyi las dang/
yiko 'brudang/ rtsis dang/ grangs dang/ lag rtsis nga/ me long gi dpyad la sbyorab r byed de/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi yon po'i dpyad kyi'atshob dalta bu las slar log pa
yin no// ma sngaka'adi ltar yang dag sbyong dang bram ze khacig dad pas byin pa dag sdudanas/ yon po'i dpyad kyi len pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ gso ba'i dpyadadang/
rtsa ba'i sman dang/ mge sman sbyin pa dang/ snum bag sbyin pa dang/ ro sbyin pa dang smyan sbyin pa dang/ bungamed kyi dpyad dang/ gzhon nu'idapyadang/ gzhan nu ma'i dpyang dang/
sman la sbyor bar byed pa ste/ drag sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi yonapo'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tshob dri lta bu las slar log pa yin no/ ]ma sdug 'diltar yang dag sbyong dang bram bre khacig
dad pa sa khyon pa dag phyung nas// yon po'i depyad kyi lag ba'i 'tsho bas tsho bsabyed pa 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i mchen 'de dang/ dbyug pa'i mchenyidadang/ ral kro'i mtshan nyid dang//
ma'i mnyid dang/ mtshon cha'i mtshan nyid dang/ glang po la sematshamanyid dang/ rta'i mtshan nyid dang/ khyu mchog gi mtshan nyid dang/ ma de'i chanyid dang/ ra'imtshan nyid dang/
lugagi mtshan dang/ bya shag gi mtshan nyid dang 'ur ba mtshan nyid dang/ mchil pa'i mtshan de dang/ bya kaka dang/ 'ur ba dang/ mchil pa'i mtshan nying dang/ bag kyi
mdzade dang/ skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ gzhon nu'iman nyidadang/ gzhon ma'i mtshan nyidodang tshothungaba'i rtags dang/ tshe ring ba'i rtags dang/ skal ba chung ba'i rtags
dang skal ba ba'i rtags dang/ bsod nams chung ba'i rtags dang/ bsod nams cheba'i rtags dang/ mthu chungaba'i rtags nga/ mthu che ba'i rtags dang/
jo bo rimananyid dang bran gyi mna' de/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi yonapo'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tshob de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/ ma sngoga'adi ltar yang dge sbyong dang
bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas/ yon po'od pyad kyi log ba'i 'tsho bas 'tshob rabyed pa 'dug na/ sman pas cig car gtong ba dang/ sbrangs te gtong ba dang/ skyaka
gdang/ 'khru ba dang/ stod du'akhru ba dang/ snar blugs pa dang/ du ba brdub pa dang/ dugs kyi las dang/ bad kun kyi dpyad dang/ pho ba'i dpyad dang sba ba dang phyol moge
gi dpyad dang/ ringags 'khyil pa dang/ bya rog 'khyil pa dang/ mkhur ba 'gul ba dang/ lce sos chod pa dang/ ro langs dang/ rolas phyadal sbyor bar byed dri/ dag sbyong dang
bram ze rnams kyi mon po'i dpung kyi log pa'i 'tshob delta bu las slar log pa yin no// ma sdug 'di ltar yang dag sbyong dang bram ze kha cig dad bas byin pa drag padanas/ yonapo'i dpyad
kyi leka pali'atsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ dkug pa dang/ kun tu dgug pa dang/ rnam par dkuka pa dang/ kun tu rmongs pa dang/ rnam bar nongaso ba dang/ rnam par 'thor
bdang/ rnam par 'joms ba'i chos dang/ bde bar byed pa dang/ sngag bsngal bar byed pa dang/ bu 'chags par byed pa dang/ lo kyi sbyin sreg dang/ 'bras kyi sbyin sreg dang//
tsher ma'i sbyin sreg dung rdzas kyi sbyin sraka dang/ sbyin sreg gi sbyin sreg dang rim la bkur sti bya ba dang/ skar ma la bkur sti bya ba dang/ lha la bkur ste bya ba dang/ bkur sa gnas
chen po la bkur sti byed pa lta/ dag sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi yon po'i depyad kyilog pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no// ma sdug 'di ltar yang dge sbyong dang bram ze la ga dad pas
na pa dag spyad nas/ yon po'i dpung sna tshogs kyi log pa'i 'tshobs 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ 'akas pa 'gyur ba dang/ zhi ba'agyur ba dang la nyos par 'gyur ba dang/ lo
legs par bgyur ba dang/ char mi 'bab par 'gyur ba dang/ char legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba dang/ mams kyand 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ yams kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba

ste/ dag sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi yon po'i depyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba lta bu las slar log pa yin no// ma sngaka'adra ltar mang dgi sbyong ngam bram ze kha cige dadapas byin pa drago can gnas / yon/

bo'i depyad sna tshogs kyi log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ na rnams kyi rgyal po rgyal bar 'gyur zhing/ phyi rol pa rnams kyi rgyal po pham pa'i gyur ba dang/ phyi rol pa rnams kyi rgyal
po rgyal bar 'gyur zhing/ zun rnams kyi rgyal po pham par 'gyur ba dang/ thun rnams kyi rkyal po g.yul du 'jug par 'gyur zhing/ phyi rol pa rnams kyi rgyal po 'byung
bar 'gyur ba dang/ phyi rol pa rnams kyi rgyal po g.yul du'ajug par 'gyur zhing/ zun rnams kyi la po 'byung bar 'gyur ba dan ste/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi yonapo'i depyadakyilog pa'i
'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no// ma sdug 'di ltar yang dge sbyong dang bram ze la cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas/ yon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'dilta ste/ rim
dang b+hA ba ngag lam du 'gro ba dang/ nyim dang zla ba dag lam gol ba 'gro ba dang/ lam ngunyim gzasazin pa dang/ blab 'bras zin pa dang/ skaramada' ltung ba dang/ phyogs dmar por gyurapa
dang bar snang las sgra byung ba dang/ rnamadu zla ba 'di gnyes 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu chab 'chor ba dang/ nub pa dang/ bsgribs pa dang/ ma bsgribs pa dang/ 'di lta ste//
lam dang las gol ba dag mngon pa ste/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi yon po'adrepyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu la sa slar log pa yin no// ma sdug 'diltar yang dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig
dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas yon po'i depyadakyilog pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ nyim dang zla ba dag lam du 'gron/ 'bras bu 'di lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ lem dang
[z ]zla ba dag lam gol kha 'gron/ 'bras bu 'di lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ lam du 'am gatras zin pa dang/ zla ba gzas zinab dang/ skamada' lungab dang/ phyogs dmar poragyur pa dang/
bar snangal sgra byungan/ 'bras bu 'di lta bura'agyur ba dang/ nyim dang zla ba 'driganyis 'di ltar rdza 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba 'char ba drang/ nug pa dang/ bsgrubs pa dang/ ma
bsgribs bdung/ 'dilta ste/ lam dang lam gol ba mngon na/ 'bras bu 'di lta bur 'gyur bar ston pa ste/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi yon po'i depyadakyi log pa'i 'tshob nga ltakhu
las slar log pa yin no// da 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po de dang ldan pas nang gi bde ba khanam tho ba med pams su myong bar byed cing/ dadabang po rnams kyi sgobasngams pa dang/
kun tu bsrungs pa'i dran ba dang/ 'grus skyongagi dran pa dang/ yid dran pas bsrungs pas gnas skabs mnyam par spyod cing gnas pa yin no// dmag gis gzugs rnams mthong
nas mtshan mar me 'dzin/ mngon rtags su ma 'dzin to/ gzhi gang gyi phyir zhen/ mig gi dbang po'i sngon bas ma bsdums pa gnas pa ni/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang/
yid mi bde ba dag 'byung bas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams sems kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de rnams bsdams pa'i phyir bsgrubs shing bsrung bar mig gi dbang pos mig gi dbang
bo sdom par byed ngo// de bzhin du rna bas sgra dang/ snus dang/ lces ro dang/ lus kyis reg bya dang/ yid kyis chos rnams shes nas mtshan mor mi
'dzin/ mngon rtags sum 'dzin te// gzhigang gi phyir zhan/ yid kyi dbang po'i sdom pas gnas pa ni/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang/ lo de mi bde ba dag 'byung bas
sdig ba mi dge ba'i chos rnams sems kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de rnams bsdam ba'i phyir yid kyi dbang pos yid kyi dbang po sdom par byed do// 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi
phung po dadang/ dbang po rnams kyi sgo bsdams pa dadang ldan pas nangagi bde ba kha nam tho ba med pa nyams su myong zhing/ 'gro ba dang ldog pa la shes bzhin du gnas pa yin/ lta ba
dang/ rnam par lta ba dang/ bskum pa dang/ brkyang ba dang/ snam sbyaradang/ chos gos dang/ lhung bzed thogs pa dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'grang ba dang/ 'dug
pa dang/ nyal pa dang/ mi nyal bad/ smra ba dang/ mi sa bo dang/ gnyid kyis dub pa bsal bo shes bzhin du gnas pa Anano// de'aphags pa'i tshul khrims kyi
phung po de dang/ dbangabo rnams kyi sgo bsdams pa dedang/ dran ba dang/ shes bzhinaachog de dang ldan pas nang gi bde ba kha na ma tho ba med ba nyams su myong zhing/ ngokanas mal
dben pa dgon pa dang/ shing drung dang/ lang stong drag tu gnas pa yin te/ dadagon par sonakyang rung/ shing drung du son kyang rung/ khong stong du sonakyang rung 'dug ste/
skyalamo krungabs nas lus drang bor bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon phyogs par bzhakanas/ de'ajig rten la brnab sams spangs te/ brnab sems dang bral ba'i sams kyis lanamang/
du gnas shing/ brnab sems las sems yongs su sbyong ba yin no// 'jig rten la gnod nas dang/ rmugs pa dang/ gnying dad/ rgod pa dang/ 'gyodapa dang/ the
tsom spangs te/ yid gnyis las rgal ba yin/ the tsom las rgal ba mno/ dge ba'i chos rnams la nges pa thob pa yin/ the tsom las sems yongs su sbyong ba yin no// sa sdug
dpangan mi zhig gis skyen po zhige blangs nas las kyi mthul rnams la brtson par byas te/ de'i las kyi mtha' de rnams grub nas/ des de las bu len de yang khong la/ de la chung ma gso la
chog tsam zhig kyang yod nas/ da 'disnyam ngusems te/ bdag gi sa skyen po blangs nas las kyi mtha' rnams la brtson par byas rje/ bdag gis las kyi mtha' de rnams grubanas/ bdag
gis de la bu len yang gazhal/ bdag la chung ma kaso bachog tsam zhig kyang yod do snyam ste/ dgazhing las bde bar gyur/ yid bde bar gyur pa dang/ ma sdug dperanamanang pa nang tshabs
da[# ]@#// che ba sdug bsngal ba zhig yodal/ de bras thos pa nilus la 'ju mi btub/ skom 'khrungs pa ni khong du gnod bar gyur pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na na da mad
cing stobs dang ldan la bod bar gyur te/ des kha zas zos pa 'jur btub/ skom 'thungs pa ni khong du gnod par ma gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag sngon na band tshabs che
ba sdug bsngal bar ra pa na/ bdag shes kha zas zos pa nilus la 'ju mi btub/ skom 'thus panikhong ngu shanod par gyurapa las/ dane'adi ltar bag med cing stobs dang ldan pas
bde bor gyur to/ bdag gis zas bros pani lus la 'jur bdub/ skom 'thungs mnikhong nguganod par ma gyur to snyam ste/de gzhi de las bde ba dang/ yid bde bar gyur pa
dang/ ma sdug par nam zhig bran du gyur/ mngag gzhug pa dang ko longab dang/ lta khol dang rang dbang med par gyur pa las/ de dus gzhan zhiganathan mi
byed par gyur te/ mngag gzhug mi byed go rolong mi byed/ lte khol mi byed de/ rang dbang yod pas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dultar bdug sngon bran du gyur pa na/ mngag
gzhug pa dang/ go ring ba dang/ lto khol dang/ rang dbang yod pa las/ da ni bran mi byed pas mngag gzhug mi byed/ go re 'ongam byed/ lte khol ma byed/ rang
ka dbang yongado snyam nas/ dekani delas bde bar gyur/ yid bde bar gyur pa dang/ ma sdug dpar name zhig btson du bzung ste/ lag ba phying ka leg tu dam du bcings par gyur pa las
dngulas nor kazhul bamed par/ bdubar legs par thar nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag sngon btson du bzung ste/ lag pa phying ka loka dum du bcings par gyur ba las
draning las bdag gzhal ba med par legs par thar to sAm ste/ de bzhi dolas yid bde par gyurapa dang/ ma lcag dpar nu ma zhig 'jigs pa las bdeb dung/ lo nyis pa las le
lekras par gyur nas/ de'adi snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag 'jigs pa las bde ba dang/ lanyos pa las lo legs par gyur to snyam ste/ dbazhi dra las bdabar gyur/ dka' bar gyur
pa de bzhin du// des bdag nyid kyi sgrib pa lcapa zhe bo dzalta ba dang/ nadu ji lta ba dang/ bon drilta ba dang/ btson ji lta ba dang/ 'jigs pa ji lta ba dengag sbangs par yang dag par
rjes su mthong ngo// de sgrub pa lnga po somasa'u ba'i nyon mongs par byed pa/ shes rab nyams chung bar byed// kanodaba'i phyogs dang 'thunab/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi mthun pa dag sngangasanas/
'dod pa dag las dben/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben/ rtog pa dngabacas/ dpyodapa dngabacas// dben pa las skyas pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba can bsam 'atan dang bo
rdzogs par byas te gnas so// dperanakhrus mkhan nam/ khrus mkhan kyi slob mamakhas pa zhige 'khar bodaa/ gzhong bu'am/ na phyis kyi nang du'adzag chal
kyi phye ma zhib mo zhus yang btab yang btab ste sbyangs na/ 'ag tshal kyikong bu de gshe gshar dang ldan/ kasher gyis zhen te/ gshegyis phyi nang khyab bas 'bo bar mi 'gyur/ 'dzag
parami 'gyurab ngobazhin du/ dge slong de'i lus dban pa las skyes pa'i dka' ba'i bde bas mngon du rgyan par byed/yongs su rlan par byed/ gongs su tshim par byed/ yongs su khyab par phyudang
ra'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/ dben ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde bsam khyab pa 'am/ khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do// dartog pa dang/ dpyod pa dang bral zhing/
nang yongs su dang// mas kyi rgyudagacig tugyur par/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par
byas takanas so// de 'di lta lus 'di la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dka' ba dang/ bde bas mngon du na par byed/ yongs su rgyan par byeng/ yongs su tshim par byang/ yongs
su khyab par byed ng/ nga'i lus thams cad la 'dilta ste/ ting 'dzin las skyes pa'i dka' ba dang/ bdebs ma khyab pa'i m/ khyab pa ma gyurapa cung zad kyang med do/ deb zha
ri'i rtse na bkod ma'i mtsho bran zhig yod par gyur la/ derani shar phyogs nas kyang tshum 'bab par gyural/ lho phyogs nas ma yin/ nub phyogs nas ma yin/ byang phyogs nas kyang
chum 'bab la/ der ltas kyang dus dus su chad kyi rgyunai 'bebs te gzhan du na bkod ma'i mtsho bran de nyid las bkod ma'i chu 'am bkodaa'i chuchen po lu gnas / bkod
ma'imatsho ban dethams cang chu bsil bas gang bar byed/ yongs su shang bar byed/ shin du gangabar byed/ yongs su khyab par byedung/ bkodama'i mtsho bran de thams cad
'di lta ste/ chu bsil bas ma khyab pa 'am/ khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang mang do// de bzhin du lus la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i grub ba dang ( bde bas mngon du
rlanapa byeng/ os su dran par byed/ yongs su tshim par byed/yongs su khyab par byed de/ ngarilus thams cad la 'di lta ste/ ting nga'adzin las skyas pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde
bas ma khyab pa ma/ khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang ma do// dadaka' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btangasnyoms la gnas shing na ba dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong/
la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang dadran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs bar byas te
kanas so// du 'deltar lus 'di la dga' bkod pa bde bas mngon dumanabar byed/ yongs su rgyun bar byed/ longs su tshim par byed/ longs su khyab
bar byed// de'i lus thams cad la 'dilta sta/ dga' ba med pa'i bde bas ma khyab 'am/khyab pa ma gyur ba byung zad kyang med do// 'di lta ste/ dperan utu la'am/
bad+ma 'am/ kumu da'am/ bad+madakarapon las skyes shinge/ mun s chen por gyur pa/ rtses ba takas sha 'dug pa de dag gi rtsa banus/ rtsi mo'i bar kyikasab kas ni//
'di lta ste/ chu bsil bas ma khyab pa 'an/ khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang mang do// de bzhin du lus la dga' ba med pa bde bas mngon du rlan par byed/ yongs su rlon par byang
yongs su tshim par byed/ yongs su khyab par byed de/ rilus thams cad la 'dil ste/ dga' ba yod pa'i bdebasam khyab pa'i m/ khyab pa ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do//
de bdab yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang yangs shing/ yid badub dang yod mi 'dor yang nub pas/ bdag yang m in/ sdug bsngal ba yang m yin/
btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi ba rdzogs par byas te kanas so// de 'di ltar lus 'di la yongs su dag pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i sems kyis mos te/
khyab bar byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// dper na khyim bdag gam/ khyim 'dzab ki 'u ras 'dapyadapa 'am dgu pas domago dang/ lag ba dang/ rkang pa g.yogs
na po'imago dngalag bzhus/ rkang pa'i bar lus thams cad 'di lta ste/ sa gtsang ma yongs su dag bsam sha pa 'am/ log par ma gyur ba cung zad kyang madango//
de bzhin du de 'di ltar lus 'di la yongs su dag pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i sems kyis chos te/ khyab pa rabyas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/
'ongs su dag pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i sems kyis ma khyab pa 'am/ khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do// ma sdug kangago tsho'on 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyis bde ba yang sras
te[0f10 ]sn gnas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yang bdu bu dang/ yidomi bdeb yang nub pas/ bdeb yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs
su dag pa bsam shatan bde rdzogs par byas te gnas pa ngakho na'i tshe/ de'i sems rgyud du ma yin/ zhum bam yin no// rgod pa med rung zhum med pas/mi g.yo bar gnas pa thob/
bar na khang pa rtse ka ma 'am/ khang pa rtseg ma'i khyams su'abru mar gyi che mar bus ba de'i me lce de rlung nas (bya dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis ma bskyod cing ma bskul ba de'i tshe/
rgod pa ma yin/ zhum ba ma yin no// rgod ba med cing zhum pa med par gnas pas/ mi g.yo bar 'bab bzhin du/ ma skrag gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i
nyan thos kyis bde ba ya nga spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang sngas shing/ yang bde ba dang/ ing mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bad ba yang ma yin/ sngaku bsngal yang ma yin pa/ btang
snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam katan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de'i tshe/ de'i sems rgodapa ma yano/ zhum pa ma yin no/ rgod pa medatsange zhum pa med pas/
mi g.yo bar gnas pa thob nas/ dre'adisnyam dusams te/ bdag gi lus kyi gzugs 'di ni rags pa 'byang ba chen po bzhi'i rgyu las byung ba yin te/ 'di la bdag gi rnam pa shes
pa rten cing 'di'i gnas te/ 'dril khyab par gnas kyis/ ma la bdag gis lus 'del sa yid bskyod do/ lus gzhan yid las byung ba'i gzugs dbang po ma tshang ba dang/
dman pa ma yin pa zhiga mngon par sprul lo sAmanAs dalus dra las med bskyod de/ lus gzhan yid las byung ba'agazugs dbang po mo tshang ba dang/ dman pa ma yin pa
mngon par sprul ba byed do// ma sdug dpar nanor bu bo 'urlu bzang po rigs dang ldanub gsal ba/ dang ba/ dri ma med pa/ tshon skud sna lnga pa 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/
sarapo dang dmar po dang dkar po dang/ le brgan las brgyus ba/ de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na/ 'di ni skud pa yin no// 'di ni nor bu yin no/ 'di ni skud bas
nor bu brgyus ba yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/ de lus de las yid bskyong nas/ lus kazhan yid las byung ba'i kazugs dbang po ma tshang ba dang/ dmanapa ma yin pa mngon par sprul
par byed do// ma sdug dparanam zhig gis rtswa mun 'dza' las thur ma phyung ba de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na/ 'di mun 'dza' yin no// 'di ni thur ma yin te/ mun
'dzaralas thung ma phyung ba yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/ de lus de las yid skyodanas/ lus gzhan in las byung ba'i gzugs dbang po ma tshangab dang/ dman ba ma yin ba mngon
par sprul par byengad// ma sdug ngapan mi zhig gis za ma tog nas sbrul phyung ban/ de skyes bu mig dang ldan pasa mthong on/ 'di ni bri ma don yin no/ 'di ni la yin te/
za ma tog nas la byung ba yin nozhisongashes ba de bzhin du/ de lus de las yid bskyod nas/ lus gzhan yid las byung ba'i gzugs dbang po ma tshang ba dang/ dman po yin pa la yi/
pa mngon par sprul par byed do/ zla sdug dparan mi zhig gis ral gri shubs nas phyung ban/ de skyes bamago dang ldanobs mthon/ 'di ni shubs yin no// 'diral gri yin
@#// te ral gri shubs nas phyungab yin no zhes shes pa da bzhin du/ de lus de las yid bskyong nan/ lus gzhan yang las byung ba'i gzugs dbang po
ma tshang ba dang/ dman pa ma yin pa mtshonapasprul par byed do// de deltar manyam par gzhag pa'i sams yongs su dag pa// rnam par byang b/ nyon mongs ba medapa nye ba'i nyon
mos pa dang bral ba/ drang po gyur pa// las su rung ba la gnas pa// ma g.yo ba thob pa// rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon sum dubya ba'i mngon brdza shes pa la sams mngon par
ka tong par byed du nga rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa dum nyams su myob byed de/ 'di lta ste/ gnyiDi tu gyur nas mngabor gyur pa dang/ long por gyur nas kracig tugyurapa dang/
snabar gyur cing na snang ba'i yo shes mthong ng nyams su myong bar byed cing/ ka pa la yang thad kar 'gro la yang thad kar 'gro/ gal yang thad kar 'akra'o// lus kyis klogs/
pa mad par 'grob ni/ panas nganam mkha' la bu bzhinano// sa la yang stong du 'grob dang/ byi'u zul byed de/ dpar na chu la bya ba bzhinano// tshul yang rgyun phyogs las bzlog par
'gro ste/ dparan sa la bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krungashis 'gro ste/ dpangan 'dab chags bya bzhinano// ma dang zla ba 'diltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing/ 'di ltar mthu
tshig 'diganyis la lag pas 'dzin cing zhug par byed do// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur ro// dbab nakasajamakar ma/ kas ramagar kyi slob ma mkhas ba zhig/
kes/ gsangashin tu 'as su rung bar byas par rig nas/ rdungs su bya ba'i rnam pa bodabu 'am mgul rgyan nam/ lag rgyan nam/ rkang rgyananam/ sor gdub kyi 'am/ gsar/
kyi 'phrang ba gang dang gang byed 'dod pa de myur ba myur bar byed pa de bzhin du/ de'adi ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'isams yongs su dag pa// rnam par byang b/ rton mongs pa med pa/ rab 'i
nyon mongs pa dang bral bra/ drang poragyuropa/ las su rung ba la gnas pa/ mi g.yo bathob pa/ rdzu 'phrul kyi yul shes pa// mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems
man dukatodabar byed d/ 'di lta ste/ gcig tu gyur nas mang por gyur ba dang shes bya ba nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang gyur ro/ zhes bya ba'i ba kongam bzhin du'o//
bon rje mkhananam rdza mkhan gyi slob mamakhas pa zhig gis/ 'jim pa'i kong dushin tu las su rung bar byas par ri gnas / snod spyad kyi rnam grangs gang sgrub bar 'dod pa de kho na myur
ba myur bar sgrub pa de bzhin du/ de 'delta mnyam par gzhag pa'i sams yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byang b/ nonamongs pa med pa// 'ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas//
tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khar ngulus kyis dbang sgyur ro/ zhes bya ba'i bar rkal bzhin du'o// depa na ba so mkhananam/ ba so mkhan kyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig/
gis ba so shin tulas su rung bar byas par rig nas/ gzugs kyi rnam grangs gang dang gangabasgrub par 'dod ba de kho na myur bsgyur bar sgrub ba de bzhin du/de 'di ltar mnyam par
gzhaka ba'i sems yongs su dag pa// rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbangosbyar ro// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de 'ang
ltamanyam par gzhag pa'i sams yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byang ba/ nyon mongs bskyed pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ drang por gyurapa/ las su rungabal gnas pa/
mi g.yo ba thob pa/ lha'i rna bshes pa'i man par shes pa mngon sum du bya la sems mngon du gtod par byed// dawA'i rnab rnam bar dag pa mi'i las 'das pas// mi rnams kyi 'am/
mi ma yin pa rnams kyi 'om/ gang dug ring po 'am/ gang dag ru ba'i sgra gnyis ka thos par byed do// dporanam dung 'bud pa zhig ri brag chen po'i khar 'dzegs nas man mo
namaphyad kyi dus su dung bus na/ de'i sgra des sa'i phyogs thokas ba med bar khyab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ de 'doltar manyam parogazhan pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ ]
rnam par byang ba/ non mongs pa med pa// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bu/ drang por gyur ba/ las su rung ba la gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba thob pa/ lha nag shes pa
mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon bar shes pa la sems mngon du gtod par byed du/ de lta na ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/ mi rnams kyi 'am/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyi 'ag/
gang dka ring po ma/ gang dag bye ba'i sgra kanyis ka thos par byed/ de 'deltar anyam par kazhag pa'isams yongs su dag pa// rnam par byang b/ nyon mongs pa tshad pa// rnaba'i
nyon mongs pa dang bral ba// drang por gyur pa/ las su rung ba lagazhas pa mi g.yo ba thob pa/ sams kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems
mngon par gtod par byed/ des sems can gzhan rnams kyi dang/ gang zag gzhan rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyodra ba'i yid/ yang kyis ji lta babazhin du
rab tu shes te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems yin no zhes yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang/ zhe sdang dang bral ba dang/ gti mug dang bcas pa
dang gtimug dang bral ba dang/ bsdus pa dang/ rnam par g.yengs pa dang/ zhum kha dang/ rab tu 'dzin pa dang/ chungadudang/ chen po dang/ rgod pa
dang/ nodapa ma yin pa dang/ rtobar zhib dang/ nub zheb ma yin pa dang mnyag bar gzhan pa dang/ mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa dang/ bskyoms 'dang/ bsgoms pa la
yin pa dang/ sams rnam par grol ba dang/ sems rnam par grol ba ma yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dung ba shes so// den skyes bu mig dang ldan pas me long gi dkyil
'khor lo sa su dag par byas te/ rangashwa bzhin gyi mtshan ma rtog par byed pa de bzhin du/ de 'di ltar mnyam par gzhag ba'i sams yongs su dag ba/ rnam bar khung ba/ nyon mongs pa
mad pa//zhu ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ drang por gyur pa/ las su rung bu la gnas pa/ sa ka yo ba thob pa/ sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'iman bar shes pa la sems
mngon dugatod par byed zhes bya ba nas/ soms shin tu rnam par grol ba la soms shin tu rnam par grol ba yin no zhes yang dag ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tushas so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong
bzhin te/ 'din zhabs shes bya'o// rig pa gang zhen/ de 'delta rnamanyam paNakazhaka pa'i sams yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byang ba/ nyon mongs pa mdab// nye ba'i nyon
mongs pa dang bral ba// drang por gyurapa/ las su rung ba la gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba thob pa/ sngon kyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa// mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon pa shes pa la sems
mngon par katod par byed// de sngonagyi kanas rnam pa dum rjes su dran te/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba kacig dang/ gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ bzhengang/ lnga dang/ drug dang/
bdunadang/ brgyud dang/ dgu dad/ bcu dang nyi shu dang/ sum cu dang/ bzhi bcu dang/ lnga bcudang/ skye ba brgyadang/ skye ba stongadang/ skye ba brgya stong dang/
skya ba brgya phrag dus dang/ skye ba stongaphrag du na dang/ skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang/ 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang 'jigeb dba'achakas pa'i bskal pa
dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dus dang/ 'jig pa'i bskul pa du ma dang/ 'chags ba dang 'jig ba'i bskal pa dum rjes su dran tre/ gangadubadag sems can 'di dag gi nang du skyes pa na//
mingani'adri zhes bya/ rigs 'dizhes bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni 'drilta bu zhig zu za/ bde ba dang ku bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo// tshe ring khyang ni 'ditsam zhig/
yun 'disi dacig gnas kanas/ tshone'adi tsam zhig thub bo// de nas bdag shi 'phos nas chokemo zhig tuskyes so// de nas shi 'phos nas yang g ge mo zhig tu skyes so// de nas
g]/]kyang sha 'phosazhas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ kazhi ci las gyurapa dang bcas/ bar sngon gyi gnas rnam ba dum rjes su
dran no// dparan mi zhig kronus grong na so 'a/ ngunas kyang grongagazhan du son gnas / de 'di snyam dusems te/ bdag gis grong che ga nas ga ge mor son to/ nga nas
kyang grong khyer ka nor ro// grong nas ni grong 'dir 'ongs so snyam pa de bzhin du/ de'ade ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sams yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byang ba nyon mongs pa mang
pa rta ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ drang por gyur ba[ ]las su rung ba la gnas pa// mi g.yo ba thob pa/ sngon kyi kanas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon par shes pa la
soms mngon dukatodapar byed de/ angonakyi kanas rnam pa dum rjes su dran te/ 'di lta ste/ skyang gcig dang zhes bya banas/ rnam ba dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang
bcas par sngon gyi gnas rnam pa dum rjes su dran no//zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// 'dul ba gzhi// dbam po sumanugazhis
de'ang ltar manyam par gzhag pa'isams yongs su dag pa/ rnam ba byang b/ nyonamos pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ drang por gyur pa la sa su rung
la gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba thob pa/ 'chi 'phong/ skye ba shes ba mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon pa shes pa 'a samasa mngon par gtod par byede/ ngalta'i mig rnam par dag pa
mi'i las 'angs pas/ sems can rnams kyi 'che'apho rnams dang skye ba rnams dang/ kha dog bzang po rnams dang/ kha dog nganapa rnams dang/ mon pa
rnams dang/ gya nom pa rnams dang/ bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro rnams kyang mthong shing/ sems can las ji lta ba bzhin bar 'gro ba rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab
tu shes te/ sems can 'dudakanIlus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag dung yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'jungs pa dang/ log par
lta ba dang/ log par lta ba'i chos kyi las byas pa'i rgyus/ rgyu dang/ rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can mul ba rnams
su skyo bar 'gyur ro// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyilegs par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa ma 'debs pa dang/
yang dag par lta ba dang/ yang dag par lta ba'i chos kyi las blangs pa'i rgyus/ rgyu de dang/ rkyen nges lus zhig nas bde 'thomatho ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// dper na/
skyes bu mig dang ldan pa zhig lam po che'i bzhimador 'dug nas/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po 'ong ba dang/ 'gu pa dang/ nyal ba nga/ tha dadabar 'gro ba
rnams kyang mthong ba bzhin du/ lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas zhes bya ba nas/ lha rnams su skyabara'agyur ro// zhes bya ba'ibar gongam bzhin du'o// de
mnyam par gzhag ba ri sams yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byang ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs ba dang bral ba/ drang por gyur// las su rung ba la gnas pa/ me
kayo ba thob pa/ thoka pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon parashes pa la sems mngon du katod bar byed de/ de'adi ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'ibaden pa yin no// zhes yang
dag pa jilta babazhin rab tu shes so// 'din sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba drang/ 'di'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ 'dri ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa//
yin no// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rob tu shes so// de de ltar shes shingo/ dultar mthong nas 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol ba dang/ srid
pa'i zag pa dang/ ma rig pa'i zaka pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol^anas bdag ki skye ba zad de/ tshangs par spyod pa bstanato/ bya ba byas
so// srid pa 'dilas kazhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ya shes 2de mthong bar brgyud par n grong ngam/ grong rdal dang gsung gang thag mi ring ba zhig na/
mtsho phranag tinge brab pa/ chu gsal ba dang ba// rnam pa ru dang ba zhig yong la/ do la skyes bu che ka dang ldan pa zhig 'gram du'aduka nas kabeka ma 'am/ gyo mo 'am[2]
'am/ rus sbal lam/ nya phyis sam/ dung rnams mthong ba de bzhin du/ de'adi ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su drag ba/ rnam par byang ba/ nyon mongs pa mang
pa 'ba'i 'on mongs pa dang bral ba/ drang por gyur pa/ las su rung ba la gnas pa mi g.yo ba thob pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'di las srid pa gzhan ma shes so// zhes bya ba'i bar
gongs bzhin no// 'dun roge pa zhes bya ste// kong ma'i zhabs dnga'adikazhes gcig du bsdoms pa la rig pa dang zhabasungashes bya'o// bram ze'i khye'u bla namadapa'i rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
pa ngesangon sum dum byas pa mngon sum du bya ba la thabs ma yin pa bzhir rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'dra la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha sug bran mod pa'i rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa 'di
