byis bang mdzod smug po can nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ban/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der song nas/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyongagi pha bar sgo 'i khyams na skyes pa sgra mkhan gyis
skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi las/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong sgo drung na 'dug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'a ra bar byed de/ dge slong mgo/
rig 'o na dgagis kho bo'i rigs kyi rgyun bcad de/ 'o na dag gis kho bo'i bu gcig pa/ sdug ra/ yid du 'ong ba/ bzod pa/ mi mthun pa med pa yul 'khor skyong rab tu byung
bsnyan par rdzogs par byas na/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'o ni rnams la su zhig bsod snyoms sbyin par bya bar sems/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bos rang gi khyim nas rgya gag ma gtogs pa
ni sbyin pa yang ma thob/ bslad kyang ma bsag ba dang/ myur ba myur bar phyir byung ngo// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi ban mo rgan mo zhige zan dron rdul pa zhug/
lenopa zhig dor ba'i phyir thogs te sgor byung ba dang/ tshe dang ldan po yul 'khor skyong gis sngon kyi Than mo rgan mo de mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bran mo rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smras so//
sring mo gal te zan don rul pa zhag lon pa 'dor ba yin na/ kho bos bkras lhung bzed 'dir chug cig/ 'phags pa gsol cig/ de nas sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo des thanA dron rul
pa zhag lano ba lhung bzed du 'jug pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ bzhin dang/ sna dang/ sma dngags dag gi mtshan ma shin tu legs/
par bzung nas// 'di skad ces kyang smras so// rje'i sras yul 'khor skyong lags sam/ sring mo kho bo skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so// de nas ston gyi bran mo rgan mo

de rings pa rings pa tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha ga na ba der song ste phyin nas 2 tsho dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha la 'di skad ces smras so// jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig/ sras yul
'khor skyong bang mdzod stag po can du byon nas/ ring mo zhig lags na nyid kyi khab tu ni byon mi bzhad de// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas la ga pa g.yon pas sku bsdus nas las
yug cig gi smad g.yogs bgos bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der song ba dang/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod smug po can du byon nas/ rtsig drung
zhig tu 'dug nas zan dron rul pa zhag lon pa za bar byed pa dang/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul la 'o sbyong la 'di skad ces smras so// yul 'khor skyong
khyod dang mdzod stug po can du phyin nas ring bo zhig len na/ ci'i phyir rang gi khyim du 'jug par mi 'dod/ zan dron rul ba zhag len pa khyod kyi khri bar yang ji ltar 'gror brkyab/ khyim bdag
khyod kyi khyim du 'ongs na/ rgya gag ma gtogs ba spyin pa yang ma thob// bslad kyang ma bslad pa dang/ myur ba myur bar byung ngo// bu yul 'khor skyong yin par kho bos mi shes mod/
gal te kho bos shes na de skad mi smra ba zhig/ bu yul 'khor skyong bzod par gsol lo// khyim bdag bzod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul
'khor skyong la yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud pa byas nas/ rang gi khyim du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/ yul 'a khor
skyong gi ma la 'di skad ces smras so// bu yul 'khor skyong yun ring zhig lon nas khyim du 'ongs kyis/ skye re zhig khyod bdag nyid kyis snod du chos la sta gon gyis shig dang/ de la bu yul
'khor myong longs spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rang nyid kyis snod du btsos nas sta gon byas so// de nas mi zhig gis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
skyong gi mdun du gsar gyi phung po chen po/ gal te mi gcig pha rol na 'greng na/ mi gcig tshu rol na 'dug pa mi mthong la/ mi gcig tshu rol na 'dug na gcig pha rol na 'thung ba mi

mthong ba sbyangs so// tsho dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces sas so// bu yul 'khor skyong byed kyi ma la/ bud med kyi rnams kyi bud med kyi nor dang/

bud med kyi bag rdzongs dang/ bud med kyi khud pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa yang 'di snyed cig yod do// gzhan yang khyod kyi kha'i ni/ mtshan mas thebs pa'i gse ra dang sa le sbram yang brgya phrag du ma dang/
stong phrag du ma dang/ brgya stong phrag du ma yong na/ pha rol gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bu yul 'khor skyong tshur khyod 'dug la/ 'do ba dga' la yang yongs
su spyod cig/ sbyin ba dag kyang thong zhig/ bsod nams dag kyang gyisashig/ khyim bdag gi chung ma khyod gal te kho bo'i tshig la dad pas mnyan par bya bar sems pa lta na/ bdag gis
gdams shing rjes su bstan to// bu su la 'khor skyong gdams ngag stsol cig/ bu yul 'khor skyong rjes su ston cigarang/ khyod kyi tshig la bdag dang bas mnyan par bgyi'o snyam du sems so//
khyim bdag gi chung ma tshur khyod kyis shana'i ras skyo sar pa byos la// gser dang sa le'i sbram gyis khong lta/ shing rta'i nang du chug la chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun shugs drag cing gting zab pa gang
na yod pa de ra 'o cig/ gzhi de las khyod kyi mya ngan dang/ skye sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams skye bar gyur tar/ de nas
tshe dang ldan pa yul 'a khor sbyong gi ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis de lta bu'i bya bas kyang du yul 'khor skyong bzlog par byang ma nus so snyam go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong/
gi mas/ mna' ma la bcol ba/ kyi bag sa ra re zhig ji lta bu'i mnyes pa rnams kyis mnyes pa dang/ khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang/ dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang/ gos
rnams bson pa dang/ rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang/ bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang/ phyi ma rnams kyis gtor bas/ bu yul 'khor skyong de sngon khyim par gyur pa na/
dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i a zhe ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang/ khrus rnams kyis bkru ba dang/ dri rnams kyis byug pa dang/ gros rnams bson pa dang/ rgyan rnams
kyis brgyan pa dung/ bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang/ phyi ma rnams kyis gtor ba gyis la/ bu yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs la 'di skad ces/

gang gi slad du rje'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lha'i bu mo ji lta bu zhig ces kyang smos shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi chung mas/
ji lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang/ khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang/ dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang/ gos rnams bskon pa dang/ rgyun rnams kyis brgyan pa dang/
bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang/ phyi ma rnams kyis gtor bas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong sngon khyim par gyur pa na/ dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i man
ba rnams kyis mnye ba dang/ khru ba rnams kyis bgru bdang/ dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang/ gos rnams bson pa dang/ rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang/ bdug po rnams kyis bdugs
pa dang/ phyi ma rnams kyis gtor ba byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces skyas so// rje'i sras gang gi slad du
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshas par spyad pa spyod pa lha mo de ji lta bu zhig lags/ sring mo kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs bar spyad pa spyod pa ni/ lha'i bu mo'i ched du mkhan/
no[]de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ sngon gyi chung ma la sring mo zhes tshig tu smras pas/ brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to/ ( donas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'kho'o skyong gis//
pha dang ma la snas pa/ yab yum gal te kha zas btang ba lags na/ ci mi stsal tam/ btang snyoms su bzhag ste/ ci mtho ba tsam lags sam/ bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod

cig ces/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul ba khor skyong gi pha dang mas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' pa dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byed de
rnam grangs du mas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabasashing tshim par byas so// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis zongs/ lag pa bkrus te lhung bzed gyur
ra rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ltas shig lus ni nor bu dang//

rna rgyan gyis ni bkra byas kyang// nad dang slu ba'i chos can de// brtan par gnas pa yod ma yin// sgra yi lan bu brgyud lha sa lashing// mig ni mig sman gyi sa bskus pa'i ng// byis pa rmongs par byed
nus kyi// pha rol tshol ba ma yin no// bi rnams kyis ni lus bsdus la// rkang pa btsag gis byugs pa yang// byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi// pha rol tshol ba ma yin no// mig sman gsar
gyis bkra byas shing// dus nga 'i lus ni brgyan pa yang// byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi// pha rol tshol ba ma yin no// ri dgas shor bas ri btsugs nas// ringags gzung ba ma nus ltar//
rngon pa 'o dod 'bod nganug la// zos nas gnas su 'gro bar bya// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pha dang ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du
banug/ yang dag nga la gzengs bstod/ yang dag bar rab tu dga' bar byas nas// deng nas steng gi nam mkha' la song ngo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod smug
po ban gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung du nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'jug go/ de'i tshe rgyal po ko'u rab bya/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi smon
pa yang sgrogasashing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdagashes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyi'i skabs phye na/ bdag/
phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas rgyal bo 'u rab byas/ tshal srung ba'i mi la bsgo ba/ kwa ye nang rje khyod so la myur du bang mdzod stag bo can gyi
tshal phyag dar byos shig/ sang nga der skyed mos tshal gyi sa 'gro/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ skyes pa des rgyal bo ko'u rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas/ bang mdzod smug po can gyi tshal thams
cad phyag dar byed pa na/ mi des tsho dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong ba ru ra'apishing zhig gi drungananyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/
rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdagashes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung/
bstan pa'i phyir skabs phu na/ ba dag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni 'di yin te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu phyin gyis/
ma la bdag gis rgyal bo ko'u rab bya la sbran par bya'o snyam nas/ donas skyes pa de rgyal po ke'u rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal bo kebu rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so// lha
gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing bzhugs la/ nam zhig na bdagashes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phyin/
bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni de lags te bang mdzod stag po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu mchis lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab
par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal bo ko'u ba byas mi gzhan zhig la bsgo ba/ kA la nang rje tshur/ bzhon pa bzang bo myur du sdogs shig/ de lung zhon nas deng lozhas shes
ldan yul 'khor skyong blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i ltar mnyananas/ bzhon pa bzang po myur du bsdogs te/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya
gang na ba der song sku phyin pa dang/ rgyal bo ko'u rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so// lha babs pa bzang bo bsdogs lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/
de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas/ bang mdzod stug po can nas phyung// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la lta ba dang bsnyen bkun bya ba'i phyir song nas/ de ji
tsam bzhin ba'i sa'i bar du ba zhan bas songasku/ bzhon pa las babs nas/ rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po ko'u rab
bya rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so tshur spyon/ rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi yul lags ]
uny+tsa/ bag bzhed na bdag kyang stan la ga yar drongs shig/ kyi yul 'khor skyong bdag gi yul lags mod kyi/ na kyang bdag yul 'khor skyong gyis bdag stan la g.yar
drang bar 'tshal lo// rgyal bo chen po gnam chis kyis// gal te bshad na bzhugs shig/ de nas rgyal bo ko'u rab bya/ tshodang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang lhan cig mno
du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal bo ko'u
rab byas// tshe dang ldan ga yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gal te rigs dman pa 'am/ longs spyod rnams yongs su zad pa 'am/ gtugs
par gyur na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa gang dag ba kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba yod na/ bdag cag rigs ni ko'u rab bya
yin la// longs spyod ni rgya che ba yin gyis/ 'di lta bu kho bos shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la langs spyod kyi skal ba dag la bgo bsha' bya yis/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong tshul
khyod 'dug la/ 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig/ sbyin pa dag thong zhig/ bsod nams dag gyis shig/ rgyal bo chen bo ma ma lags pa'i mgron du 'bod pa sa bdag/
mgron du 'bod kyi/ 'tsham pas ni ma lags so// khyod lta bu s bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa 'di lta bu'i mgron du yang ma 'bod cig/ bdag gisa'ashes ldan yul 'khor skyong dang
'tsham pa'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du 'bod pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ rgyal po chen po tshur spyon/ khyod kyis 'di skad ces 2 kyi yul 'khor skyong ba bo'i yul
'byor cing gnod pa med pa/ sngo ba med cing 'tsho ba med la/ slong ba po'i bsod snyoms rnyed sla ba yin gyis/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong/ bang mdzod stag do
can 'dir gnos shig dang/ bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong chos bzhin gyis bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar bya'o zhes bgyi ba lags na 2 rgyal po chen
po sams mngon par dad pa gang lags pa de tsam gyis bgyis lags te 'tshal lo// gzhan yang gal te zhus pa lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na/ shes ldan yul 'khor
skyong la bdag tu lags so// rgyal po chen po gsungs shig/ thos nas khyod la rig par bgyi'o// kyi yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni yongs su nyams pa lags te//
de dag gis yongs su nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgo bas longs su nyams pa dang/ nad kyis yongs su nyams pa dang/ nye dus yongs su nyams pa dang//
'angs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa'o// kyi yul 'khor skyong rga pas yo ngas su zhams ba gang zhin/ 'di la rigs kyi bu rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs bar gyur nas
de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pas/ bdag gis re zhig 'dod pa bdog kyang los kyang bar sla ba ma yin na/ mi bdogon lta
smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs la gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/ de rga bas
yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams na skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad ba yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ste/ 'di'i rga bas yongs su
nams ba zhes bya'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong rga bas yongs su nyams pas yo ngas su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dadar yang
zad g pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni gzhon nur thor bu lang tsho la bab pa// sku gnag pa/ na tshod dar la bab pa dang ldan kha/
yin te/ gang gi tshe/ rtsed mo dang/ dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ cha ba dang/ brgyan pa'i gnas la brtson pa dang ldan pas gnas par bya ba de'i tshe/ zhe du rnams mchi mas
brnangs shing du bzhin dang bcas pas ma rangs bzhin skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ shes ldan yul
'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes/ mthong/ thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung/ de la ni
kho bo rangs pa na yin te mi 'dod do// kyeshesaldan yul 'khor skyong nad kyis yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu na ba/ sdug bsngal kha/ nad tshabs che bar gyur nas de 'di
snyam du sems te/ bdag nin ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che bas/ bdag gis re zhig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang longs spyad par bla ba ma yin/ mi bdog na lta smos kyang ci dgos//
ma la bdag sgra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams
bskra dang kha spakhregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni nad kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ shes ldan
!// yul 'khor skyong ni nad kyis nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ rgya dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas zhes bya
ba nas/ rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gnod pa med cing/ nad med pa'i rang bzhin can dang/ ran par
[ ]'ju ba'i drod dang ldan po sta/ ha cang bsil bas ma yin pa dang/ ha cang tsha dro ba ma yin pa dang/ khams snyoms pas gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas khyod kyis zos pa dang/ 'thus
ba dang/ 'chog dang/ myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur na/ 'ashas ldan yul 'khor skyong de la ci zhigashes/ mthong zhes bya ba nas/ 'batu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
bzhin du'o// de la ni kho boras pa ma yin te mi bzod do// kyi yul 'khor skyong nye dus yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'i nye du rnams rabs chad na du rnams kha tag nas/
de 'a di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye du rnams rabs chad/ nye du rnams kha tag pas/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar
gong ma bzhin du'o// de na du'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas sgra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di na nye dus yongs/
su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyod ni na nus yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
khyim med par rab tu byung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ lul 'khor skyong gi nye du ni/ ko'u rib bya'i rigs nas bzung ste brgyudang/ bang mdzod skyug bo can 'di nyid na rgyas par yod na shes ldan yul
'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes 1 mthong bya ba nas/ rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la ni kho bo rangs ri ma yin te mi bzod do/ kye yul 'khor skyong longs spyod kyis yongs su
nyams pa gang zhen/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'i longs spyod bslabasaM pa dang/ yongs su zad da dung/ gtugs bar gyur nas ( de 'di snyam du se mas te/ bdag gi longs spyod na bsrabs pa dang/
yongs su zad pa dang/ gtugs par gyur gyis/ ma la bdag sgra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de longs spyod yongs su nyams pa yongs su nyams

bas skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni longs spyod kyi yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni longs spyod yongs
su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin n zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni bang mdzod stag po can 'di na/ rigs
mchog dang rigs bzang bo yin pas 'di lta ste/ longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa yin na/ 'di la shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes/ mthong/ gros/
rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smig bgos nas// dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung/ de la ni kho borangs pa ma yin te mi bzod dgo rgyal po chen po bzhi
bo 'di dag bam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des yid 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs te/ yid 'byung ba de dag gis
yid byung nas// rigs kyi bu rnams sku dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas 1 dad pa yang dag pa khe nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar gyur te/ rgyal bo chen po 'jig
rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba ma da pas skya bas med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'din thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin/
'jig rten 'di ni chos mi shes te srid pas 'khol pas chog mi shes ba yin par bdag gis bshes/ mthong/ thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang/
dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo// bdag gis mdor bsdus te gsungasashing/ rnam par ma phye ba 'di'i ni don rgyas par 'tshol bar mi 'gyur des/ shes ldan yul
[z/ ]'khor skyong gis don de nyid cinas/ bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis mdor bsdus te gsungasashing/ rnam par ma bya ba 'di'i ni de'i rgyus par 'tshal bar 'gyur bar rgyas par bshad du
gsol/ shes ldan su la 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las
dgongs te gsungs/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin lan thob cig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe khyod la no'u 'am/ zhishu rtsa
lnga lon par gyur pa na/ na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab ba/ skra gnag pa/ nyams rtsa la bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang/ da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste/ tshe 'am/ kha dgo gam
stobs sam/ rangang gas sam (srid du ram/ sdoms su mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong ngam/ kyi yul 'khor skyong gang gi tshe bdag lo nyi shu 'am/ lo 'phye'u rtsa lnga lon bar
gyur ba na/ na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu la nga tsho la bab pa// sgra gnag pa/ zhams rtsa la bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang/ nga ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste/ tshe 'am kha go
gamaM stobs sam/ shugs sam/ srid du 'am/ sboms su 'am/ smra dngags su mnyam zhing mtshungs par ma mthong ste/da ni bdag na tshod kyis lo brgyadagu len pas rgas/
'khogs/ gtugs te/ bar 'ga' bdag 'jug pa dang/ langs pa yang gzhan gyis bya dgos so// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
ba dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa ma khyen cing gzigs pa des// 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de//
bdag gis shes/ mthong/ thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung// de la nibadag
rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te brjod do// gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni
rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs mad pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/ bdag la ni bu dang/ chung ma dang/ bran dang/ las bgyid pa dang/ bzhad gad pa dang/ smra mkhan dang/ khrus
mkhan dang/ 'dul sbyong mkhan dang/ glang po che la zhon pa dang/ rta rgya dang/ shing rta pa dang/ bshan thogs dang/ gzhu 'dzin ba dang/ 'dril bu dang/ go re long bgyid pa dang
bro gar len pa rnams dang/ rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag/ bdag gi gshad ma phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba dag mchis pa slar 'joms
par bgyid pa mchis na/ na byang gi ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba mad pas skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong
gis ci la dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal bo chen po'i ri'i phyir khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyi ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ rgyal po chen po da ltar byed la lus kyi gnod ba 'ga' mchis
gam kyi yul 'khor skyong bdag la mchis te da ltar rlung gi sa rgyab tu gnod de/ rgyal po chen go gang gi tshe rlung gis rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tsho/ bdag gi bu dang/ chung ma dang/ dran dang
las byed pa dang ( bzhad gad pa dang/ sgra mkhan dang/ khrus mkhan dang/ 'dul sbyong mkhan dang/ glang po che la zhan pa dang/ rta rkya dang/ shing rta ba dang/ bshan thogs dang/
gzhu 'dzin dang 'brol bu dang/ go ro long byed pa dang/ bro gar len pa dang/ rgyal po'i bu dbur ba/ rtul phod pa// ba tu gnon tshon po ma chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa
tshu bdag la skyes shing byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa/ tsha ba mi bzod pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams tshoms shig ces bgyis na 'grub bam/ kyi yul 'khor skyong ma
lags so/ gang gi tshe rlung gis bodag gi rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tsho/ bdag gi bu dang/ chung ma dang/ bran dang/ las bgyid pa dang/ bzhad gad pa dang/ sgra mkhan dang/
khros mkhan dang/ 'dul sbyong mkhan dang/ glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang/ rta rgya dang/ shing rta pa dang/ bshan thogs dang/ gzhu 'dzin dang/ 'drol/
bu rang/ go ri long bgyid pa dang/ bro gar len pa dang/ rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul bod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur/ bdag la byung zhing
skyes ba'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsa ba pa/ mo mi bzad pa// yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub kyi/ de'i tshe bdag 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal drag
bo rtsa ba pa/ rmob mi bzod nga/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong ngo/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing
gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas/ 'jig rtan 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med de skyabs med pa yin no zhang gsungs pa de/ bdag gis shes/ mthong/ thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu
bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang ngag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste 2 de lan bdag rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod
pa de la/ bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no
zhes gsungs pa/ kyi yul 'khor skyong bdag cag la bu dang/ chung ma dang/ bran dang/ las bgyid ba dang zhes bya ba nas/ rgyal po'i bu rnams mchis te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
du'o gang dag bdag mchin rjes bzhin 'bring la/ 'greng na 'agleng ba dang/ nyal na zhugs tshe bgyid pa dag mchis na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni
thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ni las dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod

kyis ji ltar brjod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam dusems/ gangagi choskye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod nga/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po 'i yid
du mi 'ong ba// 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste// 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'dris bar gyur pa de'i tsho pa dag gi bu dang/ chung ma dang/ bran dang/ las byed pa zhes bya ba
nas rgyal po 'i bu dag tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang dag 'jig rtan 'din 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyi ba zhin shog cig ces bgyis na 'grub bam/ kyi yul 'khor skyong ma
lags so// kyi yul 'a khor skyong gang gi tshe skyo bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba// 'jig rten
thams cad kyi thun mong 'dilta ste/ 'chib zhes bya ba'i tshes de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang/ chung ma dang/ bran dang/ las bgyid pa rnams dang
zhes bya ba nas/ rgyal bo'i bu'i bar gang dag yin ba nur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// bdag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'chi ba'i phyi bzhin shog cig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub ste/
bdag 'ba' zhig 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ rgyal bo chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing/
gzigs pa des// 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ bdag gis shes/ mthong/ thos
rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bgrod do// shes ldan
yul 'khor skyong gang la 'angs te bzod pa de la/ bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang yang 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing
srid pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/ kyi yul 'khor skyong bdag sgra ngan rgyas pa 'di 'di la yongs su spyod cing/ btsun mo mang po dang/ mdzod dang
bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su longs spyod na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shesapashing sred pas bkol pas chog mi shes pa
yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ 'anyis ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ni las dgongs te gsungs rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar brjod pa de bzhin
du lan thob cig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod 'di na sgra ngan rgyus pa la yongs su spyod cing/ btsun mo mang po dang/ mdzod dang/ bang mdzod
rgyas pa la yongs su spyod pa las/ shar phyogs nas ma yid gcugs pa// yid ches ba brtan po/ 'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas// de la 'di skad ces/ lha
bdag shar phyogs nas 'dir mchi ba na/ de na bdag girdzong 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ la legs pa skya bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dag cig mthong ste/
lha ljongs de dga' di lta bu'i dpung dang/ 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang/ 'di lta bu'i bzhen pa sa dra ma drangs te gzhom pa dang/ choms nas rnal du dgod par rung ngo zhes smra na/ rgyal
bo chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod yul der dra mi drang zhing/ drangs nas bcom ste rnal du 'god dam/ khyod ljongs de dag 'dod dam/ kyi yul 'khor skyong gal te bdag gis lcengag
dedag/ 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang/ 'di lta bu'i dbung dang/ 'di lta bu'i gzhen pa// dra ma drang drang ba dang dra ma dras nas choms pa dang/ bcom nas/
rnal du dgod du rung ba shesan/ ljongs de dag tu dra ma drangs zhing/ dra ma drangs nas bcom la/ bcomanas rnal du 'god do// bdag ljongs de dag kyang 'tshol la/
'dul ba gzhi//bam po sum cu lnga pa// rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ de las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ngoms meshesangashing byed pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ bdag gis shes//
mthong/ thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te brjod do//
shes ldan yul 'khor skyong khyod gang la rangs te brjod pa de la/ bdag kyang rangs te brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de skad ces smras nas/ gnas brtan
dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// 'jig rten dag na nor dang ldan pa'i mi// de dag chags dang bcas pas sogs byed cing// nor rnams rnyed nas gtong
bar mi byed la// phyir zhing 'dod pa don du gnyer ba mthong// mi dbang rgya mtsho mtha' yis gtugs pa'i sa// thag bcug bcom ste cham du phab nas ni// rgya mtsho tshun chad
kyis kyang mi chog ste// chags pas pha rol don du gnyer bar 'bad// mi dbang de bzhin mi gzhan mang bo dag/ yongs su gzung la ngoms pa yod min pas// chog mi shes
pas rang gi lus bor te// srod dang ma bral bar ni 'chi bar 'gyur// srog ni ther zug ma yin tshe thung ste// dga' bas gzir ba la ni skyabs yod min// 'chi ba na ni nor rjes
'brang mi 'gyur// zhe du ma yin grogs min du ma yin// spyan dang sring mo de bzhin grogs kun dang// snying du sdug pa'i tshogs 'di 'dus nas ni// kye ma kyi hud 'di ni kharag
gyur ces// sgra bshig mchi ma can gyi gdong gi ngu// don ras kyis dkris te phyung nas nii// mo spyar nas nad rjes srog par byed// rang gi las kyi sems can de khrid nas//
de yi nor rnams bgo skal spyod pas phrogs// 'di ni skye ba na yang gcig pu skya// 'chi ba na yang gcig pu 'chi 'gyur zhing// gcig pus sdug bsngal nyams su 'di'i myong 'gyur//
skye bo 'khor bar grogs yod ma yin no// phyug po 'am yong na bkren pa 'am brtan po 'am// bus pa de bzhin gzhis kas reg myong nas// brtan po de yis nams kyang
@#// g.yogs mi 'gyur// bus pa bus pa yin phyir rtag tu g.yo// blo chung mi mkhas rjes su glob byed cing// de nas las rnams gsum po byed 'gyur shing//
mngal dang 'jig rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur// khon dang rjes 'brel sdug bsngal las mi 'grol// shes rab nor rnams kun gyi mchog tu gsungs// de yis bdag nyid shes pas
bdag nyid rig/ srid dang srid min bdag 'di ma gtogs pas// blun po sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa yin// phran tshegs thabs sam yang na chos min pa 'am// mthu yis gzhan
rag las ni gang 'phrog pa// zhes byas las byed 'khor ba la brten nas/ 1 nying tor brgyud pas grol bar 'gyur ma yin// ji ltar rkun po khyim 'bigs bzung nas ni// sdig
pa'i las can rang gi las kyis bcom// de bzhin skye dgu zhes byed 'di dang ni// 'jig rten pha rol rang gi las kyis bcom// shing las/shing thog bzhin du mi rnams ni// gzhon
dang bar ma rgan po rnams kyang khyung// 'dod pa sna tshogs sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ rang bzhin de lta bu yis sems rab 'jogs// 'dod pa rnams kyis 'di 'ching chags par 'gyur//
! 'dod pa yod na khon dang 'jigs pa skye// de ltas rgyal po 'di nas rab byung ste// dge sbyong nyid ni nyams pa med mchog yin// de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong
gis smas pa la mngon par dga' ste/ yi rangs nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo/// bcom ldan 'das glang po che'i grong rdal du phyogs
ba dang/ bram ze zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom
grang gis brgyan pa// 'od gzer nyi stong bas lhag po/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang pa de/ rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
kyi spyan snga ra song nas/ tshigs su bcad pas bstod par brtsams pa/ gser gyi mdog can mag tu sdug pa dang// dga' ba'i 'byung gnas yon tan kun dang ldan// mi 'dul
kha lo sbyar ba lha yi lha// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol byon pa lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
'dzum po mdzad pa na zhes bya ba nas/ mdzod spur nub par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar ba
byas nas zhus pa// kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi// zhes bya ba nas/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kun dga' bo
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram zes de bzhin
gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa gang yin pa ma glong ngag/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/
'on kyang lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang/ skyu gnas phyi ma dang/ lus phyi ma dang/ bdag gi ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la/ rang sangs
skye rgyas bstod 'os zhes bya bar 'gyur go// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas 2 the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bram ze 'dis
bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dge slong dag da lta 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nga la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas grong mchog lnga byin pa de legs par rab tu
nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba// 'byor pa dang/ rgyus de dang/ bde ba dang/
la lags ba skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang po la rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ de lhag par snyan dngags la dga' bar gyur to// wA ra NA si na bram ze snyan dngags mkhan gzhan zhig yod
bde la/ bram ze mos smras pa/ bram ze grang ba'i dus la bab kyis/ rgyal po de'i spyan sngar song la/ rjes su mthun pa 'i legs par smra ba 'ga' byas dang/ gal te na grang
ba'i skyabs cung zad thob par 'gyur// de song ba las/ ji tsam na rgyal po glang po che la zhon nas byung ngo// bram ze des bsams pa// ci bdag gis rgyal po la bstod dam/ 'on ta glang
po tsho dam pa la snyam pa la/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ glang po che dam pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin la/ rgyal bo lani khyad par du yin pas/ ra zhig glang po ni
dam pa mno par bstod par byu'o snyam nas/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa// sa srungs bu yi lus kyisha tshugs ltar// mtshan mchog ldan pa'i gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// mdog
dang tshad kyis lus kyi gzugs legs pa// glang chen dbang po bkrashis rab tu bsngags// de nas rgyal bo mngon par dga' nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa// kho bo'i glang chen sdug/
cing yid 'ong ba// mi rnams mig 'brog dga' ba skyed pa gang// de la khyod kyis bstod pa'i tshig smras kyis// khyod la grong ga mchog nilnga sbyin no// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gling
po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis
bstod pas/ ngas 'di la grong mchog lnga byin no// de ltar yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas// ngas yang 'di rang byang nub tu lung bstan to//
grongakhyer chen por gshegs nas/ grong khyer chen po ra sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o// yul srug nar gshegs pa dang/ yul srug nar brom
ze dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs dang/ lang tshodang/ thos pas rgyags par gyur nas/ bdag dang 'dra bar ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes sgrogs shing rnam par sgrogs
so bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te chos 'chad do// bram ze dbang po zhu sa bya bas dge sbyong go'u
ta na yul srug nang byon no zhes smras nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhes thos kyis ( ci bdag
las lhag pa'i gzugs bzang ba yin nam 'on ta ma yin/ ltor 'gro'o snyam nas da byung ba dang/ ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kun
00 nas brgyan pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus mdzes pa ra byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa// 'od gzer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa// rin po che'i ra ba 'gro ba ltar kun nas
po brang po mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dag sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ bdag pas gzugs lhag par bzang mod kyi/ tshad ni lhag pa'i ring ba ni ma yin no snyam
nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug tor blta bar brtsams pa dang/ ji tsam na ma mthong nas/ de phyogs shin tu mtho ba zhig la 'dzegs na/ 'on kyang ma mthong ngo/ 'das
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram zo dbang po la bka' stsal pa// bram ze non mongs kyis thong zhig/ gal te ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzegs te bltas kyang/ 'on kyang chos nyon mongs su zad
kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang khyod kyis lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro bas// sangs rgyas bstom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug
tor mi mthong ngo zhes ma thos sam 'on kyang gal te de bzhin grashegs pa'i sku tshad mthong bar 'dod na khyod kyis khyim na mi'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i 'og na de tsan dan sa mchog
las byas pa'i mchod sdong nyid yod kyis/ de phyung la gzhol cig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa yab dang yum las 'khrungs ba'i sku'i tshad ni de yin no// bram ze dbang pos bsags
ra de yang ngomatshar zhig ste/ bdag gis lan 'ga' yang ma thos na song ste blta'o snyam nas/ de ring sa pa rings par song nas ma'i spyin sreg byed pa'i thub kyi
'og tu brko bar brtsams pa las/ de thams cad du de bzhin du gyur to// de mngon bar dad par gyur nus bsams pa// dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni gdon mi tra bar thams cad mkhyen pa
yin byas// song la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/ de dad pa rgyus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga'
bar 'gyur ba dang/ yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/
khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'dzig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo 'dre'u mtho ba yashes kyi rdo rjes btsos nas/ rgyun tu
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas smras pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang/
chos dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis// bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad dzisrid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon
par dad lags so// de nas bram ze dbang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang// bdag gis tsan dan sa mchog gi mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams la gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
bram ze gnang gis so nga la shems shig/ de nas des sa phyogs dben pa ska ba yod pa zhig tu/ rim gro chen pos mchod sdod de bsgrung nas dus ma 'od chen po bshams so// bram ze dang
khyim bradag gzhan dag gis kyang rten dge bar gyur cig ces bya bar rig nas/ rtswa ku shas btags te bram ze dbang pos mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams pas na/ dbang po'i dus
mchod ces bya bar grags so// gang gi tsho ba com ldan 'das kyis menyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas/ mu stags can rnams ni spu bkong/ lha dang mi rnams ni dga'
bar mdzad/ skye bo dam pa rnams ni yi rangs par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams bros nas mtha' 'khob tu gnas pashing/ kha cig ni bram ze'i grong zhes bya bar dong nas gnas so//
de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ bram ze'i grong du gshegs so// mu stegs can rnams kyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ong ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rings nga
rings par bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du dong ste lcags nas smras pa// chos thob par gyur cig/ chos thob bar gyur cig/ de rnams kyis smras na/ 'phags
po dgad ci zhig/ kho bo cag gis khyed kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni mthong gas/ ji srid rgud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'gro bar bya'o// de rnams kyis smras pa// 'phags pa dag bdag
cag gi rgud pa gang lags/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang/ spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing 'ong ste/ bu dang bcas pa du ma bu med par byed par 'gyur
ro/de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe kho nas bzhugs shing grogs bgyi ba la grug pa de kho na'i tshe bzhud pa ni bzang po ma lags te/ bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du ma
rung go de rnams kyis smras ba/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te dag sbyong go'u ta ma gsan nan 'khod par bya'o// bzhugs shig gsad par bgyi'o zhas/ de rnams lag na dbyug pa
kaM dang gzhu thogs te/ khu tshur bcangs/ go bgos te byung ba dang/ lam gyi dbus na shAkya rgan po zhig 'dug pas mthong nas smras pa// shes ldan dag gang du 'dong/ de rnams kyis smras
! pa dgra gsod pa'i phyir ro// khyed cag gi dgra su yin/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'o// shes ldan dag gal te bcom ldan 'das dgra yin na/ byams pa gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ shes ldan dag
slar log cig/ de rnams ldeg tu ma btub pa dang/ des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni chos bshad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du pha rol gnon pa zhig bya'o snyam nas//
des ri brags su zhugs nas ma btang ba dang/ ri brags kun tshigs su co dang ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas spangs te smras pa// shes ldan dag bdag cag dang dag sbyong
go'u tan ni thag ring po kho na yin gyis/ ri brags 'dir ni lung ba chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brags bsrogs kyis/ gsad kyis slar ldog go zhes de rnams kyis gsad par brtsams pa dang/
gsad par ma nus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du byon nas bka' stsal po/ gnas 'jog dag 'di ni byed/ bcom ldan 'das ri brags rnams zhugs kyis tshig na/ dgum pa lu dro
ma thogs lags so// dus gsad dam/ bcom ldan 'das dgum du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung phyung ma thag kho nar/ 'di ltar yang sangs rgyas rnam sa kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang
lha rnams lta'i mthus mo de zhi bar gyur to// de rnams mngon par dad par gyur nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig gi slad du gshegs lags/ khyed cag kho na rjes su gzung ba'i
phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes byab nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba yo
shes kyi rdo rje s bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs ra'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong rnams tho tshom skyes nas/ the tshom
tsha thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa shAkyi rgan po 'dis nye du la chags pas/ bsod nams ma lags pa mang du bsags te/ ri brags
bsregs pa la gzigs// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag de ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang gnyen la chags pas// bsod/
nams ma yin pa mang du bsags te/ rigs brags bsregs pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brag sapashig na spre'u lnga brgya'i
tshogs gnas pas/ lo tog skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gzan to// ra brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa// shes ldan dag spro'u rnams
kyis lo tog la gnod par byed na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa spre'u rnams gsad mod/ de rnams ji ltar gsad par bya/ ri brags kyi ni 'khor
gyi shing thams cad bcad de/ shing tun tu ka ga cig pu zhig bzhag la/ chu 'khor rnams tshor mas bskor btang/ de la bza' ba'i phyir spre'u rnams 'phrog par 'gyur/ de ltar
gyur tang der de rnams ga sad par bya'o// de nas de rnams kyis ri brags kyi nye 'khor gyi shing thams cad ba cad de/ shang tin tu ka gcig pu bzhug nas nye 'khor rnams tsher ma'i ra/
bas bskor te/ srungs ma pa'i mi gzhag nas bsgo ba khyed kyis gang gi tshe spre'u rnams rtogs par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo cag la sbron cig/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na shing tin tu ka'i
me tog dang 'bras bu chags te smin pa dang/ spre'u rnams kyis sde dbon la smras pa// sde dpon shing tin tu ka smin cing mchis kyis gsol du gshegs so// de nas snga dpon 'khor lnga brgya
drung shing tin tu ka de la 'dzegs te/ shing rteni tu ka la bza' bar brtsams so// de nas srungs ma'i mis/ ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/ shes ldan dag shing
tun tu ka la spre'u thams cad 'dzegs nas za bar byed kyis/ khyed cag gi bya ba 'am/ byed pa gang yin pa de gyis shig/ de nas ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lag na mda' gzhu dngawa
sta thogs/ khu tshur bcangs te rings par song nas/ shing tan tuka bcad par brtsams pa dang/ de nas spre'u de rnams bred de mchong rgal shang kha phan tshun rgyu bar byed do//
@#// sde dpon ni sems las chung ngus za bar byed pa dang/ spre'u de rnams kyis de la smras pa sde dbon bdag cag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga ba thob cing mnis te phan tshun

du rgyu lags na/ khyod ci'i slad du thugs khral chung dus bzhugs// dres tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bye ba mang ngo 'i mi rnams la// bya ba min pa'i ng de dang 'dra// shing gi 'phro ni mang yod pas//
ga nas las bskyangs te bza' bar gyis ga de nas yang sde dpon gyi phrug gu zhig ri dwags de na bcings te 'dug pa de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang/
ji tsam na spre'u bzang po zhig phyogs der 'ongs pa dang/ de sams khongs su chud pa mthong nas snus pa/ grogs po ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud/
des smras pa/ da ltar 'i brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kho bo'i nye du gsod du dong/ ci'i phyir sa mas khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis pha rol
gnon pa ma byas/ bcings nu ji ltar pha rol gnon par byas/ kho bos khyod dgrol la zhas/ des de bkrol ba dang/ de nas dus ri brags der ma btang ste/ ri brags kun
ga pas ca co dang ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas sngangs te smras pa// shes ldan dag bdag cag dang spre'u rnams ni thag ring po kho na yin gyi/ phung ba chen po gzhan
'di byung ste ri brags bsregs kyis/ tshe gsad kyis slar ldog go zhes/ de rnams me gsad pa'i phyir brgyugs ba dang/ spre'u rnams kyang shang tin tu ka las babs nas bros so//
dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ spre'u'i phrug gu gang yin pa de ni/ shAkyi rgan po 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'dis na du la mgas pas ri dwags bsregs la/ de ltar
yang 'dis nye du la chagag pas ri brags lagrags so// nag 'i grong khyeradu gshegs nas/nag po'i grong khyer du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/
ro hi ta kar byon nas/ ro hi ta kar na gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyi gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe gnod sbyin glang chen stobs gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod spyin gyi mdun sar song
ba dang/ gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'adas bskyed par byon nas ro ha ta ka na/ bdag gi gnas kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas
kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu
'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stongs la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad chos/
dbye ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas rang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs stan las
langos nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ka ldan 'das de mod bdag gi gnas su bzhugs par gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas gnod spyin

glang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang lnga brgya sprul te/ stan mang tshangs chen dang/ sngas mgacan dang/ gor bu lnga brgya dang/ zhugs lang lnga brgya bshams so// de nas bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig na// stan las
langs te song nas/ de'i ne'u zla kha che yul gyi gnod sbyin sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba de la des bsgod/ kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyis///

a0 byang phyogs kyi 'bras bu rnams skur zhig ces/ des de kho na btang nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dgas gon byas nas/nang par sngar langs te gtsug lag khang/
chag chag dang phyag dar byas nas/ gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod bzha gnas / khang skyong gis gaN+Di brdungs pa dang/ gnod sbyin sgra sgrogs kyis rgun 'brum gyis skon pa bkang ste
gnod sbyin rnams kyi lag tu bskur te/ de dag gis gtsug lag khang gi dbus su rung por spungs te bzhag go/ dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu 'di dag ci'i yin pa drug/ ji ltar
brtag par bya ba mi shes nas []/ de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge sbyong dag byang phyogs kyi nags kyi 'bras bu rgyun
'brum zhes bya ste/ chos brtag pa byos la thim zhig/ dge slong rnams 'brum bu re re nas byed ba dang/ zhin tu yun ring du thogs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// phung bo gachis sam gsum du byosal ches leg pa'i byos shig/ de nas gnod sbyin glang chen skyobs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bad bar
bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza'ab dang ba tsa' bdag rang gi lag nas zhes bya ba nas/ snyan chos dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan
@#// pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i khar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ gang
dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdon las bzhengs ba dang/ rgan 'brum mang dulcag bar gyurag/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgun 'brum rnams mnyis la khu ba bram par bya'o// 'on kyang lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// po'adzar bya ste bzhag red/ dge 'dun
gyi dus ma yin pa'i btung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus nas/ gtsug lag khang du nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyi'i zhugs so//
lce de nas com ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ra na tshe thung ngu'i dus las byung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus la bab nagadul ba'i don bya ba ni rab tu mang bas/ gal te ra dag slong kun dga'
bo dar thabs cig tu/ khyad phyogs su gshegs na ni gdul ba rnams kyi don bya dAkaM' bar gyur gyis/ ma la nga gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang lhan cig ga shegs bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan
wA 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tutshigs su bcad po gnyis kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje bos pa/ dran dang ldan rnams bzang por shos// dran dang ldan rnams rtag tu bzang// zhi ba/
[p]ba pa'isoms kyis ni// dran dang ldan pa bde bar nyal// nadang ldan rnams bzang bor shog/ dran dang ldan rnams rtag tu bzang// rgyal dang pha rol rgyal spangs nas/ ]
dran dang ldan pa bde bar nyal// bar sngon la/ ngas pa can na sangs rgyas stobs// dechu ka na chos stobs te// sun dunan bor chen zhabs// mgo rog su blugs
sogs na med// yul klu dang de bzhin nAgs// gtade grogs drang srong nyams pa dang// kan tha 'bras kyi grong khyer du/ ] mchogagi ma 'dul dbang ldan rje// gsing ma gnod
sbyin chen bo dad// de bzhin brtsegs skyong dga' 'phel dang// srid pa'i lha dang gtum byed kyi/ bu bdun rnams ni btul pa dang// nod sbyin phyugs skyong 'gro mgyogs dang// rnal
so'i glu la gzugs brnyan btang// spyi btsan dang sbubs can btul// mdung can gyi nogrong khyer na// mdung can zhes bya'i gnod sbyinemo// 'dra 'go can dang rdul mchod rten// srog med
tshogs su bsdus te brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje tshur/ byang phyogs su klu sog ma medra 'dul
du'adongo de// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjobcom ldan 'das kyi lta mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'dis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu do
de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya da ring po kho na zhig na/ tshag sngo zhing rtogs pa skyes pa dag gakhrigs
so/ dag gis nas kyang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka'astsal pa// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshal sngo zhade sngo ba sbyangs pa dag mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// don u sha'i ra/
yin te/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na/ zhi gnas dang rjes su mthun pa rnams kyi gnas mal gyi mchog ta ma sa'i tshal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
'das sbyangs pa can du gshegs so// de'i tshe spungs pa can na gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs zhes bya ba 'dug pa sdig pa'i bsam pa can zhig gnas pasaM/ sbyangs pa can n gnas pa'i
skya bo'i tshogs kyis mgu bar byas kyang de dus dus su gnod pa byed do// spyas pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'dasalcangs pa can du gshegs nas phyogs che ge mo na bzhugs
so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song staphyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogasagacig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig
tsha/ chu 'dug pa dang/ spras pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la bcom ldan 'a das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i setam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/
yang dag par gzengs bstod pa mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang ma gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas sbyangs pa can n gnas pa'i skye bo'i
tshogs stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gag tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun pa gnod sbyinesas rgyas stobs 'debadag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas sha khon ma mchis 'anapesha khon bgyor/ 'gran zlag lags par ni 'gran zla bgyid ]rgyags ma btsal
bar ni glags tshol bar bgyid la so na/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bco bar bzung ste/ gnod sbyin sas rgyas stobs gdul bar gsol/ de'i tshaganod sbyin sangs
rgyus stobs 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug pa gyur nas/ da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas stobs khyod kyis
sasam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thos lags so/ sangs rgyas stobs khyod kyi thos sam/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis thos lags so// dam pa ma yi'i
ba'i chos sdage la de las log gi kham ldan 'das bdag log lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bas ba
pa'i che/zhi rnams la bzhag go/ de nas des spungs pa zhes bya pa'i kinas ma brtsigs so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis kyang yo byad
thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsi ges so// bcom ldan 'as ga shags pa dang/ gnod sbyin sas rgyas stobs zhabs 'bring du chas pa las/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis slar bzlog nas bka' stsal pa// skye bo'i tshogs 'di srungs shig/ ngas kyang nga yongs su myang n las 'das kyang tsa nas spyan ldangs te 'a bab par gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab par bya'o//
gzhan dag gis kyang phugs der mchod rten btsuges pas/ mchod rten sbyangs pa can zhes bya bar grags so// re tu kar byon nas/ ratu kar gnod sbyin chos stobs zhes bya ba btul te
des re tu ka zhes bya pa'i gnas mal brtsigs so// sin dur gshegs po dang/ sin dun mnyan pa gzhan zhig yod pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho'aphrul gyis dad pa bskyed
da de nas dad pa skyes nas bden pa rnams la bzhag go/ gnod sbyin phor chen btul nas zhabs gnyis kyis bcags pas/ phor chen zhabs kyis bcags pa zhes bya bar grags so//
de nas bcom ldan 'adas drang songanams kistagenas su gshegs/ der drang song mgo rog dang b.le ba spyi blugs can badzul nas/ bram zad r khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis gnas ma
li ba spyi blugs can zhes bya ba brtsi ges so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sun lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lagan rdo rje'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi ki nas
gang nAder 'dong ngo// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyaltar mnyanAto// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang/ klu'i rgyal bo sogs
med kyi gnas su gshegs so/ klu'i rgyal bo sogs med kyis bcom ldan 'das gnas su gshigs so zhes thosaso// thos nas kyang khros 'khrugs rnam/ ya ma rang so nas/ stong
gnam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ sarab dang rdul gyi chen 'bab par brtsams pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'khrus so zhes byams pa lasnyoms par zhugs pa dar
char pa de dag a ka'i phyi ma dad/ tam la'alo ma'i phyin Mgyuranas 'bab par brtsams so/ de nas 'khor lo dang rdordzortsa gcig kha dang/ mda' bo che dang/ mdung thung la sogs
te/ mtshon cha rnams dbab par bartsams pa de dag kyang/ lha'i yul dang/ rang dang/ ku mud dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ mnadar bar gyur nas 'bab par brtsams so/ de nas
sog ma med kyis khro bo'i mi duphu dbyung bar brtsams pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul rgyas dud par byung bar brtsams so// de nas de sgrus dang/ rgyugs pa dang/ nga rgyal bcom [H]
par gyur nas gnas su zhugs ta'agago khacom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ klu gdug pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba ni rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis te/ 'jigs pa
dang[0f10 ]'khrug pas yin gyis/ ma langs 'di 'jigs su gzhugago snyam du thugs su chung nas gnod ni lag na rdo rjel bka' stsal pa/ laganardo ku'i rgyal bo sos ma med
'jigs par gyis shig/ de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ rdorje'i rtse mo ga 'phas nas ri rtsa mo bshig ste lhung ba des/ klu'i rgyal po sog med kyi
gnas non par gyur to// de nas sog ma med snas/ skag/ 'phongs nas 'bros par brtsams pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma'i khams lasoms par zhugs nas/ phyogs thams
glu cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar te ma rtse gci'i tu gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na zhi zhinge bsal bar gyur pa ma gtogs par de gang dang gang du song ba
de dang da na ma mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan spyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la ma tho brtsam lag
sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rga ba'i chos can cingasamatho btsams sam/ gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'ad lta bu dag ma thob na/ khyod kyis ra mang lus par byas par 'gyur
ba0 ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag 'khor lo dang/ bkra shis dad/ g.yu drung 'khyil ba dang/ dra bas 'brel ba/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/ 'jigs pa
rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pasasu reg pa mdzad nas bka' stsal kha/ bzhan pazangs khyod kyis bum pa bzang po lhabu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi zas byon te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
nom pa dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba las/ khyod kyis smon lam log par btab pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes te/ rtag pa dang gsodra ba la zhen cing pha rol gyi srog 'phrog pa dang/ pha rol gyi srog
laganod par byed pas 'tsholor byed na 'di nas shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba ma gtogs par khyod kyi 'gro ba ni gang zhig yin/ skye ba ni gang zhige ni tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig yani/
bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/ bzhan bangs tshul da las skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams zung la/ yul ma ga d+han gnas pa'i skye bo'i
tshogs lam 'jigs pa byon// btsun pa bdag deng sunachad bcom ldan 'das kyi man sngar skyabs su mchib par/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos nas/ yul ma ga rlan gnas
pa ba gyi lo tshogs la yang ma 'jigs pa stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas re'i chungam rar/ bu mo dang/ mna' ma rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge
slong gAreg 'dun kho bdag ]cas/kyang skyabs su mchizhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams nor 'khas so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la skyabs su 'gro ba dad/ bslab
kyi pa'i gzhi rnams byon no/ de'i bu ra bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang skyabs su mchib rung/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang skyabs su mchi ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams
nod lags so// sog ma med kyis gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnamA ni mi mdza' ra mang ba lags kyis// ri bo la skyabs su mas ba sul zhing/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mi
dbog par gsol/ 'dis bdag tsag bsrungs par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la skyabs su 'gro ba byin no// donas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes/ sogam mad grogs
bodang ga nyana'adab dang/ mdza' bshes rnams btul bar gyur pa mthong nas/ yid rab tu dga' pas gar byas to smas pa// khros pas rtse bskyod mgo mang bskul nas mtshon cha'i
'a bor la 'babs// rangags skyes bu rang la phyogs pa ri tho rtsa lta bu// du ma'atshogs lags ngal chad dbugs brdzangasagezur tsang lta byed pa// sbrul bdag sog ma med de drang srong
bka' btsan rnams kyis btul// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sog ma med kha lo drug khri dang bcas pa btul nas/ gdan las bzhes tegshegs po dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
tshal sngo zhing sngo ba smras pa dag gziges so gzigs nas kyang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rdzol bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbes pa dag mthong ngam/ btsun pa
mthong lags so// lag na rdo rje de ni kha che'i yul yin te/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon nas/ dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa dge slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya
ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des klu gdug pa chu lu du btul nas thabs bshams te/ rdo las skyil mo krungashong ba'i sa mungs nas kha che' yul kun tu bstan pa 'jog par 'gyur ro// ja' lhag
mthong dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas mal gyi nang na 'di lta ste/ kha che'i yul mchog tu 'gyur te/ grong rdal drug khri dang/ grong rdal drug stong dang/ grong rdal drug cu rtsa gsum po 'di rnams
kha che'i yul yin no// yulaganyid grogs su rung gro pa dang/ gnod sbyin nyams pa 'khor dang bcas pa btul lo// yul kan than gnod sbyin mo 'khor dang bcas pa btul lo//
'bras kyi grong khyer du byon nas/ 'bras kyi grong khyer du rgyal bo bde mchog gi ma bden pa rnams la rab tu bzhag go/ yul dbang ldan du byon no// dbang ldan n rdza mkhan gzhan zhig yod pa de
bzos shan tsu rgyags te/ snod rnams bskams nas 'khor lo las 'gogs par byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul pa'i dus mkhyon nas/ rdzo mkhan gyi cha byad du nyid mngon par sbal to/
de dang lhan cig gtam bya bar brtsams pa/ khyod kyis skor ci 'dral dag cig 'khor lo las 'bebs par byed/ des gsol pa// bskams nas 'babs so// nga yang
skams nas 'babs sa// khyod dang bdag mnyam lags so// 'ad kho nar zad dum ci/ nga naso btang nas kyang 'bebs so// khyod lhag go/ so gtong ba 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad do//
khon ci zhi na/ gsar dang/ dngul dang/ si khru rgya dang/ shel gyi rang bzhin du yang byed do// de mngon par dad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdza mkhan gyi cha byad ma
snang bar mdzad de/ rang bzhin gyi mkhyad du zhugs nas/ do 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas te brtan pa rnams la rab tu bkod do// gsang ma can du gshegs nas/ gsang ma can du gnod
sbyin chen po 'khor dang bcas pa skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bzhag go/ brtse gas skyong du klu ba lang skyong dang/ dgarab gnyis so// dga' 'phel du gshegs
nas/ dga' 'phel du rgyal po srid pa klu 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ gtum byed kyi bu bdun dang/ gnod sbyin sa 'tsho bden pa dag la rab tu bkod do// de nas mtsho chen
po yod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis klu'i skye gnas su skyes te/ lo bcu gnyis 'das shing stong du byung ste 'khrugs pas 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis
00 bdag cag la chos ma bshad pas/ des na bdag cag rnam par ltang ba klu'i skye gnas su skyes kyis/ ci nas kyang bdag cag gas de'i bstan pa gzhag par bya'o zhes sus so// de nas
bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ glu 'gro mgyogs dang ba so ni 'di ltar mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas nga'i bstan pa thal bar brlag par
'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yong do snyam du mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das klu 'gro mgyogs dang nang so gnyis ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ 'gro mgyogs dang nang so kas la
bka'asu la pa// 'gro mgyogs dang nab so tsheg bzha pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba yod pa bshad kyis shes par byos shig dbatsun pa bdag cag dam pa'i chos 'tshal bar bgyid pa
su zhig mchis snyam du ragi nas de nyid du slar zhugs te// de gnyis ba de snyam du sams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la chos bshad na/ bdag cag gis rnam par ma shes so snyam
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs der sku'i gzugs brnyan btang nas/ 'gro mgyogs dang nab sogs kyis de la bltas shing bltas shing 2 bcom ldan 'das da dung bzhugs pa
lta zhes slar yang dang yang du zhugs so// phyogs de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin mo slu bu can dang sbubs can gnyis btul lo// mdung can gyi grong khyer du gshegs so/
[j]@#// mdung can gyi grong khyer na gnod sbyin mo mdung can zhes bya ba khro zhing gtum la ga zu lum can zhig gnas pas/ mdung can gyi grong gi bram zed dang khyim bdag rnams kyi bu
btsas shing btsazhig rag za bar byed do// mdung can gyi gro khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das mdung can gyi klong khyer du gshegs nas/ phyogs che ge mo na/
bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang tshogs nasatshogs dang/ khyu nas phyur phrad cing 'dus nas/ mdung can gyi grong khyer nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhag
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu'adug pa dang []bcom ldan 'das kyis mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi
bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par ragadama' par mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas
mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom
ny+nyo ]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// snya'adul ba gzhi klubam po so drug pa// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang
0 bdag cag gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed rgyu bar rig nas/ zhes bya
ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gser gyi bya ma bum blas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol pa gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang
gnod sbyin gdug pa de rang de rnams ni brtul lags na/ btsun pa gnod sbyinemo mdung can zhes bgyi ba 'a de bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas sha khon ma mchis pa sha khon du bgyid/ 'gran zla
ma lags par ni 'gran zla bgyid/ glags ma btsal ba na glags tshol par brgyud de/il btsas gangelatsas pa rnams bsreg par bgyid lags na/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bar
shu bar gzung ste/ gnod sbyin mo mang can gdul bar gsol/ de'i tshiganod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// gnod
sbyin mo mdung can la bka' stsalal/ mdung can khyod kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thos lags so// mdung can khyod kyis thos sam/ bde bar gshegs pa
bdag gis thos lags so// dam pa ma yin ba'i chos sdig pa de las log pa'i// btsun pa dam zhig bcas te/ gal te 'di dag bdag gi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig par bgyid na bdag ldog
par brgyago/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la bka' stsal pa// bram ze dang khyim bdag khyod kyis
thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das thos lags so// khyed cag rgyas jiltar bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan 'das brtsigs lags so// bde bar gshegs pa brtsi ga lags so// de nas bcom
ldan 'dus kyis gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor dang bcas pa btul nas gshegs so/ 'bra 'go can du gshegs pa dang/ 'bra 'go can na byas pa chung ngu dag cig rdul gyi
mchod rtenal rtsa bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa chung ngu dug rdul gyi mchod na la rtse par gatrigs so// gzo'i sa nas kyang/ yang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal
pa/ lagan rdo rje khyod kyis byas pa chung ngu rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse ba dag mthong ngam btsun pa mthong lags so// lag na rdo rje da yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bzhi brgya lon pa na/
'dir ku sha na'i rags kyi rgyal po ka nis ka zhes bya ba 'byungabar 'gyur ba des/ phyogs 'di'i mchod rten brtsig par 'gyur te/ pa' mong kanas ka'i mchod rten zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing//
nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang/ sangs rgyas kyi phyi ba phyed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro ti nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du srog chags sa ya
[z/]phrag bdun dang/ 'bum phrag bdun btul nas/ ro hi ta kar gshegs te kag lag khang du zhugs nas/ nang du yang dag bzhag go bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag
'jog las bzhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo dang po'i rgyal srid gang na bar 'dong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar na 'di skad ces/ kun dga' bo bya phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo// byang phyogs nan
phan yon rnam pa lnga yod do zhes gsungs la/ da bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ kun dga' bo dang po'i rgyal srid gang na ba der 'dong ngo zhes gsungs na/ de ji lta bu lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo nga gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang thabs tsag tu byang phyogs su gshegs nas/ te ma sa'i tshal rnams lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/
rdul gyi mchod rten lung bstan to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// kun dga' bo ro hi te ka nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pas/ srog chags sa ya
phrag bdun dang/ 'bum phrag bdun btul lo// byang phyogs na ni nyes dmigs lnga yod do// mtho dman can dang/ sdong dum dang/ tshor mas gang ba dang/ rdo ba dang/ gseg
ma dang/ rgya misongab dang/ gyiza ba dang/ bud med gnas ngan len kun tu spyod bgo// sdom la/ dad po'i rgyal srid rta bzangs dang//
bcom lam dang ni o ta la// kun dga' ra ba dag tha'o dang// tshugs par dga' dang ga 'i chu// yi dgas dus dpog khyim yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul dpa' sde nas
ljongs sgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ dang po'i rgyal srid du gshegs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'di'i rgyal/
po mang pos bkur ba/ dang por rgyal gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur b.ren dang po'i rgyu la po yin no// de'i phyir 'di dang po'i rgyal srid ces bya bar grags so// rta bzangs su gshegs
nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'astsal pa// kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang bos bkur pa'i rta bzang po rin po che byung ste/ do'i
phyir 'di rta bzas zhes bya bar grags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo bcom brlags gang na ba der 'dong ngo// btsun pa
N+NaM bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po 'on
zhig na/ tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbes pa lag mthong ngam//
btsun pa mthong lags so/ kun dga' po de nar po rtsa mthon zhes bya// nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na/ bcom brlag nas mar mkhan dang dpa' bo zhes bya ba na
gnyis kyis/ de 'gatsug lag khang brtsig par 'gyur te/ de'i ming gar mkhan dpa' bo zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing/ lhag mthong dang zhi gnas kyi rjes su mthun pa'i gnas mal rnams
kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bcom brlag 'dir sos 'tshong gi khye'u spyas pa zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur to/ 'i bu nyes sbas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi mtshan med pa zhig byung ba de/ nga
khongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya len pa na/ bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sangs rgyas kyi byapa byed par 'gyur ro// dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa rima'i gung zhes bya bas ste/
sbas de rab tu 'byin par 'gyur te/ gdams ngag ston pa rnams kyi khyim ni sbas yin par 'gyur ro// gar mkhan dba' bo de la thug srid du khru bco brgyad ra/ zheng du khru bcu gnyis pa/
'phangs du khru bdun pa zhig yod par 'gyur te/ dos gang dang gang dag la gdams ngag stan nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas pa de dang de rnams kyis/ thur ma sor bzhi tsam pa
par phug de'i nang du 'dor bar 'gyur// gang gi tshe phug de dgra bcom pa'i thur mas gang bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ nyams yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te/
de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dgra bcom pa'i thur ma redag nyid sbyangs nas/ de rnams kyis srag par byed do// dge slong rnams thatshom skyes nas/ thatshom thams cad/
gcod pa sangs rgyas btsom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa na skye bo mang po la snying brtse ba/ tshe dang ldan pa nyams lung bstan pa la gzigs/bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag slong dag de'i tsher ma zad/ ji ltar 'di 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do//

dge slong dag sngon byung bar bo tsa mthon po 'di nyid kyi ngos gsum la rang sangs rgyas dang/ drang srong dang/ spyi rnams gnas te/ tshes gcig na ni rang sangs rgyus lnga brgyago kha sa pa lan drang srong lnga

brgya'o gsum pa la ni sgrolnga brgya'o//sloburtswa dpon gyi kun tu spyod pa ni smra ba'i phrug gu btsas ba'i btsas pa dag gsod par byed pa yin no// de nas snga mo de dag phrugachu'i mya nganagyis non pas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams
ba d+ha shes ldan mo dag nyon cig bdag cag gi phrug gu btsas shing btsas pa dag sde dpon 'dis gsod par byed de la thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ bdag cag las snga mo gang zhige sbrum par gyur na/
des sde dpon la brjod par ma bya'o/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na snga mo zhigi sprum par gyur nas// ri de rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs[]shag tu sbas nas/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bus stod de sprulu'i phrug gu/

khyung nas/ de yang de rnams kyis dpon pa'i phyogs shig tu bsnun gsos bskyod de/ de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tsho/ des sde dpon de rang gyi khyu nas bsar nas/ ri bo rtse mthon na phan tshun du
'khyams par brtsams so// de 'khyam pa na rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgra thos nas/ de de rnams kyi drung du song ste/ gang gi tshe bag phepas par gnas par gyur pa de'i tsho/ da rnams la rtsa ba dang/
lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang so shing dag 'bul bar byed do// de rnams kyis kyang de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma rig 'dod par byed do// rang sangs rgyus de rnams kyi kun tu
spyod pa ni zos shing thos nas skyol mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ spre'u des kyang de rnams kyi spyod lam mthong nas/ skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs
rgyus de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi lus rnag can 'das thob par bya ba gang yaneb ni thob zin gyis/ bdag cag gisamya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyanges su 'jug go snyam nas//
da nas de rnams 'bar ba dang/ gsal ba dang/ char 'bebs pa dang/ glog 'byin pa'i tsho 'phrul dag byas nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
[z]u@#// yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de rnams ldang ba'i dus gang yin pa de'atshem ldang nas/ sde'u des de rnams ma mthong bas ma rega' gyur to// ji tsam
na spre'u de phug tu zhugs nas/ rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyi chos gos rnams nas gsag par brtsamasaso// de nas phug dan gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sams te/ spre'u
'as rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku bshig na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ rdo'i la chen pos sgo bcad nas 'dug go/ de nas spre'u de mya ngan dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ skye sngags bton te songo nas/
ri bo rtsom mthon la kun nas 'khyam pan/ mi rnams 'dod pas ma dga' bar gyur te/ rna ba gtod cing mi'i sgra thos par 'dod pa las/ des drang srong de rnams sa la'i sgra dag thos nas/
de 'gron pa lam stor ba bzhin du ringes pa ris pa de rnams kyi drung du song ngo// drang srong de dag kyang daka' thub drag pos gdung bar byed do// kha cig ni lag pa bsgrod nas 'dug go/ kha cig ni
rkangar yagatsage gos so// kha cige ni gdung pa lngas gdung bar byed do// gang gi tshe spre'u dang rnams dang lhan cig bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ drang srong de rnams la rtswa pa/
tsan+d+he dang lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ so shing dag sbyin par byed do// de rnams kyang del zas kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do// des de rnams kyi spyod lam dkrugs
shing/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam ston par byed de/ don gang dag lag pa bsgreng ba de rnams kyi lag pa dag phalo nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste spran nas/ mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/
gang dag rkang pa ya gcig pa de rnams kyi rkang pa phab nas mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ gang dag gang pa lngas gdung bar byed pa de rnams kyi ma bsad nas sa gol gyi sgra phyung ste/
mdun du skyol mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ de nas drang srong do rnams kyis gdams ngag 'bogs pa la smras nga/ mkhan po skye ru 'di bdag cag gi dka' thub la bar chad bgyid de yis de
rnams kyis de la rgyas par smras pa dang/ des sbas pa/ shes ldan dgaspre'u de dag ni dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ gdon mi za bar 'dis drang srongakha ge gi spyod lam de lta bu mthong gis/
khyad tsag gis kyang skyil mo krung chos la 'dug cig dro rnams kyis skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang/ de rnams kyi sngon gyi dag pa'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur nas/ de rnams kyis mkhan po dang
slob dpon med pa'i shes pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang mthun pa'i chos bskyod nas rang byung chub mngon sum du byas so/ de nas de rnams sder de la chos las byung pa'i
dad pa skyes nas/ de rnams kyis ljongs nas bsod snyoms lo tog sar pa dang/ 'brasakhu sapa dang/ dus sar gyi rid pa gang yin pa de rnams las de la thog mar byon nas/ bdag nyid las
[@]/ spyod par byed do// dzatsam dus gzhan zhig na spre'u de dus lus 'dus so// de nas rang byang ba de rnams kyis yul khams dang phyogs sna tshogs na yod pa'i shing dri zhi'i
bo rnams blangs te/ shing dri zhim po thams cad kyis phung bor sbyangs nas bsags so// dug slong dag jisams du sams/ rang byang chub rnams dang lhan cil/tu gnas pa'i spre'u
gang yin pa de ni sbas 'de nyid yin te/ 'di da' tsho yang skyaro mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs so// da ltar na yang ngas 'di skya ba mang po la phan pa dang snying brtse bar lung bstan to//
de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ bcom brlagatu gshegs pa dang/ bcom brlag gi dram ze rnams kyis dag slong ge'u du ma bcom brlag tu phyin
nas de shin tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag par 'dod de/ 'chadapar byed/ 'dogs par byed/ rab tu 'jog par byed/ rnam par 'jog par byed/ bye brag tu 'byed par byed/
gsal bar byed/ ston par byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed do zhes thos nas/ gal ted bcom brlag tu 'dug na/ bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i bar chad du 'gyur la/
de ni bkur sta ma yin pas skrag ces grag gas/ gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis bkur sta ma yin pa byas na/ de lta na de bcom brlag tu 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de la ma smad rims kyis ]
0/ bkur sti ma yin pa byas na/ ngo mtshar du sa 'dzin gyis/ gal te de la skyes bu gtso bo 'ga' zhig gis bkur ste ma yin pa byas na/ des ni legs par 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi nang na skyes
bu gtso bo su zhagi yod snyam mo// de'i tshe bcom brlag na bram ze sor gyur ces yul/ rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rang gi skya ba gsal par byad pa pa rol ni rgol
bar tshar gcod par nus pa/ de'i tshig bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhig yod de/ de nas bcom brlag gi khram ze rnams 'dus shing tshogs te sngor gyur gyi drung du song nas/ mkhan po 'di'i dge
