sbyong go'u ta ma mchis nas/ de shin tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed do zhes thos zhes pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de ni bkur sti ma yin
pas skrag go zhes gda' na/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis pa kur sti ma lags pa bgyis na/ de lta de bcom brlag tu mchis par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de la ma sad rims kyis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis
nango mtshar du ma 'dzin gyis/ gal te re la skyes bu gtso bo 'ga' zhige gas bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na/ legs par 'gyur ni bdag cag gi skyes bu gtso bo mkhan po ma lags pa su zhig mchis
khyod kyis de la bkur sti ma lags pa'i tshig gi rgya lcag gis spyi bar gsol/ sngor gyur gyis sbas pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gi lce 'di bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ gal te spro bar 'os pa
zhag na spyogo/ 'on te bstod par 'os pa zhig na bstod do// de nas bram ze sngor gyur bcom brlag na gnas pa'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyisimadun du bdar nas//
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba na/ bras bla spor gyur gyis rgyang rang po bon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kun nas brgyan pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyad
cusamadzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom lagang gis brgyan pa/ 'od gzar nyin stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba/ shang drung zhig na rten cing zhi ba'i spyod lam
pa gyis bzhugs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang ya mtshan skyes ta mig bgrad de bltas nas bstod par brtsams pa/ lus dang ngag dang dbang por bcas pa yi// yid kyis tshul bzhin rtsa
gcig gyis nas// yon tan rang bzhin yon tan rgya mtshotsho//khyod kyi yon tan phyogs gcig brjod par bgyi// skye ba rnams kyi dam pa rab mchog lags// skyon med dbang po shin tu mnyam par gzhag/
pha rol rgol ba brtsonal thams cad kyis/ don dam thugs su chud la bskyed ma nus// khyod kyi spyod pa shin tu rdzogs pa nyid// brtul zhugs bsgrubs pas brtul zhugs shin
lce tu rdzogs// stobs ldan khyod kyi ting 'dzani zad med pas// sred med bu dang ri yi rgyal po bzhin// skyes bu khyung mchog khyod la gnodam mnga'// ma zhum bstengs pa mimanga' ba ma mnga'//
'byung bo rnams la'ang mi bzod 'ga' mi mnga'// khyodan ma tshags 'thab pa ga la mnga'// brtags pa med cing ha cang zhum ma mnga'// gdung ba med cing dgyes pa'i ng yor mi mnga'//
ra yi bdag po lhun po rab brtan ltar// khyod kyi thugs ni rtag tu dge ba nyid// thub pa skyes mchog khams rnams thams cad nas// khyod kyi yi shes yangs pa sgrib mi mngag/ skye mched
rnam pa sna tshogs dag la ni// ma thogs nyams shing zad pa med par 'jug/ thub pa khyod la gang la'ang som nyi med// yid gnyis yod min the tshom yod ba yin// khyod nyid kyis
ni mchog dang mchog dang mchog mni ga// dag pas thugs su chud nas thams cad mkhyen// mthong na dga' bar 'gyur la mthong na legs// mthong na la gus pas mthong n mkhas
la dga'// khyod la dga' dang mi dga' mnyam pas na/ rtag tu dga' ba'i spyod lam de bzhin mdzad// khyod ni snyan pa'i spobs par ldan pa lags// 'dzum pa'i gsung dang
dran ldan pa bsnyengs pa med/ mkhas rnams 'dod pa rab tu 'chad pas na// 'jig rten gsum du khyed kyi grags pa 'byung/ mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang// srin po
mang dang 'jig rten 'dir mkhas dag thub pa'i drung du yang dang yang lhags nas/ khyod la yang dang yang zhub bzod med// khyod nasnyan pa'i gsung gis dga' mdzad pas//
ma dang lha dang lha man gnod sbyin dang// sun po yodi gnyis bsal rnams thub pa che// khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal slar mchi'o// bzhengs dang
bzhugs dang gshegs dang bzhud pa dang// mnal dang gsung yang na gsang ba 'am// 'on te lhung bzed chos gos bsnams pa dag/ go'u ta ma khyod kyis thams cad mdzes pa nyid//
thogs pa mdamatha'am myur mnyam pas na// gsung na snyan pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan// mi yi mchog ni dus su gsung pas na// gsung gi zlos pa rnam par spangs pa lags//
'jig rten na ni stobs dang ldan par grags/ skyes bu mkhyen pa skyes bu khyu mchog gtso// 'jig rten lhar bcas 'di ne mtha' dag la/ ngargyal amanga' khyad du gsod mdzad// mdza'
pa dang mdza' ba ma lags dang/ dmathum pa dang na mthun pa ma lags dang/ g.yo dang ma 'o yo rang bzhin gnas pa la// ngo mtshar 'dzan pa nam yang ma mnga' 'o// sa sngags
'don cinge sang btsal sa ba dang// kha chu 'dzag pas nyam thug skad 'byin dang// yongs su gdungs dang rnam par gdung ldan dang// 'jigs dang rims nad mya ngan gyis nyen pa//
sh+tsa sdug bsngal rnam pa brgya yas gtsos pa dang// yun ring nas ni mgon med bde ba med// srid pa'i srodapar zhugs shing mun bslabs pa'i// 'gro ba 'khrugs pa la ni reb gzigs nas/
bdag nyid rnam pa sna tshogs mthu dag gis// thub pa thugs rje chen go 'dzug mdzad cing// shAkya skyes kyi mchog ni khyod nyid kyis// 'phongs par gyur rnams dgrol phyir brtson pa mdzad// srid/
pa'i sdug bsngal rgyudang bcas 'di dang// srid pa'i sdug bsngal zad pa gang yin dang// srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba yin// lam ni mtshung pa med pa khyod kyis bshad// rnam
bar 'dren pa chen brtson 'grus che// ba mchog pha rol sa ba rnams kyi mchog/ 'jig rten gsum na khyod mtshungs ma mchis na// khyod las lhag par lta zhig ga la mchis// khyed la khong khro
rjes su chags ma mngag/ thub pa khyod la yongasasu zad ma mnga'// sngag dang 'gal dang rtsod pa brtul zhugs bzung// khyod la mi mnga' rtag tu ma mnga' lags// thub pa sdug
dang ma sdugabade ba dang// sdug bsngal mnyamadang dpa' ni ma mnyam sangs/ dga' dang mi dga' ba dag bzod mdzad de/ yang dag bsdams shing 'di ne nyer zhi spyod/ smad pa byas kyang/
gnod pa mi mnga' la// rab tu bsngags pas skyengs par ma 'gyur bag grags pa grags pa ma yin khyod la mnyam// glang chen mche bar ldan pa g.yul ngo/ 'dor ba drag tu 'phas
pa'i mda' dag ltar// skye bo sdig can rnams kyis smras pa yi// tshig ngan tshig rtsub dag kyang bzod par mdzad// drang srong byed snyan gasung 'ang tshig kyang brjod// shin tu ngan du sus kyang ma
ba// bzod med// smad par skas sam dge bar smras kyang rung// thub pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa lags// mchod 'os rtag par ma dang lha dag dang// lha min gnod sbyin
srin po rnams dang ni/ drang srong bdag nyid+de chen pos rtag mchongan// khyod ni thugs brtan gzhan du 'gyur mi mnga'// 'di bas bdag mchog sa kyang rlom mi mnga'// 'de bas bdge chung
zhes kyang rlom mi mnga'// bdag ni 'di dag mnyam zhes mi rlom pas// khyod la nga rgyal rnam pa gsum ma mnga'// brtan dang ldan la bong ba gser dang mtshungs/ pe zurlu dang gsag ma gyo mar

mtshungs// thub pa chen po lha dang bcas pa yi// 'gro ba 'di ni rtswa shing 'dra bar spyod// zla ba nyi ma'i 'od gatrer dang phrad nas// grang dang tshaba'i rlung dag langs na yang mi yi dbang po lta bur brjod/
mdzad de// thugs brtan khyod la rab tu gnod mi mnga'// gadrimase cha dang ni gtsang nas bshos dang na/bla gos sham thabs rnam pa sna tshogs dge/ thur pa zag med so sor brtags nas ni//
de yi don du ston par mdzad pa lags// mgon po bdag la med pas thugs ngan med// ma bcings legs gsungs bdag gire 'dzan ma mnga'// gnod pa sna tshogs dag las yongs su grol// rnyed pa//
b.res na'ang dgyes par mi 'gyur la// da ma brnyes pas kyang na zhum mi 'gyur// khyad du gsod pa bzod pa mdzad cing 'dir/ bkur ste dag la'ang chags pa mi mnga' lags// lha gnas ri yi/
ngos las 'khrungs pa yi// khrag ltar dmar ba'i tsan dan mchog dag dang// mda' dang ral gri rnon pos khyod kyi thugs// lan 'ga' yang ni 'gyur ba ma mnga' lags// don med gtam ni/
gsung bar ma mdzad gang// skye bo ngan pas bstan pa'i gtam ma lags// red pa'i gtam min zang thang bcas gtam man// bdag nyid tshe rnams ma 'dod ma lags kyi// gtam gung rab dbye/
bde ba skyed byed cing// rab tu zhi ba 'ba' zhig rab brjod pa// lha las 'das pa'i gtam ni se/nga dag cig/ gsungs na sdig pa rnam par 'dul ba gsung// snyan pa rnams dang 'brel pa//
rnams dang ni// legs par bshad dang snying por ldan pa yi// rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag thub pa che// 'gro ba'i don slad rab tu gsung bar mdzad// ma mkhas dag dang log par lta

rnams dang// gzu lum can dang dga' bar ldan rnams dang// phra ma can dang tshig rtsubasgyu can gang// de dang lhan cige bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen// mi ni gang dag drang zhing sgyu med pa// bden la dga'
zhing dbang po thul ba dang// rtag tu legs par brtags nas byed pa ni// de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod ma skyin// chos mkhyen lugs mkhyen gang zag mkhyen pa dang// drug po mngon mkhyen khyod la rtag
phyag 'tshal// thub pa zhing mkhyen mchog dang mchog min mkhyen// tshul dang tshul min mkhyen khyod mgos phyag 'tshal// khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho rgya chen legs mthong nas// bdag gis yon tan
phyogs gcig yongs su brjod par bas// 'phags pa khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol na// rtogs par jo thogs 'gro ba'i nang na mi ma mchis// de lta bu la sogs
pa bstod pa lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngor gyur ji ltar snyan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bden pa mthong bar
'gyur ba'i chos bshad par mdzad do// de nas bram za sdor gyur gyis bcom ldan 'das la bstor nas song ste/ dwalam du zhugs pa na bcom drug gi bram ze rnams kyis tshig ga rgya lcag
gas lpags pa las thal pa tsam du brgyud de/ mkhan po khyod la kho bo cag gis dag sbyong go'u ta ma la bkur sti ma yin pa byas shag ces smras na khyod da gzod ltar bstod de 'ong ngam/
shes ldan dag kho bos sngar kho bo'i rtse na bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ gal te smad par 'os pa zhig na snod na/ bstod par 'os pa zhig na bstod do zhes sngar ma sas sam/dag sbyod
go'u ta ma ni bstod par 'os pas/ kho bos bstod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas/ bcom brlag tu bsod
snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ de'i tshe bcom brlagon rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bab bo// de nas bcom brlagan gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te dge sbyong
go'u ta ma bcom brlag tu 'ong na/ bdag gi sgyu skar gyi nub ma la bar chad byed par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sgren mor byung nas 'dug go/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo re zhig bud med ni shin tu bkag kyang bzang ba ma yin na/ sgron mo lta skyes kyang ci de gis/ de nas lha mo de skyes nasaM/ phyogs gcig tu song ngo//
denas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam las gzun te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dag slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag bcom brlag na nas dmags lnga po 'di dag yod de/ lnga gang zhen/ mtho dman dang/ sdong dum dang tsher mas gang ba dang/ rdo ba dab
gseg ma dang gyo mo mang pa dang/ dgongs ka za ba dang/ bud med mang ba yin no// de nas bcom khyudas ma gshegs par bcom brlag gi gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas gang na ba de logs su
gabashags te byonanas/ gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas byung te/ ring nga zhig tu rten cing nyin mo'i gnas pa'i phyir bzhugs so// da' tshiganod sbyin bong bu'i gzugs su byas nas 'phyan pa
dang/ de la khye'u dang bu mo dag zhon pa dang/ des de dag rtsor bcug/ dga' bar byed du bcug nas/ nags thob por song nas za par byed pas/ de'i ming gnod sbyin bong bu gnod sbyin bong bu
[21 ]@#// zhis bya bar grags so/ bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las/ lha mo zhig gis mtho
btsams pas/ bcom brlag tu ma gshegs par gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas su gshags so thos so// thos nas kyang gtsang zhing pasod pa'i babra' pa dang bca' ba dag soso nas snod du btsos shing bsdogs
te shing rtar bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa
dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung

ts+tsha nga zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma pa'i n du'o// de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logasu thal mo sbyar ba
btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du shu'adore gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag gis shing rta bkang ste 'tshal ti
mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste de bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la/
gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad ram gro'i gnas su smras shig/ bsod snyoms yongs su les spyod du gzhug go/ btsun pa bka' gzhin
'tshal zhes/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji srid nye bar rtan cing gnas pa de dag thams cad las gro'i gnas su
bsags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/
bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed kyi bar brtan cing mchis pa de dag thams cad rim blo'i gnas su bsags
lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rim gro'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byonanas/ dge slong gi dge 'dugyi gung la gdan bshams
panyid la bzhugs so// de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas zhes bya banas/
phyag gnyis bcangs te lhung bzed bar rag nas/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyore 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
@#// pa bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang/ gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang/ de rnams ni partul lags na/ btsun pa gnod sbyin bong bu 'di bdag cag la yun ring mo zhige nas
sha len ma mchis par nisha bgyid/ 'gran zla ma lags par ni 'gran zla brgyad/ grags ma btsal bar ni grags tshol bar bgyid de/ dus pa btsas shing btsas pa rnams 'theg par bgyid lags
na kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nyo bar gzung ste/ gnod sbyin bong bu gdul bar gsol/ de'i tshaganod sbyin bong bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod spyin bong bu la bka' stsal pa/ bong bu khyod kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thos lags so// bong bu khyod kyis thos sam/ bde bar
gshags pa bdag gis thos lags so// dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa las log cig/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi slad du/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang
brtsig par dam 'cha' bar bgyid na bdag ldog ste// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bcom brlag gi bram ze drang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang khyim
bdag khyed cag gas thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das thos lag te brtsig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa btul le// bram ze dang khyim bdag
dod pa can rnams kyis de'i ched du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so// de bzhin du gnod sbyin mda' can dang/ gnod sbyin nags ldan dang/ gnod sbyin mo bsungs red madrang//
mchu rnams btul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom brlag tu zhugs so// zhugs nas gnod sbyin mo 'gran zla ma 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa btul nas/ de'i don du
gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi nang rang phyi rol tu gnod sbyin nyis stong lnga brgya btul nas/ de'i ched du bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa/
can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang nyis stong lnga brgya brtsigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das o ta lar gshags te/ o ta la na o ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so//
da nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bu zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro
na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ o ta la'i sod soms la zhugs pa dang/ phyogs gzhan zhig na zhing pa lnga brgya tsam mgo bo rdul gyis
yog cing shana' ris kyi smad g.yog bgosaM nas zhing rmad pa las zhing pa de rnams sa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ gzi
brjid kyis mdzes par mthong ngo zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis re rnams la chos bshad pas zhes bya ba nas/ mchod par bya ba dang/ brjod par
bya ba rang/ mngon du sba bar byabar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du// de nas rmon pa stong pa de dag gnya' shing dang ru dag bcad nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legs su dong ste lhags nas/
bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskor te 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la tshag gsum gyi chos bshad pa dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes nas zhes bya ba nas/ bden
pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
btsun pa zhing pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur nas/ dbul po'i khyim rnams su skyes shing/ 'di rnams ni rmod
pagyur lags/ dge slong dag 'di rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ 'di rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu
phyung ba yin te/ da rnams kyis de na le les dus 'das par byas pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su tshur to// rmon pa 'di rnams kyis kyang de nyid la rab tu byung
nas bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo phra mo rnams la gus par ma byas pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes so// 'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
khod srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu byang ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga las bden pa mthong bar byas so// dgo slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyus par
sbyar ro// bramo zashing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bus dag sbyango shA kya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim med par
rab tubyung ba de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa rung/ o ta lar byon nas/
o ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs te/ shes ldan dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i dge ba dang/ grags pa dang/ sgra dang/ tshigs su paMcad pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag phyogs dang phyogs
mtshams su rgyags par gyur te 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyurab/ blon med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud/
dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa 'di/ skye dgu dag sbyong dang bram zer bcas/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du byas pa rnams la rang gi mngon par
shes pas mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas/ bdag gi zag pa zad do// tshangs par spyod pa bstan to// bya ba byas so// 'di las srid pa gzhan ma shes so zhes ga
bar byed cing/ des chos bshad pa ni thog mar dag ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/
yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byad pa 'ba' zhig ston to zhes thos nas/ dag sbyong dang bram ze de lta bu lta ba ni legs pa yin/ nye bar 'gro ba na legs pa yin/ bsnyen bkur byed
pa ni legs pa yin no snyam du bsams nas/ shing rtarta rgod ma dang ldan pa thams cod nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te/ bram ze'i khyi'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing/ bram ze'i
khyi'u'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas/ gsar gyi 'khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs te/ a tal nas byang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ de jitsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bton pas song nas/ bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du zhugs
nas bram ze shang sA la chen po lta bu o ta la/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/
yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ bram ze shing sA la chen po
lta bu o ta lalA 'di skad ces gsol to// kyi go'u tam dbang po lnga po/ spyod yul tha dad pa dang/ yul tha dad pa can rang rang gi spyod yul dang/ yul nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyi/
gzhan gyis spyod yul dang/ yul gzhan nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang/ rna ba'i dbang po dang/ sna'i dbang po dang/ lce'i dbang po dang/ lus kyi dbang po gang dag lags
pa de rnams kyi spyod yul dang/ yulanyams su myong bar bgyid pa ni gang lags/ de rnams kyi rten pa yang gang lags/ bram ze dbang po lnga po sbyor yul tha dad pa dang/ yul tha dad
pa can 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang/ rnapa'i dbang po dang/ sna'i dbang po dang/ lce'i dbang po dang/ lus kyi dbang po gang dag yin pa de rnams kyis spyod yul dang/ yul
nyams su myong ba yid yin no// de rnams kyi rton pa yang yad yin no// skya go'u ta ma yid kyi don pa gang lags/ bram ze yid kyi rten pa ni dran pa yin no// kyi go'u ta ma dran
kha'i rten ba gang lags/ bram ze dran pa'i rten pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yin no/ kyi go'u ta ma dran pa la bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa gang lag
bram ze dran pa nya ba gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa na byang chub kyi yan lags bdun yin no// skya go'u ta ma byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rten pa gang lags/ bram ze byang chub kyi yan lag
bdun gyi rton pa ni rig pa dang rnam par grol ba yin no// kyi go'u ta ma rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze rig pa dar rnam par grol ba'i rten pa ni mya ngan las 'jus
pa yin no/ dkyi go'u ta ma mya ngan las 'das pa'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze ha cang thal ches so// tacang thal ches so// dri ba rnams kyi mtha' gzung bar mi nus te/
nga'i drung du na yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal gyi mthar bya ba'i phyir tshangs par spyod pa mya ngan lu 'angs par lta bar 'gro ba dang myang n las 'dus pa' mthar
thug pa can byed par byed do// de nas bram ze a ta la'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la gnod pa ci zhig bya snyam mo// des kyang sngon dag sbyong go'u ta mnyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
ny+nyo pa gdugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab na/ das ci bsams pa dang/ ci gsol ba re thams cad so sor thob par 'gyur ro zhes thos so// de nas bram h+phe o ta la' ba stan las lang
bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong
ga dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis naganang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzedagyu bar gi/
nas/ zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o// snyan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ na lan log par gdab par brtsams pa/ bdag gis
shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong ji snyed cig bshos gsol ba 'di thams cad bdag gi gling du gyur cagi snyam pa rung/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bram zu o ta la'i bu'i bsam pa
mkhyen nas/ bran khri tsho ta la'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze khyod kyis mi rung ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ 'di dag slong 'di thams cad na yang
slad pa zad pa yan gyis/ sems gzhan skyed cig ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gsheg
nas/ dge slong ga rag 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag bram ze mo
[j]@#/ ta lab bus smon lam log pas bsang ba'i sems sdig pa can bskyed kyis/ khyed cag gis zan zes na gtsug lag khang gi tshigs su bcad pa rjod cig dang
log pa'i smon lam 'grub par mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ phyi bzhi 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/
yul o ta lar bsod snyoms la zhugs ba dang/ o ta la nu bran mo rgan mo ka tsang ga la zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de bum pa thogs nas chu rgyur khron pa'i drung dusong ba dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyang phyogs deragshegs to/ bcom ldan 'dras kyis de'i gdul ba'i dus mkhyenanas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la rgan mo pha gi la
bcom ldan 'das skyems kyis tshu phul zhig ces sgo zhig/ btsunapa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ rgan mo la/
sbyo tsang ga la gang na ba der songs phyin pa dang/ rgan mo ka tsang ga la la 'di skad ces sas so// ka tsang ga la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyis rgyu phul zhig/ des sas pa/ 'phags pa
N+NaM bdag nyid 'tshal te mchi'o/ de nas ka tsang ga las chus bum pa bkang nas/ ris pa ris par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang/ ka tsang ga las sangs rgyas bcom ldan
[4// ]'das sku skyes bu chen pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyudatsus mdzes par byas pa/ bod 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od gzer nyi ma
stang bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo// mthong m thag tu yang de la bu'i sdug pa skyes nas/ des lag pa skrang sta bu bu zhes/ bcom ldan 'das
la 'khyud par brtsams pa/ dag slong rnams kyis de bzlogago/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis rgan mo 'di ma zlog cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
tshe rabi lnga brgyar yang// rtag tu nga'i yum du gyur pas// nga yi sku la reg pa las// gal te 'di ni bzlog byas na// de'u romod la khrag dron rag/ 'di yi kha nas skyags par 'gyur//
bu la gdung ba 'di mthong nas// byas pa gzo ba rjes dgongs te// thugs rje dang na thugs brtse bas/ sku la rig tu gnang bar bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la mgul nos 'khyud dugand
bas dbu lachags pa dang bral nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa mnyan pa'i phyi'i 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dar/ khams
dang rang bzhin mkhyenanas/ de dang mthun pa'i phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas ka tsang ga las 'jigatshogs la lta ba'i
ri tsa go nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rirdzas bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ das bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod
bas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la pas ma bgyis te/ mas mo lags zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i mi'i rtsi so
nyi'u mtho ba yoshes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// tshags su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang gsol
ba/ ma la lan du phan 'dogs pa'i u0f7a/ sumatshog gs ni bgyi ba gang// thar las sems gzhol 'gyur ba de// khyod kyis de ring bdag la mdzad// khyed kyis bdag ni ngan
lho'agro las// drangs te mtho ris thar la bzhag/ khyod ni rtsa la ba chen bo yis// dka' ba legs par mdzad pa lags// zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan nasasong ngo// de nas dus gzhan zhi na katsangag las jo bo la gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dar/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas to/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag/
legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par
bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do// de nas des rab tu byung/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ gdams ngag byin no// de brtson 'grus drang
'bad ba dang/ brtsa la bar byas nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcomaM pa nyid mngonosum du byas nas/ dgra bcom par gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod
chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas/ brjed par byabar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/'dul ba gzhi//bam po so bdun la//
gang gatsho bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bsdus te mdor bka' stsal nas/ gtsug lag khang du nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir 'jug ba mdzad pa de'i tshe/ katsang ga las de rgyas par
lung ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'adus kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag nga nyan thos dag slong ma mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa'i phyi banam+pa kyi nang na/ 'di lta ste/ dge
slong ma ka tsang ga la 'di mchog yin no/// ge slong rnams tshom skyes nas/ thatshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ka
tsangag las las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na rgas nas rab tu byung bar gyur las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na dbul ba dang bran pa mor gyur/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis srid pa tha ma de'i mngal du ma bzung bar gyur/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa mngon sum du gyis shing/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mad sde rnam par 'byed
par brgyud pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slongam ka tsang ga la nyid kyis las byas r shong tshogs rAd pa dag ces bya ga
sa/lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur/ zhes byaba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// dag slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa na/ 'di du'i yum du gyur
te/ gang gi nga rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ 'dis nga bzlog pas/ las ro'i rnam par sman pos/ rgas nas rab tu byung ngo// ngasbyin ba gtong ba na 'das por chad
byas pas/ des na dbul bar gyurato// ji ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo ltar 'das bsod nams dbang che bar grags par 'gyur ba'i las mi byas te/ des na nga'i srid pa tha ma 'dis
sh+tsa mngal du ma bzung ngo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs las rab tu byung nas/ dgo slong ma slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams la thunamo zhes tshig rtabarjod pas/ sa
na bran mor gyur to// de na 'dis gang dag bklags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang/ khams la mkhas pa dang/ skya mchad la mkhas pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par
'byung ba la ma bas pa dang/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas bar byas pas/ des na nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa/
nyidi mngon sum du byas so// rab tu 'byin pa'i mkhan mo gang yin pa de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus po com ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis/ mdo sde rnam par 'byed
pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa dang/ des na 'dis kyang 'chis pa'i dus kyi tshe smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
yona gnas bla na med pa la tsho ji srid cig tutshangs par spyodab dan/ yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob kyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das 'od srung kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la/ bram ze'i khyilu khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
rag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas shA kya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo 'di/ yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis/ mdos rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang bcom
ldan 'das shA kya thub pa des mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu ston par gyur cig ces byas te/ de'i son lam gyi dbang gis/ ngas da ltar mdo sde rnam par 'byed par
byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to// dag slong dag de lta bas na/ gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcisi tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/ brtson par bya'o
zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ rag sbyong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yul dag mtha' gang na bar 'dong ngo// patsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis
ltar mnyan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshags pa dang/ ji tsam na kun dga' ra ba zhige na bram bre zhig khron pa nas chu bcus shing/ kun dga' ra ba bcu par brtsams so// bram bla
des rgyang ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bsams pa/ gal tedag sbyong go'u ta ma kun dga' ra bar zhugs na/ kun dga' ra ba dang tshul rung bar 'gyur ro
snyam du bsams nas sgo bcad de/ dpyang thag dang chu snod sbas nas 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis kun dga' ra bar zhugs pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len
gyis zin pa de bzung nas/kun dga' ra ba de thams cad chus yog par byas so// de nas bram zla dadag sbyang ga'u taM ma 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu cha ba yin no snyam du rig nas/ mngon par dad
par gyur te gsol pa// shes ldan go'u ta mtshur spyon/ dpyang thag 'di lags/ chab stor ni 'o da lags kyis/ chab ci bder bzhes su gsol/ donas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gal te kun na chu yod na// khron pa'i chus ko ci zhig bya// 'dire na srid pa'i rtsa bcad nas// gang zhig yongs su btsal par spyod// de nas bgo
ldan 'das la/ bram ze des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsen par rdzogs pa dag slong gi dngos po thob pa lta
na zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung ngo zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pos tshur shog bka' stsal pas// skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i
lus ldan zhing// mod la rab ng po rab zhi'i gnas gyurato// sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bka' par gyug/ des brtson 'grus dang/ 'bad pa dang/ brtsal ba byas nas/
nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas//
[P ]mngon du sba bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ yul dgra mthar gshags te//
yul dag mtha' na sdu bu can gyi shing nim pa'i drung nabazhugs so// de'i tshe dgra mtha' na rgyal po bram ze ma sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dong/ rgyus pa dang 2 bde ba dang/ lo legs pa/ skye
bodang/ mi mang pos rub tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ rgyal bo bram zes spyan gyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma dwapa'i sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ dgra mthar byon nas/ dgra

sgyu mtha' nasku bu can gyi seshang nim pa'i drung na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma na mtha' dag gi rgyal po thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla ma byas
gdal dus/ mchod par byas te/ dgra bcom pa bkur la/ gal te bdag gis dag sbyong go'u ta ma la babur sku ma byas na/ mtha'i rgyal phran rnams/ shes ldan dag la ma rgyal po bram lnga
pa/ ma sbyin na byis pa yin te/ de'i grong dang zhing na dag sbyong go'u ta ma te par rten cing bzhugs na/ bsnyen bkur ma byas so zhes sod par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis dge sbyong go ta mnyan tho/
thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs so snyam du bsams nas/ rgyal po tshon po'i 'byor pa dang/ rgyal po chen po'i mthus dag mtha' nas byung nas/ bcom ldan
'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan gi mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur pa dang/ yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam po sna tshogs byas nas/
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
mdzad nas cang ma gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas rgyal po bram ze ma sbyin stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gong
na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan go'u tu ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cag la/ dgung zla gsum du na
ba zab chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms pa dang/ gzims cha dang/ snyan dpyad kyi rkyen snyan gyi yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan
'das kyis rgyal po bram ze ma sbyin la cang mi gsung bsaganang ngo// de nas rgyal po bram bra ma sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das tsang ma gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das
[]// gsus pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rangs nas las langs te song ngo/ de rang gi khyim du song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ rtim ra
ra zhing lnga brgya'i bcar pa sa bco brgyad dang/ sran tshodas tshogs dar/ tshod ma ro dang ldan pa dang/ 'bras chan rab tu mang por chos go/ ga mthar dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ dge
rgyu sbyong go'u ta ma zla ba gsum du gzhan gyis gdug tshod ma gsol cige/ gang zhig gis gdugs tshod gsol na de chad par gsad dro zhis des de skad du dril bsgugs nas/ nub mo nyal pa
dang laman phog gi rgyu mas dgra mtha'i grong khyer thams cad bskor bar rmis so// rjes nas kyang sngangs/ skrag/ byed cing/ spu zing zhes byed nas/ myur ba myur bar mal chen po
nas langs te/ lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du ma 'gyuraglathaM snyam dusems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las/
nam nangs nas bram ze mdun na 'don la snus pa/ mkhan po padag gis 'di 'dra ba'i rmi lam zhig mthong na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsam//
paN+Ti ji ltar lus mang lam bzang po zhig sa taM/ gal te bdag de dang mthun par bstar na/ 'di lhag par yang dag sbyong go'u ta ma la dad pa bskyed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis
[d]'di ngan par bsad do snyam du bsams nas sbas pa/ lha rmang lam mi bzang lags so// mkhan bo 'di'i 'bras bu car 'gyur/ lha gdon mi 'tshal brar rgyal srid las
nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur lags so// rgyal pos bsams pa// e ma'o kyi hud bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog ga bar chad du ma 'gyuragrang snyam du
bsams nas/ bram ze mdun na 'don la 'di skad ces smras so// gang gis na kho bo rgyal srid las nyams par ma 'gyur pa dang/ srog ga bar chad du ma 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po//
cu yod/ des smras pa/ lha gal te ma gda' ba'i phyogs su zla ba gsum bzhugs na/ des na lha rgyal srid las ma nyams shang/ srog gi bar chad du ma 'gyur lags so//
denas rgyal po bram ze mo sbyin gyis bsam pa/ gal te de lhan de bya bla bas dril sgrogs su gzhug go snyam nas/ des yul thams cad du sprul sgrogs su bcugaM pra/ nga la zla ba
gsum du lta zhing lta bar su yang ma 'ong zhig/ gang zhig 'ongs na de nichad par gsar ro zhes dril sgrogs su bcug nas/ zla ba gsum du mi snang ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug go/
tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ rgyal po bram za ma sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song be las/ jo tsam na rgyal po bram ze ma sbyin gyi zhashas 'tsho ba rnams sems
las chung sa la yod pa dag mthogo/ mthong nas kyang smas pa/ shes lhadag pa sems las chung ngus 'khod dam/ de rnams kyis skyas pa// 'phag
pa ci zhig bgyi'i mchis/ rgyal po bram ze ma sbyon gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong ga dge 'dun zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis ma bskyabs sam/ khyed cag sams
las chung dus 'khod nas gdugs tshod kyang sta gon mi byed/ dan yang mgom na/ ci sangs rgyas la sogs ba dgo slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod gcod dam/ de dag gis sas
kha/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ lhas lnga brgya rnams gyi ched du zhal bris bsod pa mang du sta gon byos shig ni bka' stsal gyi/ chog ma 'og gdon du'o zhes bka' mastsal leg
so// shes ldan dag deng lha la zhus shig/ 'phags pa lhas dril sgrogs su stsal pa/ ngal zla ba gsum du lta zhing nye bar su'ang ma 'ong zhig gang zhig 'ongs nare chud par gs
dozhes bsgrags na/ ci bdal cag la mgo ba gnyis mchis sam bdag cagan mi zhu lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song ste phyin
nas bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyas par gsol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo song la snyam sbyar
thogs te/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dag sbyong gzhan zhig dang dbamatha' lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su shes ldan dag/ khyed cag las
gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dge slong gi drage 'dun la zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro ba des zhal zul gsol cig ces sngon cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dag sbyong gzhan zhig dang/ dgra mtha'i lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/
bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su bskyo ba/ shes ldan dag khyed cag las gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dag slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro
pos zhal zas gsol cig/ dgra mtha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis sas pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo bdag cag lta zhag ra ris kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro lags mod kyi/ rgyal po sdig can 'das dril sgrogs su stsal pa/ gzhan sus kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag skyong gi
dge 'dun spyan drangs te/ zla ba gsum du zhal zas ma gsol cig/ gang zhig gis zhal zas gsol na/ de ni chad par gsad do zhes bsgrags lags so// ji tsam du byang
thu/ phyogs nas ded dpon zhig rta lnga brgya la khal bkal te/ dgra mthar phyin nas des bsams pa/ gal te mod la chasan rta rnams kyi rmag pa dung
pas 'thod bar 'gyur zhing/ log par yang 'gyur bas 'dod du gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ ded nyid du 'dug nas/ das rta cang shes lan chas nas bu chung do// rta lhagam
rnams la ni bri'u chung 'thung chad do// des rgyal pos rtsis mgo 'di dang 'di dag byas so zhes thos la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad du sus pa yang thos nas/ des bsan
pa D+ha bdag ni rgyal po 'di'i yul na gnas pa ma yin pas/ bdag la rgyal bos ci byar yod snyam du rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' kho la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa/
sgyu kun dga' bo bdag gis rta rus la nas nas bre'i chu de// rta lhag ma rnams la nibri'u chung re ba'i thang lags na/ gal te bcom ldan 'das nas gsol bar sngon/ bcom ldan
'das la na bdag gis nasabre'u chung dod// dag srong lhag ma rnamA la ni bri'u chung re re dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song sa na
ny+nyo sa bcom ldan 'das la skabs re rgyas par gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga nyid kyis las tshogs redapa/ skyon yongs su bskyar ba/ 'od
pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byang bar 'gyur ba'i las nga nyid kyis byas shing bsags pas/ nganyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so
sor myong bar 'gyur te/ las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i
bar gong ma bzhin du'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'bakabartsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la tshul shang brims te/ khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang
thabs cig dgra mthar zla ba gsum du longs spyad par skye ba des tshul shing lo nga zhig ces sgo 'ag/ btsun pa bka'i bzhin 'tshal zhes tsho dang ldan pa na dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi
ltar mnyananas/ tshulashang bris par brtsams pa na/ gang yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar dag slong gnyis kyis ma tshang bas tshul shang bas so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsor ma'i bro nad mchis pas/ dgung zla gsum du gsang nas kyis longs spyad par mi spro lags so// tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu chen pos gsol pa/ bdag
ni 'di'i bro g.yog bgyid lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar dgo slong gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu dbyar dgra thar ra bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so// tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu ni rdzi bo tshu gsum gyi bar song ste/ dbyar gnas par khas blangs so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i
dud rtsis bstabs so// de nas do dbon gyis bcom ldan 'das la nanas bre'u chung do do 'bul lo// dge slong gzhan nas la ni nas the'u chung re re'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'/ lal/ kun dga' bo song la de bzhin gshags pa'i ched du nas la ci legs su byos shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skal blangs te/ bung mod rgan mo gzhan zhig gangan yod pa der song nas phyin pa dang/ bud med de la 'di skad
ces sus so// sring mo de bzhin gshags pa'i ched dunas la cu legs su bya na khyod nus sam/ des sas pa/ 'phags pa bdag rgan mas rngo mi thog ste/ 'on kyang bu mo 'di gnyen lags/
kyisa'adi la stsol cig dang/ 'dis na su legs su bgyid par 'gyur go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de'i drung du song ste phyin nas smas pa/ sring mo khyod kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa'i ched du nas la ci legs su byed nus sam/ sa sas pa/ 'phags pa bdag dang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag lo tshig 'ga' gsung ba ltan ci le gru
su bgyi'o// dres sas pa// phyi dor gyis shig dang snya'o// de nas 'drazhing dris pa/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba tsalags/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsams pa/ gal te 'di
la bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zab pa yin pas 'dis shes par ma 'gyur ba'a gnas gang yin pa de yod kyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di la 'khor
los sgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'osnyam du bsams nas smras pa/ sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byungan/ rin po che sna bdun yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te//
bdun bo de dag gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang/ glang po ni po che dang/ rta rin po che dang/ nor bu rin po chadrang/ budatshad rin po che dang/ khyim badrag rin po che dang/
bdun pa ni blon po rin po che yin no// sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byungan/ 'khor lo rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo 'di la rgyal po

rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ gso sbyong bco lnga ba da nyid la mgo khrus byas te sbyang ba byas nas/ de steng gi khang pazas kyi gzhi la klon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug pa na/ shar phyogs
nas 'khor lo rin po che lte ba dang bcas pa/ rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud dang bcasaM ra/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ mdzes pa// mkhan bzos ma byas pa/ bzang po
thams cad gsar las byas pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa gang yin pa 'das gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba nas/
thams cad gsar las byas zhes bya ba nas/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin 'du'o// bdag nAgadon mi za bar 'khor los sgyurapa'i
rgyal por gyur to snyam nas/ de nas 'khor las sbyar ba'i rgyal pos 'khor lo rin po cha de brtag par 'dod nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas

pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 'khor lo rin po tshe lag pa gnyis kyis slas nas lag g.yon par gzhi ste lag pa g.yas spor zhing/ skye la khor lo rin po chesngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba/ 'phags pa'i lam srol/
gang yin par rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig ces smra'o// de nas 'khor lo rin po cher 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal pos sbyar ba rang/ steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags
sa 1 shar phyogs su sngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo ni po che de'i rdzis bzhin du 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan
lag bzhi dang lhan cig tu'agro bar 'gyur ro// phyogs gang du 'khor lo rin poche desdod pa der/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lagabazhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs par 'gyur zhing
shar phyogs gyi khams kyi rgyal phran gang dag yin pa de dag lakhor los sgyur rgyal po gang nab der dong ste lhags pa dang/ lakhor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces lha tshur gshegs//
lha byon pa legs so// yul 'khor 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa/ skyabo dang ma mang pos gang ba gang lags pa 'di lha' lags kyis/ lhas rjes su bskyang
du gsol/ bdag cag na lha'i bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags so zhes smras pa dang/ de'i phyir sna bodag khyod cag nga rang gi yul 'khor chos kyis rjes su bskyang bar bya'/ chos ma yin pas
nam yin no// 'ga' zhig chos ma yin la spyod dam/ 'dren mar sbyod pa zhig yod na/ khyadakyas de yul 'khor du ma bzhag gi/ deldan khyed cag kho bo'i bka' yon byed pa yin na//
de nas 'khor lo rin po che das shar phyogs mngon par phab nas ]shar phyogs kyi rgya mtshon po nas slar log ste/ lha dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs su yang sngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba 'phag
pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ de nas 'khor lo rin po che de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos spar ba dang/ steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ byang phyogs su sngon gyi
'khor los sgyur ra 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur// 'khor lo rin po tsho de'i rjes bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig 'gro
bar 'gyur/ phyogs gang du 'khor lo ni bo che de sdod pa der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs
par 'gyur zhing/ byang phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal phran gang dag yin pa de dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di
skad ces lha tshur gshegs/ lha byon pa legs so// yul 'khor 'byon pa dang/ rgyas po dang/ bde ba dang/ la legs pa skye bo rang mi mang pos gang po gang lags pa 'di
lhab lags kyis/ lhas rjes su bskyang du gsol/ bdag cag na lha'i bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags so zhes sas pa dang/ de'i phyi'i sna bo dag khyed cag rang rang gi yul rnams sa
kyis rjes su bskyang bar bya'i/ chos ma yin pas na ma yin no// 'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam/ 'dren mar sbyong n khyod kyis yul 'khor du ma gzhag cige/ de lan skyed
cag kho bo'i bka' bzhin byed pa yan no// de nas 'khor lo rin pa che des byang phyogs mngon par phapa nas/ byang phyogs kyi rtse mtshochen po nas slar log ste/ rgyal po'i spyi brang ste
nyid du phyin nas/ dkor khang gi stong du srog zhing btsugs pa bzhin du gnas so// sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo 'jig rten du byungan/ 'khor lo rin po che de lta bu 'gi
00 ]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sring mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyalapa 'jig rtan du byung na/ glang bo rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo 'di la 'khor
los sgyur ba'i glang bo ni thal kar ma tog mu da'i mdog lta bu/ yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa/ gzugs bzung ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa yin no// 'on
las sbyor ba'irgyal pos 'di mthong nas sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/ kye ma 'ong po ni po rtsebazang po zhig yan gyis/ myur du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas 'khol
las myur ba'i rgyal pos glang po gdul sbyong mkhan mkhas pa lo nyis bkug nas 'di skad ces sas so// des pa khyod kyis glang po che 'dimar ba na legs par dul par byos la nga la phul/
yig lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes glang po 'dul sbyong mkhan mkhas pas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po' ltar mnyan nas/ glang po rin pa che de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag
gcig la slob par byed de/ de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa thams cad slob pa na/ nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs pa na/ dper na glang po che gzhan rnams
'du ma dang/ lo khyudaskor dumar bslab pa thams cad bslabs nas/ bslab pa thams cad lobs pa de bzhin du ]glang po che rin pa che de 'a ni zhag gcig la bslab pa thams
cad babs pa na/ nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs so// da dul par 'ge nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bul bar byed do/
lhaglang po rin po che bzang po nangul lags te/ lha ra de'i dus la bab par mkhyenapar mdzad du gsol// de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos glang po rin po cha de brtag par 'dod nas/ nyin

'char ka'i dus kyi tshe glang po rin po che de la zhon nas/ rgya mtsho'i mtha' klas pa'i sa chen po bskor tI/ rgyal po'i pho brang danyidi nga phyin pa na zhal tshus la 'bab ste/ sring mo 'khor las sgyur

ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byungan/ glang po rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sange mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byungan/ rta rani po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du
'byang bar 'gyur zhin/ sring mo 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rten thams cad sde ba/ mgo gan/cang rdzogi mjug sdug pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa yin/
ta 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos de mthong na/ sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/ kyim rta rin po chebazang po zhig yin gyis/ myur du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas 'khor lus
sgyur pa'i rgyal pos lha mkhan mkhas pa bo nyas bkug ste 'di skad ces smras so// das pa khyod kyis rta rin po che 'di gyur ba kho nar lags par phul bar byas la nga la phul cig lha bka' bzhin
'tshal zhes rta mkhan mkhas pas 'kho los sgyur ba'i rgyal po las mnyan nas/ rta rin po cher la bslab pa thams cad ste zhag gcig la slob par byed re/ de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag
gcig la slob pa na/ mi zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs pa ni/ dper na rtagazhan rnams lo du ma dang/ lo khyud kor du mar bslabapa thams cad bslabs nas/ bslab pa
thams cad lobs pa ru bzhin du/ rta ni po che de la nyin zhag gcige la bslab pa thams cad slob pa na/ nyani khag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs so// de dul bar 'gi mas/
'khor los sgyur ba'argyal po la 'bul bar byed// lha rta rin po chab zang po na dril lakas te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ do nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i
rgyal pos rta rin po che brtag par 'dod nas/ nyin 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe rta rin po che la zhon nas rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i sa chen po bsar te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin
pa na zhal tshus la bab ste/ sring mo 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ rta ne po tshade lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sange mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
po 'dzaki rten du 'byungan/ nor bu rin po chaji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo 'dil 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor bu ni zur brgyad yod pa/ bi ma
bzang po'i rigs can dang/ gsal ba/ rnam par dang ba yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang nam mar gyi bya ba thams cad nor bu de'i 'od kyis byed/
do/ de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos nor bu rin po che brtag par 'dod nas/ mun nag sna tu gyur la/ lhas mtshan mo char gyi rgyun dal bu dal bus 'bebs shing glog 'gyu ba
dus sunor bu rin po che de rgyalaM mtshan gyi rtsi la bzhag nas/ skyed mos tshal gyi nang du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig dong ba dang/ 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi
tshogs yan lag bzhi po ji snyed pa thams cad dang/ rgyang grags spyod khor khor yug tu nor bu'i 'od kyis gsal bar gyur te/ sring mo 'khor las sbyar bo'i rgyal po 'dzage rten du 'byung
na nor bu rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ sring mo ba lor 'a sa skyar ba'irgyal po 'jig rten du 'byung// btsun mo rin po che ji lta bu zhigyi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuratsho
na sring mo 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo ni gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ hacang ma dkar ba/ ha cang ma srol/ nyakhar ba ltar pags pa 'jam
ba pa/ hacang mi ring ba/ hacang mi thung ba/ bong ldan pa/ hacang ma sbom pa// ha cang ma skem pa// hacangam tsho ba/ sha thalen pa gang yin pa ste/ sring mo de na gleng ba'i tshe lus la reg
na dro ba/ tshaba'i tshe lus la reg na bsal ba/ yul ka ling ka'agos ltar 'gan 'jam pa'o/ sring mo de'i deb sngar bu ga thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo// kha nas na ut+pal
sngon po'i dri 'byung ngo// jisrid kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun mo rin che'i bar du bshad pa de srid kyis bu mo des kyang nas kyi bya ba zin nas/ sa rkang pa gnyis la gtugs/
de smon lam godab par brtsams pa/ 'phags pa rig pa'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo rin pa chos gyur cig// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nas byi dor byas
pa khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen pazhin du mad pa yin pas/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bolo rmas pa/ kun dga' bos 'di su zhig gis phyi dor bya/ btsun pa bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig gis bgyis lags so// kun
dga' bo khyod bram ze'i bu mo de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam dag byas sam/ bcom ldan 'das bgyis lags so// kun dga' bo des na khyod bram ze'i bu mo de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam ji
sed byas pa de dag thams cad nga la rgyas par gsol cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bram ze'i bu mo dang lhan cige skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la
rgyas par gsol to/ deskacis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod
kyis ci'i phyi bu mo de las sas rgyas kyi lesngags pa ma brjod/ btsun pa bdag gis 'di snyam du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos nazeb pa lags pas/ bu mo 'das rtogs par ma 'gyur ba gang
lags pa'i gnas de mchis so snyam du bsams nas/ de'i slad du bdag gis de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod lags so// kun dga' bo khyod kyis ma legs pa zhig byas te/
khyod kyis gal te de la sas rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod pabyas pa dang/ sa dran med pa yang dgo par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i
gnas de yod pa zhig/ kun dga' bo'onakyang bu mor 'khor los sbyar ba rgyal po'i btsunamo rin po cher 'gyur ro// kun tu bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhagi com ldan 'das kyi don dunas phyir
byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i ritsun mo rin po chera'ang bstan to zhes sgra grags pa dag/ bu mo lnga rgyur gnyis kyis ma tshang ba zhig gis thos nas//
ge slongalnga brgyar dag song gnyis kyis ma tshang ba rnamos kyi nas bya der byas te/ de rnams kyis kyang smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag de'i 'khor du gyur cig/ ji tsam na bcom ldan 'as
kyis nas kyi bshos gsol bar brtsams pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ya mu gnas / bcom ldan 'das kyis sku tshabargyud pa de dang/ de rnams su phyag dang/ bsadang/
dbu la sogs pa bcad cing sbyin pa btang nas/ bskal pra grangs med pa gsum rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa nyide b.res pa do/ donanas rul ba'i bshos gsol ba lta zhes mchim
dbyung bar brtsams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 1 tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir ma dga' zhing mchim klogo/ btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su 'khrungs na rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ste/ phyag dang/ zhabs dang/ dbu la sogs pa bkum zhing sbyin pa btang nas/ bskal
pa grangs mar pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi brnyes pa re/ da ni gsang nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba lta snyam brgyad lags mod/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal
pa kun dga' bo khyod de bzhin gshags pa'i mchab 'i khor nas phyung ba'i rjes kyi zin bu bar 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
mchab 'i bar nas nas kyi zan phyung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' phil byin nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bza' bar brtsams so// bcob ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis sngon 'di lta bu'i ro myong bar dran rnam/ btsun pa dag 'khor los sgyur pa'i rigs su skyes shing/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs las chen por
ka gyur lags na/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi mchapa'i bar nas phyung ba'i nas kyibashos 'ad lta bu 'o na sngon myong ba'omi dran lags so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la
ni ro bro ba'i mchog ces bya ba rnams 'brog pa yongs su dag pa yod de/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas kha zas mal pa la longs spyad n/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la rdo brgya bar 'gyur
ro// kun tu rgyal po bram ze ma sbyin gyis sangs rgyus la sogs pa dag slong gi dge 'dunazla ba gsum du spyan drangs te/ mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das na dgra mtha' na
sa gsol lo zhes sgra grags so// mtha'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang rgyal po bram ze mosbyin gyus/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong gi dge 'dun blab gsum du spyan drangs te/ ma snang
ba'i phyogs su 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das ni deg mtha'an nas gsol lo zhes thos nas/ de rnams kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la pho la btang ba las/ de rnams nang du mchud de sgo nasdod
pash+tsa do/ dakhyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas/ 'bras A lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shang rtalnga brgya tsam bkang ste bkur ro// de nas bdud sdig can de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyod
go'u ta ma la bdag gis lan mang po zhig mthobatsan par byas na/ lan 'ga' yang skabs ma rnyed kyis/ 'di'i yang re zhig 'di la brgal bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bor bdag nyidi mngon par sbal te/ shing rta lnga brgya ro de rnams kyi mdun du 'dug nas sus la/ shes ldan daka gar 'dong/ da rnams kyis sbas pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo rgyal po'am
bu ma sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi reg 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te/ mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das ni dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo//
danas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don dun 'bras sA lu sogs spu bun smanapa shing rta lnga brgya po 'di bskur ba lags so// des sbas pa/ shes ldan dag
bcom ldan 'das lan lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin rnams mngon par dad de/ gal te nam mkha' la bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed bzed nas/ de yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
kyis lha'i bdud rtsis 'gengs par byed na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phyor nas gsol/ slar logacig/ de rnams kyis sbas po/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo bdag cag chas lags ni/ da ci/
sa ldog mchi'o// bdud kyis bsams pa/ bdag gis 'di dag bzlog par ma nusakyis/ thabs shig bsham par bya'o zhes/ de steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ char pa shing
[s] ]@#// rta'i srogashing tsam gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams te/ des rdo zhig rtade dag gi lte ba man chadabu pa de tsam gyi bar du char phab bo// de nas shing rta de dag gse glang rnams
ka bkrol te dong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyur gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tudagra mtha' nanas gsol lo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra 'i bu dang/ mo'u gal gyi bu gnyis
ni'i rtsa gsum pa la dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas/ lha'i bdud rtsi la 'as spyod do// de nas ded dpon des zla ba gsum 'das nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyanathos kyi dege 'dun dang bcasapa
skyed mos tshal du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bsu gnang ngo// tshe dang ldan pa shar 'i budang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis ri bo rtso gsum pa la dbyar
gnas pa yang 'ongs so// de nas ded dpon gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag sta gon byas te zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol
bran nas phyag btsabs te/ lhung bzed rgyu bar rig nas/ zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ sngonalan gdab par brtsams pa/ rag/
ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gyur cig// rta cang shes ni ba rgyal tshab gyuratshe// rtelnga brgya bo 'di dag kyang bu lnga brgyar rgyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo btsun
0mo rin po tshor lung pastan pa gang lags pa de ni/ bdag gi btsun mo rin po char gyur cig/ bud med lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba gang lags pa de na de'i 'khor du 'gyur cig/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ ded dpon de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ded dpon byed na 'e khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// rta ru/

shes na khyod kyi bu rgyal tshab tu 'gyur ro// rta lnga brgya pa de dag kyang bu lnga brgyar 'gyur ro// bumonobatsunamo rAni ror 'gyur ro// bu mo bud med lha brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba de dag kyang de'i sa kho/
du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas par ng ldan/ chos gos blon pa dang ldan nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun
dga' bo rgyal po bram ze ma sbyin gyi drung du song la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la/ 'daskade chos rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul du kho bos zla ba gsum gnas zin te/ 'gros shes par
gyis shig ces smos rig btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ rgyal po khran bu ma smin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba
dang/ de'atsha rgyal po bram ze ma sbyin bkra shas 'ong ba la sdod cing 'ag go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ sgonga'i skyes pa la sbas pa/ kyenango rnatshur/ khyod rgyal po bram
gze me sbyin gang na ba der song la phyin nas/ rgyal bo bram ze ma sbyin la 'di skad ces/ dgaslong kun dga' bo lha mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes smos
shig/ ba phugs pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ sgo ba'i skyes pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i ldir mnyan nas// rgyal po bram ze me srin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal
po bram ze ma sbyin la 'di skad ces pas so// lha dag slong 'phags pa kun mkhal dga' bo la 'a zhal mthong mas par 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so//
dres sas pa// kyi skyes bu nga bkrashase'ong ba sdod cing 'dug gis/ dge slong kun dga' bo ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ dre nyidra pa'i bkra shis su gyur cig/ de la ni/
bawang la yod re/ mang bzang ba dang/ gzugs bzang ba dang/ kha dog bzang ba dang/ srobs pa bzang ba dang/ bsgrub pa bzang pa yan gyis nang du ston cig/ sa ldan n
dga' bo la su zhagi 'gog/ sgo ba'i tsho dang pa kun dga' bo la de bzhin du sbas nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bonang du zhugs so// mtha'i rgyal phran gyi tshanya de rnams kyang de nyid dang lhan/
cig nang du zhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal bo bram zo ma sbyin la nad med par gyur cig ces byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/
tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ rgyal po bram za me lcan la 'di skad ces smas so// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas/ khyod nad mad par gyur cige/ rgyal po chen po khyod
kyi yul du sa zla ba gsum du gnas zin te/ 'gros shes par gyis shig ces kyang bka' stsal to// 'phags pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags
pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das dang jag yul dgra mthar dbyarab de bar bzhugs sam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal bar ma gyur grang/ mtha'i rgyal phran gyi pho nya de dag gis smras pa// lha khyod
ni rgyal srid la mi rtog pa lags te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi reg 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du sman drangs te/ mi snang ba'i phyogs su bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
nazla ba gsum du nas rngul pa'i bshos gso'o lags so// des smras pa// 'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum du nas rdul pa'i bshos gsol ba mdad// rgyal
bo chen po mad lags so// de brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang/ tshumang po zhig gto'o nAs/ dbugs slar byung ba dang/ blon po rnams bkug ste rmas pa/ shes ldan
dag ngas khyed cag rnams la nyin re zhing lnga brgya'i bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa rab tu mang po sta gon gyis shig par ma bsko 'am/ de rnams kyis sas pa/ lha de kho na skad bka'asal
pa mchis kyi chog mo zhig la stsol cig ces na khyod kyis bka' ma stsal to/ 'on kyang da dung du zhal zas lta gon na bgyid do// de nas rgyal po bram ze ma sbyin/
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/gos kaci tu'adug ko phyogs gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram
bla ma sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar skong ma bzhin du'o//
lade nas rgyal bo bram ze mi skyen gyis pa com ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nongs lags so// bde bar
gshag pa nongs lags to/ ji ltar yang byas pa lags/ ji ltar yang rmongs pa lags/ ji ltar yang ma gsal ba lags/ ji ltar yang mi mkhas pa lags te/ 'di ltar bdag
gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyin g 'dun dang bcas pa dgung zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas/ mi gda' ba'i phyogs su mchis lags so//'dul ba'i gzhi/
bam po so brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nongs pa de glo bar chud cing nongs par mthong lags na thug brtse bar bar gzung ste//
nongs pa la nongs par gzungadu gsol/ rgyal bo chen po khyod kyis nyos pa nyes par khas blangs na/ bden pa ji ltar na yang byas pa yin/ ji ltar na yang rmongs pa yin/ ji ltar
na yang mu gsal ba yin/ ltar n yang mkhas pa yin/ gang yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas ma snangapa' phyogs na 'dug gam/ rgyal ren
po gang gi phyi'i khyod kyis nyes pa shes shing mthong la/ de mthong nas 'chags par byed na/ khyed kyis dgo pa'i chos rnams nyams par ma 'gyur/ 'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o/
rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhin/ gang yang 'ga' zhig nyes pa shes shing mthong la/ de mthong nas 'chags shing phyi'i sdom par byed na/ dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par ma 'gyur/
'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// rgyal po bram ze ma sun gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig lo/
ba dag gis ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar dun pa za 'a chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzimos cha dang snyan dpyad kyi rkyen snyan gyi yo byad rnams sbyor zhing mchis naganang bar mdzad du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshags pa ni tshe thung ba'i dus su byung zhing/ gdul ba'i don bya la ni rab tu mang la/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la yang
'bab pas mi snang ngo// gal te da ltar lags na/ bcom ldan 'das lo bdunanas/ zla ba bdun dang dgung bdun zhig gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
kyis dar yang ma gnang ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo sram bre ma sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dug 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ sang bdag
gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ngas gal te 'di'i zas gcig kyang gsol bar ma gnangan/
rgyal po bram ze ma sbyin khrag dron du skyugs nas dus las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i gnas yodadosnyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das tsang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas rgyal po
bram zam sbyin rgyas bcom ldan 'daso cang mi gsung bas nang bar rige nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te/ rang gi gnas gang na
bder song so phyin pa dang/ blon po rnams la rgyas pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis na zhal zas 'di thams cad sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong gi dge 'dun gyi longs spyad par 'gyur
ba'i thabs bzang po rtsa yod/ de rnams kyis skyes pa/ lha zhal zas 'di thams cad dogs la bkram la/ dgoso rnams kyi zhabs kyis bcags na/ ded ltar na yongs su long/
cud par 'gyur lags so// des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bal/ 'os ldan dag kha zas ji snyed yod pa'i 'di thams cad s la kun rtakhroms shig/ de rnams kyis thams cad du/
kun tu bkram mo// de nas rgyal po bram ze ma sbyin gyi de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag sta gon byas nas zhes byab nas/ bcom ldan 'das
ge slong gi dge 'dun gyi chung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// ji tsam na rgan zhugs pashig ma bzod pa skyes to/ bag cag zla ba gsum du
nas la pa bos na/ dan rgyal po sngab can 'di'i 'byor pa ston to snyam du bsams nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba sa la bkram pa'i steng du rdog pa'i bstan pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim
bdag rnams/ 'phags pa rnams ni bza' ba dang bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed de zhus sod par byed/ phyir kha gtong bar byed/ kho za bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom
ldan 'das la/ dag slong rnams gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cabyeng bdu na drag slong dag bza' ba dang bca' ba khara gzhug pa'i zas
la rkang pas reg par byed pa yin no snyam nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong rgan zhugs che ge mo zhig ma bzod pa skyes nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba khar/
[r+]/ @#// gzhug pa'i bras sa la bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnan pas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams rtsod par byed/ phyar ba gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed do//
de lta bas na dag slong gis bza' ba dang bca' ba khara gzhug pas zas la rkang pas brtag par mi bya'o// bcags na'agal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po bram ze ma sbyin gyis sangs
rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs pa dag nas/ gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stongos shing tshim par byed de zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te/
lhung bzed rgyu bar 'gro nas/ snyan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya pa'i der gong ma bzhin du'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
rgyal po bram zemasmyon la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rang
tshu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzani du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' khor
mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhes te gshegs so// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dbyar zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas/ chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas/
[rs/ ]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ dge slong rab/
tumang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ce gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag gis yul dag mtha' rnams su dgung zla gsum mchis lags kyis btsunapa la bu gzhig lags/
so// dge slong dag khyed kyis spyil bu ma gzhig cagi/ la pa rnams ji srid du yun ring du gnas pa gyur pa de srid du sbyin bdag gi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ba nyid dang/ bsod nams spyod
par 'gyur ba nyid do// bzhi po 'di dag na sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin bdag gi bsod rnams kyi rgyumathun pa dang/ dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang/ bde ba'i gzhi yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang
zhe na/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dgaba'i chos la gnas pa zhig gang gi gtsug lag khang na gnas shing sems kyi ting nge 'dzani tshad med pa 'i 'asakyis mngon sumadu
byas nasardzogs par byas te gnas na/ bzhi de las sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin bdag gi risod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang/ bde ba'i gzhi dpag tu med par dge par
bya'o// gtsug lag khang ji lta par chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gnas mal yang de dang 'dra ste/ bsod nams kyi rtse mthun pa dang/ dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang/ bde ba'i
khazhi bzhi bo 'di dag dang ldan pa ba spyan ba bo dang/ sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshad re zhig bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/ bsod nams kyi
'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa 'di tsamamo zhes gzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang bsod nams tshapa'i phyi'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes pa'i grangs su 'gro'o// dbangan/ chu bo chen po lnga po
yaM 'di lta ste/ gang+gA dang/ yamun dang/ sarayu dang gnus ldan dang/ chen po zhes bya ba de dag 'bad cing 'du bar 'gyur de la ni/ chu'itshid chu'am/ chu bum pa 'am/ chu bum pa
brgya'am/ chu bum pa stong ngam/ chubus pa brgya stong 'di phyed dus gzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang chu mang ba'i phyir/ chu'i tshogs chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba de bzhin du/ bsod
nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang/ dgo pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang/ bad ba'agazhi bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa dang/ sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshad bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu
'am[0f10 ]bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam por smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes gzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// ji
ltar rgya mtsho bkra shis gtsang la dag/ ngogs bad rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho mchog der// mi dang ri dgas tshogs kyis bstan pa yi// tshul so sonas 'bab du ba ltar// de bzhin gos dang
'a bos sgom 'ba' ma/ mal cha stan dang gdang ba spyan byed la/ bsod nams rgyun ni kun nas 'du 'gyur te// dper na rgya mtshoratshaklung 'bab pa bzhin/
thatshom skye nas/ tharom thams cad gcodapa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ gang gis na phyag dang/ zhangs
dang/ dbul sogs pa bkum pa la sogs pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis slong mo pa'i skyes bo tshim par mdzad ra/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du sems can gyi don gyi slad du/
brdas nyid 'o brgyal nas mdzad pa thams cad mdzad lags pa// yul dang mtha' na dag slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis mtshang ba dang thabs cig tunas rul pa gsol la/ tshe dang ldan pa
sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis ni bdud rtsi 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan
rnams su las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes byaba'i bar gong ma bzhin du// dag slong dag sngon byung bas dga' tshe lo brgyad khri thub
pa na/ 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtenamathunapa/ skyes bu
[9]@#/ 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyug/ dran med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamapar gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung// de la khor dag song

/ brgyad khri dang rgyal bo'i pho brangaganyen ldan zhes bya ba to bar brtan cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brangaganyanaldan na/ tshogs rnams slob par byed pa'i bram ze zhige lnga brgya'i tshogs
la bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'jug ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang lhag par bkur sti byas/ rimazo byas/ rjed par byas/ mchodapar byas te/ dgra bcom par bkur ro// gang kho
nanas yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs rgyal po'i pho brang gnyan ldan du gshegs pa de lo nanas bzung// de la su yang bkur sti bya ba dang/ rim gror bya ba
dang rjod par bya ba rang/ mchod par bya ba ma byed pa dang/ de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la shin tu phrag dog
skyes bar gyur te// jatsaman dge slong slob pa dang mi slob pa rab tu mang po/ snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyan ldan du bsod snyoms
la zhugs pa dang/ de nas tshod ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang 'bras chan gyis lhung bzed bkang ste// slar log pa bram ze des mthong nas dris pa// kyi dag slong dag nga 'dra ba'i bso snyoms ]
zhal med ltago dag drang po'i ring bzhanican yin pas bstan pa dang/ de phrag dog gi ring bzhin can zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas/ bram bra' bya'u rnams la ngos te sbas pa/ dag sbyong
mgo reg 'di dag nitshod ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang 'bras chan za bar 'os pa ma yin gyi/ nas rul pa za bar 'os pa yin no// de rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rangs nas/ mkhan po de'i lta
lags te/ dag sbyong mgo reg 'di ga tshod ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang 'bras chana'atshal bar 'os pa ma lags kyi/ nas rul pa 'tshal dar 'os pa lags so// de na ya nga bram ze'i khye'u
bzang po dad ba can dag ba'i bsams pa can gnyis shig 'dug pa de dag gis mkhan po de skad ma gsung zhig/ 'di dag ni bdag nyid chen po ste/ lha'i bdud rtsi 'tshal bar 'os pa lags kyi/
nas rul pa ni 'os pa ma lags so zhes sbas so// dgasang dag ji sam dusams/ de'i tshade'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi rnams la stod par byed pa gang yin pa

de nga nyid yin no// bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyaraganyis kyis ma tshang ba gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong ldabargyarags kyis ma tshang ma 'di dag yin no// bram ze'i khye'u bzang bo dad pa can dge ba'i
bsam pa can ganyis po gang yin pa de ni go slong shA'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di gnyis yin te/ ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nyen thos slob pa
(@#// dngami slob pa rnams la/ sams gdug pas ngag gi las rtsub mo byung ba dang/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyaraganyis kyis ma tshang bas rjes su yi rang pa dang/ gnyis sa
rjes su ya ma rang po gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ rdo bar yul dag mtha'i de bzhin gshags pa dag slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis mtshab dang thabs cig tunas tshul la gsol to//
shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis nalha'i bdud rtsi la longs spyod do// dag slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las rnam par smin pa ni gcig tuganag pa yin la zhes bya ba
nAs gtsag tu dkar ba'i las rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dag slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo tshugs dka' ba gang na bder 'dong ngo// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
'dus kyi ltar mnanas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs lnga len nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ tshugs dkaragshegs nas/ tshugs dka' chubo d+hA'i 'gram na bzhugs
so// de nas dag slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gangan pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs kacig tu 'dug
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ dag slong des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos nas gcig rta dpon pa
bag yod pa/ na pa dang ldan pa// bdag nyid gtod par gnas so// gcig tu dpanar// bag yor pa/ brtan pa dang ldan pa/ bdag kyod katod par gnas pa na/ gang gtso
rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha sbu dregs nas/ gos dur siT bgros te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bgyid pa/ tshongs par spyod pa'i matha'i bla
na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te bsgrubs nas/ bdag gi skye bzad do// tshangs par spyod pa la brtan to// bya ba byas so// 'di las srid pa
gzhan mangeshas so zhes go bar bgyid pa'i chos de lta bu mdor bsdus te gas par bshad du gsol zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das chubokang kangan ba de logs su
gzigs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chu bo gang+g+hA'i rgyunagyis shing sdong po chago mig ra ba gzigs so// gatrakas nas kyang dag slong de la bka'asulalo/ dge slong khyod la
chu bo gang+ga'i rgyunagyisabashang sdong po chen po byar ba mthong ngam/ btsun mthong lags so// gal te 'di tshul gyi 'gram du ma chags/ rol gyi 'gram dang/ dbus su ma
]chags 8 skam la ma byung/ mi dang mi ma yin pas ma bzung/ glong du ma rung khong rul bar ma gyur na/ dag slongashing sdong chen po de ni rim gyis rgya mtshor
gzhol bar 'gyur/ rgya mtshor 'bab par 'gyur/ rgya mtshor bab par 'gyur de bzhin du/ gal te dgoslong gyod gyis tshul la ma chags zhes bya banas/ khong rul bar ma gyur/
