na/ de lta na dge slong khyod rimakyis mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar 'gyur/ mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab par 'gyur/ myang n las 'das pa la bab par 'gyur la/
btsun pa bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ tshu rol gyi 'gram na ci lags/ pha bo'abagyi 'gram ni ci lags/ dbus su thogs pa ni ci'i gas/ skam la byang pa na rtsolags/ mes
pazung ba na co lags ma ma lags pas bzung ba na re lags glong du nub pa ni colags/ khong rul ba nici'i gas/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan
'das 'as dag gis mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos nas zhes bya ba nas/ 'di las srid pa gzhan mareshes so zhes bgyi bas de lta bu mdor bsdus te legs
par bdag la bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dag slong tshu rol gyi 'gram zhes bya ba de ni nang gi skye mched drug gi tshig bla dgas yanin// pha rol gyi 'gram
[6 ]/zhes bya ba de ni phyi'asu mchid drag gi tshig bla dgas yin// dbus su thogs pa zhes bya ba de na dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi tshig bla dgas yanan// skam las byung ba zhes bya bden
nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gi tshig bla dgas yin na// mas bzung ba zhes ba ni 'di ltar 'di na la la rab tu byang ba dang/ khyim pa 'dres par gnas to dga' r mtshungs pa dang/ bde ba mtshungs
pa dang/ badre na bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal na sdug bsngal zhing/ 'phral gyi bya ba byung zhing byung pa rnams yang dag par blangs te/ mthar 'byin par byed pa lta bu yin no// mi ma yin pasazin
pa zhes bya ba na ltar 'di na la la tshul khrims sam/ brtul zhugs sam/ ka'i thub bam/ tshangs par spyod pa brten pa 'dis bdag lha lam/ lha gang yang rung bzhig tu gyur cig
ces smon lam btab nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lta bu 'o/ glong du nub pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'di na la la bslab pa phul nas babs pa lta bu yin na// khong rul pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'di
nal la tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos can/ khong myagasangashing phyir 'dzag nga/ shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa/ lug bong ltar spyod pa/ drag sbyong ma yin la/ dag sbyong
du khas 'chapa/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par/ tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba yod pa ltadu yin te// dag slong khyed kyis gal te de bzhin du tshu rol gyi 'gram du mthogos
[n ]@#/ ]zhes byab sa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la bab par 'gyur rdo zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas dag slong dang com ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
dga' ste rjes su yi rangunas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'atsal to/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo// de nas dge slong dbcom ldan 'das kyis
shing sdong po chen po'i dpa 'di'i gdams ngag gis gtamos te/ gcig pur dben pa/bag yod pa/ rdzun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyare gtod par gnas pa na/ gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams sgra
dang kha pa blugs nas/ gos ngur s+sa gabagos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim mad par rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' blon med pado/ tshad nyid la rang gi
mngon pa shes pas mngon sum du byas te bslabs nas/ bdag gi skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa la brten te// bya ba byas so// 'di las srid pa gzhan mashes bya ba shas nas sgo
bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa de dgra bcomalo/ samasapashan kha rnam par grol pas myur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ gnag rdzi dga' bo zhes
byab 'dug par gyur pa/ 'khar ba la brtenanas gnag skyong zhing 'dug pa las/ de'abar bas sbal pa zhig pardzas so// de gnad rnams chad la zug/ tshigs rnams bya la/

b+hagab pa dang sems bskyed pa// gal te bdag gyis lus 'bul lamaskad phyungan/gzhi di gnag rdzi dga' bo'i gtam gyi bar chad du 'gyur snyam du ga nas/bcom ldan 'das la mngon par da bar byas s shing dang//
lachen pa zha'i rigs kyi lha rnams s rgyas so// de nas gnag rdzi dga' bos la bar pa phyogs gtsad du bzhi g nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang nab der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo'-i
phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'gu nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gnag rdzi dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag natshurtsol gyi 'gram du ma chags/pha rol gyi 'gram du
chachagagadabus su mchas/skam la ma byung/ mis mi bzung/ mi ma lags pas ma bzung/ glor du mi 'byin/khong du ma 'dul bar bgyi lagAn/legs par gsus pa'i saM 'dul ba la bdag rab tu byung

ba dang/ sen par rdzogs pa dag sod gdangos po thob pa lta na/ bar g bcom ldan 'das kyi man sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// dga' bo khyod kyis bdag po rnams la gnag tar dam/btsunapa mi 'tshol
lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhin btsunupa ba rnams kyang gzhon la/pe'u mas kyang 'tshar lags te/so so'aganag ra 'tshal bas/soso'i gnas su mchis lags pas/bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul

ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ba ltan bdagan bcom ldan 'dasakyi spyan snga tshangs par spyod bslad par bgyi'o// dga' thob rnams kyang gzhon la dbe'u rnams kyang ra
[f ]te/ rang rang gnag ra hipas/rang rang gi gnas su 'gro rgyur mod kyi/'on kyang zhag rdzi zas dang gos bgagar byed pas ni'altar ba dag pa rnams la dbya dgos so// de nas gnag rdzi de ga'
bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgobo phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyispyan sn gnas song ngo// dunas 'jigs so 'jiges so zhes sgra chen po 'byin cing brgyag par brtsams pa
dang lam gyi bar nus gnag rdzo poshes lnga brgyas mthor// de rnams kyis sbas pa/ ci zhig gis 'jigs/ des smras pa/ skye bas 'jigs so/ rga pas 'dzags
so rta'achibs 'jigs so// de rnams kyang de'i phyi bzhin du brgyug par brtsams pa dang/ gnag rdzi dang/ phyugs rdzi dang/ rtswa thun dang/ shing thun dang/ lam gyis 'tsho
ba dang/ lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi gzhan dag kyang/ de rnams mthong nas brgyug par brtsams so// lam gyi mdun nas 'ongs pa rnams kyis de dag de ltar sgra 'byin pa mthong
nas/ de rnams kyis dros pa ]shes ldan dag 'di ci zhige/ de rnams kyis skyas/ 'jigs so// cazhig gis 'jigis/ skya bas 'jigs so// rgabs 'jigs so//
'tsha pas 'jigs so// de rnams kyis thos nas slar log go/ dzatsam nar 'or dang nyapazhig tu phyin pa/ donas ra 'or de na gnas pa'i skyo po'i tshogs des/ skye bo'i tshogs chen bod
00 mthong nas/ sngas bas phan tshun du 'dong bar byed do/ kha cig ni bros so// kha cig na rdzas rnams spyad do// kha cig na go bgos nas 'dug go/ ma dpa' bo gzhan dag cig yod
pa de dag gis bsu nas dras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'jigs so// ci zhig gas 'dzags/ skye bas 'jigs so// rgya bas 'jigs so//
'chibs 'jigs so// de nas ra 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo' tshogs de bag phabs so// de'i tshe tshad dang ldan pa shAri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas
tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gnag rdzi dga' bo song nas ring po ma lon par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol tu// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad
du gnag rdzi dga' bo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal ba bzlog te sman par btang lags/ shA ra'i bu gnag rdzi dga' bo slar khyim pa khyim na gnas
pa gang yin pa danA gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gsog 'jog yongs su srong pas 'dod pa rnams la logs spyod par 'gyur ba de ni gnas mdad// gnag rdzi dga' bo
de'u re bdag po rnams la gnag katad de 'ong bar 'gyur zhing/ de gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos dur smig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas
ga khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med patsho da nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te/ rdzogs
par byas nas/ skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa la brten to// bya ba byas so/ 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed par 'gyura'o// de nas dus gzhan
zhig na gnag rdza dga' bos bdagubo rnams lanag gtud nas 'khor lnga brgyudang/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis bdag po rnams la gag gtad lags te/ btsun pa bdag lags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byang bu dang/ bsan par
rdzogs pa dag slong gi dngos po thob pa ltan/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar tshangs par smon pa sad par bgyi'o// legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la gnag
rdzi dga' bo 'khor lnga brgyudang rab tu byung ba dang/ bstan par rdzogs pa dgo slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to// de ltar rab tu byung pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa de zhes bya ba nas/
sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur cis bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du 'o// chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring por ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/
[z]/ gang nas shi 'phosapa dang/ gang du skyes pa dang/ las gang gis yin pa'o// sngon sbal par byed byed pa'i lha'i dus bltas na/ dudu 'gro dag nas 'phos pa dang/
rgyal chen bzhi'i sems kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon pa dad pas yin nas/ de 'di snyam du sams te/ bdag gis gang yang zhag/
'an nas/ bcom ldan 'dus la blta ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis zhag ma len pa kho nas bcom ldan 'das la blta
ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bus rnachadra la med pagayo ba thogs nas zhes bya ba nas/ gang ba 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen
pos gsol bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhe tog gis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis sngon sbrul pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor
rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ de thos pas zhes bya ba nas/ thogs med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mthob ye shes kyi rdo rjes
ga/ bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du ba sa te/ btsun pa bdag na 'o phags so// mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
du'o// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dag slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bar g dag bsten du rgyazung du gsol/ deng sun chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar/
du srol dang yang bsdos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas sngon sbal par byed byed pa'i lha'i bu tshong pa 'i sogs red pa lta bu dang/ zhing pa lo tog legs pa
ba lta bu dang/ dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang/ nad pa nad thams cad 'as thar pa lta bur 'byor pa gang gis/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa
nyid dang/ rang gi gnas su song ngo// dag slong rnams nam gyi cha ster dang/ nam gyi cha smad la ma nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson zhing gnas pa de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi spyan snga nas snang brgya chen po mthong ngo// de mthong nas kyang thatshom du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'das la zhus pa/ ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das mdang bcom ldan
! 'das labalta ba'i slad du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'a ma/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba pa' mchis sam/ dgaslong dag nga blta ba'i phyir/
ba0 mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang gnag rdzi dga' bo'i 'bar
bas sbal pa brdzis te/ gnad rnams kyang chad la thug/ tshigs rnams kyang bya la thug pa dang/ gnag rjes dga' bo'i gtum bar chad par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ mi g.yo
zhing sgra ma byung bar 'dug nas/ nga la sanas mngon par dad par byas nas shi ba dang/ rgyal chen bazhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa de nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongos nas/ mdang ngas de
la chos bshad nas bden pa mthong ste/ rang ga gnasasu song ba yin// dag slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ tha chom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gnag rdzi dga' bo dang/ 'khor lnga brgyas las ci zhig bgyis na/ gnag rdzi dag gi nang du skyes shing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung
nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis lags/ sngon sprul pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bus las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na sbalo pa
skyes par gyur cing bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de nyid kyis las byas shing bsags la/ tshogs red pa zhes bya ba
[]// nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyide la/ skye dgu'/

tshe lo nyakhri thub pa ni/ ston pa 'od sras zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba so zhes bya ba nas/ dawA ra NA sa'i grong khyer na drang song snyapa ra dogs kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so zhes
bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i gsung rab la gnag rdzi dga' bo rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum pa/ chos sa ba/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can/ 'khor lnga brgya pa rtsod
pa'i chos la mkhas pa zhig ste/ de dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa byung zhing byang ba rnams zhi bar byed pa dang/ de nas dag slong khangs pa nga rgyal can ganyis shig lan 'ga' yang de'i drung du mi
'dong ngo// dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis phan tshunang rtsod po byung naso/ don de'i phyir de gnyis de'i drung du dong nas/ rkang pa la byag byas te smas pa/ bdag cag gnyis la 'jo deng
'di lta bu'i rtsod pa byung na zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ des bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di gnyis kyi rtsod pa dang kho na zhi bar byas na rag ma las pas/ 'di gnyis phyis 'ong bar
mi 'gyur ro snyam nasaM/ des dge 'dun thams cad bsogs nas rtsod pa de dge 'dun gyi nang du glengs nas chad par ni ma byas so// phyi de nyidi yang de la ra khor du dgos pa zhaka
byung nas re rer song ba dang/ de nas de gnyis kyis thogs so zhes dge 'dun gyi nang du rtsod pa de glangs nas/ de nas dge 'dun gyis zhi bar byas so// ji tsam na dag slong sde snod
gsum pa de ra 'or de nas 'os te lam gyis ba ba bsal nas lhan cig gnas pa dang/ nyakanag rnams la dris pa/ ra zhig rtsod pa dang rtsod zla gnyis mi 'ong ngam/ de rnams kyis
smras l/ mkhan po de gnyis kyi rtsod pa de zhi bar bkris lags so// su zhig gis zhi bar byas/ drage 'dun gyis so// ji ltar byas/ de rnams kyis rgyas par sbas pa dang/
sa ngag rtsub po'i las phyung ba/ tshe dang ldan pa dag mi shes te/ ji ltar gnag rdzi rnams kyi ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas so// de rnams kyis kyang mkhan po de de bzhin te/ ji ltar
gnag rdza rnams kyi ltar rtsod pa zhi bar bgyisaso zhes mthun par sbas so// dag slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dag slong snga snod gsum pa gang yin pa de ni/
gnag rdzi dga' bo 'di nyid yin no// de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang/ nya gnas lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni gnag rdzi lta brgya bo 'di dag nyid yin no// gang yang 'dis yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la gnag rdzi zhes bya ba'i tshig smras shing/ lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kyis kyang mthun par smras
pas / las de'i rnam par smin pas/ tshe rabs lnga brgyar 'khor lnga brgya dang/ gnagardzi rnams su skyes par gyur to/ gang 'das bklags shing
bton pas/ phung po la mkhas pa dang/ khams 'amakhas pa dang/ skye ma chod la mkhas pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mdzes pa dang/ gnas dang gnas ma yin
pa la mkhas par byas pa'i/ dralta' da 'khor lnga brgya dang/ nga'i bstan pa 'du rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dag
slong dag sngon slal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu yang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la nu'i gsung rab la dge slong srongab pa zhig tu gyur te/ ljongs rgyu zhing song pa dang/ ji
'or zhag nagatsug lag khang zhig yod pa der son to// du mtshan mo'i thun dang po la sal mo krung bcas te// yid la bya bgoms par bya bar brtsams pa dang/ de tsem na 'don pa byed/
pa'i dge slong rnams kha ton byed pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi tshor ma ni sgra yin pas/ de sgras sums rtse gcig nyid du ma btub nas/ des bsams pa/ 'di dag kha ton/
bor dachug/ gung thun la 'dug par bya'o snyam nas/ gung thun la langs te 'dug pa dang/ ji tsam na dge slong gzhan dag kha ton byed nas/ phun tham la 'dug par bya'o snyam
da thunatha ma la las te 'jug pa dang/ ji tsam nagazhan dag kha ton byang nas/ de 'dodochags dang bral ba ma yin pas kun nas dkris pa drag po skyes nas/ des smras pa///
'od srungs kyi dag sbyong 'di rnams ni sprul pa bzhin mtshan thog tag sgra 'byin to zhes byas so// dag slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dge slong song ba pa gang yin pa de ni/ sngon sbal ra/
byad byed pa'i lha'i bu 'o di yin te/ gang yang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi nyan thos rnams la sbal pa zhes tshagi tu smras pas/ las de'i rnam par
snyani pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar sprul par skyes par gyur te/ de lta'i bar du yang sbal par skyes pa yin no/ gang yang nga la soms mngon par dad par byas pas/ des na rgyal
chen bazhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes par gyur to// gang yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs lasatshangs par sbyod pa spyad pas/ des na da ltar bden pa mngon par byas so//
dge slong dag de lta bas na gtsag tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/ brtson par bya ste// dag slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la
bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+gargal ba dang/ de ni ngang pa dang/ nya dang
rus sbal lnga brgyas bskor bskor ba byas so//de rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshagi gsum gyis chos bshad pa mdzad de/ bzhan bzangs dag 'di ltar 'du byed
thams cad ni ma rtag pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin pas/ nga la sems mngon par dad par gyis la/ ci nas kyang dud 'gro/
skye gnas la 'dod chags dang bral bar gyis shig/ de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag cag kas bcom ldan 'das la tshig gsum gyis chos thos nas/ kha zas za bar byed
pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam nas/ da rnams kyis kha thas bcad pa dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams ni mi rigs tshabs dus las 'das te shi 'phos pa dang/ rgyal chen
bzhi'i sa kyi lha rnams su skyes so// chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas/ ring po ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gong nas shi 'phos pa dang/ gang du
skyes pa dang/ las kang gis yin pa'o// de rnams kyis bltas na/ dud 'gro dag las shi' thos nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes ba dang zhes bya ba nas/
ma tog man daras thu ba kang// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor dang/ chu bo god+ma snang bas gsal bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mi tog gis gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das/
la kun nas bskor te 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden/
pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jage tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtswa lo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes/
bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bdenapa mthong ba dang/ des lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa
'dra lta bu ni bdag cag la bas ma bgyis te/ mas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang/ gtan gyi tshogs dang/ sdug pas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams
kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa (bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/ sems can
dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dag rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/ lha dang mi rnams su na rab tu bkod/ 'khor ba las na ring du mdzad/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho
ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo yis ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bku9/ mtho si dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phyi/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig
tshogs la lta ba'i ro'i rtsa ma nyashu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa bdag cag na 'bags
so rna mngon par 'phags so/ bdag cag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du
gzung du gsol/ dung man chad ji srid 'tsho bab bar dusrog dang yang bsdos te/ skyabs su mchi par mngon par dad lags so// de nas sngon 1 dang/ dang pa dang/ rus sbal/
byed byed pa'i lha'i bu de rnams tshong pa la pags rud pa lta bu dung zhes bya ba nas/ rang gi gnas su dong ngo zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong rnams
the tshom skyes nas/ tha tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa 1dang/ ngang pa dang/ rus sbal 'ar rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis
na des na ngang pa dang/ nyadang/ rus sbala rnams su skyes lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na lha rnams su skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag ngang pa dang nya dang rus sbal 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs red pa dag na zhes/
bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dag slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'du nyed la skye dgu' tsho la nyi khri thub pa
na/ ston pa 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/ de wA ra Nasa'i grong khyer na drang srongs ba ri degs kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar
gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i bstan pa la de rnams rab tu byung bar gyur to/ de na dge slong de rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo phra mo rnams dral bas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas
nyarang/ ngang pa dang/ rus sbal rnams su skyes par gyur to// gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na lha rnams su skyes par gyur to// gang yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
sangs rgyas 'od srungs las tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa des na bden pa mthong bar byas so// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig
juganag ba yin la zhes bya ba nas/ brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal te zhes bya pa'i bar go ma bzhin du'o/
de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+gargal ba dang yi dgas sdong dum tshig pa lta bu/ keng rus bskyeng ba lta bu/ rang gi las lus yog pa/ lto ri sul ltar 'dug
@#/ pa la khab kyi mig tsam yod pa/ 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun rab tu 'bar te/ ma lca gcig tugyurapa lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor nas/ de
/ rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// btsun pa bdag cag yi dgas rnams rnam ba'u ltung ba'i lus can rnams lags te/ sngon gyi las kyi nongs pas chad kyang ma red
lags na/ 'tshalam mthong ba la sos kyang ca' tshal/khyod ni thugs rje chen po mnga' ba lags na bdag cag la chab stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la chu bo gang+ga bstan
nas chu bsal skye bo kun gyis nyo bar spyad bya ba// skal ldanu shang rta klung chen 'di ni grong dag dang// yul 'khor dgadang grong khyer tshom par byed cing 'dra ba// zhing rnangs lu ku mud
dang al sman// yi dgas rnams kyis gsol pa// chu bo skye bo kun gyis/bar spyad bgyi ba// skal ldan shing rta 'bab 'di bdag cag rnams la bsams// 'dan phrag ga dri mas gang
zhang lag pa ni// dbyag pa dgra par bcas pa thogs pas 'di bsrangs mthong// khacom ldan 'das kyis g+hApa'i lha la bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni grong dang yul 'khor grong khyen cham
N+NaM khyad cing// zhing sa lu ku chu da dang ut+pal skrun// ci phyir yi rigs skom pas rab nyan tshom ma byed/ khyod la byis pa'i skye bo sdug bsngal snying rje mod// gang+gA'i lhas gsol/
ba byas pa'i skya bo la bdag 'jigs pas ma lags shing// tshig rtsub byas kyang mi mthun chab gtong ma brgyud de/ nangs bgyis sgrib pa chen pos bskyabs pa 'di dag la// chu bo
bskams rgyur 'di la bdag gis ci zhig nongs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'baka' sa lapa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu ya rags rnams la chu
lud cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yi dgas rnams chu blud pa'i brtsams pa dang/ yi dgas/
de rnams kyi la khab mig tsam po dag bskyod par ma nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ de rnams kyi la bskyed nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi butshan res chu blud pa dang/
de rnams skom pas nyen pas mang du 'thungs pa'i lo rgyas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dang pa bskyed nas sha'o zhes bya kho nas/ bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su
song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 8ga slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcong pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa yi/
dgas 'di rnams kyis ci zhig bgyis na/ des na yi dgas rnams su skyes lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na des na lha rnams sa skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags btsom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsalal/ dag slong dag 'di dgad kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes/

bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dag slong dag sngon byung ba bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tsholo to lnga thub pa na ston pa 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas//
de wA ra NA si'i grong khyer na drang srong smras pa dgas kyi nag so na ta bar brtan cing bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i nyan thos rnams kyis dad pa las bsrubs nas/ sangs
rgyus dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la bya ba byed do// gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi bstan pa rgyas par ma gyur pa de'i tsho/ dad pa 'dri ba'i dag

zla slong yang nyung bar gyur to// gang ga tshargyas par gyur ba de'i tshe/ dud pa 'dri ba 'dag slong yang mang bar gyur to// ji tsam na 'dun khang zhig dag bstan lnga brgya 'ga' zhig 'phyir lhags shing
'dus par gyur ba dang/ dang ba 'dri ba'i dge slong rab tu mang po dag de rnams kyi drung du dong nas/ sbyin du gzhug par 'dod pa na/ de rnams kyis kun nas dkris pa drag pos ngag rtsub pogalas

phyung ga ra srungs kyi dge sbyong ba rnamA ni yi rigs rnams su skyes pa bzhin rtag tu lag pa zad par byed do zhes smras so// dag slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dge bsnyen lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de
tsa tsha/ dag ni yi dgas lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/ gang yang 'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi nyan thos rnams la/ yi dgas kyi tshig sbas pa'i las
da'i rnamapar sman pas tshe rab lnga brgyar yi dgas rnams su skyes pa gyur te/ da lta'i bar du yang yi dgas rnams su skyes pa yin no// gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa
dus na lha rnams su skyes so// gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des khas pa la bden pa mthong bar byas so//
dag slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par snyan pa ni gcig tshuganag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/ brtsal par bya ste/ dag slong dag khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab
par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/zhes pa'i phar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+gA las rgal ba na/ glang po che'i lta stangs kyis g.yas phyogs
nas chu bo gang+gal gzages pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'oslad du g.yas phyogs nas chu bo kAng la gzigs par mdzad/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed cag chu bo gang+gA'i gleng gzhi nyan par 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ra de 'i dus la bab lags so// bde bar gshegs pa da de'i sa
a ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chu bo gang+gA'agling gzhi bong lag pa khabad na dgaso rnams nyan par 'gyur lags so///'dul ba gzhi/
(bam po sodagu pa// dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po smyug sbams zhes zhes bya ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan po zhig byung ste/ de'i yul
'byor pa dang/ rgyus pa dang/ bad pa dang/ lo legs pa// skye bo dang ma mang pos gang pa/shing me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa/ lha rnams dus su char bobs pas/ sa gzhi
lo tog dang ldan zhing 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'khrug long dang/ chom rkun dang/ mu ga dang/ nad rnams rab tu zhi bar gyur la/ mi rnams rtag tu chos la
gzhol ba na/ chos gyis rgyal srid byed du 'dug go/ dza tsam na rgyal po de so ga'i dus la bab nas shing rnams kyi me tog la 'dus shing ngang pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ netso dang/
ra stegs dang/ khu byug dang/ shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byon pa'i nags khrod du/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas/ skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su song ba dang/ ji tsam na
ma lus gnyer mas gab/ mgo skya ba/ lus kyi yan lag rus pa/ dbang po rgud pa/ sha skem pa/ zho sha chung ba zhage 'bar ba la brten nas/ gom pa dal bu dal bus 'gro ba zhig
mthong ngo// de nas rgyal pos/ blun po rnams las pa/ shes ldand ga ma lus gnyer mas gang ba/ mgo skya ba zhes byab nas/ 'khar ba la brten nas 'gro ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes
bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o// de rnams kyis sbas pa/ lha de ni 'du byed rnams dongs pas rgas 'khog pa zhes bgyi'o// rgyal pos sar// shes ldan drag ja la yang 'di lta
bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur rom/ de rnams kyis sas pa/ lha chos brda ni thun mong lags so// de nas rgyal po yid mi bde zhing chas pa dang/ yang mi skya bo rbab rbab po/ lus
gsazhing rgyud rgyud po/ lho rwasul ltar 'dug pa/ rmanag gis gang la/ yan lag dang nying lag rnams las 'dzag pa lhan ba rnams kyis dkris pa zhig/ shugs ring po
ring bor 'byin cing 'bar ba la brten nas 'theng zhing 'gro bar chas pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ sa ldan dag maskya bo bsang bsang po zhes bya ba nas/
'thung 'gro bar chas pa 'dang zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de rnams kyis smras pa// lha 'di ni nad kyis las pa zhes bgyi'o// rgyal pos sbas pa/ shes ldan dag
nga la yang 'di lta bu ba chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ blon po rnams kyis rgyas pa// lha chos 'di ni thun mong lags te/ nyes par spyod pa'i las bgyis pa rnams la sngon gyi las kyi skyes
pas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams pa// rnam pa thams cad du sdug pa mi bya'o snyam du bsams nas chas pa dang/ yang dus nas sngon po dang/
san po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnams kyis phyogs brgyananas/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ phan dang/ dung dang/rda pa Ta hadang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med
dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dag bun 'jo zhing ma bzhes bta gnas / mgyogs mas na sna drangs/ skyes bu lag na shing thogs pa dag ni phyi pazhin 'brang zhing/ kyi hud pha//
kyi rgyud sngagar// kyi rgyud sban/ kyi hud jo bo zhes kun tu dud mo'i sgra 'don pa/mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la sbas pa/ shes ldan dag ras sngon pa dang/
sur po dang/ dmar po dwang/ dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan cing zhes bya panas/ dung mo'i sgra 'don pa 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// blon po rnams
kyis sa pa// lha 'di ni bum pa zhes bgyi'o// rgyal pos sa pa/ shes ldan dag nga la yang 'di lta bu chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha chos 'di
nathun mong lags so// de nas rgyal bos rgas pa dang/ nad pa dang/ shi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste/ bdag gyis kyang 'di lta bu'i las spyod rnams spang dgos so snyam/
tha nas[0f10 ]slar log ste mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug go/ de'i yul na bram ze dus dpog ces bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang pa/ longs spyod che ba zhig yod de/ des ji ltar rgyal pos/
rgyas ba dang/ nad pa dang/ shaM ba mthong ste yid phyung nas/ mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug pa thos so// thos nas kyang bram ze brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing/ shing rta rta
rgod ma dang ldan pa thams cad nasadakar ba'i nang du zhugs te/ gsan gyi 'khan pa dang la ba spyi blugs thogs nas/ rgyal po sbag sbas gang na bder song ste phyin pa dang/ rgyal po la/
blon po rnams kyis smas pa/ lha bram ze dus dpog chab sgo namachis so// de nas rgyal po phyir byung nas rgyal po phyir byung nas dkor khang du 'dug pa dang/ bram ze dus dpog gis rgyal
ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas te 'dug nas smras pa// lha ci'i slad du thugs ngan gyi khang par zhugs te bzhuges ]rgyal pos ji ltar gyur pa thams bam ze dus dpog la rgyas par sbas pa dang/
des snyas pa// lha 'jig rten nIrang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa lags pas 'di la thugs ngan brgyar ma mtshes so// sems can legs pa'i las bgyis pa rnams
kyang mtshes/ nyes pa'i las brgyud pa rnams kyang mchis/ gnyis ka'i las bgyid pa yang mchis te/ 'khor los sgyur ba rnams ni rtag tu las legs pa brgyader/ [.]kum na yang
lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// lha yang 'khor los sgyur ba lags te/ mi'i bde ba khyad par du 'phags pa bstar nas/ lha'i bde ba yang nyams su bstarang ra
'gyur mod kyi/ lha 'on kyang mtho ris kyi tham skas su gyur ba mchod sbyin la brtson par mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal pos/ blon po rnams la bgo/ shes ldan dapa yul thams cad du
dril sgrogs su chug ste/ rgyal po gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed kyis// khyed shog la longs spyod tsag ces sgo zhig/ de nas rgyal pos sbyin pa'i khang pa brtsig tu btsu gnas /
zas 'o dod pa rnams la zas/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba byin no/ der 'bras khu dbo bo'i dang dag byas nas/ der dron po dge blugs pa dang bsal bar gyur
pas ma dros pa mu tshes pa zhes bya bar grags so// de'i 'bras bu dang/ 'bras bkrus pa'i khu bas lo bcu gnyis tshang bar bkang bas lung par rgyun pa'i kha de nas 'bab tshur bab/
pas/ 'bras khu'i chu 'bras bu'i chu zhes bya bar grags so/ sdom la gzhon du skyes dang glang chen sgra// dpung rgyun ldan dang nor bu can// sa la stobs dang
sA la'i stobs// gsar bu dang ni gnas bcas dang/ thug pa dang namanyan yod dang// ma dros grong khyer ban du dang/ yangs pa can na tha ma yin// de nas bcom
ba ldan 'das yul gzhon nu bskyod par gshags nas/ gzhon nu bskyod par tsho dngaldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir rgyal po gso sbyong 'a'ags zhes/
bya ba btsas nas 'di nyid du chen por gyur to// des na grong khyer yang gzhon nu bskyod pa zhes bya bar grags so// khrung khrung sa can du gshags nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gyis//

tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khrung khrung sa 'dare rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi glang po che dam pas khrung khrung zhes bya ba'i skad phyung bas/ khrung khrung can khrung gyug
can zhes bya ba grags so// dpung rgyun ldan du gshegs nas/ dpung rgyan ldan gyi phyogs shag tu 'dzum pa mdzad do zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyu par gong/
ma bzhin du'o/ nor du du gshegs nas/ nor bu can du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo nor bu can 'di'i byang chub sems dpas nor bu mang po'i
mchod sbyin byas pas/ nor bu can zhes bya bar grags so// sa la stobs su gshegs nas/ sa la stobs kyi phyogs shig tshu 'dzum pa mdzad nas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bzhi'i
gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ sA la'i stobs su gshog sanas/ sA la'i stobs kyi phyogs shig tu 'dzum pa mdzad nas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan/
zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o// gser gyi bar gshegs nas kun dga' bo gser gyi khri 'di'i byang chub sems dpas gsar mang po mchod sprin
byas pas/ dngung yang bram ze rnams gser bris 'jal zhing 'gyed pas/ gser gyi bro gsar gyi la zhes bya bar grags so/// gnas bcas su gshegs nas/
gnas bcas su tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gnas pas 'dir rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ba 'byon pa dang/ rgyus pa dang/ bde ba dang/
la lags pa/skya bo dang ma mang pos gang banargyal sridi byed du 'jug go/ de dus gzhan zhig na spyi bor shachan 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa zhig skyes te/ dper na shing bal
'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'a da' pa bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa skyed par mi byed do/ de yongs su smin nas brtol pa las gzhon nu zhig byung na/ gzugs bgrang bya/ mdzes
pa/ blta na sdug pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba zhes bya ba nas/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ spyi bo skyes spyi bo skyes zhes bya par
grags so// rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyis gzhon nu byung ma thag tu/ btsun mo'i 'khor drug khri'i nang du bkri ba dang/ mthong ma thag tu btsun mo ri thams cad kyi nu ma las 'o
sa ma zags nas so so nas smras pa/ nga las nung las nu zhes rgyas pa/ da las nu las nu zhes bya bar gragasaso// de la kha cig gis ni spaboskyes/ kha cig gis nang las nu zhes bya bar
shes so// gzhon nu nga las nu yul zhig tu song ba dang/ rgyal bo gso sbyong 'phags na bar gyur nas/ de rtsa ba dang/ stongs dang/ lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu'i sman
gyis bkur sti byas kyang de slar thu par gyur nas/ des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan rig myur du gzhon nu la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur zhig lha bka' bzhin
'tshal zhes nas/ blon po rnams kyis po tabatang nas rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags nga bar gyur nas/ das bka' stsal pa// gzhan ni sman drongs la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba
nyamasu myong bar gyis shig ces byung sa/ de bas na gzhon nu myur du ge sa pa'i rogs so zhes smreng ngo// de chas pa na rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags shi'o// de nas yang blon po/
rnams kyis/ yang de la pho nya btang ste/ gzhon nu khyod kyi yapo nongs kyis gshegs te/ rgyal srid bzhes su gsol zhes sring ba dang/ gzhon nu nga las nus bsams pa//
bdag gi yag na nongs na/ bdag der ci si 'gro snyam du bsams nas/ de nyid na 'dug pa dang/ yang blon po rnams 'dus nas/ blon po'i gtso bo pho nyar btang nas/de song/
sa smras pa/ gzhon nu gshegs la rgyal srid bzhes su gsol// des sas pa/ gal te bdag gis chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid thob na/ 'dod du rgyal srid kyi
dbang skur ba 'ong bar 'gyur// blon po rnams kyis snang ba/ lhargyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba la namang du 'tshal te/ rin po che'i gcal dang/ sang ga'i lnga dang/ ba dugs dang/
cod pan dang/ dbu rgyan gyis pho brang gi nang du rgyal srid dbang bskun 'tshal lo// de bas na gzhon nu 'di nyid du gshegs pa'i rigs so// des sas pa/ gal te bdag gis chos
bzhin gyis rgyal srid thob par 'gyuran/ thams cad 'di nyid du bong srang/ gzhon nu nga las nu'i mdun nas 'gro ba bo/nod sbyin lha gnas zhes bya ba des/ rin po che'i gcal dang/ sangag
khri de nyid du byungs so// pho brang ni gnas pa rnams kyis kyang gdugs dang/ cod pan dang/ dbu rgyan khyer te rang lhags te pho brang na gnas pa rang lhags shing rang lhags pas/ gnas
bcas gnas bcas zhes bya bar grags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo mnyan yod gang na ba der
'dong ngo// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ da nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nas rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/
ji tsam na sa phyogs shig na/ bram ze zhig zan ma zos par zhing chod pa na/ de'i tshod du bu mo zhig thug pa khyer te 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs de nyid du gshegs so// da nas
bram ze des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ma cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom/
gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od gzer nyim stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo'agro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo// mthong ma thag tu yang de bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te/ ja lta
dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can la thog mar sangs rgyas mthong ba de ltar na lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas goms par byas pa lasems las su rung ba skye ba dang/ bu med pa bu rad pa dang/
dbul pos nor gyi gter mthong ba dang/ rgyal srid la dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba ni de lta ma yin no// des thug pa de khyer te myur ba myur bar ngacom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste
phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyi go'u ta ma 'di ni thug pa lags te gal te shes ldan go'u ta ma bdag la thugs brtse ni/ 'dzam gsol zhig/ de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la khron pa d+hi pa zhig bstan nas/ bram ze khyod kyis gal te yongs su btang na/ khron pa range pa 'a dar lugs shig/ des khron pa de la der blugs
so/ des khron pa der blub/sa pa dang/ 'di ltar yang sangs rgyas rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus khron pa de pa de thug pas gang nas
rlangs pa 'thul zhing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de nges nas/ bram ze thug pakhrims shag gdas brims par brtsams ban/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
ji ltar dge 'dun thams cad kyis 'thungs kyang/ khron pa rnying pa de de bzhin du thug pas gang nas rlangs pa 'thul zhing 'dug par 'gyur ba deltar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bram
rje de lhag par yang mngon par dang par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir snyan sngon 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam
pa dang bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'dra bar 'phags pa 'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas zhes bya
pa nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo rtsa gyi mtho ba yasha kyi rdo rjes btsam nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/
btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so zhes bya pa ra bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang/ tshesaM dang/ dag slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchil ga ]
ba/ kyis/ bdag dag bstan du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas bram ze de tshong pa la
sngogs rnyed pa lta bu dang/ zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang/ dpa' bo g.yul ngor rgyal ba lta bu dang/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa lta bur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo// ji tsam/
na zhing drung du phyin pa dang/ zhing de la gsar gyi nas sha stag skyes par mthong ngo/ mthong nas kyang ya mtshan skyes nas mgi brgyud de tshigs cad pas smras pa/ kye ma yono tan rang bzhi
zhing//zhes kun rnam par spangs pa la// bdag gis de ring sa bon btab// darang nyid du 'bras bu thob/ de nas bram ze de rangs pa nangs par rgyal po'i drung du song nas son
pa dang/ rgyal ba dang tshe skyel ba dag byas nas rgyal po la sbas pa/ lha bdag gis gsang nas stsal ba de rnams gsar phye sha stag tu gyur gyis/ de la sman zhig bskor bar gsol/
rgyal pos spyan bskos te btang ba dang/ bram zes phung por byas te bgos pa las/ rgyal po'i sol ba nas tha mal par gyur nas/ spyan gyis rgyal po la rogi par byas pa dang/
rgyal pos bsgo ba// yang gos shig/ yang bgos pa dang/ de bzhin du rgyal po'i skal ba na nas tha mal par gyur nas/ de ltar lan bdun
gyi bar du bgason/ da kho na bzhin du nus su gyur pa dang/ gang po ngo mtshar skyes nas/ de bdaganyid song ste bltas na/ de zhan du gyur nas/ des bram ze de la smras pa/
bram ze 'done khyod kyi bsod nams las skyes pa yin gyis/ rgyal bo'i skal ba thong la/ khyod kyis ca dpags pa de kho bo la byon cig/ de nas bram ze shin tu mgu bas ci byin pa de dag
gsar gyi nas sha stag tu gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang/ ji tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig na/ zhing pa skya bo rbab rbab po// rkang pa dang lag pa surag byang ba//
sha na'i ras kyi sad g.yog byon pa lnga brgya zhing dad// rmon pa de dag kyang lcag gzer bu can gyis gzhus pas/ lus sbas shing cha byung ba'i rnag 'dzag la/ sdom pa 'don pa lho ni zhing
rmad do// zhing pa de rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpa byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas
pa de 'od 'dom gang gas brgyan pa/ 'od gzer nyi ma stong bas lhog pa/ ni po che'i ri bo ltar kung nas bzang ba mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/ dag pa'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i
sems can rnams la thog mar sangs rgyas mthong ba ni zhes bya ba'i par gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der deng ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po
lon nas/ zhing pa rnams 'ong ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang gdul ba'i don du lam las bzur nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs/
so// de nas zhing pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhing pa de rnams
kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyenanas/ dadang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bdon pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur pa'i chos bshad pa/
mdzad do zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jigatshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs pa gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta
na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyisan sngaratshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams dag slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung shes/
byab nas/ sangs rgyas dgos pas lus gzugs bkab par gyug/ zhes ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la gdam ngag byin nas/ de rnams kyis
la 'bod pa dang/ brtsal ba drag po zhes bya ba nas/ mngon ru smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du// glang de dag kyang gnya' shing dang rudag ngacad nas/ bcom ldan
'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas// bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor nas 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pa/sa zhes bya ba'i bar
gong ma bzhin du ste/ dpar na chu bkang+ga rgal tu gshegs pa na/ ngang pa dang/ ltadang/ rus sbal rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas/ rang gi gnas su song ba bzhin no//
dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon shang pa bgyid bgyid pa'i dge slong 'di dag gis las ci zhig bgyis
na/ las des zhing par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/ ston
glabargyadebgyidapa'i lha'i bu 'di ga gas kyang/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des narlung rnams su skyes shing bdan pa mthong bar bgyas 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
pa dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs red pa zhes byang nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya bab bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dag

slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshol tewaMthub pa na/ ston pa 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rtenadabyung ste zhes rtsa ba nas/ de wA ra NA si'i grong khyer na drang srong
pa la ri dgas kyi nigs na nye bar brtan cing bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i bstan pa la nang pa lnga brgya po 'apo 'di rnams rab tu byung bar gyur to/ de na bad deka gas ma
lags/ ma bton/ yid bya ba goms par ma byas so// 'on kyang dad pas byin pa zos shing zos nas bdu 'dza la tshadas te/ la las dus 'das par byas so// dge slong
dag dza sem du sems/ dag slong lnga brgyapo gang yin pa de ni zhing pa lnga brgya po 'dwa dag nyid yin no// gtsug lag khang gi bdag po gang yin pa ni zhing pa 'di dag gang gi yin pa'i khyim bdag
'danyid yin te/ gang yang 'di dag gis gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i dad pas phyin pa zos nas/ ma lags/ ma bton/ yadi la bya ba goms par ma byas la// 'du 'dza li rtags
te le lasa'as par byas pa las des n/ tshe rabs lnga brgyaragatsug lag khang gi bdag po de'i zhing pa rnams su gyur te/ da lta'i bar du yang zhing bar skyes
pa yin no// 'di dgags yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ tshangasapar spyod pa spyad pa des n/ da ltar nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/
nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mdu byas so// sngon glang byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'da rnams kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa
la rab tu byung bar gyurata 'di dag kos de na bslob pa' gzhi phra mo rnams dral bas/ las des na glang rnams su skyes so// gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des
zla na lha rnams su skyes sa// gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs las tshangs par spyod pa sdad cing bsrungs pas/ da ltar lha'i bur gyur nas bden pa mthong bar byas
[ ]so// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par sna ba ni gcig tu gnago ba yin la zhes bya ba nas/ brtsal bar bya ste/ ka slong dag khyed cag
gas de lta la bslab par bya'o// zhes de skad ces bka' sal zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhani dugo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo
la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chumangs gang na ba der 'dong ngo// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das chu mangs su gshegs pa dang/ phyogs gzhan zhig na bram ze zhig zhing da do// de nas bram ze des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus sku skyes bu chen po'i
mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa zhes bya ba nas/ kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// des
bsams pa/ gal te shes ldan go'u ta ma'i drung du phyag 'tshol du song nan/ bdag gi las 'chor la/ 'on taphyag 'tshal du ma songanani/ bsod nams yongs su nyams par
'gyur na/ de la gang gis na las kyang ma 'chor la/ bsod nams kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i thangs bzang po ci yod snyam pa las/ de blo skyes pa/ 'dinyidi
na' dug bzhin du phyag byas na/ de lta na las kyang mi 'chor la/ bsod nams kyang yongs su nyams par ma 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des ji ltar lcag gzer bu can nyid thogs
bshang nas de nyid na 'dug bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo zhes phyag byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
stsal ba/ kun dga' bo bram zi 'dis nyis te/ gal te pha gi las phyogs 'din/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring bsrel gyi tshogs
gzhig par bzhugs so snyam pa de lta bu'i sos rang gis rig pa yis shig yong par gyuranA/ 'a can sdur 'ongs te phyag byas pa zhig/ de ltan lags yang dag par rdzogs pa'
sangs rgyas gnyis la phyag byas par 'gyur ba zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'di nA yang ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srus kyi reng bsrel cu tshogs ma zhag pa bzhugs
pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos myur ba myurapar bla gos pazhi bltab tu byas te bting nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams
panyid 'bazhugs su gsol/ de nas sa phyogs 'di'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kanyis kyis longs smad ran 'gyur lags te/ gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs sa 'odo sungs
dang gang yang da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams pa nyidi la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed gang dag ban
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring bsrel kyi tshogs ma zhi+i pa rnams lta bar 'dod da/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab lags so// bde bar gshegs pa da de'i dus la bal ]
lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa gang dag slong rnams la bstan pa mthong lags na/ dag slong rnams
sems mngon par dad par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/ srog chags grog sbyar rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgos pa sems kyis shes par 'gyur bas/ klu rnams kyis bsams
pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhig gi phyi'i 'jig rten pa'i thub des bskyed pa mdzad snyam na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring bsrel gyi
tshogs ma zhig pa gzigs par bzhed par mthong nas/ de nas de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig par phyung ba dang/
denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag rtags zung zhig/ nub par 'gyur ro zhes pa dang nub lo// rgyal po kasal rgyal gyis
bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhig pa/ nyan thos rnams la bston to zhes thos so// thos nas kyang yang ngo
mtshar skyes nas/ btsunamo dang/ gzhan n dang/ blon po dang/ khrom ra ba dang/ grong mi dang/ yul mi rnams dang lhan/
gichas so// de bzhin du lus 'phags po dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang/ drang srong sbyin dang/ so phag mkhan rnying pa dag dang/ 'degs 'dzani//
gyi ma sa ka drang/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma ngo mtshar skyes te chas so// kha cig sbyin gyi dag pa'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul ba dang/ dzatsam na de ma snang bar gyur to//
de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs de'i ring bsrel gyi tshogs ma zhigs ba nub par gyur te zhes thos so/// thos nas kyang yang de
rnams kyis bdag cag 'dir lhags pa dag la nadon med par gyur to zhes sdug bsngal ba dang yid m bde ba skyes so// dag bstan zhig gis sa phyogs der bskor ba byas nas/
soms la sems kyis 'dusnyam du mngon par 'dus byas te/ bdag gis 'di la gom pa bor bas bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das/
kyis skye bo'i tshokas chen po de'i 'gyod pa skyes pa bsal ba'i phyir dang/ dag pasen de'i bsam pa yang thugs su chud nas/ tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// mkhas pa
gang zhig rab tusems dang bas/ sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la gom 'dod na// 'dzam bu chu bo gser gyi srang tshad gi/ stong phrag brgyar yang de dang mnyam pa min///
dag khasan gzhan zhig gis yang sa phyogs de 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig bzhag nas/ sems kyis 'di snyam du mngon par 'dus byas te/ re zhig gom pa bor pa'i bsod nams
kyang de skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ 'di la 'jam pa'i gong bu bzhag pa'i bsod nams ji snyid cigatu'agyur snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dag bsnyen/
de' bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// gang zhag rab dang sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi// mchod rten la ni 'dzam gong 'jog byed na/
'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gong bu ni// stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min// de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dgagis kyang 'jim pa'i gong bu bcar to//
gzhan dag gis de la me tog sil mas gtor nas/ sems kyis 'disnyam du mngon par 'dus byas gom pas bor ba dang/ 'jim pa'i gong bu'i bsod nams kyang de snyed du
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ bdag cag gi me tog sil ma rnams la bsod namasaji snyed cige tu 'gyur snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/
tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// gang zhig rab dang sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi/ mchod rtan m tog sil ma spangs pas 'thog 'dzam bu chu
po'i gser gyi khri bo ni stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min// gzhan dag gis de la ma tog gi 'phreng bas bskor ba byas nas/ sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas la
me togo sal ma rnams kyi bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ bdag cag gis me tog 'phreng bas bskor ba la bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas// sangs rgyus
mchod rten ma tog 'phreng bskor ga/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar gyi sgrom dag ni// stong phrag brgyar yang de dang mnyam pa min// gzhan dag gis de la mar ma 'phrang la
phul nas/ sams kyis mngon par 'dus byas ba/ me tog 'phreng bas bskor ba'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ bodag cag gis mar me
phul ba'i bsod rnams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ mkhas
pa gang zhig rab tu sams dang bas// sangs rgyas mchod rten mar ma 'bul byed na// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar srang bye ban// stong phrag brgyar yang de dang mnyam la
min/ gzhan dag gis de la dri chus chag chag btab nas/ sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ mam phul ba'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungasan/ bdag cag gas dri'i chus chag chag btab pa'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa
thugs su chud nas/ tshigs su bcad de gsus pa/ mkhas bgang zhig rab tu sams dang bas/ sangs rgyas mchod rtan drichus 'thor byed na//
'dzam khu chu bo'i gsar gyi phung po// stong phrag brgyar yang de dang mnyam pa min// gzhan dag gis de la gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ 'phun btags
sa/ soms kyis mnapar 'dus bus la/ gom pa bor ba dang/ 'a gong bzhag pa dang/ ma tog sa'i nas gtor ba dang/ ma tog 'phreng bas
bskor ba dang/ mo mar lab dang dri chus gtor ba'i bsod nams de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungasan/ bdag cag gis gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan/
dang/ 'phan btags pa'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam ba thugs su
chur nas/ tshags su bcad de gsungs pa// rab dang sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan na 'dogs byed na// gsor ni
bo lhun po dang mnyam pa// stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min// rgya mtsho lta bu'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa// ded dpon
bla na med pa la// yon tan bshad pa de yin no// de rnams 'di snyam du/ de la re zhig bcom ldan 'das yongs su myongan las 'das pa la bya ba byas pa'i bsod nams
de srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ bzhugs pa la bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs
su chud nas/ tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ 'di ni sems rab dang byas nas// gang zhag bzhugs dang gang zhig ni// mya ngan 'das la mchod byed ba//
bsod nams mnyam sa khyad par med/ ]'di ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab// bsam mi khyab 'di dang rnams kyi// rnam
par smin pa 'ang bsam mi khyab// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med pa bskor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag gi yon tan ni rtogs par mi nus//
so de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo ratshogs chen po de la gang thosan/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha cig gis nyan thos kyi bya chub
kyisams bskyed/ gcig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub t+taM/ kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni dro bar
gyurapa thob/ kha cig gis na tsamo/ kha cig gis na bden pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa dag/ kha cig gsan rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha
cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyi'i mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni nyon mos po thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
du byas/ 'khor de las phal cher ni sangs rgyus la gzhol pa// chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do// bram ze dang
khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis phyogs de nyid du dus ston btsugs pa dang/ de nas chu mangs dus sten can chumangs dus ston can zhes bya bar grags so// de nas
ga bcom ldan 'das yul ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kos la na rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ mnyan yod du byon nas/ man yod na rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal bdag gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong sta phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang
dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzan du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad
nas cang ma gsung ngo zhes byapa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ sang bdaka ga sngam
par gdugs tshod ster zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya pa nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas// nang par sngar las/
te D+ha gdan bting nas nor bu'i chu snod sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te// bcom ldan 'das la sngan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod gsol pa// btsun pa
gdugs tshod lags shang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol sgo srungs kyi me la bsgo ba/ kyi nang rjer zhig sangs rgyas la so/
pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du/ gzhan mu stegs pa dag nang du ma gtang zhig/ de'i 'og tu ma snyogs pa rnams la sbyin no// jo bo bka'
bzhin 'tshal zhes sgo srungs kyi mis/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin las mnyan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs/ lhung
bzed dang chos gos bsnams te// dag slong ga tshogs kyis yongs su skor zhing/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas zhes bya ba nas/ phyog
bcabs te lhung bzed rgyu bar go nas/ stan chos dga' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa/
'od srungs chen po dgon pa'i gnas mal zhig nas/ skra dang kha spu ring zhing chos gos ngan pa zhig gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs te/ des bltas na rgyal
byed kyi tshal stong par 'dug nas/ des dge skos la dris pa/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gang du bzhud/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas
sbyin gyis sbyan drangs so// des bsam pa/ de nyid du bsod snyoms bza' zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong gi dag bdun la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/ da khyim bdag
mgon med zas spyin gyi khyim du songab dang/ sgo srungs kyis smras pa/ 'phags ba nang du ma bzhud par gzhes shig/ ci'i phyir khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas razhig/
sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du gzhan mu stegs pa dag nang du ma gtang zhig de'i 'ogadachu mu stags pa rnams la sbyin no zhes bsgo lags
so/ tshodang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos bsams pa/ gang bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis bdag la dge sbyong shAkya'i sras kyi dag sbyong yin no zhes bya bar m zhes pa de ni/ bdag gi
rnyed pa legs par red kyis/ song la skye bo bkren pa rnams la snying rje bya'o snyam dubasams te skyed mos tshal du song nas/ des bsams pa/ deng bdag gis su zhig rjes su gzung bar
bya snyam pa dang/ re zhig cig na grong phyi zug khamadzes thebs pa/ lus zhigs shing lus las rnag khrag 'dzag pa zhig slong mo la rgyu zhing 'dug naso/ de'i drung du de song ba dang/ des kyang
bslasan 'bras khu zhig redunas/ des tshodang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po lus mdzes pa dang/ soms dang zhing sbyong 'am zhi bar mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ nges par bdag gis
yin gnas 'di lta bu la bya ba ma byas bas/ san bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas su gyur gyis/ gal te 'phags pa 'od srungs chen pos bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'bras khu bzhe sa na bdag gis
'di dbul lo snyam pa dang/ de nas tshodang ldan pa 'od srus chen pos de'i bsam pa sams kyis shes nas/ lhung bzed bzed de/ sring mo kal te khyod kyis btangab yin na/ lhung
bsred 'dir lugasashige/ de nas des sems mngon par dad par byas nas/ lhung bzed der blugs pa dang/ sbrang ma zhig lhung ngo// des nga dbyung bar brtsams pa dang/ 'bras
khu de'i nas du sor mo gcig chad de smyung ngo// des bsams pa/ 'phags pos bdag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir ma phor zed kyi/ 'on kyang gsol ni mi gsol lo snyam pa dang/
tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos de bsam pa sems kyis shes nas/ de'i mngon sum kho nar 'bab pa'i rtsig drung zhig tu 'dug nas 'thungs pa dang/ des bsams pa// cung zad
dunabadag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir gsol kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis zas kyi go chod par ni ma byas so snyam pa dang/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos de'i bsam
pa sems kyis shes nas/ grong phyi nyug ma la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo rab tu dga' bskyad cig rag/ khyod kyis byin pa'i khres 'dis kho bo nyin zhag gcig 'da' bar bya'o//
de lhag par dga' ba skyes nas/ bdag gis 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po la gsod snyoms bstabs na bzhes so snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la sems dang ba bskyed
nas/ sha bas dga' ldan gyi lha'i rogs su skyes so// lha rnams kyi dbang po bats+tshabyin gyis des 'bras khu zhig phul nas sems mngon par dod par byas nas shi bani mthong na/ gang du
skyes pa ma mthong nas/ des sems can dmyal bar brtag par brtsams na yang ma mthong/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dwags dang/ mi dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang/ sum cu
rtsa gsum pa rnams su yang ma mthong ste/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug gi/ gong du mi 'jug go// 'dul ba gzhi/
bam po bzhi bcu pa// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis
zhu ba zhus pa/ 'od srungs bdag nyid chen po can// bsod snyoms phyir ni rgyu ba na// 'od srungs 'bras khu phul ba yi// bud med de nigar dga' lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dga' ldan zhes bya'i lha de rnams// 'dod po thams cad 'byor pa ste// 'odrasungs 'bras khu phul ba yi// bud med de ni de na dga'/ de
nas lha rnams kyi dbang po ba byin 'di snyam du sems te/ zhig mi 'di dag ni bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong na sbyin pa dag gtong bsod nams dag byed na// bdag bsod
nams dag mngon sum du mthong zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa go/ ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi gtang/ bsod nams dag mi bya snyam nas/ 'phags pa 'od srungs chen
po 'di ni sdug pa dang/ mgon med pa dang/ bkre na pa dang/ 'phongs pa la thugs brtse ba yon gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'de la bsod snyoms pastabs par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/
bkren pa'i srang du khyim shagacig tshu 'dug par lhang lcong rdol ba shin tu mi bzang ba zhig stul nas/ bdag nyid tha ga pa sku ags pa shana'i res kyi smad g.yogs gyon pa/ rkang
lag ser ga byung ba zhig tshu sprul nas ras 'thag par brtsams so// lha mo'id sogs kyang thag pa'i chung ma'i cha byad du byas nas ras skud 'jug par brtsams so// de'i phyogs
gcig tu ni lha'i zhal zas zhig sta gon byas te bzhag pa dang de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po bkren pa dang mgon med pa dung/ 'phongs pa'i skye bo rnams

[E ]la rjes su brtse ba'i phyirarim gyis khang pa der phyin nas/ 'di ni sdug bsngal ba zhig go zhes lhung bzed badzradams skor bsdod pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i zhal zas kyis bkang

ngo/ de nas tshodang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po 'di snyam du/ 'di zasaM lha yi bdud rtsi la// khyim gyi sbus ni 'di tsam pas// shin tu 'gal lo zhes bsams te// bangag gi snying la the tshom skyes// 'di na
chos nyid de yin te// dgra bcom po rnams nim bsam par yi shesa mthong bar mi 'jug pas/ bsam pa la zhugs pa dang/ jitsaman lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yin pa mthong nas/ des smras pa/ ko'u shi

ka 'di ltar dabazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi yun ring po nas rjes su 'brel ba'i pi tshom dang/ som nyi'i zug rngurtsa nas byung zin na/ ci'i phyir skya'i sdug bsngal

ba'i bar chad byed/'phags pa 'od srungs chen po skye bo sdug bsngal ba'i bar chad cisde bgyid/ pazhig mi 'di rnams ni bsod nams dag mngon sum du ma mthong n yang sbyin pa dag gtong bsod nams dag bgyidin/ bdag
bsod nams dag mngomasum du mthong zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa go/ ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi gtang/ bsong nams dag mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ bsod nams dag bya dgos/
bas te/ bsod nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur// bsod nams dag ni byas pa yis// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol dga'// zhes ma gsungs sam/ de'i phyin chad tshodang ldan pa 'od srus chen pos bsams nas/ khyim

rnams su bsod snyoms la 'gro bar brtsams so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam mkha' 'a 'dug bzhin du/ lha'i zhal zas kyis tsho dang ldan pa 'od srungs kyi lhung bzed 'gongs pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa 'od srungs
chen pos kyang lhung bzed kha phub pas/ bza' bdang btungab bo bar gyur ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'ongs kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su

gnang gis/ lhung bzed kyi kha g.yogs bcang bar bya'o// grong phyi chug ma che ge mo zhes bya bas 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po la 'bras khu gsol nas/ de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'osaMsu skyes so zhes kun tu sa lpags

so// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis grong phyi nyug ma che ge mo zhes bya bas 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po la 'bras khu gsol nas/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan
'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogasagacig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po
gsal rgyal la chos dang ldan pa'i gtum gyis yang dag bar ston par mdzad// yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes
ma @#/ bya ba'i bar gong ma razhinano// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
bo bam ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po'i slad du dgung bdun du bdag gdugs

tshod sbyor zhing mchis gnang bar mdzad gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das nang mi gnang

pas gnang bar li nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sn gzhus song ngo// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas// gtsang zhing

! bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag lta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs gdan bating nas/ ro bu'i chu snod bzhag nas// bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis/ dus tshod gsol/zhes khu banas/ rang gi lag nas stobs/

shing tshim par byed de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// u lto ba zhig rgan thul lags na 'dug pa/ rgyal po 'di bsod nams mngon sum du mthong zhing/ rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa yin pas// bsod nams dag

'o gas ngoms mi shes par/ sbyin pa dag gtong/ bsod nams dag byed do zhes sems mngon par dad par gyur to// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'an pa rnam thag du

kar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i babra' ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas bsdu bsam shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcags te lhung bzed rgyu bar rig nas/ snyan ches dma' ba zhig/
blangs te/ chog mnan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan kyis bka' stsal ba/ rgyal bo chen po su'i mi yus brjod de yon bsngo bar bya/ ci khyod kyi 'am/ 'on te khyod
pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyod pa gang yin pa zhig gi/ rgyal pos bsams pa// bag gi bsod snyoms bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pas/ bdag pas bsod nams chos mang
bskyed pa gzhan lta su yod snyam du bsams nas gso la pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ngan bsod nams ches mang du bskyod pa gang lags pa de 'i ming nas brjod cing/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngoba mdzad

du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis multe ba de'i ming nas brjod cing yon bsngo ba mdzad do// de bzhin du nyi ma drug gi bar du mdzad pa dang/ nyi ma drug pa la rgyal po lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas/ bcom

ldan 'das ni bdag gi bsod snyoms longs spyad cing/ yon bsngo ba ni chu lta ba'i ming nas brjod nas mdzad de snyam ste/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa de/ blon po rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams kyis smras
pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ rgyal bos smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das ni nga'i bsod snyoms yongs su 'angs spyod// yon bshad pa ni/
lto ba'i ming nas brjod cing mdzad na/ cas sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug/ de nas blon po rgan po zhig gis sas pa lha thugs khral chung dur bzhugs shag dang/ bdag gis

sang cis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lta kho na'i mtshan nas brjod de yon bsngo ba mdzad pa de ltar gyi'o// des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed kyis sang kha zas chos bsod pa dang/ ba tu mang ngo/

stagon gyis la/bram pa yang 'di ltar ci nas kyang phyad ni dge slong rnams kyi ltung bzed kyi nang du 'gro 'gaphyed nas la bor bar gyis shig/ de dag gis phyi de nyin kha zas ches bsad pa dang/ chos rab tu mang bar

bshams te/de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas brims par btsams te/phyed ni dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed du blugs phyed ni sa la pho'o// de nas ma lce bas sa la lo

ba rnams bsdu ba'i phyir brgyags pa dang/ de phyag gtsang 'drom pa dag gis slar bskrad do// de nas mu lto ba des smras pa/ gal te rgyal po 'di la nor rdzas rab tu mang po yod na/ bdag cag ltabu sdug bsngal

brda slong ba gong yin pa de dag la ci'i phyir ma sbyin/ kha zas 'di por bas ci phan zhes/mu lto ba de sems 'khrugs pas sngon gyi ji lta ba de ltar sems dad par bya sanus so// de nas rgyal po sangs rgyas la/
sogs pa dag slong gyi dge 'dun de rnams gdugs tshod gsol zin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming nas sos te yon bsngo ba na ma mdzad dosnyam du bsams nas/ yon bsngor ma mnyan pa

mtha kho nar khyim du song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyi ming nas sngos te yon bsngo ba 'di skad du mdzad de/ glang bo rta dang shing rtadapung bu chung// zhon nas grong khyer yul
bcas 'khol byed pa// zas don lan tshudag gis ma btab cing// snum bag med pa'i mthu ni yin par ltos// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi lo r-ing du gdugs tshod lan mang du gsol nas/ ming nas brjod de yon bsngo ba mdzad na/'di lta bu'i yon bsngo ba mdzad pa ni/ bdag gis sngon
chad ni lan 'ga' yang mthos lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyi ngar thug lan tshus ma btab pa las brtsams te/ las kyi
rgyu ba khyod nyan par 'dod dam/bcom ldan 'dras pa de'i dus la bab lags so// bde bar gshegs pa da pa'i dus la bab lags to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi nus kyi ngar
shug tshwas ma stsal ba las brtsams te/las kyi rgyu ba bshad pa ]bcom ldan 'das las dge slong rnams kyis thos na 'dzin par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ deng slong rnams

la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag sngon byung ba'i ri 'ir zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam ba las chungam blangs nas/ded dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur sbyong bar byed do//
de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes ba/ blta na sdug ba zhes bya ba nas/ bskyed bsrings te de chen por
gyur to zhes ba ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// ji tsam na khyim bdag des/ chung ma la smras pa/ bzangamo bdag cag gi bu lon ded pa dang nor 'phrog pa skyes kyis/ bdag zong thogs te yul
gzhan du 'gro'o// des sbas pa/ rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig/ des bong thogs te yul gzhan zhig tu song ba las/ de de nyid du ma stes te shi bar gyur to// de ched pa ma bdeg pa
zhig bas/ de las gyi nor rnams zad pas/ de'i bu yang sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang/ khyim bdag de'i rten grogs shig yod pa des de la sgras ba/ khye'u kho bo'i zhing las dag byos
shig dang/ sa khyod kyi sman sbyar bar bya'o// des de'i zhing las dag bya bar brtsams nas/ des kyang de'i wan sbyar ro// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dus ston la bab nas/ khye'u
re'i mas bsams pa// deng ni khyim bdag gi chung ma mdza' bshes dang/ gnyen dang/ nye du dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze'i skya bo rnams zin sbyin pas brel bar 'gyur gyis/ snga
mtshogs su song la/ khye'u de'i zanabaskyal lo snyam nas/ de sngatshatshogs su song nas/ khyim bdag gi chung ma la don de dag go bar byas ba dang/ de khros nas sbas pa/ re zhig dge sbyong
0 dang/ bram ze dang/ nye du rnams kyang da dung ma byin par mngag gzhug pa khye'u sprin nam/ re zhig de ring ni sdod cig// sang nyis 'gyur du sbyin no// de nas khye'u de'i mas bsams pa/ khye'u bkres

par ma gyur grang snyam nas/ bdag nyid kyi nas kyi zan dron lan tshos ma btab pa 'di bskul lo snyam mo// des de khyer nas zhing thog tu song ba dang/ khye'u des de rgyang mi ring ba zhig nas mthong nas/ des
smras pa yum zhim bo cud zad ma mchis sam/ des smras pa/bu de ring ni zanar ma ga ngayin pa de nyid kyang med do// yum ni skalags/ des bu la khyim bdag gi chung jiskad du zer ba de dag thams
cad rgyas par bsnyad nas/ than sngon lan tshwas ma btab pa 'di la kho mo nyid kyis khyer te 'ongs kyis/ bu 'di zo zhige ces smras pa// des smras pa/ zhog la bzhud cig/ des bzhag ste song ngo/
sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med ba na/ 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman zhing ngan pa la snying brtse bcan/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' te/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig bu dag 'byung bar
gyur bas/ jitshan rang sangs rgyas shig phyogs der phyin pa dang/ des de lus mdzes pa dang/ sams dang ba dang/ spyod lam zhi bar mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar bdag gis
yona gnas yang dag pa 'di ltakhu la bya ba ma byas pa des n/ bdag 'ad 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur gyis/ gal te bdag las zan don lan tshwas ma btab pa 'di bzhes na/bdag gis de la dbul bar
khya'o snyam pa dang/de nas sangs rgyas des skyes bu bkren pa de'i bsam ba sems kyis shes nas lhung bzed bzed de/ bzhin bzas gal te khyod kyis btang ba yin na/lhung/
bzed 'dir chug cig/ de nas des dad pa drag pos zan dron lan tshwas ma btab pa rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dra'atshapa'i dus kyi khye'u bkren pa gang yin ba don
ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dis rang sangs rgyas la zan dren na tshwas ma btab pa khul kha gang yin ba'i las des n/ lan drug sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha

rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// mnyan yod 'di nyid du yang lan drug rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur 'o// las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis da ltar yang rgyal po rgyal rigs
ste khe nas dbang bskur bar gyur te/ ngas 'di'i zan dron gyi rnam par smin pa rdzogs pa de la dgos nas/ glang po rta dang shing rta dpung bu chung/ zhon nas grong khyer yul bcas 'khel byed pa/wan
don lan tshudag gis mo btab cing/ snum bag med pa'i mthun yin par ltos/ zhes gsungs so// bcom ldan 'adas kyis kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi zan dron lan chus ma btab pa las brtsamA
nas las kyi rgyu ba bshad do zhes kun tu sgra grags ba/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/ de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
tha mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bo gsal rgyal la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' ba'i
mdzad nas/ cang mi gsung pozhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o/ de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong ga dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/bdag
dgung zla gsum du na bza' dang/ chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ snyan gsos kyi rkyenasman gyi lo khyad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal
bo gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la/ ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyis zla ba gsum du zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/
dge slong la ral yang 'bum ri ba'i gos re re bskon te/ 'bru mar gyi bum pa bye ba la sogs ba nas/ ma ma'i 'phreng ba bltam par brtsams so// de na gdugs tshod kyi kha dang mchod pa'i tsho ca co'i sgra

chen po grag pa dang/ ji tsam nagrong nyug ma shin tu sdug bsngal ba zhig rdza'i chag dum zhig thogs te/slong ba la zhugs pa des sgra chen po dang/ sgra mthon po thos so// thos nas kyang dris pa/shes ldan dag sgra
ga mthon po// sgra chen po 'dici'i zhige yin/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dunal zla ba gsum du ba dug
tshod gsol nas/ dge slong ra re la yang 'bumare ba'i gos re re bskyon te/ 'bru mar gyi bum pa bye ba bsog sa te/mar me'i 'phreng ba gtong bar rtsom pa yin no// de nas grong gzhug ma de 'dzugs dus
de ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di bsod nams kyis ngoms mi shes nas/da dung yang spyin pa dag gtong bsod nams dag khyed na/ ma la bdag gis kyang 'ga' zhig las bslangs labcom
ldan 'das la ma ma ra zhig bltam mo snyam nas des bslangs pa'i 'bu mar nyung zad po gyo ral gyi nang du blugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa'i slad du ma ma bstam nas/ zhabs gnyis la

gtugs te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na 'jig rten du byung ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang skye dgu'i tsho brgya

thub pa na ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba kho nar 'gyur zhing/ yang ji ltar 'ade'i zunga mchog dang zung bzang po shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang/ nyo gnas dge slong kun dga' bodang/ mkha zas gtsang dang yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul

chen mo dang/ sras gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po dang grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi lags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi yang zung mchog dang/ zung bzang po shAri'i bu dang/mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang/ nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo dang/

wa yab zas gtsang dang/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrulachen mo dang/ sras gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang bo dang/ grong khyer sar skya'i gzhir 'gyur zhing/ ji ltar yang bcom ldan 'das 'di sku gdung gses nas longs su mya ngan las 'da'

de bzhin du/bdag kyang sku gdung gsesanas yongs su mya nganalas 'da' bar gyur cig ces byas so// jitsoman mar me de dag thams cad ni shi'o/ des btang bas ene'abar zhing 'dug go/ chos nyid kyis sa sargyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams ji srid nang du yang dag ma bzhag pa de srid du/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'adas rnams kyi skye gnas rnams nang du yang dag mi 'jog khas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsams pa/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od la mnal bar mdzad pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med pas/ma la bdag gis mar me de gsad par bya'osnyam nas/nges lag pas gsad bar brtsams pa las ma nus so// de nas
chos gos kyi grwa dang/ de nas bsil yab kyis g.yabasan 'on kyang gsad bar ma nus so//bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/kun dga' bo 'di ci byed/des gsol pa bcom ldan
