'das bdag gi glo ba la bsams bsas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od la mnal bar mdzad pa ni gnas mchis shing go skabs ma mchisakyis/ma la bdag gis zhugs mang dgum mo snyam nas bdag gis de
sug pas dgum par brtsams na rngo ma thog go/ de nas chos gos kyi grwa rang/ de nas bsil yab kyis g.yasan/'on kyang rdzom thogs lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/kun dga' bo dub bar ma khyed/
sa @#/ cig bkal te rnam bar 'thor ba'i chu blangs na des kyang gsad par mi nusan/lag pa dang/ chos gos gyi grwa dang/ bsil gab kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di ltar mar me 'di ni bu mo 'di sems kyis

man bar 'du byed pa chen pos bus ba yin no// gzhan yang kun dga' bo bu mo 'di ni skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar gyur

zhing de'azung mchog dang/ zung bzang po shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang/ nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo dang/ yab zas gtsang dang/ yum lha mo sgyu'aphrulachen mo dang/ sras gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang bo dang/ grong khyer

sar skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar 'gyur la/de sku gdung gsas nas longs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur spro grong nyug ma che ge mo zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa'i slad du mar me btang bas/de bcom ldan 'das

kyisabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes kun tu sgra grags ba/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis thos nas/ de'i ma 'ongs pa'i yon tan la bsams nas/yo byad thams cad

kyis bstabs so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal kyis bos nas de nas ngo mtshar skyes te/ 'bru mar bum pa stong bsdogs nas mar sna tshogs su springs te zin po che sna bzhi'i mar me 'chag sa'i skad du dus
so 3de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po mchod pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das dgung bdun gyi bar du//

gdugs tshod lastsanadrangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sngon gyi tshal ma dron po tshwas ma stsal ba las brtsams te las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan nas/ mang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig
chu/ bdag gis dgung zla gsum du gdugasatshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re la yang 'bum ri ba'i gos thugs re bskon te/'bru mar bum pa phye ba bsdogs te 'phreng bar sbrengs nas zhugs mar bltam lags na/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tulung ma bstan lags na/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur ba ltan/bdag bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstanan legs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo chen po blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni zab ba/zab par snang ba/mthong
bar dka'ab/ rtogs par dka'/brtag par bya ba ma yin ba/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa zhib mo brtags pa'i rtogs pa dang/ mkhas pa dang/ mdzangs pas rig par bya ba yin te/ de ni khyod kyi

sbyin ba lan cig byas pas thob par klo ba ma yin te/ sbyin ba lan brgyas ma yin/ sbyin pa lan stong gis ma yin/sbyin pa lan brgya phrag stong gas ma yin no// 'on kyang rgyal bo chen bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog

pa'i byang chub 'dod na sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin/bsod nams dag kyang byaning/dgekha'i bshes gnyen dag kyang bstan bar khya khasnyan bar bya/bsnyen bkur go/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de bzhin du sbyin pa dag ni/
btang/ bsod nams dag nings shing/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag kyang bstan/ bsta/bsnyen bkur bas na/de la na khyod nam zhige na 'jig rten gyi gtso bo'anges
zla ces bka' stsal pa dang/ kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal mchim blugs te jus so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gos kyi mtha' mas mchim phyis nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khyang chub don du gnyer ban sbyin pa ji snyad cig stsal/bsod nams ji snyed cig bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po/

chen po re zhig 'das pa'i bskal pa gzhan rnams lta zhog gi/ khasal pa bzang po 'di nyid la nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer bas rnam grangs du mar sbyin pa btang ba dang/ bsod namA
byas pa de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// par sdom la nga las nu dang legs mthong che//dus dbog ku sha gdol pa dang/ lhachen po dang mu khyud rgyal/me long gdong

dang nor bzas dang//thams cad sgrol dang 'dum byed do// rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo dpag tumed pa na/rgyal bo gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ba byung bar gyur te/de'i spyi bor

ny+nyo sha rman 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa zhig skyes pa/dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ras bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur gnod pa cung zad kyang mi spyod do// de yongs su smin nas rdol ba las/gzhon nu gzugs bzang po mdzes
pabastan sdug pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs lta 'dug pa/lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sIn ma 'dzar ba/sna'i gzangs mtho ba/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/

skyes bu chen po'imtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo// byung ma thag tu btsun mo 'khor gyi nang du bkri ba dang/ rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo brgyad khris gzhon numatho

nas/num rnams las 'om zags pa dang/ bud med re res kyang ng las nu nga las nu zhes smras pas/de'i ming nga las nu nga las nu shed ba'agyuratogazhan dag na re 'di spyi bo las skyes pas de'i phyir gzhon nu'among spyi bo skyes zhes

bya'o zhes zer to//de na khag gis ni nga las nu zhes bya bar shes so//kha cig gis ni spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar shes so// gzhon nu nga las nu gzhon nu'i rtsi da mos rtse ba la brgya byin drug gi 'phos pa lan no// rgyal tshab la gnas

ba la brgya byin drug gi 'bos ba len no// gzhon nu nga las nu khul zhig tu song ste/da yul du phyin pa dang rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags na par gyur nas/de rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ lomadang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu'i snyan

gyis bsnyen bkur gnam phyi thu ba khon gyur nas/des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag myur du gzhon nu la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang skur zhig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams

kyis bo bdu bkug ste/ rgyal po gso sbyong 'bags lhung nas/ des gzhon nu spyan drongs la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba nyams su myong bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal gyis/gzhonanu myur du byon pa'i rigs so zhes
1/ spyi po// de chas pa dang rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags shi'o/ de nas blon po dag gis lang pho nya gzhan zhig gtong ba la/ gzhon nukhyod kyi yab nongs kyis/ tshur sngon rgyal srid bzhes shig
ces speng ngo// gzhon nu las nus bsams ba/ gal te bdag gi yab nongs na/ der song yang mi phan snyam du bsams nas de nyid na 'dug go/ blon po rnams ma 'dus nas blon po zhige bo nyar btang

ba dang/ de song nas snyas pa/ gzhonanu rgyal srid bzhes shig/ des snas pa/ gal te kho bos chos dang mthun pas rgyal srid thob par 'gyur na/ rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'di nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
blon po rnams kyis speng ba/ lha rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba la ni mang du 'tshal te/ rin po che'i gcal dang/ sang ge'i khrid/ gdugs dang/ rtsod pan dang/ dbu rgyan gyis pho brang gi nang du rgyal
srid kyi dbang bskur bar bgyi 'tshal bas/ de lta bas na gzhon nu 'di nyid du byon pa'i rigs so// des smas ba/ ngas chos dang mthun par rgyal srid thob pa lta na thams cad 'di nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur
ro gzhon nung las nu'i mdun nas 'gro ba gnod sbyin lha gnas zhes bya ba des rin po che'i gcal dang/ sang ge'i khri de nyid du blas so// pho brang na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang/ gdugs dang/ cod pan
dang dbu rgyan khyer nas rang yud du lhags te/ pho brang 'khor pa rang lhags pas/ gnas de'i ming gnas bcas gnas bcas zhes bya bar grags so// phyis blon po de rnams dang/ khrom gyi ru ba
00 dang grong mi dang/ yul mi rnams kyis ni dbang bskur ba khyer te deng nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha dbang bskur ba bzhes su gsol/ des smras pa/ nga mi rnams kyis rtsod ban cing ngam/
gal te chos kyis rgyal srid 'thob na/ mi ma yin ba rnams kyisanod ban 'ching grang/ jitsam na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rnyed ban bcings pa dang/ de'i rin po ches bdun byung ba 'di lta ste/ 'khor

la ni bo che dang/ glang po rin po che dang/ rta rin po chodang/ nor khu ni po che dang/ bud med rin po che dang/ khyim bdag rin po che dang/ bdun pa blon bo rin po che nyid do// de la bu dpa' ba/rtul
bod pa/ yanalag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stongayang tshang bar byung ngo// yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor nanags tshal stug po dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig

yod pa de na/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa lnga brgyabasam gtan byed do// nags tshal stug po de na yang bya gar rab tu mang bo dag cig kyang gnas so// bsam gtan gyi tshor ba ni sa yin
bas bya gar rnams lding zhing skad 'byin par byed pa dang/ den drang srong bzhin nazhes bya bzhig yod pa de 'khrugs nas/ des bya gar rnams la 'dab gshog rnams lhags par shog ces dmod pa
bor ro// de rnams drang srong 'khrugs pas 'dab gshog rnams lhags par gyur to// de nas de rnams rkang pas 'gro khar brtsams pa dang/ rgyal bo de yang ljongs rgyur song bas bya gar rnams rkang
btsal ku// pas 'ge ba mthong ngo// de nas des blon po rnams la dris pa/ ci'i phyi'i bya gaba'adi rnams rkang pas 'gro bar gyur/ blon po rnams kyis sbas pa/ lha bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni
sgralags pas drang sro'akhrugs pa dag gis 'di rnams la dmod kha bor ba dang/ de nas drang sro'akhrugs pas 'di rnams kyi 'dab shog rnams lhags par gyur to// de nas rgyal pos sas pa/ gang

dag sems can rnams la snying brtse ba med pa'i drang srong 'di lta bu yang yod pa lta zhes smra nas/ shes ldand ga deng la drang srong rnams la khyed cag nga'i yul nas 'dug cigaces sgo zhage nyes sbas so//

de nas blon po rnams drang srong gi thad du dong nas bsgo ba/rgyal po'i zhal nas khyed cag nga'i yul na 'dug ces bka' stsal to//pra srong rnams kyis bsams pa/rgyal po 'di ni gling bzhi la dbang ba yin pas ri ro pa/

kyi khong mi ru 'gro'i snyan s/de rnams der dong ste gnas so//rgyal po nga las nu'i ma rnams ni sems par byed pa dang/ 'jal bar byed pa dang/ nye bar rtogs par byed pa yin te/ de dag gis bsam shing nyabar brtag
nas bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa rnams bya bar brtson bas/ de rnams sems par byed pa dang/ 'jal bar byed pa dang/ nye bar rtogs bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ming shed las skyes zhes bya
bar grags so// de rnams kyis zhing las dag bya bar brtsams pa dang/ rgyal po ljongs rgyur song bas mdi rnams zhing las dag byed par mthong nas/ des blon po rnams la smras pa/ mi 'di rnams ci zhig
byed blon bo rnams kyis smras pa/ lhasman du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du la tog la sogs pa sbyin pa lags so// rgyal bos smas la/ ci bdag gi rgyal srid kyi mi rnams zhing las byed dam/ de nas des/

sa kha/ lhas sa bon gyi rigs nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi char phob cig ces byas pa dang/ rgyal po nga las nu'i sems bskyang ma thagatu/ lhas sa bon gyi 'igs ni ye shu rtsa bdun gyi char phab bo// rgyal po nga
las nus/ tshul mi rnams la sa ba/ 'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ lha'i ang lags/ bdag cag gi lang lags so// yang ming rnams ras bal gyi zhing rmobal
brtsams pa dang/ yang rgyal po nga las nu ljongs rgyur song bas mthong nas/ de nas blon po rnams la smras pa// mi 'di rnams rtsa zhe ge khyed/ blon po rnams kyis skyas ba/ lha mi 'di rnams ni ras bal
gyi ngang da lags so// rgya la bos smras ba/ ci zhig tu dgos/ de rnams kyis sas pa/lha gos bgyi ba'i slad du'o// de nas rgyal po palas nus smras pa/ ci pa'i rgyal srid kyi ma rnams ras bal gyi zhing
rmod dam lhasaras bal kho na'i cher phob cig ces byas pa dang/ rgyal po nga las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu/ lhas ras bal kho na'i char phab bo// rgyal pos yul mi rnams la dris pa/
'de deg su'i bsod nams kyis byung/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lha'i yang lags/ bdag cag gi lang lags so// yang mi de rnams ras bal de rnams 'khal ]
bar brtsams pa dang/ rgyal bos smras pa/ mi 'di dgaci zhig byed/ blonape rnams kyis nas lo/ lha skud pa 'tshal ba'i slad du ras bal de 'bal lags so// rgyal pos sa
ba ci pa'i rgyal srid kyi mi rnams sa skud 'khal lam/ lhas ras skud kyi char kho na phob cig ces byas pa dang/ rgyal po nga las sa sems bskyed ma thag tu/ ltasaras skud kho na'i char bab bo// rgyal
des smras pa/ 'di dgasu'i bsod nams kyis byang/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i yang lags/ bdag cag gi ya lags so// de nas rim gyis ras 'thag par brtsams pa dang/ rgyal pos
smas pa/ 'di dag ci zhig byed/ da rnams kyis smras pa// lha gos su bgyi ba'i slad du ras 'thag lags so// rgyal pos bsams pa/ da ci pa'i rgyal srid kyi mi rnams rdzas 'thag gam snyam nas/
lhas sa nyidakyi char bob cig ces byas pa dang/ rgyal po nga las nus sems bskyedam thagatu/ lhas ras nyidakyi char phab bo// rgyal pos dris pa/ 'di dag su'i bsod nams
kyis byung/ de rnams kyis smos pa/ lha'i yang lags/ bdag cag gi yang lags so// rgyal bos bsam pa/ mi 'di rnams nibadag gibasod nams dag gi mthu rab tu mi shes te/ bdag
la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs ba/ skye bo dngamimang pos gang ba yang yod/ bdag la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang/ glang bo rin po

00 ]chi dang/ rta rin po che dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ btsun mo rin po che dang/ khyim bdag rin po che dang/ bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/ bdag la bu dpa' ba/ tshul thodapa/ yanalag mchog gi

gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshang bar yod kyi/ kye ma bdag gi pho brang gi nang du rin po che'i char 'babacing/ de las phyi rol tun karasha pa cha 'ga' yang mi 'bab

par gyur cig snyam pa dang/ rgyal bo nga las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu/ pho brang gi nang du zhag bdun du rin po che'i char bab la/ phyi rol du ni kar sha ba Na 'ga' yang ma bab ste/ ji ltar mthu chen po/ rdzu
'phrul chen po/ bsod namA byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu so sor nyams su myong ba bzhin no// rgyal pos smas ba/ 'di dagasu'i bsod nams kyis byung/ de rnams/
kyis sbas pa/ lta'i lags so// rgyal pos smras pa// shes ldan dag khyed kyis nyes te/ gal te khyed kyis lha'i bsod nams kyis lags so zhes sa ba dang/ ngas 'dzam bu'i glingamatha' dag tu

rin po che'i char bab par 'gyur ba zhig/ 'on kyang khyed las rin po che su'adod pa des rin po che ci 'dod pa dag long zhig/ de nas rgyal po nga las nud rgyal srid chen po'i dbang byed du 'jug pa 'bargya byin drug shi 'phos
ba lenano// nga las chu'i mdun nas 'gro ba gnod sbyin lha gnas zhes bya ba de la/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gang ngas bka' stsal dgos pa bka' 'og tu ma chudapa'i gling gzhan 'ga' lta yod dam/
lha gnas kyis smras pa/ lha shar gyi lus 'phagos zhes bgyi ba'i gling 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa/ skyeb dang mi mang pos gang po mchis kyis/ lha/
daragshegs te bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas rgyal po nga las nu 'disnyam dusams te/ bdag la 'dzam bu'i glinga'abyor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bdeb dang/ la legs pa/ skyo bo dang mi mang ngos gang

ba yang yod/ bdag la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang/ glang po rin po che dang/ rta rin po che dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ budamed rinapo che dang/ khyim bdag rin po che dang/
'tsha bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/ bdagal bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod// yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pharel gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang/ bdag gi pho brang gi nang du yang rin
klu po ba char zhag bdun du phab na/ shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling zhig yod ces grag gis/ ma la bdag der yang song la rjes su bstan par bya'o sAm ba dang/ sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po

la nga lasanu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang thabs cig tu bu stong gis yongs su bskor te/ mdunanas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun dang nam mkha' la pags te/ rgyal po nga las nu shar gyi lus 'phag

tsish+tsa kyi gling du chas nas/ rgyal bo nga 'asanu shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du gnas te/ rgyal po nga las nus ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ mthuchen bo/ rdzu 'phrul chen pos

rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba ltar/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du lamang bo dang/ 'bargya phrag mang bo dang/ le stong phrag mang bo dang/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por rjes su bstan
bar byas so// de shar gyi lus 'phags kyi glinganarjes su ston pa la brgya byin drugashi 'phos pa lon no// yang rgyal po nga las nus/ gnod sbyin lha gnas la sa pa/ bka' 'og tum nud pa'i
gling gzhan 'ga' lta yod dam/ lha gnas kyis smras pa/ lcanub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling 'byor ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lags pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba mnyis kyis/
lha der yang gshegs te rjes su bstan du gsol///'dul ba gzhi// bam gozhe gcig pa/ de nas rgyal po nga las nu 'disnyam du sems te/
b dga' 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gung ba yod/ bdag gi pho brang ginang du yang rinapo che'i char zhag bdun du phab/ bdag gis shar

gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du yang phyin/ la mang po dang/ lo brgya phrag mang po dang/ lo stong phrag mang po dang/ 'bargya stong phrag mang bor bdag gis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du rjes su bstan na/ nub

kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling zhig yod ces grag gis/ ma la bdag der yang song la rjes su bstan nga ra bya'o snyam pa dang/ sems bskyedam thag tu rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bya ba brgyad 'bum
dang thabs cig tu bu stong gis yongs subasko nas/ mdunas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun dang steng gi nam mkha' la kha pags te/ rgyal po nga las nu nub kyi ba lang spyodakyi gling du
chasanas/ rgyal po lasanu nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du gnas te/ rgya'akhong las nusaji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ mthu chen po/ rdzu 'phrulachen pos rang gi bsod

nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba ltar/ nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du lo mang bo dang/ lo brgya phrag mang po dang/ lo stong phrag mang po dang/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por rjes su bstanabar byas so//

danub kyi ba lang spyod kyi glinganaNes su bstanab la brgya byin drug shi 'phos ba len no// yang rgyal po nga las nus/ gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/ bka' 'og tu ma chud pa'i gling gzhan 'ga' lta yod/
sgyu dam/ lha gnas kyis sa la/ lho byang gi sgra mi snyan ces bgyi ba'i gling 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bdeb dang/ li legs pa deng/ skye bo dung mi mang pos gang ba/ gzhan yang made
dag nibadag gir bgyibamamachis pa// yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa zhig mchis kyis/ kye ma lha der yang gshegs te/ nyid kyi dpung gi tshog sal rjes su bstan du gsol/ de nas rgyal po nga/
'ganu'adisnyam du sems te/ bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byorapa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba yang yod/ bdag gi pho brang gi nad du+in po tsho'i

tha0 char zhag bdun du phab/ bdag shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du song ste/ yang lo mang po dang/ le brgya phrag mang bo dang/ lo stong phrag mang bo dang/ lo brgya stong phrag mang bor bdag gis shar gyi lus

'phags kyi gling du rjesasu bstan/ bdag nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du yang song ste/ lo mang po dung/ 'khorgya ga mang bo dang/ lo stong phrag mang bo dang/ brgya stong mang bo'abadag gisanub kyi ba glang spyod kyi

gling du rjes subastanan/ byang gi sgra mi snyan ces bya ba'i gling 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lelegs ba/ skye bodang mi mang pos rab tu gang la/ gzhan yang mi de dag ni bdagagi bya bamed pa/

yongs su 'dzin pa med pa bzhin yod cis gragagis/ ma la bdag der yasong la rang gi dpung gitshogs la skyes su bstan par bya'o snyam pa dang/ sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs khyab
brgyad 'bum dang thabs cig tu bu stong gis yongs su bskor nas/ mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun dang nam mkha' la 'phags techas ba dang/ rgyal po nga lasanus bkyis lags nas sa phyogs
dkar zhing dkar bdag mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin lha gnas la snas pa/ lha gnas as phyogs dkar zhing dkar ba phagi ci zhig yin/ lha de ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyim rmos ma
btab pa'i 'brasasalu'i 'bru lags te/ 'diltar byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams nim rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras galu'i 'grul longs spyodab lags bas/ lha yang der gshegs nasam rmosam
btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'phrul spyod par 'gyur lags so// rgyal bo nga lasazhus gle gnas akyang/ blon bo rnams la smras pa/ snabo dag khyed kyis sa phyogs dkar zhing dkar ba/

dag mthong ngam/ lha mthong lags so/ sna bo dag de ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i phru yin te/ 'di ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams nim rmos ma btab/
pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru la longs spyod pa yin pas/ khyed cag kyang der song nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru la longs spyod par 'gyur ro// rgyal po nga las nums pa na ri rab kyi ngos
lags n bkra zhing bkra ba'i shing ljonara'i 'phreng ba bkod pa bzhin du gyur ba dag rgyang ring po kho nanas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang yang gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/ lha gnas bkra zhibakra

ba'i ljon pa 'phreng ba bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa phagici zhig yin/ lhade rnams ni byang gi sgrami snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi shing lags te/ 'di ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni dpag
sam gyi shing gi gos 'tshal ba lags so// rgyal po nga las nus thos nas kyang/ blon po rnams sas pa/ sna bo dag khyed kyis bkra zhing bkra ba'i ljon pa 'phreng ba bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa/
dag mthong ngam/ lha mthong lags so// sna bo dag de rnams ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi gos kyi shing yin te/ 'di ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams nidapag bsam
0 gyi shing gi gosagyon pa yin gyis/ khyed kyang der song nas dpag bsam gyi shing gi gos gyenang ra 'gyur ro/ rgyal po lasanubyang gismamisAn du song ste/ rgyal bo nga lasanu byang gi sgra mi
snyan du 'dug nas/ rgyal bo nga las nus ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ mthu chen po/ rdzu 'phrul chen pos rang gi bsod namasakyi 'bras bu myong ba ltar/ byang
gi sgami snyan gyi gling du lo mang po dang/ 'bargya phrag mang po dang/ stong phrag mang bo dang/ lo brgya stong phrag mang bor rang gidapung gi tshogs rnams la rjes su bstan to// deden rangage
dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lenano// yang rgyal po nga las nus/ gnod sbyin lha gnas la snas ba/ bka' 'og tum chud pa'i glingegazhan 'ga' lta
yodadam/ lha ma mchis so// 'on kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha tsharing ba/ kha dog dang ldan// bangob mapa'i ng gzhal med khang mthon po nayun ring du gnas pa dag mchisakyis//
kyen lcasum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la gzigs su bzhudacig/ de nas rgyal po nga las nu'adi snyam du sems te/ bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bdebadang
'alegs ba/ skya bo dang mi mang bos gang ba yang yod/ bdag la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang/ glang po rinabo tshodang/ rta rin po che dang/ nor bu rin
bo che dang/ bud med rin po che dang/ khyim bdag rin po che dang/ bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/ bdag la bu dpa' ba/ rtul bodapa/ yan lag mchog gi
gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang/ bdag gi pho brang gi nang du yang rin po che'i char zhag bdun phab/ bdagashar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du yang song ste/ 'a mang

bodang/ lo brgya phrag mang po dang/ lo stong phrag mang po dang/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du rjes su bstan/ bdag nub ba lang spyod kyi gling du yang song ste/ lo mang

po dang/ 'bargya phrag mang po dang/ lo stong phrag mang po dang/ 'bargya stong phrag mang bor bdagagis nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du rjes su bstan/ bdag byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du yang song ste/ lo

mang bo dang/ lo brgya phrag mang po dang/ lo stong phragamang po dang/ lobargya stong phragamang bor bdag gis byang gi sgra misnyen gyi gling du rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su bstan na/ sum cu rtsa gsum
pa'i lha tshe ring ba/ bdag dang ldan pa/ bdeb mang zhing gzhal med khangamathon po na yun ring du gnas pa dag cig yod ces grug gis/ ma la bdag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta ba'i
phyir 'gro'o snyam pa dang/ sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang thabs cig bu stong gis yongs su bskor nas/ mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun/
dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te chas so// mi'i rgyal po ra ba ni gser gyi ri bo bdun gyis bsko ba ba yin pas/ de nas rgyal bo nga las nu gser gyi ri mu khyud 'dzin la gnas te/ de den
rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug gi 'bos pa lonano// ri bo mu khyud 'dzin nas gser gyi ri bo rnam par 'dudal 'dug ste/ de de narang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjesasu ston/
ba la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa nan// ri bo rnam par 'dudunas gser gyi ri bo rta rna la dus ga/ de de narang gi dpung gitshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug gi 'bos pa len no/ ri bo
rtan nas gser gyi ri bo blta na sdug la 'dug ste/ de den rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no// bi blta nasdu gnas gser gyi ri bseng ldeng can la
'dug ste/ de de rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjesasu ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lanano// bseng ldedatsananas gser kyi ri gshol mda' 'dzin la 'dug ste/ de de narang gi dpung gatshog sal

rjesasu ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'thos pa len no// ribagashol mda' 'dzin nas gser gyi ri bo gnya' shing 'dzin l 'ag/de den rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjesasu ston pa la brgya byin drugashi 'phos pa
len no// por sdom la/ mu khyud 'dzin dang rnam par 'dug/ de bzhinari bo rtarnadang// bstan sdug dang seng lding can// gshol mda' 'dzin dangaganya'ashing 'dzin//
ri boganya'ashing 'dzin nas stangaginam mkha'al 'phags te dus la na/ gang+gA rim de la drang srong lnga brgya bo de rnams gnas te/ de rnams kyis rgyal po de 'ong ba mthong nas/ de rnams/

klu kyis smras nga// shes ldan dag rgyal po 'thab krol can 'di 'ong ngo// de na drang srong bzhin ngan zhes bya ba des skyor bar chu blugs te gtor bas dpung gi tshogs rnams glegs par gyur pa dang/ de'i mdun

nas blonapo rin po che 'gro bas/ des drang srong de rnams la smras pa/ bram ze khrib dor bar gyis// 'di ni kun l 'grub pa yin// 'di ni mi dbangang las nu// bya gar de dag ma yin no// ji tsam na rgyal po

'tsho nga lasazhu phyogs der phyin nas sus pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhig gis bkag/ blon po rin po ches smras pa/ drang srong rnams kyis so// rgyal pos sa kha/ drang srong 'di rnams nang na ci zhig la dga'/
des smras pa/ lha ral pa la lags so// rgyal pos smras pa// 'di rnams ral pa byin s bdag gi mdunenas 'grob gyur cigaces byas ba dang/ de nas de rnams kyiral pa byi nas laganamada' gzhu
thogs te mdun du brgyug par brtsams pa dang/ bud med rin po ches/ rgyal po la gsol pa// lha drang srong 'di rnams ni dka' thub can lags na/ 'di dgacibagyi theng lags rgyal pos btang ba

ts+tshA dang de rnams kyis slar yang brtson 'grus la gnas nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so// rgyal po nga las nu yang dbang gitshogs dang nam mkha' la 'phags te chas so// rirab ri'i rgyal bo dang ga

0 chad brgyad khri'i 'og tugaser gyis gzhi la thug par 'dug go/ dpag tshad brgyad khridi chu'i stod du byungaste/ de ltar dpag tshad 'bum drug khri yod do// de'i ngos re re la yang dbag tshad brgyad khri yod de/

de ni khor khor yug tu dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khri yod de/ rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin bzang po mdzes ba blta na sdug pa yin no// de'i stengan lta sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams gnas te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha/
rnams kyisungasam lnga bo chu la gnas pa'i klu rnams dang/ gnod spyin la gnayol go thogs pa rnams dang/ 'phreng thogos rnams dang/ rtag tu myos rnams dang/ rgyal ba chen po bzhinamasabakod pa las mun
gnas pa rnams kyis rgyal po nga las nu'i dpung gi tshogs mas bkag pa dang/ ji tsaman rgyal po nga las nu phyogs der phyin nas smas pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'disu zhig gis bkag/ de rnams kyis/sa pa/ lha
chab na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis so// rgyal pos smras pa// bdag dud 'gro rnams g.yul 'gyod dam/ des smras pa// tshule gnas pa'i kla 'di dag nyid bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyuracig cis byas pa

dang de nas rgyal po nga las nu'i mdun nas 'gro bar chas so// ji tsam na klu de rnams rgyal bong las mdun nas rgyug cing/ lhalagan yolagi thogs kyidrung du phyin pa dang/ de rnams kyis de dag la dris nga/
shes ldan dag ci ste rgyug/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'dir mi'i rgyal po 'ong ngo// de nas klung rnams dang lhalag na yol go thogs rnams legs nas/ yang dpung gi tshogs de grogs par byas so//
jitsamanargyal po nga las nu 'ongs nas/ des smras pa// dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhigagis bkag/ des smras pa// lhalha lag na yal go glegs 'di rnams kyis dpung gi
[ ]tshogs ba/ga lags so// rgyal po nga las nus smas pa// lha lag na yo' ge thogs 'di dag nyid mdunanas 'gro bar gyur cig/ de nas de rnams mdun nas rab tub rgyug ste/ ji tsamanaklade
rnams dang lhan cig lha 'phreng thogs rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang/ de rnams kyis de dag lasar/ shes ldan dag cis rgyug/ de dag gis smasar/ mi'i rgyal po 'dir 'ong ngo// des
lha dang klu de rnams yang le gnas dpung gi tshogs thogs par byas pa dang/ rgyal po phyogs der phyin nas/ des smras pa// dpung gi tshogs 'disu zhig gis pa kag/ des smras pa/ lha lca
'phreng thegos rnams kyis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ lha'aphreng thegs 'di dag nyid bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyur cig/ de nas de rnams mdun nas brgyug par brtsams so// da
rnams kyis brgyugs nas/ lhartag tu myos rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang/ de rnams kyis de dag la dris pa/ shes ldan dag ci ste rgyug/ de dag gis skyes po/ mi'i rgyal bo 'dir 'ong ngo//
de nas de rnams log nas yang dpung gi tshogs de thogs par ngus pa dang/ rgyal po phyogs der pe gnas / des smras pa// dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhig gis bkag/ des smras ba/ lha
[z}]lha rtag tu myos rnams kyis so// rgyal bos a pa// lha rtag tu myos 'di dag nyidamadun nas 'gro bar gyur cig/ de nas de rnams mdunanas brgyags so/ da rnams kyis brgyugs nas/
rgyal chen bzhi'is kyi lha rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang/ de rnams kyis de dag la dris pa// shes ldan dagacis rgyug/ mi'i rgyal po 'dir 'ong ngo// rgyal chen bzhi rnams kyis bsaMms pa/
sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag dgag par mi nus so snyam nas/ de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi ltade rnams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la/ 'dir
mi'i rgyal po nga las nu'ong ngo zhes sbranano// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsams pa// sems can 'di nibasodanams kyim chen po dang ldan pa yin pas de bzlog par mi bya yi/ mdo
yon gyis bsu bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de rnams kyis mchod yon gyis bsu'o// rgyal po nga las nu ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzeg pa na/ tshal sngo zhing sngo ba 'phreng ba sprin

spungs pa lta bu mthon po dag mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa// lha gnas tshal sogs zhing sde ba'i 'phreng ba sprin spungs ba lta bu mthon po tha gi dag ci zhig yin/ lha de ni
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol zhes bgyib rnams lags te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lho'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang 'byor zhing ldan par den
rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyid do// lha yang der byen nas lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'khyer zhing ldan par rol pa mdzad/
dgyes par mdzad/ dgyes dgur spyad par mdzod cig/ rgyal po nga las nus thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ sna bo dag khyed cag gis tshal sngo zhing so ba'i 'phreng ba sprin spungs pa lta bu
mthon po dag mthong ngam/ lha mthong logs so// sna bo dag de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol ces bya ba yin te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gnas dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i

'tsho 'dod ba'i yon tan lnga dang 'byor zhing ldan par de na rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed kyis/ sna bo dag khyed cag kyang der phyin nas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang 'byor zhing ldan
par rtse bar gyis/ dga' bar gyis/ dga' dgur spyod par gyis shig/ yang rgyal po nga las nus ri rab kyi rtse nadakar zhingadakar ba sprin spungs pa lta bu n thon pe zhig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang
gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa// lha gnas dkur zhingadakab sprin sbyangs pa lta bu mthenapo pha gici zhig yin/lhadenisumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi mdunas chos bzung lags te/ sum cu rtsa
gsum pa'i lha rnams dang rgyala chen ba' rnams der 'du zhing tshog sanas/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don sems par bgyid/ 'jal bar bgyid/ nyibar rtogo par bgyidade/lha yang der bzhud bar 'gyur ro//
sa rgyal rong las nus thos nas blon po rnams lasapa// snabo dag khyed cag gis dar zhing dkarab sprin spras pa lta bu mthon po mthong ngam/ lcamathobalags e// snabo dag de nisum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
lha rnams kyimadunas chos bzang zhes bya ba yin to/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang/ rgyal chen bzhi rnams der 'dus shing tshogs nas/ lhadang mi rnams kyi don sems par byed/ 'jal bar

byed 'bar rtog par byed de/ sna bo dag khyed cag kyang der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer bltan sdug ces bya ba ni chu dang zheng du dpag tshad nyisastong lnga brgya yod de/
khor khor yug tu dpag tshad khri yodapa/ gser gyi rab rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba ste/ ra ba de rnams kyi 'phrad duni dpag tshad phyed dang gsum yod de/ dar ba de rnams la cig rnam pa bzhi po/
gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ cha rlalas byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa dag btagasaso// skar khupakha par lta ba dang/ mar lta bdag kyang btod do// grong khyer bstanasdug
ginang gisa'i phyogs ni bzang po mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/ bkra ba/ shin tu bkra ba/ tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bkrab r byas pa/ dpangan ras bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur
'jam pa/ shin tu 'jam pa/ rkang pas mnanan nems zhes byed la/ rkang pa bteg napar ces byed pa/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba'i phung po phus mo nub tsam bkram pa ste/ rlung langs pos me tog rnying pa/
rnams khyer la/me tog gsar ba rnams 'bab par byed do// blta na sdug gi grong khyer la sgo dgu brgya dgubcu rtsa dgu yod de/ sgore re na gnod sbyin gos sngon po can go cha bgos pa/

[ ]mda' gzhu skyes kor thogs pa ltabargya/ 'di ltar sumanurtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ mdzes par bya ba'i phyir gnas so// grong khyer bstan sdug gi srung gi srid du ni dpag tshad/
nyis stong lnga brgya yod la/ rgyar ni dpag tshadabcu gnyis yod de/ bzang po mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa/ gser gyi drabs bres pa/
'a/ de'i phyogs kun n rdzing bu rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/ rdzing bu de rnams phog gu rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bai DUrlas byas pa dang/ shel las byas pas bskor
rgyu ra rdzing bu de rnams kyi them skyes rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bai DUrla las byas pa dang/ gsol las byas pa yin no// rdzing bu de rnams
lan kan rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ be DUrlu las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pas bskor cing/ gser las byas pa'i lan kan gyigazungs
gzer dang/ gdang bu dang/ lan kanagyi rten ma dngul las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa'i lanakan gyi gzungs gzer dang/ gdang bu dang/ lan kan gyi rten mgasar
las byas pa dang/ pi t+tharlalas byas pa'i lanakan gyi gzungs gzeradang/ gding ba dang/ lan kan gyi rten ma shel las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i lan kan gyi gzus gzer dang/
gdang bu dang/ lan kanagyi rtenamape cha ra las byas pa yin no// rdzing bu de rnams chu sbrang rtsi ltar mngar zhing bsil bsagang la/ ut+pal dang/ pad+madang ku mu dadang/ pad+ma dkar pos
gang zhing/ nu la gnas pa'i bya rnam pa sno tshogs 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams kyis snyan cing 'jebs la/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra skad 'byin par byed do// de'i phyogs kun na me tog gi
shing dang/ 'bras bu'i shing dang/ dbu rgyan skye ba dag shin dbyibs legs shing legs par skyes pani/ dperana'aphreng ba mkhananam/ 'phreng ba mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis//

rnargyan du bya ba'i phyir me tog gi 'phreng ba legs par brgyus pa bzhin no// thang la gnas pa'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams kyang snyan zhing 'jebs pa'i sgraskad 'byin no//
grong khyer lta na sdugan dpag bsam gyi gos kyi shing ljon pa rnam pa bzhi bo/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnams las dpag bsam gyi
shing ljon pa las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi po/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnams te/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag ji lta bu 'dod pa sems baskyed ma thag tu de lta bu
lag tu thob par 'gyur ro// rgyan gyi shing rnam pa bzhi po rnams las/ rgyan rnam pa bzhi dang/ lag pa'i rgyan dang/ rkang pa'i rgyan dang/ smad kyi rgyan dang/ snang bar bya'i rgyan no/
lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo dag ji lta bu 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu lag tu thob par 'gyur ro// rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa bzhi po/ pa wang dang/ gling bu dang/ gi wang rgyud gsum/
nga dang/ sgra snyan rnams las/ lha 'am lha'i bu mos ji lta bu 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu lag tu thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i kha zas rnam pa bzhi po/ sngon bo dang/ sa'i po dang/
dmar bo dang/ dkar po rnams las/ lha 'am lha'i bu mos ji lta bur 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu lag tu thob par 'gyur ro/ lung pa dang/ khang pa rtsig pa dang/ bsil khang dang/
byams dang/ skar khung dang/ mthongs khung can bud med kyi tshogs rnams dang/ lha mo'i tshogs rnams 'du ba'i gnas dag yod de/ de na btung ba sbrang rtsi 'i btung ba dang/ ma d+ha ba'i/
btung ba dang ka dam b+ha ra'i btung ba dang/ rol mo'i sgra skad rnams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ rang gi bsod nams kyi
'bras bu nyams su myong bar byed do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mdun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba/ srid du dpag tshad sum brgya/ rgyar dpag tshad sum brgya ste/ kho ra khor yug tu dpag
tshad dgu brgya yod// bzang po mdzes pa// blta na sdug pa// shel gyi rgyu las byung ba ste/ grong khyer de las dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi gyen du 'phags so// der sum cu rtsa gsum pas lha
rnams kyi stan bshams pa ni/ nyi dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi stan dag so sor bshams so// rgyal po nga las nu'i snyan ni da
dag thams cad kyi mjug kho nar bshams so// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams mchod yonathogs te/ rgyal po nga las nu bsu'o// de na sems can bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i
dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de dag ni rim gyis nang du zhugs so// lhag ma rnams ni phyi rol na 'khod pa dang/ rgyal po nga las nus bsams ba/ stan bshams pa gang dag yin pa 'di
rnams las/ stan tha ma gang yin pa nigadon mi za bar bdag gi stan yin no snyam nas/ de nas rgyal bo nga las nu 'di snyam du/ kye ma'o lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis stan byed bdag la stabs

kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa dang/ sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal bo chen po lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis// rgyal bo nga las nu la stan phyed bltabs nas/ rgyal bo nga las nu lha'i dbang po brgya
byin gyi stan phyud la 'dug go/ rgyal po chen po nga las nu dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan gcig la 'dug pa na/ 'di lta ste/ srid du ma/ zhing du'am/ kha dog rgyas pa 'am/ sgrudangagasal
khyad par ram/ bsams pa 'a ma/ tha dad du bya ba cul phrad kyang mad de/ gzhan du na lta rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin na mig mi 'dzums so// rgyal po chen bo rgyal po nga la sanu sum cu

sgo rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa la/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa drug gi 'phos pa len no// yang de na lha rnams la lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa 'byung ste/ deg gal te lha ma yin rnams pham par

gyur na ni/ lha ma yin de rnams grong khyer gyi sgo bcad nas ra ba'i kha bskor nas 'dug go/ 'on te lha rnams pham par gyur na ni/ lha de rnams khang pa'i sgo rnams bcad nas ra ba'i kha bskor nas 'dug go/

rdzatsamanalha ma yin rnams dpung gi tshogs yan lag pazhi ba go bskon nas/ gcan rim pa lnga dral te lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi drung du g.yul 'gyed du 'ongs pa dang/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis/ lta

rnams kyi lta'i dbang po brgya byin la smag ra/ ko'u shi ka mkhyen par mdzod cig/ lha ma yin rnams kyis gcan rim pa lnga drul te zhabar mchis kyis/ khyod kyi bgyi ba dang bshams pa gang lags pa de mdzod
cig de nas lha rnams kyi dpang po brgya byin dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bgos nas// lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir sprugs pa// rgyal po nga las nus mthong nas smras pa/ bzhugs shig

bdag nyid mchi// brgya byin gyis smras pa// de bzhin mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas gzhu rgyud kyi sgra sprengs so/ lha ma yin/

0 rnams kyis de thos nas smras pa// 'di su'i gzhu rgyud kyi sgra yin/ de rnams kyis 'di ni rgyal po nga las nu'i gzhu rgyud kyi sgra yin no zhes thos so// thos nas kyang ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// ji tsam na rgyal
po nga las nus sngags pa dang/ chos nyid kyis lha ma yin de rnams g.yul 'gyed pa'i shing rtadag nam mkha' la thad ka thad kar 'dug ste/ gang gi yang mtho dman med pa yin da las/ rgyal po nga las
nu'i ni lha ma yin thams cad kyi ltag na nam mkha' la 'phogs nas 'dug go/ lha ma yin de rnams kyis smras pa// bdag cag gi stag na nam ma kha' la sngags te 'dug pa 'di su zhig yin/ de rnams
kyis 'di ni mi'i rgyal bo da ra sa zhes pa ba yin no zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de rnams kyis bsam pa// gang gi shing rta bdag cag gi ltag tu nam mkha' las 'gro ba'i sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi
rnam par smin das dbang che bar 1sa pa yin no snyam nas/ de rnams pham par gyur te/ 'jig skrag cing brtsom pas rgyal bstananas// lha ma yin rnams kyi gnas su zhugs so// rgyal po
pa las nus sa lu/ gung rgyal/ rlon kho rnams kyis smras pa// lha rgyal lags so// rgyal pos bsams pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams pas ni bdag lhag go snyam mo// de nas rgyal po
nga las nu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba yang yod/ bdag 'ashar gyi lus 'phags
dang nub kyi ba lang spyod dang/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling yang yod/ bdag la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo zhi po che dang/ glang bo rin po che dang rta bzhi bo dang/
ra bu rin po che dang/ btsun mo ni po che dang khyim bdag rin po che dang/ bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/ bdag la bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa (yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldanub

pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong sang tshang bar yod/ bdag gi pho brang gi nang du yang gser gyi char zhag bdun du bang/ bdag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du yang phyin/ lta'i
mdun sa chos bzang du yang shugs/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang bdag la stan phyed paltabs kyis/ kye ma'o bdag gis lta rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gnas 'di nas phyung la// bdag go

nas lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bya'o snyam pa dang/ sems bskyod ma thag tu rgyal bo chen po rgyal po nga las nu 'byor ba de las yongs su nyams te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas

nad tshabs po che zhig gis thebs te sdug bsngal mi bzad pa 'chi ba la thug pa myong ba dang de nas rgyal po nga las nu'i blon po dang/ rtsis pa dang/ rgyal srid 'bul ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dang/
gsang sngags kyis lhan cig 'tsho bar byed pa rnams/ rgyal po nga lasazhu ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ rgyal po nga las nu la 'di skad ces smras so// lha 'das nas 'khor gyi mi slad ma rnams/

shes ldan dag rgyal po nga las nus nongs pa'i dus kyi tshe ci zhig gsungs zhes 'dri na/ de skad du 'dri ba de dag la bdag cag gis ji skad du lan gdab par bgyi/ sna kho dag nga 'das nas gal te khyed cag

la skya bo phyi ma rnams zhu bar 'ongs nas de skad du 'dri bar byed na/ 'dri ba de dag la khyed kyis lan 'di skad ces thob cig// shes ldan dag rgyal po nga las nuni/ rin po che sna bdun dang yang ldan/

mi 'i 'byor pa rnam bzhi gling bzhir rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug/ sum cu rtsagasum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du yang song nas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga po dag gis ma ngoms bzhin/
du nongs so zhes zer ro zhus gyis shig/ tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras pa/ kar sha pa Na'i char bab kyang/ 'dod pa dag la ngoms pa med// mkhas pas 'dod pa mnog chung zhing//
sdug bsngal mang por shes nas ni// lha yi 'dod pa rnams la yang// dga' bar 'gyur ba med pa zhed// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// thos srad pa zad la dga'// gangs kyi ri dang anyam
pa yi gser gyi ri bor gyur kyang ni// gcig gi nor du'ang des mi chog/ mkhas pas de ltar shes par bya// gang zhig gzhi 'dis sdug bsngal rtog pa de// 'dod pa dag la gzhar yung ji ltar dga'//
'jig rten nor dag zug jur rtogs nas ni// brtan pas de nyid gdul phyir bslab par bya// rgyal bo chen po da lta bas na rnam grangs des na 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar gang mi'i 'jig rten 'dod pa'i lon
tan lngas ngoms shing chog shes te 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i mi gang dag yin pa de dag ni nyung gi mi'i 'jig rten na 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas mi ngoms shing chog mi shes te 'chi bar 'gyur
ba ni ches mang bar rig par bya'o// de nas rgyal po nga las nus gtan du med pa'i mchod sbyin btang nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa// 'jig rten pha rol yang zhing// tshe thung bar ni shes
byas nas// bsod rnams dag ni bya ba ste// bsod nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur/ de bas bsod nams 'dod pa yis// sbyin pa tshul bzhin btang byas na// 'jig rten 'di dang/
pha rol tu// sbyin pa byas pa dga' bar 'gyur// ji tsam na grong tsho dang yul mi rnams kyis/ rgyal po nga las nun stashil thug cing 'dug go zhes thos so// thos nas kyang yang srog chags/

brgya stong du ma dag/ rgyal po nga las nu blta ba'i phyir nye bar song ba dang/ rgyal pos skye bo'i tshogs rnams la 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmagis kyi gtam yang byas/ khyim na gnas pa'i nyes dmigs dang/

de bzhin du 'dod pa spyod pa yang bshad de/ de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag khyim gyi gnas spangs nas/ drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ nags tshal du 'dug nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi

bsgoms pas/ 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa spangs te 2 de la mang du gnas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skal ba mnyam par skyes so// rgyal po chen po// rgyal po nga las nus ji srid gzhon nu rtse ba'i sa na/

rtsas pha dang/ ji srid rgyal tshab byas pa dang/ ji srid 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal srid chen bo byas pa dang/ ji srid shar gyi lus 'phags dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod dang/ byang gi sgra mi snyan dang/

gsar gyi ri bo bdun la gnas pa dang/ ji srid du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gnas su song ste gnas pa de'i bar la brgya byin brgyad cu rtsa bzhi shi 'phos pa lanon// rgyal po chen bo lha rnams kyi dbang po

brgya byin gyi tshe'i tshad ni/ mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin no// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis

pa'i lha rnams kyi lo stong ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi tsho'i chod yin te/ de la mi'i ltar bgrang na lo bye ba phrag gsum dang drug khri yod do// rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe rgyal po nga las nus sum cu

rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyin ng du song ste 'di skad ces/ kye ma'o bdag la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis stan phyed bstabs kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems bskyed pa de'i tshe de'i dus kyi brgya byin ni
dge slong 'od srungs yin no// gang gi tshe rgyal bo dra las nus 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed de// ma la bdag gis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gnas 'di nas byung la/ bdag nyid lha dang mi rnams kyi

rgyal srid kyi dbang phyung la dbang bya'o snyam pa de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs yin te/ sems can shin tu dbang cha bar grags pa las/
sems bskyed pa des n/ 'byor pa de las nyams nas 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs te/ nad tshabs chen pos thubs shing 'tshib la thug pa'i tshor bami bzad pa myong bar gyur
te// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshi 'dus kyi rgyal po nga las nu gang yin pa don nganyid yin te/ gang yang ngas sems can de snyad cig la phan pa byas na/ dus bla na med pa'i yongashes
thob bo// len kyang dedagan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no// rgyal po de rtsom skyes nas// the tshom thams cad
gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa rgyal po nga las nus las zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par sminapas sems bskyed ma thag tu dgung bdun du pho brang nang ngugasar
gyi chung bab 'drakas/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'dus pa'i dusan/ 'dzig rtenangu ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa//
bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen paM/ skyes bu 'dul ba la 'gyur ba/ blun nad pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad zil gyis gnon ces bya babyung sa/
de'itshe tshong dbon gyi bu khyim phub nas ring bo ma lon pa zhig gnas so// yul ngen chos lugs kyis bgo marab d nas ring po ma lon par bag rdzongs btab ste/ khyim thab la gtong ba'i lig mi

gang yin pa de rin po'i sna bzhi las byas ba'i mi dag gis brgyan nas khyim thab la gdong la/ khyim thab des kyang de khrid nas rang gi khyim du 'gro bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu des na bo che sna bzhi las byas
pa'i me tog krogs nas/ bzhon pa la zhon dbang gi khyim du chas so// dermas pa las ra zhig ga lamanargyudwayang dag pa rdzogs ba'isas rgyas thams cad zil gnon lces rgya zhing byin no//
des deskyes bunapo'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ blta bas mchog mi shes ba mthong nas shin du dad pa skyas so// zhes de dngapas brlan pa'i sems kyis bzhin pa las babs
nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mi rtog de rnams kyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas thams cud zil gnon la gtor ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon/
gyis/ me tog ringag ji ltar shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam na stag tugyur nas ga shegs na yang phyi bzhin 'ong zhing/ bzhugs na yang 'dug pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de dad pa skyes
nas tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni// 'gro ba'i nang durang byungasangs rgyas shog/ bal nas sngon gyi rgyal bsam bsgral ba'i/ skya ba'i tshogs rnams bdag
gis sgrol gyur cig/ drang srong kun zil gnon bcom ldan l// nga yis gsar gyim dog bzangagodos// go 'phang mchog 'di'adod zhas dpa tsho// nga yis smon lam rgya btab pa yin/
bsod nams de nyid kyi zhi rnam smin gyis// legs mthong chen po nga yi grong khyerayang// gsar las byas ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug la// pho brang rna can zhes ni bya bar gyur//rgyal
po chen po dzasum dusams pa'i ring 'i dus kyi tshong dpon gyi bu de ni nga nyid yine no// gang yang sa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la sems dad pa brgyadams/ rin po ches/
bzhi'am rtog gis gtor ba'i las po'i rnam par smin pas/ nga'i pho brang gi nang du zhag bdu ngu gsar gyi char babo/ btsun pa rgyal po nga las zhus/sa pa zhig bgyis na las pa'i rnam

kaM par smin pas gleng bzhi ba rnams su rgyal srid kyi dbang phyugal dbang bkyis panas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bar du mchis lags/ rgyal bo chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten
du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtenAmkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur// bla named pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
sangs rgyas nyom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byung ste/ da ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ me gyis rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du byon no// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas
rnam par gzigs sa sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnamasanas/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyenaldan ngu bsod snyoms la zhugs so// den 'bru 'tshong pa'i tshong pa zhig gis
mtha ]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de blta bas chogami shes pa mthong nas lhag par dad pa skyes te/ dudad pa skyes nas sran mudag las snga ra bus bzhus te lhung bzed
blugs pa dang/ de las sran chungag la 'brum bu bzhi zhig lhungabazed du songang// 'brum bu gcig lhung bzed kyi bar gnas sa la lhung ngo// lhag ma rnams ni lhung bzed kyin ng du lasong ba
dang ngas la bo'o// de nas tshong par dad pa skyes nas son lam btab pa// sbyin pa chen po mun pa 'di yisani/ 'gro ba'inang durang byungasaMngs rgyas shog/ brgal nas sngon gyi rgyal bas ma
bsgral ba'o// skya bo'i tshogs rnams bdag gis sgrol gyuracig/ ces bab bo////'dul ba gzhi// pa/ bam po zhe gnyis pa/ rgyal po chen po ji
snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'bru 'tshong ba'itshodapa gang yin pa de ni nyid yin te/ ngas nag yang dag par rdzogs b.risangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la dad pa skyes te sran mudug
la sngarabs bcus nas lhung bzedadu klogs pa dang/ dulas sranamud ga 'thum bu bzhi zhige lha babudadu song ngo// lhagam rnams nis la bo'o// las de'i rnam par sminapas gling bzhi rnams/
su rgyal srid kyi debang phyug lo dbang byas so// gang yang de nasran mud ga 'brum bu gcig gse lhangakhazed kyi khar phogasanas sa la lung ba'i las kyi rnam par sminapas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
rnams kyi bar duson to// rgyal po chen po gang na sudag lhung bzed du blugs pa sa la ma lhungan/ las de rnam par smin pas lha dang i rnams kyi bar la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug

la dbang byed bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'bru 'tsho ba'i tshong ba gang yin pa don ngalas zhu de nyid yin no// de ltar na rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can la bya ba byas lan
'bras bu dang phan yon shin du chen por 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ 'diltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bya ba bya'o zhes bsub par phul ba/rgyal po zin pa gzhan a[E]

ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cika/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rgyal po legs mthong chen po zhes

bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhire rnam nga ra rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa// rin po che sna bdun dang mi rnams kyi 'byor pa bzhi dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo// rgyal pa rigs

mgrong chen po rin po che sna bdun po gang dgadung ldan zhe na/'di lta ste du 'khor rin po chudang/ glang po rin po chadang/ rta rin po che dang/ nor bu rin pa dang/ btsun mo zhi kho che dang/ khyim bdug
yin po dang bdun pani blon po rin po che yin no// rgyal po legs mthong chen po mi rnams kyi 'byor ba bzhi po gang dag dang ldan zhe na/ tshorang zhing yun ring du gnas pa yin te/ do gzhon nu'i rtsed

00 mos rtsa ba la le brgyad khri bzhi stongano// rgyal tshab byed pa la brgyud khri bzhi stong len no// rgyal sring chen kho byed pa la lekhargyad khri bzhi stong len no// rgyal po'i drasrong gi tshangs par sbyod pala'i

brgyad khri bzhi stong lonano// rgyal po legs mthong chen po tsho ring zhing yun ring du gnas pa gang yin pa 'dinargyal po legasa mthong chen po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rgyal bo legs mthongo nyin po/
gzugs 'brang ba/ mas ba/ blta na sdug pa yin te/ nI'i la dog las 'das la/ lha'i ba doganam thob pa ste/ rgyal bo legs mthong chen po gzugs bzangab/ mdzas pa/ blta na sdug pa
gang yin pa 'di// rgyal po legs mthong chon po'i 'byorapa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rgyal galegasamathochen bo ni gnod pa chung zhing nad med pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ bro ba datsang bsil ba ma yin
zhing/ gracang drob ma yin pa/ drodasnyoms pa dang dus kun tu bde ba dang/ gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas zos pa dang/ 'thungs pa dang/ 'chos pa dang/ myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju ba
'gyur te/ rgyal po legs mthong chen po gnod pa chung zhing nyazhed pa rang bzhin na gang yin pa 'azhi ]rgyal po lags mthong chen po'abyor pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rgyal po legs mthong
(chan po ni grong mi dang ulami rnams kyisAng dusngagacing yod du 'ong ba yin te/ dper na bu rnams la pha bzhin te/ rgyal po chen po dus gcig cigen/ rgyal po legs mthong n bskyod mos tshal gyi gnas
su song na/ shing rta sbyar ba la smas pa/ shing rta sgyur ba rezhig shing rtarim gyis dal budal bus myur cig/ ngas grong dang yul mi rnams la yun ring du blta'o// grongs dang

yul mi rnams kyis kyang/shing rta sgyur ba la sbaso ba/ shing rta sgyur ba'i zhig shing rtarim gyis dal khu dul bus sgyu cig dang/ badragacag kyang lha la yun ring du blta'o// rgyal po legs mthong chen
ba yul mi dang grong mi rnams kyi snying du gcing yad du 'ong ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ rgyal bo dalegs mthong chen po 'byor pa zhes bya'o// de nas dus gzhan zhig na grongs dang yulam rnams gser dang/
dngul dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ la ba rin po mang bo dag thogasazhas/ rgyal po legs mthong chen po gang nab dur dong ste phyin pa dang/ rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//
lha'i sladadu bdag cag gis gsar dang/ dngul dang nor bu rin po che dang/ la ba ni po chem po 'di dag 'tshol dems lags na lha thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag bzhes su gsol//
sna bo dag pa'i yul ni 'di 'dra ba nor gyi rogis yod pas mi 'dod do zhes smras nas lenadum btuba'o// grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du/ rgyal po legs mthong
chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i srid du bdag cag gis gsar dang/ dol dang/ nor bu ni bo che dang/ la ba rin po che 'di dag 'tshol te mchis lags na lha thugs brtse ba'i slad du'adi
rtag pa zhes su gsol// rgyal ro legs mthong chen bos kyang na gnyis gsum du grong mi dang yulami rnams la 'di skadagyes smras so// sna bo dag pa'i yul na'ang 'dra ba'i nor gyi rigs yod
khas ma 'dod gzhis sbas nas len dum bcub bo// de nas grong mi de yul mi rnams 'di snyam dusems te/ bdag cag gis lha'i phyore gsar dang dngul dang/ nor bu ne po che dang la ba rin po
che dag dumang bo sngagon byas la/ de bdag cag gis glas te slar so so 'i gnas su 'dong ba ni bdag cag gi tshulaa in pas/ ma labadagathag gis rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i mdunangugasar
dang dngul gyi phung po cher spangs la/ mtha' gcig du nor bu rin po che dang la ba ni po che bzha gnas // 'di gzhi lha khyod kyi dkor gyi gsalags so zhes snyas mi lta bar 'dong ngo snyam nas/
sa grong mi dang yulami rnams kyis rgyal po ligs mthong chen po'i mdun du rin po che dang gsa'athung bo chen por sbyangs nas/ mtha' gcig tu nor bu napo tshodangal ba rinabo che bzhi g ste/ 'di
dga'i lha khyod kyi rigs lags so zhes smras nas mi lta bar dod dro// de nas rgya la po legs mthong chen po 'disnyam du sems te/bdag gi bgyi rogs ni chos bzhin gyi red pa yin gyis/
yin bs ni ma yin pas/ ma la bdag gis chos dang mthun pa'i khangabazangs tsalag go snyam pa dang/ mtha'i rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/ rgyal po legs mthong nabochos dngamathun/
ba'i khang bzangs brtsig par spro'o zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po legs mthong chen po gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang/ rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces
smras so// lha chos dang mthun pa'i khang bzungs brtsig pa la thugs kyi 'phrin las bskyang du gsol/ lha'i chos dang mthun pa'i khang babrangs bdag cag gis brtsi ga par bgyi'o// sna bdag kho bo'i
yulan 'di 'dra ba'i nor gyi rigs yod pasali dragos so zhes smras nasal gnang/ des khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po legs mthong chen po ra rkyang pa la gtugs nas/ kha cig gis
ni gos kyi mtha' nas bzung kha cig gis ni rgyal po lags mthong na po ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudunas/ rgyal bo legs mthong chen po la 'di skadu ces smras so// lha chos dang mthun
pa'i khang bzongs brtsi ga pa la thugs kyi 'phrin las bskyang du gsol/ lha'i chos dang mthunapa'i khang bzangs bdag cag gis brtsig par bgyi'o// rgyal po ligs mthong na ngos khams kyi rgyal phran/

brgyang khri bzhi stong la'angam sna bas gnangengo// nas khachos kyi rgyal bo brgyad khri bzhi stongagis rgyal bo legs mthong chen po bzhi skyabs gnang bar 'gro nas/ rang rang gi gnas su dong ste gsar dang/

ts+tso dalamang bo dang/ na tsho'i ka ba re re khyer nas/ rgyal bo lags mthong chen po gang bder dong ste phyin nas/ rgyal bo tshigs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i chos dang mthun pa'i khang bzas

wathab bdag cag gis gang du jim zhig brtsig lags/ grong pa dag khyed kyis de'i phyir rtswa can gyi shar phyogs su chos dang mthun pa'i khang bzangs churadapag tshad gcig/ rgyuradapag tshad gcug ba zhig rtsigs
shig/ de na khams kyi rgyal brgyad khri bzhi stong gisan+d+hacan gyi shar phyogs bachos dang mthun pa'i khungs bzangs rgyar dpag tshadugacig/ dpag tshad gcig ba zhig brtsigs pa/ chos dang mthun pa'i/
khang bgrangs kyi ka rten gyi gzhi rnam pa bzhi po gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ pa rU las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa bros so// chos dang mthun pa'i khang bzangs la ka ba rnam
pa bzhi po gsar las byas pa dngazhes bya banas shel las byas pa'i bar dag btsugs so// gsar las byas pa'i ka ba'i ka rten dang/ ka gzhudang/ bra phul dang gdung dngul las byas so//
dngul las byas pa'i gsas byas so// b+hASh+Thalas byas pa'i noshel las byas so// shel las byas pa'i kaba'i ka rten dang/ ka gzhu dang/ bre phul dang/ gdung nib cha las byas
so// chos dang mun pa'i khang bzangs la phyi tsho rnam po bzhi bo gsaralas byas pazhas/ shelalas byas pa'i bar drag bres so// chos dang mthun pa khong bzangs la phyi ma rnam pa bzhi po gsaralas
byas pa nas/ shel las byas pa'i bar bzhi'o// chos dmathun pa'i khang bzangs la gdung ris rnam kha bzhi po gsar las byas pa nas/ la las byas pa'i khar bres so// chos dang mthupa'i
chos dang mthun pa'i khang bzangs la ba gam ba rnam pa bzhi po gsaralas byas pa nas/ shel las byas pa'i babadags sa// chos dang mthun pa'i khang bzangs la spang leb ma/
babazhi pa gsar las byas pa nas shul las byas pa'i bar gyis g.yogs so// chos dang mthun pa'i kheng bzangs la them skas rnam pa bzhi po gsaralas byas pa nas/ shel las byas pa'i
lcagarab rtsegs so// chos dang athun pa'i khang bzangs la lan kan rnam pa bzhi po gsar las byas pa nas/ shel las byas pa'i bar gyis bskor ro// gsar las byas pa'i lan kan kyi
pa gzusakazeradang/ gdang bu dang lanakanagyi rtenamagi dngul las byas so// dal las byas pa'i zhi gzungs gzer dang/ gdang bu dung/ 'an kan gyi rten gsar las byas so// shel
ts+tsalas byas pa'i gzungs gathadang/ gang budang/ lan kan gyi rtenaabai rma las byas so/ yang chos dang mthun pa'i khang bzangs khang brtsig ma brgyadakhribazhi stong 'jigs te// khang pa rtsa ka la
rnam pa bzhi po gsaralos byas panas/ shel las byas pa'ibang rnams la gser las byas pa li khang ba rtse gam ni/ dngul las byas pa'i khrilhasam can mgon ka'irasakyi gding ba can dang/ stan
nang tshos can gyi gding btsan dang/ 'ug gi gdang bcan dang aratsho zhig gi gding ba can dang/ ka ling ka'i sa phan gyi gding btsan stong g.yogs dang bcas pa/ phyogs gnyis su sngas dmarapo/
kha bcug pa'ir dag bshams so// dngul las byas pa lan gsaralasakhas pa'o// ba cha cha las byas pa'i ngeshel las byas pa'o// shel las byas pa la ni bi cha las byas pa le'i
lhasamnyan nas/ phyogs gnyis su sngas dmar po btsug pa'i bar dag khams so// gsaralaso byas pa'i khong pa tsho ga ma'i mdun nguzhi/ dngul las byas pa'i shing rtal lam deng dmu tog dang/
'bras bu gsaralas byas pa sbyangs so// dal las 'i mdunangu ni gser las byas pa'o// bzhum+ma 'a sa byas pa'idun duni shel las byas pa'o// gshel las byas pa mdun du bzhurlu las byas
ba 'am dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu shel las byas ba sbyangs so// shing ta la de rnams rlung gis bskyod pa zhu/ 'di lta bu'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/ dperan skyes bumakhas pas so'i snyan
yalag lnga dang ldan pa yang go par legs par bsgrags pa bzhin no// chos dang mthun pa'i khang bzungs la gsar gyi bye ma brdal zhing/ na dan gyi chos chag chag btab la/ gsar gyi dra ba dang gser
gyi drele khu g.yar ka brgyus pas brtags so// de nas khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/ chos dang mthun pa'i khang bzas kyi bya ba thams chud zin par go nas/chos dang mthun pa'i khang
bsaman duchos dngamathun pa'i rdzong chur dpag tshad gcig/ rgyar dbag tshad gcig pa zhig brkos te/ chos dngomathun pa'i rdzing pa gu rnam pa bzhi bo soralas byas bdang/ dngul las byas
pa dang/ ba rgyu las byas pa dang/ shel sakhyas pas brtsigs so// chos dang mthun pa'i rdzing la them skas rnam pa bzhi po gsar las byas pa nas shel las byas pa'i
[E ]bar gyis brtsigs so// chos dang mthunopa'i dzingul lan kan mag bzhi po gsar las byas pa nas/ shel las byas pa'i bar gyis bskor to/ gsaralas byas pa'i lanakan gyi gzungs gabrer dang/
gdang bu dang/ lan kan gyi rtenam dngul las byas so// dngul las byas pa'i gsar las byas so// be rma las byas pa'i shel las byas so/ shel las byas ba'igazungs gzar dang//
gdung bu dang/ lan kan gyi na pa ba rlalas byas so// chos dngamathun pa'i rdzongang tshunus skyo ba'il tog rnam pa sna tshogs 'dilta sta/ myu la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/pad+ma dkar po dang
zhim dang/ dringadu 'dzam dang/ dus tshigs thamasacad pa dang/ dus thams cad pa'i ma tog skye bo thams cad la dwagag ba med babaskyod do// chos dang mthun pa'i rdzing gi 'gram gnyen
su brang la skyes pa'i ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs/ 'dilta ste/ a mug to ka dngatsam pa kadang pa ta la dang/ bar kasha dung/ log dang/ nub a li ka dang/ srid du 'ongadang/
u tika dang/ d+han ska ri dang/ dusatshogs thams cad pa dang dus thams cad pa'i mi rtog skya bo thams cad la dgag pa med pa dag bskyod do// chos dngamathun pa'i rdzong du gsar
0 gcal bkram zhing ngagyi chus bkangal/ gsar gyi dra ba gsar gyi dril bu gulang ka brgyas ngas khres so// de nas khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/ chos dang mthun pa'i ji
gi bya ba thams cad brin pa'i gnas/ chos dang mthun pa'i jingagamangashedu/ chos dang mthun pa'i shing tala'i tshal chur dbag tshod gcig pa/ rgyar dpag tshad gcig pa zhig btsugs
taM / chos dang mthun pa'i shing rta latshul to/ tal rnam pa bzhi pags las byas pa nas/ shel las byas pa'i borab tsugs pa la/ gsaralas byas ba lem dwang/ ma tog dab
'bras bu dngul las byas pa btsugs so// dngul las byas pa'i ni gsar las byas so// gsar las byas pa'i ba zhun las so/ba las byas pa'i lam dang/ ma tog dang//
'brasabu shi'alas byas pa btsugs so// yang shing dala'i tshul nge rnams rlung gis bskyod pa'i/ 'di'abu'asgra yi du 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyupate/ dopon skyes bu mkhas pas sale snyan yan lag lnga
dang ldan pa ya nga drag par legs par bsgrags pa bzhi'o// chos dang mthun pa'i shing ta la'i tshal la/ lanakana rnam pa bzhi bo gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ zhi ba cholas
byas ba dang/ shel las byas pas bskor te gsalas byas pa'i nan gyi gzungs gzeradang gdang bu dang/ lan kan gyirtan m dengal las byas pas bskor zhes bya ba'i bar kangam bzhin ]
nyu[/ ]no chos dang mthun pa'i shing ta la'i tshal na gsarngagyi gcal bkram zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btang la/ gsar gyi dra ba gsarngagyi dril bu g.yar ka brgyas pa bres re//

nas khams kyi rgyal zhabargyad khri bshu stong gis chos dngamathun pa'i khang bzangs dang/ chos dang mthun ba'i rdzong dang/ chos dngamathun pa'i shing ta la'i chol kyi bya ba thamasabad zin par rig nas/
rgyal po legs mthong na po gan gzhu ba der dong sta lcags ba dang/ rgyal po legasa mthong chen ba la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i chos dang mthun pa'i khang bzangs dang/ chos dngamathun pa'i
rdzing dang/ chos dang mthun pa'i shing ta la'i tshul yang bgyis lags te/ lha da pa'i dus la bab par dgongs shig/ nas rgyul po legs mthong chon po 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar khang bzos
'di nyid du thog mar bdag khon gnas pa ni bdag gi ma yan gyis ma la bdag gis bdag gi yulan dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ tshul bzang ba bkur ba gang dag gnas pa dedag la chos dang mthu
pa'i 'ang bodrangs su zan byin la/ ra ra' angs bcos bu gsar pa thung par bskonano snyam nas/ n gnas rgyal po legs mthong chen pos chos dang 'azhu ba'i 'ang babs su rang sangs rgyas lnga
brgya la zan byin de/ ring la yang ras bcos bu zungare bskonanas/ tshigs su bcad ngesmras pa// mkhas pas noranamang po dag/ redanas bgamed mi bya ste// tshul khrims ldan pa gang dag la//
[o]yon grub 'gyur ba rnams la sbyin// de ltar yid gzhungs dad ba can/ ma chags sams kyis 'di'i sbyin nas// mkhas pa 'jig rtan gnod med dang// bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// rgyal po

chen po de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal bo lags mthong na po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo gling bzhi la dbang ba/ rin po che sna bdun dang mi rnams kyi 'byor pa rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur pa de

gzhan yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nged de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lags mthong chen bo zhes bya ba 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi la dbang ba/ rin po che sna bdun dang mi rnams

kyi 'byor pa rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur to// rgyal bo chen po ngas sbyin pa'i m sbyin ba'i bgo bsha' des/ bla named pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de lta'ai blta
ste/ 'on kyang 'i sbyin pa donibanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyug dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no// rgyal bo chen po gzhan yang ngas bla nayod pa dag

bar rdzogs pa'i byungachob don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin ba dwagabatang/ bsod nanaso dag byas pa gang na ba nyicig/ rgyal bo chen po sngon byung ba bram zeshing sA la chen bo lta burus dpogatses bya ba zhig
byung bar gyur te/ des bram ze rnams la sbyin pa 'od lta bu byin te/ glang bo chagasar gyis brgyanab/ gsar gyis gyis mdzesab phyas ba/ gsol gyi rgyal mtshan can/ gser gyi rlabs g.yogs babargyad
khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la spyin par byino// rtagasar gyis brgyan ba/ gsar gyis mdzes par byas pa/ gsarakyi dra bas g.yogs ba brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams/
[P ]la sbyin pa 'byin no/ shing rta rnamababazhi bo gsar las byas pa dang dngul las byas ba dang/ bo d+halas byas pa dang/ shelalasaMbyas pas de'i pags pas g.yogs pa/ gung lngags
kyis g.yogs ba/ aramo nag gis g.yogs ba/ rnam par rgyal byed kyi ba dan can brgyud khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams lasbyin pabyin no// gsar gyi snod dngul so la mas bkang ba brgyad khri bzhi

stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no// dngul gyi snod gsaraphyis bkang ba brgyud khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin bar byinon// khri rnam pa bzhi po gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/
bzhurlu las byas ba dang/ shel las byas pa lhas ma can mago nakagika'i ris bting ba/ stananang tshangs can ba dang ba stanachen bo bting ba/ ka laTeka'agos kyis steng g.yogs pa// stong
g.yogs rtsa ga ma can phyogs gnyis su gras yar do bshams pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ ras thunga rnam pa bzhi bo ka sheka' bas phran dad tharama'i rjes phran dang/ du ku la'i ris phran nang
ko dam pa riras phran zung brkyang khri bzhi stong dang bo gsar gyi rAcan rmig pa dngal las byas ba/ be'u spyamathun dang bcas pa/ 'khar ba'i ban ras bcos bu phrugs kyis g.yogs
0 pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bumo gsar gyi debung rgyan dang mgul rgyan thogs pa/ legs par brgyun ba brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin pa byin/ zas dang/ skom dang/bza' ba
drang/ bca' ba dang/ bldag pa dang/ bzhib ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rgyal po chen po bab zashing sA la chen po lta bu dus dbog gis/ bram ze rnams la de lta bu'i sbyin pa byin pa 'dra bas
zhi/ gang gis phyi rol pa drang srong 'dong pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya la zan byin na/ sbyin pa de bas sbyin 'di 'bras bu sa 'o// rgyal po chen po khram bre ngashing sA la chago lta
bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin ba de lta bu byin pa gang yin ba 'didang/ gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgyal zan byin pa bas/ gang gis so
so'i skye bo 'dzamabu'itshalan 'dug pa gcig la zan byin na/ spyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches chi'o// bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dbog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu
byin pa gang yin pa 'di dang/ gang gis phyi rol ba'i drang srong 'dodob rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya la zan byin pa khas/ gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir
zhugs pa gcige la zan byin na/ sbyin ba dogs sbyin ba 'di'i 'bras bu sa cha'o// del sogs pa rgyus par thamasacado'atsamasanas thams cad brjod par bya sta/ gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya la zan byin pa bas// gang gis rgyunanguzhugs pa gag la zan byin na/ sbyin pa de bas sprin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches che'o//
ba gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgyal zan byin pa bas/ gang gis lo gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyirezhugs pa gcigro la na khyin na/ sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu/
ches se'o// gang gis lanatsug phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgyu la zan byin pa bas/ gang gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba gciko lan/ sbyin pa de bas smin pa 'di'i
'bras bu ches che'i// gang gis lan cig phyir 'ong babargya la zan byin pa khas/ gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byu ba'i phyir zhugs pa gcig lan/ sbyin pa de bas sprin pa 'di'i
'bras bu ches cher// gang gis phyi re zhu 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du zhugs pa brgya la zan byin pa bas/ gang gis phyi ma 'ongo bkacig lan/ de bas sbyin pa 'di'i 'bras bu ches tsho'o//
gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya bas/ kang gis dgra bcom pa 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gcig la na/ sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di 'bras bu ches che'o// gang gis dgra bcom

ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum dubya ba'i phyir zhugs ba brgya bsazhi/ gang gis dgra bcom pa gago la na/ sbyin ba de bas spyin ba 'do'i 'bras bu chos cha'o// gang gis dgra bcom pa brgya la zanabyin pa bas/[.]
thabs gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga' ra ba 'bul na/ sbyin ba de bas sminab 'di'i 'bras bu chos 'o// gang gis kun dga' ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang brtsig tu bcugan//
dubasa'adi'i 'bras bu nas che'o// gang gis gtsug lag khang nyid du gnas ma 'a'adi lta ste khridang/ gri'u dang/ lcan nang tshangs can dang/ la ba dang/ sngas dang/ gor bu dag phul na//
debs 'di'i 'bras bu cheg che'o// gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gtan gyi skyon sapacad de/ rjes su mthun pa'i mchod spyanyebatsugasazhu/ de bas 'di'i 'bras bus che'o// gang gis sangs
rgyas la skyabs su song zhing/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs na/ bas 'a'i 'bras bu chos go/ gangagis byams pa'i sags dang ldan ba zhes bya ba/
rgyas par sbyar te/ rebs 'di'i 'bras bu ches 'o// rgyal bon po khram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dbog gis brag ba mas la sbyin de lta bu byin pa gang yin pa 'di dang/ gang ges

phyi chos ba 'o dreng slong 'dod pa rnams la 'dod chags dang thul 'bargya la zan byin ba dang/ gong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byuba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya la zan byin pa dang/ gang
gis rgyun tuzhugs pa brgyadang/ gang gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya dang ]gang gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba brgya dang/ gang gis phyi ma 'ong
da/ ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgyudang/ gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya dang/ gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs
pa brgya dang/ gang gis dgra bcom pa brgya dang/ gung gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga' rab 'bul ba dang/ gang gis kun dga' ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang
brtsig tu gcug pa dang/ gang gis gtsugalag khang nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/ khri dang/ khri'u dang/ stananang tshangs can dang da la ba dang sngas dang/ gor bu dag 'bal la
dang gang gtsug ga khang dek+kad du gtan gyi rkyenaris bcad ng/ mthun pa'i mchod sbyin 'dzugs pa dang/ gang gis sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs
su 'gro zhing/ bslab pa'i ga'i rnams blangs pa dung/ gang gis byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rgyas pa bas/ gang zhig 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par rjes su lta
zad par rjes su lta/ 'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta/ 'gog par rjes su lta/ nges par 'byung bar rjes su lta zhing gnas na ( sbyin pa de bas 'di 'bras bu ches che'o//
rgyal bo chen bo de lta bsazha/ khyod kyis 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ 'du byed thams cad lami rtag par rjes su lta zhingags par bya'o// zad por rjes su lta ba dang/ 'dod chags nga
0/ ba la bar rjes su lta ba dang/ 'gog par rjes lta ba drang/ nges par 'byung bar rjes su lta zhing gnas par bya'o zhes khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// rgyal po chen po de ltar bram ze shing
sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog nges/ bralaze rnams la sbyin pa dag btang/ bsod nams ga byas nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sbyin pa byin pas bde bar 'gyur// sbyin pa sbyin
pas 'jigs pa med// lha dang mA la nang dgazha// sbyin pa yisanAlegs par mchod// du bas 'byor pa 'dod pa dang/ dbang phyug dang nilha yul dang// thur pa 'dod pas
rtog dun// 'jigs paud dar sbyin pa btang// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khram bri shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod
kyis doltar mi bal sdu/ de'achade'ongus nang nyid bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu sa dpog sa bya bar gyur ta/ ngas dan bram ze rnams la de lta bu'i sbyin pa byin no// rgyal po chen po ngas
sbyin pa'i m sbyin pa'i bgo shar rjes/ bran med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub shob bosAm na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta sta/ 'on kyang sbyin pa de blonamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub kyi rgyu tsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no/ rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bzhed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag
[rg]bya// dbatang/ bsod nams dog byas pa gang yin ba nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rgyal po la rtecan zhes bya bamathu dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ lha rnams kyi dbang po
[D ]brgya byin gyi snying du sdugapa'i grogs por gyur ba las/ de la bu pho yang mdabu mo lang yong nas/ de lag pa 'grem pa la gtod nas bdag gi 'byor ba drangadabang phyog 'di 'dran/ bupho yang mang
bumo yang yod pas/ bdag 'dasan gdung brgyudabacad par 'gyurare snyam nas segs khongs su chud cing 'dug pa/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya nyi gyisa mthong azhes sbas pa/ grogs po khyor
'i phyi'i lag pa'i 'agram pa gtad nas sems khongs su rgyus ring 'dug/ dres snas ba ko'u shi ka'adag gi 'byor pa dang dbang phyug 'di'adran/ bu pha yang med bumo yang med pas//
rgyu[j]bangag das na gdung brgyud 'chad par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ grogs po kho bos khyed la sman zhig bskur gyis/ btsun mo rnams la lud cig dang/ des na khyod bu pho dang bu mo yod par 'gyur
ro// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ri spos dud ldan la song nas sman thungs te/ rgyal po dil bskur ba dang/ rgyal pos btsunamo rnams la sman 'di 'thus shig ces bsur ba las/ rgyal po
de'i btsun mo dam pa gnyid kyis log pa dang/ de dag gis de na ma bslab bar snyan 'thungs pas/ de dgo thams cad sems can dang ldan par gyur to// dems gyi zhig na btsunamo dam pa de las
na/ des de rnams sems can dang ldan par mthong ste/ des smras pa/ khyed cag gis ci zhig byas zha/ des na sems can dang ldan bar rgyur da rnams kyis sbas pa lhas 'tsho cag la snyan
zhig btung ba'i phyir byin no// khyed cag gis ca'o porulo mo ma bsrung bar btung/ daldayod kyi sman snodapa zhig nas khyer te 'ongos/ kusha'i thum por 'jugezhas so// lcu deganu'adug/ 'o
nisin no// des kusha bkrus nas 'thungs pa dang/ de yang sems can dang ldan par gyurd// denams zla ba brgyad ngam dgu 'dus pa dang/ de dag thams cad bus pa'i tsags so// bo'abatsunamo

ma pa las nibu pho mtshan ngan babaco brgyad dang ldan pa/ bzhin sangaga'i gdong pa lta bu napo chen po'i mtshan dang ldan ba trig btsas nas/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/ ku shazhes bya bar botags
so rgyal po de bu gzhan rnams mthong nan de ga'i bar 'agyur la/ nAlo sdug pas zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur// khams kyi rgyal phran dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dkabadag cag thams cung
rgyal po la can n po 'dus thibs kyisaman gyis/ dergyal sring las dbyung gis 'dongango zhes/ da rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang 'osanas sdong grong khyer bskor te
'dug go/ rgyal po la nya can n po'i ngoms dbalhan cig g.yul sprod ma podazhas/ de sgo rnams bcad ng ra ba'i kha nas sbyangs te 'dug go/ kungashama'i drung du song nas smras pa/ yum
[2} ]ci'i slad du sgo rnams bkum/ khyod kyi yab khams kyi rgyal phran drag dang lhan cig klayul sprod ma stong nas/ des sgo rnams bcud de 'dug pa yin no// yum
bdag 'di dag dang lhan cige gtsug g.yul sprod kyis/ bdag la rgyal bos shing rta stsal du gsol/ bu khyod de'i snying sdug cing zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur/ de jig khyed la shing rje ltar tham/
yum bzhud cig/ bzhud nas gzhon kushe 'di dag dang ldan tsage g.yul sprod par 'gyur rgyus/ shing rta stsol cig ces gsungs shika/ da song nas rgyal po la snus pa/ lha gzhon nu'i mchid/
nas bdag 'di dagad la ga g.yul sprad kyis/ shing rta stsol cig ces mchi'o// nges dral shang rta khyin pa dang/ de dang ba gnyis thogs nas shing rtar zhugs te 'byung bar brtsams pa
dang [0f10 ]lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams ba/ khams kyi rgyal phran 'di dag mthu dang ldan ba yin la/ gzhon nu ku sha bskal ba bzung bo'i byang chub sems baba'anyon
gongs pa 'gyur kyis 'di'i grags bya'o snyam nas/ des del dung dang/ 'khor lo dang/ btsan byin nas/ byang chub sems dba' 'di dag gi 'khyod 'tsho bar gyis shig/ de sgo phyo
nas byung sta/ des dung 'bud pa po'i cho/ dung gi sgras dpung rnams skrag nas/ kha cig ni des 'oparagyurato// khacogani rnababaka gnas bros so// nam 'khor lo ma bzhi/
'bangs ba de'i rmo dedag sa la 'gyel bar brgyu'o// des dmag gi nang du song nas dung bus pazhu/ de dag thams cad kyi rna ba rdol bar gyur nas// de rnams kyis skyes bu 'di'i sen
pa yin no zhes byas nas byes so// des de la bzhus pa'i drud dusongaste/ lha bdag gis rgyal po thams cad pham par bgyis te yul bsgrubs lags so// rgyal po lta
chen pos thosazhasamagu ste/ des bsams pa/ gzhon nu gu shomathu dang ldan pa brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin na/ ci'i phyir bdag kiso 'di la mi dga' ba bskyed snyam nas/
