de de la dga' ba bskyod par brtsams so// des khung rnams khyim thub nas// ku'a'i ma yang bslang bar brtsams ba dang// de dag thams cad kyis smas pa// ku ma
gtogs pa la bu mo sbyin no// rgyal po gzhan zhig gis rgyal po gzhan gyi bu mo zhig bslangs te bkamangam blangs ba'i bar der/ rgyal bo la nye can chen pos bu gtan gyi ched yin ba'i
thabs shig gis bslangs nas bu mo de kusha labyin nas/ rgyu skar dang/ tshod ngang/ yud tsam dgabastun te/ gzhon nu ku sha'i khyim phub bo// rgyal pos smras pa// shes ldan dag
sus kyang gzhonanu ku sha lam langam bstan rigo/ chur 'jug pa'i khrus ma yin pa'i khrus kyis khrus byisashig zhinapar chung ma'i drung dum gtangazhag/ gzhon nu kusha spun rnams
da nga lhan cig rtse brtsumades mthong nas/ des smras ba gzhon nu rnams kyi dbus na rtsed mo byed ba'i sha za tha gi su zhig yin/ de ni byed kyi khyim thab yin no// kha
malea thab 'di 'dra ba zhig gam phyi zhig na yang des gzhon nu rnams dang ldan cig rgyan rtsa ba'ir dga mthong anas/ de bzhin du bdag gi khyim thaci 'dra bzhig snyam ste/ des bsams ba/
mngon sum du bya'o snyam nas/ des mo mar bus de phru bas bkab nas bzhag go/ de yang chung ma'i drung du 'ongs pa dang/ des kyang bstanabalas mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa bzhin/

sang ge'i gdong pa 'drab zhig mthong nas/ des smras pa/ sha za sha grazhas byas nas brosaso// rgyal po la can chen po la ni 'ar pa gzhan zhigale gnas / dus gzhon nu sha song lar 'on pa rnams phobacig/
bcas btang nas/ dpengasong ba dang ku sha'i chung mas/ pha dang ma la khyed cag sa'i stangan skyes pa mad dmA cin khyod kyis bdag sha sbal sbyin/ gal bdag bkuman de lta na legs/ gal ten
bkum ni kho mo rang 'chi zhus spring bdang/ de dag gis khrid de// gzhon nu kun s kyang ri 'or nga ba ste 'ongs pa dang/ des ma la sa ba yum badzag gimanyis brang re gar mchis/ des
snyas pa/ phams khridado// ci'i slad du/ khyod sha za yin snyam nas so// yum mchis na dgug par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gyis shig/ dadung dang/ 'khor lo dang/ bson khyer tader
song ba las/ jitsamana'i 'or gzhan zhig na skye bo'i tshogs chen po sodags 'jigs pas/ sgra rnams bcad de phyogs su lta zhing 'khod pa dang/ gzhon nu ku shas smras pa// 'i phyir de ltatha'ajug/ seng
ge'i 'jigs pas so// ci stami gsad/ mis mod/ gal te bdag gis bsad na bdag la tu phyin/ dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i phyid ngo// gshan nu ku shas gang ga'i drung du nye bar song nas dung
bus pa deng de'i rna ba rdol te shi nas/ des du khyer de'i 'or du song nas/ shes ldan dag seng ge de'i 'di yin no// dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i phyed khyab cig[ ]/nges smras pa/ khyed cag kyi

lag tu zhog la slar 'ongasan khyin nug/ du ri 'or gan chung mdu yod pa'i ra 'or der song nas/ mi rtog 'phrang brgyud mkhan zhig gi drung du phyin pa dang/ des smras pa/ khyod 'dra ba su zhig/ rjes smras r/
ma tog 'phreng brgyada mkhan gyi bu yin// khyod kyi mi tsamin/ spong byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas du ngang ng+ka rnams le mkhas pa yin pas/ des m tog 'phreng
legs par brgyus pa dang/ mi rtog brgyad mkhan rjes mo de la rtog 'thung ba de phyin no// des smras pa/ 'di 'dra ba'i ma rtog 'phrang ba'i khyod kyis sngon lan 'gar yang m brgyus na 'di la rgyu yod/
bdag gi slob mas brgyus so// khyod kyi slobam de blta'o// des de der khrid pa dang/ d mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bsha za 'digang nas 'ongs pa zhig snyam nas/ des sha zasha za zhes sgra/
byung ste de bskud pa las/ g.yos mkhan zhig gi drung du phyin pa dang/ des smras pa/ khyod su zhig/ kho bo g.yos mkhan gyi bu yin no// khyod kyi ming ci yin/ snod dri zhim
zhes bya'o// dres bco ba dang bsreg ba legs par byas pa dang/ g.yosana mkhan des kyang bu mo de la btsos pa dang bsags pa de bstabs so// des sas pa kyenang rje btso ba dang bsrags
pa legs pa 'di sus kayos/ bdag gi slob mas g.yos so// khyod kyi slob ma de blta'o zhes bya ba nas/ dezhas kyang bsad do zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ sman pa zhig gi drung du phyin pa
'tsha las/ des smras pa/ khyod su zhig/ sman ba'i bu inano// khyod kyi ming ni in/ rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya'o// bu mo de gang nad kyis thebs par gyur pa dang/ sman pas gso ma nus nas/
nupa sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ dres snas pa mkhan po tsa'i phyo'i sems khongs su chud cing 'dug rgyal po'abumo kladand kyis thebs na/ kho bos gso bar mnus so// bdag
katshig la gso lags so zhes du song ba dang/ dusaethon gnas des snas pa/ sha za 'digang nas 'ongs/ yang bsams pa/ gal te 'ga' zhig stsas na sos ma byas kyis/gang gi tshe
bdag sos par gyur pa de'i tshe skya'o sAm nas/ de sos par gyunas sha za sha za zhes sgra phyung ste des de bskrad pa las/ blon po rnams kyi drung du u pa dang/ khyod su zhig/ kho bo stong thub bo/

bya bang rnams kyis de drung du bzhag go/ sngon dbang pa'i rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa sa/ bdag gis sngon rgyal po'i bu ma thob ba gang yin pa de gzhon nu ku sha sa nor terang gi khyim du song ngo zhes shes nas/ sa

rgyal po de la gal razhigakho bo la bu mo byin na de lta na legs/ gal dam byin nani rgyal srid stor bar bya'o zhes springag dang/ des smras pa/ kho bo'abum 'di ni rgyal po la nyanan po ba rgyal bu gzhi/
nukul byigazin pas ji ltar gzhan la byin/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang 'ongs nas rgyal po'i pho brang bskor te 'dug go/ rgyal po de'i de dang lhan cig g.yul sprodam phodazhas/ des sgo dgu
bsang nas 'dug go/ gzhon nu ku shas dron po rnams la smras pa// shes ldan dag ci'i phyi'i sgo rnams bcad/ nga rnams kyis de la rgyas par smras pa dang/ gzhon nu ku sha smras pa/ gal te
kho bol rgyal bo'i sras mo shin/ kho bos de dang lhan cig g.yul spyad do// de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ bu mo 'dings 'anyan napo'i bu la byone'an/ sa
ji ltar 'di lasmin/ dra ltar gyi khrag khrug 'di yang bumo kho'a'i phyir yin no// blon po rnams kyis smras pa lha sum+b+hal bar 'gyur/ gakhom mas kyis/ zhig 'di de rnams dang lhan cig
g.yul sprod du stsolacigadang/ ngozhes skol gyis dus mkhyen par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras po/ de bzhin du gyis shig bon po rnams kyis smras pa/ stong thub ji skadadusmas pa de/
bzhin du bya'o// de nas gzhon nu ku shasamada' lnga brgya shong ba'i dang bo gnyis thogs nas dung dang/ 'khor lo dang/ ba can khyer de byung nas/ sa du/
chabus pa dang/ de rnams kyi rna brdolo nas bros so// rgyal po'i bu mo des bsams pa/ gzhon nu ku sha'adzin brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa chen po dang ldan pa yin/ ci'i phyir bdag
gis 'di la ngaga' ba mi byas m nas/ de de la dga' ba bskyang nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so// ji skung zhal gyis bzhes pa de mdzod cig/ bu ngas khyed la phyin no// des smras
pa yabu gzhon nu ku sha de na 'di nyidi lags so/ bu gal te de ltan song zhig ces/ nges dri la yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs byin nas bkur stir byas te btang ngo// de'i 'ar de'i
na nas de rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i phud byin cig/ da rnams kyis smras pa// gzhenon dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi khyer ba'ichubrug pa gang
yani pa de lta bu byung ngo// denus gtsang yang rang bzhig na lug dag cig rgyunas/ gzhon nu ku zhes tshigs su bcad de smaso pa lan dreg tu len pa'i klong// glang chen gang du'u gyur pa//
anib dang lug khyir bar// rjes su dpags nas shes par bya'o/// 'dul ba gzhi///bam po zhe gsum pa/ gal te re zhig byin na de lta nani
legs/ gal dam byin n rdzags la gtug go/ de rnams kyis de la byin nas/ da 'bab chu dang ba zhig tu btab nas/ sa bas khrus bya ba'i phyir nur zhugs pa dang/ den des rang gi bzhin gyi
gzugs bar na mthong nas/ des bsams pa// mtshan ngan pa rnam pa bco brgyad dang ldan zhing/ bzhin sang ge'i gdong pa 'dra ba yin te/ denyid kyi phyi'i rgyal po la bu mo 'dibadag la mi dga' ba
yin gyis/ bdag 'dra ba'i gsog na ni rung/ songal bdag 'chi'o snyam nas/zhags thabs po zhige du zhugs nas/ bdag nyid 'gag par brtsams pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
bsams pa// 'din bskal pa bzung po'abyung chub sems drang 'u then gzugs bzang po dang mi ldan pos/ bdag nyid gsod par byed kyis/ de'i yid la re ba rdzogs par bya'o snyam nas/
brgya byin gyis smas pa/ gzhon nu yan chad/ bdaganyid gsod par ma byad par gtsug gi nor bu 'di ko la thogs shige dang/ yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes smras song ngo
gzhon nu kun khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang/ sgo srungs kyi mos 'di'i gzhon nu ku'i pho brang yin gyis/ ma 'jug cig ces bzlog go/ des smras pa/ kusha na nga yin no// de yom/
chas nas/ des gtsug gi nor bu phral ba dang/ sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur nas de yid ches so// gzhon nu kun s bsams pa/ 'dinyid du 'dug go snyam nas/ dos pa 'a yab mkhyen par ]
[z# p]/ mdzod cig/ 'anyide dumachis so zhes snying ba dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la gatrer bzhi'i 'byung khungs bstan nas/ sa grong khyerd na po chosnabazhi
las byed du bcug go/ kazhonanukusha gnas pas/ kusha can zhes grags so// don stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ku she zhes bya bar gyur te/ des grong khyer dugakhrimachod
sbyin gyis brtsigs te/ lomang bo dang/ le brgya phrag mang po dang/ lo stong phrag mang po dang/ lo brgya stongaphrog mang por bram ze rnams la sbyin pa btang sta/ dbangagashod kyi nad
spron na su mchogs la mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa// lha dai yin ng dag tu// bdag gi 'byor ba mthong anasazhi/ gang gis phun sum thob pa yi// sbyin pa su zhig yin//
tshe khyad (gangagis skyes bu brgya phrag thibs ma cing// ser sna dkra bor rgyu ba khri'i zhazhanas/ 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pas sbyin gtong ste// bdag ni dpa' bo'i dpa' rdzob yin
par sams// gang zhig lagasha mtshon thogs g.yul ngor 'jug/ den dpa' bo mnazhes thub rnams gsungs// gang dag 'jigs pa yod par sbyin gtong ba// dadag dpa' bo yin zhes
! kun mkhyen gsung// rgyal po chen po de'i 'dresan stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ku sha zhes bya bar gyur ba/ gang gis krong khyer drug khri'i thin pa dag bdang/ bsod nams

dag byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ku sha zhes bya bder gyur te/ sa de na grong khyer
drug khri'i mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs nas sbyin bdagabatang bsod zhams drag byas so// rgyal po chen po nga'ispyoge ba'amo spyin pa ribago bsha' des/ branamad pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas par gyur dosnyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de thun mdo pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang/ skyon
tsamadang/ tshogs tsam yin no// dge slong rnams the tshom skyasazhas/ thartsom thams cad gcod pa songs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa rgyal po ku shas las
rtsa zhig bgyisazha/ las de'i rnam par smin pas mnani sdug ba bco brgyad dang ldan zhing/ phyugapa/ nor mnga'u/ longs spyod ba'i kasasu skyes pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgaku sha nyid kyis las tshog sed pa// skyon yongs su bskya ba 'od pa bzhin nye bar gnas po/ gdonami za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las ngag byas shing
bsags pas/ dag slong dag kunyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gse so sor skyong ba'agyur/ dag slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag phyi rol gyi sa'i
khan/sa lam ba smin par mi 'gyur/ chu khams mi 'gyur/ mgikhams pa'i 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi 'diltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba
byas shing bsags pa gzhi'onari phung bo dang/ khams dang/ skyemachod la rnam par sman ba'i 'gyur te/ las rnams kheskal pa brgyar yang ni// chud mi za ba'ang chogis dang dus//
rnadan lus can rnams la// 'bras bu dag tu'agyur banyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'byor gzhan zhigan khyim bdagacig gnas te/ dres babral ba dang bca' ba rab tumang po khyod de skyod
mos tshal du song ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung bshad pa na/ 'jig rten du'ang sangs rgyas dman ba dang ngan pa la snying brtsa btsan/ bos mtha'i gnas la dga' ba/
'jig rten gyi yona gnas gcig bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rangasangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song zhu/ dus zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dug rab tu
byung ba 'diskyod cig/ de dag gis skyod ma bod pa dang/ zhebadag de nyid langs te bzung nas bskad de/ seng ge 'agadong can manangan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa khyod gda'agro
zhis kyang smras so// rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/ sho'amos ba 'di gtan du smag shing nyams zhogarung ngo ma dugenas ston ginam mkha' la zhes bya ba nas/ nges pa la
ste byas te zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas bar sbyar te/ jitsam na rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam bu 'di lta bu la ngag rgyu ba po 'is phyung ba gang yin
pa de las dri bdugamyong bam gyur cig/ gang yang bya ba byas pa'i dreg ba'i rtswa tha'adis bdag phyug cing nor mang ba dang/ longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyurtsigatsos byas so//
dge slong dag dzisnyam du soms/ khyomebadag kangayonapa dku sha gzhon nu'adritordo yin te/de 'dis rang sangs rgyas la ngago rtsub bo'i las phyungabos/ las de'i rnam par smin
paman ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan zhing/ bzhanas nga ge'i gdong 'dra bar gyur to// gang yang bya ba byas pa dgi las kyi rnam par smin pas stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas las gcig tuganag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin bzhi gcig tu gzhag par 'gyur zhing/ 'drenam rnams kyin 'dun mar 'gyur/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams
kyin gcig tu dkar bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas nanguge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ las gang dag gcig duganag pa rnams dang 'drenaa rnams spangs la/ gcig tu dka' ba'i las
rnams bod la btsal ba'abya'o zhes/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ gzhan yang rgyal po chen po ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub don du gnyer
dpa'i phyir sbyin ba dag btang/ bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cika/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul ka li ka zhes bya bar gdol pa'i rgyal bo phur bu gsum
pa zhes bya ba/ 'khor gdol pa brgya phrag dum dang/ 'khor gdol pa stong phrag dus 'khor gdol pa brgya stong dum yod la/ byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rjecan/ sems can thams cad la phan pa
dngasIng brtse ba zhig byung ste/ de'iyul dum le ltos byung ba de'itshobadanab gsol bas/ lhas rgyur ba 'babs pas lan 'ga' yang le ltos 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dudrang srong ginang du rab tu
byung nas/ des mngon por shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so// de'i tshayul wA rAn si zhargyal bo tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bdeb dang/ la legs pa skyo bo dang
phalubo zhes rag dugang ba na rgyal srid byed du'ajug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig lcasa mkhan rnams kyis bcugazhis su charami 'bab bo zhes lung bstanato// de nas rgyal bo tshangs sbyin
grong khyer wAran+tasa'i dril sgrog tu bcug ba wArANasin gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyor ba draganyicig/ ltasa mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su cha rnami 'bab bo zhes lung bstan gyis (khyod
cag las gang dag la dus tsaman bza' ba yod pa de'angag cig/ gang dag latshod ba de ni dengs shig/ nas skya boratshogs chen bo de dag ma shes dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs skrag nas
[/ ]gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan drag rgyal bos yul rnams su 'di lta bu'idril sgrog tu bcugan/ de ji ltar bsgrub pa bya/ gang du 'dong/ de rnams kyis gdul ba'i yul zha/ gdel
pa'igs las byung ba'i drang srong zhig yod// pa'i 'danapa gsol bas lhas char 'bebs so zhes thos nas/ dazhus lo bcu gnyis kyi bar gyi bza ba med pa gang yin pa de rnams gdol pa'i/
yul dudong ba dang/ gdol pa'i rigs las byung ba'i drang srong gi bu gdol ba'i rgyal bo des/ skya bo'i tshogs de'i bza' ba dang btung ba 'do bcu gnyis su spun/ mu ge rgyunachakas
bonar byung nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis/ blon po rnams la dris pa/ skya bo'i gas de dag gang du song klon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha yul ka lang ka'igadol pa'o rgyal po
lu bu gosaya pa zhes bgyi ba/ sos pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang byams pa zhig mchis ti/ de'i brten pa gsol bas lhas char 'bebs pas/ der skya bo'i
rdzogs chen poms so// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag mu kachen po 'di ni mu ge'i bskul lnga ba dang 'dra ba yan+ten/ dul ji ltar bslab par bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lha
gal ba'i khul gyi rgyal po gang lags pa dodrang song ginang du rab tu byung ngo zhes thos lags kyis/ des gsol ba medzod cig/ de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gdol pa'i yul du song nas/
[ggj ]dra nga srong der gsol ba gdab bar brtsams pa/ drang srong chen po 'dogakri ul mu gachan bonu ga'i bskal pa bam dang 'dra ba khyon dgu bab pa gsol ba/
gos so// des bden pa gso la bar brtsams ba nyi 'od rigs las skyes ba li/ zhe lnga dumed cing 'tshomada'// gdol ba khur bu gsum pa zhes// lta dai la grags pa yis/
sems can kun la khams ba'isims// skyon med rab tubasgom bdag gi/ bden tshig des ni skyadagu'adri/ klus nitshom bar byed gyur cig/ gang phyir skyas ba tshun chad nas// byams
ba'i gnas babasgoms pa/ bden pa'i tshig des skye dgu dag rgyus ni ma bar byed rgyur go/ de nas bden pa gsol bas/ sul wA ra NA sar lhas char phabasamu che
rgyun chad cing 'alegs par gyur to// de nas wa ra NA san gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dgangob pa'i yul nas lar NAsisalhags so// rgyal bo chen pa de'i tshe de'i dus// gdol pa'i
rgyal bo phur bu gsum pa zhes byab/ byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rjen/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang snying brtse bcan zhig byung ba de bden pa gsol pas/ lhas char phab
nas mu ga rgyun chad cing lo legs par gyurab dekazhan zhig mi'i snyam na/ khyod kyis lta mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nganyid de de'i dus gdol bo'i rgyal bo'ur bu gsum bzhes bya ba/
[4/ ]byams pa'i bdag nying snying rje na/ sems can thams cad ba can pa dung snying brtseb na de'i bden pa gsol bas/ lhas char 'bebs pa de yin par gyur to// rgyal po na bo ngas sbyin pa'i m sbyin pa'i

bgo bshad sa/ bla na med kha sangadag khar rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis dultar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin ba de bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang/
rgyatsam dang/ tshogs ma yin no// rgyal bo'i na bo gzhan yang ngas bla na du ba lang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dgu btang bsod ms dag

byas pa gang zhe pa nyon cig/ rgyal bo chen po sngon byung ba su las thi lar/ rgyal po lha chen bo zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal patshatha' bzhire ma bar rgyal ba/ chos drang ldan ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/
nad sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de rin po chesna bo ni 'di lta bu g na te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo bde bo chadeng glang bo ni botshe dang rta rin po dang/ nor bu ni botsho dang bud med yin
bodang/ khyim bdag rin po'i dong/ bdun ba blon po nabo// de la bu dbang ba/ rdul bod pa gzha laga mchog gigizugs dngaldan pa ba rolagyisngarab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar yod
mi de rgyatshol thug se chen pom lus par gnod par rdo ba med cing 'tshe med pa 'di nyid chad med cing mtshon gyis 'da' bzhedal/ chos dang mthun pa'i snyoms pas khegs par phab ste gnas
bu zhi/ @#// so// nas rgyal bo lha chen po'i sku mkhan gyi mi skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na/ skra mkhan kyi ma la sbas pa/ kyenang rje khyod kyis gang gi tshe nga'i makolas gshin rje'i pho
skudakar skyes pa mthong ba de'i tshoda' sngon ga/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skru mkhan gyi mis rgyal bo lha chen po ltar manyan to// dus gzhan zhig na skra mkhan kyi mis rgyal bo lha chen bs/
skra dbab spu 'chos ban/ rgyal lhachen bo 'amago las gshin rje'i pho nya'i sku kar skyes pa'i thongang/ mthong nas kyang yang rgyal bo lha chen la 'di skad ces smras so/ lhamkhyen par
mdzod cigo/ dbu la gshin rje'i bshad bu skudakar po skyes lags so// kyenang rje de'i phyir khyod kyis skudakarade dag la kyis dal bu dal bus phyung la nga'i lag par byin/ lha
bka' bzhi tshul nas ska mkhan gyi mis rgyal po lha chen po'i ltathamnyan nas/ sgra skya bo de dag kagar gyi smang tser gyis rim gyis dal bu dal bus phyung nas/ rgyal bo lha chen 'o/
lag tu bzhag go/ de nas rgyal bos lha chen pos skra skya bo de dag lag pa gnyis kyis brkyang nas/ tshigs su bcad ng smras lu bdag gimago les klad kyi sgra/ la'atsho'abrog kha
skyes bami/ gshin rje'i bon byung rakyis// bdegani rab 'byung sa la bab// bdag gis mi rnams 'dod pa ni spyad sngon te/ lha rnams kyi 'dod pa btsal ba'i dus la bab kyis/

ma la bdag gis gzhon nu thu bo rgyalasrid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug la/ rgyal po'i drang srong gis par spyad pa spyod do snyam mo// de nas rgyal bo lha chen pos kazhen zhu thu bo shos pho nyas
bku gnas 'di skad ces snyas so// gzhenonu shes par gyis shig/ pa'i mgo las gshin rje'i phonya sku dkar skyas/ ngasami rnams kyi 'dod pa'i spyad zin pas/ lha rnams kyi 'dod
ba btsal ba'i dus la bab ste/ bu gzhon nu khyod la ngas rgya mtshol thug pa'i sa chen po 'digand kyis/ khyod kyis 'di lachos bzhin gyis bskyang bar bya'o// chos m yin pas ni ma yin no//
'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam 'dzin mar skyodan/ khyod kyis yul du gnas su ma gzhug cika bu gzhon nu khyod kyis kyang gang gi tshemago lo gshin rje'i 'o lta sku dkar skyes par mthong ba de ni/

khyod kyis kyang gnonanu thu bo shes rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed ngunug la/ rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod ba sbyod cig/ yis kyang khyod kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa 'di lta bu la zhugs/
pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ rgyund par mi bya zhing skyes bu cha shamadu gyuralamiculo/ bu gzhon nu'aga'azhig skyes bu bzang po yod pa'i dus 'di lta bu la/ dge ba ma nges pa 'di lta bu la zhugs

pa'i rjes su 'jug par byed pa gang yin padan/ dems kyi rgyun chad bar mi byed pa yin/de rnams kyi skyes bu tha shalam yin la 'gyurer//bugazhen nu 'ga' zhig skyes bu bzang po yod pa'i dus 'di lta bu la/
ge ba'i lam nges pa 'di lta bu la zhugs pa'i rjes su 'jug par byed ba gang yin pa zhi/ de rnams kyirgyunanod par byed pa yi// de ni rnams kyi skur bu pa shal yin no//

de lta bas nang khyod la de skad du zhes kyang khyod kyis dge ba'i las nges pa 'dilta bu l zhugs pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya zhing/ rgyun chad bar mi bya zhing skyes bu ngal du gyur la mi bya'o zhes smra'o//

de nas rgyal bo lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi de bang phyug la dbang byed du bcug tshulabcom brlaga'adi nyid kyi lha chen po'i a s+yA'i tshal 'anyid du rgyal bo'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad

do/ rgyal po lha chen po' gzhenanuthu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug pa gang yin pa de yang/ rgyal bo sgyu chen po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhi rnam par rgyal zhes bya ba'ago/

gnas sozhes bya pa'i bar gongam bzhin no// de nas rgyal po la chen po'i sku dungakha spu dag sku mkhan gyims 'atsos pan zhes bya ba zhus/ skyes but+taMshal du gyur bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar kongam bzhin

no// de nas rgyal bo lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo rgyus srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug nas/ rgyal bo'i drang srong gi tshangs bar spyod pa spyad do// de ltar bu dang tsha bo yang tshabargyud pas lha chen po

brgyad khri bzhistongagis rgyal po'i deng srong gitshangs par spyod pa spyod do// de nas rgyal po lha chen pos 'ganyid kyis mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs par mthong nas tshigs su bcad de sa pa/ lha dang mi
yin ng dag tu// dga' phrug don du gnyer ba dang// dbul bu'i 'jigs pas skag pa yis/ byis kyis ni sbyin pa btang// 'jig rten ni spyin byed mchod// spyan byed lha yi nang mchod// bya
yi se'abras ldan shing bzhinin// 'byung po kun gyi skyabs 'os min// rgyal bo chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bo lha chen bo zhes bya ba de las sgyur ba'i rgyal po kang gis dag pa'i lam nges pa

srol btod cing/ dge ba'i lam dris pa srol btod pa de la brtan nas/ lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal bo'i drang srong gis tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa de kazhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis
de ltar mi blta na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo chen po zhes bya bar gyur te/ nyid kyis dag pa'i lam nges pa de srol btod cing/ drage ba'i las ngas pa sol btodapa

de la ba rtenanas/ lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// rgyal po chen po ngas spyin pa'i m sprin legoTasha des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa denakhan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no//
rgyal bo chen po gzhan yang ngas blazhachad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dka btang/ bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de'on cig/
rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul mi thi la'adinyid du/ de rnams kyi thu ma shes rgyal bo khyud ces bya ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa// chos la gnas pa'i rgyal
bo zhig byulta/ debatsunamo dung/ gzhonatshudang/ blon po dang/ khrom gyi ru bdung/ grongami dang/ yul mi rnams dang lhan cig tu chos spyodatsang sbyin pa dag gtong bsod nams
dag byed po/ bstan gnas la nye bar gnas pa/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so/ de'i tshe lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa kosum pa'i lha rnams kyi gung la/
lha rnams mdun sa chos bzangs su rdzogs shing lhags pa rnams la bsngags pa brjod do// grogs po dag lus 'phags kyi ma rnams kyi rid pa no likas pa red/ lus 'phags/
kyi mi de rnams kyi rgyal lozhu khyud ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chog la gnas pa'i rgyal bo chen po yin te/ debatsunamo dung zhes bya banas/ lhan cig tu chos spyod cing tshul
khrims yang dag par blangs to gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// grogs po dag khyed cag rgyal po mu khyudalta bar 'dodo dam/ ko'u shi ka mchog tu 'tshal lo// grogis
bo dka de'i phyir khyod cag sdodacig dang/ kho bos je rgyal po mu khyud brtag par bya'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dpon skyes bumathu dang ldan ba'i lag ba bskums pa las
brkyang ba las 'askums pa tsam kyis/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyin nam snyang bar gyur te/ mi ilar rgyal pon khyad ldan gyi khang bzongs su she nas
'di skad ces smras so/ mu khyud ldan khyed kyi rid panalegs par dbye/ gang gi phyir sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs su rtogs shing 'dus ba rnams khyod kyi bsngags pa
dpar byed de/ grogs po ngago lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyired pa zhes bya banas/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// mu khyung khyod sug rtswa

gsum pa'i lha rnams lta zhing 'gro 'dod dam/ ke'u shi ka badran sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la lta zhingamachi'atshal lo// mu khyud de'i phyir khyod sdodacig/ kho bos cungashes stong ldan gyi shing
rtakhyod la khaskur gyis/ der khyod zhugs lam g.yo bar shog cika/ rgyal po mu khyudakyis de bzhin 'tshal zhes/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyaban las ma nyan to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
bo brgya byin sun cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang dusong nas/ kha lo sgyur bam lo gdul sngas ra/ ma la kadu khyod songal/ cung shes stong ldan gyi shing rta myur du chos la/ rgyal bo mu khyud
kun bader song ste phyin s/ 'diskang cesau khyudalalha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ cangashes stong ldan kyi shing rtabaskur ba 'di yin kyage/ dekhyodazhugs lam galo bshogo
'a@#/// cig ces byos shika ko'u shi ka khyod kyis gsungs pas shin tum nongs so zhes/ la sbyarab la gdus lha rnams kyidabang bo brgya byin lasumanyazhanas/ myur du

ca shes stong ldan gyi shing rta bcus te// rgyal bo mu khyud gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang 'di skad ces snas so// mu khyud khyod la lha rnams kyi debang po brgya byin kyis drang shes stong ldan gyi shing
bskur ba 'di yin gyis/ 'dir khyodazhugs lamaka yo robashog cikaces mchi'o// rgyal po chen po rgyal pou khyudacang shes rta stong ldan gyi shing rta bzhugs pa dang/ de nas kha lo sgyur bam la gas
rgyal po mu khyud la smras pa/ khyod gyis shing rtashang nas drang/ gang na sems can ldan pa'ims can rnams lhago ba yin pa'i las kyinem par smin pa nyams su myong nas bas/ gan sams
can dag pa'i las tshana rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong banas drang/ ma lagadung phyir gan gnas ags na sdig pa'i las can rnams sdika bzhi dgaba'i rnam par smin pa nyams
su myongab yodapa dang/ gangan sems can dag pa'i las can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin panyams sumyob dgu yod par gnyis ka bo ltas dadag kangan bde legs su shing rta byos shaka/
nas kha lo sgyur bas la gdus rgyal po mu khyud kyis nas kyang ngan sems na sngaka pa'i las can rnams sdeka pami dgakha'i las kyi rnam par sminabanyams su myong ba yod pa dang/ gnasems
can dge ba'i las can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ba yod pa gnyis ka mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar/ rgyal po mu khyud ldan gyi shing rta drangs so// rgyal po zhu khyud sumacu rtsa

gsum pa'i lha rnams kyin ngangu phyin nas/ rgyal po mu khyudawA rnams kyi mdun sa chos bcungs su zhugs ba dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po mu khyud la stan phyed bstabs nas/ rgyal

po mu khyud dang lhan ms kyi dbang po brgya byin stan phyadapyadal 'dug go/ rgyal po chen po rgyal po mu khyudadang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan phyad phyad la 'jug pa na/ khyadabar ram/ bsam pa
ma tha dad dugrub cung zad kyang madare gzhan du na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin mig mi 'dzems par thadado denas rgyal po mu khyud kyis bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa mthong
nas/ tshogs su khacad desmras pa/ dge las byas dang de bzhin du// mdzage'i las byas mthong asani// migangabagamed byed bde// skyes bu tha shal snyingaro// de nas lha rnams kyi
dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rgyal po mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras so// mu khyung myong 'anyid du 'dug la dga' ba sbyodacig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pas nadamo byos shig/ dga' bar
spyod cig/ dga' dgur spyod cig dus tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar snod dang shing rtadaka/ bso pa la ga dus mne ltar// de dang 'drab r gnas 'di yang// dbanganagazhanangag
sgyur bas bdag/ 'ji nas azhi thi lar song nas/ dngage bamang bonams bya zhing// bsod nams phun sum tshogs byas nas/ des ma'os 'ong bar bya/ de'atho
! lar 'ongs nas sbyin pa dgabatong/ bsod nams dag byas nas/ tshigs su bcad de smas pa/ gang tshe rgyal rigs bram ze dang// ba rigs dmangs rigs gdol pa dang// ma klo'abol sbyin ba
ni/ sbyin pa mo ba rnams kyis bsngags// mu ge'i tshon sbyin na zhing// skye bo dam pa tshim byas nas// ngan songams pas 'di de'i// mtho ris su yang bkur ba yin// phan yon/
'ani shes nas kyang/ mkhas pa rnams kyis sbyin ng ba dang// sbyin pa yis ni thar pa dang// dbang phyugalha gnas 'byor par 'gyur// rgyal bo chen po de'i de'i dus na/ 'khor los

sgyur ba'i rgyal khomu khyud ces bya ba gang gis sum cu rtso gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis stan khyad dang/ wa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tanalngas bstakhas
nus/ des zhi thi lar 'ongs nas grong khyadagyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs nas sbyin bdagabatang/ bsod nams dag byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta/
ste 'onakyang nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khonges sbyar ba'i rgyal po mu khyudas bya bogazhis sum cuts+tshakasum pa'ilcan ms kyin ng du song nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byonakyis
stan khyad dang/ lha rnams kyi 'ad pa'i yon tan lngas bstabs pa yin par gyur te/ bde dezhasami thi la song nas/ grongakhyekyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnasu brtsigs te sbyin pa dgra//
byin bsod nams dag byas so// rgyal po chen po ngas sbyin pa 'os sbyin pa'i bko bsha'adres/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis del mi blta ste//
'an kyang sbyin ba denebranamadapa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyutsam dang rkyen tsam dang tshogs tsam yin no/ dro 'od du rgyal po kun dga' bo zhes bya ba mthu
dang ldan ba zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar te/ de la bu gcig dang gnyis nas/ lnga'i b.rudag btsas pa las/ de'i bu kha chungs gang yin pa de'i gdongam long 'bas/ de'i ming ma long
gdobazhes bya ba grags so/ dgu thoms cad bsrings bskyod de chen por gyur to// gzhon nu ma long gdong nishin tu des pa dang/ shin tu dul ba yin// de dag gzhan negam
pa gzu lumasacan/ tshu ba pa yin no// dengag thams cad pa'i dgos pa zhig gi phyir 'dusan/ shes rab kyis nyung zad kyang so sor rtogs pamadado// gzhon num longagadongan drib
zab mo zab mo dag la rang gi shes rab kyis dpyod par byed do// rgyal bo kun daka' bo nad kyis thebs nas/ des bsams pa/ gangargyal srid byed du gzhug/ gal te bdag gis bu tho[}]
gang zhabazhi las gang yang rung ba zhig rgya bo byed du banugan/ dems gdum pa/ gzu lums can/ rtsub pa yin pas/ tshul ma yin pas yulami rnams la
gnod pa byed par 'gyuro// gal te gzhon num long gdong rgyas srid byed du bcug na de rnams kyis da rgyal bo 'dis sras thu bo mos bzha gnas / sras tha chungs rgyal srid byed du
'jug pa ri tshoka ces shod pa 'gyur bas thabs shig bshamamo snyam nas/ sa ni po chagasum dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor zhe sa byed pa dang/ shis rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug
bzhakun s/ des blon po rnams la skyes pa/ kye sna bodag nga'adusan byed thag gis gzhon nu rnams ra'i nas brtag par bya ste/ sus nor bu'i lham zung bgos na 'tsham khar 'gyur ba dang/
seng ge 'akhri la 'dug nam g.yo bar 'dug pa dang/ dbu rgyanamakol thokas na mi g.yo bar 'dug pa dang/ btsun mo 'khor zhes byed pa dang/ shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug po/
nang gi gter dang/ phyi'i gter dang/ phyi nang gi gteradang/ shing gi rtse mo'i gteradang/ ri'i rtse mo'i gteradwang chu'agram gyi koterate/ su'adi dag thams cad drang ldan par gyur pa de
nga 'das nas khyed cag gis rmug cige ces smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing// mthon po'aetha'ani ltung bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba yin pas shi'o// blon po de rnams kyis
0 gzhonan bu bo shos la nor bu'i lham zung du bskonan/ ji ltar ya ngade dang mi 'tsham mo// seng ge khri le bzhagran g.yos so// dbu rgyan brtags narab dugayos so// btsun mo'i 'a'o kyis kyang/
zhe samabyas so// shes rab kyis so so brtag par byakha drug sbas na ma shes te/ nubo phyi ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// gzhon nu ma leng gdong la nor bu'i lcemazung dubaskyon shin tu'am bdug
go/ seng ge 'i khri la 'dug na mi g.yo ba 'dug go/ dbu rgyan thogs na spyigatsug rgyas bar 'dug no/ btsumo 'khor gyis kyang zhe sa sa ba dang/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ da dung shes
rab kyis so sor brtag bya ba drug kho nang gi gteradang/ phyi'i gtor dang phyi nang go gter dung/ nga kilcama'i gtorudang rtsomo'i gter dang/ chu 'gram gyi kate shes par
bya dgos so// me long gdong gis bsams pa/ nadragikab zhes bya ba/ nang gi gteranizhin/ them ba'i nang rol na yod pa'i gter pano// phyi'i geter zhes bya ba phyi'i gter//
phyi'o kote zhes bya ba ni them pa'i phyi rol na yod pa'i gter yin no// zhing gi gtar zhes byub ci yin zhen/ thamaba'i 'ogan yod bgater inano// shing gi rtsa mo'i kater zhes bya ba/ shing gi
tsamo'i ked gzhan/ rgyal po dobazhugs pa'i shing de'i grib mas lhama'i gang la gang du khyab ba denayod pa'i gter yin no// ri'i rtse mo'i gter zhes bya ni/ rgyal bo de la pa'i rje don khrus kyi rdo
leb de'i 'og na yod pa'i gter yin no// chu 'gram gyi gterazhes bya ba ni/ khyim kyi chu nang du 'bab pa de'i skor khung gi mtha' na yod pa'i gter yin no// blon po de rnams/
kyis thams cad so sor ba rtagasan de dag byung nas/ de rnams kyis de rgyal por dbang bskur te/ rgyal po me leng gdong zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan par gyur to// ro gzhan zhig nubram za dbyuka kuwan/
! zhes bya bzhika gnas pa des/ khyim bdagacig las glang dkacika bar s te zhing rmosanas glang de dag ded de khyim du song ba dang/ jim na khyim bdag de drol bab nas/ bras zad byug gnam gyis
glang phug btang ba las/ sgo gzhan zhig nas byung sta songang// khyim bdag de zan bras nus la ngas na/ gangan yang grang mi snan gnas / nges dbyaka ku can bzung nas glang la re/ des smras pa/
khyim du ma bcug gam/ khyod kyis kho bo'i gling phroshes kyis/ kho bo la glang slar byin cika/ des snas pa/ kho bos ma phrogs so// nges smras pa/ rgyal pom long gdong ma 'di ni shes rab dang ldan/
pa yin gyis ru'i drung du dang dang/ des don 'di la las de bdag cag la rigs mi rigs ston par 'gyur// zhes de gnyis rgyas pa dang/ mi zhig gis rta rgod ma zhig bros nas/ des dbyug gu can/
la smras pa/ rta rgod ma ron khoka cika/ des snas pa/ jiltar dgag/ ci nus pas so// des rdob zhig klongs te mgor bstan pas de'i bar gyur te/ mi des smras pa// kho bo'i rta rgongo ma khyod/
kyis bsad kyis/ kho bo la rta nodaa kacig byin cig/ ci'i phyir rta rgodam spyin/ des smras pa/ tshur shog rgyal lo ma lengagang gi kun du dong dang des bdag cag gi zhal che sbyor bur 'gyur 'o//
zhes de dag der dong ba dang/ dbyug gu na de 'bros par brtsams te/ des rtseg ba zhig gi gnas bdag nyidamachongs pa dang/ de'ishongan tha ga pa zhig thags 'thag cing 'dug pa de'i stangadu lhung
bas tha ga pa sha nas dbyug gu can tha ka pa'i chung mas bzung nas/ kho mo'i khyige thab khyod kyis bsad kyis/ kho mo'i khyim thab byin cike kho bos khyod kyi khyim thab ga las kyi// sa
gas ba/ tshur rgyal po ma leng gdong ko drangadu 'dong dang/ des bdakacag gi zhal chakacod pa'i gyur ro zhes de rnams chos pa dang/ lam gyi bar de nas chu bo gange brab mo zhig yod pa de shing
mkhan nika khan sta'u thogs dparatshur rgyal kha de la/ dbyug gu can des smras pa/ chumachung jitsam/ snya'ubatang ste smras po/ chu gting zab bo/ ste'u de ra lhung nas/ des dbyug gu
na de bzung ste/ khyod kyis pa'i spe'u chur bskur ro// ngas ma bskur ro/ tshur rgyal po ma long gdong gi drung dudong dang/ des bdag cag gi zhal chasbyong bar 'gyur ro// de rnams dul bas rebyug
gcan khrid de/ cha'atsho zhig gi khyim du zhukos ba dang/ chang 'aa la khye'u zhig btsas pa de'i be'u de gos kyis bkab stobasAl ba del dbyug gu can 'dug go/ des khya'u yong cu'u yong ces skyes
nas/ jitsam na bltasan shi bar gyur nas/ des dbug gu can de bzunas/ khyod kyis kho mo'i bu bsad kyis/ kho mo'i bu byin cika/ des smras pa// kho bos nim zas

[gt; ]na/ ci'i phyir khobos khyod kyi bu sbyin/ des smras pa/ tshur rgyal pom longagadeng gi drung du 'dong ngo zhes de rnams nus pa dang/ jitsaman phyogs gzhan zhig na shing skams la zwa zhig 'dug pa des/
dbuka ku can mthong nas smras pa/ kang 'gro 'o bo nomo'agro na/ 'di dag kyis kho bo khrid do// kang ma long gdong gi drung du'o// 'o lo bo'i 'phrin yang khyer la/ rgyal po ma lebakadong la
phyogis kage mo zhig na shing lem bskams pa zhig mchis pa de la kA lika mchis te/ de'ims nas shing lem sngo zhing snum pa kanyan dgamanyis bzhin du/ dela'angagu dga' bar mi 'gyur gyi/
'di'i bdag ma san bde ba las gces gyis shige de rnams sa pa las/ ridags zhig kyis dbyug gu can mthong nas ris smras pa/ dbyug gu can grang du 'gro/ kho bo ni gang duyang mi 'gro
na/ 'di dag gis kho bo'adi ngo// gang du/ che long gdong gi drung du'o// khro bo'i 'phrin yang khyer la/ gnas gzhan dag gisang ma dang rtswa sngon po dgoms bzhin du/ bdag de dag ma dad pa
la glu zhigems zhes gyis shig dengag chas pa dang/ jitsamanasrog pa zhig gis mthong nas snas pa/ gang du'adongazhes bya ba nas/ 'o na kho bo'abren yang/ khyeracig ces bya ba'ibaragong ma bzhin
0 duste/ bdagu phyogs gcig nasrog ba'i skad 'byin la/ phyogs gzhan ngan skadagazhan 'byin pa 'di la rgyu zhig mtshes zhes gyis shig// ('dul ba gzhi/
bam po bzhi bzhi ba/ phyogs gzhan zhikon sprul zhig sa mthong nas zhes bya bas// 'on khro bo'i 'phrin yang bya cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ badrag phu gzhus bde bar 'byung la/
slab srol gyis 'jug par 'gyurub 'dri largyu'i zhokemachis zhes gyis shig/ sbrul zhig dang na le gnyis phan tshun mimathun zhing 'thab par byed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'on bdag cag gi 'phrin yang
khyedacig ces bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du ste/ bdag gzhin pa gcig gis gcig mthong nas 'thabamo'agyed kyi/ dga' bar ma 'gyur ba 'di la rgyu ci zhigamae zhes gyis shika/ bag sar

gzhon ma zhige gis shes bya nas/ des smras pa/ 'badag gi 'phrin yang khyer nyiganyisabya ba'i bar gongam 'anyan du sgyu/ gang gitshobadag pha'i khyim na mchis bo dro'i tshonA/ gyos pa' khyim 'tshal la/
gang gi tshogos logicig a pa retshon/ pa'i khyos 'tshol ba 'di la rgyu ci zhiko maso zhes gyis shiko/ de rnams mas nas rgyal pom legadong ga la ba der deng ste phyin nas dbyug gcan gyis
rgyal po la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ gzhan dag gis kyang rkang pa sa lamago bos phyag byas te 'khod pa dang/ rgyal bos dbyug gu can la dris pa/ khyodatsal
'os lhakhangagazhi khridengo/ (nyage ki re/ dbyag gukun gyis khyim bdag daci zhig las rtsod pa de thams can smras so// rgyal pos khyim bdag la dris ba/ khyod kyis
glang mthong ngam/ mthong tsakam so// dbyug gcan khyod kyis glang phugs su bslad ma/ lha bskang lags so// rgyal pos skyas ba/ gang gi phyir go bar na byas bsadabyug gu can 'di'i stod
cig/ gang gi phyir 'di yang thangam brlags pas mig phyung shi'o/ khyim bdaka gang sa snyas pa/ rnam kacig tu bdag gi rkyang skor/ rnam gnyis su bdag gi mig phyung bas/ dbyug gu can rgyalam bsngo'o//
mangs smras pa// lha dbyug gu can des khag gi rtagongom zhig bkumamo// ji ltar bas/ des rgyas par smras pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi phyir dziltar nus pa de bzhin du khog cig ces
smras pas/ mi 'di'o lce di cika/ gang gi phyi'i rdo bas bsnun pa gzhan gyis dgag tshazhes pas nag bas/ dbyug ke kun 'adi yang lag pa chod cika/ mi des snas ba/ ma gcig tshubadag gi rterkangam

bkus/ rnamaganyis su bdag gi lce bcad pa bas/ dgyuka ku can rgyal ma bsngo'o// tha ga pa'i chung mas rgyas par smras pa dang rgyal bos smras pa/ 'didi khyod kyi khyim thab du khyer cig/ nges smras pa/
rnam gcig tshuna'adis bdag gi sdum thab bkum/ rnams su ni'odisdum thab tu'agyur ba bas/ dbyug gu can rgyalami bsngo'o/ shing mkhan gyis rgyas par smras pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/
gang gi phyi'i rta'u tshu'i dbus su kho nas tshig smras pas/ shing mkhan 'di lce chod cig/ da byag gu can 'diyang chu'i goting thub par mthong bzhin du/ shing mkhan 'dri bos mig dbyung ngo//
shing mkhan gyis sbas pa/ rnam gcig tu badrag gi sta'u skor/ rnamaganyis su bdag gi lce bcad pa bas/ dbyag ku can rgyalami bsngo'o/ chang 'tshong mas rgyas pas smras pa dang/ rgyal bos
smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'as bu thams cad du gos kyis g.yogs nas bsnyal bas/ chang ba tshong ma 'dilag pa tshocig/ dbyug can gangamakhartags par ganon gyi stan la 'dug pas/ 'di'i
mig phyung zhigo/ des smras pa/ rnam gtsig tubadag gi bu bkum/ rnam gnyis su bdag gi sug pa bkum ba bas/ dbyug gu can rgyal mi bsrolo/ dbyag gu can gyis khA'i than smras pa dang/
rgyal bos smras ba/ ngab+hug ku can 'di la khyod kyi phyogs de ri'i cig yodapa'ikrong gi bdag poragyur ban/ shing skam kho de'i drung nugader yod kyis/ du'aga' zhig 'byin dosogazhig dang bde
bar 'gyur rozhes sgo zhig/ ridzags kyi than h+phas pa dang/ khyod kyisor dgas lar dogs khyod na nga yodapa po'i ba nas sbrang rtsi'i bgres pa 'dzag sbyo/ de zag pas rtswa dang kasingam dang/
dngar boragyur la/ khyodaza za basbrang ma de so zin gyis/ rol chags par ma khyedacika/ tshulam yanepas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes sbos shig/ sreg pa'i than smras pa dang/
rgyal bos smras pa/ kangadu sug pa desran pa'i skad 'byin pa'i phyogs denakadamed kyis/ gang du skad gzhan 'byin ba den gdar yod pas/ khyod kyis kag ka'
zhika la ston la tshul ma yin par sngaka'astel bar gyur nas rung gis/ gzhan du song zhig ces sgo zhig/ des sgrol dang ne'u le'i thanasnus ba dang/ rgyal bos smras l/ de gnyis la khyod
cag mir gyur pa naspun banyis shika tu skyes kyi/ de nakacika gis smras pa/ norab kri/ cig shos sangasnas zil gyis na bsam bgos so// dal gcig nelhane bar chags par byas pas
sbrul du skyes so/ cig shos kyang nor la then te lhag par chags par byas bas ne'u ler skyes so// de bas na khyed cag gis noradaka dge sbyong ngamakhram ze dkA la na la gnas de'o cigadang/ bar
ba'agyuralozhes sgo zhig/ sprul kyi thon skyes pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis sbrul de la khyod ltegs nyams chungab gyur pas ni bug nas bde bar phyir 'phyang l/ kha zas phalamo tshe zos
nas nii sdug bsngal bas phug tu 'jug bzhin gyis/ khyod kyis kha zas la jig du spyad pa drod zin par byas na/ khyod bde bar gnas par 'gyur rozhes sgo zhig/ bag song gzhon nu ma'i than smras pa/
dang rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis las sa gzhon num ngal khyod kyi phama'i khyim n 'grogs bshes shig gnas te/ gang gi khyod gos pa'i khyim n 'dug pa'i tshon 'grogs bshis de'adod do//
gang gi tsho pha ma'i khyim na gnas pa de'i tshon khyim thab 'dod de/ khyod tshulam yin pas smra kasngal bar gyur na mi rung gis/ gnas gcig thong la gcig legs par gzung bar byos shig ces sgo zhig/
bgasar gzhon nu ma dudang sbrul kyis ji skad bstan ba bzhin byas so// sbrul dang ne'u dag dang zhwas na nor dbyug ku nalabyin no// lhag ma rnams kyis kyang dzi/dbastan pa de bzhin
martan to// bon bo rnams Mkyis smas pa kyama'o lha la 'di lta bu'i sbos pa mal lta/ rgyal po dga' tshang dramagu bas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi rnams su sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs nas/
sbyin pa'i zhal tapa'i la ga bzhag ste dpa'i u ge lo bcu gnyis subyung// rjesauge le bcu gas su byung ban/ srog chags brgya stong phrag dum dag sgro kha zas sbyar ro// des
bdagadekyiechod sbyin phun sumatshogs pajamathonus tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ blo ldan chos dang mthun pa yis// nor rudabasags par ma bya ste// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yi/
yona gnas lan yon dudabul// dgasbyong bram ze des pa dang// 'phongs pa legs par tshil byas na/ shes rab can de lus zhig nas// lha chen ng du skyo bar 'gyur/ mkhasalus de
lta shes byas nas// dad ldan chags pa med sems kyis// yona gnas rnams la byin pani// dpa' bo sorasnamed pas bsngags// rgyal bo chen po de'i tshe de 'i dus na rgyal bomo long gdong zhes bya/
dbamathu dang ldan pa// gang gis mu ga le bcu gnyis su byung ba na srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma'i kha zas sbyar ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/

'on kyang nga nyid de'i tsho de'i dus na rgyal po me long gdong zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan pa der rgyurati/ sumu ge la bsu gnyis su byung ba na srog chags bar stong phrag dum dag gi kha zas sbyar ro// rgyal bo po

sa spun pa 'am sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa nganiblan med pa yang dag pa rdzogs
paNaM pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang rkyen mi dang/ tshogs tsam yin no/ rgyal bo chen po gzhan yang ngas ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang nub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag
byin/ bsod nams thug byas pa gang yin ba de nyon cig/ rgyal pa chen po sngon byung ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo nor bzas zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ des grong khyab khri bzhi stong ad
sbyin gyi kun s brtsigs te/ lo mang po drang la brgya phrag mang po dang/ lo stong phrag mang po dang/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dka gyi/ bsod nams dka byas te/ des bdag nyid kyi
ts+tso mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad desmras pa/ lha dang ma yonang dag tu/ bdag gi 'byor pa mthong nas nio/ kang gis phun sum thol pa yi// sbyin pa su zhig sbyin mi byed/
ca 0 gang gis skyes bu brgya phrag gribs mnan zhing// ser sna dgra bor gyur pa zil mnan nas// 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs par sbyin gtong sogs// bdag ni dang ba'i dpa' rab yin par sems// gabashig
lag na mtshon thogs g.yul de'ajug/ dening 'a bominezhes thub rnams gsung// gang drag 'jigs pa med par sbyin gtong ba// dudag dpa' bo yin zhes kun mkhyen gsung/ rgyal po chen

bo po'i de'i nges na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bzasazhes bya ba gong gis grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong ngamachod sbyin gyi kas brtsi gas te/ lo mang po dang/ lab phrag mang po dang/ la stong phrag

mang po dang/ lo brgya stong phragamang bor sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dgabyas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyuba'i

rgyal ponor bzangs zhes khyab dor gyur te/ nganyid kyis de na grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dumachod sbyin gyi kanas brtsigs te/ lo mang bo dang/ brgyaphrag mang po dang lo stong phragamang bo dang/
lo brgya stong phragamang por sbyin pa drag phyin/ bsonganams dgu byas so// rgyal bo chen po ngas sbyin pa lam sbyin pa'i bko bsha' dus/ blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam
na khyod kyis de ltamakholta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ rtogs tsam yin no/
dachen po gzhan yang ngas bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya ba don du gnyer sa'i phyir sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te/ brtson 'grus kyi rol duphyin pa/
yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang/ blo med pa yang dag par rdzokas pa'i byang chub ma thob ba gang yin pa de nacika/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul lnga len par rgyal po gnyis byung ste/ byang
phyogs kyi lngalen pa dang/ lho phyogs kyi ljon pa'o// de la byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa no can zhes khyab grong khyer glang po che'i khyim zhes bya ban 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bdab dang//
lo legs pa// skye bo dang mi mang pos gang/ 'khrab pa dang/ khrag khrug dang/ 'greng pa dang/ chos namadu pa/ nad rab du nub gyur pa/ 'bras sa lu dang/ bu dram shing dang//
ba lang dang/ ma haphun sum tshogs pa na/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa dang/ chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug ka/ grong khyer de na yang mtsho chen po utu la dang/ pad+ma dang//
kumu da dang/ pad+madakar pos gang ba dang pa dang/ dur pa dang/ bya ka lan da pas mdzes par byas pa yid du 'ong ba yong ngo/ mtshodon klu'i bu skya ba sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba gnas te/ das
dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas/ sa kazhi lhag par lo tog phun sum tshogs par gyur to// ul yang bza' ba dang btung ba shin tuyod la/ 'jig rten yang sbyin pa dang/ mad/
pa dang/ bstanabakur dang ldan pas/ dag sgrung dang/ bram ze dang/ bkren pa dang/ 'thongs pa rnams la kha zas sbyin par byed do/ lho phyogs kyi lta len pa'i rgyal po nas ma yin
pa la lhag par kranas pa gtum pa/ gzu a con spro thung bzhin pas/ chos ma yin pas rgyal sring byed cung chad pa dang/ brdag pa dang 'tshog pa dang/ gsod pa dang/ 'dzin
pa dang/ 'chingab dang/ su ma 'dod dang/ khong sgrol dang/ gnod pa sna tshokas kyis u[@]na gnas pa'i skya bo rnams pa rtag tu skuka par byed do// de chos ma yin pa la lhag par nas
pas der lha yang dus dus charakyi rgyun legasab mi 'bebs so// des na skye bo'i tshogs rje 'jigs da dung yo chod pas// rang gi srog la yang mi blta bar yul longs su spangs te/
byang phyogs kyi yul lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i yul dung nas gnas so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po ri dgas 'chor ba'i tshul dubyas nas/ ul rnams brtag pa'i

phyire byung ba dang/ grong rdal dang grong khyer gang yin pa dag ni stongs par rgyuphying/ skyed mos tshal dang lha khang rnams ni shog ral du gyur par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/

shes ldan dag pa'i rtse grong la dang grong khyer 'di stongs par gyur zhing/ skyang mos tshal dang la khang rnams ni zhig ral du gyur/ skye bo'i tshogs de dag ni gang du dong/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa//
(lha byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal bo nongonan gyi lul mchis so// ci'i phyir/ lhame 'jigs pa stsal du gsol/ shes ldan sprin gyis smyos shig de nas nga rnams kyis
smras ba/ lhabyang phyogs kyi la len pa'i rgyal bo chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid bgyid pas de'i yul 'byor ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs ba/ skya bodang mamang bos gang zhing/ 'thab
pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ khrag khrug dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ chom rkun m mchis la/ nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras sa lu dang bu ram shing dang/ ba glang dang/ ma de phun sum tshogs
ba/ 'jig rten la yang sbyin pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ bas bkur dang ldan pas dka sbyang dang/ bram ze dang bkren pa dang/ 'phongs pa rnams la kha zas stsol bar bkyadengo// lhan gtum
ba gzu lums can/ spro thunabs chad pa dang/ brjaka pa dang/ 'tshoka pa dang/ gsod ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang 'ching ba dang/ su ma 'dod dang/ khong spel ba dang/ gnod ba sna tshogs

kyis yul mi rnams la rtag tu skrag par mdzad pas/ des na skya bo'i tshogs de'ajigs shing yachadanas/ byang phyogs pa'i lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i yul du mchis lags so// lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal
pos sgas pa/ shes ldan ngag rkangags na skyo ba'i tshogs de slar 'ongasanas/ grong rdal dang grong khyer 'di dag du gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang bo yod/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/
lha gal te byang phyogs kyi le len ba'i rgyal po bzhin du chos bzhin gyis rgyal bo mdzad de/ byams pa'i sams dang/ phan pa'i sams dang/ thugs brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskangs na/ ring po
thogs par skye bo'i tshogs de su mchis nas/ grong rdal dang grong khye' nams su gnas par 'gyur lags so// lho phyogs kyi lngalen pa'i rgyal pos smras pa// shes ldan dag gal te de lta na/
ngas kyang byang phyogs kyi lta len ba'i rgyal po bzhin du chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byas te/ byams pa'i sems rung/ phan ba'i sems dang/ snying brtsiba'i sems kyis yul bskyang bar byas//

khyed kyis ci nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs slar 'ongs nas/ grong rdal dang grong khyer 'di rnams su gnas par 'gyur ba ltar gyis shig/ lha yon tan gzhan yang 'di lta bu mchis te/ grong khyerange nematsho
chen po ut+pal dang/ bad+madang ku mu da dang/ pad+madakar pos gang ba/ ngang pa dang/ ngurapa dang/ byaka na de kas mdzes par bkyis pan klu'i bu skya ba sna tshogs pa zhes bgyi bzhig
gnas te/ des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phub pas/ le tog lhag par phun sum tshogs par gyur to// des n sa gnelhag par lo rtog dang ldan pas/ yul yang bza' ba dang btung ba
-]shin dumod lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gangakasan klu'i bud 'dir khugs par 'gyur ba'i thabs la ci yod lha rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang dag gis de lugs par
'gyuragyis/ de dag btsal du gsol/ nas rgyal bos gsar gyi thum bo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bcings nas/ yul thams cad dudril bsgrags te/ gangagis
blo byang phyogs lnga len pa'i yul nas ku'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa khugs// de la gsar gyi them po 'di spuneno// bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur sti bya'o// dzitsam na sbrul las sdegs pa zhig blon po
ba rnams kyi drung dusong nas smras khaM/ badrag la gsar gyi thum bo 'di stsalan bangag gis glu'i bu skya ba sna tshogs ba phrogs te khrid demachi'o// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di khyabacige
ngas sgras ba/ khyed cag gang la yid ches shing yodabartan pa de'i lag dubazhika la gru'i bsku ba snatshogs pa khrid dems nas 'tshal lo// de bzhin gyis shig/ nas sbrul khas sdigs pa des mi
yid brtan du rung ba ltag ngugs kyi thum po gtadanas/ glangabo mgyi grong khyeradu song ngo// de nas des mtsho de'i khoralor yun brtags nas/ mtshan malamakhres ba nug pas klu'i bu/
skya ba sna tshogs pa de ni phyogs 'di khon nyiden 'dug go snyam mas/ nas dre gdong ma dang khyad kyi phyir slar sonas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ bdug la gtor ma dang yo byad rnams
rtsol cig dang/ zhag bdun gyen par klu'i bu dephrogs te khrid demachi'o// sbyakhas sdagos pa de yang des mthong nas don bdag 'phrog tu 'ongs te/ zhag bdun gyinyan par bdag

ca @#/ phrogs nas pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal chen po bdag gis myong ba'agyur na jilta bya/ su la skyabs btsal snyam pa dang/ yang mtsho rinas hacang yang mi ring bzhig na/ tshogs pasran/
can dang spang leb can ganyis gnas de/ degasematsho de'i drung na gnas bcas nas gang dag skam la yong pa'i srog chagasa' bong dang ldang sgo ska nga bag la sogs pa mtsho dal 'thung du 'gro
ba dang/ gangayang dun yod patudung/ rus sbal dang/ sbal ba la sogs pa bsad cing 'tshe bar byed pa las dan yang sranatsan shi'o// spang leb can nigason// klu'i bu skye ba
sna tshogs bas bsams pa/ rngon pa spang leb can a kartogs pa skyabs kazhanamad drosnyam nas/ de nas mi'i byad du byas te rngon pa sngangang leb can gyi drung du song nas smras pa/ can ng ja rgyal
bonotsane yul 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang/ bdeb dang/ lilegs pa/ skyo bo dngamumang pos gang ba zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras sa lu dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ba rlung dang mnye
na sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du/ sumathu las gyur pa ngeka khyod kyis shes sam/ des snas pa/ shes te rgyal bo de chos dang ldan pas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid
byadad/ byams pa'i sems dang/ phan pa'i sems dang/ brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskyangs pas so// des smras pa// ji ste 'ba' zhig gam/ gzhan gyis kyang yin na
u[ ]pas sgrub pa/ gzhan gyi yon tanazhig kyang yod/ mtsho 'din klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs can zhes bya ba gnas te/ nges dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab nas/
lhag par lo don phun sus tshogs par gyur to// degan sakazhi lhag par le tog dang ldan pas/ tshul khang bza' ba dngabatungab mod par gyur to// skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa//
gal te 'ga' zhig gis klu'i bu de yul 'di nas srogasan klu'i bu de ring 'khrug rung ba mi 'gyur/ debam dngubral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal bo dang
yul ma sa brogs na/ de la khyod kyis ji bya srog dang bral bar bya'o// khyodakyis klu'i bu de gang yin pa shes sam/ mi shes so// yodung yin na/ lho phyogs lnga len pa'i
sprul khas sdegs pa nga 'phrog par byed de/ de gtong madang yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas zhag 'dug 'on par 'o bar 'gyur te/'ongasanabamatsho ngogs su seng ldeng gi phur bgrwa bzhir
btsugs patshon skud sna tshogs kyis bris te gsungasngags rjod par byed kyis/ de nas gtsang mngam ring ba zhig tu khyod mi mngon par 'dug lu/ gang gi tshe des chog dalta bu byas par gyur ba pa'i
tshe mtsho'izheng ko chu khol zhingalud par 'byung te nga yang 'gyur gis de'i khyod kyis sprul khas sdigs di'i gnad dums bstan la/ de ma thag tu drung du song ste kasangasngargas slar sdus shig/

ma bsdus na khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de sa la bor rar zhes smos shig/ gal tedas gsang sngags rnams ma bsdus pa ra srog dang bral te shin zhi/ kho bo ji srid 'tsho'i bar dugasang sngags kyi zhags pas
bcings par 'gyur ro// rngonapas smras pa/ gal te khyod gcig pu la na thogasan yang de bzhin du 'o bo khro nas phyes na yulamatha' dag la phan pa lta smos kyang ci gos te/ kho bos skyabs byas song
zhig/ de nas klu'i bu des de la dben pa'i phyogs shig bstananas/ tsaman rngon bde zhag bdunagyi nyin par phyogs dben pa'i badrag 'degs ste 'dug pa dang/ sbrul khas sdigs de yang 'ongs nas/
gtor ma dang yo byad kyi chog bya bar rtsom ste sa phyogs bzhir sang ldang gi phur bu bzhi btsugs/ tshon skud sna tshogs kyis khris rtagasang sngags brjod do// de nas chu dekhol du ba dang/ rtson
pas gnad dums bsnunanas/ ral gri shubs nas phyung ste smras pa// khyod kyis nged kyi yulan gnas pa'i klu'i bu gsang sngags kyis dbrog gam/ gsang sngags slar sdus shig/ ma bsdus
nakhyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de sa la bo rer// de nas sbrul khas sdegs pas sdug bsngal nyams su myong bas nyam thag cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas skrag nas gsang sngags brtul ba dwang/ sngon bas
ngam thag pa de bsad do// de nas klu'i bu gsang sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa las thar te/ mtshonas byung nas rngon pa la 'khyud de 'di skadawas sbas so// khyod ni kho bo'i e min/ khyongani
bya/ kho bo'i pha yin/ 'di ltar khyodal brten pas kho bo pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsnga ma skyes so// tshud shog gnas su 'dong ngo zhes des nge gnas su khrid de
song nas/ ba'akhadang btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas te/ na po che dgu bstabs nas lo dang lo smras pa/ yab yum 'dzin bdag gi snangedu sdug pa/ skyabs dang gnyen dugal
pa lags te/ 'di'i mthus bdag khyed dang lhan cig pa las bral 'jam gyur to// dedag gis kyang de la dam pa sbyin par byed/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs byin nas/ sa da rnams khyer

mtshode nas byung ngo// mchod dang dbyang mi ring ba zhig bste gnas la rtog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pazhig yod de/ dan drang srong byams pa dang snying rje bdag nyid
can/ sems can rnams la sdug par 'dzin pa zhig gnas so// de nas rngon pa de drang srong de'i drung du dus gsum du 'gro'ar rtsom zhing/ de la klu'i bu skyakha sna tshogs pa dang lhag dziltar gyurapa
de dag thams cad rgyas par smras so// denus drang srong des smras pa/ khyed la rin po chadangagasar nyi dashos/ pa'i gnas niAdon yod ba zhes bya 'di zhugs pa yong kyis de slongs shig/ de nas
rten pa de don yong pa'i zhags pa la chags pa skyes nas drang srong gi tshigaganyan/ mar klu'i gnas su song ba dang/ de'adzi na gla'i khang pa'i sgo na don yod pa'i zhags pa de mthong nas ded/
snyam du sems de/ bdag 'dod pa'i zhags pa gang yin pa de ni 'du kho na yin no snyam nas klu'i gnas su zhugs so// nas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa dang/ klu gzhan rnams kyis yang dag par
dga' ba dang mgu ba dug byas nas rin po chadagu bstabs pa dang/ des smras pa/ kho bo la rin po che mi dgos kyi/ 'on kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di kho bo la byin cig/ skyo ba sna tshogs
pas smras pa/ khyod 'di'i dgos pa kho bor ga la ni gos rab sta/ gang gi tshe nam mkha' ldingegs gnod pa byas pa de 'jige kho bo cag srung ba'agyuralo/ rngonapas smras pa/
khyed cag lanInam mkha' lding gi gnod pa 'an 'ga'azhig 'byung ban 'di dags kyis/kho bo ba'i dus na dgos kyis/gal te legs khag bdang btagApa bran lamkhyen cig/ klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa 'di
snyam du sems te/ 'dis bdag la na cher btags kyis/ pham la brtags te sbyin no snyam nas/ des phamal brtags dezhanas pa de byin no// nas rngon pa debadag thob pa bzhin du
bde ba dang yid 'dre bas tshimanas/ don yod pa'izhugs ba khyer teklu'i gnas nas byung nas rang gi khyim du song ngo// jitsam dus gzhan zhikon rgyal po nor can btsunamo dang lhan cige rna bar
byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed ngo// dertse bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed balas bu mo yang madabu yang mad nas/ lag pa 'gram pa lagatod de bdag gi khyim
nor bas 'disnyad bko bsags kyang/ bdag la bu pho yang yod bu tsho yang nad bas/ bdag 'dasazhi bdag gi brgyud 'tshacing yula'achor ba dang/ bdog pa
ril yang rgyal po gzhan kyis dbang bya ba'agyur ro snyan nas/ goms khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang de 'dag sbyong dang/ bram zad ng/ grozhas po dang/ mdza' bshes dang/ da du
rnams kyis smras pa/ lcami'i slad du thugs ma dgyes/ dus skabs de de rnams la rgyas par smras ba dang/ rnams kyis sbas kha/ lha rnams la gsol ba medzod cig dung khyodal/
sras mchas bar 'gyur ro// dbuyodad bu mngon par 'dod bas zhi ba dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan dang/ nor lha la sogs pa la gsol ba'adebs shing lha'i bye brag gzhan yang/
'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha drag dang D+ha nags tshal gyi lha dag dang ba medo'i lha dag dang/ sum mdo'i lha dag dang gtorom len pa'i lha dag dang/ lhan cig skyes pa dang
chos dang mthun pa dag dang/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba'adebs// 'jig rtan n gung gsol ba 'debs pa'i las bu dang bumo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu
yod de/ na de lta bu ma yin te/ gal tedaltar 'khyuradu zinar gal yang 'di lta ste/ dban 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo bzhin du bu stong yod 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gnas
gsum bo dga mngon pa gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skyabar 'gyur ro// kasum po de dag gang zhen/ padam dkachakas bar gyur cinga'adus bu dang/ ma sa la 'bacing bram n rung
ldan pa dang/ dri thadabar gnas shing 'jug 'dod bsku/ gnas gsum po dag mngon dugyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro// de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhuralen
cinga'adug pan/ bskal ba bzang ba'ibyang chub sems dpa' zhig btsunamo dam pa dmangal du zhugs so// bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig lam 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/
lnga gang zhen skyes pa chags par gyurapa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang/ dusashes shing blamtshan shes pa dang/ mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang/ gangalas mngal
duzhugs pa nges bde ye shes pa dang/ khye'ushes shing bu mo shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u inan dazhu g.yas par rten cing 'dug la/ gal te bumo yin nadaku g.yonapar rten cing 'dug
gro dad yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas khyo la sbas pa/ rje'i sras bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pani 'di ltar bdag gi dku g.yas par rten cing mchis pa lasan/ nges par
khya'ar 'gyurakyis dgyes pa bskyodadu gsol/ de yang yide dgarazhing yid dga' nas ro stod bsrang ste lag pa g.yas ba brkyanas 'di skad ces kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod
pabu'i sathong ba dang kho'i dmathun bar rgya shing mimathun pa yiskyo ba dang/ kho bo'abye ba dag byed pa dang de gsos pas phyi gso ba dang/ bag skal la spyod pa dang/ kho bo rigs
brgyud la yun ring du gnas par Thasgrub pa dang/ bdag cag gi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung du 'chamang po yang rung ba'i sbyin ba drug bya/ bsod nams dag byas nas/ 'dingaganyis krung
du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces mingag yon sngo bar byed par gyur tsaka rus chod dubadab rjod parabyed do// del sems can zhugs par rig nas/ 'di lta ste/
mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyi stengagi 'ang bzangs kyi gzhir grang ban krangabale yo byad dag dang/ drob na drab 'i yo byad dag dang/ sman pas bstan pa'i zas tatsang kha
bo dang/ tacang mi skyur ba dang/ hadang lan tshayi tshib dang/ hatsangami mar ba dang/ ha cangami tshob dang gsungam bska ba dang kha ba dang/ skyur ba dang/ lan dang/
mnab dang/ tsha' dang/ bska ba sbas pa'i zas dka dang/ shal dang/ samo dodang/ rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus lha'i bao dga' 'a'atsholana rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang/ khri
ts+tso nas khri dang/ khri'u nas khri'udang/ shod kyi sa gzhirama'abab pa dang des sgra yid du 'ong ba nyung zad kyang mi thos bar nyam bag tu bzhag go/ de zub brgyud dam ngagu'as pa dang/
khyi'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzesal/gsalal/ gsarakhyim dog 'drab/ mgo bogadugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba//
sminama'adzarab/ sna'i gzengasamathob/ analan danyingalag mas cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// btsasan kunu dga'abar 'gyur ba'i brdungs pa rgyal bos thos nas smos
pa[0f10 ]dazhika chen ]btsunamo mas kyis rgyal po la smras pa// lha dgyes pa bskyad du gsol/ khyod kyi sras gozhig bltamamo// las rgyal bos grong khyede thams cad
rdzob dang/ gsagu ma dang/ rgya mo bsal dbyid byus nas na dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ rgyal mtshan de ba danabasgrung/ shin du zhim po'i bon por dgabashams//
ma rtog semam sna tshogs kyis sha' dga' ltar ba kram ste bsgo ba/ dug sbyong dang/ bram ze dung/ bkren pa dang/ 'phos pa rnams la sbyin pa byi// btson thams cad
khyazhig/ de'i phyi ma bdun gsum nyishu rtsa gcig tubs ra'i btsas ston rgyu tshorabyas zhus/ khye'i mngor gadrags zhus ming 'dogs par byed pan/ blon po rnams kyis ltas ba/
khyi 'di rgyal bono can gyi sras lags pas/ khyilulo ngonora'athas su gdags so zhes/ mi min 'brangasazhes bya bar btags so// khye'u nor bzangs mam bda'o// panga'ano
pa'ia ma gnyis dang/ nu ma bsnun pa'im ma gnyis dang/ brim 'phyi ba'im ma gnyis dang/ rtsen grogs kyi ma gnyis la rjes su gtad de/ dem ma brgyad po dag gis/
'om dang/ zhadang/ mar rung/ zhun mar dang/ marakyi snying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso dag gi sring bar byed/ spyod pa byed cing/ ngan gnas pa'i pabazhin nga myur
duskyadapar byed ngo// gang gi tshachan poragyur pa de'i tsho yi ge slob dang bcug ste zhes bya ba nas/ brtag pa brgyad dang/ dbyi ba dang/ klag pa la mkhas pa dang/ spyod pa lags l bar gyur/
zhes bya ba'i bar gom bzhin no// de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ljongs kyi dbang phyug dang mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'de mngon par rgyal
bar byas te gnas pa rnams kyi bezo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas zhes bya ba nas/ gnas lnga la byang bor gongam bzhin du/ ring sa rlungam gsum po cham dang/ 'bringam dang/ chung ma drag
bzhag cing gnas palib pa rnam pa gsum po/ dgun gyi dang dpyid kyi dang/ dbyar gyi rnams brtsigs nas/ skyed mos tshal rnam pa gsum po// dgun gyi dang/ dpyid kyi dang/
dbyaragyi dag btsugs so// de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs stong gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la skyes pa med par son gnas sil snyan rnams kyis bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod pa/

ba/ byed do// tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgon ba spang leb can ringashas tshol zhing de dpe ngag tu rgyu khan ri bo gzhan zhig la phyin pa dang/ des ri'i gshen drang srong gi bsti gnas me tog dang 'bras bu/
phun sumatshogs ba/ bya sna tshogs rtsub/ dena mtshonapo ud+ma dang/ ku tshudang/ pad+madakar pos yon pa/ dngapa dang/ bya ka nadab dang/ dur bas mdzes pa dag thonas
bkonas deba'athus pa'i rtsams pa las/ ji tsam na drang srong sku dang/ kha spu dang/ sonamo dang/ spu rnams ringob/ lus rlung dngabs gdungs pa/ shingegos khyon bzhi
shadedung du gnas bcas tanA'i spyil bu 'dug ba mthong ango// mthong nas kyang rkang ba lamako bos phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas drisang/ legs ldan phyogs 'dir khyod bzhugs nas tshun
ji sridamige lags/ 'go ba'i bo'u nano// khyod kyis yun desridecig tu phyogs 'dir lenan mtshar chud dubyung ba'i chos 'ga' lta gzigs pa 'am gsanab lta mchis sam/
drang srong zhi ba'i bdaganyide des dal bu dal bus smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyis mtsho'ade mthong am/ legs ldan mthobalags so// 'din tshes pa 'du ba'i jingazhes bya//
ut+pal dang/ kumu da dang/ pad+ma dkarapos kangab byasna tshogs kyi tshogs kyis bstan pa/ kha gdang/ dngul dar/ bsko'i mdog lta bu'i nus shin tugang ba/ shin
tu dri zhim pa'i m rtog gis bskor ba'i chu'irdzinga'adir/ tshes bco lnga la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu mo yode 'phrog ma zhes bya ba/ mi 'am ci mo lnga brgyas
[ZI ]yongs su bskor nas/ mgro khrus dang bsku sna tshogs dang 'ongs nas khrus byed du/ de khrus byed pa'i bro garadang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra snyan pas/ byang ng ringags kyang
yid 'phrog par byed do// kho bo yang de'i sgra thos nas dga' ba dngayid bang ba chen pos zhag bduna'ada' bar khyang ng/ bzhin bzos kho bos ngomacherarmad du byung ba 'di mthong ngo//
denas rngonab pang leb can 'desnyam dusams te/ bdag gis klu las don yod zhags pa thob pa ste/ domi'ama'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma 'gad ba bo snyam nas/ de dus gzhan zhig na
tshes bco lnga la don yod pa'i zhags gakhyer mtsho'agramadan bar la dog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ le ma tshangaming zhig du 'khras nas gcig tu bsgrims pas bya ra byed cing 'dug go/ ji
tsam na yid 'phrog ma mi mnyi mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ de 'dra ba'i 'byor pa nyid+do skyes tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing khrus kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ nApa spangaleb can gyis ngas thag tu
rdzu na yod pa'i zhags pa btabopa las/ des mi maci ma yid 'phrog ma zin no// donayod pa'i zhakas pas zinanas/ mtsho'i nang na mchongargal zhing 'jigs ba'i sgra yang phyung ba dang/
ni ma mo'i tshogs lhag mas dgos nas/ na tshun brgyugs te mi 'am ci mo yode'abrog ma la brtag par bartsams pas bzungs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang skrag nas bros so/
sngon pa des mchog tugazugs bzang mo bldan sduka ba de mthong ang// mthong nas kyang kazung ba'i phyir drung du gtugs pa dang/ dres smras ba/ ma rabs khyo ni nga la ma regacig/
khyod kyi 'di ni thog babam yin/ nganikazugasaM bzang rgyal gyi 'os mnabs// 'dzin pa legs par 'gyurab m minano// rngon pas sbas pa/ gang de byed ma bzung na 'bros
bar 'gyur ro// des sas pa/ 'o mo ma 'bros kyis/ gal te yid mi ches na 'di'i mthas bo mo stong gi nam mkha' la 'gros/ gtsug gi norab 'di byung zhigo/ rngon pas smas pa/
sus shes/ sa de lakatsug gi nor bu byin nas smras pa// gtsug ginor bu 'di su'i leg pa na gnas pa de'i dbang du kho mo 'gyura'o// de nas rngon pas naor bu de blangs dazhags pas bcings
khazhin du khrid de song ngo// de'i tshe gzhon nu nor bzasa'i rigs 'chor dungs ba dang/ na pa des gzhon nu nor bzas gzugs bzang po mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas
kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dini rgyal bu gzhon nu yin la/ 'dirang mchog tukazugs bzang go blta na sdug pa yin te/ gal te 'dim thong nabatsan thabs su khyer bar 'gyur
gyis ma la bdag gis 'di skyos kyi tshal du bdaganyid kyis dbul lo snyan nas/ nas de zhags pas bcings bzhin du/ rgyal bu gzhon nunor bzangs
gang na ba der khrid dasong nas phyin pa dang/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa// lha bdag gis bud med rin po che 'di skyes su 'tshal de mas na bzhes su gsol// rgyal bu gzhon nu
nor babrangs kyis/ mi 'am mo yade 'phrog ma gzugs 'brang o blta na sdug nga mdzes ba/ kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ yon tan thams cad 'dus pa bud med
kyi mtshan bco brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ yul gyi me bas bzang ba// nu ma gsar gyi bum pa dang rus sbal ltar rgyas shing rlog dang/ mkhrang zhing akhrags pas shin tu legs par
zlum pa ltem pa/ migamathon mthing la dmar zhing dkyus ring la pad+ma gzhon nu 'dra ba/ sna'i bzengs ring zhingamatho ba/ ma mchu byedu dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po chadang thim pa'i
'brasabu'i dbyibs 'dra ba/ 'gram pa ma rongs shing yongs su rgyas pa/ mkhur tshos lhag par dga' bar byed pa'i ri mo'i thog la can/ smin ma ris kyis mdzes shing 'dzeral bung
pa'i tshogs ltar gnag pa/ dpung pa zla bltab dri ma med pa ltar rgyas la ring ba/ lto gnyim zab mo gsum dang ldan zhing yid tsam snying pa/ numa'i g.yurakyis ro stod bags kyis 'dod la//
[e ]dku pa'ing rta'i yan lag ltar dbyibs shin dumadzes pa/ lag pa chu shing gi snying bo 'dra ba/ bar byin gyis 'dra bar zlum bas mdzes pa/ ngashin dum mngon zhengagya rgyu med pas yan lag thams
cad madzes pa/ nor bu mang po'i mgo rgyan dang/ mgul gdub dang/ rkang gdub dang/ gdub bu dang/ deshal dung/ sa mo po'i sgras 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ skya kanag la 'jam pa/
bad sogs ltar rkang pa rkang gdub kyis brgyan cing gsar gyi 'og pag can ste sbyang nge ba/ do shal mang bo spyas pa/ mag gsaragatso ma lta bzang ba mthong ngo// mthong ma thag du gzhon nu/
nor bzanges 'dod chakasakyizhakas pa/ chublu dria meng cing gsal ba g.yo ba'i rang bzhinalta bur gzung dga' ba/ klung chu rlabs dang bcas pa'i nusrin lta bur rtogs par dka' ba/ nam mkha'
lding dang rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar bgro gshing bal kyi 'da' ba lta bur myur du'agyurab/ khultar s gcigo na mi 'dug pas g.yo zhingagatsab yab can gyis nidam du zin/ 'dod chags kyi
mtha' rtag tu nyon mongs pa bstan pa la koms pa'i 'adod chags kyi 'du ba rnamyang ba la brkam pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yul na'agrologayang sa las mi zlog pa/ bzang mo la rjes su
chags pa'i sems kyis shin tu dri ma can dubyas pa/ phradapar 'dod pa shin tu dbyung mi bzodapa'i sgra 'byin pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i gzhus 'phangs pas ni snying la phog ste/ ma'i nang
[7/ ]nga[]// phyom leb bzhin du de nyid du 'gyel lo// smras pa// dbyar gyi ra sbrenang nas klag nai'akhyug la// bzhin ras zla ba 'drade nor bzangs kyis mthongs//
trel chags pa'i 'dod pa ste tshul las byung ba// 'dod chakasama' yis de yi sems la phog 'a dul ba gzhi bam po zhu lnga//
denas rgyal bu nopo bzangs kyis yid 'phrog ma de 'dang glang bo'i khyon kyi kong khyer du song nas/ na pa de la yang grongakhyiba mchog gcig byin no// zhes gzhonanu nor bzas yid 'phrog ma/
dang lhan cika steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhire dong nas lhan cig durtse bar khyed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed d/ yid 'phrog ma'i gzushes dang/ na tshod dang/ bsnyan
bkur brgya phraka du ma'i yon tan gyis gzhun nu nor bzangs kyisams dziltar de dang skad cig kyang 'bral mi phod pa de ltar rdzogs so/ tsan dus gzhan zhig na bram ze gnyis shing
ljongs rgyu zhing 'ongs pa las/ dulas gcig gis ni rgyal po la rten bcas so// gnyis bani gzhon nunor bsrangs la// rgyal pol rten bcas pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal
pos mdun na 'don dubcug ste longs spyod kyi skal pa yang byinen gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi gang yin ba de la ni/ des longs spyo dkyi skal ba tsam zhig byin ba dang/ smras pa/
gzhon nu gangagi tshe yab 'das nas khyod rgyal bor bcug pa de'i tshe bdag tu zhige ba'i/ gzhonanu nor bzangs kyis sbrus ba/ ji ltar byekyi grogs kho khram ze pa'i yab kyi mdun na 'don
du bcug pa de bzhin du/ khyod kyang dzarimadunan 'dzenadu gzhug go zhes bya ba'i gtam de gcig nas gcig tu bsgyung de/ bram ze mdun na 'don des thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ngas
nas gzhon nu nyid kyis kyang rgyal sride ma thob pa ltar byas// mdun 'don du gzhug ba lta smos kyang ci dwagos snyam mo// jitsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal bo po'i yul dur 'or pazhig/
bso bar gyur nas/ rgya la bos de 'babs su dmag kha chen cig btang ba las de bcom/ rnam pa bcom ste pham par byas nas slar log go/ de bzhin du 'a chen bdun gyi bar btang/
ba las de rnams kyang bcom/ ma par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar lhags so// rgyal po la/ blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lta ci'i slad durang gi dpunganyamasashing gzhan/
kyi mthu bskyod mdzad/ gangal lha'i yul ba mtshon gyis 'tshob jisnyadamachis pa hrams cad dgug tu gsol/ bram dzemadunan 'don gyis bsams pa/ gzhon nu gsad pa'i
thabs bya ba'i dus ne'adi ni no snyam nas/ des rgyal po la gsol ba/ lha de lta bu s ni dbab par oM thog go/ rgyal bos smras pa/ ltar bya/ nyid 'on 'gro 'am/
mdun na 'don gyis sbas pa/ ci'i slad du lha te gshegs/ gzhon nunor bzungs 'di ni der la bab cing mthu rtsal bsnyams pa dang ldan pa lags pas/
dmag 'di rnams dang lhan cig tudagur gsol rgyal pos snyas po/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes/ nas lcos gzhon nu bkuka nas bskyo ba/ gzhon nu dmag dang lhan cig tu dpal
'ong ba rnams bobatsaka/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis rgyal po las mnyananas/ btsun mo rnams kyi kon du song pa ya de 'brogam mthong ba dang/ des thams
cu brjed par gyur to// de nas yang rgyal pos bsgo ba dang/ yang d mthong ma thag tuthams cad brjod par gyur to// de nas mdun 'don kyis rgyal bo la smras pa/ lha
gzhonanuno'abrangasan yid 'phrog ma la lhag par chag pos mchid+dom thog gis/ dmagakhasdogs la gzhon nu'atsunamo rnams kyin nas byung ba dang/ nas kyang yid 'phrog ma'i drung dumi'achib thal/
byungagatang bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos/ blon bo rnams la sa'/ shes ldan dag dbung gi tshogs sta gon kyis shika blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnanas dpung gi tshogs glang
po tshe dang rdo dang shing rta dang/ dbung buchung phun sum tshogs pa 'tshog ches go mtshon rnam pa dus dang ldan ba dag sta gon byas so// de nas kazhon nuphyir byung ba dang bsgo ba/ gzhonazhu
dpung tshogs sta gon byas kyis song zhig/ des smras pa// lha yid 'phrog ma la bltas demakhar bgyi'o// rgyal bos smras pa/ gzhon nu thogs pa'i gyurakyis ma lta zhig/ yab gal
tade lta nAm la bltas te/lo// gzhon num lanawIs shige sa yi 'brogama'i gtsug gi nor bu khyeras/ ma'i drodadusong lta rkyang ba gnyis la gtugs desnas ba/ 'am bdag 'ong pa/
rnams 'babs su mtshel gas kyis/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di khyod kyis shin tu dben bar sgros la/ yid 'phrog ma 'akum pa la thug pa ma lags par ltar gyuram stsalatsago nus/ sa
de skadam lu bsgo nas mchiphyag byas te/ngamag gi dpung gi tshogs dung rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dngams de ekyis yum 'dusazhas/ ri 'or de dang ngacang yang mi ring ba zhig na shing ldan pa zhig/
na shing ljon pa zhig byung dubatab ste 'dug go/ detshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang/ 'khoganod sbyin brgya phrag dum dang/ 'khor gnong stong phrag dum dang//
'khor gnod spyinobargya stong phrag du ma dang lam nas gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar chas so// de'am dezhas chas pa na nam mkha'i lam la thogs par gyuranos/ de'adisnyan du
bsams te/ badrag kas lam 'dinas lan mang po zhig song na bdag kibazhin ba lan 'ga' yang thogs par magyuran/ gang gis nad ltar thogs pa 'dil rgyu yod snyam pa las
des gzhon nu nor bzangs mthong nas de 'de snyam du sems te/ 'di ni beska la bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ ag la chas pas nyon mongs par
'gyurakyis/ 'di'igrogs byas te ri 'od pa 'di rnams srog chags 'ga' yang gnod par ma 'gyurab radaba' bo snyam du bsams nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dbonachen po lnga len la smras pa/
lnga len tshur shog/ khyod kyis gzhon nu nor bzangs ri 'ar pa rnams dang g.yul ma bkye ba/ srog chags 'ga' la yang kanod par ma bya bar thob cig/ kanod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po/
lnga len gyis 'ga' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bu lasamnyan nas/ lha'i mnalaka'an pa'i dpung gi tshogs/ shing ta la'i dusum kyi skyes ba dang/ ri'i ched khakyi
glang po che dang/ chung lo che'i tshad tsam gyi rta dang/ kazhumad kha ga tshod tsam gyi shing rta rnams sprul lo// de nas ral gri deng/ tho ba dang/ mda' bo chadang/ mdung dang/ 'khor dang
mdung thung dang mda' dang dgra sta la sogs te/ mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ sil khrol gyi zla rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pas 'jigs ba chen po ston tsung/ lnga len/
mthu chen po'i tshogs rnams dang ri 'od du phyin pa dang/ glang po che dang/ rta dang/ shing rta'i sgra dang sal khrol gyi sgra sna tshokas dang/ gnod sbyin rnams kyirangabazhin kyi mthus
nga ba dag thal bar gyur to// de nas ri'ong na gnas pa de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs de dang rab dag ral ba mthong nas/ mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te dris pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'digang/
nas 'ongs/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ myur du sgo phye shig/ kazhon nu nor bzangs 'di'imajug nas 'ong ste/ dbungagi tshogs 'dand en no// gal te myur dum pa na thams cad
rmag med par 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis/ bodrag cag rgyal mig ste/ gzhon nu blo dang ldan la min// rgyal po'i zhishas 'tsho rnams kyis// bdag cag 'joges yonge skug kyu'amod//
ces smras nas ( da rnams kyi sgo phyuste/ de nas rgyalamtshan dang ba dan bskyongs bum pa gangab dang/ rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis gzhon nu nor 'brasakhasu'o// des kyang dbugs phyung
nas de mes 'drang ba las sna lo brkos de dpya thang cad/ gte'u yang bzung ngo// de nas dri 'o ba dems cham du phab nas/ gzhon nu nor bzangs slar log rgyo/ rgyal ponor can gyis
nyid kyi nub 'o rmi lam na bya rgod cig 'os te/ rgyal bo'i lha bral nas rgyum gzas dgrong khyeradethams cad kyi mtha'akhaskorab dang/ ni po tshos 'dun khyim du'ongs pa mthong ang
mthong nas nas rgyal bo 'jigs shing// mingaga' zhing spu zing zhes byas/ myurab myurakaralangs te mal chen po la 'dug nas lag pa 'gram pa gtad de/ gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid
las nyams ba 'am/ srog gi bar chad du ma 'gyurakrang snyam nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las/ de nas nangs nas rmi lam de bram ze mdunan 'don la/
smras pa dang/ des bsams pa// lhas rmilam de lta bu mthong banakangonami za bar kazhon nus ri'or pa rnams bam par byas kyis/ log pa bzhin dubastan par bya'o snyam nas smras pa/ lha/
