khyod kyi rmong lam du gzigs panibazang po ma lakas te/ gdonam 'tshal bar gzhi 'di las lha'i rgyal srid las nyams ba 'ag sku cho'abarachad du 'gyuralakas so// 'on kyang 'dibazlokaM
pa'i thabs mchis te/ de yang bram ze rnams kyi kasang tshige las mthong nga/ bzlog pa'i thabs de tsa yin/ lta spyang tshus tshol du rdzong dbyibs legs pa tshad la bab pa bgyis la/de nas
rdzowal gyis byugs te legs par bstananas/ ri dgas phra mo rnams kyi khrag gis bkang la/ nas lhas khrusal gshegs ban/ rdzing de la them skas gcig la 'jug par bgyi'i//
gcig las zhugs nas gnyis la 'dzag par bgyi'o// gnyis pa las zhugs nus gsum pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o// gsum pa las zhugs zhus bzhi pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o// de nas
bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis lha'i zhabs lces bldags la/ mim in pa'il gyis bdug pas 'dug go/ deltarin lha'i dngos sdig 'byang zhing
[74 ]yun ring por rgyal srid skyong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ de dag thams cadrani nus na/ 'di ltar mi ma yin pa'i tshil bu 'dzinishin du konano// mduna'adon gyis smras/
ba/ lhachod pa gang lags pa de dkon lags sam/ rgyal pos sbas pa de lta bu zhig yin/ mdun na 'don gyis sbas pa// lha yid 'phrog ma 'domi a lags bam lags sam/
rgyal pos smras pa/ mdun 'don 'dis gzhon nu'i sroga'adug gis/ duskadam sa zhika/ des smras pa lha/ khyim gyi phyi ni'aga' gdangaste// grong rdal phyi'i nikhyon gtang
ngo twayul ljongs phyi nigrong rdal te// bdag gi phyir nis gtang ngo// zhes bgyi bam gsananam/ rgyal bo bdag de brtan gyur nas// gzhon nu blo ldan de la ni// gzhan zhig/
stsalabar spyod grang gis/ yid 'phrog 'di ni dkum bar mdzod// bdag nyidel mngon par chags pa nim bye pa ru yang med pas/ des khas blangs so// zhus mdun na 'don gyis/
ji skadabastan pa bzhin dubya bar brtsams te/ rdzongabarkos nas rje thal gyis byugs shing lekas pa bstar nas/ ri dgas phra mo rnams kyikhrag sogs pa la zhugs so// sbyor ba de nor
bzangs kyi btsunamor bos shes nas/ de rnams dka' ba dang de bdeb skyes te/ badrag tsaka lang tsho la bab cing kazugs phun sum tshogs pa yin pas/ da ni bdag cag dang gzhon
nu nor bzangs yongs su ka'adagur spyod bar 'gyur ro zhes/ de rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa de dag yid 'phrog mas mthong nas dris pa/ khyad cig ci'i phyir
lhaka par dka'/ jitsaman gzhan zhig gis yid 'phrog ma la driltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang/ yid 'phrog pa sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba skyes nas/ gzhonanunor bzangs kyi
ma kanganab der song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas snying rje droskad du sgra gnyom chung dus don de dal bus smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ gal te de lta na legs par rtogs shi'o/
bdag gis kyang brtag go/ yid 'phrog mas brtags nas yang sas pa dang/ nges brtags na yang bden por mthong nas/ rinas des gtsug gi nor bu do dang gos shig yid 'phrog ma
la byin nas smras pa/ bu mo khyod dus la ma bab pas 'gro zhake/ deltan kho bo la 'amar 'byung bar mi 'gyur// de nas rgyal po driskadabastan pa'i rim pa bzhin du khrus la chas te/
khrun gis gas ba'i rdzing bur zhugs nas byungab dang/ dran s 'i rkang ba gnyis la khram ze rnams kyi lces bldags so// ji tsamazham 'gatso mo khrod de shin cig ces bsgo ba dang//
de ma thag khonar yang 'phrog ma nam mkha' 'phags de tshogs su bcad smras pa/ bsngag ni rig pang thadabang// bdag ni bgadadang btsos pa las// ba gramo brtags thar[B]
pa ltag ni'ajagamo 'gro bar bya// rgyal bos kyang nam mkha'i lam las 'gro ba mthong nas/ rje skag ste mdun na 'donal smras pa ga gis phyir 'bad par bya ba dem grub ]
par mi 'am ci yid 'phrog ma bros so/ mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lca denadon grub ste/ dngos sdeka dang bralakas so// de nas yid 'phrog mnam mkha' lam las 'gro/
bra'adisnyam dusams te/ gang yang badrag gnas skabs 'di thob dri ngani drang srong des bstan pa las rgyur gyis gal du des ma bstan ni bdag bzung 'gro bar mi 'gyur pa zhig/
dalta bsan zhig drang song de'i drung du'agro'o snyam nas/ de de'i bsti gnas su song nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas drang srong la sbas pa/ drang srong chen bo khyod kyis 'astanu bas//
bdag bzung sta mchis nas mi'i ko pa rnams thob cing srog gi bar chad du nyung zhig gis ma gyurd// ngebasagasol 'anigal tebargya zhig la gzhon nunobazos bdag tshol zhing mtshesen/ du
la bdag gi sor gdubu stsolal/ 'di skad kyang gasungaba'i rigs so// gzhon nu lam yang bzod par dka' ste 'onamongs bar 'gyur gyis ma bzhud cig/ gal trebazlog kyang mchis
su a btuban/ lam bstan ba'i rigs kyis/ gzhonanuid 'phrogams bstan ba/ byang phyogs logs na nag po gsum mchis so// de dag brgal ba'i pha rolan yang
gsum mo// de dag brgal ba'i pha ro'an ang gsum mchis so// de drag brgal ba dang ri'i rgyal po gangs can mchis so// de'i byang phyogs na ni'i
bo phur ba'i tshemachis so// de nas lam chu sgra can dang/ sangaldengacan dang/ rgyud gracig pa dang/ rtsodzin dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang/ phur pa'i dbyibs
d+hA dung sa srungs bu'adabyibs dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ ba rgol de/ lo de dag khyod kyis rgol cig/ dal ri'i song ldengatsan dong rgyud gcig pa dang/ phur pa'i dbyibs la/
ni phu gnas 'jug/ rdo can lan bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste// thabs 'di dag gis ri bongonams brgal bar bgyi'o// 'khrul 'khor ragadong can dang/ lukalta bu dang/ skyes

bu srin po ser skya'i gathukas can dag kyang gzhom par bgyi'o// phug na sbrul kha tshu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs rgyug pa zhikamaches de/ dezhizhongashas kazhom pabagyi'o// gang na sprulani nag po zhika
thuganabyed 'dug mthong nas ni// bdag gi slad du gzhu rdungs la/ mdo' las sman de gsad par gyis// gang nas lug gnyis phan tshunanas// rdung bar byed pa mthong na// dganyis
rwa rab sha mdzod dang// lamazhi nad par 'gyuralakas so/ 'jigs pa che skyong non thogs pa'i// lcags kyi skyes pa kanyis mthong na// gnyis las ni gtsaka brtags dang/
lam ni rud par 'gyur lags so// srin mo lcags kyi mu can zhake/ kha 'dzums kudangs par bgyid 'thikasan// de tsho de yi dpral ba la// phur ba dag gis gdab par mdzod// de bzhin
khron pa klong drag 'khyil/ drug u'ikhru can la khyodamachongs// skamig seng ge 'i ltar sar zhing/ mi bzad bsnyen par pa dka' ba yi// gnod sbyin dang srin po dag gzhukhakang stani
gsang mdzod la// srin 'dzin 'akhrigs gangab yi// chu boyang bo rgyalamangodacig/ nangag phye ma'ab gdungs dang// sna tshogs rud mo dgod pa dang/ sprul can 'dam ma gyi kyang//
nang kun srinamo zo// phyam labanaim yin// gdus pa ni 'dzin khrimang// sna tshogs can 'dod sgyur gzugs// dung mo mi 'am ci mi bran// dgodo ba na nam 'am ci'i//
ma'am sprul mang sprulanan// 'dam can klung shal ma la/ lung ga tshanibartan par bya// phyam lag la brtulo bodabya/ gdungabar 'dzin khrikhabacingang// sna tshog sazhananguklu sna tshogs/
duu0f00can du yidra ba bas// ngagod byed du na mo sku bal/ sbyor zas kun tu rgal bar mdzod// sbrul can ni sprul ga gi/ sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od an// klung du mtshon rnon gdab
ba i de/ sbyor bas kun durgal bar mdzod// chubo rnams brgal nas gcan ba'i gnas na kanod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran tshunas dugazhom ba medzodacika/ de nas ni ma 'am
ni'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so gsungs shig/ drang srong de la yid 'phrog mas re skad smras nas/ rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gzugs dang nas song ngo// phrin
naganyen norab zangs kyis ni 'od phab nas skyes khyerati/ glang po'i grong khyeradu 'ongs so zhes rgyal pos zosanasaachog du dga' ba skyes so// de nas gzhon nu ngal bsos nas/
tsa pha'i drung dusong staphyag byas nas mdun du 'dug pa dang/ rgyal bos mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i katam byas nas snas ba/ gzhon nu khyod bdabar 'os sam/ lha khyod kyi bka' drin gyis
'orab phab stagate'u gzung sna po bskos lakas ti/ dbya dang skyas kyang 'di dag lags kyis/ phyag mdzod du gzhug tukasol/ rgyal bos smras pa/ bu legs bar ngs kyis
bzhes so// de nas gzhon zhus phal phyagakhyas nas chas pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhonanu skyes lhan cig kho nar 'os spyad kyis 'dug cig 'dag gi yid 'phrog ma
ma mthong nas yun ring zhig lags pasamachilakas so// gzhon du 'gro ba shog l sang song zhig/ dregal kyis 'chu zhing 'angaskang chos smras so/ yab ngas bar dnganyid bdag mchi/
lakas so// rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas kazhon nurang khyim du songan/ btsun mo'i pho brang gi sgo dbal gyis stongapa mthong nas/ des ms khongs sa chung bti shas
[sa pa 'phrog mtsha mthong nas snying stor du phan tshun du zhing/ yid 'phrog ma yid 'phrog ma zhes sgra phyung// ji tsam na btsunamo rnams tshog sazhas/ baname rAnams kyis gtam rlung la bskur
dang/ de'i snying la zug rngus zug pas yang nas yang dris pas/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so// de cunganagyis yid blong bar gyur to// budand ngo rnams kyis smras pa/
lha btsun mo'i 'khor 'angan de bas 'dam shin tu khyad par du'aphags pa dag mchis na/ ci'i slad duthugs ngan mdzad/ nges pa snying mad cing byas pa chud gzon pa thos nas/ ma'i drung du
song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas snyas ba/ chum/ yid bzhin monatan ldan gyur cika/ gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs pa yi// yid 'phrogamanani ga'an/ bdag yid 'phrog
a kangadumachis// yid kyise rab tu rgyug snyam na'ang// badrag gi ingani kun du rmongs// de dang bralabar gyurapa yis// snyingani shin dugadus brjid// bdag gi yid du'ongazhing
yid 'phrog la// yid du'ashadabang yodil dga' ba yi// yid 'phrog dang bral bdag lus gdungs pa yi// bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas mchis// des snasapa dwang/ bu/
yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur nas kho mos btang ngo// um ji ltar gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa thames cad rgyas par smras ba dang/ sa pha snyingadzimadacing byas
[%9 ]pa mi gzo ba yin no zhes smras nas yang smras pa/ um gang dums/ shul ni gang nas/ des sas pa/ gang du Id 'phrog song ba yi// lam
dering dang drang srong dang// sang gdag gras rtag bstan cing// chos kyi rgyal po gnas pa yin/ dad yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi 'brang bar nyam thag dpe snying
rjerdzaskad du bla zhing sna sngags 'don ba yade bzhin yon tan ldan gyur pa'i// yadre 'phrog ma ni mi gda'an// zhes bya banasu/ bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas 'ongs//
zhes bya ba'i sher lam bzhin du'o// de nas mas smras pa/ bu btsun mo'i 'khor 'din debs ches khyadapar du 'phags pa'i bumadangag yongan/ ci'i phyir mya ngan byed/ kazhanas smras
pa yum de ma red par bdag dga' bar ga la 'gyur/ des dadabugs phyungayang/ 'onakyang mya ngan kyis gdungs nas/ de'ikhrungs tshel zhing phan tshun ngubatsal bar brtsams te/ de'i
blo skyes pa/ gang kho na las thob pa de nyid la re zhig dri'o snyam nas/ des rngan pa sprang leban+dan kyi drung du song ste dris pa/ khyod kyis yid 'phrog ma gang nas red/ des smras pa/ ri bo/
chago mo'i ngos la drang srong zhige gnas te/ de'i bsti gnas na tshangs pa'i ng bzhes bgyi ba'i rdzongamachos rtogs/ de khrus la zhugs pa las drang srong gis bstan nas rnyed do// des/
[e bsams pa// da ni drang srongagi drung du song dang/ las khungs phyin par 'gyur ro snyam mo// rgyal pos gzhon nu yid 'phrogs dang bral bas shin tu yid blong ba'igs te thos so//
denas rgyal bos smras pa/ gzhenon khyod yid klong dun yod/ pan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chungam spyino/ nges sbas pa/ yabab kund ma lags pa'i mchis brang gi la'o
dngamachis par rngo mi thogs lags so// rgyal pos de la lanangum smras kyang n zlogs so// de nas rgyal pos grol gyi []sgo dang ba'i 'di zhes kyang gzhon nuphyes 'chor ba bya
ba'i phyi'i skyes bu srungs ma dag bkodado// de nas gzhon nu mgronathog thagami lar gyur to// lnga po 'di dag ni ma mo cung zad nyal gyis/ phal cher mi'al te/ lnga ka zhen/
skyes pa 'domad la chags pas sams bcings pa dang/ brang mang skyes pa la chags pa dang srog chags durupa dang/ chom rkun parer bag dang/ drag slong brtson 'akrus brtsams
ba yin nozhes gsungs so// de nas gzhon nu 'disnyam dusems te/ gal te bdag sgo nas son/ rgyal po'i sgo srungs kyi chung ma gtum po dag yodad/ de rnams kyis bdag chad
pa gcod pa 'am/ srog dang bral ba byed par 'gyur gyis/ nas kyang ma la bdag sru sa ma med pa'i lam nas 'gro'o snyam nas/ dmtshan mo langs de up+pal sngon po'i
'bre bas mgo bo bcings ba'i 'phrang ba rgyal mtshan la btags nas/ gang nasrungs ma'i mad pa denas 'babs pa nazla ba shar ro// phanas des zla bal bltas nas/
blo yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i smra sngags 'dulta bu dag 'dren par byed de/ zlanya rgyaskar rgyal po gnamo gsal mdzad kyi// khyongan skyer ma mig tusdug pa dadadabon bzang// rtsi ga badrag gi
sdug pa ut+pal lta bu'i mig/ pad 'bog ces bgyi khyod kyis sa stengs ga zigs lags sam// zhes smras nas/ sngon gyi dga' ba nyams su myong ba dran zhingesong b.las ri dgas mo zhig
mthong nas/ dal yang smras pa/kyi ma redags mo khyod nu chu'om za// khyod ni legs 'gyur bdir spyod bdag ni rngon pa na// ri dgas mo ltar mag kyus ringebs gzugs bzang ba/
bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ ded nas song lta phyogs gzhan zhage du phyin pa dang/ tshal ma tog dang 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa'i snying po la bung ba dag longs

spyod ba mthong nas/ de nas bung zhig la smras pa/ sbrang rtsi 'thung ba'i bomathon mthing lta bu 'a mchog/ snyag ma'i sbubs dang pad+madag la gnas 'cha' ba// sgra itshog sang kha dog bung ba ltar gnag
ba// bdag gi yide 'brog ces bya khyedakyis mthongegyur tam// phyogs rezhas kyang song ba dang sprul zhig mthongongo// mthong nas kyang smras pa/ kye ma'o sbrul kanagashing lo lta bur lce g.yo zhing/
0/ mig dang kha yin nas dud pa'i tshogs 'byin ba// khyod kyi gdug pa'i mi dang 'dod chags cher mi mtshungs// bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam// de nas kyang phyogs gzhan
zhig tu son pa dang/ tshul gzhan zhig na khu byug sgra 'byin pa zhika mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang khu byug de la yang smus ba/ kun tu byakatshola mchog ljon shing la gnas pa/ 'dabachakas
tshogs kyi rgyal bo 'u dam yang 'brog ma// ut+pal sngon po lta bur drimadamadzes pa'i moke/ bdog gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyokyis mthong gyur tam// phyogs nas kyang song ba dang/ shing
mya ngan tshos zhes bya ba la dog thams cad rgyas pa zhig mthong nas/ mingagi rnam grangs bkra shis zhes brjod pa// na ba rnams kyi rgyal bo cher gyur la// yid 'phrog mya ngan gyisan klong ba/
bdag/ thal mo sbyan khyod kyisamya ngan songs// de de ltar yid brong zhing rim gyis drangasrongade'abeste gnas su phyin nas/ des drang srong de la dul ba dang bcas pas phyag byas nas smas pa bzod
'phags gos su shing shunadang na g.yang gzhimanabs// rtsa bamu na skya rubaleb kA pade kasol// drang srong akos btudabyaka'atshal bdag gi yid 'phrog ma/ khyod kyis gzigs sam khyod ni khengag
la myur du gsungs// denyis drang srong des kazhon nunorab zas la khyon b.legs so zhes khya bdang stan te ba bya ba la sogs ba sngar bya ba'i yang dag par dga' ba byas nas smras ba/ smin ma 'jam pa'i
'bya/// smin tshugs mthon mthing bzhin legs mthong na dga' ba'i gzugs 'chang ba// bzhin ras zla ba lta'adra ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i mig de bdag gis mthong// dpon khyod bkra/
skyong bzhugs te rtsa ba 'bras bu sna tshogs gsol bar mdzod cig dang// khyad kyis bde thuka khyo'agyur 'di'i bdag gi yide la the tshom yod mamachis// sminam bzang pos 'jing tshig smras te//
gzhon nu khyod la sredapas bdag ma bde// nags khrod gnas pa'i ng sdug bsngal chen po ste// gshegs par gyurananges par bdag mthongo/ nges sor gdub rgyun 'di byin nas smras pa/
lam yang la bgrod dka'abs nyenayos bar 'gyur gyis sang lan cig/ gal te bzlog kyang 'dug ma btuban/ de'am bstan pa'i rigs so// des yang 'ang skad ces bstan te/
byang phyogasalegan rinag po gsum yong// de dag brgal ba'i pha rolan yang gasum/ de drag brgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum yod de// dadag brgal ba ngang ri'i rgyal po gangs can zhes
bya ba yod de/ phyogs de nas sman 'di dag blang bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ shin du 'o ma 'dzag ces byaba'i s+sa na yod dang/ demaralas btsos nas btung bar bya'o// des na skom pa dang
bkres pa mang dran pa dang mthu stobs 'phel bar 'gyur// spre'u zhig kyang bkra bar bya// gsangasngags dag kyang bslab bar bya// gzhumada' dang bcas pa dang/ nor bu 'od
[j]dang ldan pa dang/ dug gsod pa sman dug sa la dang/ lcags kyi phur ba gsum dang 1 pa wa nga lang bcang ba bya'o// ri'i rgyal bo gsacan gyi byang phyogs na ri bo phur pa'i rtse yod do// de nas/
lam chu spyan dang/ sang ldeng can dang/ rgyud gcig pa dang/ rdorjecan dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gash+'akas can dang/ phur pa'i dbyibs dang/ sa srus ba'i dbyibs dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/
la grol lo// khyod kyis de dag rgyal ngagos te/ ar be song ldeng can la ni phugazhas 'jug rgyud gcig pa drangayu pa'i dbyibs la yang phu gnas 'jug/ rdo rjecan l bya'i rgyal pos
'jug ste/ thabs 'di ga gis 'i rnams brgal bar bya'o// 'khrul bzo gdongahan dang/ lug lta bu dang/ skyes bu srin bosar skya'i gzugs can drag gzhom par bya'o// phug na sbrul kha chu'i
rgyun chen po'i shugasakyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/ de ni zhingashas gzhem par bya'o// gang la sbrulanag po zhige/ phukun khyad 'dug matho zhusan// bdag gi slad du gzhu brdzusal//
med las basman de gsad bar gyis/ gangal lug gnyis phan tshunanas// rdung bar byed pa mthong nani// de gnyis re khacag mdzod dang// lam ni da 'gyur lags so//
'jigs boskyang mtshon thogs ba/ lcags kyi skyes ba gnyis mthong na/ de gnyis las ni gcig brngags dang/ (lam ni dba'agyuralags so// srin mo lcags kyi mdun
zhig/ kha 'dzums gdungs par bgyid gzigs na// de tshe de yi dpral ba la// phur pa drag gis gdub pajamadzo// de bzhin khron ba klong drag 'khyil//
drug ru'i khru can la khyod kachos// ma mig seng ge 'i ltar ser zhing// mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi// gnod sbyin ni srin po dgu/ gzhubakang bas nagesang mdzod la// chu srin
'dzin 'khris gangab mi// chu bo mang po rgyal mdzod cig/ nang ga phye ma lab gdus dang// sna tshogs dud mo dgod pa dang// sbrul can 'od m can kyi klung nangag na ni srinamo khro/
phya ma lab mi ma yin// gdus pan ni 'dzin khri mang// sna tshogs can 'dod sgyur gzugs// dumo ma'am mi khyan/[]god pa nani ma 'am ci'o// mna' ma sbrul can sbrul
mang na// 'od ma can krungashalam la// nag nani brtan par bya// phyi ma lab lo brtul phod bya// gdung bar 'adzin khri kha bcing ngo// sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs// dud

de'i rkang ba la mgo bos phyag byas zhas song ngo// de nas das spre'um gags pa ji skad bstan ba thams cad lta kon byas nas/ nas de rnams khyer te yang drang srong de'i drung du song ba dang/ sa
dal snga'abyin nas sbas pa// gzhon nu 'bad pa 'dis ci bya// yid 'phrog ma 'dris ci zhig dgos// khyod gcig pu'agrogs 'ong ba/lus gdon zabar 'gyuragyis thong// gzhon nus smras pa/drang srong bo

bduganagangonam zabalaAmi'o//ci'i slad du zhen mkha' la zla ba rgyug chog shig ga lasazhanyis/ mtshaba'i mthu stobs ldan pa'i dag gtso bo dang/ mo yis zhag sug bzhagrokAngashegag las mchis//bdag lubu'agrogs po mthu sngonaci zhig 'tshul/
kya'i rgya mtsho chenur 'jug pa mi bgyi 'am/ ci lags sbrul gyi zin cesagaso bar mi 'gyi 'am// sems can sdus tshan gyis bstan brtson 'grus chab rtsams te// kal de'abadademar 'di
lanyes ba med// de nas kazhon nu nor bzas yid 'phroka mes bstan pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs dang sa te/ rim gyis ri dwang chu bo dang/ phug dang g.yang sa la sogs par smanadang/

gsang sngakas dang/ sman dug sel gyi sbyor bas rgyal bar byas nas mi 'am ne'i rgyal po ljon pa'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu son pa dang/ kazhon zhus grong khyer dpal dang ldan pa skyed mos tshal gyi
tshal me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshokas dang ldan pas mdzes par byas ba bya snyatshog sakyis bstan pa// rdzing bu dang/ mcho'u ring po dang/ gru bzhing dang/ mi/
'am cimo rnams kyis bskor ba de la/ mi 'am ci mo rnams chulenangu 'ongs ba mthong nas/ de nas gzhon nu bzas kyis/ da rnams la smras pa/ chu mang bo 'dis ci zhig bya/ de rnams
kyis smras pa// mi 'am ci'i rkyal po ljon pa'i sras mo yid 'phrogam zhes bgyi ba zhika mchis/ ngama'i lag tu son par gyur bas/ de'i mi'i dri bshal ba lags so// gzhon nor bzangs
kyis dris pa ci bum pa 'di dag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu de'i steng nas ldakas sam/ 'on te ris kyis/ de rnams kyis smras ba/ rim gyis so// des bsams pa/ thabs 'di
bzang ste/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'di bum pa gtsage kin dudu gzhug go snyam nas/ des mi 'am cu ma gcig gi bum pa a tshor bar ba tsug nas/ ma 'amatsho de la snasal/ khyod kyis bum ba
'dis thog mar yid 'phrog ma la khrus byos shig/ ngas bsams pa// gdon mi za bar 'di la rngagos ba zhig yod pa 'gyur ro snyam nas nas des bum ba de thog mar yade 'phrogama'i spyi kho'o
blugs pa las/ mnasor gdub kyi rgya pang dulhungabadad/ yid 'phrog mas de'aphrigs so// de nas mi 'am ci mo las pa/ 'dir 'ga' zhig 'ongs sam/ des smras pa
mchis so// song la dadaben ba zhig du zhakacika/ de nang du khrid nas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go/ de nas yid 'phrog mas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yab gal te bdag gi
khyim thabs bgyid pa gzhon nu nor bzangs demachis na/ de la khyed kyis ca zheka bkyi/ des smras pa/ dam yin de mi'i yang mi mkho bas sa dam bu brgyar byas te phyogs bzhir gtor
gtangang// mde 'phrog mas smras pa// gabamir gyur pas 'dir gal mchi/ bdag de ngaskang gachibar bas so// de nas mi 'am 'i rgyal po len ba kun nas dkris pa dang bral te/
da kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas smras pa/ gal te gzhonanu du 'ongs nangs khyod rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ nor dang/ yo byad mang bo dang mi'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te/
ngel chungama'i don du sbyin// nas yid 'phroka ma dga' ba dang mgub dang/ rab tu dka' bas/ gzhon nu nor bzangs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyananas/ mi 'am ci'i rkyel po ldan la
bstan to// de nas ma 'amapa'i rgyal bo ldan bas gzhon nobazangs kazugs bzang po mdzes pa/ blta na sdug ba/ kha dog rgyas pa mchog dngaldan pa mthong ngo// mthong nasashin du ngo
mtshar ng gyur te/ de nas de bkag par 'adod nas/ gser gyi sdong po bdun dang/ shing tal bdun dang/ rnga bo chab n dang/ phag bdun btsukas so// gzhon nu nor bzangs ni
byang chub sems dpa' yinul/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang/ las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa min no// lha rnams kyang de dag la/
zla bgegs med par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed ngo// nas khyang chub sems dpa' gar dang/ glu dang/ pa wang dang/ 'khar dang/ shin tu sgra snyan dang/ pi wang rgyudakasum pa dang/
rdza rnga la sogs ba lha rnams kyis bsgrubs pa'i sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra'i khyad par ni kun nas 'bad cing ma 'amani stong phrag dums ni yongs su bskonas/ dal ut+pal sngon po'i
'dabam 'dra ba thogs te/ ma 'am ci rgyal bo ldan pas mthong bar kasar gyi sdong po'i drungadu song nas/ chu shing la gong ba bzhin du sdong po de dum bu dum bur bcag par brtsams te/ nas
po'i til 'bru tsam du grags so// mdas reshing ta la bshad ng rdzabadudang/ phag bdunugatsangamar phyung ste/ ri ba bzhin du ma g.yo bar gnas so// des na ma mtha' la gnas pa'i lha dang/ malam

cibargya stong phrag du mas a lul zhigatso dngag zha'i sgra chen phyung ngo// mi 'amatho'i rgyal po ldan pasa mthong thosanas shin tu ngomatshar du gyur to// de nas mi'am cho lode'aphrogam 'ang bsha stag stongagi
dbus su 'de 'phrog ma bzhag ste/ gzhon nor bzasal sgras pa/ gzhon nu tshur le 'brogam ngashes par gyis shige/ de nas gzhon nu nor babs kyis dengoshes par bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i

[z/]dbyangs kyis smras pa// dziltar khyodan ljon pa'i bu yin la// kho bo'i sdug pa yid 'phrog yin zhazha/ bdenapa 'di yis myur ba khon ni/ yid 'phrog gom pas chur bu'agro ba zheka ngas de de ma thag tu/
gom pas song ba dang/ mi 'gaci rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu nor bzangs 'dun stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnon pa shin tu 'tshogs pa lags te/ yid 'phrog ma dngab de
bab lakas zhu 'i slad du 'di 'dra sho btsag/ 'dil yeng 'phrokum gsolatsaka/ zhasam a'iskyol po ljonapa ma 'am 'o tshogs rnams kyi rjes su bsngags ba dang/ mi 'amatsi'i rnams kyi 'dun
bas kazhonunor bzangs la dzebakur sta chen po byas nas/ yid 'phrog ma lha'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te lag pa g.yon pas bzung/ gsar gyi bam bas lag pa g.yas pas bzung nas/ gzhon
nunor bzas kyi drung dusong stacha sa pa/ gzhan nu yid 'phrog ma 'di la 'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te/ kho bos khyed kyi rlung a'i phyir byin gyis/ mi rnams nim rtag pa yin gyis/ ji
ltar yang 'adia dokaM/ yab bka'abazhin 'tshal zhes gzhon zhunor bzangs kyis/ mi 'amatsa'o rgyalam ljon pa las mnyan nas/ mi 'ga'o gnas kyi khang pa na yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig
skyes ba mad par sale skan rnams kyis rtsa bar byed/ dka' bar byed/ dka'adagur spyod par byed do// de dus gzhan zhigen rang gi yul dran nas pham dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi skya pan
[3g]bya/ kyis kadus par gyunas mid 'phrog ma la sgras ba/ pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis non par gyur to// de nas yid 'phrogams de ltagyur pa/
[D ]ngag pha la rgyus bar smras so// nges smras pa/ kazhon nu dang lhan cig songal/ mi rnams zhi slakhar byed ba yin gyis khyod kyisobaka yod pa gyisangashika/ zhasama'amasi'i rgyal po ldan/
pas/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ gsar la sogs pa mang du brdzangs te btang nas/ de yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu stang kin namakha'i lam lam 'am ci'i shugs kyis chas pa na/ rim gyis
glang pa'i khyim gyi grong khyer du byin te// de nas glang po'akhomakyi grong khyer ba dang gsaka ma dang gyo mo rnams bsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dar gyi chun 'phyangs
spungs rgyalam dang brtan btsugs/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pika por ngag bshams/ ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs bkram ste dag ' dga'altar byas so// de nas gzhon numo'i gisolo
stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cinge/ yid 'phrog ma dang lhan tsig du glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du zhugs so// zhes lam sa rub pa'i ngal bsosazhus// rin po che rnam pa snatshogs
ngag khyer te pa'i drung dusong nas/ rgyal po'i rten gyi blo zhige du'ag lta/ mi 'amaba'i grong khyer du song ba dba'os pa'i rnams rgyas par smras so/ de nas rgyal kho nor can gyis 'tsho shin tu
stobs dang// brtsoka'agrus dang/ pha rol gnon pa can no zhes bya bar ka nas/ rgyal po'i debang bskabs dbang bsku'o// gzhon nunor bzangs kyis bsams pa// gang bdag
yid 'brog ma dang lhan cige tshogs pa dang/ rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa gyur pa 'an/ sngon byas pa'irgyu'i khyad par yin gyis ma la du yang bdag gis sbyin ba gun gtang/
bsod nams dkanubya'o snyam nas/ sa thapo'i khyim gyi krengo khyer du lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas so// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhon nunor bzangs
zhes bya bar gyur pa dazhan zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de lta mibalta ste/ nga nyid ngos ma de'i dus na byung ba sems dpa'i sbyad pa spyod pa na rgyal po nor 'khrungs zhes bya ba gyur to//
ngas khadang yid 'phrog ma'i bar stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon par bstananas lo gshuganyis su gtan po'od po'i mchod sbyin byas pa nges/ ngas bla na mang ba
yang ga par Dokas pa'i byang chub ma thob mod kyi/ 'on kyang sbyin pa de dang brtson 'grus de na blonamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang/ spyan ma dang/ tshogs
tsam min no/// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don duganyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa ngago btang bsod nams dka byas pa
gang yin pa de nyenacika/ rgyal bo chen po sngon byung ba thams cad ces bya ba'i grong khyer kyi grong rdal du/ rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig byung
bar gyur te/ de 'byor ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ le likas ba/ skye bo daimang pos rab tu gang ba/ 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ khrug khrug dbye/
'byed pa dang/ chom rkun dang/ nud rab tu zhu ba/ 'bras sa lu dang/ bu ram shing dang du ba lang phan sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la byams pa bzhin ngurgyal sring byed ngu 'jug ste/
chos bazhinakyis rgyal sring byed du 'jug go/ nges rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ dad dang lhan cika tsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dgra'adzakur spyod par byadango/ dertsa
tshu/ bar byed/ bka' bar khyed/ga'adakur sad par byed ba las/ khye'u kazugasabazangab/ mdzes pa bal ras
'dug pa/ dpung pa ri ba/ dbul ba'i dbyas tsho basminam 'dzab/ sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhig btsas te/ de du rnams 'dus nas khye'u'amor gdugs zhes mung 'dogs par byed du/

shes ldan daka gzhon nu'adzin rgyal po thams cad shes gnyen gyi bu yin pas/ gzhon nu thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gdags so zhes/gzhonanubrams cad sgrol zhi bdagA nas/yam brgyad la gtad de zhes khyab nas/gsalnga
[s/ ]nas/ gnas lnga rnams la byang bar gyur tozhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// reg si slong ba de thams cad slong ba po dag la sbyin par byed pas/ de'i mnge thams cad gtong ba thams
cad gtong ba zhes bya bar grags so// zhams kyi rgyal phran gyi bumo rkyakas sbyin m zhes bya ba zhig yod pa dre/ de'i ched du bsangasazhas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen bos bag mar/
blangs te/ dade dang lhan cig skye bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ ji tsaman khye'u zhig btsas pa dang/ de'i ming nAka bo zhes bya bar btags so/ yang
de dang rtsa bar byed/ dka' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa rjes bu mo zhigo btsas te/ de'i ming drag can zhes bya bar btags sa 'dul ba gzhi/
dbam po zhe drug pa/ rgyal bo thams cad kyi bshes gnyen la glang po che'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mthus khams kyi rgyal phran rnams sgra 'gabar
byed do// ngas thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ bdag cag gis gang nung zad khams kyi rgyal phran rnams snga 'gong bar byed pa de ngas thamasacad kyang glang bo che'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyis
khyod thams cad gtong n yang glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan ni zhig cika/ khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis snas ba/ gangashemathus nabadag cag thams cad rgyal po thams cad kyi
[ ]khashes gnyen 'dis zil gyis mnan/ kha cig gis smras pa// rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba zhiko yod de/ de'i
mthus bdagatsaka nibrelakyis tshan to// de dag gis sgus pa/ kang gisan glang po'i mchog de dkuka pa'i thabs bzang po la yod/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po thams
cad bshes gnyen gyi bu thams cad sgrol zhes bkyi badre mo sbyin pa 'am mika tong bcu yongam mchis te/ dbu slong ba de thams cad sbyin pas ming thams cad katong ba thams cad
gdong ba zhes bya bar grags kyis bram ze dgacig mngags dang/ de rnams kyis bsrungs na khukas par 'gyur ro// ng+ha rnams kyis bram zengag bkug nas smras pa/ bram ze dka
glu dang la/ thams cad kyis bya ba'i grong rdal n thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba las glang po'i mchog slos shika/ de dag mngags nas thams cad kyi klong rdal du dong ngo// kazhenan thams
cad sgrol gling po mchog ma dogakund dang/ ku mu da dang/ kha ba dang/ dngul dang/ sprin dkar po'i mdog lta bu mche ba drug pa bdunu'akas pa kanas pa/ glang po chos
srungs kyi bu ltar bgying zhing 'gro ba/ rangabazhin gyi mtshan mchog shes brgyan pa// mthong bkra shis pa la zhonanas/ shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang/ grogs po dang/ g.yog rnams
phyi bzhin 'brang zhing/ zla ba rgyu skar kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du grong khyer nas byung nas skyed mos tshal legs su song ngo// de nas mngags pa de dag gis gzhon nu thams
cad sgro la mngon du bsunas smras pa/ rgyal rigs kazhen khyod rgyal bar gyuracig ]yang smras pa/ lha min lha 'dus 'jig rtedu// khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags// khyod
kyis glang bo mchog 'di// bdag cag rnams la stsal ba'irishes// de skad ces smras ba dang/ byang chub sems dba' glab ba mchog de las babs nas/ dga' ba dang mazhu ba dang/
rab du dga' ba'i yid kyis bram ze dag la grung poro mchog de bstan nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag thob draga' bas ded// bram ze rnams la glang chen kadang// de bzhin khag gis srid la
gsum// btang nas byang chu mchog ragashog/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal bo thams cad bshes gnyenal smras ba/ lha khyod kyi rgyas thamasacad sgrolargyas glang po'i mchog bkra
shus ldan zhes bgyi ba phyir rgol bsamangags pa la stsal lo// rgyal bos thos nas shing dukhros khrugs te bsgo Ta shel ldan dag dang la thams cad sgrol khrid de shog cig
ngams kyis de khrid de 'os pa dang/ rgyal bo thams cad bshes gnyen gyis/ thamasacad sgrol la snas ba/ gzhan kho bos khyed la gang zhung zad khams kyi rgyal phran rnams snga
'gongabar byed pa de thams cad na grang bo'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyis/ khyod thams cad katongan yang glang po'i mchog 'di zheg rtsig shes snga mo zhig dum bsgo/
'am/ ci'i phyakhyod kyis glang po'i mchog yongs su btang/ des mnyan nas smras pa// yab bslangs na lta'am stsal/ ci ji snyadu bslangs pa de thams cad sbyin nam/ tshigs

subacad rje smras pa/khyim na gnas pa'i skyes bu yis/ci 'ashes par na sbyin pa gtang/ 'on te nags su song na ni// nges pa yig mchog bya'o/yabagal dgyenab dag btang/ bsod nams dag bgyi'i yamasan/dka' thub kyi nags su
bsha bas phyi'o//non de bzhin du gi/ byang chub sems dpas rgyugs spyin ma'i drung dusong ste smras ba/rgyugs sbyin m bdag ni dka' thub kyi nags su gnas gyis byed pos bkag yod pas
kanos shig des smras pa/ rje'i sras dang thabs cig dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par bgyi'o/ rgyugs sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa la dga' bas/ gal te
khyod 'ga' zhig slongan byon par 'gyur ro// rje'isras kal te khyod kyis gtang na stsal du gsol/ byang chub sams dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis dam bcas pa de par byos shig/
donas byang chub sems dpar pa'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te smras ba/ yab cigo bdag gis sbyin slad glang chen btang// nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod bar gsol/
ba gzhi gro nas dgon par mchilags kyis// mi dbang khyod kyi phyag mdzod stongs ma 'gyur// des rgyal bo bu dang bral ba'i blong bsamachi mas brnangs nas smras pa// bu sbyin pa dang/
dka' thub nags kyi blo gros 'dizlog ka/ byang chub sams pas smras pa/ sa ni ri dngabacas par yang// gal te ldan par 'gyurakanga' ya/ sa dag bangag ni sbyin pa
las// sams na ldog par mi bgyid/ zhus sa nas song ste/ byang nub sams dpa' bu dang/ bu mo dang/ chungs dang lhan zhugengashing rta mchog gi nang du zhugs nas dka'
thub kyi nags su chas so// de nas bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yalakAshis pa khag gis/ thams cad sgrol bsu zhas snyas pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ khyod ni'ajige
rten thams cad du/// thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags// bran sde dag la shing rta 'di/ khyod kyis sbyin par gtong ba'i rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems
dba' thams cang sgrol shing rta'i mchog de las babs nas/ dga' pa dang/ maku ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba'i snying gis bram zade dka' shing 'a mchog ngebasten nas smras pa/ jiltar ba dag
rab dga' bas ngang// bram ze rnams langashing rtagatang// bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ patang nas byang chub mchog reg sheg denas byabab sems dpa' rta la zhon nas/
rgyugs sbyin m da balhan cig song ba dang/ de nas bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yaka shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol bas na sAs pa// rgyal rigs/
gzhen khyodolakhar rgyu tsaka khyedana' na thams cad du// thams cad gtong zhes rnam bar grags/ bram ze rnams la 'dan// khyodakyis sbyin per gdang ba'i rigs/
de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol rta de las babs nas/ dka' ba drang/ marku ba rdung rab du dga' ba'i snying gis bramo bra de rnams la rta de
bstan nas snas ba/ ji ltar bdag la dga' bas deng/ bram ze rnams la rta btang ba/ de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ btan gnas byang nubamachoka rekashog/ de
nas byang chub sems dpa' nanag po khrid/ rgyugs sbyinems ni dra ba kun khrid de rkang pas don gnas / byang chub sems dbas kas ri'i sul ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dong/ chu phun sum
tshogs pa zhig tu song// byang chub sems dpa' nibasam gtan byed do// rgyagar sbyin ma 'bras bus bsu bkur byed do/ dri ragazhan zhig na bram ze zhaka kanas pa sa
rigs mnyam ba las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtsa bar peng dga' bar byed dga' gur spyod bo da de de rtsa bar bdag gzhabar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed ba las khyi'u

[e/ ]mtshan (na pa bco brgyad dang ldan ba zhig btsas pa 'an to ri zhes sgra 'byin bas/ de'i ming nganate ro ngan dore zhes bya bar gyur to// de'og gzhan zhagan bram ze rib byed bzhi shes pa zhig gnas
pa des// rigs mnyam ba las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod bar byed pa las/ dritsam na bu mo gzugs bzang momadzes pa bstan
sdug pa zhig btsas te/ bsrings bskyang nas chen mor gyur pa dang/ bram ze dus bdag gi bu mo 'di byung 'brugs pa'o/ shes sam/ ba'am nor gyi phyir ni su la yang mi sbyin no
'on kyang su zhig bdag las rig byed bzhi klog pa zhika yodan/ bdag gis de la 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes dam bcas so// de nas phan to'i gsang tshig don du gnyer zhing gsang tshig leb/
bram zade'i gan du song ste phyin nas smas ba/ mkhan po'i zhabs la bdag bkur sti bgyid pa 'tshal lags so// ci'i phyir rig byed klog pa'i slad du'o/ de bzhin du kyis ka/
de de las rig byed klog bar brtsams pa las/ nga yid gzhungs pa'i rang bzhin can zhig yin pas/ des na bo ma len par rig byed rnam pa bzhi la byang bar gyur to// bram ze
nges bsams pa// bdag gis dam bcas pa ni/ bdag gi bu mo 'di rigs sam zhes bya bar rgyas par sbyarate/ bram ze'i khye'u 'dis bdag las rig byed bzhi byung bar byas/
ya/[/ ]pa yin na/mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa yin te/ gal ta'adis bu mo ma 'dod n na legs so snyam nas/ des de la smras pa bram ze'i khye'u bdug
gis bu mo 'di byad gzugs sam/ shes sam ( bzo'am/ da kyi phyir su la yang mi sbyin te/ 'on kyang su zhig bdaku las ka byed bzhiklogra pa zhige yodan bdag gis re
la 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa las/ bdag las khyod kyis rig byed bzhi byang bar byas pas/ khyod la bu mo 'di chung mar sbyin no// des smras pa bkra shis bar
gyur ko thung bar bgyi'o zhes/ des de la dpal kyi 'byor pa chen bos bag mar btang nas smyos pa/ bram ze'i khye'u chung ma khrode la rong gi khyim du song zhig/ des chung ma de khrid
derang gi khyim du song ba dang/ des de la smas pa/ rje'i sras bdag zhi du kazhan bas las bgyid ngo'i thog kos/ bdag la bkol stsolatsaka/ dus dril snus pa/ bzangamo
kho bo la bkol ba ga lamachis ]sa skyas bo/ rdzo'i sras thams cad ces bgyi ba'i grol rdal n/ rgyal bo thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bgyi ba 'isras themasacad sgrol zhes
bkyi ba de/ gang cung zad cu slong ba de thams cad stsol gyis/ dal bdag gi bkol kha slongs shig/ bzang mo gal te de ltan lhan cig du 'dongang// de nas ngan te re thams cad kyi
grong rdal du phyin nas dris pa/ gzhon nu thams cad sgrol kangan/ de dag gis smas kha/ dka' thub kyin gs na gnas so// 'dul ba gzhi/
dam po zhi bdun pa///de nas nganato'i rlung tshad lhan cig dka' thub kyin gs su song ba dang/ de'i rgyugs sbyin ma ma tog dang 'bras bu'iphyir song ngo/
de nas bram bre na do'i rgyugs sbyin mam rtog dang 'bras bu'i phyi song ba dang/ thams cad sgrol kyi drung du'ongs nas sbas pa/ chu shar zhes su rgyun zhing gza' mig mtshungs med pa//
ri bo mchog rgyas numar ldan pa'i ro stodatsan/ grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang// mtshabazanges khyod dang mtshungs pa shadong yod yod ma yin/ bdag cag
bkol bam mchis pas// spa shag lhan coge 'khyam pa din khyang kyis rjes su brtsa bgyis te// bdag la bkol ba stsal ba'i gas// kho bo la bkol bag la yod/ dadang
hamang yang ma ring ba zhig na/ nag po dang dra ba can rtsa zhing 'dug pa dang/ des smras pa/ bus pa gzhon nu'o na dag bde cigo/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ de nas byang chub sems
dba' bu sdug pa yongs su gtong ba la yud tsam zhig sems dpar gyur to// de nas bram ze sa/ thams cad sgrol la sbas pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhin nu kho bos khyod thams cad gtong ba'o zhes
thos nas/ de'i phyir kho bo khyod la slongan/ 'di lo khyod kyis dpyad du ci zhig yod/ snying rje yi nibajug nyide khyod// thams cad gtong bar sa snang grags//
ltar grags pa de bzhin du// khyod kyis sa stang bya ba'i ragos// de skang ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas/ bram ze dol 'di skad ces smras so/ rang gi srog gtong ba la'ang
bdag gis rjes 'ga' 'ang ma dpyadan// rang gi bzhugadang ba la// bdag blo gzhan 'gyur smos ci dragos bram ze chen po de lta mod kyi/ bdag gis gnas su skyod bskyed pa'i//
bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs n/ ma dang bral ba'anyon mongs pa// 'di dka dzilar gnas snyam chod// gzhen shin tubasdu yod bas// bus pa btang la bdag min zhes//
kha cig bdag la 'phur 'ong gis// bram ze bdag nikhridan lags/ de nas bram ze des/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// kyi rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po
chen po riges su skyes pa sa 'di thams cad du lon dan krakas pa srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ bkur
stas sbos kyi glangabo tshalta bu/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ glo bur ba dang/ skya bo blam lamachod pa dang/ bkren ba dang/ mgon med pa dang/ 'phongs pa rnams yongs
'dzan pa// thams cad kyir ga yongs su rdzogs par byed b/ mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa mad pa 'am/ las kyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa'i m/
mthong na don med pa 'am/ re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bru'abras med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni mi ma yin te/ khyod kyis mngado zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo yang
la rab kun tu rtog pa'i tshubatab na myur du ldog par 'gyur ro/ debs na khyod kyis bdag gi re ba yongasasu kas par byas tekatang ba'i rigs so// byang chub sems dpas smras
pa bram ze gal tede ltan yongs su ka dang ngo// donas bus pa kazhon nu khyed kyis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo ginas/ snying d+harjeskad dung zhing thal mo gnyis sbyor
nas/ thams cad sgrol gyi rkang pa kanyis 'gadugs te smras pa/ yabacig yum nimamachis pa'i/ khyod nibadag nyaka stsol bzhed pa// re zhig ngamatho gyu'anas// de nas bor
cag stsal du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal kyis ngo zum kanag cinge/ mchima'adzaka bzhin dganyis la 'khyudanas smras pa/ bu ka rje
nga yi snying dumi sdug man// snyingabartse sAng+ge rje med min te// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyi// yon tan mthongs khadang ba yin// ci nas ngo yis byang chub mchog/ zhi ba
rang gis thob nas ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i// rten mdu 'jig rten rnams bsgral lo// de nas bus pa gzhon nungu ngag gis las snying nas/
yongs su btang ba'i blo rige nas/ phu'i rkangapa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas snying rje rje skad dang sna bab pa'itshig gis dal bus smras pa/ gal te khyod kyis thag bkuman/
ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi 'phrin/ khyod kyis bzodapa mdzod cig skyes// yab cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol// yab gzhan ang/ byis par gyur pas blamakhyod lanongs
pa bgyis pa gang// gal te la la' thugs la mi 'bab tshig 'ga' smras pa 'am// gus par snyan pas yongs su mnyes pa 'de du ma bkyis pa// de ni byis ba'i nangs pa lags
shes bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces smras nus/ la la phyag 'tshal de lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ mig mchims gang bzhenadu blam la smra bar yid la chags pas/
ang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsnye gnas de nas kha byung ste song ngo// de nas byang chub sams dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blong nas/ yid kyis
byang chub tu smon lam bda' ste/ dka' thub kyi mi'i spyil bur bzhugs so// byis pa gzhon nu ngasha dongs thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu
tsha00 gzhos so// lha stong phrag du ma yang bar snang la ha co dang ga zha'i sgra 'byin cing/ a ma'i rab sbyin bdag nyid na// bus pa 'di kanyis btang nas kyang// gang gi ming 'gyuramed/
pa de la nges pa chad gcig go/ dran s rgyugs sbyin m rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te bsti gnas legs su chas ba las/ sa tshathang du g.yos pa des myur ba kho nar bsti gnas
de nyed du song ba dang/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa// rgyags sbyia byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyuradu 'ong ngo snyam nas/ song mo
zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkaka nas 'dun pa dang/ de nas rgyugs sbyin ms smas pa/ ridags rgyal bo'i chung ma bsgrig bsgog ma// khyod na ci ste lam bkag 'dug par byed/
gal te bdag na mi 'phyo bo nazhen// lam las bzung te myur du 'gro bar gyi// khyod kyang ni dgas rgyal po'i chung ma la// bdag kyang ma a dbang po sang ga yi// btsun mo yin
bas chos kyi sbunagyur gyis// ri dgas rgyal po'i chung mas bdagrwa lam bya// de skadarus sbas pa dang/ ri dgas kyi rgyal mo de lam de nas legs shig tu song ngo/ dngos
rgyags sbyin masaM bkami shis ba'i ltas dag mthong nas/ yud tsam zhig bsams pa/ ji ltar ber snang la dung mo'i sgra grags pa dang/ ji ltar yang tshalan gnas ba'i lha rnams mya ngan byed/
dpa'i sgra grag pa las na gdonami za bar bsti gnas su ma legs pa zhiko byung bar gyur te snyan nus sbas pa/ ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang// jiltar/
bya skad 'byin pa dang// ji ltar bdag ni dgas pa las// bus pa da gnyes btang ba nges// jiltar sa 'di g.yos pa las// bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang dziltar lus
kyang rma ba las// bus pa de gnyis bdang bar nges// zhes de lta bu'i legs pa brgya stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas/ bste gnas su zhugs te mi dga' bzhin bltasan
bu de gnyis ma mthong nas donas rmongasangashing snying 'dar nas/ bas gnas kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin ngu sams te/ phyogs 'din na gshenaunag po sronge o dang lhan cig ri dgas kyi phrug gu dang rtag tu
rtse tsa/ 'di na de gnyis kyi sa rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin// 'dinadi gnyes kyi rtsod mo' byed yin/ degs ni mi snang na gal te 'gan bdag gis ma mthong gi/loma'i sngole bar
zhugs nas 2lalta srid dam snyam du de ltar snying la ra zhing bu mthong bar 'dod pas/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas/ mig mchims gang bzhin du khyim thab kyi rkang pa gnyis la
gtugs te sbas pa/ rdza'i sras khye'u dang bumo gnyis gang dumachis/ thams cad sgrol kyis smras pa/ kho bo'i drung du bram za zhig/ dbas yang dag 'ongs gyur nas/ (bus pa de gnyis de la
[n]0 byin/ de la rjes su yi rang rigs/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ rgyags sbyin ma ringags mo mda' dug can zhig gis phog pa bzhin du sa la 'gyel nas/ nya tshu'i gnas nas phyung ba bzhin du'i/
'aldog par byed/ khrung khrung bu stor ba bzhin du ni snying rje rje skad dungu 1 bde'i ba bzhin ngan ba'i sgra tshogs 'don zhing smras pa// pad+ma gzhon nu lta bu'i byad bzhazhecan/ lag ba papa'i
'dab ltar gzhonasha nA/ bdag gi bu gat+tis sdug bsngal ma myong/ 'gro ba gang du song nas sdug bsngal gyur// ri dgas bu ltar drang zhing bdags mig ridzugs lhan cig bste gnas
dga' dga' na// derang bdag gi bu gnyis ji ltar gyur// gzhan kyi dbang gis dang zhing sdug bsngal gyur// mig mchi mas gang ba'i mig gis ni// snying rjes du ba shin dusdug bsngal
brda 3de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas// skya bo bkran pa'inang na sdug pas 'tsho/ dwaganyis bdag gi pang nas bskyed bskyod pa// zas su rtsa ba tshe rtog 'bras bu za//
bzod dang gnas pas bla ma brtag dka' ba// bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo// de ka sam dang du bral ba dang// ma lag rnams kyi gzu lum spangs pa las// skye bo
sdug can ngan dang 'phrad gyur nas// bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal le// skom zhinge bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungasan/ dganyis su yi dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur// bran
@#// du gyurapas gdonani bra ba ni// degasanyams thag sdug bsngal yongs su kazir// badrag gi nges par tshobs gzhan dag tu// srog chags sdug pa brgyadabral
ba yi// sIka las shin tu mi bzad 'di'i byas la/ des na ba ba'amadabazhin cho ngas 'debs/ bden tshig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang// sems can kun la langonamanyam gyur pa// bden

tshig des na bdag gi bu gnyis bo// bran du gyur pa las ni thar par shog/ rgyakas sbyin ms bus pa gzhonan de dag gis bskyang tsang bsrings pa'i shing gang yin pa de dka le mkhrib be 'dug pa mthong nas/
snying du sdu gnas 'khyud de smras pa/ bus pas la ba chungadus chu bcus pa'i// lam rnams las thigs pa 'dzag pa yi// ljon shin rnams ni sams dang bcas pa bzhin// nus pa nu zho
ma blud lta bur du/ yang bus pa gzhon nu dekanyes dang rtse rtse ba'i ri dgas kyi phrug gu bsti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dga' ste snying rje rje skad kyi tshig gis dal bus smras pa/ ngaye
nyi'u zla mthong bar 'dod pa gang// gnas ma tshugs mtshon sungatshol byed pa/ ridakas phrug gu sgrub 'di dag kyang// bdag gi sdug bsngal m chung gzhan yin no// de nas bus pa kAnyen
nga ngag lam gang nas deng ba'i lam der rjes bcad pa da bus ba gzhen nudagany+dzas kyi rjes drang por ma byungag kya kyus gang bar mthong selhag par yang sdug bsngal bgyis gdungs nas sa ba
[z/ ]ji ltar thon pa'i rjes byung dang/ la lara myur du song ba las/ dbartags te byed par gdon mi bra// kye ma bram ze brtse med mchog/ makul ni dbugs kyis brdzangs shing skad kyang 'dzer/
ma mchu mdzes pa 'dar zhing badrag gi 'u// ri dgas bzhin du mig kyang ga rigs/ rkang pa 'jam pos jeltar song zhig gu/ denus byang chub sems dpas dad ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i
badraganyid de mthong nas// mi rtag panyid dang ldan pa tshig de dang de dag gis rnam grangs mang por go bar byas nas smras pa/ kho bos bu gnyis krakas pa yis// bdangabasam yin snga bas
min sems na kun laphan don du/ kadang bar dka' ba'i bu de btang// mchog tu gtang dka'i bdag nyid dang/ bu dang chungam rnams btang nas// sems dpa' chen pos
tshul bzhin du// byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rgyugs sbyin bdag gis gtong ba la brten gtang dka' ba'i// bus pado/nyes 'jig rten thar pa'i don du btang/ bdagadang chung
ma bzhon dang nor yang btang byas te/ kun l thams cadragatong ba'i blo gros nga la yod// nas rgyakas sbyin mas sems brtan te/ byang chub sems dbar la sgras pa/ khyod la bar chad
ma bgyid kyis// khyod blo kazhan ngum gyur cig/ gal te bdag kyang stsol bzhedan// dokas ba med par bdag stsol cig/ gzhan yang/ dpa' bo kang phyir nyid kyi mi/ sdug pas/
chags pa btang ba yis// dond myur du thob nas ni// srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzod// denus byang chub sems dpas rang gi lus lus bla gos/
phud de/ rgyugs sbyin ma la snas pa/ cingadre gnyis la byams pa mad snyamo ma/ 'ab spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kas te khrag byung ba la ltos/lha rnams kyi bang po brgya byin gyis
bsams pa/ bskol ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la dga' bas/ gal te'aga' zhig gis rgyashas sbyin m bslangs de nga la byin nagayog byed ba med par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams
nas bdag nyid bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi cha byad dang sprul nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/ grogs kho g.yog byin ci'o// byang chub sems dpar smras pa/ bajag la ga yog
ga la yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rgyags sbyin min cika/ byang chub sems dbar rgyags sbyin ma'i gdong du brtag par brtsams pa dang/ rgyugs sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa'i
bsam pa shes nas sbas pa// rdza'i sras gal de khyod kyis bdaganyed gtangan stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' snas pa/ bram ze khyod la sbyin no// de nas lha rnams kyi robang po brgya
byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u cha byad mi snang bar byas nas/ rang gi mkhyad du 'dug nas smras pa/ drang srong bdag ge rgyugs sbyin m 'di khyodal bcol kyis/ khyod kyis su la yang ma phyin cig/
ba/ rgya kas sbyin ms brgya byin gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs de smras pa/ ko'u shi ka nas kyang bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis brananyid dumi 'gyur ba de ltamadzod cig/ lha rnams kyibang po brgya
byin kyis de bzhin dubya'o zhes smras nas/ nyid mi snang bar gyur to// nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bus pa gzhon khyer ba'i khrom zi ji ltar thams cad kyi grong rdal du'atshong bar

brtsams pa de ltar rmongs par byas so// de gnyis rgyal po'i zhishas 'tshob rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/bus pa nag po dang dra ba can nubram za zhiko tshong dus na
'tshong zhing amis lags so// des baskob/ shes ldan dag deng la khrid de shaka cika/ dganyis khrid de 'ongs pa dang/ rgyal pos srang la gzhal dumanyam du gas sra kyis blus so// rgyal po des

thon bo rnams la bsgo pa/ shes ldan dag gang zhig khye'u dang bu mo dang yongs su gtong b.rubyed ba de la gzhan yongs su gtang bar mi bya brtsi yod/ gzhon nu de khu kacig dang/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
la dbang byed du gzhug go/ blon po rnams kyis de dka' thub kyin gs nas bkug ste/ de rgyal po'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhakranas/ dus grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi khang pa
brtsigs nas lo mang po dang/ lakhargya phrag mang po dang/ la stongaphrag mang po dang/ le brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te/ des bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin gyi
@#/// phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ byang chub bsod nams don gnyer bas// dag sbyong rnams dang bram ze dang/ dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung
po la// 'jigs bamed bar sbyin pa byin// gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang// rta dang nor bu rgya naMms dang// de bzhin las drag byed pa'i bran/ tshul khrim ldan pa rnams la sbyin//
chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// bu dang bu mo yongs btang bas// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// mi yis dgu pa 'thob par 'gyur// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dusan rgyal po

thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis bu dngachung ma longs su btang ba deganyen zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar ma blta ste/ 'on kyang nganyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes
bya bder gyurd sa ldan bu dang chung ma yongs su btang ngo// rgyal po chen po ngas bu dang chung ma yongs su bar ngab des/ bla mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod
kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang sbyin pa don bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub kyi tsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsaka yin no// rgyal bo chen po gzhan yang ngas tha

named ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nangu gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin bdag byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa nyin cika/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba wA ra Na si zhes bya ba'i gro khyer du rgyal
0 po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/ de'abyor pa dang/ rgyas ba dang zhes bya banas/ chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o/ jitsam naltas mkhan dag gis
ra NA sir lo bcu gnyis su char pa tsho'abab bo zhes lung bstan to// de nas rgyal bo tshangs sbyin kyis rang gi yul du dril sgrogs su bcug pa 'i yul na gnas b.rigs ldan grong khyer ba dag rten tsako/
ltas mkhan dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan gyis/ khyed cag las kyang drag la lo bcu gnyis su bza' ba yod pa de rnams ni 'dug tsako/ gzhan rnams ni bza' ba
dang bdung ba mod pa'i tshul du dengs shika/ 'alekas par gyur dang sur yang shog nyike/ de'i tshe wAr NA sa'i grong khyer na khyim bdun bdag 'dum byed ces bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba/
las spyod cheb/ yongs su bzung ba/ yangs shing rgya chab ] rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan po/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran ba zhig kun s so// samanganobakuka ste snas pa/ kyenang
rjebang ba na bdag 'khor gyi skya bo dang bcas pa lo bcu karnyes kyi rgyags thub pa yod dam/ 'on te mad/ des smras pa/ jo bomachis so// donas khyim bdag 'jug byung khor dang bcas bzhi
'dug go/ skyo bo'i tshogs kazhan ni bza' ba btung bamed pa'i yul du dong ngo// sangs rgyas 'byung bamed pa ni 'jig rten durang sangs rgyas man pa dang na pa la snying brtse ba can( bas mtha'i
[r}]shu@#// gnas mal dag la dga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ tsam na wA rANA si de'i phyogs gcig tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas
so/ ' phyogs kazhan zhig tu yang rangasangs rgyas lnga bcu'o/ de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po ka snga dro sham thams bkos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te khyim bdag 'dum byed
ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang khyim bdashu 'dum byed la 'di skad ces snus so/ khyim bdag khyod kyis rab tu byung ba lnga brgyal la khaMcu gnyis su bsod snyoms 'bul nus sam/ das smras pa//
'phags pa dag razhig mang la rmas te bgyi'o// des man bkug ste smras pa// nang rje bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ rab dubyang ba lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub
par yod dam/ des snas ra/ dzabo mchis so// de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs so/ jitsaman phyi dro'i dus su rangasangs rgyas lnga brgya po kazhan yang lhags
nas khyim bdaka'adum byed l/ khyim bdag rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya bo 'di dag la khyod kyis le bcu kanyis su bsod snyoms 'bul bar nus sam zhes bslangs pa dang/ nges sbas pa'i phags pa
padag khyed cag la g.yar gyis blangs lags na/yang bsang 'tshol/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag dedag kyang gzhan la/ bdag cag kyang gzhan yin no/ sa smras pa//
'bakas pa dag gal te daldan razhige man la rmas te bgyi'o// des mkhan bkug ste smras pa/ kye nang rje bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ rab dubyung ba stong gi le bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub par yod/
ma/ des smras pa/ jo bo mchis so// de de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po rnams la khas blangs te zhus ba/ khyed nyaka gi jus kangalags/ de rnams kyis smras pa/
u tshegs ma yol ba'o// de nas khyim bdge 'dun byed kyis sbyin pa'i khang ba brtsigs nas sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa mi ldog kyang bskos/ dus tshod brjod pa dag kyang bskos te/ des a rir/
zhing rang sangs rgyas stong la bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug go/ mu ge de yang lo bstung ma kho nar bar ye mchan gnas / de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas rnams la zhus ba/ 'phags pa dag lhas/
char 'bebs par 'gyur a/ char 'bebs par 'gyurar/ badrag gis sa bon stsalalam/ thob cig/ de dag gis sa bon btab bo// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni
'og tu 'jug pa yin gyi// des bsams pa/ 'jig rten na yona gnas gang ji snyad pa de rnams kyikachog ni rang sangs rgyas rnams yin la/ sbyin badag gangaji snyad pa de rnams kyi mchog ni khyim bdag
'dus byed yin gyis/ bsha gis 'di dag gi grogs bya'o snyam nas/ nag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang po chen po'i char phab ba dang/ le dog de rnams sku bar skyas so// de nas
[~ ]@#// skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis/ rang sangs rgyas rnams la zhus pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gi lo tog bskrun ba gang lags pa de dag sku bar skyes par gyur/ de la ji/
ba ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de rnams kyis smras ba[ ]ma bcad par skrun cika/ de rnams kyis boskrun b.las ga dog dang 'bras bu rdzu ma'i tshad tsam chags so// de nas de rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas dung
la rgyas par smras pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma gcad tsaka dang/ rang nyid smin nas gas par 'gyur ro// ji tsam na de rnams smin nas gas pa dang/ gang gis sa bon ji lta bu btab pa de'i
pa khon lta bu sha stag gis kang bar gyur to// de nas u ga rgyun chad nas lo lakas par gyur nas/ yul phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogos dang/ srog chags gang dag mu ges 'jigs skrag
nas dong ba rnams kyang yul wA ra NA sir 'ongs so// de nas mu ke rgyun chadanas 'phags par gyur nas/ khyim bdag 'dum byed kyis den rang sangs rgyas stong la katsung zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang
bca' ba sna tshokas dang/ tshod ma dodang ldan ba rnams kyis tshim par byas te/ tshigs su bcad desmas pa/ blo ldan makhas pas nor dang ni// dad pa shes rab rud nas nii/ skyes bu nga yis
rtag par yang// 'dod chags bral la yon dbul lo// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dogaldan zhing grags ldan pa'i// brtan rnams gang gis bshos gsol pa// nga yi 'gas na bde
ba 'phel/ de ltar tshul khrims phun tshogs pa'i// yon gnas dag la yon phul na/ 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// bde ba dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// rgyal bo chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na// byis

bdag 'am byed ces bya bar gyur pa gang gis mu ga 'khobcu gnyis su byung ba na/ rang sangs rgyas stong la bsod snyoms sbyar zhing/ de'i grogs lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byas pa de gzhan zhig yin/

snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag 'dum byang cas bya ba der gyur de/ nganyid kyis nganamu ga le bcu gnyis su byung ba na/ rang sangs rgyas stong la bsod/

snyoms sbyar bas/ nga'i grogs lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kyis byas so// rgyal po chen po nga'i sbyin pa 'am sprin pa'i bgo bsha' des/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob snyam na/
khyed kyis doltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyutsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no// sdom la/ sprin shukas dpang po
sbrul maka gnyis// de bzhin chu srakasane tso dang// ston mo rus sbal sde bzangs dang dadapon tshogs su bsdus pa yin// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang ngag pa

rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cika/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun nor tshol ba rab tu mang bo ngag tshig rgya
mtsho'i gru bo chibasgrubs te/ rgya mtshochen khor 'jug par 'dod nas/ donams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dug bdag cag mtsho chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta ste/
gcig la gcig phan thogs par mngon ba med kyis ]ma la bdag cag nor tshol pa rnams so sonas 'phongs pas na/ shes ba rkyal gyi cha spyad dag khyer te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug bar bya'o zhes/ daltar chos
bcas na nor tshor ba rnams so so nas 'khongs pa na dgos pa rkyal gyi chepyad/ kha cig gis ni shing shal ma la'aspang leb kha cig gis ni ras rgyunang dras na/ kha cig gis ni sku ba brgyus pa/

kha cig gis ni ra rkyal khyer te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs sa/ da rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang/ rlu srin lta'i rigs kyis mtsho'i thu bo chu bshig ga gru bo tshabashig pa dang/ do rnams

skyal ba re'i lazhen te chu ji lta ba bzhin du khyer tadong ba las de rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rlung byang phyogs nas langs te/ des lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang de na bu med/
gzugs bzang mo mdzes ma blta na sdug pa dgu yod de/ do dag gis 'di skad ces smras so job dag tshur spyon/ bzhin bzongs drag chur spyon/ bdag cag rje bo mamachis pa rnams kyi jibo
pa/ nga khyim thabs mamachis pa rnams kyi khyim thabs dang/ gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas gling mamanyiso pa rnams kyi gling dang/ mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang/ skyabs ma mchis/

[zl]pa rnams kyi skyabs dang/ rtenamamachis ba rnams kyi rten mdzodicig/ 'di dag ni khyed kyi bras kyi khang pa dang/ skom gyi khang ba dang/ gos kyi khang ba dang/ gnas mal gyi khang ba drang/ dga' bar 'gyur
ba 'akun dga' rab dang/ dga' bar 'gyur 'tshal dang/ dga' bar 'gyurab 'i rdzing dang/ 'dzam bu'i glingagi rin pa che rab tumang po 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang mu tig dang/ pa cha dang dung dung/
man shel dang/ byu rudang/ dngul dang gsaradang/ rdo'i snying bo dang/ sdug dang/ pad+ma' ga dang/ dung g.yas su 'khyil ba dag lags kyi/ khyodatshur spyon/ badrag cag dang lhan cig turtsod/
mo bgyi/ draga' bar bgyi dga' dgur spyad par bgyi'o// khyed cag las su yang smos kyang lho phyogs kyi lam dum bzhud cig/ deg bud med de rnams dang lhan cog rtsa bar byed dgo'apar byed/

gar dgur spyod par byed de/ de dag nge rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu pho dang bumo dag btsas so// de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhig
'di snyam du sems de/ 'i phyir budamad de drag gis lho phyogs kyi lam lcaka bar srung bar sems/mal bdag gis bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba dmal du gnyid log par rig nas/ bags kyis ngal
bu dal bus mal nas bebs la/ lho phyogs kyi lamadu 'gro'o snyam nas/ de de ltar nges par byas nas bud mdagang dang lhan cig nyal ba ngo gnyid kyis log par rig nas/ bags kyis dal bu dol
ubya/ bus mal nas babs te/ ral gri rnon bo mchan du thogs nas lce phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang/ don skya ba'i tshogs chen po sgo sngags 'don pa'i sgra/ kyi hud la/ kyi hud
kyi bud sringamo kyi dud sngan/ kyi hud 'dzam bu'i gling bkra bas spangs sam/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na skyed ces sgra 'byin pa dag thos so// thos nas kyang de 'jigs par gyur//

rmongs par gyur/ skyi bung zhes byed par gyur to// de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin na des/ 'a gos pa dang skye byung zhes byed de/ shin tulegs par bstsal nas/ lho phyogs kyi lam nga kho na'i rjes

su song ba dang/ des den lcags kyi mkhar chen po mtho nango chag zhika mthong nas sa grong khyer de'i mtha' kho ra khor yun du bskor na/ nas kyang sgo cung zad cig rnyed grang snyam nas/ das grong khyer de'i

mtha' kho ra khor yug tu bskor ba dang chung dun byi la lam sbrul 'dzul ba'i sgo tsam yang ma rnyed do// dungashing shi ri sha zhes bya ba sbom la ring ba zhiga mthong nas/ nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can

dzes shing shi ro ngesha de la bags kyis dal bu dal bus 'dzegs nas/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan ngag 'o phru kyi hud ma/ kyi hud pha/ kyi hud sring mo kyi nyung spyan

kyi rgyud 'dzam bu'i glingo bkra bas sngarngas samaM/ 'diltar 'adzam bu'i glingewa ra skyod ces shin tu sna sngags 'dono/ nganams kyis smras pa// kun ng rje bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun nor tshol ba ba
[tumang bo dag gag rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te/ rgya mtshon por 'jug par 'dod pa las/ bdag cag 'di snyam du sems te shes ldan dag bangag can rgya mtshon por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta ste/

gcig la gcig phan 'dogs bar mngon po med kyi ma la bdag cag noratshol kha rnams so so nas 'khongs pa zhu dgos pa rkyal kyi cha byad dag khyer da rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o zhes/ de ltar chas ba
nas nor tshol ba rnams so so nas 'thongs pan dgos pa rgyal kyi na byed/ kha cig gis ni shing shal ma la'i spang leb/ khacig gis ni sa skya nang ngas u kha cig gis sku brgyus pa/ thacig

gis ra rkyal khyer du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// bdag cag rgya mtshochen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang/ tshusrin lta'i rigs kyis gru bo tsho bshika ko/ gru bo che ba shAkenas bdag cag rkyal pa re re la zhen te
chu ji lta ba bzhin khyer te dong ba las/ bdag cag gi las kyi rnam par smin galas byung ba'i rlung byang phyogs nas las te/ des bdag cag lce phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang/ don budamed shazugs
bzang mo mdzes ma blta na sdug pa ngasha yod de/ de dag gis 'driskad ces smras so// jobo dag tshur spyon/ bzhin bzangs dag tshur spyon bdug ga jo bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang/
khyim thab ma mchis pa rnams kyi khyim thab dang/ gzhas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas dang/ glingam mchis ba rnams kyi gling dang/ mgon mamachis pa rnams kyi mgon dang/ skyabs mamachis pa
rnams kyi skyabs dang/ rtenamamachis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cig/ 'di dag ni byed kyi zas kyi khang pa dang/ skom gyi khang ba dang/ gos kyi khang pa dang/ gnas mal gyi khang ba
dang/ dga' bar 'gyurab 'i kun dga' ra ba dang/ dga' bar 'gyurab 'itshol dang/ dga' bar 'gyur pa'i rdzong dang/ 'brog bu'i gling gi ni po che rab dumang bo 'di lta ste/ nor budang/ mu tig
dang ba rgudang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byu ru dang dngul dang/ gsar dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ spug dang pad+mar gdung/ dung g.yas su 'khyil ba drag lags kyis khyed
tshur spyon/ bdag cakra dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi/ dga' bar bgyi/ dgu' dgur spyad par bgyi'o// khyed cag las su yang smyosakyang lho phyogs kyi lam dum bzhudacig bdag cag bud med de
dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dka'o gur spyod par byad de bdag cag dadrag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga'o dgur spyod par byed pa las khyo ru dang bu mo dag

btsus te/ ji srid 'dzam bu'i gling ni don mthun pa gzhan rnams kyi rgya mtsho'i gru bo che zhig go zhes m thos ba de srid du bungamed de dag drang bdag cag lhan cige rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ ga' dgur spyod

paN+NaM par byed pa las/ gang gi tsho bud med rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab dumang po gzhan dag kyang rgya mtshonapo'i dbus su phyin pa dang/ chu srin nya'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gru bo'i bshig go zhes
0thos nas/ zhus bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs de 9cig ni zos so// skyes pa za bar byed pan lhag rdol skya 'am/ spu'am/ sen mo ma[ ]so lus pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang ma lus pa tha
bdabyang ngo// de rnams za bar byed pa na khrag dron po'i thigs pa sa la lhung ba gang dag yongan yang/ de dag kyang sogo rtsa mo rnams kyis bud de sa rung bcas par bar 'jug par byed do// bdag cagal
cigen lcags kyi mkha' 'dir bcug go/ kye dang rje 'di dag nama'i bud mang ma yin te/ srin mo yin gyis 'di dag las bdag nyid srungs cig deskad ces smras pa dang/ tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can/
kyis/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kang gisan khyed cag dang bdag cagacigs pa dbang bar 'adzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs 'ga' ni yong/ de rnams kyis 'di
skad ces smras so// rkyenang rje re zhig bdag cag gang gis na/ legs pa bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin pa'i gyur ba'i thabs nicung zad kyang kho bo cig la med de/ ci'i phyir zhan gal de bdag
cag gis 'di snyam du/ kyim bdag cag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'di las brgal de 'bros so snyam du bsams na/ de'is 'gyur ram sum 'gyur gyis mthon por 'gyur ro// kal debadag cag
gis 'di snyam du/ kyam bdag cag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'di'i go phug ste 'bros so snyam du bsams na/ de'anyis 'gyur ram rtsisum 'gyur gyis zhing du skye bar 'gyur te/ ltar
zhig bdag cagalegs pa dang bde gar 'dzam bu'i gling duphyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs bdagacag lamed do// 'on kyang gangagis na khyed gan slar legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bgyur

ba'i thabs yod de/ 'dzin bdag cag gi bar snang la chub lha rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun pa rnams gso sbyong bcolnga pa de 'de la/ byang phyogs kyi gsob 'am gangan pa'i rgyal po sngon gyi shugs
can n rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu ba ba bdad dang/ nadamed pa dang/ stobs dang ldan pas dbang po rnams tshim ba/ mgo 'phas bstod de/ pha rol du 'gro bzhi su yod/ suniya rol tubakra

su'adzam bu'i glingedulegs pa dang bde bar phyin par bya zhes/ chadubarjod pa ched du brjod pa yod par 'gro ba'i byis pa'o zhes sgra 'byin par thosakyis/ khyod de'i drung dudangal/'disad ces bdag cag pha rol tumachig nag cag ra

bdagacagal rol dubakra zhing legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin pa mdzad du gsol zhes smras shig/ de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/ skyabaratshogs chen po des smas pa shin tulekas par bzung ste/

chub par byas nas/bags kyis dal bu dul bus shi shi shalas babs nas/ g.yas phyogs kyi lam de 'ad du song ste/ bum gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de mal naganyid kyis leg par go nas/bags kyis dal burngal busal/

lo// de nas tshong ba mkhas pa'i rangabazhin can kyis/bod kyimtshan mo 'das pa dang/ nang par sngar langs nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab mang po gang ba der song ste byin pa dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun ba

[. ]tumangapo rnams la 'di skaces snas so/ shes ldan dag zhig gang na skye mos tshal dben pa yod pa zhig tu shog thig dang/ kho bo khyed cag dang lhan cig gsang ste gleng dgos pazung zhig yod kyiso/ khyed su yang smos kyang/

khyab 'am bu mo ni khrid de ma 'ongazhig shes ldan dag de bzhin du bzhi' zhes/'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tumang po rnams kyis anapo// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun 'ab dumang po rnams skye mos chel ba

du dben pa gang na ba der dong ba dang/ de nas tshong bamebs pa'i rang bzhin can gyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam drisang glengs pa de dag/'dzam bu'i gling gi nomathun rab dumang po rnams la rgyus par smras nas/'di

skad ces kyang smras te/'di shani bud med a lane te/'di d gnas aMnemo yin gyis/ shes ldan daka'adilas bdaganyid bsrung bar gyis shig/ de nas 'dzam bu'i klong gi don mthun pa mang po rnams de bzhin dugs sbyong bco lnga pa de

la/ byang phyogs kyi gsang lam gangan ja'i rgyal po sprin kyi shugs can ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu bra ba/ bde ba dang/ na ma pa dang stobs dang ldan bas dbang po rnams tshim pa// mgo 'phang bstod de/ pha rol tu

'gro banisu zhig yod(su nipha rol dubakaM/ sunilegs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling duphyin par bya zhes/che dadu brjod pa ched du brjod pa stod bar song ba dang/ tshongab rtarje'i rigs shig gis rta'i rgyal po sngon kyi shugs

can rkyang ring po khong nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab du mang po la 'di skaces smras so// shes ldan daka rta'irgyal po skran gyi shugs can ni la gi yin te/ pha ga'i drung dudong la 'di skadabs ]badzagacag
[pa @/ ]pha rol dumachi'o// bdag cag pha rol tu mchi ste/ bdag cag ba rol du bkrazhing/ bdag cag legs pa dang bde bapa'i dzam bu'i gling dbyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smra'o//

denas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/ donomathun rab tumang po la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag bdag gis ji ltar skya bo'i tshogs chen po des smras pa'i donasho pa ltar/ 'din bangag cag gis
@# rta'irgyal po sprin gyi shukas can de'i drung du donas 'di skad ces ]bdag cag la rol dumachi'o// bdag cag pha rol tumachi ste/ bdag cag tha rol dubakrazhing/ bka tsaka legs pa dang bde ba'adzam

bu'i gling du phyin ba r mdzad du gsol zhes smra ba'i dus la bab pas yin nam/ 'on kyang gang gi tsho rta'i rgyal po skran gyi shugs can gyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu zos nas zhes bya banus/ 'dzam bu'i
gling du phyin par bya zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ dAnibadag cag rta'i rgyal po sngan kyi shugs can kyi drung du song 'di skad ces/ bdag cag la rol du mchi'o// bdag cag pha rol du mi ste/
bdag cag pha rol dubakri zhing/ bdag tsaka legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling duphyin par mdzad ngugasol zhes de skadadu smra ba'i dus la bab pa no/ nas rta'i rgyal bo lan gyi shugs can gyis ma

rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu thos nas zhes bya ba nas/ sun legs pa dang bde ba'adzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes bya ba'i sarakongam bzhin du'o// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi donamathun rab tumang
po bla gos phrag pagacig tugazanas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyarab btung nas 'irgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la
'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag pha rol du mchi'o/ bka cag pha rol du mchisdu/ bdag cag pha rol bokra zhing badrag cag legs pa dang bde bor 'dzam bu'i glingeduphyin par mdzad du gsol/ de nas

rna'i rgyal po sprin kyi shAkas can gyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ngon mthun rab tu mang po la legs par ba du gtams shing rjes su bstan pa/ shes ldan drag bud med de dag lhag pa nga gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par

mdzes pa/ lhag par blta na sdug par byas nas/ khye'u dang bu mo rnams khridad 'ong zhing/ ngonams 'di skad ces ngo bo drug tshur spyon/ bzhin bezangs dag tshur spyon zhes bya ba nas/ bdag cag dang lhanAcig

rtse bar bgyi/ dga' bar bgyi/ dka' dgur spyod bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// na te khyed cag la ka' zhig gis cung zad smras te/ bdag cag mi dgos na rang rang gi bu dag khrid de dengs shig/
sa zer ba la/ khyed cag las gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag gi chung ma 'am/ bu pho 'am/ bulo ma/ dag gi zas kyi khang pa 'am/ skom gyi khang pa ma/ nos de'ang ba 'am/ gnas mal gyi khangang 'am/

dga' bar 'gyurab 'i kun dga' ra ba 'am/ dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing ngam/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nango bo rab tu mang po 'di lta sta nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bai DUr+ya dang zhes bya ba nas/ dung g.yas su 'khyil ba
dazhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin dusams phan chad/ de dag kho bo'i rgyab bam ro stod la zhon yang/ shing tog gis 'bras bu smin pa rtsa ba chud pa bzhin du ltung bar 'gyur zhing/ bud med de rnams

'ongs nas za bar 'gyur te/ do dag skyes bza bar byed pa na/ khrag dron po'i thigs pa sa la ltung bgang dag yin pa de dag kyang somo'i rtse mos sa dang bcas te drung de khar 'dzug go/ khyed cag las gang dag 'di snyam du/

bdag gi chu ma 'am/ bu 'am/ bumo 'am zhes bya bas/ dung g.yas su 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin dumasams na/ de rnams kho bo'i spu'i rtsa mo'i bye ba'i la brten kyang ltang bar mi 'gyur te de dag

legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur// de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshongapa rab tumang po la legs pa rab tu gtams shing rjes su bstananasaM sgrub smad do// de nas

tshu 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong pa rab tu mang pos rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la kha cig ni ro stod du/ kha cig ni rgyab tu/ khacig ni gnya' bar ro/ khu cig ni mjug ma la 'jus so/ de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin
gyi shugs can gyis rim gyis lus kyimakhru dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyang nas/ de nyid nas stong ginam mkha' la song ba dang/ nas bud med lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par

mdzes pa/ lhag par blta na sdug pa rnams kyis khye'u dang bu mo rnams khrid de lhags nas/ 'di skad ces jo bo dag tshur spyon/ bzhan bzas dag tshur phyonazhes byang nas/ bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi//

dga' bar bgyi/ dragar dgur sbyod par bgyi zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'on te khyed cag las 'ga' zhig cung bang smras te/ khemo cag mi dashes na rang rang gi khye'udang bu mo rnams khrid da daa shig ces
zla ba de la gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag gi chu ngan lam/ bu pho 'am/ bu mo 'am/ bdag gi bras kyi khang pa 'am zhes bya ba nas/ dung g.yas su 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i bdagongs bzhin du gams bskyed pa

dgun/ rta'i rgyal po sbrazhigyi shugs can gyi rostodadang rgyab tu zhen yang/ shing tog gi 'bras bu smin pa rtsa ba chad pa bzhin du/ dmas ldan bar gyur pa dang/ bud med de rnams de dag gi drung du drongastaphyin nas bru
bar byed de/ skyes pa rnams za bar byed pa na/ lhag ma lus ba gang zhe ba 'di lta skra kham zhes bya ba nas/ sa dang 'dran m bud de bar 'jug par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du//
gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag gi chungama'/ bdag gi bu pho 'am/ badrag gi bumo 'am zhes bya ba nas ( dung g.yas su'akhyil ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de ltaa sems pa rnams ni 'diltar

lnga'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi spu'i rtse mo'i cha shas la 'jus pa yang legs pa bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par gyur to// rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gang dga' snyam du/ bduganamoge yin no//
mig ni bdag gi yin no// bdag ni rnyeb dang sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid+de gnyeno// yid ni bdag gi yin no// bdag ni gzugs yin no// gzugs nibadag gi yin no/
[p]// bdag ni sgra dang/ dri dang/ rodang/ reg dang/ bdag ni chos yin no// chos ni bdag gi yin no// bdagan se'i khams yin no// sa'i khams ni bdag gi
yin no// bdag ni chu'i khams dad/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ nam mkha'i khams dang/ bdaka ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams na bdag gi
yin no// bdag ni gzugs kyi phung po yin no// gzugs kyi phung po ni bdag gi yin no/ bdag gi tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'dubyed dang badragani rnam par shes pa'i phung po yin
laM no// rnam pa shes pa ni bdag gi yin no snyam du sems na/ de rnams sdug bsngal 'thob par 'gyur te/ srin mo'i nang du tshong pa bzhin/ rgyal po chen bo gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag ni
mig yin no// mig bdag gi yin no zhes bya ba nas rnam pashes pa'i phung po ni bdag gi yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du lta/ de ltar mi samasan/ da rnams bde ba 'thob par 'gyur te
sprin gyi shugs kyis tshong ba bzhin// sangs rgyas lasngan lu skrun pa mo// gang dag dad pa mi byed pa// nganams sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te sinamo'i nang du tshong pa bzhin// shes rab can
gyi mi gang dag/ sas rgyas bstan la dad byed ba/ bde bar pha rol 'gro 'gyur to// sprin gyi shugs gyis tshong pa bzhin rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de de'i dusan rta'i rgyal po

0 sprin kyi shugs can du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar blta ste/ 'on kyang nga re de'i tshe'i dus na rta'i rgyal po sprane kyi shugs can zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po de'i
tshangs sems can la phan pa byas pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa de glen
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgyu ma dang rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don/
du gnyer pa'i phyi'i/ sems can rjes su bzung bar byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cike/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul wA ra NAsi dang hatsang yang mi 'ong bzhig na/ drang srongakhyams ba'i bdag de
snying rdzacan/ sems can la byams pa zhig gnas so/ de'i bsti gnas dang hacang yang mi ring ba zhig ni/ khyim bdag zhing pa gnyis shig zhing rmod pa las/ de gnyis phan tshun rtsod pa
byung bar gyur te/ gcig khros pa dang srog shos kyang smar khros sa/ gcig gis bsgrub pa dang cig shos kyis kyang slar brgyab bo// de gnyis ka yang drang srong gi drung du dang
naso/ drang srong de la gcig gis dpang btsugs pa dang/ ge shes kyis kyang btsugs so// gnyis rgyal bo'i dreng du song ba dang/ rgyal pos dganyis la smras pa/ khyed gnyis la dpang
[s @ ]/su yod/ gcig gis smras pa/ lha bdag la dpang drang srong lags so/ cig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag gi dbang yang kho lags so// de nas rgyal pos drang srong
bos te dris pa drang srong chen po 'diganyis sngar gang gis nyes drang srongagis smras pa// lha gal te 'khorales sgyurab 'i bka' khrims kyis zhal chagacadran/deldan bdag gis dbang bgyi'o//
gzhan du ma lags so// rgyal pos smras ba ( de bzhi n dubya'o// de nas dreng srong gyis smras pa/ lha gcig khros pa dang/ cig shes kyang su khros so// gcig gis brkyang pa dang/
cig shes kyis kyang slar brgyab bo// rgyal pos smras pa/ 'onaganyis ka chud pas cad do// drang srong gis smras pa/ lha khyod la bdag gis sngaralha gal da 'khor los sgyur ba'i bka' khrims kyis zhan
gcad n de lta na bdag gis dpang bgyi'o// gzhan du nam lags so zhus ma gsol lam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i zhal chaji ltar gcod/ drang srong gyis smras ba/

'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po niganod pa las zlog cig/ phanapa la sbyor bar bgyid do// de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ gnyis ka deng la nga shi chad de ltar ma byed cig/ rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dusan drang

srong dgyur pa gangegs chos bzhin gyis dbang byas pa degazhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de lta mibalta ste/ 'on kyang ng nyid de'i de'adus nazhes bya ba nas/ nyid kyis chos bzhin kyis dpang debyas so zhes
bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// rgyal po napo ngas chos bzhin kyis dbang byas pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs so snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta sta/ 'onakyang

sa chos bzhin gyis dbang byas pa de ni blun mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya banas/tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// rgyal bo chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na

med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub donangu gnyer ba'i phyir/ ma nges pa'i phung po la kanas pa na rang gi srog longs su btang nas/ sems can mang po rjes su bzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/
