rgyal po chen po sngon byung bo nags tshang tshong zhigan zhig na seng ge ral pa can zhig gnas so// lam n gnas don mthun lnga brgya tsam dong nas/ dadag gi ca co'i sgras jus bskul bas/ sbrul chen po zhags
ba lta bu zhes bya ba zhig glo bur du langs nas/ nges dzAAmathunatshong dpon dngabacas par bskor ba dang/ danams skrag nas sgra 'byin cing na ba dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan dang/ dbang phyug la
sogs pa lha rnams la gsol btab ba dang/ des seng ge s sgra dathos so// thosanas kyang phyogs de 'ongs pa dang/ jitsamanasprul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhes bya bas nomathun lnga brgyatsam

bskor mthong// de dang tacangayami ringab zhig na glang po'i phug gu zhig kyang rgyu zhing 'dug pa dang/ dade'i drung du song ste smras pa/ grogs po sbrul chen po 'gas pa lta bu zhes bya bas don mthun
lnga brgya bskon/ de rnams kyi don gyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su gtong bar khyo spro ma/ ji lta bu zhagabya/ bdag gi rkang pa khyed kyi klad par bzhag pa/ thal mos
sprul chen po la bsnyen dang/ bdag gi rkang ba brtan pa'i shugs kyis na khyod 'chi bar 'gyur ro// thal lca ga gis ni sbrul le/ sbrul chen po'i kha chu'i reg pas na badrag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur//

rgyu glang po che'i phrug gus de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs nas/ song zhes kyang po che'i phrug gu'i steng du rkang pa bzhag nas thal mas sbyol chen po la bsnun pa dang sang gas rkang pa brten pa'i shug
kyis ni glang bo che'i phrug gu shi/ thal mos kyang sprul chen bo sha sbrul chen po'i las kyang ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge sha ste/ 'gro ba gsum char yang ngo// tshig mthun gyi tshogs chos pa/
dang du lha zhig gis smras pa// bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpas khyed kyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su btang nas skyabs byas kyis re zhig de'i lus la mchod pa byas la phyir dengs shig

denas de rnams kyis de'i rus pa bsregs te rus pa la mchod pa byas so// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na'i dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge zhes bya ba nas/ ngas namathun lnga brgya po de dag sprul chen
po las rang gi srog btang nas thar par byas so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin// rgyal po chen po sa sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba des/ blon med du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob
bo sAmanA/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste zhes bya ba nas ngas sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byungachub kyi rgyu tsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang tshogs tsam
yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma ba zhin na rgyal bo chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ gsod pa la yang byams pa bsgrubs
ba gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal bo chen po sngon byung bunags khrodacig na byang chub sams dba' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pan/ byamago gnyis la sems tha dadung zhig tugyur to// dalaM
gcig ni chos can zhes bya'o// cig shos ni chos []min zhes bya'o/ de tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ chos can gyis bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu zhag zos so// chos min gyis ni dug gi 'bras bu zhig
zos pa las/ gnyis ka ang dug ka mthus kun tu myos par gyur nas/ phan tshun rtsod par brtsams pa dang/ gcig gis leg par smon lam btab pa/ khyed kyi skye ba gang du skyes pa'i skyo ba de
dngade gsod pa dang/ phyi rgol ba dang/ dgra bor gyur cige nyes byas so// cig shos kyis kyang smos pa/ bgan khyod la thams cad du byams pa'i sems dang/ phan pa'i sems dang/
snying brtse ba'i sams su gyur cig ces byas so// rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sams/ de'i tshade'i dus kyi chos can gang yin pa de ni nganyid yin no// chos min gang yin pa da lta byin yin/
[s; ]@#// na/ rgyal po chen po nga'i byams pa'i sams des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i byams pa'i
sams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang/ rgyanatsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no/ 'dul ba gzhi//bam bo zhabargyad
pa// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas mched pa la ngadag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don duganyer ba'i phyir/ sems can gyi skyabs byas pa gang yin pa nge nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon
byung ba chung zhig gi 'gram na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung bo la gnas pan/ chu srogs rnams kyi nang du skyes nas chu srags lnga brgya'i dpon dugyur to// jiman chu srags/
rgan po nog chu srags de rnams kyi sgo nga dngaphrug gu rnams thabs kyis sngar bres nas/ ngal bu dal bus 'chag cing res 'ga' bya bamed pa na/ rkang pa gcige bskums nas 'dug go/ nus chu/
tho srogs de rnams bu dang bral ba lasabyung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas dpon po'i drung du song ste/ rages mthun pa'i skad gnyugams ngu bar brtsams pa dang/ de nas dpon pos rang gi
khyu rnams deltar sdug bsngal bar mthong nas/ nugling kun nas byul khar brtsams pa dang/ chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis rnam par ltung bar 'gyur gyi sams kyis
zhim minebs/ a chusrags rgan po de dal bu dal bus brtag cingebugs gtsugo dusong nas rkang pa gcig btsugs te gnas pa mthong nas (byang chub sems dpa' 'phrigs pa/ 'dzin legyi
rigs kyi phyir rgol bar ngabazhin napa yin no snyam du'a gnas / tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bdug gi sgo nga phrug bu dang/ rus chags rnams kyang khros nasazhi rkang ba gcigebatsugs 'dug pa de//
kyis khyod kyi brtul zhugs yin// kha cig smra ba yang bden te// gom pa sa bus 'dar byed cing// ngal budal bus zla ba dang/ ga2rub gyuragyur byed pa ni/ deninganagayo'imtshanyid yin//
dres bsams paM/ dpon po 'dis ni bdag gi rgyun shes so snyam du rig nas skyabs su song ngo// de nas dpon pos smras pa/ khu gu'am chu srags kyi tshogs rnams 'khrugs par ma gyurapa de'i bar ng
khyodakyi sems 'bar gyis shige de nas chu sngags rgan po de bros nas/ chu srags de rnams bdeb gyur te/ rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus nachu sngags kyi dpon po bde bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig
yin snyam n khyod kyis de ltar mikhal ste/ 'on kyang de de'i tshe de'i dusan nu grags kyi dpon po de gyur to// rgyal bo chen po ngas sems can rjes su bzungab des/ banumed pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis nga ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang ngs soms na rjes su bzung ba ni bla med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs ]
tsam yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyanaba'i phyir/ sam can rjes su bzung bar byas pa gang yin

[gt; ]pa nyan cige/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba nags tshang tshing zhig na/ byang chub gnas ngapa'i m nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa nanatso mi skad smra ba zhig du gyur ro// de'i tshe yul wA ra NA sir rgyal po tshangs
sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug go donas de re zhung rgyal po de'i khang pa'i pu shu'i stongan mib cing rgyal po chen po chos ma yin pas rgyal srid ma mdzad cig
ts+tso ces pa'o// rgyal po de de dang lhan cig gcugs par gyur ba dang/ danas des rgyal po de dka' thub kyi gnas lnga larab dubazhu gnas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byadapa zhugs nas/ ngesa'i

drags dang bya thams cad la mi 'jigs pa byin no// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dusan natso gyurapa dgazhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang ng nyidi de'i tshong dusananatso
mi skad smra ba de yin pa gyur to// rgyal bo chen po ngas sems can la na ba byas pa des banamadad payang ngag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltaa blta ste/ 'on
kyang ngas sems can la phan ba byas pa den/ blan med pa langag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyutsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no/rgyal bo chen po gzhan yang
sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don duganyer ba'i phyir/ gsod ba la byams pa'i sems bskyang ba gang yin ba de nyon cig/ rgyal bo chen po sngon byung ba yul ka shi zhes bya ba na/
rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhige rgyal sring byed de/ de rtag tu lus 'phags kyi yula'adod pa kho na'i phyir/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal bo dang mi mthun par gyur to// lus 'phags kyi rgyal po
ni de bas khyadazhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan yang yul la 'dod bas/ rtag tu byams ba'is mas dang/ phan pa'i sa mas dang/ snang brtsibs gnas so/ 'on kyang sad pas 'khol khas
yul de khon 'dod ba'i phyi'o/ dedapung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dran g.yul sprad pa'i phyire chas so// zhes lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos thos nus/
dpag tshad phyed dang gsum kyi lam stor du bcug ste/ grong khyer dathamasacad rdzob dang/ gseg ma dang/ gyo mo bsal nas/ rgyal mtshan dang ba ngan ni bsgreng/ daragyi cha na'aphyang mang po
sbyangs/ dri zhim po'i pog por ni bshams tsanangan gyi chu'i chaka chag gso btab cinge/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i babra' ba
rab dumang po dag sta gon byas de/ grong mi dang blon po rnams su bkyin s/ mgu bar 'gyur ba brgya phrag dag klungeb thos pa dang/ rgyal bo tshangs sbyin kun nas dkris pa dang bral te/
de nas bsams pa/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la so sor yang dag par duga' ba'agyur ba zhig byas te/ slar ldog go snyam du bsams nas/ lus 'phags/
kyirgyalapo'i drung du song ba dang lus 'phags kyi rgyal bos bkur sti chen pos bsunas niang duwid de kho zas bsod pa rnams kyis tshim par byas nas tshigs sukhacad de smras pa/ rgyal
dbang bdag la bzod par mdzod/ khyod la bdag ni rtag tu 'dud/ bangagazhi grogs por gyuralags nA// khyod kyis bdag la brtse ba'adzod dres kyang tshigs su bcad ng smras pa/
bzod pa la ni gzhu brdungs nas/ khro dang nga rgyal 'dzoms pa yi/ yon tan ldan pa'ima' gcig gis// khyod kyis bdag sug ril bcom mo// dunas ngeganyis 'an tshun yid gcugs
par rgyunas rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang rangag yul du song ngo/ de lus 'phags kyi yul mi rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bral bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na lus 'phags kyi
rgyal po gyur pa degazhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta sta/ nganyid de'i tshe de'i dus na lus 'phags kyi rgyal po de yin par gyur to// rgyal bo chen po ngas mid kyi dregs pa bcom

pa res bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste// 'on kyang nga'i yid kyi dregs pa bcom po ni// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
07 kyi zhes bya bas/ tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya pa'i bar gongam bzhin no/ rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/
sems can gyi don chen po byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig rgyal po chen po sngon byung bakhyung bas/nas dpa' m nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na/ rgya mtsho'i rus sbal gyi dpon po zhig tu gyur to/
ji tsam na ded dpon 'khor lnga brgyanor tshel ba zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas rgyalatshon por zhugs pa las/ ji tsaman gru da nusrana'i rigs kyis bshig nas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal

bar gyur to// de nas rus sbal des tshong pa lnga brgya rgyab tu nyonanas mtsho chen po las bsgral la// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgya mtsho'i rus sbal gyi dpon por gyur pa da gzhan zhig yin
snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgya mtsho'i rus sbal gyi dbon po der gyur/ rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rjes su bzung bas bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltami blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas sems na rjes su bzung ba banamang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub kyi zhes bya ba nas/
tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bdagongam bzhin// rgyal po chen bo gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ soms can la phan pa
[s gi. ]/byas ba gang yin bdenyon cig/ rgyal bon po sngon byung ba lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po lnga brgya byung ba las/ ngan sngan dang sde bzangs zhes bya ba spun
gnyis shig blonapo'i gtso bo byed pa las/ sngo can gyis sde pazangs la rtag tu klan katshol zhing gnodapa byob la zhugs so// sde bzangs ni de la rtag tu phan par bya ba la zhugs so// rgyul
po'i blon bo dang grong rnams kyis kyang sngabazaTas kyichadang lce can dang sdums byas kyang/ gnas skabs thams cad du gnod ba byed pa las ldogam bab bo// de nas lus 'phags kyi
rgyal pos mang po zhig sbyos nas yul nas bskrad do// de ltar cha sor song nas rgyal bo tshangs sbyin gyis blon po'i gtso bor bcug go/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na 'bar ku'ado zhes/ nubo
sde bzangs kyis thos nas/ rgyal bo la gsol babyas te wA rANAsirisong nas ga phya ba dang/ skya ba'i tshogs chen pos snga bablangs 'di lta bu gang gis na mthus bu kho lang ba'akhu ba'i rigs na/
snying rje dang ldan pa 'dis de'amog phya'o zhes/ sde bzangs lasems dga' bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po'i gtso lo snga 'brangs zhes bya bar gyur ba dregazhan zhig yin
snyam nazhes bya bzhas/ 'on kyang sa sems can rjes su bzung bzhi/ banamed pa yad drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas/ tshogs tsam yin nozhes bya ba'i bar go ma bzhin ngu'o/
rgyal bo chen bogazhan yang ngas bla nemad pa yang dag par rdzogs parubyang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyi'i sems can rjes su bzung bar byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po
sngon byung ba tshong khang zhig na nged dpon gnyis shig gnas ba las/ de gnyis shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang 'tshong la dgon pa'i lam zhig tu zhugs pa dang/ dganyes 'di snyam dusams tre bdag
cag dgon pa'i nang nas 'dod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gcig la gcig phan 'dogs par mngon bamang kyis ma la bdag cag gis shing rdapa'i 'gron par ba gnyis su bcad l/ dgon pa'i lam
du 'jug bar bya'o snyam nas/ dganyis kyis shing rta pa'i 'gronapa rags gnyis su song nas/ dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so// de ded dpon gcig nishing rta pa lnga brgya dang dgon pa'ilam
gyimako na 'dug go/ da dpon cig shos ni shing rta pa lnga brgya dang dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so// ded dpon gyi go tshong pa'imadun nas 'gro bas skyes bunag po chage chel dmarab/ bong bu'i
shing rtar zhugs la// 'khor lo rab kyis log pa/ gos cha na ba sku gshar b/ me tog ku mu da'a'abrang bsamago bobacings pa// mgo 'drenadang dukyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong
ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so// kyenang rdzab degon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chus pa mang du skyes sam kun rdzobaden te dkonapa'i lam du lhas char phab
[47 ]@#// nas tshwa dang nus pa bskyed kyis/ shes ldan dag tshu dang chu rung pa'i bal rnams dub par ma byas par 'or cig khyecagan dang nus pa la longs spyad dang/ bdab
[ ]dung legs par dagon lamakha rdol ba lcagam rdol ba'agyur/ de nas ded dpon gyis 'gron pa gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ 'gron pa dang gala'askad ces smras so// ]
shes ldan ngag shes par gyis shika/ kho bo tshong ba rnams kyi mdun nas 'gro ba na/ 'di na skyes bunag po mig tshe la dmar ba/ bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/ 'khor lo rdzab kyis log pa 3
gas rlan pa/ ]sgrog shel ma dag ku mu 'brang bas mug bo bcadres pa/ mgo 'dren dang/ dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len ba mthong ngo/ mthonas kyang 'di skad ces/kun ng
degon pa'i lam dulhas mar phab nas rtswa dngamasar pa mang du skyes sam zhes byas pa dang sa'adi skad ces kyi'ang rdzobadenate/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phub nas rtswa dunganus pa bskyed
la kyis/ shes ldan dgatsA dpatshurnying pas khal rnams dub pa ram byas par 'or cig/ khyod sug rtsa dang chusar pa la longs spyad dang bdeb dang legs par dgon pa'i lamam b.lakha
lhagam yang rdol bar 'agyur zhes zer kyis (bangag cag gi khal rnams mdub par rtsa dang nuboral/ bdag cag rtsa dang chu sor pa la longs spyad zhas bde ba dang legs par dgon pa'i
yaM lam ma brdol ba lhag ma yang brtol bar bya'o zhes/ da rnams kyis rtswa dang nu ringapa bor tu dgon pa'i lam duzhugs pa wam/ da rnams dong nas zhag gcig lenayang rtswa dang chu sar pa ma red do/
zhag gzhes dang/ gsum dang/ bdun gyi bar du song ang dang chusar 5ma red do// de nas 'gronapas zhag bdun len pa dang/ gnong sbyin ma zan gyis tshul ma yin par la brtag go/
denas da dpon cig shes 'di snyam du sems te/ tshong pa dag dong nas deng duzhag bdun lon no snyam du bsams nas/ dgon pa'i lam der zhugs pa las/ ded dpon gyi ma tshongapa'i
mdunanas 'gro bas skyes bu nag po mige chol dmar ba bong bu'i shingerar zhugs pa/ 'khor lo rdzab kyis sog pa/ gos rgyanapa/ skrag sher ba me tog ku mu da'i 'phreng bas mgo bo
bcings pa/ mgo 'dran ngangadakyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'dris ces smras so// kyi nang rdzaci ngagon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang rlu sar pa/
ngagamang du skyes sam/ kyenang rdzabangan dengagon pa'i lam du lhas charab ba nas rtswa dang nus ba mang du bskyadakyis shes ldan go rtswa dang nung sa khul rnams dub pam bya bar
'or cig khyod cag rtswa dang nusarab la'os sbyad dang bdeb dang legs bar dgon pa'i lam lhagam yang rtol bar 'gyur/ de nas dod dpon gyi ma de 'gron ba kAn ba der/
song su phyin pa dang/ 'gron pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ shes ldan ngag shes par gyis shige kho bo tshong pa'i mdun nas 'gro ba na 'di re skyes bu nag bo
[S ]zhes bya banas/ mgo 'dren dang dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo/ mthong nas zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du// 'di skad ces kyi nang rdzatsang gon pa'i lam du lcas cha phab
sa rtsa dang nusar pam du skyes sam zhes byas pa dang/ des 'driskang ces kyi nang rje bden rngudakon pa'i lam du lhas char phabanas zhes bya bzhas/ rtsol bar 'gyur ro zhes zer zhes byuba'i
bar snga ma bzhin du'o/ shes ldan dgu re zhig bdag cag gis ji sride rtswa dang nu sar pa ma rnyed kyi bar dunu da tshureng pa ma dor ro// de rnams dong nas zhag gcig lon na yang chudang nusar pa
a redang zhag gnyis dang gsum drang/ bdun gyi bar dusongan yang dang chusarapaa snod pa las ded dpon gyi mos mnan 'gron pa gnod sbyin mi zan gyis tshul ma yin pas
kha bag pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'ad skud ces kyaa'o ded dpon kyi man bus pa ste/ des 'gron pa tshul ma yin pas kha btag gis mad du zhes sbas so// donabod ba dang
legs par gon pa'i lam rtol bar gyur te/ de'i tshade'i dus kyi ded dpon phyi me shos gang yine ba dening nyid yin no/ rgyal po chen bo ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba de bla na med pa yang
[p]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu'athob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar m blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzungaban/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub zhes bya ba nus
tshogs tsam yinen zhes bya ba'i bdagongs bzhinangu'o/ sdom la/ mchab drug dang ri bong dang/ pa dam dang chu skyes ngag/ tshal tshig glang chen klu dang ni/ yul 'khor
skyong la sogs pa'o// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas thun mong ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems bskyed
pa gang yin pa nga nyan cika/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung banags tshang tshing ri dang 'bab mumang pos krungab rtswa sngon po dang/ kal ba dang/ shing sa la dang pa la shas mdzes par
byas pa'i phyogs shig na/ byang chub sems pa'i ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa// glang po che'i rgyal po mchob drug pa zhig tugyur to// de'i chung ma ba grungamo bzang mo zhes bya ba/
ba glang mo zamasacad kyi nangana mchog tu byungab dang dalcan cige khyulas shar/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu dga' dkur rgyu zhing gnas pa las/ jiman ba glangamo mchog/ mchog tu yang 'phrog
ma gzhan zhig ying la'ang mi bsam ba los/ glang po che'i rgyal bo mngal ga duphyin do// des deyang mkhas pa'i yon ton dang a ldan pa zhika bas/ glang po ched[R]ltar dal
chags pa'i sems dang 'brel bas de'agron yang phyi bzhin 'byung/ 'dug n khangug par 'gyur ba de ltar 'bu bsnyan bakur byas so// de nas ba glang mo bzang ma phran
dog gi skyon gyis mi bzudapa sus nas/ ba glang mo de la klan ka tshol ba'agyur glang pomachab drag pa la yang shin tu tshig pazu'o// gnas skabs thams cad du nam yang glu ga sa ma red pa
'tshe/ smon lam log rar gdab par brtsams pa// gang du glang po che byas pa chud gson pa 'do'i srog gcod par 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btabanas/ ngas lebs bangag
nyidamachongs teshi ba las/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'akhetsun mo rnam pa'i mngal du skyes nas/ zla ba dragu'angs bum zhig btsas te/ bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur to// gang gi tshabakamar

gtang napa de'atsho/ yul ka she rgyal po tshangs sbyin la byin te des btsun mo ngam par byas so// des tshorabs snga ma'isha kho yod pas/ bya ra pa rnams kyi glang bo che mcho badrag pa bya sa song par
byang dbcug ste/ de nas sa rgyal po tshangs sbyin la smras pa lha phyogs chakam zhaken glang po chemachab drug pams zhes matshin/ du'amechab bdug la 'tshal ba zhig mchis kyis/ lhas grong mi
rnams la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas rgyal pos yul thams cad n gnas pa'i rngon pa rnams bkug ste bsgo khaM/ shes ldan ngag dang la phyogs chog mo zhig na/ glang po che mchog drug pa zhig 'dug pa de'i
[52/ ]mtshab ngagos kyis/ myur dukhyer de shekacige/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rngonapa nganams kyis/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin las mnyan to// de nas rdo pa nga nams kyi sde dpon gang yin pa des/ na
ba de rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rang rang gi las 'brodatsung 'dug gcig dang/ kho bo khon 'gro'o zhes/ ngos gtor ma'i chog byas/ go bgos/ mtha' dug can lag la thogs/ kazhu brdungs

de glang po che tshol zhinge song ba las phyogs der phyin pa dang/ des de khyu las kar tre chungam dang lcan tsug ngaga' dkurargyu zhing bka brkyang lta 'dug pa mthong ngo/ (smras pa ul pad+ma med pa'i chu ldan

yul phyogs su// glang chen dam pa ma rtog kun da zla ba dang// g.yo 'om dnganib mortsomengag can ng// gas ribartsegs pa 'gro ba lta bur de yis mthong// glang chen mchog gi dbang po zla ba 'dra ba de'i/
ma ba drug pa zla ba'i 'od zeraltar smra ba/ pad+ma dkar po'i phung chen rgyan du'aphags pa la// pad+ma'i rnalaka drimadangug cig Nan ko lta// de nas na ba de lus la gos ngur smrig bgos/ mda' gsum

du bcug nas/ 'khrishing tshang tshing gi nang nas 'jab cing gom pa brten te dal bus/bar song ba dang/ de nas ba glang mo des rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong nas/ des khyim thabs de la smras pa lha tshur
spyon/ mi zhig mchiyis kazhanang bzhudado// des smras pa// mi 'drab zhig/ sa smras pa// kos dur smika can zhig go/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te nga lta min//
ci sta del dur sIka yan bko ma tsha zhig ngur smig las mi dge mi 'byung ngo/ nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzin snying rje'adzag re byams pa'i yid ldan pa// gzhan
gsod dka' ba spangs pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te// zla bas sam pa 'ba' zhig byed kyi gdung mar ltar/ 'dilas 'jigs pa mi 'byung 'di las zhi ba pa 'thob// de nas ba glae de dang byang
rlub sems dpa' de yang bag tsha ba med par rgyu bar brtsams pa las/ de nas rngon pa nges tshang tshing gi nang du zhugs nas/ mda'adug can gyis gnad dubasnunano/ donas ba glangamo des/ byang ba
sems dpa' la smras pa// lha de chos gos can las bsungs pa byung ma ma byung/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ snying sdug pa ma byed ma byed cig/ nyes 'di thub pa'i n babra' 'di'i
min gyi// 2sa 'di na mongs dbang du song ba yi// sems ldan snying rje rnam par spangs pa yin// skya bos rmongs sems ldan rtog pan/ su yi gser kyis g.yogs pa'i lcags lani/
mi rnams slu bar byed ces bsams nas su// gsarade lcags dung 'dra ba nyid du lta// 'du yomada' dang gzhu dang ying gdug pa// grang yin de nigadug pa nyid shes/ ngur smiga mchog tu
zhi ba 'di yang ni// rtago du zhi ba nyid du blo yis rtogs// de nas ba glong mo de mi bzad pa skyasanas khyim thab la smras pa/ bdag ni tshig 'di dag gis bde ba bskrun pa khyod kasod pa btang snyoms
03 su bgyid rdzomi thog gis/ bdag gis 'di'i yan lag dang lag rnams sngags/ g.yang/ dbug/ gshog/ gzhom par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sams dbas 'dzum phyung ste
smras pa/ a ma'onamongs pa'i 'byung po gso ba'i byang nubasams dpa' chungama'i mngon par zhen pa dung dam yin no// ci'adi yang mishes sam/ 'byung po gdon gyis thebs pa sems
rmongs pa/ nad pa des ni sman pa mkhokurato/ de la sman pa gnodapa ma byed kyi/ 'byang po panyid zil gyis mnan nas 'joms// de bzhin nyon mongs gdon gyis thebs pa la//
skye bo sems rmongs 'di ni sdog rab byed// dal bag shes nyon mongs gnod byed kyi// nyon mongs pa yis pham byas rnams la mnye// lhan cig sbyong ma bdag gis byang chub tho gnas srid
gsum 'dri/ grags pas kun bakang nyon mos g.yonacan dran 'angul brtan pa dang/ drangapo'ajoms byed phyir klog gcad dang brtagaceng snyam pa dang/ rab tu bskams pas ring pami
thokas shin dutsha gcad bya/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshe rnam kyis bgrang mo de snying rtsa bri bar byas pas cang mi smra bar 'dug ga de nas glang po che'i tshogs de byang chub sams dpa'i
drung du 'ong ba dang/ byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ grangapo cha'adi dag gis 'ded dus pa 'di la gnod pa bskyang n mi rung ngo snyam mo// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ bcom ldan
'das byang chub sams dpa' rnams/lus kyis leg par ltung bar 'gyur gyi/ sams kyisan pa yin pas dazhi ba de'i mdun du song nas mi'i skad kyis ma'ajigs 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus las la
shig ces smras te/ dbakras phyung nas brang 'og tu sbas te 'dug go/ glang pa che de rnams kyangs thig brtags nas phyogs denas kazhanangubadang ngo// glang po che rnams dong bu ngang/ das
rngon pa la sa pa kyi nang shesaM par gyis shig/ glang po che rnams dong gis/ nga ni rang gi ngags pa byos shig/ tshon pas bsams pa/ bdag 'dra ba'i ma ni sha[0]la yin te//
bangag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba 'dis kyang yon tan de lta bu dag gis dad pa bskyang ngosam nas nga skang byung stangus pa dang/ de nas byang chub sas pas snus pa/ kyi nang rdzaca'aphyir du/
rtson pas sa pa/ ba rgyab po/ byang chub sems dpa' mo dga' nas bsams ba/ mal bangag gis skyabs byas pa'i tshe gnod par gyur ba 'am/ ba glang mo 'dis bdag gsod pal mi bzang pa
skyas pas/ 'di la mi dga' ba cung zad cig byas par ma gyur tam snyam nas/ rngon ba dal snus pa// kun ng jakhyod su zhig gis brgyab/ dazhus rngon pa dmeg mchima'i rba rlabs kyis gang
bzhin du smras pa glang chen dbang po khyod kyi ni// lus la bdag gimapa' yis brgyab// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi mangs// bdag gi sems la brgyab bar gyur// dug can mngalayis
phag pa yis// las rnams skyes pa 'gyu ba sta/ yon tan gyan mangs phog pa'i// mi mthus rnams na skyo mi 'gyur// gshed la yang snying rje ba// 'di 'dra kang la yong gyur pa//
yon tan rgya mtsho khyod kyin/ yon tan deng brjod su yis nus/ mdongon badraganam snyam pa'i blo yang badrag lami 'byung gi/ bdag lus yon tan kyis stong ba// 'di la tshig
pa za ba skyes// mi yi sha tshugs ldan yang bdag dud 'gro'i skya kanas song ba yin/ glang chen mchog khyod dud 'gro yi// skye gnas sha tshugs 'chung yang mi sha tshugs tsam gyis dung
'gro 'am// mer yang brtsa ba ma yin gyi// gang la yon tananyer dmigs pa/ ngan ma zhes bya bar dran// byang chub sems dpas sAs pa/ yon tan gyis bstod par byed pa'i tshig/
gis ga dam gyi bar chad byed pa mthong la/ don ci zhig gaphyir khyod kyisang lamadas bsnun pa myurang smyos shika/ des sbas pa/ rgyal bo'i nen dur gyis bdag gis bya ba ma yin pa 'di byas te/
khyod las dgos ba zhig yong ngo// byang chub sems dpas smas pa/ gal te nga ltan dal bus shongal/ lag pa gnyis no myur skyong la/ ci 'angod ba ni blang bar gyis// byang chub mas
dpa' rnams la ni// mi katangashung zad med pas leng/ bdag gi sha 'di btsan gnas khyer ba'am/ ma ba rnams kyang 'dod par byed la rag 'di ni gzhan la brtse ba'i phyirlabaskyang
]pas// lus 'del ni ji ltar draga' badra kyis/ mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyera'ajug nus kyang/ 'khor bgrod dka' bdag nu zhugs pa nyung// thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhiragyurapa// gzhan la brtse ba de yi rgyu yin no// dran s rngon pa drango tshab skyes kyang (rgyal po'anan tural bsams nas smras pa/ khyod kyi mchob rnams
dgos lags so// byang chub sems dpas smas ba/ dal gyis phyudal khyer cig/ des smras pa khyonganyid kyis thugs dpon mdzod cig/ bdag ni khyod kyi mchab 'byin
mi 'od ngo/ de su'i phyir zhe na/ kal de snying rje'i bdaganyade can// khyod kyi mchab rnams phyungan// byams ba me yis rjes bsregs nas// bdag gi lakra gnyis mi ltung
ngam// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te de lta na nga 'dekyis phung la sbyin no zhes/ n gnas rjes mchab ru ba shin tu ring du zug pa dag phyung ba dang/ bdag nyid chen po de
las khrag phyung ste/ dmathonas gzhan dag gi dupar byas pa/ mche btsiton pa las byung khrag gisamathung ka kun nas gshes la da// ma rtog kumutu bkum mdog lta bu'i lus de
dpal ldan snom par mdzes// ri stong kha bas khebs pa'i ri bo 'od kazer mdzes dang ldan rgyur pa'i// rtse mo tshon rtsi btsag gis kha bskyar chu yis gsab gsab gder ba bzhin// de nas/
byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid spro bsring phyi'i snas pa// snying khyod nganiban par gnos shig rmongs su zhig yod// 'phongs par gyur dngamagon med 'jig rten la yang blta bar/
gyis/ khyod ni skye bo'achiba'i dbang du song ba rnams kyi mgon/ doltas 'dir ni de ring zhum par bya ba'i cham yin/ bar skabs deranam mkha'i ngos kyang ya mtshan kyis yi rangs pa'i
lha rnams kyis krung/ ya mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byung de nas lha zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i las shin dudaka' ba spyod pa de mthong nas smras pa/ grogs po bdag den
bo'i gnas gang yin pa 'di ni ye mtshan che sta/ mchob rnams ni byung ba yi// tshor bas nyam thako gyur kyang da// lhag pa'i bsam dang ldan pa'i sems// byang chub las kyang ma ldog
go 3nas lca gzhan zhig gis del sbas ba/ mchab phyung ba los byung ba'o//sdug bsngal rang gis myong yang ngag/ snyinge rje dmyal ba la gnas pa'i/ sems can rnams la
mngon 'phal ba/ gang dag yin pa de yi sems// byang skyob las ldogo ga la 'gyur/[ ]/denas byang chub sems bsamache ba de dag phyung nas rang nyid thogs tetsangami smra bar 'dug rgo n gnas
rngon pa mi dgab skyes te/ 'dis rang rgyamachab dedag bzung nas sbyin bar ga dong ma 'dod dam snyam mo/ de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i bsam pa shis nas/ go kun dalta bu'i sna mngon du
ba 3/[ ]ba rkyang nas/ pa kAkaa mo zhig ces smras te/ ku mu ta dang zla ba dang/ pad+ma'adramache ba'i mchog/ drug po 'di dag khyod sbyin zhes/ bdag gis
tsho gzung gis bde bar 'dug ye ga u0f7c cig dang/ len pa po dang nye bar ni// de yi bar gyi sdug bsngal gyis// gdungs pa'i yide rab dung bar bya// gal te khyod ci ste bdag/
wA brtags nas/ lud kyis seme dngarab/ ba a negasol khug zhwayon can ngo tsha zhing// de la ko pir gyis shig snyam sems na// khyed kyi nyis sdud gag dang gzhul ngag pa
dang mda'anon khyad du bab ngan na dur sAgA 'a kasapa' rgyalamtshan gyur pa de// mthong nas yid ni rab tu dang bar bya sbyin pa kha cig len pa la sa 'dag sta/ de bzhin gzhan ni
spyan pa po las 'dag/ nge phyin 'doranyarang las sa/ da kyi ngag pa ngangagu bskyed par 'bang// nas byang chub sems dpas 'di'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan yin nosAmanas/
ngur smaka nge ngel rtog cingesams rab tud par byas nga/ mchab ng rnams rang gilakazhus byin nas smras pa/ dug can mda' yis thog nas bdag gi snyang lan 'ga' nyung byang ma gyur ba ngen pa
gang yin pa'i/ bden pa de yis yang g byang chub mchog thob nas/ 'gro ba nyam thag sdug bsngal dag las yongs thar bya// rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/ nga'i tshe de'i dus na glang po

ma'i rgyal po ma ba drug par gyur ba gzhan zhag yonesAm/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang de de'i tsho ngus na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyal po chen po den
ngas byams pa'i sems bar ba sgrubs pa dang/ bya ku'aba'i sbyin ba yongs su btang bas/ banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byungachub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste//
'on kyang nganyid byams pa'i sems dang/ kad dka' ba'i spyinopAni bzhi 'adapa yang g par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi smyo tsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ gas tsam yin no/

rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bye chub don du gnyer ba'i phyire ri bong du gyur pa na/ drang srong la bdag nyid kyi sha byin ba gang yin de nyon cogo rgyal po chen
po ston byung ba 'das pan/ rikhrod chumago dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig na drang srong dka' thub drag po can 'khrus budang rtsa ba dang/
chu spyod pa// g.yang gzhi de shi shun gyon pa ma'i sbyin sreg byed pa zhig gnas so// drang srong de'i grogs po ri bong a skad du smra ba zhig yod de// den par drang srong gi drung du song
nas son pa dang phyag byas te/ koa rnam pa sna tshogs kyie yang dag par mgu bar byed pas/ nga gnyis pa dang bu kho nabazhin sdug pas gnas par gyur to// ngebs dus 'das pa dang than
chen byungs/ des 'brub chudang klung rnams chuchung bar gyu dacing/ shing nams ma tog dang 'bras bur tshul bar gyur to// de nas drang srong de bsti gnas de na la zas
dang bral bas lhag par dga' bar ma gyuranas/ des g.yang gzhi dang shing shun rnams bsdu bar brtsams sa/ ngenas ri bong gis de de lta bu la zhugs pa mthong nas dris pa/ drang srong chen po gang
du bzhud/ drang srong gis sbas pa grong 'dab tu song la der bcos pa'i bsod snyoms kyis 'tsho bar bya'o// de nas des drang srong gi tshig thosanas gdung ba skyes te pha ma dang bral ba sems
shing rka ngapa gnyis la gtugs nas drang song de la smras pa/ bogam dor cig/ kazhan yang khyim na gnas pa ni rnyes pa dums dkrugs pa lags la/ dgon pan gnas pa ni yon tan du ma phun
sgyur sum tshogs pa lags so// des lan du ma smras na yang ldog tu ma btubanus ngoms ri bong gis sa pa/ gal te nges na 'on kyang khyod pazhig ngang la bzhes la/ jiltar bgyis pa
bzhin du sang bzhud cig/ nas drang srong de 'di snyam dusams te/ 'dis derings par bdag kha zas la mgron du 'bod par 'dod de/ 'di ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'isrog chags
N+NaM 'di dag nibasogs pa brtsonapa ye nosnyam nas/ des de la khas blangs so// de nas ma'i dpa byas nas kha thas kyi dus la bab pa dparabong song nas/ drang song de la bskor ba byas te/
bzad par gasol bar brtsams pa/ drang srong chen po bdag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pas blang ba dang dor bam 'tshol nas/ khyong lanongs pa cung zad cibakyis pa bdag la bzad pamadzodacig
ces smras nas/ dam thag tu enang mtshongs so// de nas drang srong dme dga' ba skyes te/ a zum gnag la mchim zaka cingabu sdug pa gcig pu la bya babazhin du 'khrung nas smras pa/
bu 'di ci zhig byed parab rtsams/ ribongagis snus pa// drang srong chen po dkon par dgyes par mdzod la/ bdag gi shas nyin zhag gcig gi 'tsho ba mdzod cig gzhan yang nags
su skyas pa'i bongal tel ngag dang/ mon sun sro'u dang/ 'bras thug chen po tsal mches/ bangag gi lus zhugs su legs padabasgral ba'ang 'di ru gsol la dang la
dka' thub nags su bzhugs l mdzod/ ngunas drang srong des ri bong gi tshoge thos nas mi dga' ba skyes te sbas pa gal te de lta na khyed gang ba lngacu bya bu byung 'a nyid du srog dor ba byas
tagrong gi mthar mi 'gro'o/ rubong gis tshig de thos nas yid dga' bar gyuratu/ mag bstod nas nam mkha'i ngos logs su bltas te/ gsol ba 'debs par zhugs shing sa
pa/ ngagon pa lane gnas bcas te// bdag de dbenapal dga' na// bden ba'i ken de yis ni/ dbang chen lha yis char phobacige/ ces snas pa'i mod la/ byang chub
sams dpa'i mthus dbang po chen po'i gnas g.yos par gyur to// lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong bani'og tu 'jug pa lan pas tu las gyur bltas// bya
chub sems dpa' mathu mnanas/ jitsam na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyin gyis dbang phyag chen po'i char phab ste/ nges bsti gnas dre slar rtswa dung/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dang/
ma rtog dang/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ de nas drang srong dus dag bo'i bshes gnyen ri bong la brten nas/ don gnas du mngon ba ngashes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/
de nas drang srong gis smras pa/ kye ribong bya dkar ba'i brtson 'grus 'di dang snying rje'adi lta bu s ca zhoge donanguganyer/ des smras pa/ 'jig rten longab 'dren pa med pa// yongs su 'dren
mang par/ sems can ma brgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang/ dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa
rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bsas rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas drang srong detshig 'di thos nas ribong la sbas pa/ gang gi tshe khyod sangs rgyas su gyur ba de tshobangag la yang
tsats+tshA dgong shige/ ri bong gis smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam dusams/ de'i tshong san ri bong ngu gyur pa gang yin
bden nga nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ri bong der rate/ rgyal po chen po de nangs bya ba dka' ba bdagazed yongs su btang bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/
de ltar m blta ste/ 'onakyang nga'i nga ni blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub kyi rgyu tsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no// rgyal po chen po kazhan yang ngas bla na

mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ngonangu gnyer ba'i phyir/ padaa longab phrag pas khyer ba gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na wA ra sa'i grongakhyeradu/
rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rkya la srad byed de// 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ le lekas pa/ skye bo dang mang pos kang ba/ 'thob pa dang/ 'gro ba mo dang/ khraka
khruka dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ chom rkun ma cing rab tu zhi bar gyurapa/ 'bras dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ma phun sum tshogs pa la chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa// chos bzhin kyis rgyal
sring byed do// de'i mdun na 'don gyi bram ze de'abuljang khuzhes bya ba rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ dadapa bzang ba/ ngage ba'i bsam pa can/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan
la phan par zhugs pa/ snying rje can pha dang ma la sri zhu byed pa yod de/ bu ni gcig pu der zang la pha dang ma de dag kyang rgas nas mig mas de mdongs la thug pa dang nas pa'i pams
rgyal po tshangs sbyin la gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ljang khu 'dimanana'angon dudabang bskuradu gsol/ bdag cag dka' thub kyi nags su mchilags sa//
denas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis ljang khu la smras pa/ ljang khu khyomadun na 'don gyis shig des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdagamananas 'angonam 'tshal te/ badrag ni rgas pa
kam chung ba/ dbang po tams kyi rim gro'atshal ba lags so// de nas ljang khus khyim na gnas pa dang/ mdun na 'don mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin dusbangasanas/ phama'i krogs su nags na
gnas so// denang par langs nas pha ma gnyis la songashing ng chugatsang mas bstan bkur byed du ngenas ngo'a'og dulha la mo'i sbyin srag gisamachong sbyin byas nas/ phyis 'bras bu byung
ba'i renags khrod du'ajug go/ de nas 'bras bu dang/ rtsa ba dang/ chu bsil 'khyer te pham la byin s/ de'i 'og du phyogs gnyika tu song nasabasam gtan la brtson par gnas te//
rim pa de lta bu s dus 'da' bar byed do/ ji tsama'aa gzhan zhig la nang par sngar langs de/ pha dang ma'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas gsol te/ rmilamadu mthong ba rig par byecing
smras pa/ bdag gi g.yar lam sbrul nag bos// bdag lus zhe tu zos ba dang/ bdagane zhakas panag po yis// bcings nas lho phyogs khrid pa rmis// g.yara'am 'jigs
bye mthong bdug gi/ snying la dogs pa deng bdag la// bla ma dang bralashin ngun// mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur sum bgyid/ jitsam na pham ngeganyis kyis dbugs phyung nas ldem la
kha bltas te 'dug nas/ bden pas gsol ba btab ste/ dril ba khyer nas chu len du songang// de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs sbyin ri dwags 'chor du chos dadaka' thub kyi nags rir zhugs pa
dang/ rgyal po de sgra gragru par phog pa zhig ste/ des re ngags kyi sgra lta bu zhig thos nas gzhu na drudang bkang sta mdas 'phangs pas ljanga'u'i snying khar phog par gyurato/ de nas mangs
gnangu pog pas sa la 'gyel kyang/ de rang gi sdug bsngal khyad du bsadanas/ pha ma lonortse ngan byang cung snus pa// mda' gcig bsnun pas bdag dang ni// dbang po nyams par
gyur pa yi// pha dang de bzhinam dug dang// bdag cag skye bo gsum bsad do// de nas rgyal pos de thos nas 'ongs de dris pa/ tso sde pa'i mda' gcig bsnan pas skya bo gsum
bsad/ darenas ljang khus sIng= rje skad du ngu sa nas/ rgyal po la smras pa/ bdag pas ches nyam chung ba'i// pham yang ldengs par gyur/ bkaM kyang mda' yis
basman pas na// skya bo gsum ni'atshibar 'gyur// de nas rgyal bo 'jigs shing skrag la dngangs nas/ ljang khu la 'ang skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u ngas nyes pa byas yashes
nas mda' 'phangs kyis/ ngal bsod pa 'dor du mi gzhug par/ pham lagasol ba bya ba'i rigs so// de nas lcang khus gus ba dang bcas pas rgyal po dbugs 'byin
par byed de/ rgyal po chen po badrag dang nye bar mchis pa rnams la dbang zhig mchis na/ snying rje can dang/ skye bo la byams pa dang/ 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba lags pas/ yod pas ma
snyangs shig/ yang snas pa/ bdag gi blam kanganabar/ ril ba 'din snoms mdzod cig de dag gi ni rkong bkru ba/ tha ma 'ingan lags pa 'gyur/ dbangag gi tshig
gis rkang la phyag mdzod la/ 'di skad ring por mi thogs par mthar gdon mi za bar 'abral bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs shig de nas rgyal po rang kho nas ngal ba khyer te nags khrod du
chas pa dang/ de'i tshe phyogs bzhiram ma yin pa re thang du 'khrugs par gyur to/ de nas leng ba de gnyis gcig la gcig smras pa/ ldang la 'dunasengo'i 'gram du ring mo zhig len no/
de nas de'i mas smras pa/ nga ltar kho mo'i ljang khu de/ pad+ma ut+pal gang ba'imatsho// nga pa sgra snyan 'byin pa na// ri kas lhan cig rtse bar byed// de nas rgyal po'i drung duphyin pa dang/
po'i rtonge sgra las drang srong de dag gis smras pa/ snying du sdug cing mthong dga' ba// ljang khu niston du 'jug/ pham nyam chung bsres pa yis/ nyam thag ba latsi nag chatsi/
de de mi dka' nas snying rje skadadusnyas pa/ kye khyon lngang bum yin gyi/ kho bo rgyal po tshangs sbyin no/ byon pa legs tshur khyod bde 'am/ gdon 'di lan bzhugs shig dang//
ljang khu chab dang 'bras bu dag/ thogasanas de'u re 'dir achi'o/ mi dbang lta bu zhes bgyi ba// yon tan rnams ldan rang bzhin byams// yi byams pa'i stobs kyis 'drir//
ra dkas dang nibye rnams gnas// de nas rgyal pos drang srong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas mchim zag cing skanga'adaradur por smras pa/ ljang khu nags tshal 'di'i nang du snying/
lamangs phog ste/ srog gi lhag ma cung zad tsaka lus shing 'dug gi/ ril ba chus bkang ba 'a nengs bskur te/ 'dis khyed gnyis kyi rkang pa khrus thamamadzod cig/ dre gnyis kyis
thosanas brgyal te sa'i stang du'akyil lo// zhus rgyal po tshangs sbyin skyes nus ka do nas bslangab dang/ dwaganyis snying rje rje skadadusme sngags 'don pa ]rgyal po chen po de 'akum
pas bdaka su'u kyang 'akum dubs so/ lcamod kyi phyogs gang na chos pa der bdag cag khrid sgrig dang/ nas bu dem gum pa la rog par bgyi'o// de nas rgyal pos khyoshugs
gnyis ka khrid de phyags der phyin pa dang/ de'i srog gi lhag cung zhig lus nas/ de nas de'i phams ljang khu'i lus la kun tu byugs nas smras pa/ sdug pa 'din su yis bstsal
0 @# ljon shing dam pa su yis bcad// de nas rgyal bos rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ kho bos sngog pa'i las kyis su// nags tshalanang nas
rgyu ban// khyed cag ka ni ba kacig ba// 'di nemeda' yis bsnun par gyur/ de nas de'i pha ma ngag snying rje ji skad du snya zhing bden pas gsol bar byed pa/ bu khyod kyis nipham la//
pa bsnyenabakur lha la ma yi ni// sbyin sreg byas pa'i bden pa gang/ des na dug kyang zhi bar shog/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas gsos par gyur nas/ des sa g.yos
pa 'di ci las gyur ces brtags na/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' gnad du mas pheg ste/ ngug gis glongs pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas gnas nas
babs nas bdud rtsi btab ste bama'i bden pa'i tshog gang yin pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po'i mthu gang yin pa dang/ zug chung ba gang yanapa des rma yang ba/ dug gi shugs de yang gnas
ljang khu spraka bsngal de las yongs su thar nas/yun ring bor pha dang ma gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i/
tshe de' dusan ljang khu zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ning de yin te/ rgyal po chen po ngas pha ma gso la bstan bkur byas pa des/ bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bosam
khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga' de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no
[}]bam po zhe dgu la// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas sems can la phan pa byas ba de nyon cig/ 'jig rten chos kyi 'du shes kyis
pham dag smyung ba la 'jog par byed/ mar 'jug pa dang chur 'jug par byed pa/ dam patshayin pa'i chos de ngas thams cad kyi thams cad du bcad do// rgyal po chen po gzhan

yang ngas bla namad pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dum mngon pa shes pa lnga la bkod pa gang yin pa de nyon cika/ rgyal po chen pa sngon byung ba 'dras pa'i dus
na D+ha wA ra NAsi'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal sring byed nge/ 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bdeb dang/ la legs pa// skye ba dang mi mang pos gang ba 'thab
ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ khrag khrug dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ chom rkun mad cinganadarab tu zhib/ 'bras dang/ bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang lang dang/ ma dwaphun sum

tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la bya babazhin du rgyal srid byeng ngu'ajug go/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin de'i chung ma ni tshangs ldan ma zhes bya'o// rdzing ni tshangs ldan zhes bya'o// rgyal po tshangs sbyin
bu med cing bu mngon bar 'dod nas/ zhi bdang tshulha dang/ lus nang/ brgya byin dang/ tshos pa la sogs pa// lha'i khyad par la gsol ba'adebs
shing 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha drag dang/ tshal gyi lha dkadang/ bzhi mdo lho drag dang/ sumamado'i lha dug dang/ gtor ma len pa'i lha dgu dang/ lhan cig skyes pa
dang chos mthun pa dang/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gasol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyalas/ bupho dang bumo drag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam nga
lta bu yod de/ dmedi lta ma yin te/ gal de de ltar 'gyur du brisan/ re re la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rkyel bo bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang
gnas kasum po dga mngon du gyurapa la sama'amangal du bu 'chags par 'gyur te/ gsum po dag kazhe na/ pha dang ma ka3sa chags par gyur cinga'adus pa dang/ ma yang rung zhing zlumtshan
dang ldan pa dang/ dri ba rtobar gnas pa ste/ kAnus gsum bo de dag mngon dugyur pa las/ bu pho dang bu mo ngag skya bar 'gyur ro/ dung ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur lenatsang 'jug pa na/
bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dam bcas pa la brten pa'i sems can zhig sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos te/ btsun mo tshangs ldan ma'imangalaM du zhugs
so bung meng mkhas pa'i rangabazhin can la la/ ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yongang/ lnga nang zhe na/ skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang
dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang/ mngal na kun s pa zhukas pa shes pa dang grangalas mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes pa dang/ khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa lta/ gal
dekhye'u anen dku g.yas bar rten cing 'dug la/ gal te bum yin na ka g.yon par brten cing 'dug go/ de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas khyim thab la smras pa/ rdzo'i sras bdag la sems
can zhugs par gyur pan/'di ltar bangag ki dkugayas par rten cing mchis pas/ nges par khye'ur rakyur kyis/ dgyes pa bskyad du gsol/ de yang yidra dga' zhing yang
dga' nas/ kho bo yun ring bo nas mngon par 'adod pa'i bu'i ngo mthong ba dang/ kho bo dang mthun par skye shing mi mthun pa ma skye ba dang kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang ga sos pas phyir
gso ba dang/ bgo skal la spyod pa dang/ kho bo'i roshes brgyud kun ring du kanus par bsgrub pa dang/ bdagacagashi zhing dus la bab pa dog nyung du ma/ mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa drag
byin zhing bsod nams dag byas naso/ 'di de gnyiso kang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces meng gis yon sngo bang byed par gyur cig ces da dungo dpar byed do// dal
sems can zhugs pa rig nas/ 'di lta ste malan gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ steng gi khang babrangs kyi kazhir krang ban grang ba'i yo byang dka
dang dron dro ba'i yo byed dag dang/ sman pas bcas pa'i kha bras bsang gi thang ba dang/ decang mi dro ba dang/ cang mi kha ba dang/ cang mi skyur ba dang/ pa cang lan tshas chab
dang/ hacangam mngar ba dang/ de cung mi tshab dang/ rdacang mi bska ba dang/ kha ba dang/ skur ba dang la na tshudang/ mngar ba drang tsho ba dang/ bsku ba dka rnam 5 2
drangs pa'i zas sha dang/ shal dung/ sa mo drod dang/ rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' bo'atshol na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang/ khrims khrir dang/ 'a'u nas khre'ur rgyu zhing/

gyur shod kyi sa gzhi dam 'bab ba dang/ ngas sgra tshad du ma 'ong ba cung zad ming mi thos par gnod pa med 'ad du rim gro byed du bcug go/ de nas btsun mo tshangs ldan ma dus gzhan zhig na 'ad lta bu'i 'dod pa
skus te/ kyama'o lhas grong khyer gyashar sgor sbyin ba ka ba dang/ bsod nams dag byas shing/ lho phyogasadang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ dbus dang/ sum
mo do rnams su yang sbyin pa dka btang/ bsod nams dag byas la/ btson thams cad thar par byas kyang ma rung zhes snyam pa dang/ de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis/ btsun mo tshangs
[4/ ]ldan m las mnyan nas/ grong khyer gyi shar sgor smin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas so// lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs kyi sgo dang/ grong khyer gyi dbus dang//
sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin pa ngag byin/ bsod namos dgu byas nas/ bsen thams cad thar bar byas so/ gzhan yang btsun mo tshengs ldan ma 'di lta bu 'adod pa skyes te/ kyama'o bdag lha dang

thabs cig gru bo che'i lding khang du zhugs de ]tshangs ldan gyi rdzong du rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed / dga' dgur spyod par byed kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang/ de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis/ btsunamo
tshangs ldan m la mnyan nas/ btsun mo chos ldan m dang thabs cig tu thu bo che'i lding khang duzhugs nas/ tshongs ldan gyi rdzonganartsi bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa/
las/ gru de'ad du khye'u gzugs bzang po blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ pags pa'i mdog kasar 'drab/ mgo bo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/
sminam 'dzar ba/ sna'i kazangs mtho ba/ skye ba dran ba zhig btsas so// de btsas pa na de'id du dag lhags shing 'dus nas rim bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig du btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher
byas nas/ khye'u'amangare gdags zhes de mong 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u 'dzin tshu'i nang du btsas pa yin bas/ khyo'u chu skyes zhes bya bar btags so// gzhan mu chu skyes ma ma brgyad po/
]pangana'atsho ba'am ma gnyis dang num bsnanapa'i lam gnyis dang/ dram 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dung/ rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do// de la
[S ]mam brgyad bo dag gis 'om dang/ na dang ma dang zhun mar dang/ mar rgya snying khu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/ skyed par byed cing
sgyu rdzonganu gnas pa'i pad+mabazhin du gyur du skyed par byed do// de nas gzhon nu chu skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kang nas shi 'phos sAman/ sems can dmyal ba nas so/ de las ci zhig/
byas na des na sems can dmyal ba'i skyas snyam na/ rgyal tshab lo drug cu byas pas so// da lta gang du skyes snyam na/ ma'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes te/ gal des r yang rgyal sring byas n

slar yang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyurabs/ ma la bdag gis cinas kyang thabs shig bya snyam nas/ nges 'phya borab rdzus te 'dug go/ gang gi+im la gzhon nunustsas btsas pa 'ad kyi nyin par/ blon po

lnga brgya'abu yang btsas so// nges nyen re zhing gzhon nunams rgyal po tshangs sbyin lta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo// de nas dus kazhan zhika nakazhon de rnams mang ba dang rgyukazhus par gyur to// de nas rgyal po tshangs smin 'di snyam du sems

te kal te gzhon nu chu skyes 'phya bos gyur/ de yang nga tsamamachong ba dang nus par gyur pa zhig/ 'on kyang bdag gis 'di'aphubor gyur bzhin rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag kosnyam mo// de nas kazhonozhu musmyos 'di snyam

du sems te/ rgyal po 'azhi don med pa la katsazhes cher 'dzin pas/malabangag lkug pa dedu brdzu 'osAmanas/ngas thabs bya bar lhuka pa nyid du brdzus te 'dug go/ zhes sa gzhazhikan gzhon nu de rnams sna shes par gyur to

denas rgyal po tshangs sbyin 'di snyam dusams te/gal te gzhon nu skyes lhug par a kyur dang/ daang da tsam sna shes par gyur pa nika snyam mo// ji yong gzhon nu chu skyes gzhon nu chu skyes bya ba de nub par gyucing/ gzhon nu lkug 'bya

gzhen lkug 'phya zhes bya bar grakas so//de nas dus gzhan zhake na rgyal po tshangs sbyin laka pa la 'gram pa gdan gnas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtadanas thugs

gi dgyes shing bzhugs/ rgyal bos smras pa/da ltar rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'debadra ba thob ban/bu pho ya bshad bum mngamed pas/ngashin gdung brgyud chad par 'gyural/ bu kacig yod pa gang yin pa de yang lkug cing 'phya bor na/da

nga'i phyir sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ blon po dag gis sman pa rnams bsdus te/ sman pa rnams kyis bltas nas smras pa// lha gzhon nu 'dzin dbang po kasal zhing/ 'dilaud kyi rigs cung zad kyang ma mchis par

mthong/ 'on kyang skrag pa zhika mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin kyisakashadam pa bkug nas gsang sta bsko ba/ kazhon nulhuka 'phya skya bo'i tshogs chen po 'amengon sum ngu spongags/ khyed cag rnams kyis mngosad

cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/nga nas ka shing ma pa'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs sbyin lamanyan nas/ kazhenanu lhuka 'phu shing rtar btuka sta wAr NAsi'i dbus thog thag khrid pa dang/ de nas kazhonanulkug 'phyas wArANas
[rr/ 2] ]'byor zhingergyas pa mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so// kyi lha ra NA sa 'di stong pa in// 'on te gnas pa zhig yod/kashedam pa'im rnams kyis ka zhon na sku 'bu rkyal po la phul nas/
lha gzhon nu'adisan 'di skad kyi tshika sbas so//de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu lhug 'bri bang du blangs nas 'di skad ces smras so// su nyin gsad/ su zhig gtag/ su zhig
srog dang dbral/ su la ci zhige spyin/ de skad ces smras na/ gzhon nu lkog 'phya cang mi smra'o/ yang rgyal bo tshangs sbyin gyis/ gshed ma pa rnams la smras
ba/ sa gzhon nu longs su slangs so// lha bka' bzhin 'tshol zhes gsham 'a rnams kyis slar yang gzhon nu sku 'phashing rtar bcug nas/ wA Na se'i dbus
thog thaka khrid pa dang/ gzhonan skun 'phyas mi zhog mo bzhis khyer mthong// mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ 'di ci'i ba do'am/ 'on de kason boshi gshodama rnams kyis

slar yang ga zhon nu lhuka 'phru rgyal bo la phul nas/ lha gzhan nu 'dresani'adi skad kyi tshig smras so// rgyal bo tshangs sbyin gyis yang gzhon nu pang du blangasazhas 'di skad ces smras so// su zhig gsad/
su zhig go dag/ su zhig srog dang bral/ su la zhoge sbyin/ de skad ces smras n kazhon nu lkug 'phyatsang la sgra'o/ mang rgyal bo tshangs sbyin gyis/ gshadam pa rnams la smras
[ra]pa sa gzhon nu yongs su sngangs so/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ gshedram pa'im rnams kyis slar yang gzhan nu zha bo lhun pa shing rtar bcug nas/
lhu ra NA se'i dbus thog thag drangs pa dang/ gzhonanulhun 'phyas 'bras kyi phung po chen po zhig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so// 'bras
kyi phung po chen mo 'di rgyal de ngung po de nas m zas dung drung zug par 'gyur ba zhika/ gshed mapa rnams kyis slar yang/ gzhon nu zha bo lkug pa rgyal po la phul nas/ lha gzhon
nu'adisan 'di skad kyi tshig smras so/ slar yang la po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu lhug 'phu pang dukhrungs nas 'di skad ces smras so// suzhig gsad/ su zhig ga dug su zhig dang dbral/ su la ci
zhig ste/ de skad ces sen/ gzhon nu skug 'phya cang mi smra'o// yang rgyal bo tshongs phyin kyis/ ga shad mkha rnams le smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas gzhon nu yongs su spangs kyis/ dngal
myur du gzhon nu tshal gyi nang du dong rkos tenuka tsaka lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ gshedum pa'i ma rnams kyis gzhon nu lkug 'phyashing rtar btuka nas/ dur khrod chen po gang
na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ dong rko bar brtsams so// de nas gzhon nu lhuka 'byos tshigs su bcad de snus pa/ kha lo sgyur khyod ci yi phyir/ dong ni myur
du rko byed pale dang de su bya zhes yis// myur du nga la smra bar gyis// kha la sbyar bas snas pa// rgyal po'i sras po
btsas pan/ zha bo lkug pa mi shes/ des 'di tshal khrod myur du ni// dong rkos chag ces bka' stsal to// da nasaM kazhan nu lhuka 'phu'adi snyam du bsams te/
'di dag ni kajug pa laka ba dmar ba/ ba gsod pa dang gcod pa la chags pa/ gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa// pha rol gyi srog gcod par byed pas 'tshe bar byed pa yin no snyam nas/ 'dzikas
shing brkyalanus/ 'di dug gis badrag bsad bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas kashadama rnams la smras pa/ lhas gal te bdag la mchog cig gnang na/ bdag
rkang gis grong khyer du 'jug cing tshig kyang sna'o// gshed tsha pa'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po'i drung du song nas rgyas par smras pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal de gzhan n
rgyal sred 'dod na yang sngo sa deng gzhon nu la sbyin par bya'o// de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin yid dga' zhing/ yid dga' sa bon po rnams la bsgo ba
shes ldan dag deng la grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang/ gsaka ma dang/ kye mo rnams myur dus la la/ spos kyi dud pa dang pa mas 'khrikas par bya'o/
rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sgreng la/ ma dog sna tshogs kyi solom khroms shig ces bsgro'o// sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis 'grub la/ lha rnams dang rnal 'byor
b rnams ni sems bsam thag tu thams cad 'grub ces bya bas/ lha bka'abazhin 'tshal zhes/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyananas/ grong khyer/
thams cad rdo ba dang/ gsog ma dang/ gyo mo rnams bsal zhing/ spos kyi dud pa dang phyi mas 'khrigs par byas nas/ rgyal mtshan dngab dan bsgrung
sta me tog sna tshogs kyi sal ma bkramamo// gzhon nu lhuka 'phu rkang pas grong khyer du 'jug pa na/ ya mtshan skyes pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag
kyang 'dus so// de nas gzhon nu lhag 'phru chungashis krong khyer du zhugs nas/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi
rkang ba gnyis la gtugs nas/ de'i tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mdabang bdakan lhag 'phro dang// blun po blo ma gsal ma lags// rnam par
gsal bar bgyid pa yin/ tshog gis gsal bar bgyid pa lags// ma dbang bdag ni lhuka'aphya dang// blun po blom ldan m lags// dbang po rnams ni ngas ba dang/ gsal ba dag dang/
ldan b.lags// rgyal pos smras pa/ su'i phyore tshig ma 'byin cing rkang gsami 'gro lha de'i slong nas gson cig ]bangag gis ston kyi tshe
rabs ga len drug cu'i raduni// mi yin ngan rigs brgyud pa'i// rgyal tshab bdag gis bgyis pa dang// lo ni dreg khre'i bar dag du/ dmyal ba'i nang
dus bzang smin/ rgyal ba'i sngag bsngal mi bzad b// drag po 'jigs byed de dran nas/ dmyal bar yang ami rung bas// rgyal srid la ni mngon mi ngagal//
yab cig gnang bar mdzod cigo dang/ gdani rab tu 'byung bar bgyi// rgyal bos smras pa/ bu drang srong rnams kyis gang dka' thub cung zad re byas pa dang/ mchod
sbyin dang/ sbyin sreg byas pa de dag thams cadra ni rgyal srid kyi phyir yin na/ khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs pa spangs te rab tu 'byung/ de nas gzhon nu/
lhago 'phyas pa'i tshe tshogs su bcad des s pa// kim pa'i 'bras bu'adrab yi// 'dod pa rnams ni spyod mi 'tshal// bdud rtse'i 'bras bu'i re lta bu'i// tshangs par spyod pa/
spyad par bgyi// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu bdab gang ci nyems su myong ba de thams cad ni rgyal srid kyi yin n 'i phyir khyod rgyal srid kyi bde ba stangs te rab tu 'byung gzhan nu lhago 'phyes/
de'atsho tshigs su bcad desnus pa/ gang las sdug bsngal rab 'byung ba'i/ bded bde'i gam mi bgyid// gangulas ba ba rab skye ba// sdug bsngal sdug bsngal g+ha ma mi bgyid//
yab cig badrag la gnang bar mdzod// deka' thubunugs sum bar bkyi/rgyal pos smras pa/ bu re zhig khang 'brangs kyi gzhi spos kyi dad pa dang phu mas 'khrigs
ba ma tog snatshogs bkram par mala'am bo stangagayogos bzang bo can bshams pa la/ gang nas kyang 'jigs pamed par ni nyal/ rol mo'isgra snyan bsani
sang kos 'jam po ni bgro/ zas zhim po ni zo/ btung ba zhim po ni btung bar bya'o dgon pa ni rab tu 'byubs/ rtag tu shing drung du nu'i
gding ba dang lo ma'i gding ba la 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sams kyis gcan gzan gdug pa rnams dang lhan tsako 2la/ lce spyang ki sgras ni sang/ g.yang kazhidang shing n gyi
gosanIgyon/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bu niza/ chu dron po dang chu rogam can gyi btung ba btung dgos/ khyodaci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs tre ba du 'byungadenas kazhenanu zhaka 'phyas
de'i tshe tshogs su bcad de smras pa/ nags shangengeshun g.yang gzhi khyon zhing 'bras bu za// gcan gzan gdug pa rnams dang lhan ciko 'dug pa bla'i ]/mkhas pa 'jig rten pha
rol dka gas 'jigs pa yis// rgyal sri phyi na gsod dang drag dang 'ching mi rung// yab cig bdag la gnang bar mdzod/ dka' thub
nags su mchi bar bgyi// rgyal bos sAs pa// bu re zhig nga'i blacom gsum po 'di dag chod cig dang/ de'i 'og du khyod rab tu 'byung bar tshe dka' bar 'gyur ro//
gang byed kyis wa ra NA si'i 'byang zhing rgyas pa mthong nas/ wa ra tsus 'di ci stong pa yin nam/ 'on te gnas pa zhige yod ces smos pa de/ khyod kyis su zhig
las bsams te smras/ lha de'i slad du gson cika/ lhas bdag nongs pa ma mchis par dgum par bka' stsalan/ 'gras kyang gzhon nu 'di ci'i phyi'i ka sadachos kyi
tshegam skyas ba de los bsams te bdag gis smras lags so/ bzang nga/ gang khyod gyes ma re mthong nas/ dri 'di shi ba nyid shi ma/ 'on te gson poshi
zhes sbas po de tsa las bsags te smas/ lha daud du gson cig/ gang zhig nyes par bgyid pa'i las bgyid bgyid nas kum pa de ni gam pa nyid gum ba lags la/ kung
zhika legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyed bgyid de gum pa de ni/ gson por gum pa lags pa de las bsams nas bdag gis smras lags so/ bzang ngo// gang khyod kyis 'bras
kyi phung po chen po mthong nas/ 'bras kyi lung de chen bo 'di dang po de nas ma zos dang drang zug par 'gyur ba zhig ces smras pa de tsa las bsams te smras/ lha de'i slad du gsan/
go / nange pa 'di rnams kyis 'bras bun blangs te 'tshal nas las bgyid cing de dag la dog smin nas 'bras kyi phung po chen po bcar nas bu len pa mas la 'jal te/ de
ltar na dengug gi drungaden sn gnas 'tshal ba nying lags so/ dubazhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyilan kyis mi'ode thob la/ dethobanas dge ba'i las kyi lam mi sogs na/
de ltar n pa'i sngon gyi dag pa de rgyun 'chad pa'i gyur ro/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de rgyunachadan bde'agro las nyams shing/ ngan 'gror gnas par 'gyur ba de las bsams nas/
bdag gis smras lags so/ de nas rgyal pos bu'i tshig thos nas/ mchems brnangs bzhin dubu la 'khyudadasbas pa/ brtul zhugs nges leng
rang gi chos spyod cig ba dag kyang khyod kyi slob mar khas blang ngo// dunas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis blon po rnams la sbas pa/ shes ldan dag gal nga gnyon

nu lhag 'phro rab tu ma byung naser 'gyur/ lha rgyal por 'gyur ro// khyod cag gi bu rnams bde 'gyur/lha de'i g.yog du'agyur ro//de rab tu byung nakhyed cag gi bu rnamaci'i phyir rab tu byung lhabaku stsal tu bas so/
de'i tshowA ra DAsi dngag cang mi ring ba'i bsti gnas zhig yod de/ de na drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyipasnying rje can/ snying brtsag sems can thams cad la byams pazhig gnas
so de nas gzhon nu lkug 'phyas 'khor lnga brgya dang 'byor pa chen pos drang srong du las rab tu byung nas/ des de la gdams ngag phyin to/ de nas 'bad pa dang/ brtsal ba dang/ brtson 'grus/

drag pos mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so// de nas dus gzhan zhige na drang srong da dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas/ gzhon nu lhug 'phyas drang srong de'i ro dri sna tshogs kyi shing phung por
spungs nas bsregs ta/ mchod pa dang bkur sti cher byas so// gzhon nu lhug 'phyos bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de rnams la gdams ngag byin nas/ de rnams kyis 'bad pa dang/ bstsal ba
dang / brtson 'grus drag pos mngon par shes ba lnga mngon sum du byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rje snyam du sems/ de'i tshe ngu'i dus kyi gzhon nu lhug 'phyargyal

srid lag mthil du 'ongs pa yongs su sangs rta/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya dang mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// rgyal po chen po ngas sems can thams cad la phan pa

byas pa dang rgyal srid spangs pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta sta 'on kyang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgyutsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ ri dwags dang bya'i

tshog sama'i 'jigs pa las thar par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nags tshal stug po ri dang chudang/ rtswa sngon po dang/ gil ba dang/ shing sa la dang pal

sha rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig gi tshal gsob na bya'i tshogs chen po zhig gnas so// tshal stug po nge na yang shing gnyis phan tshun rgud pas ma byung bar gyur to// de na bya'i tshogs gang drag baphur nus pa de/

dag ni dong ngo// 'phur ma nus pa gang yin pa dang sgo nga rnams ni de nyid du bor ro// du'i tsho byang chub sems dpa' srag pa zhig tu skyes so// byang chub sems dpas ma chan po sreg cing rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong
ba mthong// mthong nas kyang de sems can re rnams la snying brtse ba chen po skyes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'ang sAm dusams so// bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa 'di rnams kyi don
la brtson par ma byas na/ bdag gson te yang mi rung/ bdag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las ji ltar bsgral bar bya snyam du bsams nas/ byang chub sems dba'a'adab ma chus sher bar byas nas/
mi'i phung po'i steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas/ 'dab ma lcug cing tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'di dag 'dab ma yod mod kyi// 'di debu 'phur bar mi nus so// 'di dag rkang pa yod mod kyi// 'di dug 'gro
bar mi nus so// 'di dag pha ma 'phur te dong// mni mi g.yo bar 'dug cig/ khyams pa shin tu bsgom pa yi/ bden pa'i tshig ni gang yin pa// bden pa'i tshig ni de yis su//
mni ma g.yobar 'dug cig/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyiso/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can la phan par byed pa de mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang mi dga' bar gyur te/ 'dis bdag nyid yongs su btang
bas/ de rnams la phan pa ci zhig nus/ gzhan yang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di sems can rnams la phan par byed pa la skyo bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di'i grogs bya'o snyam nas/

lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis char chen po rab tu phab pas/ ma de rab tu zhi bar gyur to// des na sems can de thams cad ma'i 'jigs pa las thar ro// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i

dus kyi srag pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de yin no// rgyal po chen po denanga'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas sems can la phan pa byas pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgyu tsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no// rgyal po

chen po gzhan yang ngas sems can la phan pa byas te// blon po lnga bcu rang gishadang khrag gis tshim par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngonabyung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ wA ra NAsi'i grong khyer du

rgyal bo tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed do// de'i blon po lnga brgya yod pa las/ khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis blon po lnga brgya po do rnams khu byung ba'i gling gzhi de dag rgyal pos thos na/ rgyal po de yang
chos dang ldan pa/ snying brtse ba can chos 'dod pa/ skya bo la byams pa/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa zhig pas/ des bsams pa/ 'di dag bsad de mi rung snyam nas/ dus de
rnams skyugs te/ de rnams sbyangs bcad d dong pa las/ bya gling zhig la phyin to// de na de rnams skomapas nyenanas/ phanatshun brtags na chu gang na yang ma mthong nas/ de rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu

sgra phyung ba dang/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glang po che rnams kyi nang du yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa/ glang po che sa srungs kyi bu'i sha tshugs lta bu zhig tu skyes pa de'i bsod nams kyi mthus/ ri sul
dag mi tog dang 'bras bu thun chum tshogs shing/ rdzing dang/ mtsho'i dang/ chu 'bab pa dang ldan no// glang po che'i gtso bo des thag ring po na gnas bzhin du tshor nas/ des sna chusapakang nas
brgyugs te/ des blon po de rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang dbugs phyung nas/ chus de rnams kyi kha bshal te/ rgyab tu zhon nas ri yul der btsud de/ 'bras bu dang/ rtsa pa dang/ chus tshim par byas
shing lam gyi dub pa bsal nas/ de nas des de rnams la smras pa/ ri sul 'di'i pha rol ngos glang po che'i gtso bo'i ro yod kyis/ de'i rgyu lto khrus nyo chus khong la/ rtsa ba dang/ 'bras bu dag
bsdus te dus shig dang/ de ltar na 'brog 'di rtol khar 'gyur ro// draskad ces bstan nas/ de nas glang po che'i gtso bo de'i de la 'dzegs nas/ sems bskyed de
smon lam btab pa// ji ltar bdag gis sdug bsngal nyam nga ba 'di las yongs su bskyabs pa dang/ 'brog 'di las rtol ba'i thabs bstan pa drang/ 'di dag gi don du rang gi srog phangs pa yongs su
btang ba de bzhin du/ bdag blo na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bdag gis 'di dag nyid 'khor ba'i dgon pa las sgrol bar gyur cig ces
smras nas/ glang po che des lag pa gnyis kyis sna brdzisanas/ bdag nyid ri de'i kha nas mchongs pa dang/ glang po che'i gtso bo lus chen po lhung ma thag tu mod la shi bar gyur to// blon po da
lce rnams kyis btsal ba na mthong ste/ de rnams gnas der song nas/ de rnams kyis glang bo che'i gtso bod mthong ba dang gcig la gcig smras pa/ glang po che'i gtso bo ga gis bdag cag gi
srog 'byin pa de ni 'di yin te/ lag pa 'di'i steng du lag pa bzhagan/ ji ltabadag cag gi lag pa sa la lcabar mi 'gyur/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis/ bdaganyid chen po 'dis gang

gi don du srog longs su btang ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ces sgra phyung ngo// de nas blon po de rnams kyis/ glang po che'i gtso bo de'i rgyu lto phyung nas bkrus te chus bkang nas/ rtsa ba
dang 'bras bu rnams khyer nas/ glang po cha'i gtso bo de'i ri la mchod pa byas nas 'brog de brtol nas/ phyis smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar bdag nyid chen po 'dis/ bdag caga rnams rjes su gzung
ba'i phyir rang gi srog yongs su btang ba yang bdag cag 'brog 'de las yongs su bskyabs pa de bzhin du/ bdag nyid rman po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas nas/ bdag cag 'khor ba'i 'brog chen po las yongs su thar par byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rje snyam du sems/

de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che'i gtso bo gang yin pa de nga nyid yin no// rgyal po chen po ngas bdag nyid yongs su btang ba dris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob kho nam na/ khyod kyis
de ltar mi blta ste/ 'ong kyang sa bdag nyid yongs su btangab des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub kyi sgyu tsam dang/ rkyen[]ma dang/ tshogs tsam yin no// rgyal bo

chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyi'i/ srog chags stong phrag mang po la rang gi shas tshim par byas kyang/ pa'i sems nyams pa mang pa gang yin pa de nyon
cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na klu gzhon nu tsam pa skyes zhes bya ba dad pa bzang ba/ dag pa'i bsams pa can de tshos brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gnas nas phyung nas/ yan lag
brgyad dang ldan pa'i gzo sbyong blangs te/ gnas gsal bar lus chen por byas nas lus btang ste gnas shing/ 'jig rten na 'gro ba dang gnas pa la cung zad kyang gnod pa mi byed
do// lo nyis byung nas las la rmi lta ba'i mi/ gnag rdzi dang/ phyugs rdzi dang/ shing thun dang/ lam gyis 'tsho ba dang/ lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis/ klu'i sha las bcad cing bza'

bar brtsams te/ de na ngas dus mang por rang gi shas tshim par byas na yang nga'i sems ma nyams so// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tsho'i dus klu gzhon nu tsam ba rgyas gang yin pa de ni nga nyid

yin no// rgyal bo chen po ngas rang gi sha yongs su btang bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyutsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsa ma yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir//

sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig rgyal po chen kho sngonabyung ba mtsho chen po ma dros pa na/ ngang pa rnams kyi sde dpon ul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur to// de la bu gnyis yod
ts+tshA da/ gang ba dang/ bzhin rgyas zhes bya ste/ tho bo ni gang ba'o// nu bo ni bzhin rgyas so// gang ba ni gtum pa/ gzu lums can/ bar ng bzhig bas/ rgyun kho nar dang pa rnams lasdon ra
byed do/ kha cig la sgo 'byin/ kha cig la sgor mos rma 'byin te/ de lta bu dang/ gnod pa gzhan yang brgya phrag dug byas nas/ ngangapa rnams ngang pa'i sde dpon yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song nas/
nyim ra zhingayang go bar byed pa dang/ des bsams ba/ gang ba ni gtum pa/ gzu lums can/ brlang ba yin te/ gal te 'di rgyal tshab tu bcugan/ bdag 'dag pa dang/ 'dis ngang
pa'i khyu bshig par 'gyur gyis/ 'di la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/ des gang ba dang/ bzhin rgyus gnyis ka bkug ste smras pa/ 'bab chu'i dong dang/ mtsho dang/ ma rnams

bltas te nga'i drung du thog mar su 'ongs pa de/ ngas ngang pa rnams kyi sdadapon du gzhug go/ dganyis phan tshun 'granapas/ 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang dong ba las/ de gnyis kyis 'bab chu'i dngo

dang mtshodang/ mtsho'u rnams phan tshun du bltes nas/ de gnyi sarim gyis wA ra wAsi'i grong khyer du phyin to// de'i tshe wA NAsi'i grong khyer na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/ 'byor pa

dang/ rgyas pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba zhes bya ba'i bag sta/ wA Nas ri skyedamos tshal na de'i rdzi nga tshangs ldan zhes bya ba/ mtsho bas khyad par du 'phags pa zab pa/

zhig yod de/ de las chu las skyo ba'i ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs bskyod cing/ phyogs bzhi 'khor bar yang ma tog dang 'bras bu'i shing stong phrag du ma dag bstun nas/ de up+pal dang/ pad+madang/ ku mu[E]
dudang/ pad+madakar bos khebs la/ shing rnam pa du mas stug por brgyan nas/ bya rnam ba mang po dag skad 'byin to// de'i 'byor pa de mthong nas/ gang ba dang pa lta
brgyus yongs su bskor te babs nas ci dga' rgyu zhing/ des rtsa bar brtsams so// bzhin rgyus la yang rang gi khyus smras pa/ khyod kyang bobs la rtsadamo mdzod/ des smras pa/ re zhig rgyal
sridaje blangs la/ de nas phyis 'ongs tatsa bar bya'o zhes/ des myur ba myur bar song nas rgyal srid blangs te// donas ngang pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas/ rtswa ra sar lhags te tshangs ldan gyi
rdzing du babs nas rtse bar brtsams te/ de de lta bu'i bag yod pas gnas pa skya bo'i tshogs kyis mthong nas ya mtshan skyes te/ e ma ho pang pa'i sde dpon mchog tu blta na sdug pa'i gzugs can gang
nas 'dir 'ongs/ tshangs ldan gyi rdzong gi rgyan du gyur cing chun rgya ba'i bya thams cad gzugs mdzes pas zil gyis mnan te/ 'jig rten dga' ba bskyang snying mi dga' dgur gnas so// de nas lha
rat+tAsi na gnas pa'i skya 'tshogs thams cad kyis thos nas/ u0f8btshangs ldan gyi rdzong bu'i mtha' yongs su bskor te/ de bag skyong zhing gnas pa dang/ gzugs mdzes pa la ltazhing gnas so// blon

po rnams kyis rgyal po la rig bar byas pa/ lha ngang pa'i sde dpon zhig ga zhig cig nas mchis nas/ de tshangs ldan gyi rdzong du 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang babs tachun sgyuba'i bya thams cad gzugs mdzes
bas zil gyis mnan nas/ 'jig rten dga' ba bskyod cing bag brgyung ste gnas shing mchis so// rgyal bos smas ba sha ldan dag gal te de ltar gyur na byapa rnams khug cig/ da rnams kyis
bkug nas/ rgyal bos snas pa/ shes ldan dag tshangs ldan gyi mtshon bya mchog tu gzugs mdzes ba/ blta na sdug pa/ ngang pa'i sde dpon zhig ge zhig cig nas 'ongs so zhes thos kyis/ khyed
cag gis de gcig pu ma snang par risazu la pa'i drung du khyer tu shog cig/ des dari mchog tu 'jam pos rmamabyung bar bzung pa dang/ des tshigs su bcad de gas pa/ bdag ni dam por ris
bzung bas/ mi yi dbang song byar med kyis// cinas ngang pa'i khyu dag ni// myur du ma dros dang bar gyis/ pa pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba ni bros so// danus gcig phurnyas bzung bas mya

na gyis non cing gnas pa de/ bya ba rnams kyis mthong nas ngo mtshar skyes te/ rgyalaM bos 'jigs nas ma smad pa dang ma shi bar do dag gis ngang pa'i sde dpon de khyer nas/ rgyal po'i drung du song ngo//
cig shos de yang ma bzung bzhin du chags pa'i ris bcings pas rang nyid song ngo// ngang pa'i sde dpon rgyal po la phul ba dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dgacig shos 'di ci ste khyer 'ongs

de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bdag cag gis ni 'di ma bzung na/ 'onakyang rang nyid mchis lags so// rgyal bo mchogatu ngo mtshar du gyur te dad pa chen po skyes so// de nas rgyal khos 'dang pa'i sde dpon sang
ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag go/ de nas ngang pa'i sde dpon gyis mi'i skad kyis gang thos nas/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa de lta bu'i chos bshad/
pa byas so// rgya la pos/ blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la wA ra NAsi'i grong khyer du dril sgrogs su chug la nga'i yul na chunargyu ba'i srog chags rnams sus kyang ma bsang rige/ de
rnams kyis dril sgrogs su bcug nas/ tshuyang chun rgyu ba'i srog chags ma gsod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ngang pa'i sde dpon

bzhin rgyus gang yin pa de ni ngo nyid yin te/ de na ngas sems can de snyad la phan pa byas so// rgyal po chen po ngas sems can la phan pa byas ba des/ bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thobakho
snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas sems can la phan pa byas ba de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi Sh+Thatsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no//
sdom la/ ston pa mig mdzes lkug 'phye dang/ rtsibs kyi mu khyud gnag las skyes// thugs bskyed 'od ldan tshogs bsags thub// sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur mtshan mu stegs// ma dros gleng
rgyal bo chen po gzhan yang blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer pa'i phyir/ sems can la phan pa byas te dge pa la btsud pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/

rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rton pa mig mdzes bya ba phyir rol pa'i mu stags rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig byung sta/ ston pa mig mdzes kyi nyan thos brgya phrag
du ma dang/ stong phrag du ma dang/ ba stong phrag du ma byung ngo// ston pa mig mdzes nyan thosa rnams la chos ston pa na/ shin tu zad par bsgyur ba ma yin/ shin tu dri ma med par 'gyur ba ma yin/

shini'u tshangs bar spyod pa la gnas par 'gyur bag yin te/ rmongs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam pa'i bar yin no// ston pa mig mdzes kyiganyan thos thams cad kyi thams cad du bslab pa yongs su rdzogs
pa gang yin pa de dag ni chos pa'i gnas pa bzhi ba sgoms nas/ 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa'i 'dun pa sbyangs te/ de la lan mang du gnas shing tshangs pa'i de'i jig rten dang skal ba mnyam par skyes
go/ thams cad kyi thams cad dum yin pa gang dag yin pa de la kha cig ni 'phrul dgar ro// kha cig ni dga' ldan no// kha cig ni su chu gsum dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang/ rgyal rigs
shings la chen po lta bu dang/ bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu dang/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta burnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas ston pa mig mdzes 'di
snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig 'gro ba mnyam pa dang skye ba mnyam pa dang/ tshaphyi ma mnyam ba ni 'os pa ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis gong du bsam gtan gnyis
a@#// pa byams pas bsgom par bya'o snyam nas/ des bsam gtan gnyis ba bsgoms pas/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// rgyal po chen

tsho po de'i tshe de'i dusan ston pamig mdzes zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam nA/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nganyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ston pa mig mdzes zhes bya ba phyi rol pa'i mu stags rdzu 'phrul

dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba de yin par gyur te/ nganyid kyi nyan thos brgya phrag du ma dang/ stong phrag du ma dang/ brgya stong phrag du ma byung bar gyur pa'i nyon thos rnams la nganyid
kyis/ shin tu zad par 'gyur ba ma yin/ shin tu dri ma med par 'gyur ba ma yin/ shin tu tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam
pa'i bar gyi chos bshad do// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sams/ ngas sams rgyan la phan pa byas pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar ma blta
ste 'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam drang/ rkyen tsam dang/ cho gas tsam yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par/

ts+tsu rdzogs pa'ibyang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ sems can la phan pabyas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba ston ba lkug 'phya zhes bya ba/ phyi rol pa'i mu stegs rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa//

'dod pa rnams la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ de khram ze'i khye'u lngakha slob par byed do// de nas dus gzhan zhig na ston pa lhug 'phya 'di snyam du sams te/ ci'i phyir bram ze'i khye'u/
'di rnams kyis mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du ma byas snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sams te/ 'di rnams g.yang gzhi dang/ shing shun dang/ dbyug gu/ ril ba spyi blugs drang/ blugs

ga zer gyi snod lhag ba 'chang zhing/ tshod rngadu dang ut+pa la'i rtsa ba sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa las gyur to snyam mo// de nas ston pa skug 'phyo 'di snyam du sems te/ skal bram ze'i khye'u rnams la
nan tur zhig ma byas n dbral bar dka' 'o snyam mo// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdul ba la mkhas pa ni bla na med pa yin pas/ de nas ston pa lkog 'byas/ bram bre'i khye'u rnams la smras
bram ze'i khye'u dug zla ba gsum po 'di dgal/ kho bo nang du yang dag 'jog 'dod kyis/ kho bo la 'bras bu dang rtsa ba stobs pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang/ gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid ma gtogs
bar bram ze'i khye'u su yang m 'ongazhig/ bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyang khrims subacas pa/ bdag cag las dbyar gyi nang logs su rtsa ba dang 'khrus bu stobs pa'i bram bre'i khye'u gcig dang/ gso
