sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid ma gtogs par bram ze'i khye'u su yang mkhan po blta zhing 'gro bar mi bya'o// bdag cag las dbyar gyi nang logs su rtsa ba dang 'bras bu stobasapa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang/
gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid ma gtogs par/ gang zhige mkhan po lta zhing songapar gyur na de ni bdag cag gis nyes pa can du brtsi'o zhes byas nas/ ston pa lhug 'phyi zla
ba pa gsum po de la nang du ang dag 'jog la zhugs pa dang/ rgyu ba dang 'bras bu stobs pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang/ gso sbyong bco lnga ba danyid ma gtogs par/ bram thab kyi bu su yang de'i drung
wA du mi 'gro'o// ston pa skuga'abyas rkyang ring po kho na nas ri dwags shig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so// ri dgas 'os pa legs so// tshur ri dgas khyod dang kho bo ni/
mtshungs te/ khyod kyang zas lto 'grangs tsamakhyis chog cing kun tu chog la/ kho bo yang lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog cing kun tu chog na/ 'din kha cig ni de lta ma yin to/ ha cangadzad dang d+ma la'i
rtsa ba sbyor ba la brtson par gnas so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams 'di snyam du sems ta/ gdon mi khro bar mkhan po ni brtul zhugs rdzogs par gyur te/ 'di ltar mkhan po ri dwags dang lhan
cig sna bar byed do snyam du bsams nas/ ston pa lhug 'phyo gangan bder dong sto lhag pa dang/ ston pa'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs grwacogatu 'dug go/ de nas
ston pa skug 'bya cang mi smra'o// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gdon mi za bar mkhan po ni brtul zhugs rdzogs par gyur to/ 'di ltar mkhan po ri dogs dang lhan cig ]
zlakhar byed do snyam du bsams nas/ ston ba lhug 'thu nang gi phyirari degs dang lhan cig smakhar byed kyi/ mi rnams dang ni ma yin no zhes smras nas stan las langs te dong ngo/ de nas
ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs ma zhig ston pa lag 'phya gangan ba der song ba dang/ ston ba lhag 'thus rgyang ring po kho na nas/ ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs can mthong// mthong nas
kyang 'di skad ces smras so// ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs can khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ tshur khyod dang kho bo ni mtshungs te/ khyod kyang g.yang gzhi gcig thogs/ kho bo yang g.yang gzhi gcig thogs//
khyod kyang ril ba dang/ 'khyug chu dung blugs gatrar gyi snod re ra thogs/ kho bo yang 'i la thogs khyod kyang bsod snyoms lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog cing kun tu chog kho bo yang bsod
snyoms lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog cing kun tu chog na 'dri na kha ciganadi lta ma yin te/ g.yang gzhi dang/ shing shun dang/ dbyug gu dang/ ril ba dang/ blugs gatrar gyi snod lhag pa 'chang
zhing [0f10 ]ha cang chod rngad dang khre rgod dang/ ut+pa la'i rtsa ba sbyor ba la brtson par gnas so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ riltar mkhan po 'dod zhen che ba la ni
rnam par smod la/ 'dod zhen chung ba la ni bstod pas don gyis na mkhan pos bdag cag la nan tur byas kyis/ ma la bdag gis g.yang gzhi dang shing shun dang dubyug chu dang//
ril ba dang/ blugs gzar gyi snod lhag pa chu bo rtag 'bab kyi nang du boral/ mkhan po gangan ba der 'dong ngo zhes/ de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang/ shing
na dang/ dbyug bu dang/ ril ba dang/ blugs gzur gyi snod lhag pa rnams chu bo rtag 'bab kyin ng du bor nas/ rgyud gtsang ba dang spyod pa gzhung bzhin du byas nas/ ston pa lhun
'phyi'i gang na ba der dong ga lhags pa dang/ ston pa zhug 'thu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ ston pa skyug 'phyos bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyi bsams
pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin shes nas/ ji ltar bram bre'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag gis mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'ichos bshad pa byas so
rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ston pa ltag 'phya gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// rgyal po chen po ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa des/ bla na med pa yang

drag par rdzogs pa'i sbyong chub thob bo snyam na// khyod kyis du stor mi blta ste 'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang tshogs tsam
rgyal bo chen por zhan yang ngag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don duganyer ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas sems can la phan pa byas pa gang

yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba'i mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyud wi thub pa gyur to// mi rnams kyi tshil brkyang khri sgrub pa na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid 'byor par gyuraNi zhes bya ba/
rgyas par ji nang chos ldan gyi mdo las 'byung ba lta bu 'o// jitsem nami tshe le brgyad khri thub ba rnams la lus kyi gnod pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ grang ba dang tsho ba dang/ bkris
pa dang/ skom pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ brab dang/ rga ba'o// mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ rgyal po khyad ldan zhes bya ba byung ste/rgyal po khyed ldan gyi skyed mos tshul gyi gnas na/

shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba zhig yod do// rgya gro d+ha'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas kyi drung na/ bram ze shinges la chen bo lta burtsi bas kyi mu khyud ces bya ba/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya
tsam la phrug ze rnams kyi gsang tshige klog tu 'jug go/ de nas bram tre shinge ga la chen po lta burtsibs kyi mu khyud gcig pu dben par song nas bams la sams kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te/ mi

rnams ni tshe thung la tshe phyi mar 'gro dgos te/ skyes pa la mi 'chib med pas dge ba bya zhing tshangs par spyod pa spyad dgos na/ 'on kyang da ltar mi 'di dug ni da lta ste/ don sgyur pa dang/ bsod
nams myud pa dang/ dge ba sbyang pa la sems las chung ngu/ sams las chung ngur gnas par byed kyis/ ma la bdag sku dang kha spu bregs la gos dur smrig bgos te/ dad pas yang dag pa kho
nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas bram ze shing sa la chen po lta burtsi bas kyi mu khyud kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram

ze'i khye'u dug shes par gyis shig/ 'di na kho bo gcig pu zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar rgyus par sbyar ro// bram khro'i khye'u dug bdag nisku dang kha spu brags te zhes bya ba nas/
rab tu 'byung na shes ldan dag ci byed/ kye mkhan po bdag cag gis gang cung zad mi 'tshol ba de thams cad ni shes ldan mkhan po la brten nas lags pas/ gal te shes ldan po sku dpal
spu bregs nyis bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung na bdag cag kyang shes ldan mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// bram ze'i khya'i dug de'i dus la dbab par gyis shig/

de nas bram ze shing sa la chen po lta burtsibs kyi mu khyud sku drang kha spu bregs nas bya ba nas/ rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar du sta bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de rnams kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas/

gos dur smrig bgos te// bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu lcibs kyi mu khyud rab tu byung ba'i rdzas su rab tu byung ngo// de nas bram ze shangs la chen po lta burtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis mya ngan las
'da' bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa la sbangs nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya ba dang rgyas bar snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms kyi bar du
brjod par bya sta/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon mad pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa mad pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa tshad ma da pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos/

takhyab par byas nas rdzogasapar byas te gnas so// de nas bram bre shing sa la chan po lta burtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi ming/ bram khri shing sa la chen po lta burtse bas kyi mu khyud bram ze shings lachen
bo lta burtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba'i mingegrang yin pa nub par gyur cing/ ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya bar grags so// de nas ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyisabram ze'i khye'u rnams la
smas pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag mi rnams ni tshe thung ba/ nyon mongs pa/ ring po ma thogs pa yin la/ de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan mo/ dpar na rtswa'o ja mo la chags pa'i zil pa ni nyi ma
shar pa'i tshe byung bar lungazhi'ing por mi gnas so// bram ze'i khye'u dugade bzhin du mi rnams kyi tshoyang bril pa dang 'dra bar ring po mi thogs par nyon mongs pa yin la/ de yang sdug bsngal
dang ldan no/ dpar nochu la ri mo mkhan gyis ri mo bris pa ni myur du 'jig cing ring por mi gnas so// bram khro'i khye'u dug de bzhin du mi rnams kyi tshayang chu'i ro mo bzhin du ring por mi gnas
pa nyon mos pa yin l/ de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no// dipar na cha la dbyug pas khram btab pani myur du 'jig cingaring por mi gnas so/ de bzhin du tsho yang dbyug pas bris pa lta
khu yin no// dpe na khor yug chur bor ba ni myur du 'bying shing ring por mi gnas so// de bzhin du tshoyang khor yug lta bu yin no// dbar na rdo rje chung bor/
bani myur du 'bying zhing ring por mi gnas so// de bzhin dutshe yang rdo rje chungo bor ba lta bu yin no// dper na dbyug pa gnam du 'phangs pa ni myur du lhung zhing ring po ra mi gnas so// de bzhin
dutsho yang dbyug pa la/nam du 'phangs pa lta bu yin no// dper na thugs bcug pa ji tsam btags pa de tsamadu btag par bya ba rting la klug par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du srog kyang btag bar bya
ba'i ti la thug pa lta bu yin no// dbor na gsad par khrid pa'i phyugs ni gom pa re re borazhing gsad pa la cha pa yin no// de bzhin du tshoang gsad pa'i phyugs lta bu yin no/ dper na
gsad par khrid pa'i mi ni gomar bor zhing gsad pa la na ba yin no// de bzhin du tsho yang gsad pa'i ma lta bu yin no sa ma 'das pa dang/ bdam lam mchas dparan shu'i kham
tshad cig zungs chu mang po'i nang du bcug ste/ 'og nas me sbar na myur du gor bar 'gyur zhing ring por mi gnas so// de bzhin du tsho yang sha'i kham tshad lta bu yin no//
dul ba gzhi/// bam po lnga bcu pa/ ripar na ri las bab pa'i chu bo gting zab pa/ shugs drag pa/ thag ri di bo ring bo 'bab pa/ shing rtsi dod bar
byad ba ni nyin zhag de dag 'dus shing/ skad cig dang/ thang cig dang/ ud tsam de dag 'das na/ chu'i gnas pa dang 'jig pa mi mngon no// de bzhin du mi rnams kyi tsho yang chubo'i
rgyun lta bu ste/ ring por mi thogs par nyon mongs pa yin la/ de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no/ bram zi'i khye'u dug bdag ni byams pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/ rgyus par snying rje dang/
dgar ba dang/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya ba nas/ gnos sogs bya ba'i khar du'o// bram ze'i khye'u dug tshur khyed kyis kyang byams pa dang ldan pa'i soms dang//
snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyi bar gyis gnas par gyis shog/ rgyal po chen po ston la rtsibs kyi mu khyud de/ de tsam du tshong/ de tsam du/
ring du gnas/ de tsam gyis tsho'i mthar thug pa yang/ re zhig dug slong dag la mi rnams ni tshe thung ba tshapang por mi thogs pa/ nyon mongs pa yin la/ de yang sdug bsngal drang ldan
no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos ston to// rgyal po chen po de jisAm du soms/ de'i tshe de'i dus ni ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam no/ khyod kyis de
ltar mi blta sta/ 'on kyang rang nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya bar gyurato// rgyal po chen po des sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa des/ bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang/
rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin no// ston pa mig mdzes ji lta bar// bram ze'i khye'u 'joms byed dang// glang po skyong yang de dang 'dra'o// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang
ngas bla nu mdu pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba na/ nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i shes rab chen po dang spobs pa chen por gyur nas/ sems can la phan pa byas pa/

gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po ston byung ba rgyal bo phyogs bdag ces phyi bzhugakhyung ste/ rgyal bo phyogs bdag gi bu gzhonanu rdul phran zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo// rgyal po phyogs bdag
la bram bra shinges la chen po lta bu gnag lhas skyes zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ bram 'u shing sa la chen po lta bu gnag lhas skyes kyi bu bram zi'i khye'u me gas zhes bya ba mkhas pa/ gsal ba/
yid gzhungs pa/ gzhung dang mthun par sbyodapa'i shes rab dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ 'di ltar nga ni pha bumaze gnag lhas skyes zhing las kyi mtha' gang yin pa de rnams bram ze'i khye'u ma gso
la 'dri 'ong byed do// don byaba'i don nges par brtag pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang bram ze'i khye'u mgasol dris nas byed kyi/ ma dris bar ni ma yin no// gzhon nu rdul phran dang/ rgyal po'i
0 'khor rgyal rigs drug gi grogs po dang/ snying du sdug pa dang/ rna'u zla yang yin no// gang gi tshe rgyal po phyogs bdag rtsa 'dod pa 'am/ dga' bar 'dod pa 'am/ dga' dgur spyod 'dod
bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ des dgos pa thams cad dang las su bya ba thams cad bram ze gnag lhas skyes la slar gtadra nas/ stong gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la skyes pa med par song ste/ rol mo
rnams kyis rtse bar byed/ draga' dgur spyod par byed do// de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi'o// dashi bon rgyal po phyogs bdag khIn tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mibang
badra myur to// sdug bsngal zhing yid mi 'do ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong nas/ kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi bas bdag chathang du dmas par gyur to// kyi hud bram ze gnag lhas skyes/
de bas bdag nyid shin tu che thang du dums par gyur to zhes zer ro// de nas gzhon nu rdul phran rgyal bo thogs padag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ rgyal po phyogs bdag la 'di skad ces
[~ ]sa so// lha ci'i slad du bram bri gnag lhas skyes gus pas shin tu sdugabasngal zhing thugs la gcags par gyur/ sdug bsngal zhing thugs la gcags pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar
mdzod/ gzhon nu kho bo gang gi tsho rtse 'dod pa 'am/ dga' bar 'dod bo 'am/ dga' dgur spyod bar 'dod por gyur ba di'i tshe/ kho bo'i dgos pa thams cad dang las su bya ba thams
[s/ ]@#/// cad bram ze gnag lhas skyes la sgyur gtadunas/ stong gi khang bzadras kyi gshin skyes pa mang par song nas/ rol mo rnams kyis rtse bar byed/ dga'
yo bar byed/ dga' dgur skyod par byed do// dan kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi hud dram ze gnag lhas skyes shi bas bdag shin tu che thang du dmas par gyur to snyam mo// lha bram
wA za gnag lhas skyas sum pas shin tu sdug bsngal zhing thugs ma dgyes par gyur to/ sdug bsngal zhing thugs mi dgyes pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar ma mdzad cig/ de ci'i slad
tshe du zhe na/ lha bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyi bu bram ze'i khye'am gso zhes bgyi ba mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ gzhung dang mthun par spyod pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa zhig
mchis te/ 'di ltar de'i ba bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyi las kyi mtha' bgyis pa gang lags pa de dag kyang/ bram bra'i khye'am gso la dris nas bgyis kyi/ ma dris par ni ma lags so//
don du bgyi ba'i don ngesabar brtag pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bram ze'i khye'u ma gso la dris nas brgyus kyi/ ma dris par ni ma lags so// lha de ltalags pas/ pha gnag lhas
hUM skyos kyi las thabs su dbang bskur du gsol/ de nas rgyal po phyogs bdag gis/ bram blo'i khye'u gso pho zhes bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod sa deng phyin chad/
0 nas/ pha gnas lhas skyes kyi las thabs su bcug go/ bka'abazhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u cha gsos gnyan no// de nas bram ze'i khye'u ma gso de pha bram ze'i gnag lhas skyes byed byed pa'i zhing

las kyi mtha' gang yin pa de rnams kyang byed do// de'i yabram ze gnag lhas skyes don du bya ba'i don nges ba can rtog rtog pa gang yin pa de dag kyang de nges bar rtog go/ de nas bram ze'i khye'am gso'i
ming bram ze'i khye'u ma gso zhes bya ba gang yin bdenub par gyur cing bram ze gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar grags so// de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyalarigs
drug kho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smros mo// shes ldan ngagatshur byed gzhon nu rdul phran gang na ba der dang la phyin pa dang/ gzhon nu rdul phran la rgyal ba dang tsho sal ba dag byos la//
gzhon nu rdul phran la 'di skad ces jiltar rdul phran khyod bde na/ de bzhin du bdag cag kyang bde zhing/ ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na/ de bzhin du bdag cag kyang sdug bsngal par
'gyur la/ rgyal bo'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug po ni rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang/ snying du sdug pa dang/ ni'u zla yin gyis rdul phran khyod gal te yab 'dus nas/ yab kyi rgyal srid
kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na/ nas kyang bdag cag la longs spyod dag las longs skyod kyi deb go lo sha'i mtshod cig ces gyis shige/ mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal
[g]// rigs drug gis/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes las mnyan nas/ gzhon nu rdul phran gang na ba der dong stang sbyin pa dang/ gzhon nu rdul phran la rgyal ba dang tsho Al ba
dag byas nas/ gzhon nu rdul phran la 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde ni/ de bzhin du bdag cag bde zhing/ jiltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal n/ da bzhin
du bdag cag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug ni/ rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang/ snying du sdug pa dang/ na' zla 'gros kyis/ rdul phran khyogal du yab
'das nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na/ ci nas kyang bdag cag la lengos sbyod dag las longs spyod kyi bgo bshi' mdzod cig/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhonan rdul phran gyis
mnyan to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal bo phyogs bdag dus lasa'ajus te shi ba tshub nas/ blon po'i tshogs rnams dang/ sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams dang/ rgyal khrims 'don
pa rnams dang/ gsang tshig lhan cig 'don pa rnams kyis/ gzhon nu rdul phran pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag cing/du rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i phyir dbang bskur ro//
de nas gzhon nu rdul phran gyi ming gzhon nu rdul phran nyis bya ba gang yin pa de nub cing/ rgyal po rdul phran zhes bya bar grags so/ de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis/ bram ze gnag lhos skyas
lo tam ba kug nas 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan bos nga'i yab la ji ltar rdzas su ston pa de ltar nga la da phyin chad rjes su bstan par bya bar soms shige/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram
ze gnag lhas skyes kyis mnyan no// de nas zam ze gnag lhas skyes kyis/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug pho nyas bkug ste 'di skad ces smras so/ shes ldan dag khyed cag rgyul bo
rdul phran gang na ba der deng la byin pa dang/ rgyal bo rdul phran la rgyal ba dang tshe sbal ba dag byos la 'di skad ces/ lha lha gzhon nur gyur pa na bdag cag sbyan sngar mchis nas 'di skad ces/
ji ltar rdul phran khyod bden/ de bzhin du bdag cag bod shing/ ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na/ de bzhin du bdag cag sdug basprul pa 'gyur la rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug po
ni rdul phran khyod kyi grogs po dang/ snying du sdug pa dang/ nubu zla legs kyis/ rdul phran khyod gal te yab 'das te ab kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na/ ci nas kyang bdag cag
la longs spyod dag las longs sbyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod cig ces gsol ba dgongs samatshos sgos shig/ gal te 'di skad ces ngas dran no zer na/ lha dani de'i dus la bab pa lags so/
zhes sbos shige/ 'on te de 'di skad cesas chen po nang yongs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'di chab dun du 'gyod pa su zhig yong ces zer na/ gnag lhas skyes ma lags pa gzhan
gu yang ma mchis so zhes smyos shig mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gis bram ze gnag lhas skyes bas mnyan nas/

rgyal bo rdul phran gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang/ rgyal po rdul phran la rgyul ba dang tshe sprul ba dag byas nas rgyal po rdul phran la 'di skad ces smras so// lhu lha sngon gzhon nur gyur pa
na bdag cag spyan sngar mchis nas 'di skad ces/ ji ltar rdul phran khyod bde na/ de bzhin du bdag cag bde zhing/ ji ltar rdul phran khyod sdug bsngal na/ de bzhin du bdag cag sdug
bsngal bar 'gyur la/ bdag cagargyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigos drug po ni rdul phran khyod kyi grogs bo dang/ snying du sdug pa dang/ ne'u zla lags kyis/ rdul phran khyod gal te yab kyi
rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag na/ ci nas kyang bdag cag la longs sbyod drag las longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' mdzod cig sog gsolab dgongs logs sam/ shes ldan dag ngas dran no//
lha da ni de'i dus la phob lags so// 'o na sa chen po nang yongs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'gyed pa su zhig yod/ lha gnag lhas skyes ma lags pa gzhan ma mchis
ny+nyo so/ de nas rgyal bo rdul phran gyis/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po khyod kyis sa chen bo 'di nang yongs la phyi shing rta'i dbyibs ltar 'dug
ba 'di cha bdun du 'gyed nus sam lha legs par rngo thog go/ de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis rgyal po rdul phran las mnyananas/ dkyil dang dkyil na yul 'khor bu chung/
dngakho bu chung yod pa gang dag yin pa de dag rgyal po rdul phran gyi ris subcud pa dang/ des rgyal po rdul phran yi rangs par gyur te/ bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis kho bo'i rigs ji lta bu
zhig tu bcad na/ da ltar dper na mkhas ba/ gsal ba/ bya brag shes pas byas pa lta bu gyur to zhes yi rangs pa yong go bar byas so// yul 'khor bu chung gzhan gang yin pa de
dag kyang rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gi rigs su bcad pa dang des rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rogs drug kyang yi rangs par gyur te/ bram ze gnag lhas skyas kyis ji lta bu zhig tu
bgos na/ ji ltar mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ bye brag shes par byas pa bzhin du kho bo cag gis yun ring po nas bsam bsam pa'i yul de dag/ da kho bo cag gis ris su bcad ces
yi rangs pa yang go bar byas so/ de nas rgyal bo'i zham ring rgyal rigs drug gis bram ze gnag lhas skyas la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po rgyal ro rdul thun la ji ltar rjes su
ston pa de bzhin du/ de slan chad bdag cag la yang khyod kyis rjes su bstan par dgongs su gsol/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes bram ze gnag lhas skyas kyis mnyan no// de nas
bram ze gnag lhas skyes rgyal bo rdul phran dang/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu bdun dung/ bram ze'i rigs shing
sa la chen po lta bu bdun dang/ khyim bdag shing sa la chen po lta bu bdun dang thabs rir bab pa'i chung ba bzhi bcu la rjes su ston to// bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i
gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ 'dul sbyong mkhan dang/ glang po che la zhon pa dang/ rta la zhon pa dang/ ral gri 'dzin stangs mkhan dang/ gzhu 'dzin pa dang/ zhabs
'bring byed pa dang/ go re long byed pa dang/ bro gar len pa dang/ rgyalapo'i bu ngul phod pa// dupa' ba/ rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang/ sams srung ba dang/
sku mkhan dang/ khrus byed pa du ma la yang rjes su ston par byed do// de nas bram khra gnag lhas skyes kyi ming bram ze gnag lhas skyes bram ze gnag lhas skyes zhes bya ba'i ming gang yin
pa de nub par gyur phyi/ bram ze chogapo gnag lhas skyes bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar grags so// de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes bram ze rnams kyis ni tshangs par bkur
ro// rgyal bos ni lhar bkur ro/ grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis ni rgyal por bkur ro// bram ze rnams kyis ni bodisnyam du shes te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas sgyus kyis tshangs pa'i
lam mthong ste/ tshas pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas/ mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam mo// rgyal po dang/ grong mi dang/ ul mi rnams kyis kyang 'di snyam dushes te/ bram
ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs pa'i lam shes shing/ tshangs pa'i lam mthor lta/ tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas/ mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam mo// de nas
tham ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du sams te/ bdag de ltar bram ze rnams kyis ni tshangs par bkur/ rgyal bos ni lhar bkur/ grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyisani rgyal por bkur/
bram ze rnams ni 'di snyam du shes te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/ tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas/ mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam
rgyal po dang/ grong mi dang/ yul mi rnams kyis kyang 'di snyam du shes te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes ni tshangs pa'i lam shes shing tshangs pa'i lam mthong ste/ tshangs
pa'ile ma shes shing mthong nas/ mtha' dug rdzogs par byas te gnas par byas so snyam mo// bdag gis ni tshangs pa'i lam yang mi shes/ bdag ni tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong nas
mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas ba yang ma yin na/ bdag gis bdag gi ba bram ze gnag lhas skyes las/ bram ze gang zhig dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan
gyis gnas na/ de'i drung du tshas pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes thos kyis/ ma la bdag gis byar zla ba bzhi bo dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par
bya'o snyam mo// de nas bram ze chen bo gnag lhas skyes kyis/ rgyal bo rdul thun la 'di skad ces gsaso// lha re zhig rjes su ston pa gzhan zhig btsal du gsol/ badrag ni dbyar zla ba bzhi bo
dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'tshal lo// mkhan pod de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig/ rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang/ rgyal rigs shings la chen po
lta bu bdun dang/ bram ze shing sa la chan po lta bu bdun dang/ khyim bdag shingos la chen po lta bu bdun dang/ thab rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcul smras pa/ shes ldan dag re zhig ma
g.yang bar bag yod pas khyim na 'khod cig/ bdug ni dbyar gyi zla ba bzhi po dgal dban bar snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'dod do// rdzu'i sras de de'i dus la bab lags so// bram
bra'i khyi'u lnga brgya bo dag la smras l/ bram ze'i khye'u dag re zhig ji skad thos pa dang/ ji skad bstan pa dang/ ji ltar kun chub par byas pa'i rig pa dag zung zhig/ lhogs shig/ bdag
na debyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'dod do// mkhan po da de'i dus la bab lags so// 'dul sbyong mkhan dang/ glang po che la zhon ba dang/ rta la
zhon pa dang/ shing rta pa dang/ ral gri 'dzin stag mkhan dang/ gzhu 'dzin pa dang/ zhabs 'bring byed pa dang/ go re long byed pa dang/ khro gar len pa dang/ rgyal po'i bu tshul
bod pa/ dpa' ba/ rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dung/ soms srung ba dang/ sgra mkhan dang/ khrus byed pa du ma la smras pa/ shes ldan dag re zhig rjes su ston pa gzhan
tshol cig/ kho bo ni dbyar zla ba bzhi po drag la dban par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'dod do// mkhan po nga dro'i dus la bab lags so// da nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis
grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su khang bzangs shig brtsigs nas/ dbyar zla ba bzhi bo dag la dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas pa las/ de'i drung du tshangs pa ma 'ongs so// de nas bram
ba chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis dbyar zla ba bzhir zhag gcig gis ma lon pa dang 'disnyam du sems te/ bdag gi pha bram ze gnag lhas skyas las dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag la dban par snying rje'i bsam
gtan gyis gnas ni/ de'i drung du tshangs pa 'ongs bar 'gyur ro zhes thos na/ bdag gi drung du tshangs pa ma 'ongs so snyam mo/ de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ bram ze chen po gnag
lhas sbyas kyis bsam pa sams kyis shes nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis/ tshangs pa mi mdzad kyi
bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing/ bram ze chen bo gnag lhas skyes kyis khang btsongs su 'ongs so// de'i tshe tshangs pa mi mdzad kyi bdag po'i
kha dog gi mthus khang bzangs thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis nam gyi cha smad la bab pa dang khang bzangs thams cad snang ba rgya chen
bos khyab b.ru gyur par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de'i rmi tshigs su bcad de stsas pa/ 'di 'dra ba yi kha dog ni// bdag gis ma mthong ma thog na// gzugs bzang kha dog ldan pa yi/
grogs po khyod ni su zhig yin// gang la lhar bcas tshangs ris drang// de bzhin dris ni gzhan dag gis// gzhon nur rab shes de lta bur// gnag lhas skyes kyis pazhes byos/ tshadA
pa khyod la 'dud bgyid cing/ bkur sti spang ni bgyid lags kyis/ badrag gi tshig rnams gsan mdzod la// myur du gnang bar mdzad du gsol// gnag lhas skyes pa khyod kyis ni/
sgyus ba'i tshig de gzung bar byas// tshe 'di'i don ni gang yin dang// phyi ma'i don ni gang yin pa/ yid la bsams pa de dag ni// bram ze nga la dris shig dang// dris pa de dang de dag ni/
nga yis khyod la gtan la dbab// de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ re zhig bdag gis mthong ba'i chos kyi don gyis thob par byab gang yin pa de ni bdag gis thob
kyis/ ma la bdag gis tshe phyi ma'i don las brtsams te dri bar bya'o snyam nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ blo la bsngogs pa'i yid gnyis the tsom dag/ tshangs pa kun 'gyur
gzhon nu la 'dri ba// gang du gnas shing gang la bslab byas na// tshangs pa'i 'jig rtan mi 'chi 'thob bar 'gyur// khram ma'i nang du 'o snyam spangs shing// gcig bur gyur pa snying rjer
mos pa dang// dring med du 'khrig las chags bral ba// 'di la gnas shing 'di nyid la bslabs na// mo yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'chi medu 'thob// de nas bram ze chen po gnag
lhas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ tshangs pa'i bshadupa/ bram ' mi'i nang du 'o snyam spangs shing// zhes bya ba 'a dri'i don yang bdag gis kun shes/ tshangs pas bshad pa gcig
pur gyur ba snying rjer chos pa dang// zhes bya ba'adi'i don yang bdag gis kun shes na/ tshangs pas bshad pa drang mad rdzong 'khrig las chags bral ba// zhes bya ba 'di'i drin bdag
gis mi shes so snyam du bsams nas/ de'i tshotshigs su bcad de snyas ba tshangs ba mi'i nang dri nga gang zhig lags// 'jig rten kun na ngogs kyis 'bab chu ltar// gang gis
sgribs na ngan song sgrib pa can// chongs pa 'thob 'gyur laman mo shes pa'o// khro dang brdzun dang khon dang rna'atshodapa/ 'jungs dang mngon pas nga rgyal mi bzod dang// chags
dang zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang// phrag dog ser sna dug dang 'tshig pa lta// de dug bram ze mi'i nang dri nga yin// 'jig rten kun na ngogs kyis 'bab chu
ka ltab// dmis bsgribs na ngan song sgrib ba can// tshangs pa 'thob 'gyur lam ni mishes so// de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du goms to/ ji skad du bdag gis
tshangs pas smras pa'i don shes pa ltar na/ khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs bar spyod pasal gyis dgapa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa// yongs sudag
pa rnam par byang ba spyad pa 'di ni blo ba ma yin pas/ ma la bdag gis skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smig bgos nas/ dan pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim mad
par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam go// de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ tshangs
par skye bar bya ba'i phyir// 'di la 'bad pa brtan par gyis// chos 'di dag pa g.yung drung yin// zhes ny+tsas nas/ tshongs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de
nas dbyar zla ba bzhi bo dag 'das nas/ rgyal po rdul phran bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bram ze chan po gnag lhas skyes kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag
[z ]byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ rgyal po rdul phran la/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis 'di skad ces smras so// sa bdag rgyal chen
rdul phran khyod// bdag gitshig ni gsan par mdzod/ gnag lhas skyes bdag mi spro yis// rgyal srid nyid kyis bskyang du gsol// de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis tshigs su bcadra de
sus pa/ khyod kyi 'dod pa mi chog pa// gang yin nga yang khyod la bskang// khyod la'atshab de gsad kyis// gnag lhas skyes kyis bdag ma spangs// rgyal po bdag 'dod ma chog min//
bdag la 'tshaba'ang ma mchis te// mi ma yin pa'i tshig thos nas// khyim gyi gzhi la ma skye'o// gang las thos nas bram ze khyod// 'dir ni bdag dang 'dod spong ba// mi ma yin pa de ni
'dra/ de yis de ni bdag la sa// snying rje yi ni gnas pa yis// rab dben bsam gtan byedu ba na// de nas tshangs pa mdun du 'ongs// tha dad phyogs ni snang bar byas// bdag
gis de yi tshig thos nas// khyim gyi gzhi la ni sgro 'o// bram ze gang du 'gro ba der// kho bo yang ni 'gro bya zhing// khyod kyi nyan thos 'gyur bar gyis// gnag lhas skyes khyod ston pa mdzod//
gang la so so'i skya bo rnams// chags pa'i 'dod pa de dag spongs// 'dod pa rnams la mi lta zhing// bden pa'i chos la gnas par mdzod// tshangs par skye bar bgyi slad du// nor bu dag
u@#/ ba biT+Ta/ ji ltar m bcos dri mod ltagi/ tshangs bar spyod brgyud par bgyi// mkhan bod de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de nas bram chan po gnag
lhas skyes kyis/ rgyal bo'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug rnams la gas pa shes ldan dag bdag ni skra dang khaspu bregs te/ gog dur smeg bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med/
shu par rab tu 'byung na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po lo bdun du gzhes shig dang/ lo bdun 'das nas bdag cagakhu dung/ rgyun dang/ gzhan da rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bkod nas/
mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab du 'byung ngo// shes ldan dag lo bdun ltaha cang yang thogs chos so// gzhan yang 'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba/ las spyod rnams ni myos
par 'gyur ba srog 'chad pa ni shes par dka' ba yin pas/ lo bdun 'das na yang shes ldan dag rab tu babyung ngam mi 'byung gtol med pas/ ra zhig kho bo rab tu 'byung ngo//
mkhan po lo drug gam/ lnga 'am/ ban 'am/ gsum mam/ gnyis sam/ gcig gam/ zla ba bdun nam/ drug gam/ lnga 'am/ bzhi 'am gsum cham/ gnyis
ny+nyo sam/ gcig gam/ zhag bdun zhig gzhes shig dang/ zhag bdun 'das nas bdag cag bu dang/ spun dang/ gzhan dag rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bkod nas/ mkhan po rab
! tubyung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// shes ldan dag zhag bdun lha ring po yang mi thogs na 'on kyang 'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba/ longs spyod rnams ni myos pa/
'gyur ba/ srog 'chad bani shes par dka' ba yin pas zhag bdun 'das na yang shes ldan dag rab tu 'byung ngam mi 'byung gtol med pas/ re zhig bad rab tshu 'byung ngo//
mkhan po dra de'i dus mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de nas bram ze chen bo gnag lhas skyes kyis/ rgyal rigs shi sa 'a chen po lta bu bdun dang/ phum bu shing sa la chen po lta bu bdun
dang/ khyim bdag shing sa la chen po lta bu bdun dang/ thabs nir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smug bgos nas/
dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/ shes ldan dag ci byang/ rdzo'i sras ga cagakhatshun mo bgyi ba'i dus na ni btsun mo/ grogs bgyi ba'i dus na nigyogs
lags pas/ rje'i sras gal te sku dang kha ma bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dud pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/ rje'i sras rab tu byung ba'i rjes su
bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// shes ldan dag nga de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig/ de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la smras
@#// pa/ shes ldan dag bdagani sgra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ drad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/ shes
ldan dug rtsi byed/ mkhan po bdag cag gdacung zad ci'atshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po las brtan te lags kyiso/ gal te mkhan po skra dang kha spu bregs te/ go so ngur smrig bgos
nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byungan/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rdzas su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ shes ldan dag da de'i dus la bab//
par shes par gyis shig/ 'dul sbyong ma khan dang/ glang po che la zhon pa dang/ rta la zhon ba dang/ shing rtapa dang/ ral gri 'dzin stangs ma khen dang/ gzhu 'dzin pa dang/ zhabs 'bring byed pa
dang/ go re long byed pa dang/ bro gar len pa dang/ rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ tshul bodob/ rab gnonatshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang/ sams srung ba dang/ skra mkhan dang/
khrus byed pa du ma la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag ni zhes bya ba nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dud pa yang dag ba kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du
'khyung na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// shes ldan dag de'i dus la dbab bar shes par gyis shig/
! de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes skra dang ba sbakhregs te/ gos ngur smig bgos nas/ dad pa la yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo// rgyal po rdul phran yang/
'khor brgya phrag du ma dang/ 'khor stong phrag du ma dang/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma dang ma dang bslu bregs te/ gos ngur smig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
mdu par/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo// rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu bdun dang/ bram ze
shings la che na po lta bu bdun dang/ khyim bdag shing saM la chen po lta bu bdun dang/ thabs rir bab pa 'i chung ma bcu yang sku dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa
gang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par/ bram ze rgan po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byungaba'i rdzas su rab tu byung ngo// bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam yang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur
sgrig bgos nas/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rdzas su rab tu byung ngo// glang po che la zhon pa dang/ rta la zhon pa dang/ shing rta pa dang/ ral gri 'dzin stangs
ba dang/ gzhu 'dzin pa dang/ zhabs 'bring byed pa dang/ go ri long byed pa dang bro gar len pa dang/ rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba tshul yod pa/ rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnamA
dang sams srung ba dang/ sku mkhan dang khrus byed pa rnams kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smig bgos te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes
rab tu byung pa'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo// bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes de ltar rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrub pa lnga po/ sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa/ shes rab nyam
chung bar byed ba/ gnod par byed pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar byed pa spangs nas/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa
med pa/ yangs pa/ rgyu chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ phyogs gcig tu mos te khub par byas nas/ rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bzhin du
gnyis pa dang/ de bzhin du gsum pa dang/ de bzhin du bzhi pa dang/ blo dang/ 'og dang/ thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rtan 'di thams cad byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems khon
mad pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs ba/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad mad pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nasaM/ rdzogs par byas te gnas so// dra
bzhin du snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa// yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin tu
bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu chos te khyab bar byas nas/ rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bzhin du gnyis pa dang/ de bzhin du gsum pa dang/ de bzhin du bzhi pa dang/ bla dang/
'ogadang/ thad kar rnam pa thams cad du' jig rten 'di thams cad btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sams khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod ba med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen
bor gyur pa/ tshadu mad pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas/ rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi ming bram ze
chen po gnag lhas skyes bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes zhes bya ba'i ming gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing/ ston pa gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar grags so// de nas ston pa gnag lhas
skyas 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang/ 'khor stong phrag du ma dang/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ grong rdal nas grong rdal dang/ grong khyer nas grong khyar du ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo// de'i
tshoskyas pa 'am bud med dag las nyes pa 'ga' byung na/ ston pa gnag lhas skyes phyogs gang na 'dug pa'i phyogs de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ ston pa gnag lhas skus de
la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo zhes/
ched du brjod pa lan gsu mched du brjod do// mdun na 'don bdun byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ ral gris 'tshodang tshangs sbyin dang// sna tshogs za dang de bzhin sa//
rdul phran u kha 'khor skyong gnyis gnyis// de tshe skye bo de bdun byung// ka ling ka nAmache ba'i khyil// rdomangs nan skem byed de// srung byed na ni ma ho ldan/ ang gar tsam pa'i ris su
bcad// lus 'phags na ni mi thi la/ stang bralo can n ma rungs ba// wa ra N+Nasaraka gi sta/ gnag lhas skyes kyis ris bcad de'o// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe
de'i dus kyi ston pa gnag lhas skyes gang yin ba de ni nga nyid yin no// rgyal po chen po dras sems can la phan pa byas pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/
khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang pa'i don bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyutsam dang/ rkyen tsam dang/ tshogs tsam yin// btsun pa bcom ldan
'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thog mar thugs gang du bskyod lags/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rgyal po bod ldan zhes bya ba byung ste/ da'i yul du glang po rin po
cham tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ yan lag bdunashin tu gnas pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig byung ngo// de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis/ glang bo 'dul
ma khan mkhas ba pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces wA// mkhas pa des pa khyod kyis glang po che dam pa 'di myur dulegs par rdul bar byos la la phul cig/ g+ha bka' bzhin 'tsha
zhes/ glang bo 'dul mkhan mkhas pas/ rgyal po 'od ldan las gtan nas glang bo che dam pa de 'dul bar byed de/ de dul bar yig nas/ rgyal bo 'od ldan la phul te/ lha'i glang bo
che dam pa ni dul lags pas/ lha da do'i dus la bab par mkhyen par ma dzad du gsol/ de nas rgyal po 'od ldan glang po che dam pa de la zhon te/ glang po 'dul mkhan yang gong du zhon nas ri
dgas 'chor du song ngo// ji tsaman glang po che des/ nags kyi ba glang mo'i dri tshor nas/ des da de'i rjes bzhin du brgyugs so// de nas rgyal po glang po che rlung ltar mgyogs pas khyer ba
dang/ glang bo che 'dul mkhan la smras pa/ kye glang po 'dul mkhan/ nam mkha' gul ba 'dra zhing phyogs kun myur du 'du bar 'gro ba 'dra// sani mtha' dag 'khor lo bzhin 'khor shing

rnams ma la la la 'khor ba 'dra// glang po'i dbang po gangs ri 'gro ba lta bu 'di rgyug mthong nas ni// ri bo 'di rgyug snyam nas rnams gya tshom myur du rgyug pa 'dra// kye glang po che 'dul mkhan glang po che'i
dbang po shul cig jul cig/ glang chen dbang po tshar gcad par// bzang po rab tu 'bad par rgyas// glang chen gnya' rengs khyer ba yis// kho bo cir 'gyur gtol med khyer// glang po che 'dul
bas smras pa/ lha drang srong dam pas snas pa'i gsang sngags bzlas bgyi zhing// 'di la lcags kyus tshar bcad 'bad pa yang bgyin// 'chi bar nges pa'i rnams kyi
tshe yis sman bzhin du// glang bo 'di ni bdag stobs zil gyis mnan nas mchi/ mi yi dbang po lcags kyu 'am// zhags pa 'am yang na lcag gis kyang// 'dod chags gnya' rengs khyer
ba'i sams/ tshar gcad nus pa ma lags so// 'dod chags sems kyi zug rnguni// ji zhig ltar na skye 'gyur te// tshul 'ga' zhige gso rgyus 'gyur la// 'ga' zhig gis kyang zhi bar 'gyu//
gangag chaglang po 'dul mkhan pos glang po chodam pa dro gnas thams cad du bzlog par ma nus pa de'i tsho rgyal po la smras pa// lha glang po che 'di ni 'khrul gyis/ shing gi yal ga la 'jus
mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal po dang 'dul mkhan shing gi yal ga la 'jus te 'dug go/ de nas do shi ba las thar te b.rogyur nas/ rgyal pos/ 'dul mkhan lasmras pa/ khyod kyis glang
po che dam pa ma thul bar nga la phul lo// des smras pa/ lha 'di bdag gig shin tu dul bar bgyis te/ 'on kyang nags kyi ba glang mo'i dri tshor nas nyan dum btub lags so// lha de lta
klu lags mod kyi/ dpyod dran nas ring po mi thogs par mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas glang po che de chos pa dang bral bar gyur nas zhag bdun len pa dang/ dpyad rjes su dran nas rang nyid gnas su
'ongs te 'dug go/ de nas glang po che 'dul mkhan gyis/ rings paringes par rgyal po la smras pa/ lha glang po che da ni mchis lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis ni 'dim thul
lo/ (lha bya la 'a gsaso// ci mngon/ lha'i spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o zhes/ dres lcags kyi thu lum so mal du tshos bar bsregs pa rigs dpyad kyi sar khyer te len du gzhug par brtsams
so// de nas sa bag tsha ba med pas blang bar brtsams pa dang/ glang po 'dul mkhan gyis smas pa/ lha len du ni btub na/ 'on kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ kyi
mkhas pa de ltar shin tu du ba 'dis bdag cag g.yengs pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ lha bdag gis sngar lus thul gyis/ sems ni ma lags bo zhes ma gsol lam/ bdagon lus
'dul ba lags kyi/ sams 'dul ba ni ma lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ sams 'dul ba 'ga' yod par khyod kyis mthong ngam thos sam/ dalhas bskul nas smras pa/ lha
lus 'dul ba dngasams 'dul ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams mchis so// 'dod pa'irgyus byung nyes gzhom phyir// mang po rtsom par byed mod kyi// mi nus par ni shes nas kyang//
brtson 'grus nyams nas ldeg bar byed// de dang der ni de lta bu '// 'bad pa rnam pa mang byas kyang/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nags tshal gyi// 'a nas phyin par mi 'gyur ro// 'dod pa ga tshom
par 'dod pa ni// kha cig ul rnams spong bar byed// de gzhom 'dod pa gzhan dag ni// dga' bzhin dpang po tshim par byed// lha dang lha min mi dang sang ge stag
dung sprul dag dang/ srin bu phya ba phye ma leb dang 'jig rten 'di deg kun// 'dod pa'i zhags pa shin tu phra mo rnams kyis yid bcings nas// sring 'gro'i thobs po 'dir ni 'khor lo bzhin du
shin tu 'khor// bdag ni sna tshogs thabs kyis 'di lta bur// gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs pa'i glang po 'dul// rgyal bo gzugs can ma lags phrasems ni// drang srong chab rlung
'tshal bas ma sprul lo// glang pon 'dul ba gzugs mang phru ba'i phams/ drang srong chu rlung brabs ma thul na// gang gi dbang du gzugs mdasams 'gyur de// ma yi 'jig rten dug
na yod dmakya/ gang gi dbang du gzugs med sams 'gyur da// lha cig mi yi 'jig rten na mchis te// rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas mthu bo che// nyon mongs sbyangs pa dpa' bo stobs
ldan pa/ de dang gang dag de 'dra'i rjes 'brang ba// de dbang 'dir ni gzugs med sems 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi brtson 'grus
rang stobs thos nas/ sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tusmon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa rgya chen gyur pa 'di yis su// 'gro bar rang byung
sangs rgyas rgyun ni// sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral ba// skye bo'i tshogs dag bdag gis bsgral bar bya// bdag gis skye dgu legs bskyangs las byung ba 'am// btungs
las byung bsod nams yod pa gang// dres ni sangs rgyas nyid thob 'jig rten dang// 'dod pa'i rims nad las ni thar par bya// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po
'od ldan du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid du yin te/ ngasader thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// btsun pa bcom
ldan 'dus kyis blo namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du ger ba'i phyir/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus gang la thog mar bsod snyoms phul lags/ rgyal bo chen po sngon/

byung ba yangs pa zhes bya pa'i grong khyer yod de yangs pa'i grong khyer du rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig byung ngo// de'i tshe ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba nas//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe mchog zung dang bzang po zungani/ shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu zhes bya'o// rim gro byed pa ni dge slong kun dga'
bo zhes bya'o// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon pa dang/
de rlung shas che ba'i bstun gyis thebs nas/ das tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la rdza mkhan angs pa'i 'od las mar dang/
til mar dang/ bu rab chu khyer ta shog cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyananas/ rdza ma ban yangs pa'i 'od gangan ba
dur song ste phyin pa dang/ rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces smras so// yangs pa'i 'od shes par gyis shige/ bcom ldan 'das rlung shas che ba'i spun gyis thebs te/ lamar dang
til mar dang/ bu ram chudagosaso// de nas rdza mkha yangs pa'i 'od kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan nas/ mar dang/ til mar dang/ bu'am chu khyer tabu dang lhan cig yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang/ maradang til mar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku khyugs nas chu'ajam pos sku khrus byas te/ bu ram chu'i btung ba
gsol to// des na nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzod cing 'tsho bar gyur to// de nas rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od kyis/ de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/

bdag kyang rab zhu sbyin pa 'diyig shAkya'i rigs skyes ba// yon tan rigs dang rus dag mnyam pa'i sas rgyas nyid gyur cing// bdag gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar gyi nyamathaka 'chi ba yi// pha rolazhi ba
rgya chen 'jigs pa med pa sgrol bar shog/ de'i bus kyang ny+nyo na lam btab pa/ bdag kyang las 'dis nagazugs med pa'i chos rnams rtogs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro byed par gyur cig

ces byas so// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ der ngas yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la thog ma
bsod snyoms phulal// dgitshade'i dus kyi bu gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no////'dul bkazhi/dbam po nga gcig pa// 1
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i slad du/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyedacig la bsnyen bkur bgyis lags/ rgyal po chen
po ri zhig grangs med pa dang po la/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas// 'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi ba'o// de'i bar bdun khri bdun stong gi/ sangs rgyas rnams ni des machod do// grangs med gcig zhi/
'das pa yi// rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod pa'i phyir// nga la skyo ba'i soms med do// rgyal po chen po grangs med pa gnyis pa la ni/ sangs rgyas mar me mdzad nas ni///

dbang po'i rgyal mtshan thub pa'i bar// bdun khri drug stong dag gi ni// sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod// grangs med gnyis po tshangabarani// rgyal ba ngayis mchod byas te// skye ba de dang da dug chu/
nga la skyo ba'i gnas med do// grangs med pa gsum pa la yang// sangs rgyas legs mdzadunas bzung ste/nga laskyob 'asamasamadad//sangs rgyas 'od srungs bar dag tu/ bdun khri bdun stong las gdam
nga yis mchod// grangs med gsum po de la ni// rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te// byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na// de'i tshongal skyo sems med// nga ni byang chub sems dpa' na// sangs rgyas mchog ni
de dag mchod// 'jig rten 'dren pa de kun gyis/ nga ni sangs rgyas nyid du bstan// sa ni sngon bsams gang yin pa// nga yi smon lam thams cad rdzogs// sa nisangs rgyas khur bor te//
kaM sems can rnams mirjes su bzung// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar dga' ste rjes su a ras nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ral song ngo// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos zhus ba/ 'jig rten gtso bo rnam
'dren pa// thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs// thog mar gang du bskyod pa dag/ skal ldan chen po bdag la gsungs// khyod sngon byang chub spyad pan// sangs rgyas ji snyed dus gang du// ji
lta bur ni bsnyen bkur mdzad// mi mchog de ni bdag la gsungs// kun dga' bo yi chog gsan nas// rkangaganyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro la thugs rje mdzad nas su// thub
pas byang chub sbyod pa gsungs// sangs rgyas 'dod chags bral thos shing// glang po drags pa'i shas chen dang// 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyur mthong nas/ ngas ni byang chub sems bskyed do/
mi dbang 'od ldan gyur pa na// ngas ni byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir// ngas ni brtan por dam bcas te// skyon med pa yi sbyin pa btang// nga ni rdza mkhan gyur pa na// sangs rgyas shAkya thub mthong
nas byang chub phyir ni thog mar sa/ mar dang til mar gyis mchod do// gron gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu/ tshong dpon bu mor gyur pa na/sangs rgyas ko di ru mthong nas// sa ni marama'i sbyin pa byas//
sangs rgyas gzhan gyis ma thul ba'i// nga sngon sde snod gsum pa las// dge slong dge 'dun rtsod pa la// dge 'dun la ni bud mad smras// tshig gi nyes byas byung bas na// mod la bud med nyid du
gyur/ slar yang sams dod byas pas ni// skyes pa nyid ni thob par gyur// sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu// ngani rgyal po'i sras gyur tshe// gcen po rin chen gatsug tor la/ ]mar ma'i sbyin/
bas mchod byas shing// ngas ni zla gsum drug cu ru// bde mdzad kyi ni yum ring byas// sani mya ngan 'das pa de'i// mchod rten la ni nor kun phul// nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na// sku/
brnyan dbyangs la zla gsum mchod// de yi mochod rten mthon po ni// ngagu bcurtsa gcig brtsig tu bcug/ nga ni bram zer gyur pa na// sangs rgyas dpa' 'byung mthong nas duga'// legs
par thal sbyar de nas yang// mi mchog la ni mchod pa byas// nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na// bstan bcos du ma 'jigs med tshe// sangs rgyas phan par bzhed
mdzad pa// ngayi stan la spyan drangs so// sngon ni dka' thub ldan pa yi/ drangasrong chos la gnas gyur tshe// sangs rgyas ko'udi n+ya mthong nas// sani ri bo'i kha nas mchongs/ drang grong
gyur na'ang yid dga' bas// sangs rgyas bstan sdug mthong nas// rtswa ba dang ni 'bras bu'i phyir// bsti gnas bzhugs pa ngas spyan drangs// 'jig rten 'dran pa sbyin mdzes la/ drang srong
gyur tshabakur ste byas/ shing shunayid du 'od ba yis// ngas ni mi yi mchog bkab bo// nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na// yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung spangs nas// byang chub 'dod pa'i ched du/
ngag/ yul 'khor skyong gi zhabs 'bring byas// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas// 'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar// bdun khridang ni lnga stong gi/ sangs rgyas rnams la nga yis mchod//
grangs med gcig ni 'ongs pa yi// rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te// byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na// de tsho nga la skyo sams mad// grangs med pa dang po'o// bram ze'i khye'ur gyur
pa'i tshe// 'od dang grangs par ldan pa yi// sangs rgyas mar ma mdzad mthong nas// ut+pal sngon po bdun gyis mchod// nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na// dka' thub spyod ces bya ba yi//
0 sangs rgyus mchin mnga' mthong nas ni// mi mchog la ni bla ris mchod// rgyal bo'i rgyur tshe mun 'joms pa'i/ skal chen la ni rin po che// sna tshogs bkra ba'i rol mo yi// mchod pa
dag gis bzhengs gsol to// kun dga' mi dbangang gyur pas// sang ga sang ga'i rtse la mnga' la// rin chen yu ba can gdugs kyis// mi mchog la nimachod pa byas/ rgyal po
gyur tshe grong khyer ni// stong phrag drug cu rnams su yang// mi yi nyi ma bde mdzad// spyan drangs nas ni mchod pa byas// 'jig rten 'dren pa ma debang la// bsro khang las dung de bzhin du//
a kar nag po'i dri dag gis/ bram zur gyur tshe zhabs 'bring byas// grong khyar rgyal srade 'pha' bar ni// bram za'i sangs rgyas sum cu po// gtsug tor can zhes 'jig rten grags//
rgyal por gyur tshe mchod pa byas// grong khyer 'bras 'thab dag tu ni// sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa lnga la// nga na tshong dpon rgyur bo na// tshangs par spyad pas mchod pa byas// grong khyer dga'
ba de nyid du/ ngan tshong dpon gyur pa'i tshe// sangs rgyas gtsug tor 'jig rten grags/ gtsug lag khang gis mchod pa byas// chong dpon gyur te rgyal ba drug mchod phying glang
chon rta gsoradang// bud med rnams dang nor bu yis// rgyan gyis skyed mos tshalabyas so// rgyal bo gyur tshe dad pa yis// grong khyer yid 'ong de nyid du// byang chub don du gnyer ba las/
gtsug tor can la sku dregs so// kun dga'i bram zer gyur pa na// thub chen ma 'gags de la ni// byang chub don du gnyer ba ngas// 'bras bu mchog gis mchod
ba byas// chong khon du ni gyur pa na// 'jig rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la// nor bu rin chan gyis mchod cing// gtsug lag khang ni nyams dgas mchod// ded dpon du ni gyur pagi/
byang chub shing gi drung na ni// sangs rgyas legs 'khrungs bzhugs mthong nas// thog mar bsod snyoms la spyan drangs// nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na// byang chub shing drung thub pa/ 'jig
rten dga' mdzad blo bzang mthong// 'khor ni stong dang rab tu byung// nga ni ded dpon rgyurapa na// sangs rgyas tsan dan 'od dpag med// chu 'jamadar ni til mar dang// bu ram la ni spyan drangs
mo kun dga' rngul por gyur pa na// tshangs sbyin grags pa chen po pa// 'dren pa la ni zhal zas dang// thams cad sbyin pas mchod pa byas// bram zer yang ni gyur pa na// thugs
rje chen po 'od zer can// thub pa rkang gnyis mchog mthong nas// sa sa'i rgyal mtshan gyis mchod do// rgyal bor gyur nas sangs rgyas ni// don dam gzigs pa grong mchog tu// 'jug
pa de la ta la yi// lo ma'i bsil yab mchod pa byas// nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na// 'jig rten gsal mdzad sangs rgyas ni// shAkya thub la me tog gi/ sil ma sna tshogs dra sgyur mchod//
grong khyer mchog tu mthor 'phags pagi/ mi mchog 'jug par mthong nas ni// rol mo rnams kyi sku dag dang// ma rtog rnams kyis mchod pa byas// rgyal bor gyur tshe dad pa yis//
sangs rgyas dam pa zhes bya ba// srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba la// thog mar shing rta dag gis bstabs// ngani rgyal bor gyur pa na// gtsobi'i ched du lam bstar cing// dpag tshad brgya ni
gang bar yang// ma tog khang bcu gas mchod pa byas// sangs rgyas dgra ni mdzad pa ni// grong khyer gshegs zhes ngas thos nas// lam ni rgyal mtshan yongs bkang ste// rgyal po
'byor pas bsub byas// nganamanyan par gyur pa na// shing rta'i yan lag chu 'gram du// byon pa ngas ni mthong nas ni// thub pa cha yi rgyun las bsgral// ded dpon rgyur tshodad po
yis/ shing rta skal ldan chen po ni// ngas ni gru zam btags nas kyang// mtshochen las ni bsgral bar byas/ nganirgyal por gyur pa na/ rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas ni// tshangs
tsan dan sa mchog gi/ ka bar ldan pa'i khang pas mchod// rgyal bor gyur tshe sangs rgyus ni// bcom ldan tshangs pa'i tshomachod cing// snam sbyar rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas// ngas ni yams
kyi nadazhi byas// tsan dan ldan lachar med tsho// rgyal po lta bu'i skyekhrus byas// de tsho lhas ni char phab pas// skyo bo rnams ni skyabs su dong// ngani rgyal po gyur pa na// sangs rgyus
bcom ldan zla ba la// mchod nas ngas ni khyams bsgoms pas// bdud kyis btang ba'i yams nad zhi// mi yi dbang po sngon gyur tshe// ngas ni byang chub 'dod/
pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul ba la// cho 'phrul bu ni gsol ba btab/ rgyal po dag tu gyur pa na// rin chen ri bo'ong chen ldan// 'khor ni brgya stong phrag mang po// mthong
nas lo lngar mchod pa byas// bram zer myur tshodad pa yis// sas rgyas don kun bsgrub pa ni// mtshan dang ldan pa mthong nas kyang// ngas ni bstod pa ljabargya byas// bram zer gyur tshe/
yid dga' bas// sangs rgyas dbang po rgyal mtshan mthong/ ngas ni thal mo legs sbyar te// dam pa gsol ba'i 'os zhes gsol// gas rgyus mar me mdzad pa nas// thub pa dbang
po rgyal mtshan bar// bdum khri dang ni drug stong gi/ sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod// grangs med gnyis pa tshang bar ni// rgyal pang yis mchod byas te// byang chub phyir ni spyod pa
na de tsho la skyo sems med// grangs med pa gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas bda mdzad dam pa la// rgyal por gyur tshe mchod byas te/ mya ngan 'das nas mchod rten
ts+tso ]btsugs// rgyal srid rab tu zhi lir byas// rgyal por gyur tshe dad pas ni// sangs rgyas gang po re skong la// tshul dang 'dra bar mchod byas te// chos kyi rgyal po zhes bsgrags
go sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la// tshong dbon gyur tshelegs ba'i mi/ rim gro byas bang mi mchog la// de bzhin gsar gyi me tog la gtor/ nga ni chong dbon/
gyur pa na/ sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can// thub chen grong mchog gshegs de la// gsoragyi dra bas mchod pa byas/ ngani tshong dpon gyur pa na// pad+ma dam pa dpa' chen po//
rgyal bo grags pa'i grong mchog tu// dal gyi me tog sil mas gtor// ngani bram zer gyur pa na// sangs rgyas grags mchog slob ma yi// dge 'dun gyisan mdun bltas pa// mthong
nas mi mchog gnas kyis mchod// nga ni rgyalapor gyurang na// legs gsungs kyang chub shing drung du// bzhugs pa ngas mthong glang po rta// shing rta dpung bu chung gis bsrungs/ sas
rgyas dri med thub chen la// tshong dpon gyur tshe bso khang dang/ mchod rten las dang mar mas ni// de yi tshon rnam par mchod// sangs rgyas sad mdzad rdo leb stapa// snyoms par bzhug
ba mthong nas nii// dad pas rol mo'i sgra kun dang// rgyal po'i 'byor pas bzhengs gsol la// tshong dpon dun gyur pa na// 'jig rten dga' mdzad dgra thul ba// sangs rgyas spyod pas
gshegs pa na// lam ni sna tshogs brgyan pas mchod// tshong dpon gyur tshe yid dga' bas// gnas 'jog gshegs pa thos nas ni// skyed mos tshalani brgyan byas nas// sani
gtsug lag khang brtsigs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan skar 'od la/ byang chub 'dod pas dad pas sa// rgyal po'i mdzod ni thams cad las// nor bu rin chen
rnams kyis mchod// ngani rgyal po gyur pa'i tshe// tog gis bdud rnams bcom nas ni// chos kyi rgyal srid bsgrags pa na// ngasani N+yal mtshan kho na btsugs// b+ha ra dwa dza blo ldan pa// bram
zemya ngan 'das pa la// rgyal po ngas ni ril ba dang// dbyug chu gtsug lag khang chen byas// nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na// sangs rgyas 'dren pa don gzigs pa/ gsar dang nor bu mu tig dang//
driyi snying po rnams kyis mchod// sangs rgyas don kun sgrub pa ni// sangs rgyas spyod pas gshegs pa na// rgyal por gyur tshodapungadag gi/ tshogs kun gyis ni mchod pa byas// sangs rgyas don
dam gzigs pa ni// grong khyer dmabar gshegs pa no// rgyal po gyur tshorol mo dang// me tog kun gyis mchod par byas// ngani ded dpon gyur pa na// sangs rgyas skar rgyal rkang gnyis/
mchog/ dri yo snying po de bzhin du// rtsa ba'i dri rnams rab tu gtor// rin chen bkra ba'i phug na yang/ songs rgyus skar rgyal la ni sa// de tsho tshigs bcad gcig bstod pas/ bskal
ba dgu ni phyir ba'i bsIl la// 'bru tshongadu nigyur ba na// sangs rgyus bcom ldan rnam gzigs la// de tsho byang chub spyod pa'i phyir// mud ga spar gang phul bsamachod// tshong dpon gyur
tshes mchod pa// sangs rgyas mchog ni gtsug tor can// thub pa nyan thos tshogs bcas pa// zhal zas kyis ni zla gsum mchod// tshong dpon du ni gyur pa'i tshe// 'jig rten 'dren/
pa thams cad skyobs// skal chen nyan thos bcas pa la// zhal zas kyis ni gus par mchod// tshong dpon gyur dad pa yis// sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig pa ni// bdog pa
kun la spyan drangs nas// tshangs par sbyodaphyir blo gros bskyed// tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na// yang dag sangs rgyas gsar thub la/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs dad pa yis// khyim
mad par nirab tu byung// bram ze'i khya'ani bla ma'i tshe// dga' skyong ni tshig thos nas// 'od srungs rkang gnyis mchog las ni// rab tu 'byung ba'i blo bskyod do// byams pa drang srong
gyur pan/ rgyal bor gyur nas rim gro byas// byas pa gzo brjes dran nusu// des ni nga la slar mchod do// g.yang sangs rgyus bde mdzad nas// sangs rgyas 'od srungs bar du ni//
sa ni bdun khri bdun stong gi/ rgyal ba rnams mchod pa byas// grangs med gsum po tshang bar// rgyal ba ngas nimachod byas te// sngonani byang chub skyad pa na// nga la skyo ba'i sems
dang nibyang chub sems duba'i tshe// sangs rgyas mchog ni de rnams mchod// nga ni de dag thams cad kyis// 'jig rten mdun du lung bstan to// ngas ni sngonabasams
gangayin pa/ nga yi smon lam thams cad rdzogs// ngas ni sangs rgyas khu bor te/ sems can rnams rjes su gzung// shi ba'i rgya la por nga gyur tshe// sbyin
pa dag ni thams cad btang// dus dbo gyur pa'i tshe// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin brdzogs mtsho'i tshong pa gyur pa na// tshul khrims pha rol phyin don du/ srog chags rnams ni
btang zhing/ ngas ni rang gi srog btang ngo// ngasngon drang srong gyur pa na// bzod pa'i rol rdzogs bya'i phyir// yan lag rnams ni gtubs pa yig ngagi bzodapa yongs su rdzogs//
mi ma yin mo'i skye rabs dang// de bzhin rgya mtsho bskams pa dang// de bzhin bdag ni bden dga' ba'i// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// smachen blon bor gyur pa dang// gnag
lhas skyas su 'gyuratshe// shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs nas// de bzhinaldabo che yang bsgrags/ bram ze ba 'bar gyur pa na// ral khar 'dab chags tshang bcas kyang/ bsam
gtan lasanam langs par// bsam gtan la rol byin btsunabyas// snying rjerdzayongs su bsgomabyus shing/ pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs pas// khur lci ba na ngas bor to// nga bcas pa
mang rdzogs par byas// ngadasangasargyus gong phrad nas// mchod pa byas pa'i mo mechog ni// kun byang n 'das par ga shekas// ni khyang chub la bzhig go/ rgyal bo 'od ldan dbang po
bawanas/ thub ba dbang po rgyal mtshan bar// sems can bye ba phrag stong ni// srid pa'i me tsholas bsgral ba byas// 'jig rten gtsobo rnabasadren pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas te lha mir bcas/
'jig rten 'din bsgral ba dang// sgrol bar mdzad pa smos ci dgos// ngas ni 'jig rtenadon gyi phyir// mya ngan 'das na'ang chos kyi glu// brtan pa dag ni bca' byas te// brgya stong phrag
nibasgral bar bya// mi khong sangs rgyas skyabs song zhing// mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas la// bya ba byed pa'i skyes bu de// 'jig rten dga'i skyod de ba// gang dag de bzhin gshegs rgyal lags
bya ba cung zad byed na'ang de// mtho ris sna tshogs bgrod nas ni/ bdud rtsi go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ yang dag ji bzhin 'di thos nas// dag ba khungs ni bskyed de bya// nga ni mya ngan 'das
ob tu// srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'khyams re// sangs rgyas mang po'i skabs rdzogs so///sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti byas// blamar khyas zhes bya ba
gong ma bzhin du ste/ de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rab tu
mang po rtog khang du lhags shing 'dus bar gyur nas// skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dgagleng bar byed do/ shes ldan dag shes par gyis shige/ sngonani bdag cag la rgyal po dang/ blon po
dang / bram ze dang/ khyim bdag dang/ grong mi dang/ ul pa dang/ tshong pa dang/ tshong dpon dang ded dbon rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ blomar byas/
zla rjod par byas// mchod par byas pas/gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gnas mal dang/ nad kyi rgyun nakyi yo byad rnams kyang rud pa las/ da ni ngag sbyong go'u tam 'jig rten du
byungapa las bkur stir byed/ blamar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed ces bya ba nas// sman dang yo byad rnams nyes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// des na de ltar bdag cag gi red/
pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chud na/ de la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de na kha cig gis sa ba/ tshangs par spyod pa la mi tshangs par spyod pa skyon yin pas/ de la skyon
ra 'di gdugs so/ kha cig gis smAs pa/ ji lta bu zhig bya/ de rnams kyis smraso pa/ bdag cag gi nang na kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang mo mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de la sring mo dag
tshur/ dge sbyong go tam la skur pa thob cig ces so bar bya'o// bdag cag gi nang na kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang mo mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gang yin/ bram za'i bu mo tshu mi yin no// de/
wA la spro ba bskyod do zhes de rnams kyis de pho nas bkug ste smras pa/ sring mo shes par gyis shog/ sngon ni bdag cag gi bkur sti dang zhes bya ba nas nad kyi rgyun sman gyi yo byad rnams zhes bya
ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// da ni dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'jig rten du byung bas/ 'jig rten rnams de la bkur sti byed pas/ bdag cag gi red pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad
paratshur na/ khyod kyis yal bar dor ram/ bram ze'i bu mo kun tu gyurtswa yis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis de la ji ltar bgyi lags/ sring mo khyod kyis nye du rnams kyi ched du/ dge spyod

go'u tam la kho mo dang lhan cig tu mi tshangs par sbyong do zhes khyod skur pa 'debs par so 'am/ de lta na bdag cag gi red pa dang bkur ste sngon gyi bzhin du 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang/ bram

zi bu mo kun tu s myurtswa yis// gzhan mu stegs can dang kun tu T+Tharab tumang po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'thags dag dug sbyong go'u ta ma la ni skur pa 'debs par bdag mo spre'i// sring mo khyod ji
tsam du/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur pa 'dabs par mi spro ba de tsam du bdag cag dang gtama'i dra bar mi bya phabs par smra bar mi/ blta bar mi bya rnam par blta bar mi bya zhing/ khyong gnas
thams cad du 'dug tu mi gzhug ste/ 'gyod pa de nyid kyis dus byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do// bud mad ni shes rab chung ba yin pa'i de skyugs
nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ sring tsho tshur khyod tshur rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du rgyun du song ba// dus tha gi tsam lon nas/ dge sbyong go ta ma la skur pa thob
cig de nyi ma re razhing langs te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo// dzatsam ltol snod gcig brtsis nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo// de'i khartsom/

ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mi rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang 'dihAm du dgongs pa
mnyid kyi las rnams byas shing bsags pa/ chogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams/ gzhan su zhig
gis so sor myong bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyun mi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas gsol pa// bdag ni 'odo ru sbrum bgyis nas// chags par 'gyur
zhing dga' 'gyur ba/ snyan zhing 'jibs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis// da ltar chos ni gsung mdzad dam// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// yang dag min pa spyi bdmyal bar 'gro//
bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mis gsol pa/ gang gis byas nas ma byas zhes smra ba'ang// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal ba// dman pa'i chos can mi srid gnyis ka/ pha rol dag chu dmya bar
'gro bar 'gyur// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o bram ze'i bu mo rtsa mi 'dini/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yun ring po nas mtho btsan
par byed dosnyam du bsams nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis snod de sa la lhung bar byas so// de nas bram ze'i bu mo rtswa ma skyangs nas rings pa rings par slar song ngo/ de nas dge slong gnas
brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/ chos kyi dbang du bgyi ba'i bka' mchide kyang bka' stsal/
gang du thog mar bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa yang lung bstan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyan bkur bgyis pa yang bka' stsal
lags pas/ ci nas bdag cag mtsho chen po ma dros par mchis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong
gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi gdon mi za bar mdzad pa ni bcu ste/ bcugang ha na/ ji srid
sangs rgya sa su lung bstan pa dang/ sems can 'gas kyang bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba thams cad btul ba dang/ nyon
thos kyi mchog zung gcig tu bstan pa dang/ mtshams bcad pa dang/ sku tshe'i tshalnga cha btang ba dang/ mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam par bstan pa dang/ grong khyer gsal bar lha las
gshegs par bstan pa dang/ yab dang yum gnyis bden pa dag la bgong pa dang/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sngon gyi las

ka kyi rgyu ba bstan pa ma mdzad pa de srid du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bo// don 'di la nibcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig mtsho chen bo ma dros

glu par sngon gyi las kyi rgyud lung bstan par bzhed nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mtsho chen po ma dros pa gang na ba 'dong/ der rang rang gi sngon gyi las kyi sgrub lung bstan
par bya'o// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltor mnyan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig
tu mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/ mtsho chen po madros bar gshegs so// gnod sbyin gsum po mi bzadu gnas pa yid 'ong zhing/ dge tog sna tshogs shing gis rnam par mdzes byas pa//
de las rgya mtsho dug can dag tu 'grob yi// chubo bzhi bo 'di dag phyogs bzhir 'bab// kAd+hAsin du nga bzhin pag shu dang// si tade la rdzu 'phrul stobs thob pa ma gtogs mi rnams kyis
ni go bgrod ba// der ni thub pa dge 'dun bcas par bzhugs// don bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyod pa mdzad de/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyis/ 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tsho/ srog chags grog skur yan chad kyi sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes pa pa 'gyur pas de nas klu'i
rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bsams pa// ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyod pa mdzad snyam na mtsho chen po ma dros ra las kyi sgyu nga lung bstan
bar bzhed par mthong ngo// de nas de gnyis kyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam/ bzang po thams cad gser las byas pa/ sdong rin ni bo
cha ge sar ni rdo rje las byus pa/ pa destong phrag du mas yongs su bstar ba zhig stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dege 'dun gyi gung la pad+ma'i snying po de la bzhugs so// dag

slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang pad+ma gzhan rnams kyi snying po la 'khod do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu bya rgod kyi phung bo'i ro la snam sbyar 'drub bo// de nas bcom ldaka'adas kyis

dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu song la rab tu byung pa'i zla bo khrid de shog cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/

mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi snang bar gyur cing bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces sa so// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu ston pa dgra bcom
[]/ dpa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang bdang thabs cig tu/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa na sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas khyod la gzhes kyis tshur shog 'dong
des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po re zhig snam sbyar drubs la/ de nas phyis 'gro'o// des sgyus ba/ grogs bya'o// de bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa

mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sor mo lnga char gyis drub par brtsams pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'o nalta drub zin du zad

mod/ des s+sa sa pa/ tshe dang ldan pas ri'i bu gal te khyod mi 'gro namathus bkur bar bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus skye 'gasats+tsha cang sbol nas smras pa/ tshongang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi
bu chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthun rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ bzhig khyod kyis 'di khyer la/ de nas phyis kho bo cur cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
gyi bu chen pos de drungs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bus bsams pa// 'di ni mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas/ gal te 'di khyer bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do snyam nas/ des de

bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i spyi la btags so// tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'gul bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/
'dis bya rgod kyi phung po'i riyang khyer bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis ri'i rgyal po ri ring la gdugs so snyam nas/ des de'i rgyal po ri rab la brtags pa las/ yang tshodang ldan pa
mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ cha dga' bo dag kyang g.yos par gyur/ ma dros pa yang kun nas 'khrugs shinge/ dag
slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang ldeg par gyur nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug bzhin du de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ci'i slad du klu'i rgyal po dga'
bo dang nyi dga' bo gnyis g.yos lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis g.yos pa ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos chen po gnyis rdzu 'phrul
gyis rnam par 'phrul bar byed do// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ ri'i rgyal po ri rngab 'di yapakhyer bur 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis bskyom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'i sdong po la
gdags so snyam nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'i sdong po la btugs pas ma gul par 'dug go/ gang gi tshe de'i rdzu 'phrul la rdzu 'phrul gyis rdugs pa de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la'i

skad ces sa sa so// tshodang ldan pa shAri'i bu khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtses ba byas zin gyis/ tshur shog 'dongo/ tshodang ldan pa go'u 'gal gyi bu chen po song zhig dang/ kho bo 'ongang
zhes byas nas/ ji sring tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ma phyin pa de'i bar du/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus snga phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 'amago

pos phyag 'tshal te/ pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug pa dang/ de'i 'og tshu tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po phyin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'og
lta sam/ tshid ldan pa kho bo'ongs so// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/

tshodang ldan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen bo ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan
'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ltar 'ba' zhig chu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yabazos pham par byas bde nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul dbus su ri mo/
mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung ngo// da dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir yul dbus nas/ yul nag can zhes bya bar song ngo// de de na 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slobadapon zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa las/
des de ngal ba'i rim gropar 'khrul 'khor las bu mo zhig byas nas btang ngo// des de'i rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas 'dug go/ de nas des gong zhig ces sgra na/ de cang mi sla bar 'dug go/ des bsamA
pa/ gdonam zos par 'di bdag dang dga' dgur spyod pa'i phyir btangangosnyam nas/ des de'i lag pa nas bzung su drangs pa las/ ji tsam zhig nas shing brul gyi phung por gyur te/
daskyangs nas bsams pa/ bdag gcig bu zhig tu skyangs par byas kyis/ ma la bdag gis ni 'dirgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par bya'o snyam nas/ des sgo'i nges
tshogs la rang gi gzugs brnyan 'gegs pa zhig bris te/ sgo phag tu yib nas 'dug go/ da ldang ba'i dus gang yin pa de las thal ba dang/ de nas 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon
gyis bsams pa/ ring zhig lon na ci'i phyir du sgor ma byung snyam du bsams nas dorasong ba las/ jitsam na 'gags te shi ba mthong ngo// des bsams pa/ ci'i phyir 'dis bdag nyid
srog dang bral bar byas snyam pa las/ des 'khrul 'khor zhig nas shing sbrul gyi phung por 'dug pa mthong nas/ de 'disnyam du sems te/ bdag nyid skyangs pas 'gags so snyam mo/ yul

nas can gyi kun tu spyod pa ni gang su'i khyim yang rung/ der mi blo bur ba shi na ji srid rgyal po la mamathol ba de srid du/ des de la rim gro mi byed do// de nas de rgyal bo'i drung du song ste mthol ba/ lha yul
dbus nas ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig mchis te/ de bdag gi sdum bar gnas pa las/ de la bkur sti bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis 'khrul 'khor las bu mo zhig bgyis te btangab dang/ des de lag
@#// pa nas bzung stodrangs pas/ shinge gi phung por mchis pa dang/ de skyongs nas bodag nyid 'gegs lags na/ lha de la g.yar snga 'drim pa zhig gtang du gsol/
lo donas bdag gis rim gro bgyi lags so// de nas rgyal pos zhoshas 'tshob rnams la bso ba/ shes ldan dag dengal g.yar snga rims shig/ de rnams dong nas de mthong ngo// des bsam
pa bdag gis ji ltar zungang las dbab par bya'o snyam mo// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'gag thag chod/ sta rakhyer te thag pa gcad par brtsams pa las/ ji rtsoman rtsig pa yin par
mthong nas/ de nas 'khrul 'khor mkhan gyi slob dpon de skyangs par gyur to// de de ltar skyongs par gyur pa dang/ ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon du sgo lkog nas byung ste smras pa/ tre nang rje dag khyod
kyis ni kho bo gcig pu zhig tu skyengs par byas te/ khyod ni rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyongs par byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du soms/ 'i tshodo'i dus kyi ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon
gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/ don yang 'dis 'dibazos pham par byas so// de ltar yang 'dis 'dirje 'phrul gyis pham par byas so// gzhan yang 'di ltar 'das
'di bzos pham par byas pa de nyonacig/ dag slong dag sngonabyung ba'i ra 'or gzhan zhig na/ ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gnyis shig byung ba las rtso dpar gyur te/ gcig gis skyas pa bani
bzo legs par shes so// cig shos kyis smyos pa/ nga ni de bas kyang lhag lhag par legs par shes so// de gnyis phan tshun 'gran par gyur nas/ rgyal po'i drung du dong ste de'i rkang
pa gnyis la gtugs te/ gcig gis smras pa/ lha bdag ni bzo legs par 'tshal lo// cig shos kyis kyang sbas pa/ lha bdag ni de bas kyang lhag par legs par 'tshal lo//
rgyal bos de gnyis la sgo khangabastan nas/ khyed gnyis gang mkhas ni ngas mi shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang gcig gis ni rtsig ngos gcig la bris la/ cig shos kyis kyang gcig la bris shig
dang/ de lta na khyed gnyis ka gang bzo legs pa shes pa ngas la gas par shes par 'gyur ro// dganyis kyi bar yol bas bcapanas ri mo bri bar bats+tsams te/ de la gcig gis ni zla ba drug gis/
ri mo'i lam zinano// cig shos kyis ni zlob drug tu rtsig ngos bltar ro// ri mo'i las zin pa gang yin pa de rgyal po'i drung dusong sta son pa dang snas pa/ lha bdag gi ri mo'i las bgyis
lags na/ sbyang khrim du gsol/ de nas rgyal po blon po dang lhan cig sbyor byung nas mthong ba dang/ rimo'i las mkhas mo zhig shin tumagu'o// cig shos kyis kyang rkang pa gnyis la
gtugs te smras pa/ da bdag gi ri mo'i las lagazigs su gsol/ des bar chad kyi yol ba bshus pa dang/ gcig gi gzugs brnyan de la shar ba rgyal bos mthong nas/ ri mo'i las la
lhag par 'di mkhas so zhes shin tu ya mtshan skyes so// de nas des slar yol bas bar b.rung nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs tas pa/ lha 'di ni me'i
las ma lags te/ 'on kyang rtsig ngos bstar ba lags so// de nas rgyal po de ya mtshan skyes nas smras pa/ 'di ni bzo la lhag par mkhas pa yin no// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/

gang gis zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstar ba de ni dug slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no// gang gis zla ba drug tu ri mo'i las byas pa de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dag slongamo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di nying yin te/ de na
