yang 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas so// da ltar yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so// gzhan yapajiltar 'dis 'di pham par byas pa de nyon cig/ ngag song dag

sngon byung ba wAr N+Nasa'i grongakhyer du drang srong dung dang/ bris pa zhes bya ba gnyis shig nye bar brten cing gnas so// ji tsam dus gzhung zhig na lhas char phab pas rdza ba tu gyur to/ dung drod de rdzob
tu brje bda'achos nas dril ba chag par gyur to// de nas des dmod pa bor ba/ rang bzhin ngan pa khyod kyis da phan chad la bcu gnyis su char mi 'babs par gyur cigatsas byas so// rgyal po
tshangs sbyin dang/ wA ra NAsi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i chogs kyis thos nas/ de nas de rnams de'i drung du song ste gsol ba btab pa/ drang srong chen po de ltar ma mdzad cig/ des smras pa//
[z/ ]bdag gis rang bzhin ngan pa la bzod par mi nus te/ bdag gi ngamod pas bcom pa des lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'babs par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin dang skye bo'i tshogs des/
bris pa la gsol ba btab nas/ des gsol ba byas talhas char phapa bo// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ ra'i tsho'i dus kyi drang srong dung gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong mo 'gal gyi bu 'di nyon
mo// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bris pa gang yin ba de ni/ drag slong shA ri'i bu yin te/ de na yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 'dirdzu 'phrul gyis pham par
byas pa de nyon cig/ bris pas dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir dung gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa las/ dung gi rkang pa gnyis kyis la pa mnan pa dang/ bris pas sas pa/ nyi ma 'char
ka'i dus kyi tshe khyod kyi spyi bo gas par gyur cig/ dung gis smras pa/ de ltar na nyi ma 'char bar ma gyur cig ces byas pa dang/ 'jig rten du nam sros par gyur to// de nas rgyal po dang/
bram ze dang/ khyim bdag gis dung la gsol ba btab pa/ drang srong chen po de lta bu ma mdzad cig/ des smras pa khrim shar bar gyur na/ gdon mi zabar bdag gi mgo 'gas par 'gyur
ro bris pas de la smras pa/ gal te de ltan 'jib las byas pa'i mgo zhig byos shig/ ji tsam na 'jab las dung gis mgo zhig byas pa las nyi ma shar ba dang gas par gyur to// dge slong/
@#@#// dag jisnyam du sems/ dung gang yin pa de ni dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di nyid de yin no// bris pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid de yin te/ de na
yang 'dis pham par byas so// gzhan yang ji ltar pham par byas pa de nyon cig/ yul dbus sub so mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung nas/ ba so 'bras tsam bye'u gang khyer nas/
yul nas can du song ste/ do ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig gi khyim du zhugs na/ de yang stong par 'dug nas/ 'i chung ma la smras pa/ grogs po'i chung ma 'bras bre'u chung gang po 'di tshos
la byin cig ces de bzhag ste song ngo// des btso bar brtsams pa las/ shing zad par gyur kyang ma tshos so// de nas de'i khyim thab 'ongs nas smyos pa/ bzang mo 'di cizhig yin/ des
smyas par smras pa dang/ des de brtags pa las/ ba so 'bras tsam sha stag tu mthong nas/ des de la robri bar smras pa/ bzang mo 'di tsho chuyin gyis/ chub zang po gzhan zhig khyer ta'ong
dang/ des 'bras 'dris par 'gyur ro// des ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon la chu bzung po zhig khyer te sheg cig ces smos so// dus de la sus nas/ des phyogs gzhan zhig tu rdzing bu zhig bris
wA dar khyi robam pa zhig kyang bris so// de nas ba so mkhan gyi slobadapon de bum po khyer nas rdzing bu yin no snyam nas phyogs der phyin te/ khyi robam pa mthong ba dang/ des sna bkab nas 'jug/
bar brtsams galas/ ji tsam na de'i chu snod de chag nas ba so mkhanagyi slob dpon de skyes bar gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de na dug slong mo
'gal gyi bu 'di nyid de yin no// ri mo mkhan gyi slobadapon gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid de yin no// 'on kyang d bzhin gshegs pas b.ros pa bsam gdon dang tang 'dzanA
dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming yang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi shes so// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang/ dge nga Ara'i bus mi
shes so// dge slongashAri'i bus thob pa gang dag min pa de dag gi ming yang/ dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bus mi shes so// dge slong mo'u 'gal gyis bus thob pa gang yin pa de dug gi ming yang/
nyanablos gzhan rnams kyis mi shes te/ dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu bus/ dge slong kAri'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che mod kyi/ des mang du gnas pa la dgongs nas/ ngas rdzu 'phrul can
rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to// shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu'i le'u 'o///sdom la/ 'od srungs shA ri'i bu dang ni// mo'u 'gal bu dang mdzes ldan dang/ sna
ma gro bzhin ngag dbang dang// bsod snyoms legs 'os dga' yod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po rang gi las kyi sgrub lung ston par byed de sbas pa/ de ni dang
song sngon nas spya pa dang// rjes mthun tshig dag shin tu sgrogs pa na// gzhig byas pas 'bras bu cha myong ba/ chung ngu gcig pu de nimar dran nas// jo
ltar sang ga ri yi phug gnas pa// 'jigs pa med par sbyod yul 'grob ltar// mtshungs pa med pa'i nyan thos 'od srungs du// sngonagyi gnas na[]sbyang pa sgrogs byed pa// zag med brab gyur
pa rnam grol soms// nyon mongs med par gnas pa skyon med yid// de la chos mchog yod par yid ches nas/ de yi chos la yid kyis ston byas te// rangasangs rgyas la bdag gis yon8ni/
khrirgod bre'u chung gang zhig rab phul bas/ de 'drab dang kun tu phrad gyurang// smon pa sa sgra mi snyan du skyes pa ni// las de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bu yis// lus can ngadag gira'adzra mad
tsharing ba// khyad par 'gro zhing spyod pa mi dman pa// sgra mi snyan du lan stong skyes par gyur// las de gcig pa nyid kyi 'bras bu yis// lan stong sum cu rtsa gsum par skyes te// ma rtag
'phreng rgyun byug pa sna tshogs dang// mthu chen lus mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur/ de nas 'thosabangag sgra mi snyan du skyes// slar yang lha dge dga' bar byed po dang// sems kyi smon las
tsany+nyo dbangagis slar yang bdag/ mi yi dge ba rnams kyi nang du phyes// las nga gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bus dug/ bram ze sa la chen po'i rigs skyes te// nor mang skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bkum
'dod pa'i yon tan lnga don mi gnyer yang// bdag gis ston pa lan 'ga' 'ang ma mthong zhing// mtshungs med nyan thos bdag gis ma mthong nas// bdag gis sangs tsham tshe na 'jig rtenan//
dgra bcom rnams la phyag 'tshal ba du byung// bdag ni de ltar rab tu byungab dang// rgyal ba bu mangs mchod rten nang bzhugs mthong// thub zhabs phyug 'tshol bcom ldan bdag gi ston/ dag
ni khyod kyi nyan thos gyur ces gsol// 'od srungs ji skad smras bzhin byas te 'dir// khyon ston nga yin nga ya nyen thos khyod// gal te sdug bsngal kun las thar 'dod n// khyod kyis snyan par
bshad pa'i chos snyan nyon// gang yang bdag la rgyus mchog skyob pa ni// thugs rjechen po yis ni chos bshad pa// bsam gtan bzhi stobs dbang po byang tshub kyi// yan lag lam gyi
yan lag rnam par thar// dedag bsgom pa bdag gis dga' dgur thob// zag pa zad cing lus kyi the ma bzung// lus kyi tham 'dzin ba rdul med pa// drang po 'di dgadung ni bdag gi phrad/
de bzhin gshegs rgyal phun sum tshogs pa gsungs// tshul khrims ldan pa gang 'dod 'grub par 'gyur// bdag gi yidrel ci dang ci bsams pa// thams cad grub ste srid pa'i tha ma 'di//
bdag gi skye ba zad ci'aching ba dang// srid pa kun nas langs pa nyid bcad d// bdagani chos rgyal thugs las skyes pa'i sras// nyon mongs tshogs rnams zad pas mya ngan 'da'/ bag
[rn e]// ni thams cad gzigs 8 yis// sbyangs pa gnas pa mchog tu bstan// zag pa medacing nyes pa bsal// go 'phangami g.yo bdag gis thob// gnas brtan
'od srungs de lta bur// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// dge slong dge 'dunamadun 'dug nas// rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ dbodasrungs kyi le'u ste dang po'o//
'dul ba gzhi/bam po nga gnyis pa// de nas dgi slong gnas brtan gnas ba na rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tsho
dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus las ci zhig byas na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas shes rab chen po dang spobs pa chen po dang ldan par gyur// des smras pa/ bdag gis dgon bor dang sangs
rgyus drang srong dag sbyong zhi gyur pa// skal dang ldan pa chos gosani// nga tsho rnying par gyon pa mthong// de la bdag gisams dad pas// bang brgyugs nas kyang chos gos ni/ las
shing kha bsgyur de bzhin du// de la yang dang yang du gtugs/ de nas badag la thugs brtse 'i phyir// da ni ra snang la 'phags nas// rang gi gatri brjod kyis 'bar zhing / de nas
ma khagal gshigs par gyur/ bdag gis thal mo sbyar byas nas// jiltar bdag ni 'di 'dra bar dbang rnon shes rab cho' shoka rus/ de lta bur ni smon lam btab 0 nas/
ni ga po'i rigs su bam/ ma rabs dag tu mi skyabar// bar ma'i rigs su skye 'gyur zhing// rtag tu rab 'byung mngabar shog/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag/ bdag ni tshe rabs lnga
bcur yang// mi yi redapa thob nas ni// khyim med par ni rab tu byung/ bdag gi skye ba thamani// mi yo sridezlob 'di yin te// rdzogs sangs blon mad pa yi// ded dpon
'di'i mnyes par byas// shAkya seng ga'i bstan pa la// bdag gis rab 'byung thob nas ni// mya ngana'adus pa bsil gyur pa'i// dgra bcom pa yang badrag gis thob//
btsun pa bdag gis zla phyed kyis// 'gro ba'i pha rol phyin thob nas// dge slong dge 'dun gungabazhugs nas// ston pas bdagani mngon sum du// chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor
ba shes rab can gyi gtsobo bstan// shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu// dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// madros pa yi mtshochin du// rang gi las ni lung bstanato// shA
ri'i bu'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o///de nas drag slonga gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe

dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi buchen po/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus ni rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ da ni khyod kyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lu ston cig/ de skad ces snus pa dang
tshodang ldan ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag sngon drang srong gyur pa'i tshe// nags mtha'i dgon par
gnas pa na// derani skyes pa zhig 'ongs nas// bdag la rab 'byung gsol ba 'debs// bdag gis brgyugs nas de yi sku// brogs nas kyang ni chos gos dag/ kha dog bsgyur nas de
wA 'byin// de yid dga' gyur de yi tshe// phyogs gcig tu ni nyer song nas// skyil mo krung bcas 'dug nas des M// rang byang chub ni'ig gyur to// de nas mkha' la song bar gyur// bdag
gis dad bskyed nyer song ste// de nas thal mo legs sbyar to// de nas rdzu 'phrul mchog gsol zhing// smon lam gdab ba byas pa ni// drang srong tsho 'di mi'adruba'i// bdag gi rdzu 'phrul du
'drar shog/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yisan// gang dang gang du skyes par ni// bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yin// lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ bdag gi srid pa tha ma ni// mi yi sridathong 'od yin
ta/ rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi// ded dpon 'din mnyes par byas// shAkya seng ga'i bstan pa la// bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni// mya ngan 'das pa bsil rgyur pa'i// dgra
bcom pa bdag gis thob// thams cad gzigs pas rdzu 'phrul can// rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to// dgo ba chung ngu byas pas ni// bde ba mang po nyams su myong//
mi dgab pa las gang yin// bdag gis lung bstan mnyan par gyis// grong mchog rgyal po'i khab tu ni// bdag ni tshong dpon khye'u gyur nas// khyim gyi phyi rol rtsa rtsa nas// zan gyi
phyir yang zhugs pa las// don pha ma gnyis ka ni// dben par 'dug pa bdag gis mthong// da gnyis mthong nas bdag brngags shing// sbyangs pas kyang ni sbyo bar byas// phra
dang ma ni gnas ka la// yid kyi nyes pa byas pa ni// gang tshe chen por gyur pa na 'dam bu bcom pa bzhin bsad snyam// bdag gi yid kyis chos byas kyi// lus kyi byis pa ma yi
ga bdag ni dmyal ba thig nag tu// sdug bsngal mi bzad nyams su myong/ de yi las kyi lhag ma yis// bdag gi srid pa tha ma 'dir// mu stegs gzhan gyi dge sbyong gis// 'am/
bu bcom bzhin bdag gtog 'khyug/ bdag ni sdug bsngal nyid kyis// shi bar gyur te da nas ni// las rnams kyi ni lhag ma yang// tham zad par 'gyur ba yin// de bas pha dang ma
dag la// sems ni rab tu dpar byas// samos dad pa yi rgyu yis ni// sems can 'gro ba bzang bor 'gro// de ltar gnas brtan pang nas skyes// dgi slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug
nas/ ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstanito// bang nas skyes kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o///de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis
tshongang ldan pa mdzes ldan la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan/ tshe dang ldan pa pang nas skyes kyis rang gi las kyi rgyub lung bstan zin gyis//
nga ni tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cigo/ de nas tshodang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du rungago las kyi grub lung bstan pa/
dge 'dun kun dgarab dug sonAn// khyams de'i phyag dur mthong nas// bdag gis phyagasam blus nas su// dratsho dga' bas phyag dar byas/ de nas bdag gi sems dad pas//
khyams dgatsang mar mthong nas ni// jiltar khyams da gtsang ba ltar// nyon mongs med par gyur cig smras/ drag pa'i rtsa ba de yis ni// gang dang gang dus+yas par yang// bdag gi
gzugasani bezang ba dang// blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur// de yi las kyi lhag mas ni// bduge gi lus ni tha ma la// bdag gi la dang ma gnyis kyis// bdag ming mdzes ldan
khonor btags/ mdzes ldan bdag nibatsas gyur te// gang tshe gnyen tshogs mdun phyin pa// de tsheganyen ni thams cad kyis// mgu zhing yid dga' bkur sti byas// rdzogs sangs
bla na med pa yi/ded dpon 'di nimanyes par byas// myang n 'das pa bsil rgyurapa'i// dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis nyon mongs med gyur ces// smon lam btab pa gang
yin pa// bya ba byas te nyon mongs ched/ dgu bcos zag pa med pa yin// 'dzam bu'i glingani thams cad kyang// ka shi'i gos kyis phyags byas pas// gang gis 'dod chags
bral ba yi// drasro 'chag sa gcig phyags pa'o// 'dzam bu'i glingan drang srong gi/ 'chags thams cad phyags pa bas// gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi , ]darelde tsam dag
phyug pa'o// 'dzam bu'i gling na dge 'dun gyi// kun dga' ra ba kun phyogs pas// gang gis rgyal ba'i mchod rtenani// khru gang tsam zhig phyags pa 'o// badrag nyid kyis ni gang rtogs
pa'i khyad par de dag shes byas nas// bde gshegs mchodartan phyags nas nii// sems kyang rab tu dang ba'agyis// de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// yon tan mang po shes
pa yis// mchod rten rnams la bkur sti byos// 'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur// btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni// gang bus dran pa 'di lags te// de yis 'bras bu sdug pa dang//
'dod pa yidra'ong nyams su myong// de bas rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// mchod pa dag gi bzang po gyis/ btsun pa 'di nibasod nams zhing// dam pa blan med pa yin// rdzogs
sangs de bzhin gshegs pa 'am// sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos la// sems ni reb tu nga'abyas pa'i// yonanichub ma'agyur ma yin// de ltar gnas brtan mdzes ldan gyis//
dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// mdzes ldan gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshodang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i ma tog/ tshod ldan pa mdzes ldan
gyis rang gi las kyi sgrub lung bstan zin gyis/ da ni tshodang ldan pas kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ des snas pa/ sna ma'i ma tog rna rgyan byas// mgol me tog 'phreng
bcings nas// ne'u zla rnams kyis yongs bskor to// skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su byung/ don thub pa chen po pa// rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la// skya bo'i tshogs can
thams cad nas// legs par mchod pa bdag gis mthong// de nas ni'u zla rnams khrid nas// rang rang gi ni 'phreng ba kun// sems ni dad par byas nas su// mchod
de la gdags pa byas// de na bdag gis de dag dang// skye bomang po gzhan mthong nas// sna ma na ba las phral te// de tshe mchodartan gdugs pa byas// dag ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag
gang dang gang du skyes par yang// bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi// lha dang ni rnams su gyur// rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi// dodadapon 'di ni mnyes par byas// mya ngan 'das pa
bsil gyur pa'i// dgra bcom pa ni bdag gis thob// ma tog gcig ni btang bas na/ lo na bye ba brgya phrag tu// bdag gis lha yi yongs spyad nus// nga yi lhag mas mya ngan
'das// btsunang gal te sangs rgyus kyi// yon tan phal cher 'tshal gyur na// sems ni shin tu dang ba yis// phyi zhing bsnyen bkur bgyis pa zhigro/ de ltas rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// yon tan mang po shes pa yis// mchod na rnams la bkur sti byes// 'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur// rdzogs sangs de bzhin gshegs pa 'am//
sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos la// sems ni rab tu dang byas pa'i// yom ni chungabar 'gyur ma yon/ btsun pa bdag gis dag bzhi// gang byas dran pa 'dilags te// de
yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang// 'dod pa'i yid 'ong nyams su myong// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// yang srid skyob zad pa dang// nyon mongs bcom nas bsi'i gyur pa'i// bdug
ni dwagra bcom myongan 'das// bdag ni yang srid nyal ba dang// 'khor ba gang du 'ang nyal ma yin// bdag gi skye ba thamani// 'di yin lenub med par 'gyur// de nyid kyi na
glu yis bdag/ sna ma'i me tog ming 'di btags// sdug bsngal kun las bdag grol zhing// srid pa'i mtsholas brgal bar gyur// de ltar gnas brtan sna ma ni// dag/
slob dge 'dunamadun 'dug nas/ ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// sna ma'i me tog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//
ba/ de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so// tshod ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa/ tshod ldan pa sna ma'im tog gis
wA rangagi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshod ldan pas kyang ng ni rang gi las kyi sgrubalung ston cig/ tshod ldan pa bye banyi shu bas las ci zhig byas na/ las des bcom ldan 'dus kyis
brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi mcho ga tu bstan/ des smras pa/ rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la// rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/ bdag gis phyogs bzhi dge 'dun gyi/
gnas khang gcig cig brtsigs nas ni// bdag gis gnas khang da yi gzhir// ras phran rnams kyis sa gzhi g.yogs// sams dga' ba dang yid bde bas// datshosmon lam
btab pa ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byas te// bstan par rdzogs pa thob nas ni// mya ngan 'das pa mchog zhi ba// na mdu go 'phangarag par shog/ bdag gi bsod
N+NaM nams des ni bdag/ bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi// bskal pa dgu bcuralha dang ni// mi rnams su ni 'khor bar gyur// de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// bdag gi
lus ni tha ma la/ dam par tshong dpon mchog gi yang// bu gcig par ni bdag skyas so// bdag ni btsas ma thag tu yang// pha yis thos nas 'dun gyur pa// gzhon nu la
ni bdag gi nor// bya ba nyi shu sbyin par bya// bdag gi rkang mthil gnyis ka'i sku// shin tu phra shing gnyen pa dang// reg na bde zhing 'jam pa yi// shingeba' 'dab lta'i
sor bzhi skyes/ 'das pa'i bskal pa dgu bcu dang// bskal pa gcig 'di lhag par ni// sa gzhi gding bas ma g.yogs pang// rkang pa 'jog ni ma myong ngo// rdzogs
sas blan med pa yi// ded dpon 'di ni mnyis par byas// mya ngan 'dus pa bsil gyur pa'i// ngag bcom pa yang bdag gis thob// thams cad gzogs pas btson
'grus can// rnams kyi mchog tu bdug bstanato// zag mang nyes pa sbas pa yi// go 'phang mi g.yo bdag gis thob// gnas brtan bye ba nyi shu du// dag slong dge
'dunamadun 'dug nas// de ltar ma dros mtshon du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// bye ba nyi shu pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas dag slong gnas brtan gnas
brtan rnams kyis// tshodang ldan pa ngag dbangal 'di skad ces sas so// tshongang lnga pa ngag dbang/ tshodang ldan pa bye banyeshu pas ra gi las kyi myupa lung bstan zin gyis/
tshadapaldan bas kyang darangagi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ des snas pa/ 'das pa'i bskal pa dgu bcu ni// bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa
lha rnams dang ni mer skyes te bdag gis ngan 'gro mi shes []so// bdag gis dge ba mi shes te/ phan tshun zla ltas 'ba' zhig gis/ rnam par gzigs kyi mchod
wA rtan ni// mthong nas de tshabastan bkur byas// mgron bu drug cu rnams kyisani// dri dang 'phreng ba phyug nos te/ mchod rten la ni gdags byas pas// bdag ni log pa/
lhung ma gyur dag pa chung ngu byas pas ni/ bde ba mang bo nyams su myong// mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i// dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob// gal te rdzo gas sangs rgyas
tshur la// mchod rten de la bdag gis su// bkur sti byas par gyur nas ni// legs pamang byedu 'gyur bzhig/ de ltas rdzogs nga 'i sangs rgyas kyi// yon tan mang po shes
pa yi// mchod rten bkur sti byos shig dang// 'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur thams cad gzigs pas mang thos dang// sna tshogs gtam dang dge ba/ stobs
ldan tshogs bcad byed pan// rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to// de ltar gnas brtan ngag dbangani// dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'ag nas// ma dros pa yamatshochen du//
rangagi las lung bstan to// ngag dbangagi le'u ste bdun pa'o/// de nas dwagaslong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra d+ha dzabasod snyoms len

la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan ba b+ha ra d+ha dzabasod snyoms len/ tshodang ldan pa ngag dbang gis rang gi las kyi chub lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba
lung a ston cig/ de nas tshodang ldan pa b+ha ra b+hAdza bsod snyoms len gyis sbrus pa/ bdag ni tshong dpon bur gyur nas// pha ya khyim n dbang byed tshe// bdag gis pha ni yid bsrungasaM
shing// ma la ldog pa mi mthun byas// pha deng sring mo spun dang ni// bran dang las byed rnams la yang// zas dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang// ma la skyo ba byas nas su//
bdag ni ser snas zil non pas// ma la zas ni ma byin par M// khros pas tshig tusmras pa ni// zas su rdzob zo zhig byas// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// rab tu tshe dang
thig nag gi/ dmyal bar lan mang lhung nas ni// sdug ba lngal mi nyung thob par gyur/ dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas// mi yi srid pa thob pa na// las kyi rnam par smin pa des
bdag ni rdob zabar gyur// skye ba de dang de dag tu// bdag gis rdo bamang zos shing// de bzhin bkres skom sdug bsngal gyis// bdag ni 'chiba'i dus byas so// bdag gi skya ba
tha ma 'di/ mi gro de thob pa 'diyin te/ rdzogs sangs blon med pa yi/ dadadapon 'dinamanyes par byas// shAkya seng ge 'i bstan pa la/ bdag
gis rab byung thob nas ni// mya na 'das ba bsil gyurab 'i// dgrwabcom pa yang bdag gis thob// thams cad gazigs pas sangago yi// sgra sgrogs pa yi mchog tu bstan//
wA bdag gis nyon mongs thams cad spangs// nyon mongs bral bas zagrwa pa madra// da dung duyang btsun pa dag/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul ldan lags na// phugs na bdag gi zas
mchis pa// rdzob nyid du gyur lags so// btsun pa bdag gis sdig pa ni// gangabgyidadran ba 'di la gyis te// las rnams chud mi za ba nas// de yi 'brasabu nyams su
wA myong/ b+ha ra d+hAdza bsod snyoms len// gnas brtun dge slong dge 'dun mdun// 'dug nas ma dros mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lungabastan to// b+ha ra d+ha dzabasodasnyoms
lan gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//donas dag slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa legs
'ongs/ tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra d+hAdza bsod snyoms len gyis rang gi las kyi sgrub lung bstan zin gyis/ tshodang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis kyang de rang gi lA kyi sgrub lung ston cig denas tshodang
ldan pa legs 'os kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi sgrub lung ston bar byed de/ rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan to// tshong dpon bu phor gyur nas ni// bdag ni nor dang 'brum zhing// skye
bo'i tshogs kyis bkurab dang// rgyalapo dang ni grong ma dang// gsang tshig brjod pa rnams kyis bkur// blta na sdug cing mdzes pa dang// dar la btse pa gzugs kyis
rgyags// de nas bdag ni shing rtar zhugs// skye bo'i tshogs kyis mdun byas nas// 'dod pa kun dang ldan gyur cing// skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su byung// skyed mos
tshal der dug sbyong ni// dbang po legs par bsdums pa dang// dbang po zhings rgyu byed pa// chos gos ngam ma zhig mthong// dug sbyong dmazlong bdag gis ni//
yid mi bde ba skyes gyur to// de skyon med kyang misdu gnas // gding skyo ba byas nos ni// kha dog nacing 'jigs par snang/ mdzor po lus ni lus ma can// sha
ba na cing cu thon/ rab tu byung 'di su yi yin/ ngag gi nyes pa spyad pa dang/ las kyi rnam par smin pa des// de nas 'achi'atho'i dus byas nas/ dmyal ba
rnams su skyes par gyur// domyal ba nas nii 'thos bdag/ kha dog ngan cing sdug bsngal ldan// 'dzoracan lus ni lus rma can// sha bri ngan cing rtsa thon gyur//
lag na khyi mo phyogs shing// sha mkhris kyi smad g.yogs gyon/ phyag du phung po'i steng nyal/ gnas med mgon med skyob pa med/ khrus
kyi ched du sgrungab na// gangad gang du song na ang// dbyug pa can gyis phyir bzlog cing/ de dag bdag la smod par byed// de ltar tshorabs lnga brgyarani// gang dang gang du skyes
pa der// bkres dang ma pa'i sdug bsngal gyis// badrag ni'achiba'i dus byas so// sems can kun gyis bdag gi ming// nyes 'ongs pa zhes smad pa byas// kun gyi
yid du mi 'ongabs// nga tshosmad pa byed paragyur// bdag gis rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas ni// dge slong dge 'dun mdun gyis byas// skye bo'i chogs ni chen po la// dam pa'i
gnas ni ston pa mthong// skye bo'i tshogs d mthong anas nii// jitsam 'dod pa'i zas dang skom// rAdapar gyur naster snyam nas// myur du brgyugs te phyin pa dang// skye bo'i tshogs
chos kyi phyir// 'dug pa de ni mthong nas kyang// zas sbyin pa ni med do zhes/ bdag nir chadaslar log go/ de nas thub pa thugs rdzatsan mgon pos bdag la bka' stsal
pa// 'ongs pa legs tshur khyod bde 'am// stan 'di la ni khyoda'adugacig/ bdag ni dga' ba thob gyur nas// thal mo legs sbyar de'i 'og tu// ston ba'i zhabs la phyag byas nas//
phyogs gcig tun bdag 'dug go/ de nas ston pa thugs rje can// go'u tam rjes su thugs brtse bas// rim pa bzhin gyi gtum gsungs pas/ bdag nibaden pa mthong bur
bgyis// bden pa mthong nasathub chen la// de nas bdag gis rab 'byung gsol// go'u ta ma thugs rdzachen pos bdag rjes su brtse bas rab tu phyung// 'jig rten gyi ni
'dren pa yis// bdag ming legs 'ongs zhes btags shing// ma yi khams la snyoms 'jug pa// rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to// de ltar gnas brtan legs 'ongs kyis//
dge slong dge 'dun mdud 'dug nas// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// legs 'ongs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//ston te/ dalags 'angs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//
de nas dge slong/ gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis// tshodang ldan pa dga' yod la 'di skad ces smras so/ tshodang ldan pa dga' yod/ tshodang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung

bstan zin gyis/ tsho dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis kyang d rang gi las kyi khyung lung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis de'i tsho rang gi las kyi sgrub lung ston par byed de/[]grong mchog
rgyal po'i khab tu ni// tshong dpon phyug por gyur pa na// de na mu gi byung gyur nas// drang srong rnams ni gso skal bgos// de nas bdag gi gso skal du// bskul dang ldan pa'i
rang sangs rgyas// khrag ba med pa'i bsil gyur pa'i// drang srong mdzes pa gcig cig byon// sems ni ser sna'i skyon can gyis// bdag gi
sdig pa bsams pa ni// da lta'i dus sudage sbyong 'adi// labadun duni su zhig gso// khyi yi gcin ni bskol ba yis// de nas 'bras kyi chan bcos te// don drang srong b.ru
wA bcug/ de tshod ni 'chidus byas// sdig pa'i las ni dbyas pas// bsdus gzhom dang ningu 'bod dang// de bzhin tshab rab tsha ba'i// dmyal ba rnams su yunaris
btsos// dmyal ba nas niaM shi 'phos bdag/ ma yi srad pa thob na yang// nang du can la gzhan dbang dang// sdug bsngal gyis ni bdag dus byas// da lta 'tsho rabs/
lnga bsgyur ni// gang dang gang du skyes pa na// mi sdugand dang mi bsred pas// rtag tu bdag ni dus byas so/ bdag go skye pa tha ma ni// mi yi srid thob 'di yin te//
rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi// ded dpon 'di no mnos par byas// shAkya seng ge 'i bstan pa la// bdag gis rab khyu thob nas ni// mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur ba//
wI dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob// btsun pa daltar na yang bdag/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing zag med kyang// nadabu can la 'dre ldog pa// de lta bu ni bdag 'tsho'o// de ltar
gnas brtan dga' yod kyis/ dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// ma 'gags pa'i grogs po dga'
yod kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o/// sdomani grags ldan dang ni dpal bskyed dang// ba ku la dang gsum grags dang/ ma skyes dang ni yul 'khor skyong// sa ba
'od srungs byin pa cin// de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshodang ldan pa grwags po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa grags pa/
tsho dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis rang gi las kyi sgrub lung bstan zin gyis/ tshedapaldan pa grags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi sgrub lung ston cig/ de nas tshod ldan pa grags pas de'i tsho rang gi
las kyiDub lung ston par byed de/ bdag sngon dgon pa'i drangasong gyur// grong dubasod snyoms phyir song na// rnam par basngos pa'i bam pa yi// bud med kyi ni zhig mthong//
bdag gis tshul bzhin brtag byas te// skyal mo krung bcas 'dug nas ni// rtse gcig shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// der ni ma sdug bsgom pa byas// bdag 'dug pa las dayi lto//
rdol nas 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ba// thos par gyur nas bdag kyang ni// ting 'dzin las langs par gyur// de yi lho na yod pa yi// ngan skyugs dang ni khrag dang ni// rul pa'i dri
dngami gtsangag/ kun nas rab tu 'dzag pa mthong// rgyu ma gtog mkhal ma dang// snying dang de bzhin global// srin bu brgyaphrag za byed nas// slar
yang sams ni mnyam par bzhag/ deci 'dra bar 'di de 'dra// 'di ci 'dra bar de de 'drar// phyi yi ro ni mthong gyur nas// ragi lus la gtod par byed// de nas ting 'dzin las
lasanas// bsti gnas su nislar log hU~M// de tshobasod snyoms ma sbyad de// zas kyang barngab ba ma byas so// gang tshabadag yang glopakhyer du// zas kyi ched du zhugs pan/
yid 'phrog pa yi gzugs mthong nas// de la mi gtsang bsgom byas pa/ de yi ro nitsho'adra bar/ gzugs gtogs dri kun de 'dra sta// khog pa mi gtsang bas gangab// thams
cad smad pa yin no zhes// de ltar yang dang yang bsgoms bas// bdag gis 'dod chags bral ba thob// tshangs pa'i gnas pa tshadamadapa/ bzhi po legs par bsgom byas
pas/ de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas de// chos pa yi ni 'jig rtenaskyes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rtan 'phos bdag wA ra NAsi'i grong du skyes// tshongadabon mchog gi bu gcig
bar// dpal dang bdag nyid dongaskyas te// kun la sdug cing yid 'ong ba// mthar phyin gnasazhib+bob par gyur// bdagamin mi yonges rgyu zhing/ mtshan mo dag ni nyal bar byed//
myur bar de nas langs pa na/ de na bud med mang po dag/ rdza rngadungani rnga chen dang// 'khar rdzapi wang sngas bcug nas// skrun mor bla rtsol byed pa dang// lag brkyang nas niiganyid
log mthong// denus bdag gi sngon gyi rgyu// mthuchen po ni skyes bar gyur// bdag la de nas bud med la// dur khrod mi gtsang 'du shes 'byung/ de nas skyo bar gyur nas ni//
bdag gis bsngags pa'i tshog smras pa// grogs pos bdag ni gtsos rgyur/ kun nas 'tshobs reg par gyur// de nas mal nas langs nas ni// khang bzangs nas ni shodadu babs/
lhas ni rdzas su snying brtse bas// bdag gi sgo ni rnyem par phye/ grong khyer nas ni mngon byung nas// 'brab chu ngogs sunubar song// bdag gis pha rol 'gram na ni/ dge
sbyong dbang po bsdams pa mthong// bdag gis dag sbyong de mthong nas// sgra gsang bstod de smras pa ni// dgo sbyong bdag ni gtsos gyur to/ dkrogs po bdag la 'tsho
bas reg de nas ston pas bdag la yang/ da tsho bdud rtsi'i tshig ga sus pa/ gzhon nu ma 'jigs khyod tshur shog 'di nikhyod la 'tsho ba med// bdag gis nor
bu'i lham phud de/ 'bab chu yaM ni ngogs rgal nas// sangs rgyas gang zag zla med pa// thugs rje can gyi spyan sngar song// donas bdag skom thugs chud nas// gang zag zla med/
[7 @#// ston pa des// snyan pa'i chos ni paka' stsal pa// dani so sor bdag gis rtogs// de nas bdag gis bdena mthong nas// thub chen rab byung gsol ba btab/
go'u tam thugs rje chen po yis// thugs brtse ba yis rab tu phyung// mtshan gcig lon nas donas nii// nyim 'char ka tsam nani// bdag gi khrag pa kun zad cing// bdag ni bsil
gyurachu ngan 'das// de ltar gnas brtan grags pa ni// dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// madros pa yi mtshon du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// gnas brten grags pa'i
busnyo btsugacig pa'o///de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshodang ldan pa dpal skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dpal

skyed tshodang ldan pa grags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshodang ldan pa dpal skyod kyis kyang d rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ de nas tshodang ldan pa dpal skyod kyis de'i
tshar ng gi las kyi sgrub lung ston par byed de/ wA ra NAsi'i grong khyer du// ston pa 'od srungs myang n 'das/ rgyal po kri ki rin chen las/ byas pa'i mchod rten chen po brtsigs// rgyal
bo kri ko grogs ldan bu// bdag ni thu bor gyur pa na// bdag gis thog mar gdugs kyis ni// rgyal ba'i mchod rten la gdags byas// dge ba'i las ni dbyas pas// gang dang gang du
skyes pa na// bsod nams byas pa'i mdzes pa yi lha dngami ni rnams su gyur// de ba de dang de dag tu// phyug cing longs spyod che ba dang/ nor dang 'brurani ldan pa ni/ bdag ni yon bdag
chen por gyur// bdag gis tshor bas lnga bsgyur ni// sbyin pa mi nyung btang byas te// slong ba pa dang dge sbyong dang// bram ze so sor tshim par byas// shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni//
'dod chags bram zhing zag med pa// thab med pa'i rang sangs rgyas// lnga brgya po dag tshim par byas// dag ba'i las ni de byas pas// srid pa tha ma 'di la ni// shAkya phyug po'i rigs su
skyes// btsas ma thag tu tshig smras pa// khyim 'di na rinor 'bru dag/ jig cung zad cig yod dam/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ngas btang ngo// dbul po rnams su tshim par byos// dbul po rnams
la zas byin dang// gtong bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med/ jig nor ltar yod dam kye// bdag la myur du legs par smyos// de dag bdag gi tshig thos nas// yid skyo ba ni gyur nas su/
ma ma gtogs par phyogs dang ni// phyogs su rnam par rgyug par byed// mni bu la byams pa yis/ nga tshobadag la 'di skad smras// lha 'am me 'am gnod sbyin nam// khyod su bdag la
myur du smos// ma cig khyod kyi bu bdagani// mo lags srin po ma lags te// sbyin bdag tshe rabs dran pas na// rtag tu sbyin pa gtong la skyo// bdag gi tshig de mas thos nas// ying ni/
draga' bar gyur nas kyang// dbugs 'byin byed cing smras pa ni// bu gcig dgar sbyin pa thob// yopyadam po rnams kyis kyang// bdag la mas ni gso ba
byas kun la sdug cing yid 'ong ba// bdaguni lta bas ngoms mi myong// bdag ni btsas ma thag tu yang// khyim du nor dang 'bru rnams dang// gser dang bran dang las byed pa/ rnams
kyang rtag tu 'bral bar 'gyur// dpal spyod khye'u zhoge btsus gyur la// btsas ma thag tu smras pas na// bdag gi ming ni gnyen rnams kyis// dpal skyed ces ni bya bar btags//
de nas bdag gis sbyin btang zhing// dbul po rnams ni tshom byas te// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas// khyim mad par ni rab tu byung// bdagan 'tsho med 'jigs pa 'am// bu
'an nyan pas rab 'byung min// de tsho dad pas rab byung nas// mngon shes drug po bdag gis thob// bdag ni rgyal po blon po dang// dobazhin grong mi rnams kyis mchod// zas dang
btung ba gos dang ni/ gnas mal yang ni red par gyur// de ltar gnas brtano dpal skyed kyis// dge slong gnas brtan mdun 'dug nas// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rangagi las
ni lung bstan to// dpal skyod kyi le 'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rab tu mang po rnams kyis// tshodang ldan pa ba ku la la 'di

skad ces smras so// tshod ldan pa ba ku la// tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyod kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa ba ku las kyang da rang gi las kyi skyob lung ston cig/ de nas
tsho dang ldan po ba ku las de'i tsherang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i pho brang bshos ldan du// bdag sngon sos 'tshong gyur pa las/ rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab kyi// dge
slong dge 'dun spyan drangs nas// khyed cag ji snyadabazhedapa yi// snyun sman bdag gis dbul bgyis te// shun pa rtsa ba 'bras bu'i sman// dge 'dun bdag gis tshim par bgyis// dge 'dun dbyar
nin drangs nas// badrag lo dge sbyong gcig cig gis// a ru ragacig ma gtogs par/ de na 'ga' yang slong ba med// bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu// bdag ni log par lhung ma gyur
sman sbyin pa yi rnam smonani// mthu chen 'di la bltabar gyis// dge ba chung ngu byas pas ni/ bde ba mang po nyams su myong// a ru rani gcig byin pas// yun ring mtho ris rnams su dugal//
de nas las kyi lhag masani// bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas// yul 'khor bsod snyoms len pa dag/ slob pa na yang m myong// nub gsum kho nas rig ba ni// gsum po bdag gis mngon
sum byas// ngan ngonagyis ni 'tsho byas shing// phyag dar khrod kyi chos gos 'chang// khyim khyim pa'i m rab tu byung ba dang// bdag ni 'dres par mi gnas te// bdag gi tshon lo brgya dang//
drug cu lhag cig lon na yang// da tsam bar du'ang bdag gis ni// na bar mngon par mi dran te// btsun pa bdag gis dge bani// chung ngu bgyis pa 'di dran te// de yi 'bras
ka bu yid 'ong ba dod// bde ba byung ba nyams su myong// de ltar gnas brtan ba ku las// dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// madros pa yi mtshochan du/ rangagi las ni lung bstan to// ba ku la'i
le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras so// chodang ldan

pa gnas brtan/ tshe dang ldan pa ba ku las rang gi las kyi rgyub lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gnas brtan gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ de nas tshod ldan pa gnas

brtan gnas brtan zhes bya bas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu pa lung ston par byed de/ sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su// bdag ni lham mkhan gyur pa na// mu ge byung nas de na bdag/ ko ba'i ras ma rnams
'tshad do// bza' bar bya ba kho na'i phyir// ko ba'i risag 'tshod pa las// dge sbyong gzhan zhig zas kyi phyir// bsod snyoms la ni byon pa dang// de la bdag gis sems dad pas// ko ras kyi ni thug
paN+NaM bgyi// dge sbyong des ni longs spyad nas// don nam mkhar 'phags par gyur// bdag nirab tu dga' gyur nas// thal mo legs par sbyar byas te// de nas gang dang gang du ni// song ba kun tu 'brang
byas so// dga' ba rgya chen thob nas kyang// de tshe smon lam btab pa ni// gnas brtan 'di lta bu dang bdag/ lhan cig 'dug par gyur par shog/ dge slong 'di yi las kyis ni// drimadachos
ni gang reg par// bdag gis chos de rag rgyuracos// de tsho smon lam btab par gyur// kha dog ldan pa ma yin zhing// dri []ni smad por gyur pa dang// ro dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i// sbyin pa de tsho
bdag gis btung// dge ba chung du byas pas kyang// bdeb mang bo myong bar gyur// bsod nams byas pa'i mdzes pa yi/ lha dang mi ni rnams su sgyur// bdag gi bya ba tha ma ni// mi yi srid
thob 'di yin te// rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi// ded dpon 'di na mnyes par byas// bdag gi smon lam gang btab pa// byang chub dam pa 'dorag ste// bdag gis daltar bsil gyur pa'i//
mya ngan 'dus pa legs par thob// danas gnas brtan chen po ni// gnas brtan zhes byamathu chen gyis// madros pa yi mtshochen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// gnas brtan gnas
brtan zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o///de nas dag slonga gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshod ldan pa stong rgyas 'od srungs la sogs pa/ gnas
brtan gsum la 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa dag gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya bas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gis kyang de rang gi las kyi rgyu
ba lung ston cig/ de nas de rnams kyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu b.lung bstan par btsums pa/ bdag cag gsum ni sbyin gyur nas// lhan cigatshongadapon gyur pa na//
za 'od srungasamachod rten la bal// shugashig 'dus pa mthong gyur sa// tshong pa thamasacud bsdusanas ni// dasan slar yang sar par brtsigs// spun rnams dag ni lhan cig tu// gdug gsum
zhig ni gdags par byas// dge ba'i las ni de byas pas// mtho ris gnas su yun ring dga'// ma rnams su na slar 'ongs nas// phyug po'i rigs can dag tu skyes// rdzogs pa'isangs
rgyas ma mthong nas// mu stegs gzhan las rab tu byung// ne ran dzana'i chungogs su// cho'aphrul mdzad pa mthong nas nii// de nas de lo rab byung phyir// bdag cag gis kyang gsol ba
sgyubatab// de nas thugs blon gyis ni// thugs brtsas bdag cag rab tu phyung// bdag cag ga ya'i mgor sonanas// go'u tam yi bstan pa thos// danas brtson 'grus brtsams pas ni//
mya ngan 'das pa dam pa thob// da ltar ston pa bkur byas shing// de tshomachodi na mngon btud pas// bdag cag kun ni rab byung nas// bsil bar gyuratimya ngan 'das// lteng rgyas dngani
tshuklung dang// ga ya 'od srungs gnas brtan gsum// ma dros pa yo mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// ltang rgyas dang chu klung dang/ go ya 'od srungs rnams kyi le'u ste bco lnga/
da/de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshodang ldan pa grags pa la 'di skad ces stsas so// tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa steng rgyas
dang/ chu klungadang/ ga ya 'od srungs rnams kyis rang gi las kyi sgrub lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang rang gilas kyi rgyud lung ston cig/ donas tshod ldan pa grags pas kyang
dra'i tsherangagi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byadade/ bdug sngon dri'atshong gyur pa na/ dri rnams 'tsho bal mkhas gyur pas// dung ni de tsho noba'i phyir// budamed gzhon num dag 'ongs/ de ni bag
gis gzugs ldan pi'i// bud meda'os pa mthong anas nii/ 'dren brkyang gi nitshig sla zhing// chags pa'i sems kyis reg par byas// 'du zhing lhan cig 'khod pa rnams// mi tshangs spyod
paspro med kyang/ ma brtags gzhan gyi bud med la/ lag pas reg par byas pas na// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes// slar yang mi'i ni'ongs pa na/
lag pa g.yas pa bsams par gyur// de ltar tshorabs lnga brgyarani// gang dang gang du skyes pa na// rtag tu bdag gi lag pani dgayas pa na zhinga rnamapar bskums// bdag gis sangs rgyus
mnyes byas nas// khyim med par ni rab tu byung// mya ngan 'das pa bdor gyur pa'i// dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob// btsun pa bdag gis mi dge ba// gang bgyis dran pa 'dilags te//
las rnams chud mi za bas na// de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong// da dung du yang btsun pa dag/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul ldan gyur na'ang// lag pa g.yas 'di ji lta bar//
g.yon pa da lta ma lags so// skyes pa 'am bud madra gang yang rung// bya ba byed pa gang yin pa// sems can dmyal bar skyes gyur nas// de ni sdug bsngal tshor ba myong// mkhas pa blo dang ldan
pa'i mis/ khab 'bar ma ni ji lta bar// gzhan gyi bud med rnam spangs shing// rang gi chung mas chog par gyis// gzhan gyi bud mad mthong nas ni// skyes pa gang zhigade la chags// dmyal ba'i
tshor bas nyan pa yi// sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur// bdag gis de ltar sdig byas pas// sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu// yun ring dmyal ba du yi ni// 'bras bu mi nyung nyams su myong//
bdag gi skya ba tha ma 'dir// bla na med pa'i gnas thob nas// sdug bsngal kun las bdag grol zhipa// bsil bar gyur cing mya ngan 'das// de lta bas na bde 'dod cing// sdug bsngal
nyid nim 'dod pas// gzhan gyi bud mad 'gro mi bya/ de ltar sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ro// des na gnas brtan grags pa ni// dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// ma dros pa ya mtsho
chen du// rang gi lasani lung bstan to// gnas brtan grags pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//(denas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa ma

skyes la 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa ma skyes/ tshodapa ldan pa grags pas rang gi las kyi sgrub lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa ma skyasakyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu pa lung ston cig/

gnas tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyis// de'i tshe rang gi las kyi sgrub lung ston par byed de/ rgyal bo'i pho brongabashes ldan du// rnam par gabrigs kyi tshangs sbyod tshe// nyon mongs med ces bya ba gi/ tshong
dpon noramang zhig tu gyur// thub chen rnam par gzigs pa yi// 'khor ni stong phrag brgya dugadung// drug cu rtsa gnyis yod par gyur// de tsho rgyal po bshes ldan dang// bdag gis mi yi khyu mchogani//
zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas// phyir zhing bshos dang bskyed pa yis// tshogs dang pacas te tshig bar byas// bdag gis sangs rgyas zla gsum du// bshos gsol de nas bshes ldan gyis// de tshe
rjes gcod ston mo ni// bza' bca' dang na bza' dang// gnas mal dag dang ldan pa gsol// de nas skyed mos tshal bltar ba// rgyal bo des ni phul bar gyur// de bzhin dge slongar re la//
gos kyis kun nus g.yogs pa'i skyon/ brgya stong dug dang nga yi tsho/ gsar gyi dra bas g.yogs pa yi// mang bo shin tu legs brgyan pa// mi nyung ba dag sbyin par btang// dge slong rare'i spyi
bor ni// de tshog dugs kyang 'dzin bar byed// de nabud med legs brgyan lus/ tsan dan a ka rus bskus pa// de tshadage slong re rer 'ang// bsnyen bkur dga' khyid du bcug/ rgyal po des de
lta bu'i// rjes gcod pa yi bkur sti byas/ drang srong gtso bo rnam par 'dren// rgyal pos tshim par byas pa dang// stan de phun sum tshogs mthong nas// de nas bdag
gis bsams pa ni// bdag la bza' dang bca' yod kyang// 'di 'dra ba yi stan med de// phun sum tshogs pa 'di'adra dang// glang po bdag gi lagal bdog/ lha yi dbangapo dbang sgyur ba//
brgya byin bdag gi drung du 'ongs// de nas brgya byin bdag la smras// khyod kyi grogs ni ngasabya zhes// des ni lha yi skyedamos tshal// mdzes shing yid du 'ong bar sprul// lha yi gdan M ni bshams
nas nii// lha yi g.yogs pa rnams kyis g.yogs// de nas bdag gis bcom ldan 'das// rnam gzigs 'jig rten gyis bkur ba// mi mchog de'i nyan [] thos bcas// gdugs tshod
la ni spyan drangs nas// sa srungs la sogs glang po rnams// lha yi rgyun gyis 'gas brgyan pa// dge slong ra lo'i sbyo byor ni// da tshog dugs dag 'dzin par byed// de rnam rnam par 'dren pa/
lha yi zhal zas rnams kyis bstathos// thub pa nyan thos thabs cig la// bdag gis lha yi gos kyis g.yogs// dge ba'i las ni de byas pas// bde ba mang po nyams su myong// bsod nams
byas pas lha dngani// mi yi nang du mdzes gyur pas// bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu// ngan 'gro bdag gis mi shes so// rnam par gzigs pa dpal ldan pa'o// drungasrong chen pos
bsnyan bdu rabs/ bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'di// zlul po'i khab tu bdag skyes so// gzugs can snying po'i grobcuradu// noracan phyug po'i khyim duni// rgyal bo gzugs can snying bos/
ni de tshobadag brjod bkuras byas// blon po rnams dang grong gi la// kun nas sdug cing yid du 'ong// lha yi 'dod pas rtag tuni// srid pa 'dirani bdagatshim byas// mir gyur
nayang lha rnams kyi// 'dod pa yid 'ongs nyams su myong// de nas ded dpon bla namadu// sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren po'o// thub pa chen po thugs brtse bas// rgyal po'i khab
gshegs bar gyur/ sangs rgyas shos pab chen bo ni// rgyal bo'i khab byon bdag gis thos// bcom ldan thub de gangan bar/ dga' ba'i yid kyis song ba dang// 'jig rten
gsal ba 'od mdzad pa// spronam 'dzin pa mthong nas ni// da tshorabs te rkangapas ni// thub pa'i spyan sngar song nas kyang
thub pa cha' bdag mgu bas// zhabs gnyis la ni
mgos phyag byas// skyes mchog la ni phyag byas nas// phyogs gcig tu'adu gnas su// 'gro bas bsnyenabakur byas pa yi// dpa' chen bdud kyi 'ching ba bcad// ded dpon ma ya tig/
denas bdagagis thugs rjecan// rdzogs sangs rgyas la 'di skad gsol// dpa' bo bdag ni rab 'byung zhing// bsnyen par rdzogs par thob par 'tshal// de nas shes
tha rab dam pacan// sangs rgyas gang zag bla med pas// dge slong tshur shog chos gsungs pas// bdag ni bsnyen bar rdzogs par gyur// des na bdag ni bag yod cing// brtson 'grus bsam gtan
brtan po yis// bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das zhi ba'i// gnas kyi dam pa rig par gyur// rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi// ded dpon 'din mnyes par byas// mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i// dgra
bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ srid pa 'khor bar skye ba dang// 'chib rnams las bdag grol zhing// mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa las// thams cad du zhing bdag grol lo// de ltar gnas
brtan ma skyes kyis// dag slong dag bdun mdun 'dug nas// ma dros pa ya mtsho chen du// rang gi lasan lung bstan to// ma skyes kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//
danas dag slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshod ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa yul 'khor skyod/ tshodang ldan pa ma skyes kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu

ts+tshA b.lung bstan zin gyis/ tshodang ldan ba yul 'khor skyong gis kyang darang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tsherang gi las kyi rlub lung ston par byed de
ka shi'i yul 'khor dur byed la// rgyal po kri ki sa bya khyung// rgyal bo kr-i kI'i bu thachus// de yi tshin bdag gyur to// 'od srungs dpa ba dang ldan pa yi// mchod rten chen po brtsigs pa dang//
pha yi yodono srung ba'i phyir// de la gdugs bu chung zhig phulaM// dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod rten la// gdugasazhi gdags ba byas pa des// rab khyungardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang// lhan cig
'grogs rgyur smon lam btab// dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ gang dang gang du skyes pa ni// bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi// lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur// bdag gi skye ba bram 'di//
bang mdzod stug por bdag skyes te// der yang tshong dpon khyim du skyes// rigs kyi bu gcig par gyur te/ mi dbako'u rub bya dngani// de bzhin kun sdug yid du 'ong// de bzhin yul mi rnams dang/
mi/ bdag ni gnyen tshogs yid du 'ong// mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang// gzugs bzangashin tu dbyibs legs shing// ma yi 'byor pa rnams kyisani// 'dod pa thams cad phun sum
tshogs// ston pa dga' zhing yid 'ong ba// bang mdzod stug por gshigs pani// bdagagis mthong nas sems dad pas// rab chu'abyung bar gsol ba btab// ston pa gangazag zla med de// bsam ba
kun la mkhas gyur bas// bdag gi bsam pa des mkhyen nas// rab tu byung ba las bzlog pa// pha ma dag gis ma gnang pa'i// gang zag dge yang sangs rgyas rnams// rab tu 'byin par mi mdzad kyis/
sobalabadaganyid tham gyis// de nas khyim du bdag song nas// pa ma gnyis la smAs pan// yab cig gnang bar mdzod cig bdag/ khyim ma mchis par kha 'byung
ngo// pha mas bdag las zlos nas ni// de yod mi bder gyur nas// bu gicog khyod ni bdag cagaganyis// shi bar gyur na'ang ma gnang ngo// de thos nas ni bdag gis su// gal te mgon
'di nyidadu// zas mi 'tshal bar bdag 'gum zhes// sa la yang ni nyal bar byas// de tshodakar po'i chos dag gis// bskul nas rab 'byung don gnyer zhing/ thar par 'dod pas zhag drug
rgyu chu// zan ma thos par 'dug pa dang// de nas bdag dang mdza' ba yi// ne'u zlas tha ma la smras pa// 'din gnang bar gyur na legs// khyed la gi bas cizhig bya// gal te 'di ni rab 'byung ba'o//
yaM dga' n phyis kyang khyed cag gis// gson po nyid du bltas so cog/ shi bar gyur na ci zhigo rung// gal te rab chubyung ba la// 'dAmi dga' bar ma gyur na/ khyed kyi zad mod pha ma las// gzhan
na bu gnas ga la yod// bdag gisnyan smA ne'u zla la// pham gnyis kyisas pani// gal te rab 'byupalta byed na// de ltan lta gzhan du min// de nas ne'u zla bdag gi drung// nyo bar 'ongs
nasawas pa ni// mkhas pa khyod ni pha ma yis// rab tu 'byung bar gnang ba ni// khyod la pha ma gnyis na re/ gal te rab tu byung nas khyod// phyis kyang lta bar byed na ni// bu gcig song la rab tu
byung/ legs bshad bdag gis mnyan byas te// de nas nyamanirtag byas nas/ ston pa'i lcan sngarason gnas ni// 'dik+kadaces tshig gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni gnang lags na// shub chen
khyod kyi bstan pa la/ bde gshegs rab 'abyung gsol 'debs na// rgyal bas bdag ni rab tuphyung// de nas bdag ni rab byung nas// ston pa'i bstan la 'di ltar gnas// bdag gi kun sbyor/
thams cad zad// zag pa rnams ni bcom par gyur// bdag gis gdugs gcig btang bas ni// bde ba mang bor myong bar gyur// bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi// lha dang min rnams su
gyur/ rnathamasacad gzigs pas dgon pa ba/ rnams kyi mchog chub dag bstan to// mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyurapa'i// dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ de ltar thugs rje chargyal la// yid ni
rab tu ring byas te// mchod rten lani bkur sti byas// 'jigs pa tsholas rnam thar gyis// gnas brtan phyag dar khrod pa'i// yul 'khyor skyong zhes grags pa yis// ma dros pa yimatsho chen du//
rangagi las ni lung bstan to// yul 'khor skyong gi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// 'dul ba gzhi/ pa/ bam po nga gsum pa// de nas
dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tsho dang ldan pa sa ga la 'di skad ces gas so// tshong ldan ba ga/ tshe dpaldan pa yul 'khorasbyong gis rang gi las kyi rgyu b.lung bstan zin gyis//
tshodang ldan pas gas kyang darang gi las kyi sgrub lung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pas gas de'i tshong gi las kyi rgyud lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i khab kyi tshong dpon
gyi/ gtso bo nor chen bdag gyur to// dbyar gyi dus su drang srong ni// lnga brgya dgane'u bar byon// de ni tshong dpon lnga brgya yang// thams cad 'dus par gyuranAmAni// kun gyis drang srong
rab zhig/ khyim khyim dunibago bar bya// rang gi don du kha zas ni// ji lta bu dag g.yo byed pa// dka' thub can ngare re la'ang// rtag tu de 'dra kho sbyin// de'i nang drang srong rgan po gang// de
ni bdag gi skal bar 'ongs// tshong dpon mchog la de bzhin du// thub pa mchog de mtshams par gyur// bdag la lnga brgya pa yi bras// snodagang nas nii 'dren byed pa// de 'dra ba yi kha zas/
nyid[}]bdag gis dge slong de la byin// de nas de la bdag la ni// ser sna shin tu mi bzod skyes// 'di lta bu yi kha zasan// bdag gis chung ma byin ma myong// sring mo ma yin de bzhin du//
ba bu dang bu mo dag dang ni// phunu la'ang ma byin na// duslong 'dul zla gsum du// sbyin pa lta zhig skyes ci regos// bdag ni lnga brgya po dag gis// god tshogs chen po 'dir 'gyur gyis// ma la
bdag gis dge sbyong badi// gsadapa la ni brtson byas te// 'di ni shi ba'i dus byas na// bdag la 'god pa mi 'byung zhes// de nas bdag gi sdig sems kyis/ rtayi gcin nibaskol byas te///
nyes med par ni gsad bya bar// kha zas rnams dang lhan cig sbyin// der ni thos ma thag tu yang// mi bzad pa[@]nadalangs te// rgyu mganyemam kha'am dag/ rosmad nas ni zags par gyur//
thub pa chos kyi yon tan dga'// shes bzhin de nas dus las 'das// lha dang gnod sbyin gcig la gcig/ sman shin tu sgrogs byed pa// kye ma'otshong dpon 'di'i sdig 'di yis thub pa 'dra pa
sangs rgyas// bsil bar gyur cing zag med pa// dbang ldan 'di ni gros par gyur// nye du rnams kyang 'akhrugs nas ni// de nas bdag la smodapyadang// gang phyir thub pa 'a dibasad pas// khyod
kyis bsod nams rim bskyed// nye du rnams kyi tshig thos nas// bdag kyang yid mi bed gyur nas// drang srong do dag bsogs nas ni// de nas bdag gis nyes pa bshags// bzod pa gsol nas de
na yang// nyes pa thams cad so sor bshags// lnga brgya la ni zhal zas kyis// gus dang bcas pas tshim par byas// bdag gis sdig pa da bshags nas// bzod gsol drang srong de dag ni//
zas dang btung bas tshim byas nas// de tshe smo na lam btab pa ni// gnas brtan 'di'adra dag dang ni// bdag lhan cig 'grogs par shog/ ji ltar 'di kun grol gyur pa// de bzhin 'ching
las grol bar shog/ bkren pa rnams kyi khyim dubadag/ la 'ga' 'ang skye bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gi sems lan 'ga' yang// ser sna skye bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gis rang sangs rgyas gasad
[ns ]@#// ba'i shin tumi bzad las byas pas// de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas/ dmyal ba rnams su skyes nas ni// yun rile ni stong dag tu// skyug bsngal tshor ba
blo nyams su myong// slar yang mir ni'os pa na// phyug cing no cher gyur pa dang// 'jig rten rnams kyis mchod bkur 'opa// bdag na myur du 'chi 'gyu zhing/ rtag tu bdag gi nang khrol
dag/ 'dzag pas shi ba'i dus byas so// khyim pa'i rtags rnams spangs nas// khyim med par ni rab tu byung// bstan la brtson 'grus byas bas na// 'dod chags thams cad yang dag/
bton// gang tsho len pa med pa yi/ mya ngan 'das bar bdag gyur na'ang/ rgyum gtum mkhal gnang// de dag kyang ni 'dzug par gyur// bdag gis sdig la byas pa dang// dge ba'i
las byas gang yin pa// dge dang sdig pa de drag gi/ 'bras bu de dag nyams su myong// mnyan yod dbus ma skyes pa yi/dge slongamathu chen sa gas ni/ dge slong dge 'du namadun 'dug
nas/ ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// sa ga'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o///de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis//
tshod ldan pa 'od srungs byin pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa 'od srungs byin pa can/ dge slongs gas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ da tshod ldan pa 'od/

00 srungs byin pa can gyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs byin pa can gyis de'i tsho rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de mu ge dag ni byung ba na//
grong khyer pa ni mtha' drag gis// lo bdun tshang bar dge slong gi/ dge 'dun dag ni spyanadrangs so// de nas bdag gi skal bar ni// rang sangs rgyas ni skal ldan pa/ bsil bar
gyur cig zag med pa'i// thub pa mdzes pa gcig cig 'ongs// bdag gis dam bcas byas pa ni// las mi byed na bu dang ni// nang mi yang rung su la yang/ bdag gis zanan mi sbyin
no/ da ltar rnam par bsams nas ni// bdag gis sdig pa'i blo bsamasab/ dge slong las mi byed pa 'di// bdag gis ci ste zas sbyin zhes// de nas drang srong bdag 'grogs nas//
zhing las mtha' rnams blta ba'i phyir/ mtha' dag tu ni bskor nas su// de yi 'og tu zas zar bcug/ las kyi rnam par smin pa des// bsdus gzhom dang ni tsha ba yi// dmyal ba rnams
su skyes nas ni// sdug bsngal kho na'i tshor ba thob// dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos bdug/ gang dang gang du skyes par ni// detshobartson ba mang byas na'ang// sdug bsngal kho nas zas red/
do/ bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni// mi lo sad thob 'di yin te// rdzogs sangasablan med pa yi// ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas// yang dag dadapas rab 'byung nas// bdag gis zag pa rnams
[r/ ]@#// bcom ste// bdag gis mngon shes drug reg gnas// ragra bcom nyid kyang thob bar gyur/ da dung du yang btsun pa des// 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul ldan lags na'ang//
daltar lan mngasong nas ni// sdugakhaN+Dal gyis zhi zos bsgrub po// lamanaring por so nas kyang// badragani zas dag sgrub pa ni// gang tshebadag ni bsgyur nas// de yi 'og tu zas 'grub bo//
sgyu rus ni 'od srungs las kyi ming/ byin pa can ni mthu chen gi/ ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi lasanilung bstan te// 'od sAsi na can gyi li lho nyi shu pa'o//
tsha/sdomani de lam phran sprul khol ma 'gags dang// nag po lnga pa sgra gcan dang// dga' bo nor dang zhe sde dang// bzang ldan dang na mdzes bzang ngo/ de nas dge slong

zla gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshodang ldan pa las thun bstan la 'di skad ces smAs so// tshodang ldan pa lam phran bstan/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungasan pa can gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu b.lung

bstan zin gyiso/ dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan gyis de'i tshe rang gilas kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon gyi tshor bas gzhan rnams
su// bdagazhi phag rdzir gyur pa na// phag rnams kha'icingos nas su// 'bab chu los ni sgrol bar byed// 'bab tshulas nibasgral ba'i phyir// bdag gis chudabus phyin pa dang// bskyod
bar gyur pas dbugs subs nas/ phag rnams thams cad g por gyur// skyob pa med cing mgon med pas// bdag kyang 'bab chus khyer ba las/ drang srong rjes su brtse bdag/ 'ongs
nas bdag ni byung bar gyur// de dag gis bdag de bas bsgral// de nas bdag gis rab tu byung// bdag gis gdams ngag med pa ni// 'du shes med la snyoms par zhugs/ de nas 'chi
ba'i dus byas nas/ lha rnams su ni bdag skyes te// lha yi 'jig rten shi 'thos nas// bdag gis mi yi srid pa thob// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos byas nas/ khyim med par ni
rab tu byung/ rmongs shing g.yor bo ma yin pas// bgad pa bdag gis ma rtogs so// btsun pa bdag gis zla gsum du// tshigs bcad gcig la zhugs nas ni// tshig bzhi pa yi rkang
pa gcig/ rtogs pas 'dod chags kun bton to// btsun pa de ltar bdag gis ni// las gang bgyis pa dran lags te/ bskal pa mi nyung yun ring du// 'khor 'dir ni bdag
gis brgyugs// 'jig rten mgon pa'i spyan sngar ni// lam phran bstan gyi dkar nag las// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// lung bstan pa ni byas pa yin// lam phran bstan gyi le'u
ste nishu gcig pa'o////de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshodang ldan pa sbrum khol la 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa sbrul khol/
tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan gyis rang gi las kyi sgrub lung bstan zin gyis tshe dang ldan pas kyang rang gi las kyi grub lu ston cig/ de nas tshodang ldan pa
la khol gyis de'i tshorang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sangs rgyas 'od srungs mya ngan 'das/ thog mar byung ba'i dge sbyong ni// sde snod gsum ldan mang du thos// chos kyi ser
smra can du gyur// dge slong gzhan bdag shes gyur na// bdag dang mtshungs par 'gyur 'ong zhes// bdag gis dge slong rnams la chos// ma bton ci zhig bshad do/ bdug
gi drung du dge slong gang// nye bar 'ongs nas 'dri byed na'ang// thams cad gdams ngag ma byin par// thams cad du ni sbyos shing bkye// dge slong rnams ni nyer 'ongs nas// de tshe
bdag la bkur sti byed// chos ni rab tu mi ston pa// khyod kyi de ni bzang min zer// de nas 'chi ba'i dus bab tshe/ bdag gis chos n gzhan dag la// ma bstan de ni gegs min
zhes bdag na yod la 'gyod bar gyur// tshe yi lhag ma nyung ngu zhige/ zhag bdun lus nas bdag gis ni// rab tu byung ba rnams bsogs te// de nas skye ba bshags pa byas//
bdag gis nyes pa bshags byas shing// ser sna de ni rnam bsal nas// de tsho bdag gis nub bdun du// don bzang po yi chos bshad do// bdag gi blo la ci lcogs bas// legs
bar bag dpa'i chos thosanas// phan tshunA'adoms shing gcig la gcig/ smra bar yang ni phyed du bcug de tsho bdag gis nub bdun du// chos ni cung zad cig bshad pas/
'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa yi// lha yi'ajig rten dgachu dga'// lcami 'jig rten gi 'i thos te/ bdag gis mi yi sride thob nas/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi dag tu/ Akya'i
rgyal po'i 'ogis su skyes// nor chen longs spyod chen po dang// gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa dang// thams cad la sdug yid 'ong zhing// phun sum tshogs pa'i mthar phyin to// khyim 'i
nas ni skyes pa red/ khyim med pa ni rab 'byungalas// 'dod pa'i longs skyod 'byor pas na// bdag ni rab 'byung ma btub bo// rdzogs sangs gang zag zlumed pas// bdag nyid la ni thugs
brtse'i phyir/ yang dang yang du rab 'byung ba/ yang dag len pa sku la mdzad// de nas ded dpon bla na mdab// sangs rgyas la ni bdag gi gsol// re zhig bdag gis lo bdun du/ sbyin pa mi nyung gtang
bar bkyi// bdag gis sbyin pa dag btang nas// lo bdun lonobar gyur pa dang// shes rab mchog can khyod las ni// de nas bdag gis rab tu 'byung// lo bdun dag ni thogs chos la// tsho'i
cung zad tsam yone pas// sang nyid 'chi yang sus shes kyis// de ring nyid du rtul te gyis// bdag gis gus pas sangs rgyas kyi// gsuzhi slar bzlog ma byas par// btsun pa bdag ni dgung bdun
[t]! @# ]/thugs brtses rab tu byung bar mdzod/ bdag gis zhag bdun sbyin btang ste/ 'khongs pa dag ni tshim byas nas/ bdag gi phyir ni zhi du dag/ grong khyer du ni me latse
ba btsugs// snang ba chen po rnams kyis ni// grong khyer mchog ni gsal bar byas// skye bo dag gis mtshor bar byas// rab 'byung phyin ni sngon du byung// bdag ni dad pas rab byung nas// rgyal ba'i
zla bstan la brtson byas te// la mnyi shu lnga lon yang// sems mnyam pa yang ma thob bo// de nas bdag gis sdig pa'i sims// 'dod la zhen pa skyes pa ni// bdud rtsi rtogs par ma gyur gyis//

dman par slar ni bdag ldog snyam/ de nas ngo tsha khrel yod pa// don chen dag ni skyes gyur pa// bdag la nye du'i tshogs smod cing// skyon du anganibagrang 'gyur ba// de ni bdag dang 'tsham min shing//
de ni bzang po ma yin gyi// bdag lta gson ma'ang ci ru rung// mtshon gyis gdam par bya'o snyam// mtshon rnon bdag ni blangs nas su// skyil mo krung ni bcasanas kyang// mtsho ni ske la gtad pa las//
nas sems ni rnam par grol// bdag sems tha ba las grol nas// yang dag yang du brjod pa ni// e ma'o sas rgyas chos dge 'dun// a ma'o chos nyide a re bzung// sngon ni bdag gi 'du
N+NaM shes gang// so so'i skye bo shi bla snyam// bdag gis srog la ma bltas pas// zhi ba dam pa thob par gyur pa yis// sngon 'khums par gyur pa yis// dam chos sor rtsa byas ba gang/ khatsun
pa de yi 'bras bu ni// sdug bsngal ba yi rnam par grol// bdag gis 'chi ba'i dus mchos// dam pa rab bstan gang yin pa'i/ las kyi rnam bar smin pa des// phun sum tshogs pas pha
rol phyin// shAkya'i bu bo dbang po rtul// sprul khol mthu chen ldan pas ni ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// skyul khol gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//

denas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshodang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan ba ma 'gags pa/ tshodapaldan ba sprul khol gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan

zin gyis/ tshodang ldan pa ma 'gags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu b.lung ston cig/ de nas tshodang ldan pa ma 'gags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par khyod de/ sngonan phrag khur khyer ba yi// tsathun
dbul bor gyur pa na/ bdag gis dge sbyong grags ldan pa/ nyon mongs bcom la bsod snyoms phul// shAkya'i rigs la bdag skyosaM na'ang// bdag ni ma 'gags yin par shes// la mo klu
la mkhas gyur bas// pho ga sgyu spyod pas khaslang ban// rdzogs sangs galas bsnyes med pa// ston pa bdag gis mthong bar gyur// mthong nas bdwagani sams dadabs// khyim med par yang
ba tu byung// bdag gis de yi gsung thos nas// bstan la dag 'a bas gnas gyur te// rtag tu pha rol gnon brtan zhing// gzabs pa'i bdag nyid brtson 'grus brtsams/ sangs rgyas
khastan pa mthar phyungs/ rig pa gsum rjes su thob/ bdag sngon gang na 'dug pa yi// sngon gyi gnas ni shes gyur te// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams su//
bdag gis lan bdun skye pa klus// slar yur ma ya nang du// sa yi dbang po lan bdun byas// de tsho 'dzamatshul dbang phyug gis// rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bsku'o 'di'i nabadun
ts+tshA dang der bdun// bdag gis lan ni bcu bzhir 'khor/ bdag sngonagang na 'dug pa gnas na sngon dugs gyur te/ las kyi 'bras bu de lta gu/ bdag gis de nyams sumyong
gang dang gang du skyes ba na// dga' pa dag gis rgya bar byed// sems can rnams kyi 'chi'atho drang// 'ong ba dang na 'gro ba dang// 'di lta bu dang gzhan rgyun shes// 'phags pa'i yan lag lnga
ldan dga'// yan lag lnga pa'i ting 'dzani lag/ zhib phyogs gcig goms byas zhing// shin tu sbyangs thub lam gyis ni// lha yi sngan ni rnam par sbyangs// ston pa 'jigarten bla med kyis da/
bag ga kun rtog ma bye nanas kyang// yid las byung ba'i sku yis naM/ bdag drung rdzu 'phrul gyi byonanas/ ston pa sus med la dgyes pas// spros pa dang 'bral ba bshad// bdag gis de yi gsung
sh+tsathos nas/ bstan la dga' bas gnas gyur te/ dortag pa rib po'i gnon brtan zhing// gzengs pa'i bdag nyidi brtson 'grus brtsams/ sangs rgyas bstan pa mthar phyung nas// rnagi ra gsum
tsha narjes su thob// 'chiba'angaman par mi dga' zhing// 'tsho ba' ngaman par ma dga' ste// shes pa zhan dran dang ldan pa bas// dus la so sor rtog par byed// yangs pa'i 'odra ma'i grong khyer
gyi 3'od mtshang tshang de'i drung du/ bdag gi srog ni bad nas kyang/ zag med mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// bdag gis bsod snyoms byan las ni// 'bras bu thob pa 'di yin te// rdzogs
sangs gang zag zla med pa'i/ ston pa bdag gis mnyes ba'i sa/ myan blas ba bsal gyur pa'i// dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob// thams cad gzigs pasabasod nams
can// rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to// de ltar gnas brtan ma 'gags pas// dag slong dge 'dunamadun 'dug nas// ma dros pa ya mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan
to/ ma 'gags pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis// tshe dang ldanul 'degs 'dzan gyibu nag po la 'di

skad ces smras so/ tshodang ldan nag po/ tshodrang ldan la ma 'gags pas rang gi las kyi rgyug lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang dbang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa
ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu ga bos de'atshorang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bu ram sbyo ba'i long pa na// bu ramashing rnams btsir ba las// rang sangs rgyas skal ldan ng// nad pa gsor rung
a// zhig 'os nas/ bdag gso thub pa nupadadun du// lu'am til mar bsnyen bkur byas// skal ldan zhag bdun 'das pa dang/ de nas de yi mkha' la 'gags//
sa bran de nyar 'ongs nas// bdag la sbas par gyur pan// yon ba gnas rab tu byung gyur pa// da ltabu nasong bar rgyug/ drang srong mkha' la song ngo zhes/ bdag gis de la tshig thos nas/
sems mgu ba dang yudabade bas// de yatshanA dad par byas// sems rang dung ba de yi bu ram sbyin pa btang bu des// bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi// lha dang min rnams su rgyug/
bdag gi skya ba za ma ni// sa yi srar thob 'a di yin te// rdzogs sas bla na med pa yi// ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas// shAkya seng ge 'i bstan pa la// bdag gis rab byung bzhes/
na mya ngan 'das pa bsal gyur pagi/ dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob// da dung du yang btsun pa dag/ bdagags chos gos bsod snyoms dang/ yo byad dang ni gnas mal gyis// da lta
tshang bo red par gyur/ bar na chos gos 'drub ba na// bu ram btung bsgyur pa'og/ bdag lasku ram gling bzhi zhig/ dgos so snyam du bsams pa dang// rgyal po gzugs can snying po la// de nas
lha yis sbas pa ni/ ri dgas 'dzin bu nag po la// bu rab gtong ba byin cig dang// mi yi dbang po khyod kyis na// bu ram btung ba rten chen 'gyur// 'tsho byed a ma'i tshul du ni// ri dgas bu la/
bu ram skyol/ rgyal po'i chog na mthu chen po// gzugs can snying po pa dag la gi/ stodachen po bu ram gyis bkang ba// bzhi po dag ni bkur bar gyur// de nas des ni bu ram ga/ ro dang ldan
pa khyer 'ongs nas// stong ni nyis brgya lnga bcu gi/ dge slong dge 'dun tshim par phyas// yid g 'dzin bu dag bcom pa// mngon shes drug ldan mthu chen po// ma dros pa ya mtsho chen ng/
rang gi las ni lung bstan to// ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag pa'i le'u ste nyi tsa la zhi bgo de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra
gcan zin la 'di skad ces sas so// tshodang ldan ba sgra gcan zin/ tshe dang ldan pa la dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag pos rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis
nga da rang gi las kyi sgyu lung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis de'i tsho rang gi las kyi rgyub lung ston par byed de/ bdag sngon lus 'phags ma bkaM/ bdag po rgyal bor
rtsur pan// dgos pa zhig gi phyir 'a dug na// skye bos su bstan ban/ de nas drang song dka' thub cha// gzi brjida mchog 'jigs 'ongs gyur to// de bar 'ongs nas kyang// bdag
la 'di skad tshag smras so// sa bdag bdag ni rkun ma ste// bdag gis ma byin chag 'tshal gyis/ rkun po'i chad pa ji lta bar// khyod kyis de bzhin gcad du gsol// drang song tshes kyi yon tan
dga'// de la bdag gis der smras pa// khyod la mun kanang bar byas// khyod song la ba der spyod// rgyal po bdag gi 'khyongapa ni// de ltas bsal
ba'i rngom thog/ bdag la chodapas gsung mdzod dang// 'gyod pa drag nganga'abral bar 'agyur/ dbangag gis don rgya mo tshol// kazhi nizheg drug nga bar byas// den zhaka drug lon nas phyir//
rang gi bsti gnas gnas su song// zhe sdamed pa'i sems kyis ni// sdig pa bdag gis byas pas kyang// zab tu tsha dang thuganag tu// len dreg rnams su btsus// ngonas lasakyi
lhag masan// badrag gi lus na thas la// a yaMangal du lo drug ni// tshong par yang na 'dug par gyur// bdag ni zhe sdang yod bzhin du// lus dang ngag ka las byas pa// las rnams chud
ma tha bsan// nga yi 'bras bu3us su myong/ da ltar gnas brtan sgra gcan zin// dge slong dge 'dunamadun 'dug nas/ sa dris pa yi mdo chen du// rang gi lasani lung bstan to// sgra
gan zen gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//nas dge slongakAnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'dre skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan
pa dga' bo// tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin kyis rang gi las kyi chu ba lung bstan zin gyis tshod ldan pa dga' bos kyang darang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ donas tshe dang ldan pa
dga' bos kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la// bdag gis lan cika khrus byas te// dge slong dge 'dun khrus byas nas// de tshesmon/
lam btab pa ni// gnas brtan 'dulta bu ngan dang// bu dga'i lhan cig 'grogs par shog/ dag cingadris med pa dang// nyon mongs med cing thugabral shog/ kha dog bzang po dag dang
ni/ dkazugs bzang gyur cig smon lam btab/ de nas 'tshe'apho'i dus byas nas/ lha rnams su ni skyes par gyur/ badrag ni gser gyi mag 'dra ba'i/ mi dang lhan rnams
su gyur// gang dang gang du skyes pa ni// longs spyod chen posashin tu gnas // rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni// shin tu dkar bo bdag gis brtsigs// denus byug pas
thams ngan// saraporagyurapa de ltar byanas// de nas nAn nums 'dod pa phyir// gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur ba dang// gsar 'azangs dbyibs ni legs 'gyur bar// son
lam ngu zhig dab ba byas// dge ba'i las ni byas pas// grong khyerawArANasaran/u0f7a/ kasha'i rgyal bo kr-iki ya// bu pho 'bringabor bdag skyes so// 'od srungs mchod rtena mthong nas ni//
des dad pa'i sams bskyed de// mchod rten de la bdag gis ni// gdugs 'brong zhakani gdags pa byas// khrus dedazhibaso kang dang// yung gi byug pas byugs pa dang// gdugs ni
gdags pa byas pa yis// bde ba mang po nyams su myong// de nas las kyi lhagams na// bdag gi yang sride tha ma 'dir// shAkya'i rgyal po ririgs skyes nas/ sangs
rgyas skyob pa'id du gyur// bdag gi lus ni 'di la yang/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yod pa// sum cu lhag pa ma yin pa'i// sum cu dman pa ma yin pa'o/ shAkya seng ge 'i bstan pa
la// bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni// mya ngan 'das ba bsile gyur pa'i// dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob// thams cad gzigs pas mdzes pa yi// rnams kyi mchog tu bdag ban kho/
nyes bal bran pa zad nas ni// go 'phang dam pa thob par gyur/ de ltar gnas brtan dga' bosan// dge slong dge 'dun mduna'adu gnas // ma dros pa yematsho chen du// rang gi lasan lung
bstan to// dga' bo'i le'u sta ke shu rtsa drug pa'o//denas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis// tshe dang ldan pa gyang ba nor la 'daskadecas smras so// tshodang ldan pa

kyad bu mo tshodang ldan pa dga' bos ngo gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zen gyis/ tshe dang ldan ba gyad bunor gyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cika dran s tsho dang ldan pa rgyud bskor kyis de'i
rangaka las kyi rgyu ba lungaston par byed da/ 'dinas bdag sngon tshongapa// pa rjes ni bya bar gyur// tshong pa'i lam du zhugs pan/ dbang du gyur cing zagamed pa// nyon mongs mad pa'i
rang sangs rgyas// drang srong zhigani 'gron par 'ongs// de la bar du bdag gis ni/ rtag bar zas mgron du bos// kad du brang ni'adabs 'gyur bar// der ni gdang ba drag kyang bshams
rkang ba'i rludang ti mu dung de yi ma medag kyang bshams/ jisrid lam yod de srid du// bdag gis de la bkur sti byas/ tshong pa rnams kyis ma bzhin du/ mtsho 'gram du
phyin pa dang/ dge slongakru drung nyara'ongs nas// bdag gis de la smras pa ni// btsun pa rgya mtsho 'di la ni// nor gyi slad du bzhud dam ni// btsun pa bdag nyaka 'phongs pas na// 'dod
pa dag gi phyir yang// rgya mtsho chen po'amu tshogs la// nyen can ngu ne'ajug par byed// bdag la dge slong des smras pa/ bdag ni mya ngan 'das pa yin// khyed bkakarten kun lhan cig tu//
ran bsod nams rab der gyur// de tshe de la bdag gisani/ rab dgas chos gos bzang ba phul// mgo bos phyagadi byas nas yang// dre la sku bdag byas so// de'us bdag la
thugs brtse'i phyir// des ni chos gos thungs nas ni// de dag thams cad lta bzhin du// de yi 'og tu mkha' la 'phakas// cho 'phrul byed pa de mthong nas/ de tshebadag ni skyo gyur nas// bdag
gis thalamo sbyar byas te// de nas smon lam btab pa ni// gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang// bdagani lhan cige 'grogs pashog/ 'di yi chos ni gang dag thob/ de dag bdag gis/
]/thob par shog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas nimanyes byed cing/ rab tu byung ba thob pa dang/ dge 'dun la yang rdzu 'phrul gyis// rnam 'phrul bkur ste byed par shog/
dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis// lha ya'ajig rtenarab tu dga'// mi yi thob pa thob nas kyang// bdeb rgya chon mas sumyong// skye ba de dang dedag tu// bdag ni noran phyagapa dang// bsod zhams bus pas
mdzes pa yi// lha dang min rnams su gyur/ bskal pa tha ma 'di la// srid pa tha ma 'de la yang// kushi zhes bya'i gad rnams kyi// khyad kyi bar ni bdag skyes te// blta na sdug cing mdzes
ba dang / 3kazugs bzang spyod pa mdzes pa dang/ [ ]/thams cad la sdug yade 'ong zhing// phun sum tshogs pa mthar phyin to// sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge ni// bla nAmed pa mos pa byas//
mthengs bdag bsams dad byas te// khyen med panganarab tu byung/ ma ga d+ha ya 'i brgyudanus// 'od ma'atshol du gnas bcas na// ga slong dge 'dunamathobatsam pa'i// nyan thos dgacika
de lhags te/ gnasamal dag nibaskos na yang// dge slong rnams la spyi byed de/ ma par 'tshe zhing skyod pa dang// yang dang yang dug she ba byed// chengs pa mtshungs spyoda rnams mthong nas/
bdag nising rdzab gyur te// 'angaganazag pa zad gyurakyang// nyid kyis dge slong bsnyen bkur bya// bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams byas nas// bstan ba 'di la brtson byas ba// dkra
bcom bdag gis thob nas ni// mngon shes drug la dbang byas so// ston pa'i sngan sngar song nas nii// thub lamago bos phyag byas te// tholamo spyi bor spunas su// skyes bu dam pa la gsol
parta 'dod chakas gtimug gis ma lags// khyams sems gus dang bcas pa yis// thub pa 'dzaganadage slongagi/ a kro bgyid pa gnang bar mdzod// pha rol sems la mkhas pa yi///
sngon bas bdag gso la mkhyenas// nyid kyis drag slong dga' dunamadun// azhugama'i rim gro byed du bcug/ gas b.lus kyi las dazhi// dbazhi ga dang yid kyis kyang// khangag
gis rtag dusems gnas// dge slongangaga'an rim gro byas// spyodab lan zhugs pa dang/ lam nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag/ bdag gis mthong nas dga' ba dang/ so
sor langani bde gyur na/ dil mar rab 'bar lta bu mi/ badrag gi sor lnga'i sgron ma yi// rdzu'aphrul rnam par bstan byas nas// gnas mal dag ni 'cha'aparubyed// dag slong
gang dag bdag gi ni// cho 'phrul 'din lta 'dod na// nam ni sros par gyur ba dang// mun khungabag drung lhags nas ni// denamulanici rigs par// byams sems kus
dang bcas pa yis// kanasatshabadag ni'acha' byed tsang// skye bo mang po skyob bad bdag gis bsams pa gang yin dang// bag gse smon lam gang btab pa// drag gi
zang bo da grub cing// go 'ang mi g.yo bdag gis thog/ de lta bur ni khyad bum// ga pa med cing dbang gyur pas// ma sa kha la mtshon du/ rang gi las ni lung
bstan to// gyad bunor gyi le'u ste nyenurtsa bdun pa'o//de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshodang ldan paskusngal 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa ste/

tshodang ldan paspyad bunor gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba 'ang bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan panyesdus kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyab lung ston tsa'i// de nas tshe dang ldan pa nyasdus pa'i rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung
ston par byed de/ 'das pa dag gi dusan bdag/ rngon pa dag tugyur pa na// nags chen nyams dgar khyul ba dang/ ra phyogasa rnam pa snatshogs mthong// dug gis bskus pa'i mda'anams
dang / rta gzhu yi tshogs dag klangs nas nii// ri dgas dang ni ri yi rdzopa// de dang der ni bdag gis rgyus// bdag gis ra degs rnams mthong na// gdug pa'i sems ni tir bzhag nas//
dug gis ba skus ba'i mda'a rnams kyis// re dogs mang po rab tu bstan// bdag gi lag na gzhu dang// dug gas bskus pa'i mda' bsrel bzhin// rang sangs rgyas shig ljon nga gi/
drungan bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur// bdag gis dge sbyong de 'bod nas// de tshoyadenamo bder gyur// de nas thub pa gnod tshad ba'i// lus la mdas nibasnun par gyur// de yi 'og tu dge
tsa slong de// mda' yi zug rngu'i sdug bsngal ldan// zhing de nyid kyi khyung du ni// len pa med par mya ngan 'das// rtsub pa'i las de byas pas na// sems can dmyal bar skyes nas ni// de la/
la ni stong phrag bcu// bdag gis sdug bsngal tshor ba myong// de nas dmyal las shi 'phos nas// dud 'gro'i skye gnas song nas ni// ri yi rdzong ni da nyid du// khadag ni ri dgasa rnams
su rgyas// rtag tu 'jigs shing bag chazhing// bkres kyi skom pas nyen pas na// rid pa shin tu sdug bsngal bas// bdag ni de dang der rgyu'o// rdzong der rjon pa gdug pa ni//
shin tu mi bzad pa rnams kyis// dug gas bskus pa'i mda' rnon gyis// bdag gi lus la bstun par gyur// bdag 'gyel de dag gis mthong nas/ bdag ni gson zhing 'gul bzhin du//
mtshon gyis yan lag rnams kyi sha/ bcad nas de rnams khyer zhing 'dong// bdag ni sa phyogs de nyid du// sha yi ched du bsad byas te// de ltar tsho rabs lnga brgyar ni// sdug bsngal mang po
bsgrubs pa yin// ri bo de nyid ngos na ni// dka' thub ldan la mkhu tshashing// rdzu 'phrul chegazi mi bzad pa'i// drang srong rab tu mang po mthong// bdag gis drang srong de mthong nas// de na
byams pa'i sems bsgoms te// blo bzang byams dang ldan pa la// gang dang yang du blta byas so// dka' thub ldan pa de rnams la// bdag gi se gus bcas sems dad byas// dge ba'i rtsa
kha de yisani// bdag gis mi yi srid pa thob/ khros don gnyer ba'i slong ba ni/ rang sangs rgyas shig mtho nas pa ni// gus pa yis ni rtag pa de// bdag gis/
zas la spyan drangs so// btsun pa de tshig byas nas su// detshosmonalam btab pa ni// drang srong 'di lta bu dag dang// bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes
byed cing// bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni// 'jigasaji skrag pa med pa yi// zag pa med la gnas par shog/ dge ba'i las de byas pas na// lha mi 'a jig rtenarab tu dga'/ mi
nyid rnyed pa thob nas kyang// phyug cing no na'ang bar gyur// rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa// ston pa bdag gis mnyes par byas// bdag gis shAkya thub mthong nas// khyim med
bar ni rab tu byung// dad pas rab tu byung nas kyang// bstan la dga' bas go nas byas pas// bdag gis dgra bcom thob nas ni// mngon shes drug la dbang byas so// da dung du yang
khatsun pa dag/ ba dag ni thams cad dbang gyur na'ang/ phug gi nang du zhugs nas su// 'chi bar nye bar gyur pa na// sbrul gdug shin tu mi bzad pa// bdag gi lus la 'bab par gyur//
btsun pa bdag gis nyes spyod pa// gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/ las ni chu dmi za bas na// de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong// de ltar gnas brtan nye sde las// dge slong dge 'dun
mduna'adug nas// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ nyasda'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o///dos dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams

kyis / tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan// tshe dang ldan pa nye sdus rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung
ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan shAkya'i rgyal pos deb tshorang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ dgon pa shin du 'jigs chen gyis// u ge dag ni khyung ba na// rang gi zas ni don
